tika-vin01t1:25: Namāmi sirasā dhīraṃ, garuṃ me gaṇavācakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:30: Porāṇehi kataṃ yaṃ tu, līnatthassa pakāsanaṃ;
tika-vin01t1:31: Na taṃ sabbattha bhikkhūnaṃ, atthaṃ sādheti sabbaso.
tika-vin01t1:43_2: ca katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti. Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:43_3: tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā. Tathā hi vaṇṇayanti –
tika-vin01t1:44_1: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
tika-vin01t1:44_2: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
tika-vin01t1:44_3: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi samācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
tika-vin01t1:45_0: Mayaṃ pana idhādhippetameva payojanaṃ dassayissāma. Tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:45_1: yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ. Idameva hi
tika-vin01t1:45_2: payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati –
tika-vin01t1:50_1: ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavabhāvato, tāya paññāpāṭavañca rāgādimalavidhamanato. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:51_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-vin01t1:51_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:51_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:53: Atha vā ratanattayapūjanassa paññāpadaṭṭhānasamādhihetuttā paññāpāṭavaṃ. Vuttañhi tassa samādhihetuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:54_0: “Evaṃ ujugatacitto kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:54_1: labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati,
tika-vin01t1:54_2: passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:55_0: Samādhissa ca paññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvo vuttoyeva “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:55_1: Tato evaṃ paṭubhūtāya paññāya paṭiññāmahattakataṃ khedamabhibhuyya anantarāyena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:56: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavaḍḍhanato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ratanattayapaṇāmena hi āyuvaṇṇasukhabalāni vaḍḍhanti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:58: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti. ;
tika-vin01t1:59: Tato āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavuḍḍhiyā hoteva kāriyaniṭṭhānamiti vuttaṃ “anantarāyena parisamāpanattha”nti.
tika-vin01t1:60: Atha vā ratanattayagāravassa paṭibhānāparihānāvahattā. Aparihānāvahañhi tīsupi ratanesu gāravaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:61: “Sattime, bhikkhave, aparihāniyā dhammā. Katame satta? Satthugāravatā dhammagāravatā saṅghagāravatā sikkhāgāravatā samādhigāravatā kalyāṇamittatā sovacassatā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:63: Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato. Vuttañhi tassa puññātisayattaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:67: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:71_0: Upāyesu ca paṭipannassa hoteva kāriyaniṭṭhānaṃ. Ratanattayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasaṃbuddhiyā
tika-vin01t1:71_2: pahoti, bhayādiupaddavañca nivāreti. Tasmā suvuttaṃ “saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:72_0: Evaṃ pana sappayojanaṃ ratanattayavandanaṃ kattukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:72_1: kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “yo kappa…pe… mahākāruṇikassa tassā”ti āha. Ettha
tika-vin01t1:72_2: pana yassā desanāya saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā yasmā karuṇāppadhānā, na suttantadesanā
tika-vin01t1:72_3: viya karuṇāpaññāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā viya paññāppadhānā, tasmā karuṇāppadhānameva
tika-vin01t1:72_4: bhagavato thomanaṃ āraddhaṃ. Esā hi ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ ārambhānurūpathomanā.
tika-vin01t1:72_6: karuṇāpaññāppadhānaṃ, abhidhammadesanāya saṃvaṇṇanārambhe “karuṇā viya sattesu, paññā
tika-vin01t1:72_7: yassa mahesino”ti paññāppadhānañca thomanaṃ āraddhaṃ. Karuṇāpaññāppadhānā hi suttantadesanā
tika-vin01t1:72_9: sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya tattha sātisayappavattito. Suttantadesanāya hi mahākaruṇāsamāpattibahulo
tika-vin01t1:72_11: ca kevalaṃ paññāppadhānā paramatthadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhasamatthāya paññāya
tika-vin01t1:73_0: Vinayadesanā pana āsayādinirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ karuṇāya pākatikasattenapi asotabbārahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:73_1: suṇanto apucchitabbārahaṃ pucchanto avattabbārahañca vadanto bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:73_2: paññapesīti karuṇāppadhānā. Tathā hi ukkaṃsapariyantagatahirottappopi bhagavā lokiyasādhujanehipi
tika-vin01t1:73_5: verañjādīsu sārīrikañca khedamanubhosi. Tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:73_6: viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī,
tika-vin01t1:73_7: karuṇāya kiccaṃ pana tatopi adhikanti karuṇāppadhānā vinayadesanā. Karuṇābyāpārādhikatāya
tika-vin01t1:73_8: hi desanāya karuṇāppadhānatā. Tasmā ārambhānurūpaṃ karuṇāppadhānameva ettha thomanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:74_0: Karuṇāggahaṇena ca aparimeyyappabhāvā sabbepi buddhaguṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā taṃmūlakattā
tika-vin01t1:74_1: sesabuddhaguṇānaṃ. Mahākaruṇāya vā chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu aññatarattā taṃsahacaritasesāsādhāraṇañāṇānampi
tika-vin01t1:74_2: gahaṇasabbhāvato sabbepi buddhaguṇā nayato dassitāva honti. Esoyeva hi niravasesato
tika-vin01t1:74_3: buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo yadidaṃ nayaggāho. Aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe
tika-vin01t1:79_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ patianuyuttena “no
tika-vin01t1:79_1: hetaṃ, bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “apica me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin01t1:80_0: Ayaṃ pana avayavattho – yoti aniyamavacanaṃ. Tassa “nātho”ti iminā sambandho. “Kappakoṭīhipī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:80_1: pana yāya karuṇāya so “mahākāruṇiko”ti vuccati, tassā vasena kappakoṭigaṇanāyapi
tika-vin01t1:80_2: appameyyaṃ kālaṃ lokahitatthāya atidukkaraṃ karontassa bhagavato dukkhānubhavanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:80_3: dasseti. Karuṇāya baleneva hi so bhagavā hatthagatampi nibbānaṃ pahāya saṃsārapaṅke
tika-vin01t1:80_4: nimuggaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato samuddharaṇatthaṃ cintetumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ nayanajīvitaputtabhariyadānādikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:80_5: atidukkaramakāsi. Kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kālanti kappakoṭigaṇanāyapi “ettakā kappakoṭiyo”ti
tika-vin01t1:80_7: aparicchinnāni kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kappakoṭivaseneva
tika-vin01t1:80_8: hi so kālo appameyyo, asaṅkhyeyyavasena pana paricchinnoyeva. “Kappakoṭīhipī”ti apisaddo
tika-vin01t1:80_9: kappakoṭivasenapi tāva pametuṃ na sakkā, pageva vassagaṇanāyāti dasseti. “Appameyyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:80_10: kāla”nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ “māsamadhīte, divasaṃ caratī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:80_11: Karonto atidukkarānīti pañcamahāpariccāgādīni atidukkarāni karonto. Evamatidukkarāni
tika-vin01t1:80_12: karonto kiṃ vindīti ce? Khedaṃ gato, kāyikaṃ khedamupagato, parissamaṃ pattoti attho,
tika-vin01t1:80_13: dukkhamanubhavīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dukkhañhi khijjati sahitumasakkuṇeyyanti “khedo”ti
tika-vin01t1:80_14: vuccati. Lokahitāyāti “anamatagge saṃsāre vaṭṭadukkhena accantapīḷitaṃ sattalokaṃ
tika-vin01t1:80_15: tamhā dukkhato mocetvā nibbānasukhabhāgiyaṃ karissāmī”ti evaṃ sattalokassa hitakaraṇatthāyāti
tika-vin01t1:80_16: attho. Assa ca “atidukkarāni karonto”ti iminā sambandho. Lokahitāya khedaṃ gatoti
tika-vin01t1:80_17: yojanāyapi natthi doso. Mahāgaṇṭhipadepi hi “atidukkarāni karonto khedaṃ gato, kimatthanti
tika-vin01t1:81_0: Yaṃ pana evaṃ yojanaṃ asambhāventena kenaci vuttaṃ “na hi bhagavā lokahitāya saṃsāradukkhamanubhavati.
tika-vin01t1:81_1: Na hi kassaci dukkhānubhavanaṃ lokassa upakāraṃ āvahatī”ti, taṃ tassa matimattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:81_2: Evaṃ yojanāyapi atidukkarāni karontassa bhagavato dukkhānubhavanaṃ lokahitakaraṇatthāyāti
tika-vin01t1:81_3: ayamattho viññāyati, na tu dukkhānubhavaneneva lokahitasiddhīti. Paṭhamaṃ vuttayojanāyapi
tika-vin01t1:81_4: hi na dukkarakaraṇamattena lokahitasiddhi. Na hi dukkaraṃ karonto kañci sattaṃ maggaphalādīsu
tika-vin01t1:81_5: patiṭṭhāpeti, atha kho tādisaṃ atidukkaraṃ katvā sabbaññubhāvaṃ sacchikatvā niyyānikadhammadesanāya
tika-vin01t1:81_6: maggaphalādīsu satte patiṭṭhāpento lokassa hitaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin01t1:82_0: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārabhājanavasena tividho loko, hitakaraṇassa pana adhippetattā
tika-vin01t1:82_1: taṃvisayasseva sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti ettha puññapāpāni
tika-vin01t1:82_2: taṃvipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Katthaci pana “sanarāmaralokagaru”ntiādīsu samūhatthopi
tika-vin01t1:82_3: lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “iminā
tika-vin01t1:82_4: sattalokañca jātilokañca saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā tassa sattalokassa idhalokaparalokahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:82_5: atikkantaparalokānaṃ vā ucchinnalokasamudayānaṃ idha jātiloke okāsaloke vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasaṅkhātañca
tika-vin01t1:82_6: hitaṃ sampiṇḍetvā lokassa, lokānaṃ, loke vā hitanti sarūpekasesaṃ katvā lokahitamiccevāhā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:82_7: na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasaṅkhaātahitassapi sattalokavisayattā,
tika-vin01t1:84_0: Nāthoti lokapaṭisaraṇo, lokasāmī lokanāyakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi sabbānatthapaahārapubbaṅgamāya
tika-vin01t1:84_3: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ ekapaṭisaraṇo patiṭṭhā. Atha
tika-vin01t1:84_4: vā nāthatīti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ mettāyanavasena āsīsati patthetīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:84_5: Atha vā nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpetīti attho, nāthatīti vā yācatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:84_6: Bhagavā hi “sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:84_7: sattānaṃ taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācitvāpi karuṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti.
tika-vin01t1:84_8: Paramena vā cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro
tika-vin01t1:84_9: bhagavā “nātho”ti vuccati. Sabbopi cāyamattho saddasatthānusārato veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:85_0: Mahākāruṇikassāti yo karuṇāya kampitahadayattā lokahitatthaṃ atidukkarakiriyāya anekappakāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:85_1: tādisaṃ saṃsāradukkhamanubhavitvā āgato, tassa mahākāruṇikassāti attho. Tattha kiratīti
tika-vin01t1:85_2: karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Dukkhitesu vā kirīyati pasārīyatīti
tika-vin01t1:85_3: karuṇā. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādheti, vināseti
tika-vin01t1:85_4: vā parassa dukkhanti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti
tika-vin01t1:85_5: vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā
tika-vin01t1:85_6: attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādhetīti. Karuṇāya niyuttoti
tika-vin01t1:85_7: kāruṇiko yathā “dovāriko”ti. Yathā hi dvāraṭṭhānato aññattha vattamānopi dvārapaṭibaddhajīviko
tika-vin01t1:85_8: puriso dvārānativattavuttitāya dvāre niyuttoti “dovāriko”ti vuccati, evaṃ bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:85_9: mettādivasena karuṇāvihārato aññattha vattamānopi karuṇānativattavuttitāya karuṇāya
tika-vin01t1:85_10: niyuttoti “kāruṇiko”ti vuccati. Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi yāva mahāparinibbānā
tika-vin01t1:85_11: lokahitatthameva lokanāthā tiṭṭhanti. Mahanto kāruṇikoti mahākāruṇiko. Satipi bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:85_12: tadaññaguṇānampi vasena mahantabhāve kāruṇikasaddasannidhānena vuttattā karuṇāvasenettha
tika-vin01t1:85_14: iminā padena puggalādhiṭṭhānena satthu mahākaruṇā vuttā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:86_0: Atha vā karuṇā karuṇāyanaṃ sīlaṃ pakati etassāti kāruṇiko, pathavīphassādayo viya
tika-vin01t1:86_1: kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvā karuṇāyanasabhāvo sabhāvabhūtakaruṇoti attho. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin01t1:86_2: Atha vā mahāvisayatāya mahānubhāvatāya mahābalatāya ca mahatī karuṇāti mahākaruṇā.
tika-vin01t1:86_3: Bhagavato hi karuṇā niravasesesu sattesu pavattati, pavattamānā ca anaññasādhāraṇā
tika-vin01t1:86_4: pavattati, diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañca mahantameva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ ekantato nipphādeti,
tika-vin01t1:86_5: mahākaruṇāya niyuttoti mahākāruṇikoti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Atha vā mahatī
tika-vin01t1:86_6: pasatthā karuṇā assa atthīti mahākāruṇiko. Pūjāvacano hettha mahantasaddo “mahāpuriso”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:86_7: viya. Pasatthā ca bhagavato karuṇā mahākaruṇāsamāpattivasenapi pavattito anaññasādhāraṇattāti.
tika-vin01t1:87_0: Evaṃ karuṇāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvā idāni saddhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:87_2: asambujjhanto appaṭivijjhantoti attho, yathāsabhāvaṃ appaṭivijjhanatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:87_3: Hetuattho hettha antasaddo “paṭhanto nisīdatī”tiādīsu viya. Yanti pubbakālakiriyāya
tika-vin01t1:87_4: aniyamato kammaniddeso. Buddhanisevitanti tassa visesanaṃ. Tattha buddhasaddassa
tika-vin01t1:87_5: tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho
tika-vin01t1:87_6: veditabbo. Atha vā savāsanāya aññāṇaniddāya accantavigamato, buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:87_7: buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa
tika-vin01t1:87_8: abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva
tika-vin01t1:87_9: kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho. Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena
tika-vin01t1:87_11: khandhasantāno buddho. Yathāha “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe
tika-vin01t1:87_12: ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu
tika-vin01t1:87_13: ca vasībhāva”nti. Tena evaṃ nirupamappabhāvena buddhena nisevitaṃ gocarāsevanābhāvanāsevanāhi
tika-vin01t1:88_0: Tattha nibbānaṃ gocarāsevanāvaseneva nisevitaṃ, maggo pana attanā bhāvito ca bhāvanāsevanāvasena
tika-vin01t1:88_1: sevito, parehi uppāditāni pana maggaphalāni cetopariyañāṇādinā yadā parijānāti, attanā
tika-vin01t1:88_2: uppāditāni vā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena paricchindati, tadā gocarāsevanāvasenapi sevitāni
tika-vin01t1:88_3: hontiyeva. Ettha ca pariyattidhammassapi pariyāyato dhammaggahaṇena gahaṇe sati sopi
tika-vin01t1:88_5: adhigacchati, tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi
tika-vin01t1:88_6: sacchikiriyāya sammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti yaṃ asambudhaṃ asambujjhanto asacchikarontoti
tika-vin01t1:88_7: atthasambhavato sopi idha vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tampi ca appaṭivijjhanto bhavābhavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:88_8: gacchati, pariññātadhammavinayo pana tadatthapaṭipattiyā sammāpaṭipanno na cirasseva
tika-vin01t1:91_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi maggaphalanibbānāni paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakehipi gocarāsevanādinā
tika-vin01t1:91_1: sevitāni honti, tathāpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena “buddhanisevita”nti vuttaṃ. Kenaci
tika-vin01t1:91_2: pana buddhasaddassa sāmaññato buddhānubuddhapaccekabuddhānampi ettheva saṅgaho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:92_0: Bhavābhavanti aparakālakiriyāya kammaniddeso, bhavato bhavanti attho. Atha vā bhavābhavanti
tika-vin01t1:92_1: sugatiduggativasena hīnapaṇītavasena ca khuddakaṃ mahantañca bhavanti attho. Vuddhatthopi
tika-vin01t1:92_2: hi a-kāro dissati “asekkhā dhammā”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā abhavoti mahābhavo vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:92_3: Atha vā bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti vā sassatadiṭṭhi, abhavoti ucchedadiṭṭhi.
tika-vin01t1:92_4: Vuttappakāro bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavo. Taṃ bhavābhavaṃ. Gacchatīti aparakālakiriyāniddeso.
tika-vin01t1:92_5: Jīvalokoti sattaloko. Jīvaggahaṇena hi saṅkhārabhājanalokaṃ nivatteti tassa bhavābhavagamanāsambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:93_0: Avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsinoti dhammavisesanaṃ. Tattha avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā.
tika-vin01t1:93_1: Pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho. Tabbiparītato
tika-vin01t1:93_2: kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti vā avijjā, khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:93_3: āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññataṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:93_4: tathaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti vā avijjā, dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:93_5: atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā, antavirahite saṃsāre sabbayonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
tika-vin01t1:93_6: satte javāpetīti vā avijjā, paramatthato avijjamānesupi itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesupi
tika-vin01t1:93_7: khandhādīsu na javatīti vā avijjā. Sā ādi yesaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ te avijjādayo, teyeva
tika-vin01t1:93_8: kilissanti etehi sattāti kilesā, teyeva ca sattānaṃ bandhanaṭṭhena jālasadisāti jālaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:93_9: taṃ viddhaṃseti sabbaso vināseti sīlenāti avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī. Nanu cettha
tika-vin01t1:93_10: sapariyattiko navalokuttaradhammo adhippeto, tattha ca maggoyeva kilese viddhaṃseti,
tika-vin01t1:93_11: netareti ce? Vuccate. Maggassapi nibbānamāgamma kilesaviddhaṃsanato nibbānampi kilese
tika-vin01t1:93_12: viddhaṃseti nāma, maggassa kilesaviddhaṃsanakiccaṃ phalena nipphannanti phalampi
tika-vin01t1:94: Dhammavarassa tassāti pubbe aniyamitassa niyamavacanaṃ. Tattha yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-vin01t1:95: “Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
tika-vin01t1:97_0: Hi vuttaṃ. Saṃsāradukkhe vā apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo maggaphaluppattiyā sattakkhattuparamatādivasena
tika-vin01t1:97_2: katvā ariyamaggo tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nibbānañcāti ubhayameva nippariyāyato
tika-vin01t1:97_4: pariyattidhammo tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhayaṃ pariyāyato dhāretīti veditabbaṃ. Vuttappakāro
tika-vin01t1:97_5: dhammoyeva attano uttaritarābhāvena varo pavaro anuttaroti dhammavaro, tassa dhammavarassa
tika-vin01t1:97_6: namo atthūti sambandho. Ettāvatā cettha amhehi sārattho pakāsito. Yaṃ panettha kenaci
tika-vin01t1:97_7: papañcitaṃ, amhehi ca idha na dassitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ. Ito paresupi evameva
tika-vin01t1:97_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmā ito paṭṭhāya ettakampi avatvā sāratthameva dassayissāma. Yattha
tika-vin01t1:97_9: pana kenaci accantaviruddhaṃ likhitaṃ, tampi katthaci dassayissāma. Ettha ca “avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsino”ti
tika-vin01t1:97_10: etena svākkhātatādīhi dhammaṃ thometi, “dhammavarassā”ti etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa
tika-vin01t1:97_11: abhāvadīpanato paripuṇṇatāya. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadaṃ dhammassa dasseti, dutiyena pabhāvasampadaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:98_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ
tika-vin01t1:98_1: “guṇehī”tiādimāha. “Guṇehī”ti padassa “yutto”ti iminā sambandho. Idāni yehi guṇehi
tika-vin01t1:98_3: vuccati. Samādhīti paṭhamajjhānādi. Samādhisīsena hi paṭhamajjhānādayo vuttā. Paññāti
tika-vin01t1:98_4: maggapaññā. Vimutti ca vimuttiñāṇañca vimuttivimuttiñāṇanti vattabbe ekadesasarūpekasesanayena
tika-vin01t1:98_5: “vimuttiñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ādisaddapariyāyena pabhutisaddena vā vimuttiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:98_6: Tattha vimuttīti phalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇanti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Pabhuti-saddena chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidādayo
tika-vin01t1:98_7: guṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca sīlādayo guṇā lokiyā lokuttarā ca yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:98_8: niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā. Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “sīlādayo kiñcāpi lokiyalokuttarā
tika-vin01t1:98_9: yathāsambhavaṃ labbhanti, tathāpi ante ‘ariyasaṅgha’nti vacanato sīlādayo cattāro
tika-vin01t1:98_10: dhammakkhandhā lokuttarāvā”ti, taṃ tassa matimattaṃ. Na hi ariyasaṅghassa lokiyaguṇehipi
tika-vin01t1:98_11: thomanāya koci doso dissati, sabbaññubuddhassapi tāva lokiyalokuttaraguṇehi thomanā
tika-vin01t1:99_0: Kusalatthikānaṃ janānaṃ puññassa vuddhiyā khettasadisattā khettanti āha “khettaṃ
tika-vin01t1:99_1: janānaṃ kusalatthikāna”nti. Khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyatīti hi khettaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:99_4: hi vuttaṃ. Tanti pubbe “yo”ti aniyamena vuttassa niyamavacanaṃ. Ariyasaṅghanti ettha
tika-vin01t1:99_5: ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato ariyā niruttinayena. Atha
tika-vin01t1:99_6: vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito
tika-vin01t1:99_7: ariyā. Ariyānaṃ saṅgho samūhoti ariyasaṅgho. Atha vā ariyo ca so yathāvuttanayena
tika-vin01t1:99_8: saṅgho ca diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvatoti ariyasaṅgho, aṭṭha ariyapuggalā. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:99_9: ariyasaṅghaṃ. Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti
tika-vin01t1:99_10: ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā namāmī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:100_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:100_1: idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento āha “icceva”miccādi. Iccevaṃ
tika-vin01t1:100_2: yathāvuttanayena accantaṃ ekantena namassaneyyaṃ namassitabbaṃ ratanattayaṃ namassamāno
tika-vin01t1:100_3: kāyavācācittehi vandamāno ahaṃ vipulaṃ yaṃ puññābhisandaṃ alatthanti sambandho. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:100_4: buddhādayo ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe
tika-vin01t1:100_5: āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:101_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-vin01t1:101_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:101_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma,
tika-vin01t1:101_3: ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:106_0: “Puññābhisandanti puññarāsiṃ puññappavattaṃ vā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Majjhimagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:106_1: pana cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “puññābhisandanti puññābhinisaṃsa”ntipi attho vutto. Puññābhisandanti
tika-vin01t1:106_2: puññanadiṃ, puññappavāhanti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo. Avicchedena pavattiyamānañhi
tika-vin01t1:106_3: puññaṃ abhisandanaṭṭhena “puññābhisando”ti vuccati. Teneva sāratthapakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāya –
tika-vin01t1:107_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā. Katame cattāro?
tika-vin01t1:107_1: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti ‘itipi so bhagavā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:107_2: buddho bhagavā’ti, ayaṃ paṭhamo puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro”ti –
tika-vin01t1:108_0: Evamādikāya pāḷiyā atthaṃ dassento “puññābhisandā kusalābhisandāti puññanadiyo kusalanadiyo”ti
tika-vin01t1:108_1: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “puññābhisandanti puññaphala”nti, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:108_2: Na hi ratanattayaṃ namassamāno tasmiṃ khaṇe puññaphalaṃ alattha, kintu anappakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:108_3: puññarāsiṃ tadā alabhi, tassa ca phalaṃ paralokabhāgī, diṭṭhadhamme tu antarāyavighāto
tika-vin01t1:108_4: tassa ca puññassa ānisaṃsamattakaṃ, “tassānubhāvena hatantarāyo”ti ca vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin01t1:108_5: ca puññaphale anuppanne tassānubhāvena hatantarāyabhāvo na sijjhati, na cetaṃ tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:108_6: khaṇe diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ ahosi. Tasmā tassa mahato puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:108_7: hatantarāyoti ayameva attho yujjati. Athāpi paṇāmakiriyāya janitattā puññameva puññaphalanti
tika-vin01t1:108_8: tassādhippāyo siyā, evaṃ sati yujjeyya. So ca puññappavāho na appamattako, atha kho
tika-vin01t1:108_9: mahantoyevāti dassento āha “vipula”nti, mahantaṃ anappakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Alatthanti
tika-vin01t1:109_0: Tassānubhāvenāti tassa yathāvuttassa puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena balena. Hatantarāyoti
tika-vin01t1:109_1: taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti
tika-vin01t1:109_2: antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho. Paṇāmapayojane vuttavidhinā hato viddhasto antarāyo
tika-vin01t1:109_3: upaddavo assāti hatantarāyo. Assa “vaṇṇayissaṃ vinaya”nti iminā sambandho, hatantarāyo
tika-vin01t1:109_4: hutvā vinayaṃ vaṇṇayissanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena tassa puññappavāhassa attano pasādasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:109_5: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ hanane samatthataṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:110_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassa vinayapiṭakassa
tika-vin01t1:110_1: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo, tassa tāva bhagavato sāsanassa mūlapatiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t1:110_2: tampi thomento āha “yasmiṃ ṭhite”tiādi. Aṭṭhitassa susaṇṭhitassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:110_3: yasmiṃ ṭhite patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha yasminti yasmiṃ vinayapiṭake.
tika-vin01t1:110_4: Ṭhiteti pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ hutvā lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena ṭhiteti
tika-vin01t1:110_7: “Appatiṭṭhaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, anāyūhaṃ oghamatari”nti hi vuttaṃ. Ayañcattho tīsupi
tika-vin01t1:110_8: sīhaḷagaṇṭhipadesu vuttoyeva. Gaṇṭhipade pana “aṭṭhitassāti parinibbutassapi bhagavato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:111_0: Patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti tesuyeva lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti. Susaṇṭhitassāti
tika-vin01t1:111_1: ettha tāva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanehi
tika-vin01t1:111_2: samannāgamanavasena susaṇṭhānassāti attho. Anena assa rūpakāyasampattiṃ nidassetī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:111_3: Gaṇṭhipade pana “yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhitehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatattā rūpakāyena susaṇṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:111_4: kāyavaṅkādirahitattā tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatattā ca nāmakāyenapī”ti vuttaṃ. Kenaci
tika-vin01t1:111_5: pana “catubrahmavihāravasena sattesu suṭṭhu sammā ca ṭhitassāti atthavasena vā susaṇṭhitassa.
tika-vin01t1:111_6: Susaṇṭhitattā hesa kevalaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo hitaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo sampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:111_7: ca pamudito apakkhapatito ca hutvā vinayaṃ deseti. Tasmā imasmiṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanādhikāre
tika-vin01t1:111_8: sāruppāya thutiyā thomento āha ‘susaṇṭhitassā”’ti vatvā “gaṇṭhipadesu vuttattho adhippetādhikārānurūpo
tika-vin01t1:111_9: na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti – yathāvuttakāmasukhallikādiantadvaye
tika-vin01t1:111_10: aṭṭhitattāyeva majjhimāya paṭipadāya sammā ṭhitattā susaṇṭhitassāti evamattho gahetabboti.
tika-vin01t1:111_11: Evañhi sati ārambhānurūpathomanā katā hoti yathāvuttaantadvayaṃ vivajjetvā majjhimāya
tika-vin01t1:112_0: Tanti pubbe “yasmi”nti aniyametvā vuttassa niyamavacanaṃ, tassa “vinaya”nti iminā
tika-vin01t1:112_1: sambandho. Asammissanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, nikāyantaraladdhīhi asammissaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:112_2: anākulaṃ katvā vaṇṇayissanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anurūpassa kālamattassapi
tika-vin01t1:112_4: attano balena vaṇṇayissāmīti vacanamattampi aññehi vattumasakkuṇeyyattā “nissāya
tika-vin01t1:112_5: pubbācariyānubhāva”nti āha. Pubbācariyānubhāvo nāma atthato pubbācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitā
tika-vin01t1:112_6: aṭṭhakathā, tatoyeva ca “pubbācariyānubhāvo aṭṭhakathā”ti sabbattha gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t1:112_7: vuttaṃ. Tasmā pubbācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāya vaṇṇayissaṃ, na attanoyeva
tika-vin01t1:113_0: Atha “porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu vijjamānāsu puna vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya kiṃ payojana”nti yo vadeyya,
tika-vin01t1:113_1: tassa porāṇaṭṭhakathāya anūnabhāvaṃ attano ca saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanaṃ dassento “kāmañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:113_2: Kāmanti ekantena, yathicchakaṃ vā, sabbasoti vuttaṃ hoti, tassa “saṃvaṇṇito”ti iminā
tika-vin01t1:113_3: sambandho. Kāmaṃ saṃvaṇṇitoyeva, no na saṃvaṇṇitoti attho. Kehi pana so vinayo saṃvaṇṇitoti
tika-vin01t1:113_5: uttamaṭṭhena ca āsabhā, tehi pubbācariyāsabhehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kīdisā panete pubbācariyāti
tika-vin01t1:113_6: āha “ñāṇambū”tiādi. Aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhātena ambunā salilena niddhotāni nissesato
tika-vin01t1:113_7: āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena dhotāni vikkhālitāni visodhitāni rāgādīni tīṇi malāni
tika-vin01t1:113_8: kāmāsavādayo ca cattāro āsavā yehi te ñāṇambuniddhātamalāsavā, tehīti attho. Iminā
tika-vin01t1:113_9: ca na kevalaṃ etesu ācariyabhāvoyeva, atha kho rāgādimalarahitā khīṇāsavā visuddhasattā eteti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:114_0: Khīṇāsavabhāvepi na ete sukkhavipassakā, atha kho evarūpehipi ānubhāvehi samannāgatāti
tika-vin01t1:114_1: dassento āha “visuddhavijjāpaṭisambhidehī”ti. Visuddhā accantaparisuddhā vijjā catasso
tika-vin01t1:114_2: ca paṭisambhidā yesaṃ te visuddhavijjāpaṭisambhidā, tehi. Ekadesena paṭisambhidaṃ
tika-vin01t1:114_3: appattānaṃ ariyānameva abhāvato etehi adhigatapaṭisambhidā paṭutaraladdhappabhedāti
tika-vin01t1:114_4: dassetuṃ visuddhaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Vijjāti tisso vijjā, aṭṭha vijjā vā. Tattha dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:114_5: pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇañcāti imā tisso vijjā. Aṭṭha vijjā pana –
tika-vin01t1:121_0: Evaṃ vipassanāñāṇamanomayiddhīhi saddhiṃ pariggahitā cha abhiññāyeva. Atthapaṭisambhidā
tika-vin01t1:121_2: Tattha saṅkhepato hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā,
tika-vin01t1:121_3: hetuhetuphalānurūpaṃ vohāresu ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, idaṃ ñāṇaṃ imamatthaṃ jotayatīti
tika-vin01t1:121_4: iminā ākārena heṭṭhā vuttesu tīsu ñāṇesu pavattañāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Etāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:121_5: pana vitthārakathā atipapañcabhāvato idha na vuccati. Paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ saddhammesu
tika-vin01t1:121_7: abhiyogavasena viseso hotīti laddhapaṭisambhidāsu sātisayataṃ dassetuṃ āhā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:122_0: Kilesajālaṃ parikkhārabāhullaṃ vā saṃlikhati tanuṃ karotīti sallekho. Idha pana khīṇāsavādhikārattā
tika-vin01t1:122_1: parikkhārabāhullassa sallikhanavaseneva attho gahetabbo, tatoyeva ca gaṇṭhipade “sallekhiye
tika-vin01t1:122_2: parimitaparikkhāravuttiyā”ti attho vutto. Sallekhassa bhāvo sallekhiyaṃ, tasmiṃ sallekhiye,
tika-vin01t1:122_3: sallekhapaṭipattiyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nosulabhūpamehīti asulabhūpamehi sallekhapaṭipattiyā
tika-vin01t1:122_4: asukasadisāti tesaṃ upamāya anucchavikapuggalānaṃ dullabhattā natthi sulabhā upamā
tika-vin01t1:122_6: paṭikkhipati. Dhajūpamehīti rathassa sañjānanahetukaṃ rathe baddhadhajaṃ viya ajānantānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:122_7: “asukehi ca asukehi ca therehi nivāsito mahāvihāro nāmā”ti evaṃ mahāvihārassa sañjānanahetuttā
tika-vin01t1:122_8: mahāvihārassa dhajūpamehi. Saṃvaṇṇitoti sammā anūnaṃ katvā vaṇṇito. Saṃvaṇṇito ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:122_9: vinayoti padacchedo kātabbo. Cittehi nayehīti anekappabhedanayattā vicittehi nayehi.
tika-vin01t1:122_11: nayehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā buddhavaraṃ anugatehi pubbācariyāsabhehīti sambandho kātabbo.
tika-vin01t1:123_0: Evaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāya anūnabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanavisesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:123_1: dassetuṃ “saṃvaṇṇanā”tiādimāha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kiñcāpi pubbācariyāsabhehi yathāvuttaguṇavisiṭṭhehi
tika-vin01t1:123_2: ayaṃ vinayo sabbaso vaṇṇito, tathāpi tesaṃ esā saṃvaṇṇanā sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ bhāsāya
tika-vin01t1:123_3: saṅkhatattā racitattā dīpantare bhikkhujanassa sīhaḷadīpato aññadīpavāsino bhikkhugaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:123_4: kiñci atthaṃ payojanaṃ yasmā nābhisambhuṇāti na sampādeti na sādheti, tasmā imaṃ
tika-vin01t1:123_5: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ pāḷinayānurūpaṃ katvā buddhasirittherena ajjhiṭṭho idāni samārabhissanti.
tika-vin01t1:123_6: Tattha saṃvaṇṇiyati attho etāyāti saṃvaṇṇanā, aṭṭhakathā. Sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
tika-vin01t1:123_7: paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā
tika-vin01t1:123_8: tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhoyeva buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo. Soyeva
tika-vin01t1:123_9: ca mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ābhato, pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi
tika-vin01t1:123_11: Sīhassa lānato gahaṇato sīhaḷo, sīhakumāro. Taṃvaṃsajātatāya tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:123_12: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassapi sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo, tasmiṃ sīhaḷadīpe bhūtattā
tika-vin01t1:123_13: sīhaḷadīpakena vākyena vacanena, sīhaḷabhāsāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:124_0: Pāḷinayānurūpanti pāḷinayassa anurūpaṃ katvā, māgadhabhāsāya parivattitvāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:124_1: hoti. Ajjhesananti garuṭṭhāniyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā
tika-vin01t1:124_2: ajjhesanā, taṃ ajjhesanaṃ, āyācananti attho. Tassa “samanussaranto”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:124_3: Kassa ajjhesananti āha “buddhasirivhayassa therassā”ti. Buddhasirīti avhayo nāmaṃ
tika-vin01t1:124_4: yassa soyaṃ buddhasirivhayo, tassa, itthannāmassa therassa ajjhesanaṃ sammā ādarena
tika-vin01t1:125_0: Idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya karaṇappakāraṃ dassento “saṃvaṇṇanaṃ tañcā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:125_1: tañca idāni vuccamānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samārabhanto sakalāyapi mahāaṭṭhakathāya idha
tika-vin01t1:125_2: gahetabbato mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ tassā idāni vuccamānāya saṃvaṇṇanāya sarīraṃ katvā mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:125_3: yo vinicchayo vutto, tatheva kurundīnāmādīsu vissutāsu aṭṭhakathāsu yo vinicchayo
tika-vin01t1:125_4: vutto, tatopi vinicchayato yuttamatthaṃ apariccajanto antogadhattheravādaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:125_5: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samārabhissanti padatthasambandho veditabbo. Ettha ca attho kathiyati
tika-vin01t1:125_6: etāyāti atthakathā, sāyeva aṭṭhakathā tthakārassa ṭṭhakāraṃ katvā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:125_7: viya. Mahāpaccariyanti ettha paccarīti uḷumpaṃ vuccati, tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā
tika-vin01t1:125_8: tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Kurundivallivihāro nāma atthi, tattha katattā kurundīti nāmaṃ
tika-vin01t1:125_9: jātanti vadanti. Ādisaddena andhakaṭṭhakathaṃ saṅkhepaṭṭhakathañca saṅgaṇhāti. Vissutāsūti
tika-vin01t1:126_0: Yuttamatthanti ettha tāva majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca idaṃ vuttaṃ “yuttamatthanti
tika-vin01t1:126_1: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṭṭhānassa yuttamatthaṃ, na pana tattha ayuttampi atthīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:126_2: Mahāgaṇṭhipade panettha na kiñci vuttaṃ. Kenaci pana “mahāaṭṭhakathānayena vinayayuttiyā
tika-vin01t1:126_3: vā yuttamattha”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati mahāpaccariādīsupi katthaci ayuttassāpi
tika-vin01t1:126_4: atthassa upari vibhāvanato. “Aṭṭhakathaṃyeva gahetvā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmī”ti vutte
tika-vin01t1:126_5: aṭṭhakathāsu vuttattheravādānaṃ bāhirabhāvo siyāti tepi antokattukāmo “antogadhatheravāda”nti
tika-vin01t1:126_6: āha, theravādepi antokatvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃvaṇṇananti aparakālakiriyāya kammaniddeso.
tika-vin01t1:126_7: Pubbe vuttaṃ tu “saṃvaṇṇana”nti vacanaṃ tattheva “samārabhanto”ti pubbakālakiriyāya
tika-vin01t1:126_8: kammabhāvena yojetabbaṃ. Sammāti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena rassabhāvo katoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:127_0: Evaṃ karaṇappakāraṃ dassetvā idāni sotūhi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassento “taṃ me”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:127_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – idāni vuccamānaṃ taṃ mama saṃvaṇṇanaṃ dhammapadīpassa tathāgatassa
tika-vin01t1:127_2: dhammaṃ sāsanadhammaṃ pāḷidhammaṃ vā sakkaccaṃ paṭimānayantā pūjentā thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:127_3: samannāgatattā therā, acirapabbajitattā navā, tesaṃ majjhe bhavattā majjhimā ca bhikkhū
tika-vin01t1:127_4: pasannacittā yathāvuttanayena sappayojanattā upari vakkhamānavidhinā pamāṇattā ca
tika-vin01t1:127_5: saddahitvā pītisomanassayuttacittā issāpakatā ahutvā nisāmentu suṇantūti. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:127_7: padīpo assāti dhammapadīpo, bhagavā. Tassa dhammapadīpassa.
tika-vin01t1:128_0: Idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya āgamavisuddhiṃ dassetvā pamāṇabhāvaṃ dassento “buddhenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:128_1: Yatheva buddhena yo dhammo ca vinayo ca vutto, so tassa buddhassa yehi puttehi dhammasenāpatiādīhi
tika-vin01t1:128_2: tatheva ñāto, tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matimaccajantā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyā yasmā pure
tika-vin01t1:128_3: aṭṭhakathā akaṃsūti ayamettha sambandho. Tattha dhammoti suttābhidhamme saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t1:128_4: vinayoti sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ. Ettāvatā ca sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:128_5: Sakalañhi buddhavacanaṃ dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ hoti. Vuttoti pāḷito ca atthato
tika-vin01t1:128_6: ca buddhena bhagavatā vutto. Na hi bhagavatā abyākataṃ nāma tantipadaṃ atthi, sabbesaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:128_7: attho kathito, tasmā sammāsambuddheneva tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamopi bhāsitoti
tika-vin01t1:128_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāyeva hi aṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin01t1:128_9: Tatheva ñātoti yatheva buddhena vutto, tatheva ekapadampi ekakkharampi avināsetvā
tika-vin01t1:128_10: adhippāyañca avikopetvā ñāto viditoti attho. Tesaṃ matimaccajantāti tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:128_11: adhippāyaṃ apariccajantā. Aṭṭhakathā akaṃsūti aṭṭhakathāyo akaṃsu. Katthaci “aṭṭhakathāmakaṃsū”ti
tika-vin01t1:128_12: pāṭho dissati, tatthāpi soyevattho, ma-kāro pana padasandhivasena āgatoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:129_0: Tasmāti yasmā tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ adhippāyaṃ avikopetvā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:129_1: tasmāti attho. Hīti nipātamattaṃ hetuatthassa “tasmā”ti imināyeva pakāsitattā. Yadi
tika-vin01t1:129_2: aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ sabbampi pamāṇaṃ, evaṃ sati tattha pamādalekhāpi pamāṇaṃ siyāti
tika-vin01t1:129_3: āha “vajjayitvāna pamādalekha”nti. Tattha pamādalekhanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle
tika-vin01t1:129_4: pamajjitvā likhanavasena pavattaṃ pamādapāṭhaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pamādena satiṃ
tika-vin01t1:129_5: apaccupaṭṭhapetvā adinnādānassa pubbapayoge “saccepi alikepi dukkaṭa”nti vuttavacanasadisaṃ
tika-vin01t1:129_6: yaṃ likhitaṃ, taṃ vajjayitvā apanetvā sabbaṃ pamāṇanti. Vakkhati hi tattha –
tika-vin01t1:130: “Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saccepi alikepi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitanti veditabbaṃ. Na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ nāma atthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:131_0: Kesaṃ pamāṇanti āha “sikkhāsu sagāravānaṃ idha paṇḍitāna”nti. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane.
tika-vin01t1:131_1: Puna “yasmā”ti vacanassa ko sambandhoti ce? Ettha tāva mahāgaṇṭhipade gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:131_2: ca na kiñci vuttaṃ, majjhimagaṇṭhipade pana cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca idaṃ vuttaṃ “yasmā
tika-vin01t1:131_3: pamāṇaṃ, tasmā nisāmentu pasannacittā”ti. Evamassa sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin01t1:131_4: vuttaṃ pamāṇaṃ, tasmā idha vuttampi pamāṇamevāti pāṭhasesaṃ katvā vajirabuddhitthero
tika-vin01t1:131_5: vadati. Tattha idhāti imissā samantapāsādikāyāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:132_0: Tattha “yasmā”ti vacanassa paṭhamaṃ vuttasambandhavasena aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ sabbampi
tika-vin01t1:132_1: pamāṇanti sādhitattā idāni vuccamānāpi saṃvaṇṇanā kevalaṃ vacanamatteneva bhinnā,
tika-vin01t1:132_2: atthato pana aṭṭhakathāyevāti dassetuṃ “tato ca bhāsantaramevā”tiādimāha. Pacchā
tika-vin01t1:132_3: vuttasambandhavasena pana idha vuttampi kasmā pamāṇanti ce? Yasmā vacanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t1:132_4: esāpi aṭṭhakathāyeva, tasmā pamāṇanti dassetuṃ “tato ca bhāsantaramevā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:132_5: Evamākulaṃ dubbiññeyyasabhāvañca katvā gaṇṭhipadesu sambandho dassito, anākulavacano
tika-vin01t1:132_6: ca bhadantabuddhaghosācariyo. Na hi so evamākulaṃ katvā vattumarahati, tasmā yathādhippetamatthamanākulaṃ
tika-vin01t1:132_7: suviññeyyañca katvā yathāṭhitassa sambandhavaseneva dassayissāma. Kathaṃ? Yasmā aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin01t1:132_8: vuttaṃ pamāṇaṃ, tasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti evamettha sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Yadi
tika-vin01t1:132_9: nāma aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ pamāṇaṃ, ayaṃ pana idāni vuccamānā kasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti
tika-vin01t1:132_10: āha “tato ca bhāsantarameva hitvā”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:132_11: pamāṇaṃ, yasmā ca ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāpi bhāsantarapariccāgādimattavisiṭṭhā, atthato pana
tika-vin01t1:132_12: abhinnāva, tatoyeva ca pamāṇabhūtā hessati, tasmā sakkaccaṃ ādaraṃ katvā anusikkhitabbāti.
tika-vin01t1:132_13: Tathā hi porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ pamāṇabhāvo, imissā ca saṃvaṇṇanāya bhāsantarapariccāgādimattavisiṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:132_14: atthato tato abhinnabhāvoti ubhayampetaṃ sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbabhāvahetūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:132_15: Na hi kevalaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ satipi pamāṇabhāve ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā tato bhinnā atthato
tika-vin01t1:132_16: aññāyeva ca sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti vattumarahati, nāpi imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya tatoabhinnabhāvepi
tika-vin01t1:132_17: porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ asati pamāṇabhāve ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti vattuṃ
tika-vin01t1:132_18: yuttarūpā hoti, tasmā yathāvuttanayena ubhayampetaṃ sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbabhāvahetūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:133_0: Tatoti aṭṭhakathāto. Bhāsantarameva hitvāti kañcukasadisaṃ sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā.
tika-vin01t1:133_1: Vitthāramaggañca samāsayitvāti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu upari vuccamānampi ānetvā tattha
tika-vin01t1:133_2: tattha papañcitaṃ “ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampannoti bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin01t1:133_3: ettha apalokanādīnaṃ catunnampi kammānaṃ vitthārakathā viya tādisaṃ vitthāramaggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:133_4: saṅkhipitvā vaṇṇayissāmāti adhippāyo. Tathā hi vakkhati –
tika-vin01t1:134_0: “Ettha ca ñatticatutthakammaṃ ekameva āgataṃ, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā cattāri saṅghakammāni
tika-vin01t1:134_1: nīharitvā vitthārato kathetabbānīti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, tāni ca ‘apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:134_2: ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakamma’nti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā vitthārena
tika-vin01t1:134_3: khandhakato parivārāvasāne kammavibhaṅgato ca pāḷiṃ āharitvā kathitāni. Tāni mayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:134_4: parivārāvasāne kammavibhaṅgeyeva vaṇṇayissāma. Evañhi sati paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā
tika-vin01t1:134_5: ca na bhāriyā bhavissati, yathāṭhitāya ca pāḷiyā vaṇṇanā suviññeyyā bhavissati, tāni
tika-vin01t1:134_6: ca ṭhānāni asuññāni bhavissanti, tasmā anupadavaṇṇanameva karomā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:135_0: Vinicchayaṃ sabbamasesayitvāti taṃtaṃaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ sabbampi vinicchayaṃ asesayitvā
tika-vin01t1:135_1: sesaṃ akatvā, kiñcimattampi apariccajitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vaṇṇituṃ yuttarūpaṃ hutvā
tika-vin01t1:135_2: anukkamena āgataṃ pāḷiṃ apariccajitvā saṃvaṇṇanato sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu ayuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:135_3: vaṇṇitaṃ yathāṭhāneyeva saṃvaṇṇanato ca vuttaṃ “tantikkamaṃ kiñci avokkamitvā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:135_4: kiñci pāḷikkamaṃ anatikkamitvā anukkameneva vaṇṇayissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:136_0: Suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthanti suttantapāḷiyaṃ āgatānampi vacanānamatthaṃ. Sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin01t1:136_2: suttantavacanānamatthaṃ taṃtaṃsuttānurūpaṃ sabbaso paridīpayissāmīti adhippāyo. Hessatīti
tika-vin01t1:136_3: bhavissati, kariyissatīti vā attho. Ettha ca paṭhamasmiṃ atthavikappe bhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:136_4: catubbidhaṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetvā suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā
tika-vin01t1:136_5: bhavissatīti vaṇṇanāya vasena samānakattukatā veditabbā. Pacchimasmiṃ atthavikappe
tika-vin01t1:136_6: pana heṭṭhāvuttabhāsantarapariccāgādiṃ katvā suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī
tika-vin01t1:136_7: ayaṃ vaṇṇanā amhehi kariyissatīti evaṃ ācariyavasena samānakattukatā veditabbā. Vaṇṇanāpīti
tika-vin01t1:136_8: ettha apisaddaṃ gahetvā “tasmāpi sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti yojetabba”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:136_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha pubbe vuttappayojanavisesaṃ pamāṇabhāvañca sampiṇḍetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:136_10: Majjhimagaṇṭhipade pana “tasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāpī”ti sambandho vutto. Ettha
tika-vin01t1:136_11: pana na kevalaṃ ayaṃ vaṇṇanā hessati, atha kho anusikkhitabbāpīti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetīti
tika-vin01t1:136_12: adhippāyo. Etthāpi yathāṭhitavaseneva apisaddassa attho gahetabboti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t1:136_13: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ pamāṇaṃ, yasmā ca ayaṃ vaṇṇanāpi tato
tika-vin01t1:136_14: abhinnattā pamāṇabhūtāyeva hessati, tasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti.
tika-vin01t1:139_0: Idāni “taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinaya”nti paṭiññātattā yathāpaṭiññātavinayasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo
tika-vin01t1:139_2: adhippeto tāva vinayo vavatthapetabboti dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti
tika-vin01t1:139_3: tāsu gāthāsu. Tāva-saddo paṭhamanti imasmiṃ atthe daṭṭhabbo. Tena paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:139_4: vavatthapetvā pacchā tassa vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti dīpeti. Vavatthapetabboti niyametabbo.
tika-vin01t1:139_5: Tenetaṃ vuccatīti yasmā vavatthapetabbo, tena hetunā etaṃ “vinayo nāmā”tiādikaṃ niyāmakavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:139_6: vuccatīti attho. Assāti vinayassa. Mātikāti uddeso. So hi niddesapadānaṃ jananīṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:140_0: Idāni vaṇṇetabbamatthaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā dassento āha “vuttaṃ yenā”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:140_1: hoti – etaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”tiādinidānavacanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:140_2: vinayapiṭakaṃ yena puggalena vuttaṃ, yasmiṃ kāle vuttaṃ, yasmā kāraṇā vuttaṃ, yena
tika-vin01t1:140_3: dhāritaṃ, yena ca ābhataṃ, yesu patiṭṭhitaṃ, etaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ vatvā tato “tena
tika-vin01t1:140_4: samayenā”tiādipāṭhassa atthaṃ anekappakārato dassayanto vinayassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti.
tika-vin01t1:140_5: Ettha ca “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”tiādinidānavacanamattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:140_6: apekkhitvā vattukāmopi visuṃ avatvā “nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, ‘idamavocā’ti nigamanena
tika-vin01t1:140_7: pariyosānakalyāṇa”nti ca vacanato nidānanigamanānipi satthudesanāya anuvidhānattā
tika-vin01t1:140_8: tadantogadhānevāti nidānassapi vinayapāḷiyaṃyeva antogadhattā “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā”ti
tika-vin01t1:140_9: idampi vinayapiṭakasambandhaṃyeva katvā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. Mātikāya hi “eta”nti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:141_0: Idāni pana taṃ visuṃ nīharitvā dassento “tattha vuttaṃ yenā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti
tika-vin01t1:141_1: tesu mātikāpadesu. Atha kasmā idameva vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “idañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:141_2: Idanti “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”tiādivacanaṃ. Hi-saddo yasmāti atthe daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:141_3: yasmā buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:141_4: na hotīti attano paccakkhaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ na hoti, bhagavatā vuttavacanaṃ na
tika-vin01t1:141_5: hotīti adhippāyo. “Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti āhacca bhāsitaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo”ti
tika-vin01t1:141_6: kenaci vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade pana “attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti attano dharamānakāle
tika-vin01t1:141_7: vuttavacanaṃ na hotī”ti likhitaṃ. Tadubhayampi atthato samānameva. Idāni pañhakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:141_8: vatvā anukkamena yathāvuttapañhavissajjanaṃ karonto “āyasmatā”tiādimāha. Iminā puggalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:141_9: niyameti, “tañcā”tiādinā kālaṃ niyameti. Tañca upālittherena vuttavacanaṃ kālato
tika-vin01t1:143_0: Idāni taṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetukāmo tassā tantiāruḷhāya idha vacane kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:143_1: dassento “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā…pe… veditabbā”ti āha. Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma
tika-vin01t1:143_2: cesāti ca-saddo īdisesu ṭhānesu vattabbasampiṇḍanattho, tañca paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle
tika-vin01t1:143_3: vuttaṃ, esā ca paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti evaṃ veditabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaññāsattho vā ca-saddo.
tika-vin01t1:143_4: Upaññāsoti ca vākyārambho vuccati. Esā hi ganthakārānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ kiñci vatvā
tika-vin01t1:143_5: puna paraṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ casaddappayogo. Yaṃ pana kenaci vuttaṃ “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti
tika-vin01t1:143_6: nāma cāti ettha ca-saddo atirekattho, tena aññāpi atthīti dīpetī”ti. Tadeva tassa
tika-vin01t1:143_7: ganthakkame akovidataṃ dasseti. Na hettha casaddena atirekattho viññāyati. Yadi cettha
tika-vin01t1:143_8: etadatthoyeva ca-kāro adhippeto siyā, evaṃ sati na kattabboyeva paṭhamasaddeneva
tika-vin01t1:143_9: aññāsaṃ dutiyādisaṅgītīnampi atthibhāvassa dīpitattā. Dutiyādiṃ upādāya hi paṭhamasaddappayogo
tika-vin01t1:143_10: dīghādiṃ upādāya rassādisaddappayogo viya. Yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā
tika-vin01t1:143_11: paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti.
tika-vin01t1:143_12: Etena taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānaṃ suttānañca ādipariyosānesu antarantarā ca sambandhavasena
tika-vin01t1:143_13: ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikāravacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Mahāvisayattā pūjanīyattā ca mahatī
tika-vin01t1:143_14: saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti, paṭhamā mahāsaṅgīti paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti. Nidānakosallatthanti
tika-vin01t1:143_15: nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ, tattha
tika-vin01t1:144_1: kiriyāsu “buddho bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomanato veneyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtā
tika-vin01t1:144_2: kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti āha “dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:144_3: Tattha saddhindriyādidhammoyeva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ. Atha vā cakkanti
tika-vin01t1:144_4: āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi
tika-vin01t1:145: “Dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattetīti dhammacakka”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:146_0: Katabuddhakicceti kataṃ pariniṭṭhāpitaṃ buddhakiccaṃ yena, tasmiṃ katabuddhakicce
tika-vin01t1:146_1: bhagavati lokanātheti sambandho. Etena buddhakattabbassa kassacipi asesitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:146_2: dasseti. Tatoyeva hi so bhagavā parinibbutoti. Nanu ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā
tika-vin01t1:146_3: bhagavatāyeva vinītā honti, tathā hi sāvakabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ buddhavacananti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:146_4: sāvakavineyyā ca na tāva vinītāti? Nāyaṃ doso tesaṃ vinayanūpāyassa sāvakesu ṭhapitattā. Tenevāha –
tika-vin01t1:147_0: “Na tāvāhaṃ pāpima parinibbāyissāmi, yāva na bhikkhū viyattā vinītā visāradā bahussutā
tika-vin01t1:147_1: āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena
tika-vin01t1:148_1: gāhassa micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ loke jātasaṃvaḍḍhabhāvadassanatthañca. Tathā hi manussabhāvassa
tika-vin01t1:148_2: supākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ mahābodhisattā carimabhave dārapariggahādīnipi karontīti. Kusinārāyanti
tika-vin01t1:148_3: evaṃnāmake nagare. Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti
tika-vin01t1:148_4: tassa nagarassa upavattanabhūtaṃ mallarājūnaṃ sālavanuyyānaṃ dasseti. Tattha nagaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:148_5: pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattananti sālavanaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:148_6: Yathā hi anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ, evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya
tika-vin01t1:148_7: dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya hoti. Yathā ca thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo
tika-vin01t1:148_8: pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati, evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā
tika-vin01t1:148_9: uttarena nivattā, tasmā taṃ “upavattana”nti vuccati. Yamakasālānamantareti yamakasālānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:148_10: vemajjhe. Tattha kira bhagavato paññattassa parinibbānamañcassa ekā sālapanti sīsabhāge
tika-vin01t1:148_11: hoti, ekā pādabhāge, tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti, eko pādabhāgassa,
tika-vin01t1:148_12: tasmā “yamakasālānamantare”ti vuttaṃ. Api ca “yamakasālā nāma mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi
tika-vin01t1:149_0: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti upādīyate kammakilesehīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā
tika-vin01t1:149_1: ca rūpaṃ. So pana upādi kilesābhisaṅkhāramāranimmathanena nibbānappattiyaṃ anossaṭṭho,
tika-vin01t1:149_2: idha khandhamaccumāranimmathanena ossaṭṭho nisesitoti ayaṃ anupādisesā nibbānadhātu
tika-vin01t1:149_3: natthi etissā upādisesoti katvā. Nibbānadhātūti cettha nibbutimattaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:149_4: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cāyaṃ karaṇaniddeso. Parinibbāneti parinibbānaṭṭhāne, nimittatthe
tika-vin01t1:149_5: vā bhummavacanaṃ, parinibbānahetu sannipatitānanti attho. Saṅghassa thero saṅghatthero.
tika-vin01t1:149_6: So pana saṅgho kiṃparimāṇoti āha “sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti. Niccasāpekkhattā
tika-vin01t1:149_7: hi īdisesu samāso hotiyeva yathā “devadattassa garukula”nti. Sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānanti
tika-vin01t1:149_8: ca saṅghattherānaṃyeva sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ. Tadā hi “sannipatitā bhikkhū
tika-vin01t1:149_9: ettakā”ti pamāṇarahitā. Tathā hi veḷuvagāme vedanāvikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya “na cirena
tika-vin01t1:149_10: bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā tato tato āgatesu bhikkhūsu ekabhikkhupi pakkanto
tika-vin01t1:149_11: nāma natthi, tasmā gaṇanaṃ vītivatto saṅgho ahosi. Āyasmā mahākassapo dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:150_0: Tattha mahākassapoti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti
tika-vin01t1:150_1: mahākassapo, apica kumārakassapattheraṃ upādāya ayaṃ mahāthero “mahākassapo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:150_2: Atha kimatthaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti āha
tika-vin01t1:150_3: “sattāhaparinibbute”tiādi. Satta ahāni samāhaṭāni sattāhaṃ, sattāhaṃ parinibbutassa
tika-vin01t1:150_4: assāti sattāhaparinibbuto, bhagavā, tasmiṃ sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati, bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:150_5: parinibbānadivasato paṭṭhāya sattāhe vītivatteti vuttaṃ hoti. Subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena
tika-vin01t1:150_6: vuttavacanaṃ samanussarantoti sambandho. Tattha subhaddoti tassa nāmaṃ, vuḍḍhakāle
tika-vin01t1:150_7: pana pabbajitattā vuḍḍhapabbajitoti vuccati. “Alaṃ āvuso”tiādinā tena vuttavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:150_8: nidasseti. So hi sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati āyasmatā mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:150_9: pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannesu pañcamattesu bhikkhusatesu avītarāge bhikkhū
tika-vin01t1:150_10: antarāmagge diṭṭhaājīvakassa santikā bhagavato parinibbānaṃ sutvā pattacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin01t1:150_11: bāhā paggayha nānappakāraṃ paridevante disvā evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:151_0: Kasmā pana so evamāha? Bhagavati āghātena. Ayaṃ kira so khandhake āgate ātumāvatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:151_1: nahāpitapubbako vuḍḍhapabbajito bhagavati kusinārato nikkhamitvā aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi
tika-vin01t1:151_2: saddhiṃ ātumaṃ gacchante “bhagavā āgacchatī”ti sutvā āgatakāle “yāgudānaṃ karissāmī”ti
tika-vin01t1:151_3: sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhite dve putte etadavoca “bhagavā kira tātā ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā
tika-vin01t1:151_4: bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi, gacchatha tumhe tātā khurabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t1:151_5: ādāya nāḷiyāvāpakena anugharakaṃ anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍatha, loṇampi telampi taṇḍulampi
tika-vin01t1:151_6: khādanīyampi saṃharatha, bhagavato āgatassa yāgudānaṃ karissāmī”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:151_7: Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā bhusāgārakaṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:151_8: gantvā manusse āmantetvā “hatthakammamattaṃ me dethā”ti hatthakammaṃ yācitvā “kiṃ
tika-vin01t1:151_9: bhante karomā”ti vutte “idañcidañca gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā vihāre
tika-vin01t1:151_10: uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā tādisameva pārupitvā “idaṃ karotha,
tika-vin01t1:151_11: idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca
tika-vin01t1:151_12: paṭiyādāpesi. Bhojjayāgu nāma bhuñjitvā pātabbayāgu, tattha sappimadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsapupphaphalarasādi
tika-vin01t1:151_13: yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ pavisati, kīḷitukāmānaṃ sīsamakkhanayoggā
tika-vin01t1:152_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ
tika-vin01t1:152_1: ātumābhimukho pāyāsi. Manussā tassa ārocesuṃ “bhagavā piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisati, tayā
tika-vin01t1:152_2: kassa yāgu paṭiyāditā”ti. So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena
tika-vin01t1:152_3: dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:152_4: vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhatu me bhante bhagavā yāgu”nti āha. Tato “jānantāpi tathāgatā
tika-vin01t1:152_5: pucchantī”ti khandhake āgatanayena bhagavā pucchitvā ca sutvā ca taṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:152_7: dve sikkhāpadāni paññapetvā “bhikkhave anekakappakoṭiyo bhojanaṃ pariyesanteheva
tika-vin01t1:152_8: vītināmitā, idaṃ pana tumhākaṃ akappiyaṃ, adhammena uppannabhojanaṃ imaṃ paribhuñjitvā
tika-vin01t1:152_9: anekāni attabhāvasahassāni apāyesveva nibbattissanti, apetha mā gaṇhathā”ti bhikkhācārābhimukho
tika-vin01t1:153_0: Subhaddo anattamano hutvā “ayaṃ ‘sabbaṃ jānāmī’ti āhiṇḍati, sace na gahetukāmo pesetvā
tika-vin01t1:153_1: ārocetabbaṃ assa, pakkāhāro nāma sabbaciraṃ tiṭṭhanto sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭheyya, idañca
tika-vin01t1:153_2: mama yāvajīvaṃ pariyattaṃ assa, sabbaṃ tena nāsitaṃ, ahitakāmo ayaṃ mayha”nti bhagavati
tika-vin01t1:153_3: āghātaṃ bandhitvā dasabale dharamāne kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:153_4: uccakulā pabbajito mahāpuriso, sace kiñci vakkhāmi, mamaṃyeva santajjessatī”ti. Svāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:153_5: ajja mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ āgacchanto “parinibbuto bhagavā”ti sutvā laddhassāso
tika-vin01t1:153_6: viya haṭṭhatuṭṭho evamāha. Thero pana taṃ sutvā hadaye pahāraṃ viya matthake patitasukkāsaniṃ
tika-vin01t1:153_7: viya maññi, dhammasaṃvego cassa uppajji “sattāhamattaparinibbuto bhagavā, ajjāpissa
tika-vin01t1:153_8: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ dharatiyeva, dukkhena bhagavatā ārādhitasāsane nāma evaṃ lahuṃ
tika-vin01t1:153_9: mahantaṃ pāpakasaṭaṃ kaṇṭako uppanno, alaṃ kho panesa pāpo vaḍḍhamāno aññepi evarūpe
tika-vin01t1:154_0: Tato thero cintesi “sace kho panāhaṃ imaṃ mahallakaṃ idheva pilotikaṃ nivāsetvā chārikāya
tika-vin01t1:154_1: okirāpetvā nīharāpessāmi, manussā ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sarīre dharamāneyeva sāvakā
tika-vin01t1:154_2: vivadantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ dassessanti, adhivāsemi tāva. Bhagavatā hi desitadhammo
tika-vin01t1:154_3: asaṅgahitapuppharāsisadiso, tattha yathā vātena pahaṭapupphāni yato vā tato vā gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:154_4: evameva evarūpānaṃ vasena gacchante gacchante kāle vinaye ekaṃ dve sikkhāpadāni nassissanti
tika-vin01t1:154_5: vinassissanti, sutte eko dve pañhavārā nassissanti, abhidhamme ekaṃ dve bhūmantarāni
tika-vin01t1:154_6: nassissanti, evaṃ anukkamena mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāma, tasmā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:154_7: karissāmi, evaṃ sati daḷhasuttena saṅgahitapupphāni viya ayaṃ dhammavinayo niccalo
tika-vin01t1:154_8: bhavissati. Etadatthañhi bhagavā mayhaṃ tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṃ akāsi, tīhi ovādehi
tika-vin01t1:154_9: upasampadaṃ akāsi, kāyato cīvaraparivattanaṃ akāsi, ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā candopamapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:154_10: kathento maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā kathesi, tikkhattuṃ sakalasāsanaratanaṃ paṭicchāpesi,
tika-vin01t1:154_11: mādise bhikkhumhi tiṭṭhamāne ayaṃ pāpo sāsane vaḍḍhiṃ mā alatthu, yāva adhammo na
tika-vin01t1:154_12: dippati, dhammo na paṭibāhīyati, avinayo na dippati, vinayo na paṭibāhīyati, adhammavādino
tika-vin01t1:154_13: na balavanto honti, dhammavādino na dubbalā honti, avinayavādino na balavanto honti,
tika-vin01t1:154_14: vinayavādino na dubbalā honti, tāva dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmi, tato bhikkhū
tika-vin01t1:154_15: attano attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā kappiyākappiye kathessanti, athāyaṃ pāpo sayameva
tika-vin01t1:154_16: niggahaṃ pāpuṇissati, puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkhissati, sāsanaṃ iddhañceva phītañca
tika-vin01t1:154_17: bhavissatī”ti. Cintetvā so “evaṃ nāma mayhaṃ cittaṃ uppanna”nti kassaci anārocetvā
tika-vin01t1:154_18: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samassāsetvā atha pacchā dhātubhājanadivase dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:154_19: bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi. Tena vuttaṃ “āyasmā mahākassapo sattāhaparinibbute…pe…
tika-vin01t1:155_0: Tattha alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Āvusoti paridevante bhikkhū ālapati. Mā socitthāti
tika-vin01t1:155_1: citte uppannabalavasokena mā socittha. Mā paridevitthāti vācāya mā paridevittha “paridevanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:155_2: vilāpo”ti vacanato. Idāni asocanādīsu kāraṇaṃ dassento “sumuttā maya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:155_3: Tena mahāsamaṇenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ, tato mahāsamaṇato suṭṭhu muttā mayanti
tika-vin01t1:155_4: attho, upaddutā ca homa tadāti adhippāyo. Homāti vā atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ, ahumhāti
tika-vin01t1:155_5: attho, anussaranto dhammasaṃvegavasenāti adhippāyo. Dhammasabhāvacintāvasena pavattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:158_0: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetu.
tika-vin01t1:158_1: Khoti avadhāraṇe, etaṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjateva, no na vijjatīti attho. Kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:158_2: āha “yaṃ pāpabhikkhū”tiādi. Ettha yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇaniddeso vā, yena kāraṇena
tika-vin01t1:158_3: antaradhāpeyyuṃ, tadetaṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjatīti attho. Pāpabhikkhūti pāpikāya lāmikāya
tika-vin01t1:158_4: icchāya samannāgatā bhikkhū. Atīto atikkanto satthā ettha, etassāti vā atītasatthukaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:158_5: pāvacanaṃ. Padhānaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, dhammavinayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pakkhaṃ labhitvāti
tika-vin01t1:158_6: alajjīpakkhaṃ labhitvā. Na cirassevāti na cireneva. Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti
tika-vin01t1:158_7: yattakaṃ kālaṃ dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjīpuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:159_0: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatāti parinibbānamañcake nipannena bhagavatā bhikkhū ovadantena
tika-vin01t1:159_1: etaṃ vuttanti attho. Desito paññattoti dhammopi desito ceva paññatto ca. Suttābhidhammasaṅgahitassa
tika-vin01t1:159_2: hi dhammassa abhisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā, tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ vineyyasantāne
tika-vin01t1:159_3: ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ, tasmā dhammopi desito ceva paññatto cāti vutto. Paññattoti ca
tika-vin01t1:159_4: ṭhapitoti attho. Vinayopi desito ceva paññatto ca. Vinayatantisaṅgahitassa hi atthassa
tika-vin01t1:159_5: kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato vinayoti laddhādhivacanassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-vin01t1:159_6: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ, tasmā vinayopi desito ceva
tika-vin01t1:160_0: So vo mamaccayenāti so dhammavinayo tumhākaṃ mamaccayena satthā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-vin01t1:160_1: – mayā vo ṭhiteneva “idaṃ lahukaṃ, idaṃ garukaṃ, idaṃ satekicchaṃ, idaṃ atekicchaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_2: idaṃ lokavajjaṃ, idaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ. Ayaṃ āpatti puggalassa santike vuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:160_3: gaṇassa, ayaṃ saṅghassa santike vuṭṭhātī”ti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamanīyatāvasena
tika-vin01t1:160_4: otiṇṇavatthusmiṃ sakhandhakaparivāro ubhatovibhaṅgo mahāvinayo nāma desito, taṃ sakalampi
tika-vin01t1:160_5: vinayapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati “idaṃ vo kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_6: idaṃ vo na kattabba”nti kattabbākattabbassa vibhāgena anusāsanato. Ṭhiteneva ca mayā
tika-vin01t1:160_7: “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni,
tika-vin01t1:160_8: pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgāni, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti tena tena vineyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena
tika-vin01t1:160_9: pakārena ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme vibhajitvā suttantapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin01t1:160_10: sakalampi suttantapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati taṃtaṃcariyānurūpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:160_11: sammāpaṭipattiyā anusāsanato. Ṭhiteneva ca mayā “pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni,
tika-vin01t1:160_12: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni, nava hetū, cattāro āhārā, satta
tika-vin01t1:160_13: phassā, satta vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittāni, tatrāpi ettakā dhammā
tika-vin01t1:160_14: kāmāvacarā, ettakā rūpāvacarā, ettakā arūpāvacarā, ettakā pariyāpannā, ettakā apariyāpannā,
tika-vin01t1:160_15: ettakā lokiyā, ettakā lokuttarā”ti ime dhamme vibhajitvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_16: taṃ sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati,
tika-vin01t1:160_17: khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṃ catusaccasambodhāvahattā satthārā sammāsambuddhena kattabbakiccaṃ
tika-vin01t1:160_18: nipphādessati. Iti sabbampetaṃ abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā pañcacattālīsa vassāni
tika-vin01t1:160_19: bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ, tīṇi piṭakāni, pañca nikāyā, navaṅgāni, caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti
tika-vin01t1:160_20: evaṃ mahappabhedaṃ hoti. Iti imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin01t1:160_21: ahaṃ ekova parinibbāyāmi, ahañca panidāni ekova ovadāmi anusāsāmi, mayi parinibbute
tika-vin01t1:160_22: imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissanti ovādānusāsanīkiccassa nipphādanatoti.
tika-vin01t1:161_0: Sāsananti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena tividhaṃ sāsanaṃ, nippariyāyato pana
tika-vin01t1:161_1: sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Addhaniyanti addhānamaggagāmīti addhaniyaṃ, addhānakkhamanti
tika-vin01t1:161_2: attho. Ciraṭṭhitikanti ciraṃ ṭhiti etassāti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, sāsanaṃ, assa bhaveyyāti
tika-vin01t1:161_3: sambandho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā yena pakārena idaṃ sāsanaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ pavattituṃ
tika-vin01t1:161_4: samatthaṃ, tatoyeva ciraṭṭhitikaṃ assa, tathā tena pakārena dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyanti.
tika-vin01t1:162_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ vibhāvento āha “yañcāhaṃ bhagavatā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:162_1: Tattha “yañcāha”nti etassa “anuggahito”ti etena sambandho. Tattha yanti yasmā, yena
tika-vin01t1:162_2: kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā etaṃ, tena “anuggahito”ti ettha anuggaṇhanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:162_3: parāmasati. Dhāressasītiādikaṃ pana bhagavā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle mahākassapattherena
tika-vin01t1:162_4: paññattasaṅghāṭiyaṃ nisinno taṃ cīvaraṃ vikasitapadumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antare
tika-vin01t1:162_5: parāmasanto āha. Vuttañhetaṃ kassapasaṃyutte mahākassapatthereneva ānandattheraṃ
tika-vin01t1:163_0: “Atha kho, āvuso, bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
tika-vin01t1:163_1: atha khvāhaṃ, āvuso, paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ paññāpetvā bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:163_2: etadavocaṃ ‘idha, bhante, bhagavā nisīdatu, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā’ti.
tika-vin01t1:163_3: Nisīdi kho, āvuso, bhagavā paññatte āsane, nisajja kho maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā etadavoca
tika-vin01t1:163_4: ‘mudukā kho tyāyaṃ kassapa paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭī’ti. ‘Paṭiggaṇhātu me, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:163_5: bhagavā paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti. ‘Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:163_6: kassapa sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti. ‘Dhāressāmahaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sāṇāni
tika-vin01t1:163_7: paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti. So khvāhaṃ, āvuso, paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:163_8: pādāsiṃ, ahaṃ pana bhagavato sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanāni paṭipajji”nti.
tika-vin01t1:164_0: Tattha mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ. Kasmā bhagavā evamāhāti? Therena saha
tika-vin01t1:164_1: cīvaraṃ parivattetukāmatāya. Kasmā parivattetukāmo jātoti? Theraṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetukāmatāya.
tika-vin01t1:164_2: Kiṃ sāriputtamoggallānā natthīti? Atthi, evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṃ ṭhassanti,
tika-vin01t1:164_3: kassapo pana vīsavassasatāyuko, ‘so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ vasitvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:164_4: katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ pavattanakaṃ karissatī’ti attano
tika-vin01t1:164_5: naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapemi, evaṃ bhikkhū kassapassa sussūsitabbaṃ maññissantī”ti, tasmā evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:164_6: Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin01t1:164_7: cārittameva, tasmā “paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā”ti āha. Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:164_8: kassapāti kassapa tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti
tika-vin01t1:164_9: vadati. Tañca kho na kāyabalaṃ sandhāya, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ pana sandhāya evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:164_10: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne
tika-vin01t1:164_11: chaḍḍitaṃ tumbamattehi pāṇakehi samparikiṇṇaṃ te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse
tika-vin01t1:164_12: ṭhatvā aggahesiṃ, tassa me imaṃ cīvaraṃ gahitadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī
tika-vin01t1:164_13: mahāravaṃ viravamānā kampittha, ākāsaṃ taṭataṭāyi, cakkavāḷadevatā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu
tika-vin01t1:164_14: “imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena
tika-vin01t1:164_15: jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, tvaṃ imassa cīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:164_16: Theropi attanā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti. So taṃ atakkayitvā “ahametaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:164_17: pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṃ bhante”ti
tika-vin01t1:164_18: āha. Paṭipajjinti paṭipannosiṃ. Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā therena pārutacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:164_19: bhagavā pārupi, satthu cīvaraṃ thero. Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:165_0: Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ pariveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā
tika-vin01t1:165_1: gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni. Rathikasusānasaṅkārakūṭādīnaṃ yattha katthaci
tika-vin01t1:165_2: paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu paṃsukūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ. Atha vā
tika-vin01t1:165_3: paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti paṃsukūlasaddassa attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:165_4: Nibbasanānīti niṭṭhitavasanakiccāni, paribhogajiṇṇānīti attho. Ettha “kiñcāpi ekameva
tika-vin01t1:165_5: taṃ cīvaraṃ, anekāvayavattā pana bahuvacanaṃ kata”nti majjhimagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:165_6: Cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti viññāyamānattā
tika-vin01t1:165_7: viññāyamānatthassa ca-saddassa payoge kāmācārattā “attanā”ti na vuttaṃ. “Dhāressasi
tika-vin01t1:165_8: pana me tvaṃ, kassapa, sāṇāni paṃsukūlānī”ti hi vuttattā attanāva sādhāraṇaparibhogo
tika-vin01t1:165_9: viññāyati, nāññena. Na hi kevalaṃ saddatoyeva sabbattha atthanicchayo bhavissati
tika-vin01t1:165_11: panettha idaṃ vuttaṃ “cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti
tika-vin01t1:165_12: idha attanāsaddaṃ ānetvā cīvare attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:166: “Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa taṃ;
tika-vin01t1:168_0: Atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti yojanīyaṃ ekassapi
tika-vin01t1:168_2: vutte suttantaṭīkākārenāti gahetabbaṃ. Samānaṃ dhāraṇametassāti sādhāraṇo, paribhogo.
tika-vin01t1:168_3: Sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:170_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ
tika-vin01t1:170_1: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t1:170_2: yāvade ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:170_3: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:171_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:171_1: cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-vin01t1:171_2: viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:172_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi, sato ca
tika-vin01t1:172_1: sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedemi, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti ‘upekkhako satimā
tika-vin01t1:172_2: sukhavihārī’ti, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade
tika-vin01t1:172_3: ākaṅkhati pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati…pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:173_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva
tika-vin01t1:173_2: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati sukhassa ca pahānā
tika-vin01t1:173_3: dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:174_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:174_1: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja
tika-vin01t1:174_2: viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:175_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkama ‘anantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:175_1: viññāṇa’nti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade
tika-vin01t1:175_2: ākaṅkhati sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma…pe… viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:176_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi
tika-vin01t1:176_1: kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati…pe…
tika-vin01t1:177_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:177_1: upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:178_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:178_1: upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi…pe… saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:179_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhomi, ekopi hutvā
tika-vin01t1:179_1: bahudhā homi, bahudhāpi hutvā eko homi, āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:179_2: tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchāmi seyyathāpi ākāse, pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṃ karomi
tika-vin01t1:179_3: seyyathāpi udake, udakepi abhijjamāne gacchāmi seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ, ākāsepi pallaṅkena
tika-vin01t1:179_4: kamāmi seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo, imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve
tika-vin01t1:179_5: pāṇinā parimasāmi parimajjāmi, yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattemi. Kassapopi
tika-vin01t1:179_6: bhikkhave yāvade ākaṅkhati anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti…pe… yāva brahmalokāpi
tika-vin01t1:180_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya
tika-vin01t1:180_1: ubho sadde suṇāmi dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade
tika-vin01t1:180_2: ākaṅkhati dibbāya sotadhātuyā…pe… ye dūre santike ca.
tika-vin01t1:181_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca
tika-vin01t1:181_1: pajānāmi, sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ‘sarāgaṃ citta’nti pajānāmi, vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ‘vītarāgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:181_2: citta’nti pajānāmi, sadosaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… vītadosaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… samohaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:181_3: vītamohaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… saṃkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… vikkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… mahaggataṃ
tika-vin01t1:181_4: vā cittaṃ…pe… amahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… sauttaraṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:181_5: samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… avimuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:181_6: vā cittaṃ ‘avimuttaṃ citta’nti pajānāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati parasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:181_7: parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti, sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ ‘sarāgaṃ citta’nti
tika-vin01t1:181_8: pajānāti…pe… avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ ‘avimuttaṃ citta’nti pajānāti.
tika-vin01t1:182_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarāmi. Seyyathidaṃ
tika-vin01t1:182_1: – ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi
tika-vin01t1:182_2: jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi
tika-vin01t1:182_3: jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi
tika-vin01t1:182_4: saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe ‘amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī
tika-vin01t1:182_5: evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ, tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo
tika-vin01t1:182_6: evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno’ti.
tika-vin01t1:182_7: Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t1:182_8: yāvade ākaṅkhati anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati. Seyyathidaṃ – ekampi jātiṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:182_9: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
tika-vin01t1:183_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
tika-vin01t1:183_1: satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
tika-vin01t1:183_2: yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi ‘ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā
tika-vin01t1:183_3: vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā
tika-vin01t1:183_4: micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:183_5: nirayaṃ upapannā. Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena
tika-vin01t1:183_6: samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā,
tika-vin01t1:183_7: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā’ti. Iti dibbena cakkhunā
tika-vin01t1:183_8: visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe
tika-vin01t1:183_9: dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate, yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade
tika-vin01t1:183_10: ākaṅkhati dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne
tika-vin01t1:183_11: upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate, yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
tika-vin01t1:184_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
tika-vin01t1:184_1: sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, āsavānaṃ khayā
tika-vin01t1:184_2: anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:185_1: bhagavatā vuttaṃ kassapasaṃyutte āgataṃ pāḷimimaṃ peyyālamukhena ādiggahaṇena ca
tika-vin01t1:186_0: Tattha yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmīti attho. Tatoyeva hi majjhimagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:186_1: cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “yāvadeti yāvadevāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti likhitaṃ. Saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin01t1:186_2: “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti attho vutto. Tathā hi tattha līnatthapakāsaniyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:186_3: ācariyadhammapālatthereneva vuttaṃ “yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṃ yāvadeti idaṃ pada”nti.
tika-vin01t1:186_4: Potthakesu pana katthaci “yāvadevā”ti ayameva pāṭho dissati. Yāni pana ito paraṃ
tika-vin01t1:186_8: iddhividha”ntiādinā nayena abhiññā ca vuttā. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ anupadavaṇṇanāya
tika-vin01t1:186_9: ceva bhāvanāvidhānena ca saddhiṃ visuddhimagge sabbaso vitthāritaṃ. Idhāpi ca verañjakaṇḍe
tika-vin01t1:186_10: cattāri rūpāvacarajhānāni tisso ca vijjā āvi bhavissanti, tasmā tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:187_1: samāpajjitabbabhāvato evaṃsaññitā nirodhasamāpattiyā saha aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Chaḷabhiññā
tika-vin01t1:187_2: nāma āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ pañcābhiññāyoti evaṃ lokiyalokuttarabhedā sabbā abhiññāyo.
tika-vin01t1:187_3: Uttarimanussadhammeti uttarimanussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammo uttarimanussadhammo.
tika-vin01t1:187_4: Atha vā uttari manussadhammāti uttarimanussadhammo, manussadhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathadhammo.
tika-vin01t1:187_5: So hi vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbato manussattabhāvāvahato
tika-vin01t1:187_6: vā “manussadhammo”ti vuccati, tato uttari pana jhānādīni “uttarimanussadhammo”ti
tika-vin01t1:187_7: veditabbāni. Attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti ahaṃ yattakaṃ kālaṃ yattake vā samāpattivihāre
tika-vin01t1:187_8: abhiññāyo ca vaḷañjemi, tathā kassapopīti evaṃ yathāvuttauttarimanussadhamme attanā
tika-vin01t1:187_10: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā
tika-vin01t1:187_11: samāpattiyo samāpajjati, yamakapāṭihāriyādivasena vā abhiññāyo vaḷañjeti. Ettha ca
tika-vin01t1:187_12: “uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi –
tika-vin01t1:188: “Ovada kassapa bhikkhū, karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ vā, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:189_0: Evampi attanā samasamaṭṭhāne ṭhapetiyeva, tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati aññatra
tika-vin01t1:189_1: dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti adhippāyo. Tattha “tassāti tassa anuggahassā”ti majjhimagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:189_2: vuttaṃ. Tassa meti vā attho gahetabbo. Potthakesu hi katthaci “tassa me”ti pāṭhoyeva
tika-vin01t1:189_3: dissati, dhammavinayasaṅgāyanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kiṃ nāma tassa me āṇaṇyaṃ aṇaṇabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:189_4: bhavissatīti attho. “Nanu maṃ bhagavā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ upamāvasena vibhāveti.
tika-vin01t1:189_5: Sakakavacaissariyānuppadānenāti ettha cīvarassa nidassanavasena kavacassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:189_6: kataṃ, samāpattiyā nidassanavasena issariyaṃ gahitaṃ. Kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakanti kulavaṃsassa
tika-vin01t1:189_8: samāso daṭṭhabbo, me saddhammavaṃsassa patiṭṭhāpako pavattakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttavacanamanussaranto
tika-vin01t1:189_9: anuggahesīti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti sambandho,
tika-vin01t1:189_10: dhātubhājanadivase tattha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:190_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvento āha “yathāhā”tiādi. Tattha ekamidāhanti
tika-vin01t1:190_1: ettha idanti nipātamattaṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti ca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ, ekasmiṃ samayeti
tika-vin01t1:190_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Pāvāyāti pāvānagarato, tattha piṇḍāya caritvā kusināraṃ gamissāmīti
tika-vin01t1:190_3: addhānamaggappaṭipannoti vuttaṃ hoti. Addhānamaggoti ca dīghamaggo vuccati. Dīghapariyāyo
tika-vin01t1:190_4: hettha addhānasaddo. Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti guṇamahattenapi saṅkhyāmahattenapi
tika-vin01t1:190_5: mahatā. Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghena bhikkhusaṅghena, samaṇagaṇena saddhiṃ ekatoti attho.
