tika-vin01t1:190_7: “bhojane mattaññutā”tiādīsu viya. Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti sabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:190_8: subhaddakaṇḍaṃ idha ānetvā vitthārato dassetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:191_0: “Tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananato para”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:191_1: Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana “tato paranti subhaddakaṇḍato para”nti vuttaṃ. Idamevettha sārato
tika-vin01t1:191_2: paccetabbanti no takko. Ayameva hi ussāhajananappakāro, yadidaṃ “handa mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:191_3: dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma, pure adhammo dippatī”tiādi, tasmā ussāhajananato
tika-vin01t1:191_4: paranti na vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā ussāhajananappakārassa pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā. Ayañhettha pāḷikkamo –
tika-vin01t1:192_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū āmantesi, ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ pāvāya
tika-vin01t1:192_1: kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
tika-vin01t1:192_2: Atha khvāhaṃ, āvuso, maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdiṃ.
tika-vin01t1:193_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro ājīvako kusinārāya mandāravapupphaṃ gahetvā pāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:193_1: addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti. Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, āvuso, taṃ ājīvakaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:193_2: disvāna taṃ ājīvakaṃ etadavocaṃ ‘apāvuso, amhākaṃ satthāraṃ jānāsī’ti? ‘Āma, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:193_3: jānāmi. Ajja sattāhaparinibbuto samaṇo gotamo, tato me idaṃ mandāravapupphaṃ gahitanti.
tika-vin01t1:193_4: Tatrāvuso, ye te bhikkhū avītarāgā, appekacce bāhā paggayha kandanti, chinnapātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:193_5: papatanti āvaṭṭanti vivaṭṭanti, ‘atikhippaṃ bhagavā parinibbuto, atikhippaṃ sugato
tika-vin01t1:193_6: parinibbuto, atikhippaṃ cakkhuṃ loke antarahita’nti. Ye pana te bhikkhū vītarāgā,
tika-vin01t1:193_7: te satā sampajānā adhivāsenti ‘aniccā saṅkhārā, taṃ kutettha labbhā”’ti.
tika-vin01t1:194_0: “Atha khvāhaṃ, āvuso, te bhikkhū etadavocaṃ – ‘alaṃ, āvuso, mā socittha mā paridevittha,
tika-vin01t1:194_1: nanvetaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ ‘sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo
tika-vin01t1:194_2: vinābhāvo aññathābhāvo. Taṃ kutettha, āvuso, labbhā, yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ
tika-vin01t1:194_3: palokadhammaṃ, taṃ vata mā palujjī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:195_0: “Tena kho pana samayena, āvuso, subhaddo nāma vuḍḍhapabbajito tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno
tika-vin01t1:195_1: hoti. Atha kho āvuso subhaddo vuḍḍhapabbajito te bhikkhū etadavoca ‘alaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:195_2: mā socittha mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena, upaddutā ca mayaṃ homa’
tika-vin01t1:195_3: ‘idaṃ vo kappati, idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti, ‘idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma, taṃ karissāma,
tika-vin01t1:195_4: yaṃ na icchissāma, na taṃ karissāmā’ti. Handa mayaṃ āvuso dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
tika-vin01t1:195_5: pure adhammo dippati, dhammo paṭibāhīyati, avinayo pure dippati, vinayo paṭibāhīyati,
tika-vin01t1:195_6: pure adhammavādino balavanto honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti, pure avinayavādino
tika-vin01t1:196_0: “‘Tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhū uccinatū’ti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnapañcaarahantasatāni
tika-vin01t1:196_1: uccini. Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavocuṃ ‘ayaṃ, bhante, āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t1:196_2: sekkho, abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ, bahu cānena bhagavato santike
tika-vin01t1:196_3: dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto. Tena hi, bhante, thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatū”’tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:197_0: Tasmā tato paranti ettha subhaddakaṇḍato paranti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. “Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t1:197_1: vitthārato veditabba”nti hi iminā “yaṃ na icchissāma, na taṃ karissāmā”ti etaṃ pariyantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:197_2: subhaddakaṇḍapāḷiṃ dassetvā idāni avasesaṃ ussāhajananappakārappavattaṃ pāḷimeva
tika-vin01t1:198_0: Tattha pure adhammo dippatīti ettha adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathadhammapaṭipakkhabhūto
tika-vin01t1:198_1: adhammo. Pure dippatīti api nāma dippati. Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ
tika-vin01t1:198_2: samattho hoti, tato puretaramevāti attho. Āsanne hi anāgate ayaṃ puresaddo. Dippatīti
tika-vin01t1:198_3: dippissati. Pure-saddayogena hi anāgatatthe ayaṃ vattamānapayogo yathā “purā vassati
tika-vin01t1:198_4: devo”ti. Keci panettha evaṃ vaṇṇayanti “pureti pacchā anāgate yathā addhānaṃ gacchantassa
tika-vin01t1:198_5: gantabbamaggo ‘pure’ti vuccati, tathā idha daṭṭhabba”nti. Avinayoti pahānavinayasaṃvaravinayānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:198_6: paṭipakkhabhūto avinayo. “Vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti evaṃ iti-saddopi ettha daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:198_7: “tato paraṃ āhā”ti iminā sambandho. Potthakesu pana katthaci iti-saddo na dissati,
tika-vin01t1:199_0: Tena hīti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Uccinane uyyojentā hi taṃ mahākassapattheraṃ evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:199_1: Bhikkhū uccinatūti saṅgītiyā anurūpe bhikkhū uccinitvā gaṇhātūti attho. “Sakalanavaṅga…pe…
tika-vin01t1:199_4: ukkaṃsagatattā saṅgītiyā bahūpakārataṃ dasseti. Tattha sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhareti
tika-vin01t1:199_5: sakalaṃ suttageyyādi navaṅgaṃ ettha, etassa vā atthīti sakalanavaṅgaṃ, satthusāsanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:199_7: tīṇi piṭakāni vuccanti, taṃ sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanasaṅkhātaṃ pariyattiṃ dhārentīti
tika-vin01t1:199_8: sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidharā, tādiseti attho. Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:199_9: sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā ca avihatattā tā janenti, tāhi vā janitāti puthujjanā. Duvidhā puthujjanā
tika-vin01t1:199_11: natthi, te andhaputhujjanā. Yesaṃ tāni atthi, te kalyāṇaputhujjanā. Te idha “puthujjanā”ti
tika-vin01t1:199_12: adhippetā. Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā.
tika-vin01t1:200_0: Tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhareti tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samāhāro tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:200_1: navaṅgādivasena anekadhā bhinnaṃ sabbapariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadharā,
tika-vin01t1:200_2: tādiseti attho. Anu anu taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo, anubhāvo eva ānubhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:200_3: pabhāvo. Mahanto ānubhāvo yesaṃ te mahānubhāvā. Tevijjādibhedeti tisso vijjāyeva
tika-vin01t1:200_4: tevijjā, tā ādi yesaṃ chaḷabhiññādīnaṃ te tevijjādayo, te bhedā anekappakārā bhinnā
tika-vin01t1:200_5: etesanti tevijjādibhedā, khīṇāsavā, tādiseti attho. Atha vā tisso vijjā etassa atthīti
tika-vin01t1:200_6: tevijjo, so ādi yesaṃ chaḷabhiññādīnaṃ te tevijjādayo, te bhedā yesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:200_7: te tevijjādibhedā, tādiseti attho. Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti ye bhikkhū sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:200_8: idaṃ “atha kho āyasmā”tiādivacanaṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:201_0: Kissa panāti kasmā pana. Sikkhatīti sekkho, atha vā sikkhanaṃ sikkhā, sāyeva tassa
tika-vin01t1:201_1: sīlanti sekkho. So hi apariyositasikkhattā ca tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo
tika-vin01t1:201_2: na asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha paṭipassaddhussāho, nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho
tika-vin01t1:201_3: pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto. Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsu sikkhāsu jāto, tattha
tika-vin01t1:201_4: vā bhavoti sekkho. Atha vā ikkhati etāyāti ikkhā, maggaphalasammādiṭṭhi. Saha ikkhāyāti
tika-vin01t1:201_5: sekkho. Uparimaggattayakiccassa apariyositattā saha karaṇīyenāti sakaraṇīyo. Assāti
tika-vin01t1:201_6: anena. Asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthīti nanu ca –
tika-vin01t1:203: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:204_0: Vuttattā kathametaṃ yujjatīti? Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti vuttampi bhagavato santike
tika-vin01t1:204_1: paṭiggahitamevāti katvā vuttanti nāyaṃ virodho. Bahukārattāti bahuupakārattā. Upakāravacano
tika-vin01t1:205_0: Ativiya vissatthoti ativiya vissāsiko. Nanti ānandattheraṃ, “ovadatī”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:205_1: Ānandattherassa yebhuyyena navakāya parisāya vibbhamanena mahākassapatthero evamāha
tika-vin01t1:205_2: “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti. Tathā hi parinibbute satthari mahākassapatthero
tika-vin01t1:205_3: satthuparinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:205_4: pañcasate bhikkhū uccinitvā “āvuso, rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyeyyāma,
tika-vin01t1:205_5: tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano attano palibodhaṃ pacchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti
tika-vin01t1:205_6: vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato. Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya mahājanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:205_7: saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇagirismiṃ cārikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:205_8: cari. Tasmiṃ samaye ānandattherassa tiṃsamattā saddhivihārikā yebhuyyena kumārabhūtā
tika-vin01t1:205_9: ekavassikaduvassikabhikkhū ceva anupasampannā ca vibbhamiṃsu. Kasmā panete pabbajitā,
tika-vin01t1:205_10: kasmā vibbhamiṃsūti? Tesaṃ kira mātāpitaro cintesuṃ “ānandatthero satthuvissāsiko
tika-vin01t1:205_11: aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati, icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ satthāraṃ gahetvā gantuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:205_12: amhākaṃ dārake etassa santike pabbājessāma, so satthāraṃ gahetvā āgamissati, tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:205_13: āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te
tika-vin01t1:205_14: pabbājesuṃ. Satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā patthanā upacchinnā, atha ne ekadivaseneva uppabbājesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:206: Atha ānandattheraṃ dakkhiṇagirismiṃ cārikaṃ caritvā rājagahamāgataṃ disvā mahākassapatthero evamāha “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ kassapasaṃyutte –
tika-vin01t1:207_0: “Atha kiñcarahi tvaṃ, āvuso ānanda, imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi
tika-vin01t1:207_1: bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi, sassaghātaṃ maññe
tika-vin01t1:207_2: carasi, kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasi, olujjati kho te, āvuso ānanda, parisā, palujjanti
tika-vin01t1:207_3: kho te āvuso navappāyā, na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti.
tika-vin01t1:208_0: “Api me bhante kassapa sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni, atha ca pana mayaṃ ajjāpi āyasmato
tika-vin01t1:208_1: mahākassapassa kumārakavādā na muccāmāti. Tathā hi pana tvaṃ, āvuso ānanda, imehi
tika-vin01t1:208_2: navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi
tika-vin01t1:208_3: saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi, sassaghātaṃ maññe carasi, kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasi, olujjati
tika-vin01t1:208_4: kho te, āvuso ānanda, parisā, palujjanti kho te āvuso navappāyā, na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:209_0: Tattha sassaghātaṃ maññecarasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi. Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe
tika-vin01t1:209_1: carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya hananto viya āhananto viya āhiṇḍasi. Olujjatīti
tika-vin01t1:209_2: palujjati bhijjati. Palujjanti kho te āvuso navappāyāti, āvuso, evaṃ ete tuyhaṃ pāyena
tika-vin01t1:209_3: yebhuyyena navakā ekavassikaduvassikadaharā ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti. Na vāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:209_4: kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na vata jānātīti theraṃ tajjento
tika-vin01t1:209_5: āha. Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato na muccāma. Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa
tika-vin01t1:209_6: evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yasmā tvaṃ imehi
tika-vin01t1:209_7: navakehi bhikkhūhi indriyasaṃvararahitehi saddhiṃ vicarasi, tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:210_0: “Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti ettha vā-saddo padapūraṇe. Vā-saddo hi upamānasamuccayasaṃsayavavassaggapadapūraṇavikappādīsu
tika-vin01t1:210_1: bahūsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,
tika-vin01t1:210_2: sadisabhāveti attho. “Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantī”tiādīsu samuccaye. “Ke vā ime
tika-vin01t1:210_3: kassa vā”tiādīsu saṃsaye. “Ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:210_4: vavassagge. “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā”tiādīsu vikappeti. Idha
tika-vin01t1:210_5: pana padapūraṇe daṭṭhabbo. Teneva ca ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ “vāsaddassa
tika-vin01t1:210_6: atthuddhāraṃ karontena ‘na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī’tiādīsu padapūraṇe”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin01t1:210_7: ettakameva vuttaṃ “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:210_8: na vata jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āhā”ti. Etthāpi vatāti vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:210_9: Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “na vāyanti ettha vāti vibhāsā, aññāsipi na aññāsipīti
tika-vin01t1:210_10: attho”ti. Taṃ tassa matimattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hettha ayamattho sambhavati, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:210_11: attano pamāṇaṃ nāññāsīti evamattho veditabbo. Tatrāti evaṃ sati. Chandāgamanaṃ viyāti
tika-vin01t1:210_12: ettha chandā āgamanaṃ viyāti padacchedo kātabbo, chandena āgamanaṃ pavattanaṃ viyāti
tika-vin01t1:210_13: attho, chandena akattabbakaraṇaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Chandaṃ vā āgacchati sampayogavasenāti
tika-vin01t1:210_14: chandāgamanaṃ, tathā pavatto apāyagamanīyo akusalacittuppādo. Atha vā ananurūpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:210_15: gamanaṃ agamanaṃ, chandena agamanaṃ chandāgamanaṃ, chandena sinehena ananurūpaṃ gamanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:210_16: pavattanaṃ akattabbakaraṇaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Asekkhapaṭisambhidāppatteti asekkhabhūtā
tika-vin01t1:210_17: paṭisambhidā asekkhapaṭisambhidā, taṃ patte, paṭiladdhaasekkhapaṭisambhideti attho.
tika-vin01t1:211_0: “Kiñcāpi sekkho”ti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ, asekkhānaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:211_1: pana uccinitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭhamamaggeneva hi cattāri agatigamanāni pahīyanti,
tika-vin01t1:211_2: tasmā kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatūti evamettha sambandho
tika-vin01t1:211_3: veditabbo. Na pana kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi abhabbo agatiṃ gantunti yojetabbaṃ. “Abhabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:211_4: pana dhammasaṅgītiyā tassa arahabhāvaṃ dassentā vijjamāne guṇe kathenti. Tattha chandāti
tika-vin01t1:211_5: chandena, sinehenāti attho. Agatiṃ gantunti agantabbaṃ gantuṃ, akattabbaṃ kātunti
tika-vin01t1:211_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Imāni pana cattāri agatigamanāni bhaṇḍabhājanīye ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:211_7: ca labbhanti. Tattha bhaṇḍabhājanīye tāva attano bhārabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ amanāpe
tika-vin01t1:211_8: bhaṇḍe sampatte taṃ parivattitvā manāpaṃ dento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Attano
tika-vin01t1:211_9: pana abhārabhūtānaṃ manāpe bhaṇḍe sampatte taṃ parivattitvā amanāpaṃ dento dosāgatiṃ
tika-vin01t1:211_10: gacchati nāma. Bhaṇḍesu bhājanīyavatthuñca ṭhitikañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati
tika-vin01t1:211_11: nāma. Mukharānaṃ vā rājādinissitānaṃ vā “ime me amanāpe bhaṇḍe dinne anatthaṃ kareyyu”nti
tika-vin01t1:211_12: bhayena parivattitvā manāpaṃ dento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo pana evaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:211_13: sabbesaṃ tulābhūto pamāṇabhūto majjhattova hutvā yaṃ yassa pāpuṇāti, tadeva tassa
tika-vin01t1:211_14: deti, ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatiṃ na gacchati nāma. Vinicchayaṭṭhāne pana attano bhārabhūtassa
tika-vin01t1:211_15: garukāpattiṃ lahukāpattiṃ katvā kathento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Itarassa lahukāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:211_16: garukāpattiṃ katvā kathento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ pana samuccayakkhandhakañca
tika-vin01t1:211_17: ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Mukharassa vā rājapūjitassa vā “ayaṃ me garukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:211_18: katvā āpattiṃ kathentassa anatthampi kareyyā”ti garukameva lahukāpattiṃ kathento
tika-vin01t1:211_19: bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo pana sabbesaṃ yathābhūtameva kathesi, ayaṃ catubbidhampi
tika-vin01t1:211_20: agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma. Theropi tādiso catunnampi agatigamanānaṃ paṭhamamaggeneva
tika-vin01t1:211_21: pahīnattā, tasmā saṅgāyanavasena dhammavinayavinicchaye sampatte chandādivasena aññathā
tika-vin01t1:211_22: akathetvā yathābhūtameva kathetīti vuttaṃ “abhabbo…pe… agatiṃ gantu”nti. Pariyattoti
tika-vin01t1:212_0: Uccinitenāti uccinitvā gahitena. Etadahosīti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. Rājagahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:212_1: kho mahāgocaranti ettha “rājagahanti rājagahasāmantaṃ gahetvā vutta”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:212_2: majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ. Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viya gocaro, bhikkhācaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:212_3: So mahanto assa, etthāti vā mahāgocaraṃ, rājagahaṃ. Thāvarakammanti ciraṭṭhāyikammaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:212_4: Visabhāgapuggalo subhaddasadiso. Ukkoṭeyyāti nivāreyyāti attho. Ñattidutiyena kammena sāvesīti –
tika-vin01t1:213_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni
tika-vin01t1:213_1: sammanneyya ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi
tika-vin01t1:213_2: bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba’nti, esā ñatti.
tika-vin01t1:214_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni sammannati ‘rājagahe
tika-vin01t1:214_1: vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:214_2: vasitabba’nti, yassāyasmato khamati imesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ sammuti ‘rājagahe
tika-vin01t1:214_3: vassaṃ vasantānaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:214_4: vasitabba’nti, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin01t1:215_0: “Sammatāni saṅghena imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca
tika-vin01t1:215_1: vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba’nti, khamati
tika-vin01t1:216: Evaṃ ñattidutiyena kammena sāvesi. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “taṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanayeneva ñātabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:217_0: Ayaṃ pana kammavācā tathāgatassa parinibbānato ekavīsatime divase katā. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_1: dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayaṃ pana kammavācā tathāgatassa parinibbānato ekavīsatime
tika-vin01t1:217_2: divase katā. Bhagavā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ paccūsasamaye parinibbuto, athassa sattāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjayiṃsu. Evaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma
tika-vin01t1:217_4: ahesuṃ. Tato sattāhaṃ citakāya agginā jhāyi, sattāhaṃ sattipañjaraṃ katvā santhāgārasālāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_5: dhātupūjaṃ kariṃsūti ekavīsati divasā gatā. Jeṭṭhamūlasukkapakkhapañcamiyaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:217_6: dhātuyo bhājayiṃsu. Etasmiṃ dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin01t1:217_7: subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena kataṃ anācāraṃ ārocetvā vuttanayeneva bhikkhū uccinitvā
tika-vin01t1:217_8: ayaṃ kammavācā katā. Imañca pana kammavācaṃ katvā thero bhikkhū āmantesi ‘āvuso idāni
tika-vin01t1:217_9: tumhākaṃ cattālīsadivasā okāso, tato paraṃ ayaṃ nāma no palibodho atthīti vattuṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_10: na labbhā, tasmā etthantare yassa rogapalibodho vā ācariyupajjhāyapalibodho vā mātāpitupalibodho
tika-vin01t1:217_11: vā atthi, pattaṃ vā pana pacitabbaṃ cīvaraṃ vā kātabbaṃ, so taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā
tika-vin01t1:217_12: karaṇīyaṃ karotū’ti. Evañca pana vatvā thero attano pañcasatāya parisāya parivuto
tika-vin01t1:217_13: rājagahaṃ gato, aññepi mahātherā attano attano parivāraṃ gahetvā sokasallasamappitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_14: mahājanaṃ assāsetukāmā taṃ taṃ disaṃ pakkantā. Puṇṇatthero pana sattasatabhikkhuparivāro
tika-vin01t1:217_16: aṭṭhāsi. Āyasmā ānando yathā pubbe aparinibbutassa, evaṃ parinibbutassapi bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:217_17: sayameva pattacīvaramādāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_18: pakkāmi. Gacchato panassa parivārā bhikkhū gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā”ti. Tasmā tathāgatassa
tika-vin01t1:217_19: parinibbānato tīsu sattāhesu atikkantesu ekavīsatime divase imaṃ kammavācaṃ sāvetvā
tika-vin01t1:218_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā pana idha maṅgalasuttaṭṭhakathāyañca “sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu
tika-vin01t1:218_1: sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu vītivattesū”ti vuttaṃ? Sattasu dhātupūjādivasesu gahitesu
tika-vin01t1:218_2: tadavinābhāvato majjhe citakāya jhāpanasattāhampi gahitamevāti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:218_3: viya dissati. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto, diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti ca
tika-vin01t1:218_4: vuttanti? Nāyaṃ doso. Appakañhi ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hoti, tasmā samudāyo
tika-vin01t1:218_5: appakena adhikopi anadhiko viya hotīti katvā aḍḍhamāsato adhikepi pañca divase “aḍḍhamāso
tika-vin01t1:218_7: viya. Tathā appakena ūnopi ca samudāyo anūno viya hotīti katvā “diyaḍḍhamāsato ūnepi
tika-vin01t1:218_8: pañca divase diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti ca vuttaṃ. Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyañhi chamāsato
tika-vin01t1:218_9: ūnepi aḍḍhamāse “cha māse sajjhāyo kātabbo”ti vuttavacanaṃ viya. Tattha hi tacapañcakādīsu
tika-vin01t1:218_10: catūsu pañcakesu dvīsu ca chakkesu ekekasmiṃ anulomato pañcāhaṃ, paṭilomato pañcāhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:218_11: anulomapaṭilomato pañcāhaṃ, tathā purimapurimehi pañcakachakkehi saddhiṃ anulomato
tika-vin01t1:218_12: pañcāhaṃ, paṭilomato pañcāhaṃ, anulomapaṭilomato pañcāhanti evaṃ visuṃ tipañcāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:218_13: ekato tipañcāhañca sajjhāyaṃ katvā chamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabboti vacanaṃ viya. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:218_14: hi vakkapañcakādīsu tīsu pañcakesu dvīsu ca chakkesu visuṃ heṭṭhimehi ekato ca sajjhāye
tika-vin01t1:218_15: pañcannaṃ pañcannaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena pañcamāsaparipuṇṇā labbhanti, tacapañcake pana
tika-vin01t1:218_16: visuṃ tipañcāhamevāti aḍḍhamāsoyeveko labbhatīti aḍḍhamāsādhikapañcamāsā labbhanti.
tika-vin01t1:219_0: Evaṃ sati yathā tattha aḍḍhamāse ūnepi māsaparicchedena paricchijjamāne sajjhāye
tika-vin01t1:219_1: cha māsā paricchedakā hontīti paricchijjamānassa sajjhāyassa sattamāsādimāsantaragamananivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:219_2: chamāsaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, na sakalachamāse sajjhāyappavattidassanatthaṃ, evamidhāpi
tika-vin01t1:219_3: māsavasena kāle paricchijjamāne ūnepi pañcadivase diyaḍḍhamāso paricchedako hotīti
tika-vin01t1:219_5: diyaḍḍhamāsaggahaṇaṃ katanti evamettha attho gahetabbo. Aññathā ca aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:219_6: aññamaññavirodho āpajjati. Ekāhameva vā bhagavato sarīraṃ citakāya jhāyīti khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:219_7: adhippāyoti gahetabbaṃ. Evañhi sati parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu vītivattesu
tika-vin01t1:219_8: aṭṭhamiyaṃ citakāya bhagavato sarīraṃ jhāpetvā tato paraṃ sattasu divasesu dhātupūjaṃ
tika-vin01t1:219_9: akaṃsūti aḍḍhamāso atikkanto, gimhānaṃ diyaḍḍho ca māso seso hoti. Parinibbānasuttantapāḷiyampi
tika-vin01t1:219_10: hi citakāya jhāpanasattāhaṃ na āgataṃ, dveyeva sattāhāni āgatāni, upaparikkhitvā
tika-vin01t1:219_11: pana yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ito aññena vā pakārena yathā na virujjhati, tathā
tika-vin01t1:219_12: kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ. Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “aḍḍhamāso atikkantoti ettha eko
tika-vin01t1:219_13: divaso naṭṭho. So pāṭipadadivaso kolāhaladivaso nāma, tasmā idha na gahito”ti. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:219_14: na sundaraṃ parinibbānasuttantapāḷiyaṃ pāṭipadadivasatoyeva paṭṭhāya sattāhassa vuttattā
tika-vin01t1:219_15: aṭṭhakathāyañca parinibbānadivasenapi saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ gahitattā. Tathā
tika-vin01t1:219_16: hi parinibbānadivasena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ gahitattā jeṭṭhamūlasukkapañcamī
tika-vin01t1:220_0: Sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesūti ettha sādhukīḷanaṃ nāma saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā
tika-vin01t1:220_1: aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttāni gītāni gāyitvā pūjāvasena kīḷanato sundaraṃ kīḷananti sādhukīḷanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:220_2: Atha vā saparahitasādhanaṭṭhena sādhu, tesaṃ saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā kīḷanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:220_4: ca purimasmiṃ sattāhe sādhukīḷāya ekadesena katattā sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma te jātā.
tika-vin01t1:220_5: Visesato pana dhātupūjādivasesuyeva sādhukīḷanaṃ akaṃsu. Tatoyeva ca mahāparinibbānasuttantapāḷiyaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:221_0: “Atha kho kosinārakā mallā bhagavato sarīrāni sattāhaṃ santhāgāre sattipañjaraṃ karitvā
tika-vin01t1:221_1: dhanupākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā naccehi gītehi vāditehi mālehi gandhehi sakkariṃsu garuṃ
tika-vin01t1:223_0: “Kasmā panete evamakaṃsūti? Ito purimesu dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:223_1: karontā khādanīyabhojanīyādīni saṃvidahantā sādhukīḷikāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu. Tato
tika-vin01t1:223_2: nesaṃ ahosi ‘imaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷissāma, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ
tika-vin01t1:223_3: amhākaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kocideva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇheyya, tasmā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t1:224_0: Tasmā visesato sādhukīḷikā dhātupūjādivasesuyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Te pana dhātupūjāya
tika-vin01t1:224_1: katattā “dhātupūjādivasā”ti pākaṭā jātāti āha “sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesū”ti. Upakaṭṭhāti
tika-vin01t1:224_2: āsannā. Vassaṃ upanenti upagacchanti etthāti vassūpanāyikā. Ekaṃ maggaṃ gatoti cārikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:224_3: caritvā mahājanaṃ assāsetuṃ ekena maggena gato. Evaṃ anuruddhattherādayopi tesu tesu
tika-vin01t1:224_4: janapadesu cārikaṃ caritvā mahājanaṃ assāsentā gatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yena sāvatthi,
tika-vin01t1:224_5: tena cārikaṃ pakkāmīti yattha sāvatthi, tattha cārikaṃ pakkāmi, yena vā disābhāgena
tika-vin01t1:224_6: sāvatthi pakkamitabbā hoti, tena disābhāgena cārikaṃ pakkāmīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:225_0: Tatrāti tassaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāyāti “sabbe
tika-vin01t1:225_2: kammunā bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ attabhāvaṃ janeti abhinibbattetīti
tika-vin01t1:225_3: jano, kilese janeti, ajani, janissatīti vā jano, mahanto janoti mahājano, taṃ mahājanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:225_4: bahujananti attho. Saññāpetvāti samassāsetvā. Gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvāti paribhogacetiyabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:225_5: gandhakuṭiṃ vanditvā gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivarīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:225_6: “gandhakuṭiṃ vanditvā”ti vuttaṃ. Milātaṃ mālākacavaraṃ milātamālākacavaraṃ. Yathāṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:225_7: ṭhapetvāti paṭhamaṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvā yathāṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:225_8: Bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsīti senāsane kattabbavattaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:225_9: vuttaṃ. Karonto ca nhānakoṭṭhake sammajjanaudakūpaṭṭhānādikālesu gandhakuṭiṃ gantvā
tika-vin01t1:225_10: “nanu bhagavā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ nhānakālo, ayaṃ dhammadesanākālo, ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānakālo,
tika-vin01t1:225_11: ayaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappanakālo, ayaṃ mukhadhovanakālo”tiādinā nayena paridevamānova
tika-vin01t1:225_12: akāsi. Tamenaṃ aññatarā devatā “bhante ānanda, tumhe evaṃ paridevamānā kathaṃ aññe
tika-vin01t1:225_13: assāsayissathā”ti saṃvejesi. So tassā vacanena saṃviggahadayo santhambhitvā tathāgatassa
tika-vin01t1:225_14: parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulatāya ussannadhātukaṃ kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ khīravirecanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:226_0: Ussannadhātukanti upacitasemhādidhātukaṃ kāyaṃ. Samassāsetunti santappetuṃ. Dutiyadivaseti
tika-vin01t1:226_2: vadanti. Viriccati etenāti virecanaṃ, osadhaparibhāvitaṃ khīrameva virecananti khīravirecanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:226_3: Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ bhesajjapānaṃ sandhāya. Aṅgasubhatāya subhoti evaṃ laddhanāmattā
tika-vin01t1:226_4: subhena māṇavena. Pahitaṃ māṇavakanti “satthā parinibbuto ānandatthero kirassa pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:226_5: gahetvā āgato, mahājano ca taṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamatī”ti sutvā “vihāraṃ kho pana
tika-vin01t1:226_6: gantvā mahājanamajjhe na sakkā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ vā kātuṃ dhammakathaṃ vā sotuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:226_7: gehaṃ āgataṃyeva naṃ disvā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmi, ekā ca me kaṅkhā atthi,
tika-vin01t1:226_8: tampi naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā subhena māṇavena pesitaṃ māṇavakaṃ. Etadavocāti
tika-vin01t1:226_9: etaṃ “akālo kho”tiādikaṃ ānandatthero avoca. Akālo khoti ajja gantuṃ yuttakālo na
tika-vin01t1:226_10: hoti. Kasmāti ce āha “atthi me ajjā”tiādi. Bhesajjamattāti appamattakaṃ bhesajjaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:226_11: Appattho hi ayaṃ mattāsaddo “mattā sukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:227_0: Dutiyadivaseti khīravirecanaṃ pītadivasato dutiyadivase. Cetakattherenāti cetiyaraṭṭhe
tika-vin01t1:227_1: jātattā “cetako”ti evaṃladdhanāmena. Subhena māṇavena puṭṭhoti “yesu dhammesu bhavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:227_2: gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, te tassa accayena naṭṭhā nu kho, dharanti, sace dharanti,
tika-vin01t1:227_3: ānando jānissati, handa naṃ pucchāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā “yesaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo dhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:227_4: vaṇṇavādī ahosi, yattha ca imaṃ janataṃ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi, katamesānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:227_5: kho bho ānanda dhammānaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosī”tiādinā subhena māṇavena
tika-vin01t1:227_6: puṭṭho. Athassa thero tīṇi piṭakāni sīlakkhandhādīhi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassento
tika-vin01t1:227_7: “tiṇṇaṃ kho, māṇava, khandhānaṃ so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī”tiādinā subhasuttamabhāsi. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:227_8: sandhāya vuttaṃ “dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:228_0: Khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇanti ettha khaṇḍanti chinnaṃ. Phullanti bhinnaṃ. Tesaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:228_1: puna sammā pākatikakaraṇaṃ, abhinavakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Rājagahanti evaṃnāmakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:228_2: nagaraṃ. Tañhi mandhatumahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā “rājagaha”nti vuccati. Chaḍḍitapatitauklāpāti
tika-vin01t1:228_3: chaḍḍitā ca patitā ca uklāpā ca ahesunti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhagavato parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:228_4: gacchantehi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitā vissaṭṭhā, tatoyeva ca upacikādīhi khāditattā ito
tika-vin01t1:228_5: cito ca patitā, sammajjanābhāvena ākiṇṇakacavarattā uklāpā ca ahesunti. Imamevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:228_6: dassento āha “bhagavato hī”tiādi. Paricchedavasena veṇiyati dissatīti pariveṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:228_7: Tatthāti tesu vihāresu. Khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇanti iminā sambandho. Paṭhamaṃ māsanti
tika-vin01t1:228_8: vassānassa paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Senāsanavattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:228_9: paññattattā senāsanakkhandhake ca senāsanapaṭibaddhānaṃ bahūnaṃ vacanato “bhagavatā…pe… vaṇṇita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:229_1: So ca vassūpanāyikadivasato dutiyadivasoti veditabbo. Te hi therā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāya
tika-vin01t1:229_2: uposathaṃ katvā pāṭipade sannipatitvā vassaṃ upagantvā evaṃ cintesuṃ. Ajātasattu
tika-vin01t1:229_3: rājāti ajāto hutvā pituno paccatthiko jātoti “ajātasattū”ti laddhavohāro rājā. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:229_4: kira kucchigate deviyā evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji “aho vatāhaṃ rañño dakkhiṇabāhuto lohitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:229_5: piveyya”nti. Atha tassā kathetuṃ asakkontiyā kisabhāvaṃ dubbaṇṇabhāvañca disvā rājā
tika-vin01t1:229_6: sayameva pucchitvā ñatvā ca vejje pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇasatthakena bāhuṃ phāletvā suvaṇṇasarakena
tika-vin01t1:229_7: lohitaṃ gahetvā udakena sambhinditvā pāyesi. Nemittakā taṃ sutvā “esa gabbho rañño
tika-vin01t1:229_8: sattu bhavissati, iminā rājā haññissatī”ti byākariṃsu, tasmā “ajātoyeva rañño sattu
tika-vin01t1:229_9: bhavissatī”ti nemittakehi niddiṭṭhattā ajātasattu nāma jāto. Kinti kāraṇapucchanatthe
tika-vin01t1:229_10: nipāto, kasmāti attho. Paṭivedesunti nivedesuṃ, jānāpesunti attho. Vissatthāti nirāsaṅkacittā.
tika-vin01t1:229_11: Āṇācakkanti āṇāyeva appaṭihatavuttiyā pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti āṇācakkaṃ. Sannisajjaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin01t1:230_0: Rājabhavanavibhūtinti rājabhavanasampattiṃ. Avahasantamivāti avahāsaṃ kurumānaṃ viya.
tika-vin01t1:230_1: Siriyā niketamivāti siriyā vasanaṭṭhānamiva. Ekanipātatitthamiva ca devamanussanayanavihaṅgānanti
tika-vin01t1:230_2: ekasmiṃ pānīyatitthe sannipatantā pakkhino viya sabbesaṃ janānaṃ cakkhūni maṇḍapeyeva
tika-vin01t1:230_3: nipatantīti devamanussānaṃ nayanasaṅkhātavihaṅgānaṃ ekanipātatitthamiva ca. Lokarāmaṇeyyakamiva
tika-vin01t1:230_4: sampiṇḍitanti ekattha sampiṇḍitaṃ rāsikataṃ loke ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ viya. Yadi loke vijjamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:230_5: ramaṇīyattaṃ sabbameva ānetvā ekattha sampiṇḍitaṃ siyā, taṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍanti
tika-vin01t1:230_6: pheggurahitasāraṃ viya kasaṭavinimuttaṃ pasannabhūtaṃ viya ca daṭṭhabbesu daṭṭhuṃ
tika-vin01t1:230_7: araharūpesu sārabhūtaṃ pasannabhūtañcā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Daṭṭhabbo dassanīyo
tika-vin01t1:230_8: sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo, maṇḍapoti
tika-vin01t1:230_9: evamettha attho gahetabboti amhākaṃ khanti, upaparikkhitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:230_10: Maṇḍaṃ sūriyarasmiṃ pāti nivāretīti maṇḍapo. Vividha…pe… cāruvitānanti ettha kusumadāmāni
tika-vin01t1:230_11: ca tāni olambakāni cāti kusumadāmaolambakāni. Ettha ca visesanassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:230_12: olambakakusumadāmānīti attho. Tāni vividhāni anekappakārāni viniggalantaṃ vamentaṃ
tika-vin01t1:230_15: nānāratanehi vicittabhūtamaṇikoṭṭimatalamivāti attho. Ettha ca ratanavicittaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:230_17: veditabbaṃ. Maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalattā maṇikoṭṭanena nibbattatalanti maṇikoṭṭimatalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:230_18: Nanti maṇḍapaṃ. Pupphūpahāro pupphapūjā. Uttarābhimukhanti uttaradisābhimukhaṃ. Āsanārahanti
tika-vin01t1:230_19: nisīdanārahaṃ. Dantakhacitanti dantehi racitaṃ, dantehi katanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etthāti
tika-vin01t1:230_20: āsane. Niṭṭhitaṃ bhante mama kiccanti mayā kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:231_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu “imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:231_1: bhikkhusaṅghe eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaratī”ti. Thero taṃ sutvā “imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:231_2: bhikkhusaṅghe añño vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaraṇakabhikkhu nāma natthi, addhā ete
tika-vin01t1:231_3: maṃ sandhāya vadantī”ti saṃvegaṃ āpajji. Ekacce naṃ āhaṃsuyeva “sve, āvuso, sannipāto”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:231_4: Idāni taṃ dassento āha “bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsū”tiādi. Tenāti tasmā. Āvajjesīti
tika-vin01t1:231_5: upanāmesi. Anupādāyāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kañci dhammaṃ agahetvā, yehi vā kilesehi
tika-vin01t1:231_6: sabbehi vimuccati, tesaṃ lesamattampi agahetvāti attho. Āsavehīti bhavato ābhavaggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:231_7: dhammato vā āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi kilesehi. Lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:231_8: āsavehīti, tadekaṭṭhatāya pana sabbehipi kilesehi, sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:231_9: vimuccatiyeva. Cittaṃ vimuccīti cittaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇe āsavehi vimuccamānaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:231_10: arahattaphalakkhaṇe vimuccīti attho. Caṅkamenāti caṅkamanakiriyāya. Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:231_11: kataṃ upacitaṃ puññaṃ etenāti katapuñño, arahattādhigamāya katādhikāroti attho. Padhānamanuyuñjāti
tika-vin01t1:231_12: vīriyaṃ anuyuñja, arahattādhigamāya anuyogaṃ karohīti attho. Kathādoso nāma natthīti
tika-vin01t1:231_13: kathāya aparajjhaṃ nāma natthi. Accāraddhaṃ vīriyanti ativiya āraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ. Uddhaccāyāti
tika-vin01t1:231_14: uddhatabhāvāya. Vīriyasamataṃ yojemīti caṅkamanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa pahānavasena
tika-vin01t1:232_0: Dutiyadivaseti therena arahattappattadivasato dutiyadivase. Dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitāti
tika-vin01t1:232_1: pakkhassa pañcamiyaṃ sannipatiṃsu. Attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmoti “sekkhatāya
tika-vin01t1:232_2: dhammasaṅgītiyā gahetuṃ ayuttampi bahussutattā gaṇhissāmā”ti cintetvā nisinnānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:232_4: saphalatādīpanatthaṃ attupanāyikaṃ akatvā aññabyākaraṇassa bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitattā
tika-vin01t1:232_5: ca thero attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo ahosīti veditabbaṃ. Yathāvuḍḍhanti vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ
tika-vin01t1:232_6: anatikkamitvā. Eketi majjhimabhāṇakānaṃyeva eke. Pubbe vuttampi hi sabbaṃ majjhimabhāṇakā
tika-vin01t1:232_7: vadantiyevāti veditabbaṃ. Dīghabhāṇakā panettha evaṃ vadanti –
tika-vin01t1:233_0: “Atha kho āyasmā ānando arahā samāno sannipātaṃ agamāsi. Kathaṃ agamāsi? ‘Idānimhi
tika-vin01t1:233_1: sannipātamajjhaṃ pavisanāraho’ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhacitto ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā bandhanā
tika-vin01t1:233_2: muttatālapakkaṃ viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya vigatavalāhake nabhe samuggatapuṇṇacando
tika-vin01t1:233_3: viya bālātapasamphassavikasitareṇupiñjaragabbhaṃ padumaṃ viya ca parisuddhena pariyodātena
tika-vin01t1:233_4: sappabhena sassirikena mukhavarena attano arahattappattiṃ ārocayamāno viya ca agamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:233_5: Atha naṃ disvā āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi ‘sobhati vata bho arahattappatto
tika-vin01t1:233_6: ānando, sace satthā dhareyya, addhā ajja ānandassa sādhukāraṃ dadeyya, handa imassāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:233_7: idāni satthārā dātabbaṃ sādhukāraṃ dadāmī’ti tikkhattuṃ sādhukāramadāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:234_0: Ākāsena āgantvā nisīdītipi eketi ettha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ tathā tathā gahetvā āgatamattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:234_1: ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ vacane aññaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ natthīti vadanti. Upatissatthero
tika-vin01t1:234_2: panāha “sattamāsaṃ katāya dhammasaṅgītiyā kadāci pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā āgatattā taṃ
tika-vin01t1:234_3: gahetvā eke vadanti. Kadāci ākāsena āgatattā taṃ gahetvā eke vadantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:235_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti bhikkhū ālapi abhāsi sambodhesīti ayamettha attho. Aññatra pana
tika-vin01t1:235_1: ñāpanepi hoti. Yathāha – “āmantayāmi vo, bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave”ti.
tika-vin01t1:235_2: Pakkosanepi dissati. Yathāha “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sāriputtaṃ āmantehī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:235_3: Āvusoti āmantanākāradīpanaṃ. Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti kaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā. Kiṃ ānando nappahotīti
tika-vin01t1:235_4: aṭṭhakathācariyehi ṭhapitapucchā. Nappahotīti na sakkoti. Etadagganti eso aggo. Liṅgavipallāsena
tika-vin01t1:235_5: hi ayaṃ niddeso. Yadidanti ca yo ayanti attho, yadidaṃ khandhapañcakanti vā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:235_6: Sammannīti sammataṃ akāsi. Upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyanti pucchadhātussa dvikammakattā
tika-vin01t1:235_7: vuttaṃ. Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:235_8: Bhagavāpi hi dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatādassanatthameva vicittabījaniṃ gaṇhāti. Na
tika-vin01t1:235_9: hi aññathā sabbassapi lokassa alaṅkārabhūtaṃ paramukkaṃsagatasikkhāsaṃyamānaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:235_10: mukhacandamaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetabbaṃ hoti. “Paṭhamaṃ, āvuso upāli, pārājikaṃ kattha
tika-vin01t1:235_11: paññatta”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu tassa saṅgītiyā purimakāle paṭhamabhāvo na yuttoti?
tika-vin01t1:235_12: No na yutto bhagavatā paññattānukkamena pātimokkhuddesānukkamena ca paṭhamabhāvassa
tika-vin01t1:235_13: siddhattā. Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāle ṭhitānukkameneva saṅgītāni,
tika-vin01t1:235_14: visesato vinayābhidhammapiṭakānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ methunadhammeti
tika-vin01t1:236_0: Vatthumpi pucchītiādi “kattha paññatta”ntiādinā dassitena saha tato avasiṭṭhampi
tika-vin01t1:236_1: saṅgahetvā dassanavasena vuttaṃ. Kiṃ panettha paṭhamapārājikapāḷiyaṃ kiñci apanetabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_2: vā pakkhipitabbaṃ vā āsi nāsīti? Buddhassa bhagavato bhāsite apanetabbaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t1:236_3: Na hi tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadanti, sāvakānaṃ pana devatānaṃ vā bhāsite
tika-vin01t1:236_4: apanetabbampi hoti, taṃ dhammasaṅgāhakattherā apanayiṃsu, pakkhipitabbaṃ pana sabbatthāpi
tika-vin01t1:236_5: atthi, tasmā yaṃ yattha pakkhipituṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ tattha pakkhipiṃsuyeva. Kiṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:236_6: tanti ce? “Tena samayenā”ti vā “tena kho pana samayenā”ti vā “atha kho”iti vā “evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_7: vutte”ti vā “etadavocā”ti vā evamādikaṃ sambandhavacanamattaṃ. Evaṃ pakkhipitabbayuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_8: pakkhipitvā pana idaṃ paṭhamapārājikanti ṭhapesuṃ. Paṭhamapārājike saṅgahamāruḷhe
tika-vin01t1:236_9: pañca arahantasatāni saṅgahaṃ āropitanayeneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu. “Tena samayena
tika-vin01t1:236_10: buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti ca nesaṃ sajjhāyārambhakāleyeva sādhukāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_11: dadamānā viya mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampittha. Te eteneva nayena sesapārājikānipi
tika-vin01t1:236_12: saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ pārājikakaṇḍa”nti ṭhapesuṃ. Evaṃ terasa saṅghādisesāni “terasaka”ntiādīni
tika-vin01t1:236_13: vatvā vīsādhikāni dve sikkhāpadasatāni “mahāvibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā ṭhapesuṃ. Mahāvibhaṅgāvasānepi
tika-vin01t1:236_14: purimanayeneva mahāpathavī akampittha. Tato bhikkhunivibhaṅge aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t1:236_15: “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāmā”tiādīni vatvā tīṇi sikkhāpadasatāni cattāri ca sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t1:236_17: Ubhatovibhaṅgāvasānepi vuttanayeneva pathavī akampittha. Etenevupāyena asītibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_18: khandhakaṃ pañcavīsatibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ parivārañca saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_19: nāmā”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Vinayapiṭakāvasānepi vuttanayeneva pathavīkampo ahosi. Taṃ āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:236_20: upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “āvuso, idaṃ tuyhaṃ nissitake vācehī”ti evamettha avuttopi viseso veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:237_0: Evaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṅgahamāropetvā suttantapiṭakaṃ saṅgāyiṃsu. Idāni taṃ dassento
tika-vin01t1:237_1: āha “vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā”tiādi. Mahākassapatthero ānandattheraṃ dhammaṃ pucchīti ettha
tika-vin01t1:237_2: ayamanukkamo veditabbo – ānandatthere dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā dhammāsane nisinne
tika-vin01t1:237_3: āyasmā mahākassapatthero bhikkhū pucchi “kataraṃ, āvuso, piṭakaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti?
tika-vin01t1:237_4: “Suttantapiṭakaṃ, bhanteti. Suttantapiṭake catasso saṅgītiyo, tāsu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:237_5: saṅgītinti? Dīghasaṅgītiṃ, bhanteti. Dīghasaṅgītiyaṃ catuttiṃsa suttāni, tayo ca
tika-vin01t1:237_6: vaggā, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ vagganti. Sīlakkhandhavaggaṃ, bhanteti. Sīlakkhandhavagge
tika-vin01t1:237_7: terasa suttantā, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ suttanti? Brahmajālasuttaṃ nāma bhante tividhasīlālaṅkataṃ
tika-vin01t1:237_9: taṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca
tika-vin01t1:238_0: Antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti ettha antarā-saddo kāraṇakhaṇacittavemajjhavivarādīsu
tika-vin01t1:238_1: dissati. Tathā hi “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya aññatra tathāgatā”ti ca, “janā saṅgamma
tika-vin01t1:238_2: mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu kāraṇe antarāsaddo vattati. “Addasa
tika-vin01t1:238_3: maṃ bhante aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe. “Yassantarato
tika-vin01t1:238_4: na santi kopā”tiādīsu citte. “Antarā vosānamāpādī”tiādīsu vemajjhe. “Api cāyaṃ tapodā
tika-vin01t1:238_5: dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare. Svāyamidha vivare vattati,
tika-vin01t1:238_6: tasmā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca vivareti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo, antarāsaddena
tika-vin01t1:238_7: pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca
tika-vin01t1:238_8: nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo
tika-vin01t1:238_9: hoti. Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanappasaṅge antarāsaddayogena
tika-vin01t1:238_10: upayogavacanassa icchitattā. Idha pana yojetvā evaṃ vutto. Rājāgāraketi tattha rañño
tika-vin01t1:238_11: kīḷanatthaṃ paṭibhānacittavicitraṃ agāraṃ akaṃsu, taṃ rājāgārakanti pavuccati, tasmiṃ.
tika-vin01t1:238_12: Ambalaṭṭhikāti rañño uyyānaṃ. Tassa kira dvārasamīpe taruṇo ambarukkho atthi, taṃ
tika-vin01t1:238_13: ambalaṭṭhikāti vadanti. Tassa avidūrabhavattā uyyānampi ambalaṭṭhikātveva saṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:239_0: Suppiyañca paribbājakanti ettha suppiyoti tassa nāmaṃ, paribbājakoti sañjayassa antevāsī
tika-vin01t1:239_1: channaparibbājako. Brahmadattañca māṇavakanti ettha brahmadattoti tassa nāmaṃ. Māṇavoti
tika-vin01t1:239_2: sattopi coropi taruṇopi vuccati. Tathā hi –
tika-vin01t1:242_0: Ādīsu satto māṇavoti vutto. “Māṇavehipi samāgacchanti katakammehipi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:242_1: coro. “Ambaṭṭhamāṇavo aṅgako māṇavo”tiādīsu taruṇo māṇavoti vutto. Idhāpi ayameva
tika-vin01t1:242_2: adhippeto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brahmadattaṃ nāma taruṇapurisaṃ ārabbhā”ti. Jīvakambavaneti
tika-vin01t1:242_3: jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane. Atha “kaṃ ārabbhā”ti avatvā “kenasaddhi”nti kasmā
tika-vin01t1:242_4: vuttaṃ? Na etaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā eva vuttaṃ, raññāpi “yathā nu kho imāni puthusippāyatanānī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:242_5: kiñci kiñci vuttaṃ atthi, tasmā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedehiputtenāti ayaṃ kosalarañño
tika-vin01t1:242_6: dhītāya putto, na videharañño, “vedehī”ti pana paṇḍitādhivacanametaṃ. Vidanti etenāti
tika-vin01t1:242_7: vedo, ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vedena īhati ghaṭati vāyamatīti vedehī, vedehiyā putto vedehiputto, tena.
tika-vin01t1:243_0: Etenevupāyena pañca nikāye pucchīti ettha ayamanukkamo veditabbo. Vuttanayena brahmajālassa
tika-vin01t1:243_1: pucchāvisajjanāvasāne pañca arahantasatāni sajjhāyamakaṃsu. Vuttanayeneva ca pathavīkampo
tika-vin01t1:243_2: ahosi. Evaṃ brahmajālaṃ saṅgāyitvā tato paraṃ “sāmaññaphalaṃ panāvuso ānanda, kattha
tika-vin01t1:243_3: bhāsita”ntiādinā pucchāvisajjanānukkamena saddhiṃ brahmajālena terasasuttantaṃ saṅgāyitvā
tika-vin01t1:243_4: “ayaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggo nāmā”ti kittetvā ṭhapesuṃ. Tadanantaraṃ mahāvaggaṃ, tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:243_6: tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “ayaṃ dīghanikāyo nāmā”ti vatvā āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ
tika-vin01t1:243_7: “āvuso, imaṃ tuyhaṃ nissitake vācehī”ti. Tato anantaraṃ asītibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ majjhimanikāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:243_8: saṅgāyitvā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa nissitake paṭicchāpesuṃ “imaṃ tumhe pariharathā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:243_10: paṭicchāpesuṃ “bhante, imaṃ tumhākaṃ nissitake vācethā”ti. Tadanantaraṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasatapaamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:243_11: aṅguttaranikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā anuruddhattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “imaṃ tumhākaṃ nissitake vācethā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:247_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇitaṃ sukhumañāṇagocaraṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti
tika-vin01t1:247_1: vatvā pañca arahantasatāni sajjhāyamakaṃsu. Vuttanayeneva pathavīkampo ahosi. Tato
tika-vin01t1:247_2: paraṃ jātakaṃ mahāniddeso paṭisambhidāmaggo apadānaṃ suttanipāto khuddakapāṭho dhammapadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:247_3: udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu theragāthā therīgāthāti imaṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā
tika-vin01t1:247_4: “khuddakagantho nāma aya”nti ca vatvā abhidhammapiṭakasmiṃyeva saṅgahaṃ āropayiṃsūti
tika-vin01t1:247_5: dīghabhāṇakā vadanti. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsehi saddhiṃ sabbampi
tika-vin01t1:247_6: taṃ khuddakaganthaṃ suttantapiṭake pariyāpanna”nti vadanti. Ayamettha adhippāyo –
tika-vin01t1:247_7: jātakādike khuddakanikāyapariyāpanne yebhuyyena ca dhammaniddesabhūte tādise abhidhammapiṭake
tika-vin01t1:247_8: saṅgaṇhituṃ yuttaṃ, na pana dīghanikāyādippakāre suttantapiṭake, nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte
tika-vin01t1:247_9: vinayapiṭaketi. Dīghabhāṇakā “jātakādīnaṃ abhidhammapiṭake saṅgaho”ti vadanti. Cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsānañcettha
tika-vin01t1:247_10: aggahaṇaṃ jātakagatikattā. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana aṭṭhuppattivasena desitānaṃ jātakādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:247_11: yathānulomadesanābhāvato tādise suttantapiṭake saṅgaho yutto, na pana sabhāvadhammaniddesabhūte
tika-vin01t1:247_12: yathādhammasāsane abhidhammapiṭaketi jātakādīnaṃ suttapariyāpannataṃ vadanti. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:247_13: yuttaṃ vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Khuddakanikāyassa sesanikāyānaṃ viya apākaṭattā sese
tika-vin01t1:247_14: ṭhapetvā khuddakanikāyaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “tattha khuddakanikāyo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:248_1: tattha vavatthāpitesu dhammavinayesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ekavidhādibhede dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:248_2: “tadetaṃ sabbampī”tiādimāha. Tattha anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti ettha anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:248_4: vāti udānādivasena pavattadhammaṃ sandhāyāha. Vimuttirasanti arahattaphalassādaṃ
tika-vin01t1:248_5: vimuttisampattikaṃ vā aggaphalanipphādanato, vimuttikiccaṃ vā kilesānaṃ accantavimuttisampādanato.
tika-vin01t1:249_0: Kiñcāpi avisesena sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ kilesavinayanena vinayo, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:249_1: paṭipajjamāne apāyapatanādito dhāraṇena dhammo ca hoti, idhādhippete pana dhammavinaye
tika-vin01t1:249_3: āha “avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammo”ti. Atha vā yadipi dhammoyeva vinayo pariyattiādibhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:249_4: tathāpi vinayasaddasannidhāno abhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhammasaddo vinayatantiviparītaṃ
tika-vin01t1:250_0: Anekajātisaṃsāranti ayaṃ gāthā bhagavatā attano sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattappattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:250_1: paccavekkhantena ekūnavīsatimassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa anantaraṃ bhāsitā. Tenāha
tika-vin01t1:250_2: “idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti. Idaṃ kira sabbabuddhehi avijahitaudānaṃ. Ayamassa
tika-vin01t1:250_3: saṅkhepattho – ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena
tika-vin01t1:250_4: ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā, tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro
tika-vin01t1:250_5: ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ
tika-vin01t1:250_6: anibbisanto taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ. Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya
tika-vin01t1:250_7: jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā, na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:251_0: Diṭṭhosīti idāni mayā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho asi. Puna gehanti puna
tika-vin01t1:251_1: imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ na kāhasi na karissasi. Tava sabbā anavasesā kilesaphāsukā
tika-vin01t1:251_2: mayā bhaggā. Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa kūṭaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:251_3: visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ. Visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:251_4: idāni mama cittaṃ, ahañca taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ arahattaphalaṃ vā
tika-vin01t1:251_5: ajjhagā adhigato pattosmīti attho. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “visaṅkhāragatanti cittameva
tika-vin01t1:251_6: taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ arahattaphalaṃ vā ajjhagā adhigato patto”ti
tika-vin01t1:251_7: evampi attho vutto. Ayaṃ manasā pavattitadhammānaṃ ādi. “Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammāti
tika-vin01t1:251_8: ayaṃ pana vācāya pavattitadhammānaṃ ādī”ti vadanti. Antojappanavasena kira bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:252_0: Kecīti khandhakabhāṇakā. Paṭhamaṃ vutto pana dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ adhippāyoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:252_1: Ettha ca khandhakabhāṇakā vadanti “dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ gāthā manasā desitattā tadā
tika-vin01t1:252_2: mahato janassa upakārāya na hoti, amhākaṃ pana gāthā vacībhedaṃ katvā desitattā tadā
tika-vin01t1:252_3: suṇantānaṃ devabrahmānaṃ upakārāya ahosi, tasmā idameva paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti.
tika-vin01t1:252_4: Dhammapadabhāṇakā pana “desanāya janassa upakārānupakārabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:252_5: bhagavatā manasā desitattāyeva idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti vadanti, tasmā ubhayampi
tika-vin01t1:252_6: aññamaññaṃ viruddhaṃ na hotīti veditabbaṃ. Nanu ca yadi “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti manasā
tika-vin01t1:252_7: desitaṃ, atha kasmā dhammapadaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:252_8: satthā bodhirukkhamūle nisinno udānavasena udānetvā aparabhāge ānandattherena puṭṭho
tika-vin01t1:252_9: kathesī”ti vuttanti? Tatthāpi manasā udānetvāti evamattho gahetabbo. Atha vā manasāva
tika-vin01t1:252_10: desitanti evaṃ gahaṇe kiṃ kāraṇanti ce? Yadi vacībhedaṃ katvā desitaṃ siyā, udānapāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:252_11: āruḷhaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā udānapāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhabhāvoyeva vacībhedaṃ akatvā manasā desitabhāve kāraṇanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:253_0: Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammāti ettha itisaddo ādiattho. Tena “ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa,
tika-vin01t1:253_1: athassa kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbā. Yato pajānāti sahetudhamma”nti ādigāthāttayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:253_2: Udānagāthanti pana jātiyā ekavacanaṃ, tatthāpi paṭhamagāthaṃyeva vā gahetvā vuttanti
tika-vin01t1:253_3: veditabbaṃ. Ettha pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ khandhake āvi bhavissati. Pāṭipadadivaseti
tika-vin01t1:253_5: etena pana sambandhitabbaṃ. Visākhapuṇṇamāyameva hi bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaṃ
tika-vin01t1:253_7: bodhemīti attho. Vayadhammāti aniccalakkhaṇamukhena dukkhānattalakkhaṇampi saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:253_8: vibhāveti “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato. Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvananayeneva
tika-vin01t1:253_9: tadārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ dassento sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhāveṇikaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:253_10: aviparītaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pakāsetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:253_11: niyojeti “appamādena sampādethā”ti. Atha vā “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhepena
tika-vin01t1:253_12: saṃvejetvā “appamādena sampādethā”ti saṅkhepeneva niravasesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:253_13: Appamādapadañhi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ sāsanaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-vin01t1:254_0: Suttantapiṭakanti ettha yathā kammameva kammantaṃ, evaṃ suttameva suttantanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:254_2: asaṅgīta”nti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. “Paṭhamasaṅgītito puretarameva hi āyasmatā
tika-vin01t1:254_3: ānandattherena jetavane viharantena subhassa māṇavassa desita”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-vin01t1:254_4: vuttaṃ. Subhasuttaṃ pana “evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando sāvatthiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:254_5: viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme aciraparinibbute bhagavatī”tiādinā āgataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:254_6: Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādivacanaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ āyasmatā ānandatthereneva vattuṃ
tika-vin01t1:254_7: yuttarūpaṃ na hoti. Na hi ānandatthero sayameva subhasuttaṃ desetvā “evaṃ me suta”ntiādīni
tika-vin01t1:254_8: vadati. Evaṃ pana vattabbaṃ siyā “ekamidāhaṃ, bhante, samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ viharāmi
tika-vin01t1:254_9: jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti, tasmā dutiyatatiyasaṅgītikārakehi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:254_10: subhasuttaṃ saṅgītimāropitaṃ viya dissati. Atha ācariyadhammapālattherassa evamadhippāyo
tika-vin01t1:254_11: siyā “ānandatthereneva vuttampi subhasuttaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiṃ āropetvā tantiṃ ṭhapetukāmehi
tika-vin01t1:254_12: mahākassapattherādīhi aññesu suttesu āgatanayeneva ‘evaṃ me suta’ntiādinā tanti ṭhapitā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:254_13: evaṃ sati yujjeyya. Atha vā āyasmā ānandatthero subhasuttaṃ sayaṃ desentopi sāmaññaphalādīsu
tika-vin01t1:254_14: bhagavatā desitanayeneva desesīti bhagavato sammukhā laddhanaye ṭhatvā desitattā
tika-vin01t1:254_15: bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ attani adahanto “evaṃ me suta”ntiādimāhāti evamadhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:255_0: Ubhayāni pātimokkhānīti bhikkhubhikkhunīpātimokkhavasena. Dve vibhaṅgānīti bhikkhubhikkhunīvibhaṅgavaseneva
tika-vin01t1:255_1: dve vibhaṅgāni. Dvāvīsati khandhakānīti mahāvaggacūḷavaggesu āgatāni dvāvīsati khandhakāni.
tika-vin01t1:255_2: Soḷasaparivārāti soḷasahi parivārehi upalakkhitattā soḷasaparivārāti vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-vin01t1:255_3: hi parivārapāḷiyaṃ “yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:255_4: pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā paññattivāro, tato paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto
tika-vin01t1:255_5: kati āpattiyo āpajjatī”tiādinā katāpattivāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo
tika-vin01t1:255_6: catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajantī”tiādippabhedo vipattivāro, “methunaṃ
tika-vin01t1:255_7: dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi
tika-vin01t1:255_8: saṅgahitā”tiādippabhedo saṅgahavāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṃ
tika-vin01t1:255_10: dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇa”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:255_11: adhikaraṇavāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi
tika-vin01t1:255_12: samathehi sammantī”tiādippabhedo samathavāro, tadanantaraṃ samuccayavāro cāti aṭṭha
tika-vin01t1:255_13: vārā vuttā. Tato paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:255_14: nayena puna paccayavasena eko paññattivāro, tassa vasena purimasadisā eva katāpattivārādayo
tika-vin01t1:255_15: satta vārāti evaṃ aparepi aṭṭha vārā vuttā. Iti imāni aṭṭha, purimānipi aṭṭhāti mahāvibhaṅge
tika-vin01t1:255_16: soḷasa vārā dassitā. Tato paraṃ teneva nayena bhikkhunivibhaṅgepi soḷasa vārā āgatāti
tika-vin01t1:255_17: imehi soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhitattā soḷasaparivārāti vuccati. Potthakesu pana katthaci
tika-vin01t1:255_18: “parivāro”ti ettakameva dissati, bahūsu pana potthakesu dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin01t1:255_19: “soḷasaparivārā”ti evameva vuttattā ayampi pāṭho na sakkā paṭibāhitunti tassevattho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:256_1: ettha, etenāti vā brahmajālādicatuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho. Vuttappamāṇānaṃ vā suttānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:256_2: saṅgaho etassāti brahmajālādicatuttiṃsasuttasaṅgahoti. Evaṃ sesesupi veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:257_0: Vividhavisesanayattāti imissā gāthāya atthaṃ vibhāvento āha “vividhā hī”tiādi. Daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanāti
tika-vin01t1:257_1: yathākkamaṃ lokavajjesu sikkhāpadesu daḷhīkammappayojanā, paṇṇattivajjesu sithilakaraṇappayojanāti
tika-vin01t1:257_2: veditabbaṃ. Ajjhācāranisedhanatoti saññamavelaṃ atibhavitvā pavatto ācāro ajjhācāro,
tika-vin01t1:257_3: vītikkamo, tassa nisedhanatoti attho. Tenāti vividhanayattādihetunā. Etanti “vividhavisesanayattā”tiādigāthāvacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:258_0: Idāni atthānaṃ sūcanatotiādigāthāya atthaṃ pakāsento āha “tañhī”tiādi. Attatthaparatthādibhedeti
tika-vin01t1:258_1: yo taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati suṇāti vāceti cinteti deseti ca, suttena saṅgahito sīlādiattho
tika-vin01t1:258_2: tassapi hoti, tena parassa sādhetabbato parassapi hotīti tadubhayaṃ taṃ suttaṃ sūceti
tika-vin01t1:258_3: dīpeti. Tathā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe lokiyalokuttaratthe cāti evamādibhede
tika-vin01t1:258_4: atthe ādisaddena saṅgaṇhāti. Atthasaddo cāyaṃ hitapariyāyavacano, na bhāsitatthavacano.
tika-vin01t1:258_5: Yadi siyā, suttaṃ attanopi bhāsitatthaṃ sūceti parassapīti ayamattho vutto siyā,
tika-vin01t1:258_6: suttena ca yo attho pakāsito, so tasseva hoti, na tena parattho sūcito hotīti. Tena
tika-vin01t1:258_7: sūcetabbassa paratthassa nivattetabbassa abhāvā attaggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ. Attatthaparatthavinimuttassa
tika-vin01t1:258_8: bhāsitatthassa abhāvā ādiggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttassa hitapariyāyassa
tika-vin01t1:258_9: atthassa sutte asambhavato suttādhārassa puggalassa vasena attatthaparatthā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:259_0: Atha vā suttaṃ anapekkhitvā ye attatthādayo atthappabhedā “na haññadatthatthi pasaṃsalābhā”ti
tika-vin01t1:259_1: etassa padassa niddese vuttā attattho, parattho, ubhayattho, diṭṭhadhammiko attho,
tika-vin01t1:259_2: samparāyiko attho, uttāno attho, gambhīro attho, guḷho attho, paṭicchanno attho,
tika-vin01t1:259_3: neyyo attho, nīto attho, anavajjo attho, nikkileso attho, vodāno attho, paramatthoti,
tika-vin01t1:259_4: te atthe suttaṃ sūcetīti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi kiñcāpi suttanirapekkhaṃ attatthādayo
tika-vin01t1:259_5: vuttā suttatthabhāvena aniddiṭṭhattā, tesu pana ekopi atthappabhedo suttena dīpetabbataṃ
tika-vin01t1:259_6: nātikkamati, tasmā te atthe suttaṃ sūcetīti vuccati. Imasmiñca atthavikappe attha-saddoyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:259_7: bhāsitatthapariyāyopi hoti. Ettha hi purimakā pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā, tato
tika-vin01t1:259_8: pare cha bhāsitatthabhedā, pacchimakā pana ubhayasabhāvā. Tattha duradhigamatāya
tika-vin01t1:259_9: vibhāvane agādhabhāvo gambhīro, na vivaṭo guḷho, mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā
tika-vin01t1:259_10: tirohito paṭicchanno. Niddhāretvā ñāpetabbo neyyo, yathārutavasena veditabbo nīto.
tika-vin01t1:259_12: Paramattho nibbānaṃ, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo eva vā.
tika-vin01t1:260_0: Atha vā attanā ca appiccho hotīti attatthaṃ, appicchākathañca paresaṃ kattā hotīti
tika-vin01t1:260_1: paratthaṃ sūceti. Evaṃ “attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”tiādīni suttāni yojetabbāni.
tika-vin01t1:260_2: Vinayābhidhammehi ca visesetvā suttasaddassa attho vattabbo, tasmā veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya
tika-vin01t1:260_3: desanāya attahitaparahitādīni sātisayaṃ pakāsitāni honti tappadhānabhāvato, na āṇādhammasabhāvavasappavattāyāti
tika-vin01t1:260_4: idameva atthānaṃ sūcanato suttanti vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā “ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:260_5: suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpanna”nti ca “sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”ti ca evamādīsu suttasaddo
tika-vin01t1:261_0: Suttesu āṇādhammasabhāvā ca veneyyajjhāsayaṃ anuvattanti, na vinayābhidhammesu viya
tika-vin01t1:261_3: suttantadesanā”ti idampi veneyyānaṃ hitasampāpane suttantadesanāya tapparabhāvaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:261_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tapparabhāvo ca veneyyajjhāsayānulomato daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha “veneyyajjhāsayānulomena
tika-vin01t1:261_5: vuttattā”ti. Vinayadesanaṃ viya issarabhāvato āṇāpatiṭṭhāpanavasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:262_0: Anupubbasikkhādivasena kālantare abhinipphattiṃ dassento āha “sassamiva phala”nti.
tika-vin01t1:262_1: Pasavatīti phalati, nipphādetīti attho. Upāyasamaṅgīnaṃyeva nipphajjanabhāvaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t1:262_2: “dhenu viya khīra”nti āha. Dhenutopi hi upāyavantānaṃyeva khīrapaṭilābho hoti. Anupāyena
tika-vin01t1:262_3: hi akāle ajātavacchaṃ dhenuṃ dohanto kālepi vā visāṇaṃ gahetvā dohanto neva khīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:262_4: paṭilabhati. “Suttāṇā”ti etassa atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “suṭṭhu ca ne tāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:263_0: Suttasabhāganti suttasadisaṃ. Suttasabhāgataṃyeva dassento āha “yathā hī”tiādi. Tacchakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:263_1: suttanti vaḍḍhakīnaṃ kāḷasuttaṃ. Pamāṇaṃ hotīti tadanusārena tacchanato. Evametampi
tika-vin01t1:263_2: viññūnanti yathā kāḷasuttaṃ pasāretvā saññāṇe kate gahetabbaṃ vissajjetabbañca paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:263_3: evaṃ vivādesu uppannesu sutte ānītamatte “idaṃ gahetabbaṃ, idaṃ vissajjetabba”nti
tika-vin01t1:263_4: viññūnaṃ pākaṭattā vivādo vūpasammatīti etampi suttaṃ viññūnaṃ pamāṇaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:263_5: Idāni aññathāpi suttasabhāgataṃ dassento āha “yathā cā”tiādi. Suttaṃ viya pamāṇattā
tika-vin01t1:263_6: saṅgāhakattā ca suttamiva suttanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca attatthādividhāne suttassa
tika-vin01t1:263_7: pamāṇabhāvo attatthādīnaṃyeva ca saṅgāhakattaṃ yojetabbaṃ tadatthappakāsanapadhānattā
tika-vin01t1:263_8: suttassa. Vinayābhidhammehi visesattañca pubbe vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Etanti “atthānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:264_0: Yanti yasmā. Etthāti abhidhamme. Abhikkamantīti ettha abhi-saddo kamanakiriyāya vuḍḍhibhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:264_1: atirekataṃ dīpetīti āha “abhikkamantītiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato”ti. Abhiññātāti aḍḍhacandādinā
tika-vin01t1:264_2: kenaci saññāṇena ñātā paññātā pākaṭāti attho. Aḍḍhacandādibhāvo hi rattiyā upalakkhaṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:264_3: saññāṇaṃ hoti, yasmā aḍḍho cando, tasmā aṭṭhamī, yasmā ūno, tasmā cātuddasī, yasmā
tika-vin01t1:264_4: puṇṇo, tasmā pannarasīti. Abhilakkhitāti etthāpi ayamevattho veditabbo. Abhilakkhitasaddapariyāyo
tika-vin01t1:264_5: abhiññātasaddoti āha “abhiññātā abhilakkhitātiādīsu lakkhaṇe”ti. Ettha ca vācakasaddantarasannidhānena
tika-vin01t1:264_6: nipātānaṃ tadatthajotakamattattā lakkhitasaddatthajotako abhisaddo lakkhaṇe vattatīti
tika-vin01t1:264_7: vutto. Rājābhirājāti rājūhi pūjetuṃ araho rājā. Pūjiteti pūjārahe.
tika-vin01t1:265_2: aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme”tipi vadanti. “Pāṇātipāto akusala”nti evamādīsu ca
tika-vin01t1:265_3: maraṇādhippāyassa jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā akusalaṃ, na pāṇasaṅkhātajīvitindriyassa
tika-vin01t1:265_4: upacchedasaṅkhāto atipāto, tathā adinnassa parasantakassa ādānasaṅkhātā viññatti
tika-vin01t1:265_5: abyākato dhammo, taṃviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā akusalo dhammoti evamādināpi
tika-vin01t1:265_6: aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhammeti attho veditabbo. Abhivinayeti ettha “jātarūparajataṃ
tika-vin01t1:265_7: na paṭiggahetabba”nti vadanto vinaye vineti nāma. Ettha “evaṃ paṭiggaṇhato pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:265_8: evaṃ dukkaṭanti vadanto ca abhivinaye vineti nāmā”ti vadanti. Tasmā jātarūparajataṃ
tika-vin01t1:265_9: theyyacittena parasantakaṃ gaṇhantassa yathāvatthu pārājikathullaccayadukkaṭesu aññataraṃ,
tika-vin01t1:265_10: bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena gaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ, attatthāya gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:265_11: Kevalaṃ lolatāya gaṇhantassa anāmāsadukkaṭaṃ, rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammatassa anāpattīti
tika-vin01t1:265_12: evaṃ aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite vinaye paṭibalo vinetunti attho veditabbo. Abhikkantenāti
tika-vin01t1:265_13: ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ abhisaddo dīpetīti āha “adhike”ti.
tika-vin01t1:266_0: Nanu ca “abhikkamantī”ti ettha abhisaddo kamanakiriyāya vuḍḍhibhāvaṃ atirekataṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin01t1:266_2: ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ visiṭṭhataṃ dīpetīti idaṃ tāva yuttaṃ kiriyāvisesakattā
tika-vin01t1:266_3: upasaggassa, “abhirājā abhivinayo”ti pana pūjitaparicchinnesu rājavinayesu abhisaddo
tika-vin01t1:266_4: vattatīti kathametaṃ yujjeyyāti ce? Idhāpi natthi doso pūjanaparicchedanakiriyādīpanato,
tika-vin01t1:266_5: tāhi ca kiriyāhi rājavinayānaṃ yuttattā, tasmā ettha atimālādīsu atisaddo viya abhisaddo
tika-vin01t1:266_6: saha sādhanena kiriyaṃ vadatīti abhirājaabhivinayasaddā siddhā, evaṃ abhidhammasadde
tika-vin01t1:266_7: abhisaddo saha sādhanena vuḍḍhiyādikiriyaṃ dīpetīti ayamattho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:267_0: Ettha cāti abhidhamme. Bhāvetīti cittassa vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Pharitvāti ārammaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:267_1: vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuḍḍhimantoti bhāvanāpharaṇavuḍḍhīhi vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttāti
tika-vin01t1:267_4: pūjitāti dassitā. Sabhāvaparicchinnattāti phusanādisabhāvena paricchinnattā. Adhikāpi
tika-vin01t1:267_5: dhammā vuttāti ettha kāmāvacarehi mahantabhāvato mahaggatā dhammāpi adhikā nāma hontīti
tika-vin01t1:268_0: Yaṃ panettha avisiṭṭhanti ettha vinayādīsu tīsu aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:268_1: samānaṃ, taṃ piṭakasaddanti attho. Vinayādayo hi tayo saddā aññamaññaṃ asādhāraṇattā
tika-vin01t1:268_2: visiṭṭhā nāma, piṭakasaddo pana tehi tīhipi sādhāraṇattā avisiṭṭhoti vuccati. Mā
tika-vin01t1:268_3: piṭakasampadānenāti pāḷisampadānavasena mā gaṇhathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kudālañca piṭakañca
tika-vin01t1:268_4: kudālapiṭakaṃ. Tattha ku vuccati pathavī, tassā dālanato vidālanato ayomayo upakaraṇaviseso
tika-vin01t1:268_5: kudālaṃ nāma, tālapaṇṇavettalatādīhi kato bhājanaviseso piṭakaṃ nāma, taṃ ādāya gahetvāti
tika-vin01t1:269_0: Desanāsāsanakathābhedanti ettha kathetabbānaṃ atthānaṃ desakāyattena āṇādividhinā
tika-vin01t1:269_1: abhisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā. Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādinā sāsitabbabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:269_2: anusāsanaṃ vinayanaṃ sāsanaṃ. Kathetabbassa saṃvarāsaṃvarādino atthassa kathanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:269_3: vacanapaṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ kathāti vuccati. Tasmā desitāraṃ bhagavantamapekkhitvā
tika-vin01t1:269_4: desanā, sāsitabbapuggalavasena sāsanaṃ, kathetabbassa atthassa vasena kathāti evamettha
tika-vin01t1:269_5: desanādīnaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi desanādayo desetabbādinirapekkhā
tika-vin01t1:269_6: na honti, āṇādayo pana visesato desakādiadhīnāti taṃtaṃvisesayogavasena desanādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:269_7: bhedo vutto. Tathā hi āṇāvidhānaṃ visesato āṇārahādhīnaṃ tattha kosallayogato. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:269_8: vohāraparamatthavidhānāni ca vidhāyakādhīnānīti āṇādividhino desakāyattatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:269_9: Aparādhajjhāsayānurūpaṃ viya dhammānurūpampi sāsanaṃ visesato, tathā vinetabbapuggalāpekkhanti
tika-vin01t1:269_10: sāsitabbapuggalavasena sāsanaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṃvarāsaṃvaranāmarūpānaṃ viya viniveṭhetabbāya
tika-vin01t1:269_11: diṭṭhiyāpi kathanaṃ sati vācāvatthusmiṃ nāsatīti visesato tadadhīnanti kathetabbassa
tika-vin01t1:269_12: atthassa vasena kathā vuttā. Bhedasaddo visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo “desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:269_13: kathābhedañca yathārahaṃ paridīpaye”ti. Bhedanti ca nānattanti attho. Tesu piṭakesu
tika-vin01t1:269_14: sikkhā ca pahānāni ca gambhīrabhāvo ca sikkhāpahānagambhīrabhāvaṃ, tañca yathārahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:270_0: Pariyattibhedanti ca pariyāpuṇanabhedanti attho. Yahinti yasmiṃ vinayādike piṭake.
tika-vin01t1:270_1: Yaṃ sampattiñca vipattiñca yathā pāpuṇāti, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho. Atha
tika-vin01t1:270_2: vā yaṃ pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiñca vipattiñcāpi yahiṃ yathā pāpuṇāti, tampi sabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:270_3: vibhāvayeti yojetabbaṃ. Ettha yathāti yehi upārambhādihetupariyāpuṇanādippakārehi
tika-vin01t1:271_0: Paridīpanā vibhāvanā cāti heṭṭhā vuttassa anurūpato vuttaṃ, atthato pana ekameva.
tika-vin01t1:271_1: Āṇārahenāti āṇaṃ ṭhapetuṃ arahatīti āṇāraho, bhagavā. So hi sammāsambuddhatāya mahākāruṇikatāya
tika-vin01t1:271_2: ca aviparītahitopadesakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahati, vohāraparamatthānampi
tika-vin01t1:271_3: sambhavato āha “āṇābāhullato”ti. Ito paresupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t1:272_0: Paṭhamanti vinayapiṭakaṃ. Pacurāparādhā seyyasakattherādayo. Te hi dosabāhullato
tika-vin01t1:272_1: “pacurāparādhā”ti vuttā. Pacuro bahuko bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesaṃ te pacurāparādhā.
tika-vin01t1:272_2: Anekajjhāsayātiādīsu āsayova ajjhāsayo. So ca atthato diṭṭhi ñāṇañca, pabhedato pana
tika-vin01t1:272_3: catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tathā hi pubbacariyavasena āyatiṃ sati paccaye uppajjamānārahā
tika-vin01t1:275_0: Idañca catubbidhaṃ āsayanti ettha sattā nivasantīti āsayoti vuccati. Anusayā kāmarāgabhavarāgadiṭṭhipaṭighavicikicchāmānāvijjāvasena
tika-vin01t1:275_1: satta. Mūsikavisaṃ viya kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā anāgatā kilesā, atītā paccuppannā
tika-vin01t1:275_2: ca tatheva vuccanti. Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthīti. Cariyāti rāgacariyādikā
tika-vin01t1:275_3: cha mūlacariyā, antarabhedena anekavidhā, saṃsaggavasena pana tesaṭṭhi honti. Atha
tika-vin01t1:275_4: vā cariyāti caritaṃ, taṃ sucaritaduccaritavasena duvidhaṃ. “Adhimutti nāma ‘ajjeva
tika-vin01t1:275_5: pabbajissāmi, ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī’tiādinā tanninnabhāvena pavattamānaṃ sanniṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin01t1:275_6: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “sattānaṃ pubbacariyavasena abhirucī”ti
tika-vin01t1:275_7: vuttaṃ. Sā duvidhā hīnapaṇītabhedena. Yathānulomanti ajjhāsayādīnaṃ anurūpaṃ. Ahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:275_8: mamāti saññinoti diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena ahaṃ mamāti evaṃ pavattasaññino. Yathādhammanti
tika-vin01t1:275_9: natthettha attā attaniyaṃ vā, kevalaṃ dhammamattametanti evaṃ dhammasabhāvānurūpanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:276_0: Saṃvarāsaṃvaroti ettha saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Mahanto saṃvaro
tika-vin01t1:276_1: asaṃvaro. Vuḍḍhiattho hi ayaṃ a-kāro yathā “asekkhā dhammā”ti, tasmā khuddako mahanto
tika-vin01t1:276_2: ca saṃvaroti attho. Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanāti diṭṭhiyā vimocanaṃ. Adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ vibhāgo
tika-vin01t1:276_3: parato paṭhamapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāya āvi bhavissati. Suttantapāḷiyaṃ “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:276_5: kilesānanti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvārehi vītikkamo, tassa
tika-vin01t1:276_6: pahānaṃ. Anusayavasena santāne anuvattantā kilesā kāraṇalābhe pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedavasena
tika-vin01t1:276_7: vītikkamituṃ na labhantīti āha “vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassā”ti. Pariyuṭṭhānappahānanti
tika-vin01t1:276_8: okāsadānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:276_9: tassa pahānaṃ cittasantānesu uppattivasena kilesānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānassa pahānanti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:276_10: hoti. Anusayappahānanti appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanakā kāraṇalābhe uppattiarahā
tika-vin01t1:276_11: anusayā. Te pana anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta
tika-vin01t1:276_12: kilesā, tesaṃ pahānaṃ anusayappahānaṃ. Te ca sabbaso ariyamaggapaññāya pahīyantīti
tika-vin01t1:277_0: Tadaṅgappahānanti dīpālokeneva tamassa dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena
tika-vin01t1:277_1: tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ “tadaṅgappahāna”nti vuccati. Idha pana tena tena
tika-vin01t1:277_2: susīlyaṅgena tassa tassa dussīlyaṅgassa pahānaṃ “tadaṅgappahāna”nti veditabbaṃ. Vikkhambhanasamaucchedappahānānīti
tika-vin01t1:277_3: ettha upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva jalatale sevālassa
tika-vin01t1:277_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:277_5: Catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato santāne samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:277_7: pahānanti kāyaduccaritādi duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesehi vā dūsitaṃ caritanti duccaritaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:277_8: Tadeva yattha uppannaṃ, taṃ santānaṃ sammā kileseti bādhayati upatāpeti cāti saṃkileso,
tika-vin01t1:277_9: tassa pahānaṃ, kāyavacīduccaritavasena pavattasaṃkilesassa tadaṅgavasena pahānanti
tika-vin01t1:277_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Samādhissa kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā suttantapiṭake taṇhāsaṃkilesassa
tika-vin01t1:277_11: pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Attādivinimuttasabhāvadhammappakāsanato abhidhammapiṭake diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:278_0: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekamekasmiṃ piṭaketi attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammoti
tika-vin01t1:278_1: pāḷīti ettha pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato
tika-vin01t1:278_2: buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo.
tika-vin01t1:278_3: “Dhammoti pāḷīti ettha bhagavatā vuccamānassa atthassa vohārassa ca dīpano saddoyeva
tika-vin01t1:278_4: pāḷi nāmā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya likhite sīhaḷagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:278_5: pana idaṃ vuttaṃ – sabhāvatthassa sabhāvavohārassa ca anurūpavasena bhagavatā manasā
tika-vin01t1:278_6: vavatthāpitā paṇḍatti pāḷīti vuccati. Yadi saddoyeva pāḷi siyā, pāḷiyā desanāya ca
tika-vin01t1:278_7: nānattena bhavitabbaṃ. Manasā vavatthāpitāya ca pāḷiyā vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t1:278_8: desanāya nānattaṃ natthi. Tathā hi desanaṃ dassentena manasā vavatthāpitāya pāḷiyā
tika-vin01t1:278_9: desanāti vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ vinā pāḷiyā saha desanāya anaññathā vuttā. Tathā ca
tika-vin01t1:278_10: upari “desanāti paññattī”ti vuttattā desanāya anaññabhāvena pāḷiyā paṇṇattibhāvo
tika-vin01t1:278_11: kathito hoti. Apica yadi pāḷiyā aññāyeva desanā siyā, “pāḷiyā ca pāḷiatthassa ca
tika-vin01t1:278_12: desanāya ca yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ pana avatvā “pāḷiyā ca pāḷiatthassa
tika-vin01t1:278_13: ca yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vuttattā pāḷiyā desanāya ca anaññabhāvo dassito hoti. Evañca
tika-vin01t1:278_14: katvā upari “desanā nāma paññattī”ti dassentena desanāya anaññabhāvato pāḷiyā paṇṇattibhāvo kathitova hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:279_0: Ettha ca “saddoyeva pāḷi nāmā”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe dhammassapi saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:279_1: ko visesoti ce? Tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ bodhakabhāvena ñāto uggahaṇādivasena ca pubbe
tika-vin01t1:279_2: vavatthāpito saddappabandho dhammo, pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito tadatthappakāsako
tika-vin01t1:279_3: saddo desanāti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā
tika-vin01t1:279_4: “desīyati samuṭṭhāpīyati saddo etenā”ti katvā musāvādādayo viya. Tatthāpi hi musāvādādisamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin01t1:280_0: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhāti ettha pāḷiattho pāḷidesanā pāḷiatthapaṭivedho
tika-vin01t1:280_1: cāti ime tayo pāḷivisayā hontīti vinayapiṭakādīnaṃ atthassa desanāya paṭivedhassa
tika-vin01t1:280_2: ca ādhārabhāvo yutto, piṭakāni pana pāḷiyoyevāti tesaṃ dhammassa ādhārabhāvo kathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:280_3: yujjeyyāti ce? Pāḷisamudāyassa avayavapāḷiyā ādhārabhāvato. Avayavassa hi samudāyo
tika-vin01t1:280_4: ādhārabhāvena vuccati yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti. Ettha ca dhammādīnaṃ dukkhogāhabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:280_5: tehi dhammādīhi vinayādayo gambhīrāti vinayādīnampi catubbidho gambhīrabhāvo vuttoyeva,
tika-vin01t1:280_6: tasmā dhammādayo eva dukkhogāhattā gambhīrā, na vinayādayoti na codetabbametaṃ sammukhena
tika-vin01t1:280_7: visayavisayīmukhena ca vinayādīnaṃyeva gambhīrabhāvassa vuttattā. Dhammo hi vinayādayo,
tika-vin01t1:280_8: tesaṃ visayo attho, dhammatthavisayā ca desanāpaṭivedhāti. Tattha paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:280_9: dhammatthānaṃ, desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya ca dukkhogāhabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:280_10: Paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā taṃvisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:280_11: dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Dukkhena ogayhantīti dukkhogāhā. Ekadesena ogāhantehipi mandabuddhīhi
tika-vin01t1:280_12: patiṭṭhā laddhuṃ na sakkāti āha “alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā cā”ti. Ekamekasminti ekekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:280_13: piṭake. Etthāti etesu piṭakesu. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:281_0: Idāni hetuhetuphalādīnaṃ vasenapi gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassento āha “aparo nayo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:281_1: Hetūti paccayo. So hi attano phalaṃ dahati vidahatīti dhammoti vuccati. Dhammasaddassa
tika-vin01t1:281_2: cettha hetupariyāyatā kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi. Nanu ca “hetumhi
tika-vin01t1:281_3: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena dhammassa hetubhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti
tika-vin01t1:281_4: ce? Dhammapaṭisambhidāti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena “hetumhi
tika-vin01t1:281_5: ñāṇa”nti vuttattā. “Dhamme paṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti ettha hi “dhamme”ti
tika-vin01t1:281_6: etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetumhī”ti vuttaṃ, “paṭisambhidā”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena
tika-vin01t1:281_7: “ñāṇa”nti, tasmā hetudhammasaddā ekatthā ñāṇapaṭisambhidāsaddā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena
tika-vin01t1:281_8: sādhito dhammassa hetubhāvo. Hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti etena vacanena sādhito
tika-vin01t1:281_9: atthassa hetuphalabhāvopi evameva daṭṭhabbo. Hetuno phalaṃ hetuphalaṃ. Tañca yasmā
tika-vin01t1:281_10: hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati sampāpuṇīyati, tasmā atthoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:282_0: Yathādhammanti ettha dhammasaddo hetuṃ hetuphalañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabhāvavācako
tika-vin01t1:282_1: hesa dhammasaddo, na pariyattihetubhāvavācako, tasmā yathādhammanti yo yo avijjādisaṅkhārādidhammo,
tika-vin01t1:282_2: tasmiṃ tasminti attho. Dhammānurūpaṃ vā yathādhammaṃ. Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya
tika-vin01t1:282_3: aviparītavisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati, tatoyeva ca aviparītābhilāpoti
tika-vin01t1:282_4: vuccati. Dhammābhilāpoti atthabyañjanako aviparītābhilāpo. Ettha ca abhilappatīti
tika-vin01t1:282_5: abhilāpoti saddo vuccati. Etena “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti
tika-vin01t1:282_6: ettha vuttaṃ dhammaniruttiṃ dasseti saddasabhāvattā desanāya. Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya
tika-vin01t1:282_8: saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādinā saddārammaṇatā dassitā. Tathā hi imassa atthassa ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:282_9: saddo vācakoti vacanavacanatthe vavatthapetvā taṃtaṃvacanatthavibhāvanavasena pavattito
tika-vin01t1:282_10: saddo desanāti vuccati. Adhippāyoti etena “desanāti paññattī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ dhammaniruttābhilāpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:282_11: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na tato vinimuttaṃ paññattiṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyaṃ dasseti. Desīyati
tika-vin01t1:282_12: attho etenāti hi desanā, pakārena ñāpīyati etena, pakārato ñāpetīti vā paññattīti
tika-vin01t1:282_13: dhammaniruttābhilāpo vuccati. Evaṃ “desanā nāma saddo”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe ayamattho
tika-vin01t1:282_14: veditabbo. “Desanāti paññattī”ti ettha paññattivādino pana evaṃ vadanti – kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t1:282_15: “dhammābhilāpo”ti ettha abhilappatīti abhilāpoti saddo vuccati, na paṇṇatti, tathāpi
tika-vin01t1:282_16: sadde vuccamāne tadanurūpaṃ vohāraṃ gahetvā tena vohārena dīpitassa atthassa jānanato
tika-vin01t1:282_17: sadde kathite tadanurūpā paṇṇattipi kāraṇūpacārena kathitāyeva hoti. Atha vā “dhammābhilāpoti
tika-vin01t1:282_18: attho”ti avatvā “dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttattā desanā nāma saddo na hotīti dīpitamevāti.
tika-vin01t1:283_0: Idāni paṭivedhaṃ niddisanto āha “paṭivedhoti abhisamayo”ti. Paṭivijjhatīti ñāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:283_1: paṭivedhoti vuccati. Paṭivijjhanti etenāti vā paṭivedho, abhisametīti abhisamayo,
tika-vin01t1:283_2: abhisamenti etenāti vā abhisamayo. Idāni abhisamayappabhedato abhisamayappakārato
tika-vin01t1:283_3: ārammaṇato sabhāvato ca pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “so ca lokiyalokuttaro”tiādimāha. Visayato
tika-vin01t1:283_4: asammohato ca avabodhoti sambandho. Tattha visayato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho
tika-vin01t1:283_6: avabodho. Asammohato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho pana nibbānārammaṇo maggayutto
tika-vin01t1:283_7: yathāvuttadhammatthapaññattīsu sammohaviddhaṃsano lokuttaro abhisamayo. Tathā hi
tika-vin01t1:283_8: “ayaṃ hetu, idamassa phalaṃ, ayaṃ tadubhayānurūpo vohāro”ti evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:283_9: lokiyañāṇaṃ visayato paṭivijjhati, lokuttarañāṇaṃ pana hetuhetuphalādīsu sammohassa
tika-vin01t1:283_10: maggañāṇena samucchinnattā asammohato paṭivijjhati. Atthānurūpaṃ dhammesūti avijjā
tika-vin01t1:283_11: hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā, saṅkhāre uppādeti avijjāti evaṃ kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesūti
tika-vin01t1:283_13: sampayuttaavijjā paccayo, itaresaṃ yathānurūpantiādinā kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesu paṭivedhoti
tika-vin01t1:283_14: attho. Dhammānurūpaṃ atthesūti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā kāraṇānurūpaṃ kāriyesu
tika-vin01t1:283_15: avabodhoti attho. Paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsūti paññattiyā vuccamānadhammānurūpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:284_0: Yathāvuttehi dhammādīhi piṭakānaṃ gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesū”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:284_1: Dhammajātanti kāraṇappabhedo kāraṇameva vā. Atthajātanti kāriyappabhedo kāriyameva
tika-vin01t1:284_2: vā. Yā cāyaṃ desanāti sambandho. Yo cetthāti etāsu taṃtaṃpiṭakagatāsu dhammatthadesanāsu
tika-vin01t1:284_3: yo paṭivedhoti attho. Dukkhogāhanti ettha avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya
tika-vin01t1:284_4: dukkhogāhatā. Tesaṃ paññāpanassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya paṭivedhanasaṅkhātassa paṭivedhassa
tika-vin01t1:284_5: ca uppādanavisayīkaraṇānaṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Evampīti pisaddo
