tika-vin01t1:284_6: pubbe vuttappakārantaraṃ sampiṇḍeti. Etthāti etesu tīsu piṭakesu. Vuttatthāti vutto
tika-vin01t1:285_0: Tīsu piṭakesūti ettha “ekekasmi”nti adhikārato pakaraṇato vā veditabbaṃ. Pariyattibhedoti
tika-vin01t1:285_1: pariyāpuṇanaṃ pariyatti. Pariyāpuṇanavācako hettha pariyattisaddo, na pāḷipariyāyo,
tika-vin01t1:285_2: tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo “tīsu piṭakesu ekekasmiṃ pariyāpuṇanappakāro daṭṭhabbo
tika-vin01t1:285_3: ñātabbo”ti. Tatoyeva ca “pariyattiyo pariyāpuṇanappakārā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:285_4: Atha vā tīhi pakārehi pariyāpuṇitabbā pāḷiyo eva pariyattīti vuccanti, tatoyeva ca
tika-vin01t1:285_6: Evampi hi alagaddūpamāpariyāpuṇanayogato alagaddūpamā pariyattīti pāḷipi sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:285_7: evañca katvā “duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamā”ti parato niddesavacanampi
tika-vin01t1:285_8: upapannaṃ hoti. Tattha hi pāḷiyeva duggahitā pariyāpuṭāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Alagaddūpamāti
tika-vin01t1:285_9: alagaddo alagaddaggahaṇaṃ upamā etissāti alagaddūpamā. Alagaddassa gahaṇañhettha
tika-vin01t1:285_10: alagaddasaddena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Āpūpiko”ti ettha apūpasaddena apūpakhādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:285_11: viya alagaddaggahaṇena gahitapariyatti upamīyati, na pana alagaddena. “Alagaddaggahaṇūpamā”ti
tika-vin01t1:285_12: vā vattabbe majjhepadalopaṃ katvā “alagaddūpamā”ti vuttaṃ “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:285_13: Alagaddoti cettha āsīviso vuccati. Gadoti hi visassa nāmaṃ. Tañca tassa alaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:285_14: atthi, tasmā alaṃ pariyatto paripuṇṇo gado assāti anunāsikalopaṃ dakārāgamañca katvā
tika-vin01t1:285_15: “alagaddo”ti vuccati. Atha vā alaṃ jīvitaharaṇe samattho gado assāti alagaddo. Nissaraṇatthāti
tika-vin01t1:285_16: vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ attho payojanaṃ etissāti nissaraṇatthā. Bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti
tika-vin01t1:285_17: ettha bhaṇḍāgāre niyutto bhaṇḍāgāriko, bhaṇḍāgāriko viya bhaṇḍāgāriko, dhammaratanānupālako.
tika-vin01t1:285_18: Aññaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti.
tika-vin01t1:286_0: Duggahitāti duṭṭhu gahitā. Duggahitabhāvameva vibhāvento āha “upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:286_1: upārambhā itivādappamokkhādihetu uggahitāti attho. Lābhasakkārādihetu pariyāpuṇanampi
tika-vin01t1:287_0: “Yo hi buddhavacanaṃ ‘evaṃ cīvarādīni vā labhissāmi, catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ jānissantī’ti
tika-vin01t1:287_1: lābhasakkārādihetu pariyāpuṇāti, tassa sā pariyatti alagaddapariyatti nāma. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:287_2: pariyāpuṇanato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varatara”nti.
tika-vin01t1:288_0: Nanu ca alagaddaggahaṇūpamā pariyatti alagaddūpamāti vuccati, evañca sati suggahitāpi
tika-vin01t1:288_1: pariyatti alagaddūpamāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tatthāpi alagaddaggahaṇassa upamābhāvena
tika-vin01t1:289_1: caramāno, so passeyya mahantaṃ alagaddaṃ, tamenaṃ ajapadena daṇḍena suniggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:289_2: niggaṇheyya, ajapadena daṇḍena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā gīvāya suggahitaṃ gaṇheyya.
tika-vin01t1:289_3: Kiñcāpi so, bhikkhave, alagaddo tassa purisassa hatthaṃ vā bāhaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā
tika-vin01t1:289_4: aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ bhogehi paliveṭheyya, atha kho so neva tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya
tika-vin01t1:289_5: maraṇattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu, suggahitattā, bhikkhave, alagaddassa, evameva
tika-vin01t1:289_6: kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:290_0: Tasmā idha duggahitā eva pariyatti alagaddūpamāti ayaṃ viseso kuto viññāyati, yena
tika-vin01t1:290_1: duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamāti vuccatīti? Saccametaṃ, idaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:290_2: pārisesañāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi nissaraṇatthabhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:290_3: visuṃ gahitattā pārisesato alagaddassa duggahaṇūpamā pariyatti alagaddūpamāti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:290_4: Suggahaṇūpamā hi pariyatti nissaraṇatthā vā hoti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti vā, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:290_5: suvuttametaṃ “duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamā”ti. Yaṃ sandhāyāti
tika-vin01t1:290_6: yaṃ pariyattiduggahaṇaṃ sandhāya. Vuttanti alagaddasutte vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:291_0: Alagaddatthikoti āsīvisatthiko. Alagaddaṃ gavesati pariyesati sīlenāti alagaddagavesī.
tika-vin01t1:291_1: Alagaddapariyesanaṃ caramānoti alagaddapariyesanatthaṃ caramāno. Bhogeti sarīre.
tika-vin01t1:291_2: Hatthe vā bāhāya vāti ettha maṇibandhako yāva agganakhā “hattho”ti veditabbo, saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:291_3: aggabāhāya avasesā “bāhā”ti. Katthaci pana “kapparato paṭṭhāyapi yāva agganakhā hattho”ti
tika-vin01t1:291_4: vuccati. Aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgeti vuttalakkhaṇaṃ hatthañca bāhañca ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t1:291_5: avasesaṃ sarīraṃ “aṅgapaccaṅga”nti veditabbaṃ. Tatonidānanti taṃnidānaṃ, taṃkāraṇāti
tika-vin01t1:291_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Purimapade hi vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso. Taṃ hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:291_7: nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti taṃnidānanti hi vattabbe “tatonidāna”nti purimapade paccatte
tika-vin01t1:291_8: nissakkavacanaṃ katvā tassa ca lopaṃ akatvā niddeso. Taṃ kissa hetūti yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:291_9: hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ taṃnidānañca maraṇādiupagamanaṃ, taṃ kissa hetu kena kāraṇenāti
tika-vin01t1:291_10: ce. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Ekacce moghapurisāti ekacce tucchapurisā. Dhammanti pāḷidhammaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:291_11: Pariyāpuṇantīti uggaṇhantīti attho, sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggatā karontā dhārenti cāti
tika-vin01t1:291_12: vuttaṃ hoti. Atthanti yathābhūtaṃ bhāsitatthaṃ payojanatthañca. Na upaparikkhantīti
tika-vin01t1:291_13: na pariggaṇhanti na vicārenti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:291_14: idha samādhi, idha paññā kathitā, mayañca taṃ pūressāmā”ti evaṃ bhāsitatthaṃ payojanatthañca
tika-vin01t1:291_15: “sīlaṃ samādhissa kāraṇaṃ, samādhi vipassanāyā”tiādinā na pariggaṇhantīti. Anupaparikkhatanti
tika-vin01t1:291_16: anupaparikkhantānaṃ. Na nijjhānaṃ khamantīti nijjhānapaññaṃ nakkhamanti, nijjhāyitvā
tika-vin01t1:291_17: paññāya disvā rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo. Tena imamatthaṃ dīpeti “tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:291_18: paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhantānaṃ te dhammā na upaṭṭhahanti, ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:291_19: samādhi, vipassanā, maggo, phalaṃ, vaṭṭaṃ, vivaṭṭaṃ kathita’nti evaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā hontī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:292_0: Te upārambhānisaṃsā cevāti te paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā hutvā pariyāpuṇantīti
tika-vin01t1:292_1: attho. Itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā cāti iti evaṃ etāya pariyattiyā vādappamokkhānisaṃsā,
tika-vin01t1:292_2: attano upari parehi āropitavādassa niggahassa pamokkhappayojanā hutvā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti
tika-vin01t1:292_3: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – parehi sakavāde dose āropite taṃ dosaṃ evañca evañca mocessāmāti
tika-vin01t1:292_4: iminā ca kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti. Atha vā so so vādo itivādo, itivādassa pamokkho
tika-vin01t1:292_5: itivādappamokkho, itivādappamokkho ānisaṃso etesanti itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā, taṃtaṃvādappamocanānisaṃsā
tika-vin01t1:292_6: cāti attho. Yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti yassa ca sīlādipūraṇassa maggaphalanibbānassa
tika-vin01t1:292_7: vā atthāya imasmiṃ sāsane kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti. Tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontīti
tika-vin01t1:292_8: tañca assa dhammassa sīlādiparipūraṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ete duggahitagāhino nānubhonti na vindanti.
tika-vin01t1:293_0: Atha vā yassa upārambhassa itivādappamokkhassa vā atthāya ye moghapurisā dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:293_1: pariyāpuṇanti, te parehi “ayamattho na hotī”ti vutte duggahitattāyeva soyevatthoti
tika-vin01t1:293_2: paṭipādanakkhamā na hontīti parassa vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano vādā taṃ mocetuñca
tika-vin01t1:293_3: asakkontāpi taṃ atthaṃ nānubhontiyevāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Dīgharattaṃ ahitāya
tika-vin01t1:293_4: dukkhāya saṃvattantīti tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitattā upārambhamānadappamakkhapalāsādihetubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:293_5: dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti. Ettha hi kāraṇe phalavohārena “te dhammā
tika-vin01t1:293_6: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi kiñcāpi na te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya
tika-vin01t1:293_7: saṃvattanti, tathāpi vuttanayena pariyāpuṇantānaṃ sajjhāyakāle vivādasamaye ca taṃmūlakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:293_8: upārambhādīnaṃ anekesaṃ akusalānaṃ uppattisabbhāvato “te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya
tika-vin01t1:293_9: saṃvattantī”ti kāraṇe phalavohārena vuttaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetūti ettha tanti yathāvuttassatthassa
tika-vin01t1:293_10: anabhisambhuṇanaṃ tesañca dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanaṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin01t1:294_0: Sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyevāti ettha ādisaddena samādhivipassanādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:294_1: Yo hi buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhino āgataṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:294_2: samādhigabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā maggaphalānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:294_3: āgataṭṭhāne maggaṃ bhāvessāmi, phalaṃ sacchikarissāmīti uggaṇhāti, tasseva sā pariyatti
tika-vin01t1:294_4: nissaraṇatthā nāma hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti yaṃ pariyattisuggahaṇaṃ sandhāya alagaddasutte
tika-vin01t1:294_5: vuttaṃ. Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni pūrentānampi
tika-vin01t1:294_6: arahattaṃ patvā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi upanīte cattāro
tika-vin01t1:294_7: paccaye paribhuñjantānampi paresaṃ vāde sahadhammena upārambhaṃ āropentānampi sakavādato
tika-vin01t1:294_8: dosaṃ harantānampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Tathā hi na kevalaṃ suggahitapariyattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:294_10: ijjhanti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:295_1: pahīnakileso. Paṭividdhākuppoti paṭividdhaarahattaphalo. Na kuppatīti akuppanti hi
tika-vin01t1:295_2: arahattaphalassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Satipi hi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ catunnañca phalānaṃ akuppasabhāve
tika-vin01t1:295_3: sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ sakasakanāmapariccāgena uparūpari nāmantarappattito tesaṃ maggaphalāni
tika-vin01t1:295_4: “akuppānī”ti na vuccanti, arahā pana sabbadāpi arahāyeva nāmāti tasseva phalaṃ “akuppa”nti
tika-vin01t1:295_5: vuttaṃ. Iminā ca imamatthaṃ dasseti “khīṇāsavasseva pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti
tika-vin01t1:295_6: nāmā”ti. Tassa hi apariññātaṃ appahīnaṃ abhāvitaṃ asacchikataṃ vā natthi, tasmā buddhavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:295_7: pariyāpuṇanto tantidhārako paveṇīpālako vaṃsānurakkhako ca hutvā uggaṇhāti. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t1:295_8: “paveṇīpālanatthāyā”tiādi. Tattha paveṇīti dhammasantati, dhammassa avicchedena pavattīti
tika-vin01t1:295_9: attho. Vaṃsānurakkhaṇatthāyāti buddhassa bhagavato vaṃsānurakkhaṇatthaṃ. Tassa vaṃsopi
tika-vin01t1:296_0: Nanu ca yadi paveṇīpālanatthāya buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti,
tika-vin01t1:296_1: kasmā “khīṇāsavo”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Ekaccassa puthujjanassapi hi ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-vin01t1:296_2: Tathā hi ekacco bhikkhu chātakabhayādīsu ganthadharesu ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ asakkontesu
tika-vin01t1:296_3: sayaṃ bhikkhācārena akilamamāno atimadhuraṃ buddhavacanaṃ mā nassatu, tantiṃ dhāressāmi,
tika-vin01t1:296_4: vaṃsaṃ ṭhapessāmi, paveṇiṃ pālessāmīti pariyāpuṇāti, tasmā tassapi pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti
tika-vin01t1:296_5: nāma kasmā na hotīti? Vuccate – evaṃ santepi puthujjanassa pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti
tika-vin01t1:296_6: nāma na hoti. Kiñcāpi hi puthujjano “paveṇiṃ pālessāmī”ti ajjhāsayena pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t1:296_7: attano pana bhavakantārato anittiṇṇattā tassa pariyatti nissaraṇapariyatti nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:296_8: tasmā puthujjanassa pariyatti alagaddūpamā vā hoti nissaraṇatthā vā, sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:296_9: nissaraṇatthāva, khīṇāsavānaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyevāti veditabbaṃ. Khīṇāsavo ca
tika-vin01t1:296_10: bhaṇḍāgārikasadisattā bhaṇḍāgārikoti vuccati. Yathā hi bhaṇḍāgāriko alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t1:296_11: paṭisāmetvā pasādhanakāle tadupiyaṃ alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ rañño upanāmetvā alaṅkaroti,
tika-vin01t1:296_12: evaṃ khīṇāsavopi dhammaratanabhaṇḍaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mokkhādhigamassa bhabbarūpe sahetuke
tika-vin01t1:296_13: satte passitvā tadanurūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādisaṅkhātena
tika-vin01t1:297_0: Evaṃ tisso pariyattiyo vibhajitvā idāni tīsupi piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo
tika-vin01t1:297_1: vitthāretvā dassento āha “vinaye panā”tiādi. Sīlasampattiṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇātītiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:297_2: yasmā sīlaṃ visujjhamānaṃ satisampajaññabalena kammassakataññāṇabalena ca saṃkilesamalato
tika-vin01t1:297_3: visujjhati, pāripūriñca gacchati, tasmā sīlasampadā sijjhamānā upanissayasampattibhāvena
tika-vin01t1:297_4: satibalaṃ ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā veditabbā sabhāgahetusampadānato.
tika-vin01t1:297_5: Satibalena hi pubbenivāsavijjāsiddhi, sampajaññena sabbakiccesu sudiṭṭhakāritāparicayena
tika-vin01t1:297_8: pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:297_9: “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo.
tika-vin01t1:297_11: ca paribhāvitā paññāsampatti paṭisambhidāppabhedassa upanissayo. Ettha ca “sīlasampattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:297_12: nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā cha abhiññā na ijjhanti,
tika-vin01t1:297_13: tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve
tika-vin01t1:297_14: sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā. Yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso
tika-vin01t1:297_15: paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhanti maggakkhaṇe eva tāsaṃ paṭilabhitabbato.
tika-vin01t1:297_16: Evaṃ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā
tika-vin01t1:297_17: upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhantīti maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:298_0: Tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanatoti ettha tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ pāpuṇitabbānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:298_1: chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidānaṃ vinaye pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Verañjakaṇḍe
tika-vin01t1:298_2: hi tisso vijjāva vibhattāti. Dutiye tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā
tika-vin01t1:298_3: apekkhitvā kataṃ, na tisso vijjā. Tā hi chasu abhiññāsu antogadhattā sutte vibhattāyevāti.
tika-vin01t1:298_4: Tāsañcāti ettha ca-saddena sesānampi tattha atthibhāvaṃ dīpeti. Abhidhammapiṭake
tika-vin01t1:298_5: hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso ca paṭisambhidā vuttāyeva. Paṭisambhidānaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:298_6: aññattha pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ tattheva ca sammā vibhattabhāvaṃ dīpetukāmo heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-vin01t1:299_0: Idāni “vinaye duppaṭipanno ‘mudukānaṃ attharaṇādīnaṃ samphasso viya itthisamphassopi
tika-vin01t1:299_1: vaṭṭatī’ti methunavītikkame dosaṃ adisvā sīlavipattiṃ pāpuṇātī”ti dassento āha “vinaye
tika-vin01t1:299_2: pana duppaṭipanno”tiādi. Tattha sukho samphasso etesanti sukhasamphassāni, attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni.
tika-vin01t1:299_3: Upādinnaphasso itthiphasso, methunadhammoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttampi hetanti ariṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:299_4: bhikkhunā vuttaṃ. So hi bahussuto dhammakathiko kammakilesavipākaupavādaāṇāvītikkamavasena
tika-vin01t1:299_5: pañcavidhesu antarāyikesu sesantarāyike jānāti, vinaye pana akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike
tika-vin01t1:299_6: na jānāti, tasmā rahogato evaṃ cintesi “ime agārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā
tika-vin01t1:299_7: sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti. Bhikkhūpi manāpikāni cakkhuviññeyyāni
tika-vin01t1:299_8: rūpāni passanti…pe… kāyaviññeyye phoṭṭhabbe phusanti, mudukāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni
tika-vin01t1:299_9: paribhuñjanti, etaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati, kasmā itthīnaṃyeva rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā
tika-vin01t1:299_10: na vaṭṭanti, etepi vaṭṭantī”ti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena sāvajjakāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ
tika-vin01t1:299_11: saṃsanditvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi
tika-vin01t1:299_12: saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento viya sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruno sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto
tika-vin01t1:299_13: viya pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā
tika-vin01t1:299_14: ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ, natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:299_15: paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto ariyamagge khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto
tika-vin01t1:299_16: “methunadhamme doso natthī”ti jinassa āṇācakke pahāramadāsi. Tenāha “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā
tika-vin01t1:300_0: Tattha antarāyikāti taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe
tika-vin01t1:300_1: eti āgacchatīti antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho. Anatikkamanaṭṭhena tasmiṃ antarāye
tika-vin01t1:300_2: niyuttā, antarāyaṃ vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyassa vā karaṇasīlāti antarāyikā, saggamokkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:300_3: antarāyakarāti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca kammakilesavipākaupavādaāṇāvītikkamavasena pañcavidhā.
tika-vin01t1:300_4: Tesaṃ vitthārakathā parato ariṭṭhasikkhāpade āvi bhavissati. Ayaṃ panettha padatthasambandho
tika-vin01t1:300_5: – ye ime dhammā antarāyikā antarāyakarāti bhagavatā vuttā desitā ceva paññattā ca,
tika-vin01t1:300_6: te dhamme paṭisevato paṭisevantassa yathā yena pakārena te dhammā antarāyāya saggamokkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:300_7: antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ nālaṃ samatthā na honti, tathā tena pakārenāhaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:300_8: dhammaṃ ājānāmīti. Tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti tato anavajjasaññībhāvahetuto vītikkamitvā
tika-vin01t1:302_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, attahitāya
tika-vin01t1:302_1: paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya, neva attahitāya
tika-vin01t1:302_2: paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti –
tika-vin01t1:303_1: puggaladesanā vohāravasena, na paramatthato”ti evaṃ bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ajānanto.
tika-vin01t1:303_2: Buddhassa hi bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā paramatthadesanā cāti. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:303_3: “puggalo satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti evarūpā sammutidesanā.
tika-vin01t1:303_4: “Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānā”ti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
tika-vin01t1:303_5: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ
tika-vin01t1:303_6: samatthā, tesaṃ sammutidesanaṃ deseti. Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:303_7: paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, tesaṃ paramatthadesanaṃ deseti.
tika-vin01t1:304_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇako ācariyo
tika-vin01t1:304_1: ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ damiḷabhāsāya ācikkhati, ye andhakabhāsādīsu
tika-vin01t1:304_2: aññatarāya, tesaṃ tāya bhāsāya, evaṃ te māṇavā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma khippameva
tika-vin01t1:304_3: sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. Tattha ācariyo viya buddho bhagavā, tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāve
tika-vin01t1:304_4: ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni, desabhāsāya kosallamiva sammutiparamatthakosallaṃ, nānādesabhāsāmāṇavakā
tika-vin01t1:304_5: viya sammutiparamatthavasena paṭivijjhanasamatthā veneyyasattā, ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:304_6: viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasenapi desanā veditabbā. Āha cettha –
tika-vin01t1:311_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti – hirottappadīpanatthaṃ kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:311_3: hiriyanti ottappantī”ti vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohamāpajjati, paṭisattu hoti
tika-vin01t1:311_4: “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti. “Itthī hiriyati
tika-vin01t1:311_5: ottappati, puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte mahājano jānāti, na sammohamāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:311_6: na paṭisattu hoti, tasmā bhagavā hirottappadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Khandhā
tika-vin01t1:311_7: kammassakā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:311_8: puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti
tika-vin01t1:311_9: vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
tika-vin01t1:311_10: “Khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṃ arahantaṃ, ruhiruppādakammaṃ saṅghabhedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:311_11: karonti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:312_0: “Khandhā mettāyanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:312_1: puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Khandhā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi
tika-vin01t1:312_2: eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā pubbenivāsadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Khandhā
tika-vin01t1:312_3: dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohamāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:312_4: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti. “Puggalā
tika-vin01t1:312_5: paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti vutte pana jānāti, na sammohamāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:312_6: na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
tika-vin01t1:312_7: Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto na vijahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe
tika-vin01t1:312_8: ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti. Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:312_9: katheti, tasmā iminā ca adhippāyena bhagavato puggaladesanā, na paramatthadesanāti
tika-vin01t1:313_0: Duggahitaṃ gaṇhātīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṃ
tika-vin01t1:313_1: viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati, anañña”ntiādinā duggahitaṃ katvā gaṇhāti, viparītaṃ
tika-vin01t1:313_2: gaṇhātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Duggahitanti hi bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso. Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ
tika-vin01t1:313_3: duggahitagāhaṃ sandhāya. Attanā duggahitena dhammenāti pāṭhaseso veditabbo. Atha
tika-vin01t1:313_4: vā duggahaṇaṃ duggahitaṃ. Attanāti ca sāmiatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, tasmā attano duggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:313_5: viparītagāhenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Amhe ceva abbhācikkhatīti amhākañca abbhācikkhanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:313_6: karoti. Attānañca khanatīti attano kusalamūlāni khananto attānaṃ khanati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:314_1: “cittuppādamattena dānaṃ hoti, sayameva cittaṃ attano ārammaṇaṃ hoti, sabbaṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:314_2: asabhāvadhammārammaṇa”nti evamādinā atidhāvanto atikkamitvā pavattamāno. Cattārīti
tika-vin01t1:315_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni, yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa
tika-vin01t1:315_1: bhāgī assa. Katamāni cattāri? Buddhānaṃ bhikkhave buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
tika-vin01t1:315_2: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa. Jhāyissa, bhikkhave, jhānavisayo acinteyyo
tika-vin01t1:315_3: na cintetabbo…pe… kammavipāko, bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo…pe… lokacintā bhikkhave
tika-vin01t1:315_4: acinteyyā na cintetabbā…pe… imāni, bhikkhave, cattāri acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni,
tika-vin01t1:315_5: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:316_0: Tattha “acinteyyānī”ti tesaṃ sabhāvanidassanaṃ. “Na cintetabbānī”ti tattha kattabbatānidassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:316_1: Tattha acinteyyānīti cintetumasakkuṇeyyāni, cintetuṃ araharūpāni na hontīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:316_2: Acinteyyattā eva na cintetabbāni, kāmaṃ acinteyyānipi cha asādhāraṇādīni anussarantassa
tika-vin01t1:316_3: kusaluppattihetubhāvato tāni cintetabbāni, imāni pana evaṃ na hontīti aphalabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:316_4: na cintetabbānīti adhippāyo. Tenevāha “yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:317_1: tīhi vaggehi saṅgaho etesanti tivaggasaṅgahāni. Catuttiṃseva suttantāti gāthāya evamatthayojanā
tika-vin01t1:317_2: veditabbā – yassa nikāyassa suttagaṇanāto catuttiṃseva ca suttantā vaggasaṅgahavasena
tika-vin01t1:317_3: tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassāti tivaggo saṅgaho. Esa paṭhamo nikāyo dīghanikāyoti anulomiko
tika-vin01t1:318_0: Atthānulomanato anulomiko, anulomikattaṃyeva vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādimāha. Ekanikāyampīti
tika-vin01t1:318_1: ekasamūhampi. Evaṃ cittanti evaṃ vicittaṃ. Yathayidanti yathā ime. Poṇikā cikkhallikā
tika-vin01t1:318_2: ca khattiyā, tesaṃ nivāso poṇikanikāyo cikkhallikanikāyoti vuccati. Evamādīni cettha
tika-vin01t1:318_3: sādhakāni sāsanato ca lokato cāti evamādīni udāharaṇāni ettha nikāyasaddassa samūhanivāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:318_4: vācakabhāve sāsanato ca vohārato ca sādhakāni pamāṇānīti attho. Ettha paṭhamamudāharaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:319_0: Pañcadasavaggasaṅgahānīti mūlapariyāyavaggādīhi pañcadasahi vaggehi saṅgaho etesanti
tika-vin01t1:319_1: pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni. Diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttānīti aḍḍhena dutiyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:319_2: ekaṃ sataṃ dve paññāsasuttāni cāti attho. Yatthāti yasmiṃ nikāye. Pañcadasavaggapariggahoti
tika-vin01t1:320_0: Suttantānaṃ sahassāni sattasuttasatāni cāti pāṭhe suttantānaṃ satta sahassāni satta
tika-vin01t1:320_1: satāni cāti yojetabbaṃ. Katthaci pana “satta suttasahassāni satta suttasatāni cā”tipi
tika-vin01t1:321_0: Pubbe nidassitāti suttantapiṭakaniddese nidassitā. Vuttameva pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā
tika-vin01t1:321_1: dassetuṃ “ṭhapetvā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacana”nti vuttaṃ. Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakantiādinā
tika-vin01t1:321_2: niddiṭṭhameva hi iminā pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “ṭhapetvā caturopete”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:321_3: Tadaññanti tehi catūhi nikāyehi aññaṃ avasesanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:322_0: Sabbameva 2 hidanti sabbameva idaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Navappabhedanti ettha kathaṃ panetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:322_1: navappabhedaṃ hoti. Tathā hi navahi aṅgehi vavatthitehi aññamaññasaṅkararahitehi
tika-vin01t1:322_2: bhavitabbaṃ, tathā ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīni siyuṃ, atha suttasabhāvāneva
tika-vin01t1:322_3: geyyaṅgādīni, evaṃ sati suttanti visuṃ suttaṅgameva na siyā, evaṃ sante aṭṭhaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:322_4: sāsananti āpajjati. Apica “sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇa”nti
tika-vin01t1:322_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Suttañca nāma sagāthakaṃ vā siyā niggāthakaṃ vāti aṅgadvayeneva
tika-vin01t1:322_6: tadubhayaṃ saṅgahitanti tadubhayavinimuttañca suttaṃ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:322_7: yaṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā, athāpi kathañci visuṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā, maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-vin01t1:322_8: vā na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya, geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā
tika-vin01t1:322_9: sagāthakavaggassa viya, tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t1:327_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi. Tathā hi “ettakaṃ tassa
tika-vin01t1:327_1: bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ, sāvatthiyā suttavibhaṅge, sakavāde pañca
tika-vin01t1:327_3: Teneva ca āyasmā mahākaccāno nettiyaṃ āha – “navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:327_4: hi suttādivasena navaṅgassa sāsanassa pariyeṭṭhi pariyesanā atthavicāraṇā “navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti
tika-vin01t1:327_5: vuttā. Tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-vin01t1:327_6: Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:327_7: vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti. Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā visajjanabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:327_9: veyyākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā visajjanavasena pavattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:327_10: veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati. Geyyādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato saokāsato
tika-vin01t1:327_11: anokāsavidhi balavāti “gāthāvirahe satī”ti visesitattā ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu
tika-vin01t1:327_14: patiṭṭhitā. Ettha hi satipi saññantaranimittayoge anokāsasaññānaṃ balavabhāveneva
tika-vin01t1:327_15: gāthādisaññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu
tika-vin01t1:327_16: jātakasaññā patiṭṭhitā, satipi pañhāvisajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu
tika-vin01t1:327_17: vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena
tika-vin01t1:327_18: tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo.
tika-vin01t1:327_19: Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ, taṃ suttaṅgaṃ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanato.
tika-vin01t1:328_0: Nanu ca evaṃ santepi sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:328_1: suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti? Na tadavatthā. Sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi
tika-vin01t1:328_2: pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvisajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti. Yañca
tika-vin01t1:328_3: vuttaṃ “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na, niruḷhattāti.
tika-vin01t1:328_4: Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttabhāvo. Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya
tika-vin01t1:328_5: gāthābhāvena paññātāni, atha kho suttabhāveneva. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ suttanāmakanti
tika-vin01t1:328_6: nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tampi
tika-vin01t1:328_7: natthi. Yasmā sahatāññena. Sahabhāvo hi nāma atthato aññena hoti, saha gāthāhīti
tika-vin01t1:328_8: ca sagāthakaṃ. Na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi, yo
tika-vin01t1:328_9: “saha gāthāhī”ti vucceyya. Nanu ca gāthāsamudāyo gāthāhi añño hoti, tathā ca tassa
tika-vin01t1:328_10: vasena saha gāthāhīti sagāthakanti sakkā vattunti? Taṃ na. Na hi avayavavinimutto
tika-vin01t1:328_11: samudāyo nāma koci atthi. Yampi vuttaṃ “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-vin01t1:328_12: siyā”ti, tampi na aññato. Aññāyeva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā. Atho na tāhi
tika-vin01t1:328_13: ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:329: Idāni suttādīni navaṅgāni vibhajitvā dassento āha “tattha ubhatovibhaṅganiddesakhandhakaparivārā”tiādi. Tattha niddeso nāma suttanipāte –
tika-vin01t1:331: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchatī”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:342_0: Ādinā āgatassa khaggavisāṇasuttassa ca tadatthavibhāgavasena satthukappena āyasmatā
tika-vin01t1:342_1: dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherena kato niddeso mahāniddeso cūḷaniddesoti ca vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:342_2: Evamidha niddesassa suttaṅgasaṅgaho bhadantabuddhaghosācariyena dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:342_4: niddesassa suttaṅgasaṅgaho eva dassito. Ācariyadhammapālattherenapi nettipakaraṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:342_5: evametassa suttaṅgasaṅgahova kathito. Keci pana niddesassa gāthāveyyākaraṇaṅgesu
tika-vin01t1:342_6: dvīsu saṅgahaṃ vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ niddesaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ upasenattherena –
tika-vin01t1:343_0: “Tadetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:343_1: dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu
tika-vin01t1:343_2: mahānikāyesu khuddakamahānikāye pariyāpannaṃ, suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:343_3: itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallanti navasu satthusāsanaṅgesu yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:344_0: Ettha tāva katthaci pucchāvisajjanasabhāvato niddesekadesassa veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-vin01t1:344_1: yujjatu nāma, gāthaṅgasaṅgaho pana kathaṃ yujjeyyāti idamettha vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Dhammapadādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:344_2: viya hi kevalaṃ gāthābandhabhāvo gāthaṅgassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Dhammapadādīsu hi
tika-vin01t1:344_3: kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu gāthāsamaññā patiṭṭhitā, niddese ca na koci kevalo gāthābandhappadeso
tika-vin01t1:344_4: upalabbhati. Sammāsambuddhena bhāsitānaṃyeva hi aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitānaṃ gāthānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:344_5: niddesamattaṃ dhammasenāpatinā kataṃ. Atthavibhajanatthaṃ ānītāpi hi tā aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitā
tika-vin01t1:344_6: niddisitabbā mūlagāthāyo suttanipātapariyāpannattā aññāyevāti na niddesasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:344_7: gacchanti ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu āgatabhāvepi taṃ vohāraṃ alabhamānā jātakādigāthāpariyāpannā
tika-vin01t1:344_8: gāthāyo viya, tasmā kāraṇantaramettha gavesitabbaṃ, yuttataraṃ vā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:345_0: Nālakasuttatuvaṭṭakasuttānīti ettha nālakasuttaṃ nāma padumuttarassa bhagavato sāvakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:345_1: moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ disvā tadatthaṃ abhikaṅkhamānena tato pabhuti kappasatasahassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:345_2: pāramiyo pūretvā āgatena asitassa isino bhāgineyyena nālakattherena dhammacakkappavattitadivasato
tika-vin01t1:345_3: sattame divase “aññātameta”ntiādīhi dvīhi gāthāhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā
tika-vin01t1:345_5: suttaṃ. Tuvaṭṭakasuttaṃ pana mahāsamayasuttantadesanāya sannipatitesu devesu “kā
tika-vin01t1:345_6: nu kho arahattappattiyā paṭipattī”ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:345_7: pakāsetuṃ “pucchāmi taṃ ādiccabandhū”tiādinā nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:345_8: “mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā”tiādinā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ. Evamidhasuttanipāte āgatānaṃ maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:345_9: suttaṅgasaṅgaho dassito, tattheva āgatānaṃ asuttanāmikānaṃ suddhikagāthānaṃ gāthaṅgasaṅgahañca
tika-vin01t1:348_0: Sakalassapi suttanipātassa geyyaveyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho kasmā coditoti? Nāyaṃ virodho.
tika-vin01t1:348_1: Kevalañhi tattha codakena sagāthakattaṃ katthaci pucchāvisajjanamattañca gahetvā
tika-vin01t1:348_2: codanāmattaṃ katanti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā suttanipāte niggāthakassa suttasseva abhāvato
tika-vin01t1:348_3: veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho na codetabbo siyāti. Sagāthāvaggo geyyanti yojetabbaṃ. “Aṭṭhahi
tika-vin01t1:348_4: aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma paṭisambhidādī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana paṭisambhidāmaggassa
tika-vin01t1:349: Nosuttanāmikāti asuttanāmikā. “Suddhikagāthā nāma vatthugāthā”ti tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Tattha vatthugāthāti –
tika-vin01t1:352: Ādinā pārāyanavaggassa nidānaṃ āropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena saṅgītikāle vuttā chappaññāsa ca gāthāyo, ānandatthereneva saṅgītikāle nālakasuttassa nidānaṃ āropentena vuttā –
tika-vin01t1:357: Ādikā vīsatimattā gāthāyo ca vuccanti. Tattha “nālakasuttassa vatthugāthāyo nālakasuttasaṅkhyaṃyeva gacchantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:358_0: “Parinibbute pana bhagavati saṅgītiṃ karontena āyasmatā mahākassapena āyasmā ānando
tika-vin01t1:358_1: tameva moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puṭṭho yena yadā ca samādapito nālako bhagavantaṃ pucchi,
tika-vin01t1:358_2: taṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetukāmo ‘ānandajāte’tiādikā vīsati vatthugāthāyo vatvā
tika-vin01t1:359_0: Tasmā nālakasuttassa vatthugāthāyo nālakasuttaggahaṇeneva saṅgahitāti pārāyanikavaggassa
tika-vin01t1:359_1: vatthugāthāyo idha suddhikagāthāti gahetabbaṃ. Tattheva panassa pārāyaniyavagge ajitamāṇavakādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:359_2: soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pucchāgāthā bhagavato visajjanagāthā ca idha suddhikagāthāti
tika-vin01t1:359_3: evampi vattuṃ yujjati. Tāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ suttanāmena avatvā “ajitamāṇavakapucchā tissamettayyamāṇavakapucchā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:359_4: āgatattā cuṇṇiyaganthehi amissattā ca nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā nāmāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t1:360_1: Kenaṭṭhena panetaṃ “udāna”nti vuccati? Udānanaṭṭhena. Kimidaṃ udānaṃ nāma? Pītivegasamuṭṭhāpito
tika-vin01t1:360_2: udāhāro. Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā
tika-vin01t1:360_3: gacchati, taṃ “avaseko”ti vuccati, yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā
tika-vin01t1:360_4: gacchati, taṃ “mahogho”ti vuccati, evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:360_5: hadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti, so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi vacīdvārena
tika-vin01t1:360_7: ayamākāro labbhateva. Tayidaṃ katthaci gāthābandhavasena katthaci vākyavasena pavattaṃ. Tathā hi –
tika-vin01t1:361_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti
tika-vin01t1:361_1: samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti. Tedha bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:361_2: cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti. Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā
tika-vin01t1:361_3: tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi ‘atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī na āpo”’ti –
tika-vin01t1:363_0: Nanu ca udānaṃ nāma pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpito dhammasaṃvegasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammapaṭiggāhakanirapekkho
tika-vin01t1:363_1: udāhāro tathā ceva sabbattha āgataṃ, idha kasmā bhagavā udānento bhikkhū āmantesīti?
tika-vin01t1:363_2: Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saññāpanatthaṃ. Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:363_3: dhammaṃ desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassena udānaṃ udānento “idha
tika-vin01t1:363_4: nibbānavajjo sabbo sabhāvadhammo paccayāyattavuttikova upalabbhati, na paccayanirapekkho,
tika-vin01t1:363_5: ayaṃ pana nibbānadhammo kathamappaccayo upalabbhatī”ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya
tika-vin01t1:363_6: tesaṃ ñāpetukāmo “atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatana”nti -ādimāha. Na ekantato te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:365: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:368: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-vin01t1:369_0: Idampi dhammasaṃvegavasappavattaṃ udānanti vadanti. Tathā hi ekasmiṃ samaye sambahulā
tika-vin01t1:369_1: gopālakā antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavanaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍehi hananti. Tena ca samayena
tika-vin01t1:369_2: bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge te dārake ahiṃ daṇḍena hanante disvā
tika-vin01t1:369_3: “kasmā kumārakā imaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍena hanathā”ti pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena bhante”ti
tika-vin01t1:369_4: ca vutte “ime ‘attano sukhaṃ karissāmā’ti imaṃ paharantā nibbattaṭṭhāne dukkhaṃ anubhavissanti,
tika-vin01t1:369_5: aho avijjāya nikatikosalla”nti dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādesi. Teneva ca dhammasaṃvegena
tika-vin01t1:369_6: imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Evametaṃ katthaci gāthābandhavasena katthaci vākyavasena katthaci
tika-vin01t1:369_7: somanassavasena katthaci dhammasaṃvegavasena pavattanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:369_9: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Yebhuyyena hi udānaṃ gāthābandhavasena bhāsitaṃ pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpitañca.
tika-vin01t1:370: Tayidaṃ sabbaññubuddhabhāsitaṃ paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ sāvakabhāsitanti tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:374: “Sabbo rāgo pahīno me, sabbo doso samūhato;
tika-vin01t1:375: Sabbo me vihato moho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:379_0: Therigāthāsu ca āgatāni. Aññānipi sakkādīhi devehi bhāsitāni “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:379_1: kassape supatiṭṭhita”ntiādīni, soṇadaṇḍabrāhmaṇādīhi manussehi ca bhāsitāni “namo
tika-vin01t1:379_2: tassa bhagavato”tiādīni tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni udānāni santi eva, na tāni idha
tika-vin01t1:379_3: adhippetāni. Yāni pana sammāsambuddhena sāmaṃ āhaccabhāsitāni jinavacanabhūtāni,
tika-vin01t1:379_4: tāneva ca dhammasaṅgāhakehi “udāna”nti saṅgītaṃ. Etāniyeva ca sandhāya bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:379_5: pariyattidhammaṃ navavidhā vibhajitvā uddisantena udānanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:380_0: Yā pana “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādigāthā bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle udānavasena pavattitā
tika-vin01t1:380_1: anekasatasahassānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ udānabhūtā ca, tā aparabhāge dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa
tika-vin01t1:380_2: bhagavatā desitattā dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ anāropetvā dhammapade
tika-vin01t1:380_3: saṅgahitā. Yañca “aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño”ti udānavacanaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuyā
tika-vin01t1:380_4: devamanussānaṃ pavedanasamatthanigghosavipphāraṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, tadapi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:380_5: sabbesaṃ eva bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ “ārādhayiṃsu vata maṃ
tika-vin01t1:380_7: attanā adhigatadhammekadesassa yathādesitassa ariyamaggassa sāvakesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:380_8: therena adhigatattā attano parissamassa saphalabhāvapaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ pītisomanassajanitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:380_9: udāhāramattāṃ, na “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”tiādivacanaṃ viya pavattiyā nivattiyā
tika-vin01t1:380_10: vā pakāsananti na dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:381: Udānapāḷiyañca bodhivaggādīsu aṭṭhasu vaggesu dasa dasa katvā asītiyeva suttantā saṅgītā, tatoyeva ca udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:392: Tīṇi dvāsīti ca tathā, udānassa paveditā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:393: Idha pana “dvāsīti suttantā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na sameti, tasmā “asīti suttantā”ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:394_0: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “vuttamarahatāti me sutaṃ. Ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahatha,
tika-vin01t1:394_1: ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāya. Katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ? Lobhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:394_2: pajahatha, ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā”ti evamādinā ekakadukatikacatukkavasena
tika-vin01t1:394_5: pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā hi ekakanipāte tāva sattavīsati suttāni, dukanipāte dvāvīsati,
tika-vin01t1:394_6: tikanipāte paññāsa, catukkanipāte terasāti dvādasuttarasatasuttantāneva itivuttakapāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:405: Evamādinā uddānagāthāhi dvādasuttarasatasuttāni gaṇetvā dassitāni. Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyampi –
tika-vin01t1:406: “Suttato ekakanipāte tāva sattavīsati suttāni, dukanipāte dvāvīsati, tikanipāte paññāsa, catukkanipāte terasāti dvādasādhikasatasuttasaṅgaha”nti –
tika-vin01t1:407_0: Vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā “dvāsīti khandhakavattānī”ti
tika-vin01t1:407_2: vattabbe “dasuttarasatasuttantā”ti vuttantipi sakkā vattuṃ, tathāpi īdise ṭhāne pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:408: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ purāvutthaṃ bhagavato pubbacaritaṃ kāyati katheti pakāsetīti jātakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:409_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande. Katame cattāro? Sace, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t1:409_1: bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:409_2: ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti, atittāva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisā
tika-vin01t1:409_3: hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati. Sace bhikkhunīparisā…pe… upāsakaparisā…pe… upāsikā
tika-vin01t1:409_4: parisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti. Tattha ce ānando
tika-vin01t1:409_5: dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti, atittāva, bhikkhave, upāsikāparisā
tika-vin01t1:409_6: hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati. Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā
tika-vin01t1:410_0: Cūḷavedallādīsu visākhena nāma upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya nāma bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin01t1:410_1: bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ cūḷavedallanti veditabbaṃ. Mahāvedallaṃ pana mahākoṭṭhikattherena
tika-vin01t1:410_2: pucchitena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhisuttampi bhikkhūhi puṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:410_3: tenevāyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṃ. Etāni majjhimanikāyapariyāpannāni. Sakkapañhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:410_4: pana sakkena puṭṭho bhagavā abhāsi, tañca dīghanikāyapariyāpannanti veditabbaṃ. Mahāpuṇṇamasuttampi
tika-vin01t1:410_5: tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇamāya rattiyā aññatarena bhikkhunā puṭṭhena bhagavatā
tika-vin01t1:410_6: bhāsitaṃ, taṃ pana majjhimanikāyapariyāpannanti veditabbaṃ. Vedanti ñāṇaṃ. Tuṭṭhinti
tika-vin01t1:410_8: pītisomanassaṃ. Laddhā laddhāti labhitvā labhitvā, punappunaṃ labhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:411_0: Evaṃ aṅgavasena sakalampi buddhavacanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhammakkhandhavasena vibhajitvā
tika-vin01t1:411_2: dhammarāsivasena. Dvāsīti sahassāni buddhato gaṇhiṃ, dve sahassāni bhikkhuto gaṇhinti
tika-vin01t1:411_3: sambandho. Tattha buddhato gaṇhinti sammāsambuddhato uggaṇhiṃ, dvesahassādhikāni
tika-vin01t1:411_4: asīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni satthu santikā adhigaṇhinti attho. Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti
tika-vin01t1:411_5: dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto uggaṇhiṃ, dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikā
tika-vin01t1:411_6: adhigaṇhiṃ. Sāriputtattherādīhi bhāsitānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisuttantādīnaṃ vasena hi “dve
tika-vin01t1:411_7: sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttaṃ. Caturāsīti sahassānīti tadubhayaṃ samodhānetvā catusahassādhikāni
tika-vin01t1:411_8: asīti sahassāni. Ye me dhammā pavattinoti ye dhammā mama pavattino pavattamānā paguṇā
tika-vin01t1:411_9: vācuggatā jivhagge parivattanti, te dhammā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:411_10: hoti. Keci pana “ye ime”ti padacchedaṃ katvā “ye ime dhammā buddhassa bhagavato bhikkhūnañca
tika-vin01t1:411_11: pavattino, tehi pavattitā, tesvāhaṃ dvāsīti sahassāni buddhato gaṇhiṃ, dve sahassāni
tika-vin01t1:411_12: bhikkhutoti evaṃ caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti evamettha sambandhaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:412_0: Ettha ca subhasuttaṃ gopakamoggallānasuttañca parinibbute bhagavati ānandattherena
tika-vin01t1:412_1: vuttattā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassesu antogadhaṃ hoti, na hotīti? Tattha paṭisambhidāgaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t1:412_2: tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sayaṃ vuttadhammakkhandhānaṃ bhikkhuto gahiteyeva saṅgahetvā evamāhāti
tika-vin01t1:412_3: daṭṭhabba”nti. Bhagavatā pana dinnanaye ṭhatvā bhāsitattā sayaṃ vuttadhammakkhandhānampi
tika-vin01t1:412_4: “buddhato gaṇhi”nti ettha saṅgahaṃ katvā vuttanti evamettha vattuṃ yuttataraṃ viya
tika-vin01t1:412_5: dissati. Bhagavatāyeva hi dinnanaye ṭhatvā sāvakā dhammaṃ desenti. Teneva hi tatiyasaṅgītiyañca
tika-vin01t1:412_6: moggaliputtatissattherena bhāsitampi kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:412_7: tatoyeva ca attanā bhāsitampi subhasuttādi saṅgītiṃ āropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena
tika-vin01t1:413_1: buddhasāsane pākaṭo, kittakā dhammā te satthārā bhāsitā, tayā dhāritā”ti pucchite
tika-vin01t1:413_2: tassa paṭivacanaṃ dentena āyasmatā ānandattherena evaṃ “dvāsīti buddhato gaṇhi”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:413_3: paridīpitadhammakkhandhānaṃ vasena. Ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ satipaṭṭhānādi. Satipaṭṭhānasuttañhi
tika-vin01t1:413_4: “ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādinā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:413_5: ārabhitvā tesaṃyeva vibhāgadassanavasena pavattattā “ekānusandhika”nti vuccati. Anekānusandhikanti
tika-vin01t1:414: “Kati chinde kati jahe, kati cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-vin01t1:417: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-vin01t1:419_1: veditabbaṃ. Tasmā “kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā, sukhāya vedanāya
tika-vin01t1:419_2: sampayuttā dhammā, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
tika-vin01t1:419_3: sampayuttā dhammā”ti evamādīsu tikesu kusalattikassa vibhajanavasena yaṃ vuttaṃ nikkhepakaṇḍe –
tika-vin01t1:420_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Tīṇi kusalamūlāni alobho adoso amoho, taṃsampayutto vedanākkhandho
tika-vin01t1:420_1: saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:421: “Katame dhammā akusalā? Tīṇi akusalamūlāni lobho doso moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā, taṃsampayutto vedanākkhandho…pe… manokammaṃ. Ime dhammā akusalā.
tika-vin01t1:422_0: “Katame dhammā abyākatā? Kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā
tika-vin01t1:422_1: apariyāpannā vedanākkhandho …pe… viññāṇakkhandho, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā
tika-vin01t1:422_2: nākusalā na ca kammavipākā sabbañca rūpaṃ asaṅkhatā ca dhātu. Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti –
tika-vin01t1:423: Ayameko dhammakkhandho. Evaṃ sesattikānampi ekekassa tikassa vibhajanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:424: Tathā “hetū dhammā”ti evamādikesu dukesu ekekassa dukassa vibhajanavasena yaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:425: “Katame dhammā hetū? Tayo kusalā hetū, tayo akusalā hetū, tayo abyākatā hetū”ti –
tika-vin01t1:426: Ādi, tatthāpi ekekassa dukassa vibhajanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandho. Puna aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe –
tika-vin01t1:427_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Catūsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ. Ime dhammā kusalā. Katame dhammā akusalā?
tika-vin01t1:427_1: Dvādasa akusalacittuppādā. Ime dhammā akusalā. Katame dhammā abyākatā? Catūsu bhūmīsu
tika-vin01t1:427_2: vipāko tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ rūpañca nibbānañca. Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti –
tika-vin01t1:428: Evamādinā kusalattikādivibhajanavasena pavattesu tikabhājanesu ekekassa tikassa bhājanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandho. Tathā –
tika-vin01t1:429: “Katame dhammā hetū? Tayo kusalā hetū, tayo akusalā hetū, tayo abyākatā hetū”ti –
tika-vin01t1:430: Ādinayappavattesu dukabhājanesu ekamekaṃ dukabhājanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandhoti evamettha tikadukabhājanavasena dhammakkhandhavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:432: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:433_0: Evamādinayappavatte cittuppādakaṇḍe ekamekaṃ cittavārabhājanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandhoti
tika-vin01t1:433_1: gahetabbaṃ. Eko dhammakkhandhoti ettha “ekekatikadukabhājanaṃ ekamekaṃ cittavārabhājana”nti
tika-vin01t1:433_2: vuttattā ekeko dhammakkhandhoti attho veditabbo. “Ekeko”ti avuttepi hi ayamattho
tika-vin01t1:433_3: atthato viññāyamānova hotīti “eko dhammakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ. Atthi vatthūtiādīsu vatthu
tika-vin01t1:433_4: nāma sudinnakaṇḍādi. Mātikāti “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:433_5: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ajjhācāre paññattasikkhāpadaṃ. Padabhājanīyanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa
tika-vin01t1:433_6: “yo panāti yo yādiso”tiādinayappavattaṃ vibhajanaṃ. Antarāpattīti “paṭilātaṃ ukkhipati,
tika-vin01t1:433_7: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādinā sikkhāpadantaresu paññattā āpatti. Anāpattīti “anāpatti
tika-vin01t1:433_8: ajānantassa asādiyantassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassā”tiādinayappavatto
tika-vin01t1:433_10: vematiko nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, dasāhātikkante anatikkantasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti
tika-vin01t1:434_0: Idāni evametaṃ abhedato rasavasena ekavidhantiādinā “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo…pe…
tika-vin01t1:434_1: imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti buddhavacanaṃ dhammavinayādibhedena vavatthapetvā
tika-vin01t1:434_3: saṅgītiyā imassa piṭakassa vinayabhāvo majjhimabuddhavacanādibhāvo ca vavatthāpitoti
tika-vin01t1:434_4: dasseti. Na kevalaṃ imamevimassa yathāvuttappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvā saṅgītaṃ, atha
tika-vin01t1:434_5: kho aññampīti dassento āha “na kevalañca imamevā”tiādi. Tattha uddānasaṅgaho paṭhamapārājikādīsu
tika-vin01t1:434_6: āgatānaṃ vinītavatthuādīnaṃ saṅkhepato saṅgahadassanavasena dhammasaṅgāhakehi kathitā –
tika-vin01t1:435: “Makkaṭī vajjiputtā ca, gihī naggo ca titthiyā;
tika-vin01t1:438_0: Assa buddhavacanassa saṅgītipariyosāne sādhukāraṃ dadamānā viyāti sambandho. Saṅkampīti
tika-vin01t1:438_1: uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gacchantī suṭṭhu kampi. Sampakampīti uddhaṃ adho ca gacchantī sampakampi.
tika-vin01t1:438_2: Sampavedhīti catūsu disāsu gacchantī suṭṭhu pavedhi. Accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttāni acchariyāni,
tika-vin01t1:438_4: pañcahi satehi yena katā saṅgītā, tena pañcasatāni etissā atthīti “pañcasatā”ti ca,
tika-vin01t1:438_5: thereheva katattā therā mahākassapādayo etissā atthīti “therikā”ti ca loke vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:439_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha nidassitā, taṃ nigamanavasena
tika-vin01t1:439_2: vakkhamānaṃ sabbaṃ nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Kimatthaṃ panettha dhammavinayasaṅgahe kathiyamāne
tika-vin01t1:439_3: nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu ca bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabboti? Vuccate
tika-vin01t1:439_5: upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca, desakālakattuhetunimittehi
tika-vin01t1:439_6: upanibandho viya vohāravinicchayo. Teneva ca āyasmatā mahākassapena “paṭhamapārājikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:439_7: āvuso, upāli, kattha paññatta”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ visajjanaṃ karontena
tika-vin01t1:439_8: āyasmatā upālittherena “tena samayenā”tiādinā paṭhamapārājikassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:440_1: hi bhagavato natthi niratthakā paṭipatti attahitatthā vā, tasmā paresaṃyevatthāya
tika-vin01t1:440_4: sāsanaṃ, na kabbaracanā. Tayidaṃ satthuracitaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:441_0: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:441_1: tañcassa pamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ “buddho bhagavā”ti iminā padadvayena vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:441_4: eva ca sabbasattuttamabhāvadīpanena ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti idamettha
tika-vin01t1:442_0: Tatrāyaṃ ācariyaparamparāti tasmiṃ jambudīpe ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ paramparā paveṇī paṭipāṭi.
tika-vin01t1:442_1: Upāli dāsakotiādīsu upālitthero pākaṭoyeva, dāsakattherādayo pana evaṃ veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:442_2: Vesāliyaṃ kira eko dāsako nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo tiṇṇaṃ antevāsikasatānaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko
tika-vin01t1:442_3: hutvā ācariyassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanto dvādasavassikoyeva tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū
tika-vin01t1:442_4: ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ antevāsikaparivuto dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā vālikārāme nivasantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:442_5: āyasmantaṃ upālittheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano vedesu sabbāni gaṇṭhiṭṭhānāni theraṃ
tika-vin01t1:442_6: pucchi. Theropi sabbaṃ byākaritvā sayampi ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto nāmaṃ sandhāya imaṃ
tika-vin01t1:442_7: pañhaṃ pucchi “ekadhammo kho, māṇava, sabbesu dhammesu anupatati, sabbepi, māṇava,
tika-vin01t1:442_8: dhammā ekadhammasmiṃ osaranti, katamo nu kho so, māṇavaka, dhammo”ti. Sopi kho māṇavo
tika-vin01t1:442_9: pañhassa atthaṃ ajānanto “kimidaṃ bho pabbajitā”ti āha. Buddhamantoyaṃ māṇavāti.
tika-vin01t1:442_10: Sakkā panāyaṃ bho mayhampi dātunti. Sakkā, māṇava, amhehi gahitapabbajjaṃ gaṇhantassa
tika-vin01t1:442_11: dātunti. “Sādhu kho bho pabbajitā”ti māṇavo sampaṭicchitvā attano mātaraṃ pitaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:442_12: ācariyañca anujānāpetvā tīhi antevāsikasatehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā
tika-vin01t1:442_13: paripuṇṇavīsativasso upasampadaṃ labhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Thero taṃ dhuraṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:443_0: Soṇako pana dāsakattherassa saddhivihāriko. So kira kāsīsu ekassa vāṇijakassa putto
tika-vin01t1:443_1: hutvā pañcadasavassuddesiko ekaṃ samayaṃ mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ vāṇijjāya giribbajaṃ
tika-vin01t1:443_2: gato. Tato pañcapaññāsadārakehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ gantvā tattha dāsakattheraṃ saparisaṃ
tika-vin01t1:443_3: disvā ativiya pasanno pabbajjaṃ yācitvā therena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā “pabbajāhī”ti
tika-vin01t1:443_4: vutto mātāpitusantikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā tesu anicchantesu chinnabhatto hutvā
tika-vin01t1:443_5: mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pañcapaññāsāya dārakehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā
tika-vin01t1:443_6: laddhūpasampado arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ thero sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. Sopi
tika-vin01t1:444_0: Siggavatthero pana soṇakattherassa saddhivihāriko ahosi. So kira pāṭaliputte siggavo
tika-vin01t1:444_1: nāma amaccaputto hutvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu sampattiṃ anubhavamāno
tika-vin01t1:444_2: ekadivasaṃ attano sahāyena caṇḍavajjinā seṭṭhiputtena saddhiṃ saparivāro kukkuṭārāmaṃ
tika-vin01t1:444_3: gantvā tattha soṇakattheraṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnaṃ disvā vanditvā
tika-vin01t1:444_4: attanā saddhiṃ anālapantaṃ ñatvā gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchitvā bhikkhūhi
tika-vin01t1:444_5: “samāpattiṃ samāpannā nālapantī”ti vutto “kathaṃ, bhante, samāpattito vuṭṭhahantī”ti
tika-vin01t1:444_6: puna pucchitvā tehi ca bhikkhūhi “satthuno ceva saṅghassa ca pakkosanāya yathāparicchinnakālato
tika-vin01t1:444_7: āyusaṅkhayā ca vuṭṭhahantī”ti vatvā tassa saparivārassa upanissayaṃ disvā saṅghassa
tika-vin01t1:444_8: vacanena nirodhā vuṭṭhāpitaṃ soṇakattheraṃ disvā “kasmā, bhante, mayā saddhiṃ nālapitthā”ti
tika-vin01t1:444_9: pucchitvā therena “bhuñjitabbakaṃ kumāra bhuñjimhā”ti vutte “sakkā nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:444_10: amhehipi taṃ bhojetu”nti pucchitvā “sakkā, kumāra, amhādise katvā bhojetu”nti vutte
tika-vin01t1:444_11: tamatthaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā tehi anuññāto attano sahāyena caṇḍavajjinā tehi ca
tika-vin01t1:444_12: pañcahi purisasatehi saddhiṃ soṇakattherassa santike pabbajitvā upasampanno ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:444_13: Tattha siggavo ca caṇḍavajjī ca dve upajjhāyasseva santike dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā
tika-vin01t1:445_0: Tissassa pana moggaliputtassa anupubbakathā parato āvi bhavissati. Vijitāvinoti vijitasabbakilesapaṭipakkhattā
tika-vin01t1:445_1: vijitavanto. Paramparāyāti paṭipāṭiyā, anukkamenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Jambusirivhayeti
tika-vin01t1:445_2: jambusadisanāme, jambunāmaketi vuttaṃ hoti. Mahantena hi jamburukkhena abhilakkhitattā
tika-vin01t1:446_0: Vinayavaṃsantiādīhi tīhi vinayapāḷiyeva kathitā pariyāyavacanattā. Pakataññutanti
tika-vin01t1:446_1: veyyattiyaṃ, paṭubhāvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhuraggāho ahosīti padhānaggāhī ahosi, sabbesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:446_2: pāmokkho hutvā gaṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhikkhūnaṃ samudāyo samūho bhikkhusamudāyo, samaṇagaṇoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:450_0: “Yadā nibbāyiṃsū”ti sambandho. Jotayitvā ca sabbadhīti tameva saddhammaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin01t1:450_2: attho, tejavantoti vā, mahānubhāvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nibbāyiṃsūti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
tika-vin01t1:450_3: parinibbāyiṃsu. Pahīnasabbakilesattā natthi etesaṃ katthaci ālayo taṇhāti anālayā,
tika-vin01t1:451_0: Vassasataparinibbute bhagavatīti vassasataṃ parinibbutassa assāti vassasataparinibbuto,
tika-vin01t1:451_1: bhagavā, tasmiṃ parinibbānato vassasate atikkanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Vesālikāti vesālīnivāsino.
tika-vin01t1:451_2: Vajjiputtakāti vajjiraṭṭhe vesāliyaṃ kulānaṃ puttā. Kappati siṅgīloṇakappoti siṅgena
tika-vin01t1:451_3: loṇaṃ pariharitvā pariharitvā aloṇakapiṇḍapātena saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ kappati, na sannidhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:451_4: karotīti adhippāyo. Kappati dvaṅgulakappoti dvaṅgulaṃ atikkantāya chāyāya vikāle
tika-vin01t1:451_5: bhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati gāmantarakappoti “gāmantaraṃ gamissāmī”ti
tika-vin01t1:451_6: pavāritena anatirittabhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati āvāsakappoti ekasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:451_7: nānāsenāsanesu visuṃ visuṃ uposathādīni saṅghakammāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Kappati
tika-vin01t1:451_8: anumatikappoti “anāgatānaṃ āgatakāle anumatiṃ gahessāmī”ti tesu anāgatesuyeva vaggena
tika-vin01t1:451_9: saṅghena kammaṃ katvā pacchā anumatiṃ gahetuṃ kappati, vaggakammaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:451_10: Kappati āciṇṇakappoti ācariyupajjhāyehi āciṇṇo kappatīti attho. So pana ekacco kappati
tika-vin01t1:451_11: dhammiko, ekacco na kappati adhammikoti veditabbo. Kappati amathitakappoti yaṃ khīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:451_12: khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ, taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:451_13: bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati jalogiṃ pātunti ettha jalogīti taruṇasurā. Yaṃ
tika-vin01t1:451_14: majjasambhāraṃ ekato kataṃ majjabhāvamasampattaṃ, taṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:451_15: Jātarūparajatanti sarasato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbadā jātaṃ rūpameva hotīti jātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:451_16: rūpametassāti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya rājatīti rajataṃ, rūpiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:452_0: Kākaṇḍakaputtoti kākaṇḍakabrāhmaṇassa putto. Vajjīsūti janapadavacanattā bahuvacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:452_1: kataṃ. Ekopi hi janapado ruḷhīsaddattā bahuvacanena vuccati. Yena vesālī, tadavasarīti
tika-vin01t1:452_2: yena disābhāgena vesālī avasaritabbā, yasmiṃ vā padese vesālī, tadavasari, taṃ pattoti
tika-vin01t1:452_3: attho. Mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti ettha mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātamaropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:452_4: mahantaṃ vanaṃ. Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:452_5: hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ, idaṃ tādisaṃ na hotīti saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vananti
tika-vin01t1:452_6: mahāvanaṃ. Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ anto katvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena
tika-vin01t1:453_0: Tadahuposatheti ettha tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani, tasmiṃ divaseti attho. Upavasanti etthāti
tika-vin01t1:453_1: uposatho, upavasitabbadivaso. Upavasantīti ca sīlena vā sabbaso āhārassa ca abhuñjanasaṅkhātena
tika-vin01t1:453_2: anasanena vā khīrapānamadhupānādimattena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. So panesa
tika-vin01t1:453_3: divaso aṭṭhamīcātuddasīpannarasībhedena tividho. Katthaci pana pātimokkhepi sīlepi
tika-vin01t1:453_4: upavāsepi paññattiyampi uposathasaddo āgato. Tathā hesa “āyāmāvuso kappina, uposathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:453_5: gamissāmā”tiādīsu pātimokkhuddese āgato. “Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho
tika-vin01t1:453_6: upavuttho”tiādīsu sīle. “Suddhassa ve sadā pheggu, suddhassuposatho sadā”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:453_7: upavāse. “Uposatho nāma nāgarājā”tiādīsu paññattiyañca āgato. Tattha upecca vasitabbato
tika-vin01t1:453_8: uposatho pātimokkhuddeso. Upetena samannāgatena hutvā vasitabbato santāne vāsetabbato
tika-vin01t1:453_9: uposatho sīlaṃ. Asanādisaṃyamādiṃ vā upecca vasantīti uposatho upavāso. Tathārūpe
tika-vin01t1:453_10: hatthiassavisese uposathoti samaññāmattato uposatho paññatti. Idha pana “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t1:453_11: tadahuposathe sabhikkhukā āvāsā”tiādīsu viya uposathadivaso adhippeto, tasmā tadahuposatheti
tika-vin01t1:453_12: tasmiṃ uposathadivaseti attho. Kaṃsapātinti suvaṇṇapātiṃ. Kahāpaṇampītiādīsu kahāpaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:453_13: samabhāgo aḍḍho. Pādo catutthabhāgo. Māsakoyeva māsakarūpaṃ. Sabbaṃ tāva vattabbanti
tika-vin01t1:453_14: iminā sattasatikakkhandhake āgatā sabbāpi pāḷi idha ānetvā vattabbāti dasseti. Sā
tika-vin01t1:453_15: kuto vattabbāti āha “yāva imāya pana vinayasaṅgītiyā”tiādi. Saṅgāyitasadisameva saṅgāyiṃsūti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:454_0: Pubbe kataṃ upādāyāti pubbe kataṃ paṭhamasaṅgītimupādāya. Sā panāyaṃ saṅgītīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:454_1: Tesūti tesu saṅgītikārakesu theresu. Vissutāti gaṇapāmokkhatāya vissutā sabbattha
tika-vin01t1:454_2: pākaṭā. Tasmiñhi sannipāte aṭṭheva gaṇapāmokkhā mahātherā ahesuṃ, tesu ca vāsabhagāmī
tika-vin01t1:454_3: sumanoti dve therā anuruddhattherassa saddhivihārikā, avasesā cha ānandattherassa.
tika-vin01t1:454_4: Ete pana sabbepi aṭṭha mahātherā bhagavantaṃ diṭṭhapubbā. Idāni te there sarūpato
tika-vin01t1:454_5: dassento āha “sabbakāmī cā”tiādi. Sāṇasambhūtoti sāṇadesavāsī sambhūtatthero. Dutiyo
tika-vin01t1:454_6: saṅgahoti sambandho. Pannabhārāti patitakkhandhabhārā. “Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā”ti
tika-vin01t1:454_7: hi vuttaṃ. Katakiccāti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi kattabbassa pariññāpahānasaachakiriyābhāvanāsaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t1:455_0: Abbudanti upaddavaṃ vadanti corakammampi bhagavato vacanaṃ thenetvā attano vacanassa
tika-vin01t1:455_1: dīpanato. Gaṇṭhipade pana “abbudaṃ gaṇḍo”ti vuttaṃ. Imanti vakkhamānanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:455_2: Sandissamānā mukhā sammukhā. Uparibrahmalokūpapattiyā bhāvitamagganti uparibrahmaloke
tika-vin01t1:455_3: upapattiyā uppāditajjhānaṃ. Jhānañhi tatrūpapattiyā upāyabhāvato idha “maggo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:455_4: Upāyo hi “maggo”ti vuccati. Vacanattho panettha – taṃ taṃ upapattiṃ maggati gavesati
tika-vin01t1:455_5: janeti nipphādetīti maggoti evaṃ veditabbo. Atthato cāyaṃ maggo nāma cetanāpi hoti
tika-vin01t1:455_7: magga”nti hi ettha cetanā maggo nāma.
tika-vin01t1:460_0: Ettha cetanāsampayuttadhammā maggo nāma. “Ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā”ti saṅkhārūpapattisuttādīsu
tika-vin01t1:460_1: cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi maggo nāma. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne jhānassa adhippetattā
tika-vin01t1:461_0: Moggalibrāhmaṇassāti lokasammatassa aputtakassa moggalināmabrāhmaṇassa. Nanu ca kathametaṃ
tika-vin01t1:461_1: nāma vuttaṃ “moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahessatī”ti. Kiṃ uparūpapattiyā
tika-vin01t1:461_2: paṭiladdhasamāpattīnampi kāmāvacare uppatti hotīti? Hoti. Sā ca katādhikārānaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:461_3: cetopaṇidhivasena hoti, na sabbesanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha mahaggatassa garukakammassa
tika-vin01t1:461_4: vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittakammaṃ kathamattano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotīti? Ettha ca
tika-vin01t1:461_5: tāva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “nikantibaleneva jhānā parihāyati, tato parihīnajjhānā
tika-vin01t1:461_6: nibbattantī”ti. Keci pana “anīvaraṇāvatthāya nikantiyā jhānassa parihāni vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin01t1:461_7: gahetabbā”ti vatvā evamettha kāraṇaṃ vadanti “satipi mahaggatakammuno vipākapaṭibāhanasamatthassa
tika-vin01t1:461_8: parittakammassapi abhāve ‘ijjhati, bhikkhave, sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā’ti
tika-vin01t1:461_9: vacanato kāmabhave cetopaṇidhi mahaggatakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittakammuno
tika-vin01t1:462_0: Sādhu sappurisāti ettha sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto, taṃ yācāmāti attho. Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhoti
tika-vin01t1:462_2: udaggudaggo. Pītimā hi puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā abbhuggatattā “udaggo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:462_3: Sādhūti paṭissuṇitvāti “sādhū”ti paṭivacanaṃ datvā. Tīretvāti niṭṭhapetvā. Puna paccāgamiṃsūti
tika-vin01t1:462_4: puna āgamiṃsu. Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye dutiyasaṅgītiṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:462_5: samayeti attho. Navakāti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “daharabhikkhū”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:462_6: adhikaraṇaṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsūti taṃ vajjiputtakehi uppāditaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinituṃ
tika-vin01t1:462_7: na sampāpuṇiṃsu nāgamiṃsu. No ahuvatthāti sambandho. Idaṃ daṇḍakammanti idāni vattabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:462_8: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbutāti sambandho, yāva attano attano āyuparimāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:463_0: Kiṃ pana katvā te therā parinibbutāti āha “dutiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ katvā”tiādi. Anāgatepi
tika-vin01t1:463_1: saddhammavuḍḍhiyā hetuṃ katvā parinibbutāti sambandho. Idāni “tepi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvā
tika-vin01t1:463_2: therā aniccatāya vasaṃ gatā, kimaṅgaṃ pana aññe”ti saṃvejetvā ovadanto āha “khīṇāsavā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:463_4: hoti. Jammiṃ lāmakaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ anabhibhavanīyaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aniccataṃ
tika-vin01t1:463_5: evaṃ ñatvāti sambandho. Keci pana “durabhisambhava”nti ettha “pāpuṇituṃ asakkuṇeyya”nti
tika-vin01t1:463_6: imamatthaṃ gahetvā “yaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ niccaṃ amataṃ padaṃ, taṃ pattuṃ vāyame dhīro”ti
tika-vin01t1:463_7: sambandhaṃ vadanti. Sabbākārenāti sabbappakārena vattabbaṃ kiñcipi asesetvā dutiyasaṅgīti
tika-vin01t1:467_0: Imissā pana saṅgītiyā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi nikkaḍḍhitā te dasasahassā vajjiputtakā
tika-vin01t1:467_1: bhikkhū pakkhaṃ pariyesamānā attano attano anurūpaṃ dubbalapakkhaṃ labhitvā visuṃ
tika-vin01t1:467_2: mahāsaṅghikaṃ ācariyakulaṃ nāma akaṃsu, tato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni
tika-vin01t1:467_3: jātāni gokulikā ca ekabyohārikā ca. Gokulikanikāyato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni
tika-vin01t1:467_4: jātāni paṇṇattivādā ca bāhuliyā ca. Bahussutikātipi tesaṃyeva nāmaṃ, tesaṃyeva antarā
tika-vin01t1:467_5: cetiyavādā nāma apare ācariyavādā uppannā. Evaṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulato dutiye vassasate
tika-vin01t1:467_6: pañcācariyakulāni uppannāni, tāni mahāsaṅghikehi saddhiṃ cha honti.
tika-vin01t1:468_0: Tasmiṃyeva dutiye vassasate theravādato bhijjitvā dve ācariyavādā uppannā mahisāsakā
tika-vin01t1:468_1: ca vajjiputtakā ca. Tattha vajjiputtakavādato bhijjitvā apare cattāro ācariyavādā
tika-vin01t1:468_2: uppannā dhammuttarikā bhaddayānikā channāgārikā samitikāti. Puna tasmiṃyeva dutiye
tika-vin01t1:468_3: vassasate mahisāsakavādato bhijjitvā sabbatthivādā dhammaguttikāti dve ācariyavādā
tika-vin01t1:468_4: uppannā. Puna sabbatthivādakulato bhijjitvā kassapikā nāma jātā, kassapikesupi bhinnesu
tika-vin01t1:468_5: apare saṅkantikā nāma jātā, saṅkantikesu bhinnesu suttavādā nāma jātāti theravādato
tika-vin01t1:468_6: bhijjitvā ime ekādasa ācariyavādā uppannā, te theravādena saddhiṃ dvādasa honti.
tika-vin01t1:468_7: Iti ime ca dvādasa mahāsaṅghikānañca cha ācariyavādāti sabbe aṭṭhārasa ācariyavādā
tika-vin01t1:468_8: dutiye vassasate uppannā. Aṭṭhārasa nikāyātipi aṭṭhārasācariyakulānītipi etesaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:468_9: nāmaṃ. Etesu pana sattarasa vādā bhinnakā, theravādoveko asambhinnakoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:470: Aññaṃ pakkhaṃ labhitvāna, adhammavādī bahū janā.
tika-vin01t1:476: Atthaṃ dhammañca bhindiṃsu, vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasu.
tika-vin01t1:479: “Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ, aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu te;
tika-vin01t1:480: Byañjanacchāyāya te bhikkhū, bahuṃ atthaṃ vināsayuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:482: Patirūpaṃ suttaṃ vinayaṃ, tañca aññaṃ kariṃsu te.
tika-vin01t1:487: Pakatibhāvaṃ vijahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
tika-vin01t1:493: Bahussutikā ca paññatti, dvidhā bhijjittha bhikkhavo.
tika-vin01t1:497: Ganthañca ekadesañhi, chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
tika-vin01t1:499: Pakatibhāvaṃ vijahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
tika-vin01t1:510: Ganthañca ekadesañhi, chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
tika-vin01t1:512: Pakatibhāvaṃ vijahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
tika-vin01t1:520_0: Aparāparaṃ pana hemavatā rājagirikā siddhatthikā pubbaseliyā aparaseliyā vājiriyāti
tika-vin01t1:520_1: aññepi cha ācariyavādā uppannā. Purimakānaṃ pana aṭṭhārasannaṃ ācariyavādānaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t1:520_2: pavattamāne sāsane asoko dhammarājā paṭiladdhasaddho divase divase buddhapūjāya satasahassaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:520_3: dhammapūjāya satasahassaṃ, saṅghapūjāya satasahassaṃ, attano ācariyassa nigrodhattherassa
tika-vin01t1:520_4: satasahassaṃ, catūsu dvāresu bhesajjatthāya satasahassanti pañca satasahassāni pariccajanto
tika-vin01t1:520_5: sāsane uḷāraṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattesi. Tadā hatalābhasakkārehi titthiyehi uppāditaṃ
tika-vin01t1:520_7: pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahassamekaṃ gahetvā yathā mahākassapatthero ca
tika-vin01t1:520_8: yasatthero ca dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyiṃsu, evameva saṅgāyanto tatiyasaṅgītiṃ akāsi.
tika-vin01t1:520_9: Idāni taṃ tatiyasaṅgītiṃ mūlato pabhuti vitthāretvā dassento āha “tissopi kho mahābrahmā
tika-vin01t1:520_10: brahmalokato cavitvā moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:521_0: Tattha gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesīti moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:521_1: aggahesīti attho. Gehassa pana tannissayattā nissite nissayavohāravasena “gehe paṭisandhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:521_2: aggahesī”ti vuttaṃ yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karonti, sabbo gāmo āgato”ti. Sattavassānīti
tika-vin01t1:521_3: accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Aticchathāti atikkamitvā icchatha, idha bhikkhā na
tika-vin01t1:521_4: labbhati, ito aññattha gantvā bhikkhaṃ pariyesathāti adhippāyo. “Bho pabbajitā”tiādi
tika-vin01t1:521_5: brāhmaṇo attano gehe bhikkhālābhaṃ anicchanto āha. Paṭiyāditabhattatoti sampādetvā
tika-vin01t1:521_6: ṭhapitabhattato. Tadupiyanti tadanurūpaṃ. Upasamaṃ disvāti therassa kāyacittavūpasamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:521_7: punappunaṃ disvā, ñatvāti attho. Iriyāpathavūpasamasandassanena hi tannibandhino
tika-vin01t1:521_8: cittassa yoniso pavattiupasamopi viññāyati. Bhiyyoso mattāya pasīditvāti punappunaṃ
tika-vin01t1:522_0: Soḷasavassuddesikoti soḷasavassoti uddisitabbo voharitabboti soḷasavassuddeso, soyeva
tika-vin01t1:522_1: soḷasavassuddesiko. Soḷasavassoti vā uddisitabbataṃ arahatīti soḷasavassuddesiko,
tika-vin01t1:522_2: soḷasavassāni vā uddisitabbāni assāti soḷasavassuddesiko, soḷasavassoti uddeso vā
tika-vin01t1:522_3: assa atthīti soḷasavassuddesiko, atthato pana soḷasavassikoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:522_4: vedānaṃ pāragūti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ paguṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:522_5: pāraṃ gatoti pāragū. Pāragūti cettha niccasāpekkhatāya samāsādikaṃ veditabbaṃ. Laggetvāti
tika-vin01t1:522_6: olambetvā. Na ca kācīti ettha ca-saddo avadhāraṇe, kāci kathā neva uppajjatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:522_7: Pallaṅkanti nisīditabbāsanaṃ. Uppajjissatīti etthāpi “kathā”ti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:522_8: Kupito anattamanoti kopena kupito, anattamano domanassena. Domanassasamaṅgī hi puggalo
tika-vin01t1:522_9: pītisukhehi na attamano na attacittoti anattamanoti vuccati. Na sakamanoti vā anattamano
tika-vin01t1:523_0: Caṇḍikkabhāveti caṇḍiko vuccati caṇḍo thaddhapuggalo, tassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ, thaddhabhāvoti
tika-vin01t1:523_1: attho. Idha pana “caṇḍikkabhāve”ti vuttattā caṇḍikoyeva caṇḍikkanti gahetabbaṃ, tena
tika-vin01t1:523_2: “caṇḍikkabhāve”ti ettha thaddhabhāveti attho veditabbo. Kiñci mantanti kiñci vedaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:523_3: Aññe ke jānissantīti na keci jānissantīti adhippāyo. Pucchitvā sakkā jānitunti attano
tika-vin01t1:523_4: padesañāṇe ṭhitattā thero evamāha. Sabbaññubuddhā eva hi “puccha, māṇava, yadākaṅkhasī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:523_5: paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇaṃ sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavārenti. Sāvakā pana padesañāṇe
tika-vin01t1:523_6: ṭhitattā “sutvā vedissāmā”ti vā “pucchitvā sakkā jānitu”nti vā vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:524_0: Tīsu vedesūtiādīsu tayo vedā pubbe vuttanayā eva. Nighaṇḍūti nāmanighaṇḍurukkhādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:524_1: vevacanappakāsakaṃ satthaṃ, vevacanappakāsakanti ca pariyāyasaddadīpakanti attho,
tika-vin01t1:524_2: ekekassa atthassa anekapariyāyavacanavibhāvakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:524_3: anekesaṃ atthānaṃ ekasaddassa vacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi tassa ganthassa pavattattā.
tika-vin01t1:524_4: Vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ saddañca nikhaṇḍeti bhindati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu,
tika-vin01t1:524_5: so eva idha kha-kārassa gha-kāraṃ katvā nighaṇḍūti vutto. Keṭubhanti kiriyākappavikappo
tika-vin01t1:524_6: kavīnaṃ upakārasatthaṃ. Ettha ca kiriyākappavikappoti vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā
tika-vin01t1:524_7: kappīyati vikappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo, so pana vaṇṇapadabandhapadatthādivibhāgato
tika-vin01t1:524_8: bahuvikappoti kiriyākappavikappoti vuccati. Idañca mūlakiriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:524_9: vuttaṃ. So hi satasahassaparimāṇo nayādicariyādikaṃ pakaraṇaṃ. Vacanatthato pana
tika-vin01t1:524_10: kiṭati gameti kiriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato gamento pūretīti keṭubhanti
tika-vin01t1:524_11: vuccati, saha nighaṇḍunā keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhā, tayo vedā. Tesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu.
tika-vin01t1:524_12: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etenāti akkharappabhedo,
tika-vin01t1:524_13: sikkhā ca nirutti ca. Saha akkharappabhedenāti sākkharappabhedā, tesu sākkharappabhedesu.
tika-vin01t1:524_14: Itihāsapañcamesūti athabbanavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā “itiha āsa itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto
tika-vin01t1:524_15: purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tayo vedā. Tesu itihāsapañcamesu.
tika-vin01t1:524_16: Neva attanā passatīti neva sayaṃ passati, neva jānātīti attho. Puccha, byākarissāmīti
tika-vin01t1:525_0: Yassa cittantiādipañhadvayaṃ cuticittasamaṅgino khīṇāsavassa cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:525_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamapañhe uppajjatīti uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:525_2: Na nirujjhatīti nirodhakkhaṇaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati. Tassa cittanti tassa puggalassa
tika-vin01t1:525_3: tato paṭṭhāya cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatīti pucchati. Yassa vā panātiādike
tika-vin01t1:525_4: pana dutiyapañhe nirujjhissatīti yassa cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhissati.
tika-vin01t1:525_5: Nuppajjissatīti bhaṅgato parabhāge sayaṃ vā aññaṃ vā nuppajjissati, tassa puggalassa
tika-vin01t1:525_6: cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti pucchati. Imesaṃ pana pañhānaṃ paṭhamo pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo,
tika-vin01t1:525_7: tasmā “yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”ti
tika-vin01t1:525_8: evaṃ puṭṭhena satā evamayaṃ pañho ca vissajjetabbo “pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-vin01t1:525_9: tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, itaresaṃ cittassa
tika-vin01t1:525_10: uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, nirujjhissati ceva uppajjissati
tika-vin01t1:525_11: cā”ti. Yesañhi paricchinnavaṭṭadukkhānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ sabbapacchimassa cuticittassa
tika-vin01t1:525_12: uppādakkhaṇe vattati, tesaṃ tadeva cuticittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatīti. Uppādappattatāya
tika-vin01t1:525_13: uppajjati nāma, bhaṅgaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati. Bhaṅgaṃ pana patvā taṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:525_14: nirujjhissati, tato appaṭisandhikattā aññaṃ na uppajjissati. Ṭhapetvā pana pacchimacittasamaṅgikhīṇāsavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:525_16: nāma, bhaṅgaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati. Bhaṅgaṃ pana patvā nirujjhissateva, aññaṃ
tika-vin01t1:525_17: pana tasmiṃ vā aññasmiṃ vā attabhāve uppajjissati ceva nirujjhissati ca. Dutiyo pana
tika-vin01t1:525_18: pañho arahato cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇe niyamitattā ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo, tasmā “yassa
tika-vin01t1:525_19: vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatī”ti
tika-vin01t1:525_20: puṭṭhena “āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ. Khīṇāsavassa hi uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgicuticittaṃ bhaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:525_21: patvā nirujjhissati nāma, tato paraṃ nuppajjissati. Uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya pana
tika-vin01t1:525_22: uppajjati ceva bhaṅgaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati cāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:526_0: Ayaṃ pana māṇavo evamime pañhe vissajjetumasakkonto vighātaṃ pāpuṇi, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:526_1: “māṇavo uddhaṃ vā adho vā harituṃ asakkonto”tiādi. Tattha uddhaṃ vā adho vā harituṃ
tika-vin01t1:526_2: asakkontoti uparimapade vā heṭṭhimapadaṃ, heṭṭhimapade vā uparimapadaṃ atthato samannāharituṃ
tika-vin01t1:526_3: asakkontoti attho, pubbenāparaṃ yojetvā pañhassa atthaṃ paricchindituṃ asakkontoti
tika-vin01t1:526_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ tāva ācikkhīti “atthi imasmiṃ kāye”tiādikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:526_5: dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ “mantassa upacāro aya”nti paṭhamaṃ ācikkhi. Sotāpannānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:526_6: sīlesu paripūrakāritāya samādinnasīlato natthi parihānīti āha “abhabbo dāni sāsanato
tika-vin01t1:526_7: nivattitu”nti. Vaḍḍhetvāti uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā. Appossukko bhaveyya
tika-vin01t1:526_8: buddhavacanaṃ gahetunti arahattappattiyā katakiccabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Vohāravidhimhi
tika-vin01t1:526_9: chekabhāvatthaṃ “upajjhāyo maṃ bhante tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pahiṇī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:527_0: Udakadantaponaṃ upaṭṭhāpesīti paribhogatthāya udakañca dantakaṭṭhañca paṭiyādetvā
tika-vin01t1:527_1: ṭhapesi. Dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantaponaṃ vuccati dantakaṭṭhaṃ. Guṇavantānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:527_2: saṅgahetabbabhāvato thero sāmaṇerassa ca khantivīriyaupaṭṭhānādiguṇe paccakkhakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:527_3: vināva abhiññāya pakatiyā vīmaṃsamāno puna sammajjanādiṃ akāsi. “Sāmaṇerassa cittadamanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:527_4: akāsī”tipi vadanti. Buddhavacanaṃ paṭṭhapesīti buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpetuṃ ārabhi.
tika-vin01t1:527_5: Ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakanti ettha “sāmaṇerānaṃ vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ cārittaṃ na hotīti
tika-vin01t1:527_6: ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpesī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t1:527_7: vuttaṃ. Avassikova samānoti upasampadato paṭṭhāya aparipuṇṇaekavassoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:527_8: Moggaliputtatissattherassa hadaye patiṭṭhāpitampi buddhavacanaṃ vohāravasena tassa
tika-vin01t1:527_9: hatthe patiṭṭhāpitaṃ nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “hatthe sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:527_10: Yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyiṃsūti moggaliputtatissattherassa hatthe sakalasāsanapatiṭṭhāpanena
tika-vin01t1:527_11: dutiyasaṅgītikārakāropitadaṇḍakammato muttā hutvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:528_0: Bindusārassa rañño ekasataputtāti ettha bindusāro nāma sakyakulappasuto candaguttassa
tika-vin01t1:528_1: nāma rañño putto. Tathā hi viṭaṭūbhasaṅgāme kapilavatthuto nikkhantasakyaputtehi
tika-vin01t1:528_2: māpite moriyanagare khattiyakulasambhavo candaguttakumāro pāṭaliputte rājā ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:528_3: Tassa putto bindusāro nāma rājakumāro pitu accayena rājā hutvā ekasataputtakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:528_4: janako ahosi. Ekasatanti ekañca satañca ekasataṃ, ekenādhikaṃ satanti attho. Ekāva
tika-vin01t1:528_5: mātā assāti ekamātikaṃ, attanā sahodaranti vuttaṃ hoti. Na tāva ekarajjaṃ katanti
tika-vin01t1:528_6: āha “anabhisittova rajjaṃ kāretvā”ti. Ekarajjābhisekanti sakalajambudīpe ekādhipaccavasena
tika-vin01t1:528_7: kariyamānaṃ abhisekaṃ. Puññappabhāvena pāpuṇitabbāpi rājiddhiyo arahattamaggena āgatā
tika-vin01t1:528_8: paṭisambhidādayo avasesavisesā viya payogasampattibhūtā abhisekānubhāveneva āgatāti
tika-vin01t1:529_0: Tattha rājiddhiyoti rājabhāvānugatappabhāvā. Yatoti yato soḷasaghaṭato. Sāsane uppannasaddhoti
tika-vin01t1:529_1: buddhasāsane paṭiladdhasaddho. Asandhimittāti tassāva nāmaṃ. Tassā kira sarīre sandhayo
tika-vin01t1:529_2: na paññāyanti, tasmā evaṃnāmikā jātātipi vadanti. Devatā eva divase divase āharantīti
tika-vin01t1:529_3: sambandho. Devasikanti divase divase. Agadāmalakanti appakeneva sarīrasodhanādisamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:529_4: sabbadosaharaṇaṃ osadhāmalakaṃ. Agadaharītakampi tādisameva harītakaṃ. Tesu kira
tika-vin01t1:529_5: dvīsu yathākāmamekaṃ paribhuñjati. Chaddantadahatoti chaddantadahasamīpe ṭhitadevavimānato
tika-vin01t1:529_6: kapparukkhato vā. “Chaddantadahe tādisā rukkhavisesā santi, tato āharantī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:529_7: Dibbañca pānakanti dibbaphalarasapānakañca. Asuttamayikanti kapparukkhato nibbattadibbadussattā
tika-vin01t1:529_8: suttehi na katanti asuttamayikaṃ. Sumanapupphapaṭanti sabbattha sukhumaṃ hutvā uggatapupphānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:529_9: atthitāya sumanapupphapaṭaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Uṭṭhitassa sālinoti sayaṃjātasālino. Samudāyāpekkhañcettha
tika-vin01t1:529_10: ekavacanaṃ, sālīnanti attho. Nava vāhasahassānīti ettha “catasso muṭṭhiyo eko kuḍuvo,
tika-vin01t1:529_11: cattāro kuḍuvā eko pattho, cattāro patthā eko āḷhako, cattāro āḷhakā ekaṃ doṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:529_12: cattāro doṇā ekamānikā, catasso mānikā ekakhārī, vīsati khāriyo eko vāho, tadeva
tika-vin01t1:529_13: ekaṃ sakaṭa”nti suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ. Idha pana “dve sakaṭāni eko vāho”ti
