tika-vin01t1:684_2: paṇṇākāre pesesi. Tadā sopi te disvā pasīditvā ativiya tuṭṭho “imehi atirekataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:684_3: kiṃ nāma mahagghaṃ paṭipaṇṇākāraṃ sahāyassa me pesessāmī”ti amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā
tika-vin01t1:684_4: laṅkādīpe abhisekaparihāraṃ pucchitvā “na tattha īdiso abhisekaparihāro atthī”ti
tika-vin01t1:684_5: sutvā “sādhu vata me sahāyassa abhisekaparihāraṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā sāmuddikasaṅkhādīni
tika-vin01t1:684_6: tīṇi saṅkhāni ca gaṅgodakañca aruṇavaṇṇamattikañca aṭṭhaṭṭha khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatikaññāyo
tika-vin01t1:684_7: ca suvaṇṇarajatalohamattikāmayaghaṭe ca aṭṭhahi seṭṭhikulehi saddhiṃ aṭṭha amaccakulāni
tika-vin01t1:684_8: cāti evaṃ sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma idha pesesi “imehi me sahāyassa puna abhisekaṃ karothā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:684_9: aññañca abhisekatthāya bahuṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesesi. Tena vuttaṃ “asokaraññā pesitena
tika-vin01t1:684_10: abhisekenā”ti. Eko māso abhisittassa assāti ekamāsābhisitto. Kathaṃ pana tassa tadā
tika-vin01t1:684_11: ekamāsābhisittatā viññāyatīti āha “visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ hissa abhisekamakaṃsū”ti, pubbe
tika-vin01t1:684_12: katābhisekassapi asokaraññā pesitena anagghena parihārena visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ puna
tika-vin01t1:696_0: Tadā pana tassa rañño visākhapuṇṇamāya abhisekassa katattā tato pabhuti yāvajjatanā
tika-vin01t1:696_2: – abhisekamaṅgalatthaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattassa maṇḍapassa anto katassa udumbarasākhamaṇḍapassa
tika-vin01t1:696_3: majjhe suppatiṭṭhite udumbarabhaddapīṭhamhi abhisekārahaṃ abhijaccaṃ khattiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:696_4: paṭhamaṃ tāva maṅgalābharaṇabhūsitā jātisampannā khattiyakaññā gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ sāmuddikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:696_5: dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhaṃ ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa
tika-vin01t1:696_6: muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva, taṃ sabbepi khattiyagaṇā
tika-vin01t1:696_7: attānamārakkhaṇatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu
tika-vin01t1:696_8: ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu khattiyagaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya
tika-vin01t1:696_9: sahitacitto hitasamamettacitto ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:697_0: Tato puna purohitopi purohiccaṭṭhānānurūpālaṅkārehi alaṅkatappaṭiyatto gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:697_1: rajatamayasaṅkhaṃ ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari ussāpetvā tena
tika-vin01t1:697_2: tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva, taṃ sabbepi brāhmaṇagaṇā
tika-vin01t1:697_3: attānamārakkhaṇatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu
tika-vin01t1:697_4: ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu brāhmaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto
tika-vin01t1:697_5: hitasamamettacitto ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:698_0: Tato puna seṭṭhipi seṭṭhiṭṭhānānurūpabhūsanabhūsito gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ ratanamayasaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:698_1: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:698_2: abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi gahapatigaṇā attānamārakkhaṇatthaṃ iminā
tika-vin01t1:698_3: abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena
tika-vin01t1:698_4: rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu gahapatigaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto hitasamamettacitto
tika-vin01t1:698_5: ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:699_0: Te pana tassa evaṃ vadantā “sace tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanānurūpena rajjaṃ kāressasi, iccetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:699_1: kusalaṃ. No ce kāressasi, tava muddhā sattadhā phalatū”ti evaṃ rañño abhisapanti
tika-vin01t1:699_2: viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana dīpe devānaṃpiyatissassa muddhani dhammāsokeneva
tika-vin01t1:699_4: abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcīti vadanti. Idañca yathāvuttaṃ abhisekavidhānaṃ majjhimanikāye
tika-vin01t1:699_6: rājūnaṃ suvaṇṇamayādīni tīṇi saṅkhāni ca gaṅgodakañca khattiyakaññañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”tiādinā vuttanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:700_0: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamānoti pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:700_1: ca sammodanīyaṃ “kacci bhante khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci vo appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ
tika-vin01t1:700_2: lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”ti evamādikathaṃ kathayamāno. Cha jane dassesīti raññā
tika-vin01t1:700_3: saddhiṃ āgatānaṃ “na ime yakkhā, manussā ime”ti sañjānanatthaṃ bhaṇḍukassa upāsakassa
tika-vin01t1:700_4: ānītattā tena saddhiṃ cha jane dassesi. Tevijjāti pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuāsavakkhayasaṅkhātāhi
tika-vin01t1:700_5: tīhi vijjāhi samannāgatā. Iddhippattāti iddhividhañāṇaṃ pattā. Cetopariyakovidāti
tika-vin01t1:700_6: paresaṃ cittācāre kusalā. Evamettha pañca abhiññā sarūpena vuttā, dibbasotaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:700_7: tāsaṃ vasena āgatameva hoti. Bahūti evarūpā chaḷabhiññā buddhasāvakā bahū gaṇanapathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:700_8: atikkantā sakalajambudīpaṃ kāsāvapajjotaṃ katvā vicarantīti. Keci pana “tevijjā iddhippattā
tika-vin01t1:700_9: ca khīṇāsavā cetopariyakovidā keci khīṇāsavāti visuṃ yojetvā ‘arahanto’ti iminā sukkhavipassakā vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:701_0: Paññāveyyattiyanti paññāpāṭavaṃ, paññāya tikkhavisadabhāvanti attho. Āsannanti āsanne
tika-vin01t1:701_1: ṭhitaṃ. Sādhu mahārāja paṇḍitosīti rājānaṃ pasaṃsati. Puna vīmaṃsanto “atthi pana
tika-vin01t1:701_2: te mahārājā”tiādimāha. Cūḷahatthipadopamasuttantaṃ kathesīti “ayaṃ rājā ‘ime samaṇā
tika-vin01t1:701_3: nāma īdisā, sīlādipaṭipatti ca tesaṃ īdisī’ti ca na jānāti, handa naṃ imāya cūḷahatthipadopamasuttantadesanāya
tika-vin01t1:701_4: samaṇabhāvūpagamanaṃ samaṇapaṭipattiñca viññāpessāmī”ti cintetvā paṭhamaṃ cūḷahatthipadopamasuttantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:702_0: “Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, idha tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno…pe…
tika-vin01t1:702_1: sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti, taṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:702_2: suṇāti gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṃ vā kule paccājāto, so taṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:702_3: sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati, so tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati
tika-vin01t1:702_4: ‘sambādho gharāvāso rajopatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā, nayidaṃ sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā
tika-vin01t1:702_5: ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ ekantaparisuddhaṃ saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ, yannūnāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:702_6: kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyya’nti.
tika-vin01t1:702_7: So aparena samayena appaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya
tika-vin01t1:702_8: appaṃ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahantaṃ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya kesamassuṃ ohāretvā
tika-vin01t1:702_9: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati.
tika-vin01t1:703_0: “So evaṃ pabbajito samāno bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā
tika-vin01t1:703_1: paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
tika-vin01t1:704: “Adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharatī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:705: Evamādinā sāsane saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ paṭiladdhasaddhehi ca pabbajjupagamanaṃ pabbajitehi ca paṭipajjitabbā sīlakkhandhādayo dhammā pakāsitā.
tika-vin01t1:706_0: Rājā suttantaṃ suṇantoyeva aññāsīti “so bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hoti,
tika-vin01t1:706_1: ekabhattiko hoti rattuparato virato vikālabhojanā”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ suttante āgatattā
tika-vin01t1:706_2: taṃ suṇantoyeva aññāsi. Idheva vasissāmāti na tāva rattiyā upaṭṭhitattā anāgatavacanamakāsi.
tika-vin01t1:706_3: Āgataphaloti anāgāmiphalaṃ sandhāyāha, sampattaanāgāmiphaloti attho. Tatoyeva ca
tika-vin01t1:706_4: visesato aviparītaviditasatthusāsanattā viññātasāsano. Idāni pabbajissatīti gihiliṅgena
tika-vin01t1:706_5: ānītakiccassa niṭṭhitattā evamāha. Acirapakkantassa raññoti raññe acirapakkanteti
tika-vin01t1:706_6: attho. Adhiṭṭhahitvāti antotambapaṇṇidīpe samāgatā suṇantūti adhiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-vin01t1:707_1: attho. Gahitā dāni imehi pathavīti āsanānaṃ pathaviyaṃ atthatattā evamāhaṃsu. Patiṭṭhahissatīti
tika-vin01t1:707_2: cintentoti ettha tena kāraṇena sāsanapatiṭṭhānassa abhāvato avassaṃ patiṭṭhahantassa
tika-vin01t1:707_3: sāsanassa pubbanimittamidanti evaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena sallakkhesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:707_4: Paṇītenāti uttamena. Sahatthāti sahatthena santappetvāti suṭṭhu tappetvā, paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:707_5: suhitaṃ yāvadatthaṃ katvāti attho. Petavatthuṃ vimānavatthuṃ saccasaṃyuttañca kathesīti
tika-vin01t1:707_6: desanāvidhikusalo thero janassa saṃvegaṃ janetuṃ paṭhamaṃ petavatthuṃ kathetvā tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:707_7: saṃvegajātaṃ janaṃ assāsetuṃ saggakathāvasena vimānavatthuñca kathetvā tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:707_8: paṭiladdhassāsānaṃ “mā ettha assādaṃ karotha nibbānaṃ vinā na aññaṃ kiñci saṅkhāragataṃ
tika-vin01t1:707_9: dhuvaṃ nāma atthi, tasmā paramassāsakaṃ nibbānamadhigantuṃ vāyamathā”ti saccapaṭivedhatthāya
tika-vin01t1:707_10: ussāhaṃ janento ante saccasaṃyuttaṃ kathesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:708_0: Tesaṃ sutvāti tesaṃ santikā therānaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā. Rañño saṃviditaṃ katvāti rañño
tika-vin01t1:708_1: nivedanaṃ katvā, rājānaṃ paṭivedayitvāti attho. Alaṃ gacchāmāti purassa accāsannattā
tika-vin01t1:708_2: sāruppaṃ na hotīti paṭipakkhipanto āha. Meghavanaṃ nāma uyyānanti mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:708_3: Tassa kira uyyānassa bhūmiggahaṇadivase akālamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā sabbataḷākapokkharaṇiyo
tika-vin01t1:708_4: pūrento gimhābhihatarukkhalatādīnaṃ anuggaṇhantova pāvassi, tena kāraṇena taṃ mahāmeghavanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:711_0: Sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvāti “kacci, bhante, idha sukhaṃ sayittha, tumhākaṃ idha
tika-vin01t1:711_1: nivāso sukha”nti evaṃ sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā tato therena “sukhasayitamhi, mahārāja,
tika-vin01t1:711_2: bhikkhūnaṃ phāsukamidaṃ uyyāna”nti vutte “evaṃ sati idaṃ no uyyānaṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā
tika-vin01t1:711_3: “kappati, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmo”ti pucchi. Imaṃ suttanti veḷuvanārāmapaṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin01t1:711_4: vuttamimaṃ suttaṃ. Udakanti dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ adāsīti “imaṃ mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:711_5: saṅghassa dammī”ti vatvā jeṭṭhamāsassa kāḷapakkhe dutiyadivase adāsi. Mahāvihārassa
tika-vin01t1:711_6: dakkhiṇodakapāteneva saddhiṃ patiṭṭhitabhāvepi na tāva tattha vihārakammaṃ niṭṭhitanti
tika-vin01t1:711_7: āha “idañca paṭhamaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Punadivasepīti kāḷapakkhassa dutiyadivaseyeva.
tika-vin01t1:711_8: Aḍḍhanavamānaṃ pāṇasahassānanti aḍḍhena navamānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ, pañcasatādhikānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:711_9: aṭṭhasahassānanti attho. Jotipātubhāvaṭṭhānanti ñāṇālokassa pātubhāvaṭṭhānaṃ. Appamādasuttanti
tika-vin01t1:712_0: Mahaccanti karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ, mahatā rājānubhāvenāti attho. Tumhe jānanatthanti
tika-vin01t1:712_1: sambandho. Ariṭṭho nāma amaccoti rañño bhāgineyyo ariṭṭho nāma amacco. Pañcapaṇṇāsāyāti
tika-vin01t1:712_2: ettha “catupaṇṇāsāyā”ti vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati upari vuccamānaṃ “dvāsaṭṭhi arahanto”ti
tika-vin01t1:712_3: vacanaṃ sameti. Teneva ca sīhaḷabhāsāya likhite mahāvaṃse “catupaṇṇāsāya saddhi”nti
tika-vin01t1:712_4: vuttaṃ. Dasabhātikasamākulaṃ rājakulanti muṭasivassa puttehi abhayo devānaṃpiyatisso
tika-vin01t1:712_5: mahānāgo uttiyo mattābhayo sūratissoti evamādīhi dasahi bhātikehi samākiṇṇaṃ rājakulaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:712_6: Cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsūti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivase raññā dinnavihāreyeva paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin01t1:712_7: pāṭipadadivase vassaṃ vasiṃsu. Pavāretvāti mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā. Kattikapuṇṇamāyanti
tika-vin01t1:712_8: aparakattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ. Mahāmahindatthero hi purimikāyaṃ upagantvā vutthavasso mahāpavāraṇāya
tika-vin01t1:712_9: pavāretvā tato ekamāsaṃ atikkamma cātumāsiniyaṃ puṇṇamadivase ariyagaṇaparivuto rājakulaṃ
tika-vin01t1:712_11: Evañca katvā vakkhati “puṇṇamāyaṃ mahāvīro, cātumāsiniyā idhā”ti. Yaṃ panettha kenaci
tika-vin01t1:712_12: vuttaṃ “vutthavasso pavāretvāti cātumāsiniyā pavāraṇāyāti attho, paṭhamapavāraṇāya
tika-vin01t1:712_13: vā pavāretvā ekamāsaṃ tattheva vasitvā kattikapuṇṇamiyaṃ avoca, aññathā ‘puṇṇamāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:712_14: mahāvīro’ti vuttattā na sakkā gahetu”nti, tattha cātumāsiniyā pavāraṇāyāti ayamatthavikappo
tika-vin01t1:712_15: na yujjati. Na hi purimikāya vassūpagatā cātumāsiniyaṃ pavārenti. Ciradiṭṭho sammāsambuddhoti
tika-vin01t1:712_16: satthussa sarīrāvayavo ca sammāsambuddhoyevāti katvā avayave samudāyavohāravasena
tika-vin01t1:713_0: Therena vuttampi gamanakāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā idha vāse payojanameva dassetvā gamanaṃ paṭisedhetukāmo
tika-vin01t1:713_1: āha “ahaṃ bhante tumhe”tiādi. Abhivādanādīsu ācariyaṃ disvā abhivādanakaraṇaṃ abhivādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:713_2: nāma. Yasmiṃ vā disābhāge ācariyo vasati iriyāpathe kappento, tato abhimukhova vanditvā
tika-vin01t1:713_3: gacchati, vanditvā tiṭṭhati, vanditvā nisīdati, vanditvā nipajjati, idaṃ abhivādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:713_4: nāma. Ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:713_5: Ācariyaṃ pana disvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīse ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ namassati, yasmiṃ disābhāge
tika-vin01t1:713_6: so vasati, tadabhimukhopi tatheva namassati, gacchantopi ṭhitopi nisinnopi añjaliṃ
tika-vin01t1:713_7: paggayha namassatiyevāti idaṃ añjalikammaṃ nāma. Anucchavikakammassa pana karaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:713_8: sāmīcikaraṇaṃ nāma. Cīvarādīsu hi cīvaraṃ dento na yaṃ vā taṃ vā deti, mahagghaṃ
tika-vin01t1:713_10: eseva nayo. Idaṃ sāmīcikaraṇaṃ nāma. Sarīradhātuyoti sarīrāvayavā. Aññātanti aññātaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:713_11: viditaṃ mayāti attho. Kuto lacchāmāti kuto labhissāma. Sumanena saddhiṃ mantehīti
tika-vin01t1:713_12: paṭhamameva sāmaṇerassa kathitattā vā “jānāti esa amhākamadhippāya”nti ñatvā vā evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:714_0: Appossukko tvaṃ mahārājāti mahārāja tvaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭilābhe mā ussukkaṃ karohi, mā
tika-vin01t1:714_1: tvaṃ tattha vāvaṭo bhava, aññaṃ tayā kattabbaṃ karohīti adhippāyo. Idāni tadeva raññā
tika-vin01t1:714_3: kaṃsatāḷāditāḷaṃ avacarati etthāti tāḷāvacaraṃ vuccati ātatavitatādi sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:714_4: Teneva parinibbānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbañca tāḷāvacaraṃ sannipātethāti ettha sabbañca
tika-vin01t1:714_5: tāḷāvacaranti sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ. Ettha pana sahacaraṇanayena sabbatūriyabhaṇḍānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:714_6: vādakāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭantīti te sabbe upaṭṭhāpetvā sannipātetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Lacchasīti
tika-vin01t1:714_7: labhissasi. Therā cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsūti rājanivesanato nikkhamitvā puna cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:715_0: Tāvadevāti taṃ khaṇaṃyeva. Pāṭaliputtadvāreti pāṭaliputtanagaradvāre. Kiṃ bhante
tika-vin01t1:715_1: sumana āhiṇḍasīti sumana tvaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā kasmā vicarasīti pucchati. Cetiyagirimhiyeva
tika-vin01t1:715_2: patiṭṭhāpetvāti pacchā tattha vihāratthāya ākaṅkhitabbabhāvato cetiyagirimhiyeva
tika-vin01t1:715_3: patiṭṭhāpetvā. Vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāyāti pacchābhattanti attho. Pacchābhattameva hi
tika-vin01t1:715_4: chāyā vaḍḍhati. Athassa etadahosīti dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ disvā evaṃ cintesi. Chattaṃ apanamatūti
tika-vin01t1:715_5: idaṃ setacchattaṃ sayameva me sīsoparito dhātucaṅkoṭakābhimukhaṃ hutvā namatūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:715_6: Mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhātūti idaṃ dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ therassa hatthato dhātuyā saha
tika-vin01t1:715_7: āgantvā sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātūti attho. Pokkharavassaṃ nāma pokkharapattappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:715_8: valāhakamajjhe uṭṭhahitvā kamena pharitvā temetukāmeyeva temayamānaṃ mahantaṃ hutvā
tika-vin01t1:715_9: vassati. Mahāvīroti mahāparakkamo. Mahāvīrāvayavattā cettha satthuvohārena dhātuyo
tika-vin01t1:715_10: eva niddiṭṭhā. Dhātusarīrenāgamanañhi sandhāya ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:716_0: Pacchimadisābhimukhova hutvā apasakkantoti piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoyeva pacchimadisābhimukho
tika-vin01t1:716_1: hutvā osakkanto, gacchantoti attho. Kiñcāpi esa pacchimadisaṃ na oloketi, tathāpi
tika-vin01t1:716_2: pacchimadisaṃ sandhāya gacchatīti “pacchimadisābhimukho”ti vuttaṃ. Puratthimena dvārena
tika-vin01t1:716_3: nagaraṃ pavisitvāti ettha piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoyeva āgantvā dvāre sampatte parivattetvā
tika-vin01t1:716_4: ujukeneva nagaraṃ pāvisīti veditabbaṃ. Mahejavatthu nāmāti mahejanāmakena yakkhena
tika-vin01t1:716_5: pariggahitaṃ ekaṃ devaṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ. Paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānanti ettha paribhuttūpakaraṇāni
tika-vin01t1:716_6: nidahitvā kataṃ cetiyaṃ paribhogacetiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tividhañhi cetiyaṃ vadanti
tika-vin01t1:716_7: paribhogacetiyaṃ dhātucetiyaṃ dhammacetiyanti. Tattha paribhogacetiyaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin01t1:716_8: Dhātucetiyaṃ pana dhātuyo nidahitvā kataṃ. Paṭiccasamuppādādilikhitapotthakaṃ nidahitvā
tika-vin01t1:716_9: kataṃ pana dhammacetiyaṃ nāma. Sārīrikaṃ paribhogikaṃ uddissakanti evampi tippabhedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:716_10: cetiyaṃ vadanti. Ayaṃ pana pabhedo paṭimārūpassapi uddissakacetiyeneva saṅgahitattā
tika-vin01t1:717_0: Kathaṃ pana idaṃ ṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ ahosīti āha “atīte
tika-vin01t1:717_1: kirā”tiādi. Pajjarakenāti ettha pajjarako nāma rogo vuccati. So ca yakkhānubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:717_2: samuppannoti veditabbo. Tadā kira puṇṇakāḷo nāma yakkho attano ānubhāvena manussānampi
tika-vin01t1:717_3: sarīre pajjarakaṃ nāma rogaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāvaṃse –
tika-vin01t1:720: “Rakkhasā ca bahū tattha, pajjarā ca samuṭṭhitā;
tika-vin01t1:722_0: Anayabyasananti ettha anayoti avaḍḍhi. Kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ byasati vikkhipati
tika-vin01t1:722_1: vināsetīti byasananti dukkhaṃ vuccati. Kiñcāpi “buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento”ti
tika-vin01t1:722_2: vuttaṃ, tathāpi “te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā”ti vacanato paṭhamaṃ buddhacakkhunā
tika-vin01t1:722_3: lokaṃ oloketvā pacchā sabbaññutaññāṇena lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante
tika-vin01t1:722_4: disvāti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi āsayānusayādibuddhacakkhussa te sattā anayabyasanaṃ āpajjantā
tika-vin01t1:722_5: dissanti. Dubbuṭṭhikāti visamavassādivasena duṭṭhā asobhanā vuṭṭhiyeva dubbuṭṭhikā,
tika-vin01t1:722_6: sassuppattihetubhūtā kāyasukhuppattisappāyā sattupakārā sammā vuṭṭhi tattha na hotīti
tika-vin01t1:722_7: adhippāyo. Tatoyeva ca “dubbhikkhaṃ dussassa”nti vuttaṃ. Bhikkhāya abhāvo, dullabhabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:722_8: vā dubbhikkhaṃ, sulabhā tattha bhikkhā na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sassānaṃ abhāvo, asampannatā
tika-vin01t1:722_9: vā dussassaṃ. Devoti meghassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sammādhāramanupavecchīti udakadhāraṃ sammā
tika-vin01t1:723_0: Mahāvivādo hotīti tasmiṃ kira kāle jayantamahārājena ca tassa rañño kaniṭṭhabhātukena
tika-vin01t1:723_1: samiddhakumāranāmakena uparājena ca saddhiṃ imasmiṃ dīpe mahāyuddhaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:723_2: Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena maṇḍadīpe mahāvivādo hotī”ti. Hotīti kiriyā
tika-vin01t1:723_3: kālamapekkhitvā vattamānapayogo, vivādassa pana atītakālikattaṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”ti
tika-vin01t1:723_4: imināva viññāyati. Saddantarasannidhānena hettha atītakālāvagamo yathā “bhāsate vaḍḍhate
tika-vin01t1:723_5: tadā”ti. Evaṃ sabbattha īdisesu ṭhānesu vattamānapayogo daṭṭhabbo. Kalahaviggahajātāti
tika-vin01t1:723_6: ettha kalaho nāma matthakappatto kāyakalahopi vācākalahopi. Tattha hatthaparāmāsādivasena
tika-vin01t1:723_7: kāyena kātabbo kalaho kāyakalaho. Mammaghaṭṭanādivasena vācāya kātabbo kalaho vācākalaho.
tika-vin01t1:723_8: Vipaccanīkagahaṇaṃ viggaho. Kalahassa pubbabhāge uppanno aññamaññaviruddhagāho. Atha
tika-vin01t1:723_9: vā kalaho nāma vācākalaho. Aññamaññaṃ hatthaparāmāsādivasena virūpaṃ viruddhaṃ vā
tika-vin01t1:723_10: gahaṇaṃ viggaho kāyakalaho. Yathāvutto kalaho ca viggaho ca jāto sañjāto etesanti
tika-vin01t1:724_1: sāsanassa antaradhānena dhātuparinibbāne sati tāni cetiyāni vinassanti. Tīṇi hi parinibbānāni
tika-vin01t1:724_2: kilesaparinibbānaṃ khandhaparinibbānaṃ dhātuparinibbānanti, tāni pana amhākaṃ bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:724_3: vasena evaṃ veditabbāni. Tassa hi kilesaparinibbānaṃ bodhipallaṅke ahosi, khandhaparinibbānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:724_4: kusinārāyaṃ. Dhātuparinibbānaṃ anāgate bhavissati. Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:724_5: tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti, mahācetiyato nāgadīpe
tika-vin01t1:724_6: rājāyatanacetiyaṃ, tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ gamissanti, nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi
tika-vin01t1:724_7: brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti, sāsapamattāpi dhātu na antarā
tika-vin01t1:724_8: nassissati. Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanā
tika-vin01t1:724_9: hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjessanti, tā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharissanti. Tato
tika-vin01t1:724_10: dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā sannipatitvā “ajja satthā parinibbāti, ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati,
tika-vin01t1:724_11: pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:724_12: kāruññaṃ karissanti, ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin01t1:724_13: Dhātūsu tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati, sāsapamattiyāpi dhātuyā
tika-vin01t1:724_14: sati ekajālāva bhavissati, dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu paricchijjissati. Evaṃ mahantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:724_15: ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t1:725_0: Divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhatīti divā vatthuvicinanāya okāsaṃ kurumāno
tika-vin01t1:725_1: tato dhātuṃ gahetvā kumbhe ṭhapetvā sadhātukova hutvā tiṭṭhatīti vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāvaṃse –
tika-vin01t1:728_0: Thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ pariyāyatīti matthakato dhātuṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā sadhātukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:728_1: thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ rattibhāge pariyāyati, samantato vicaratīti attho. Jaṅghappamāṇanti
tika-vin01t1:728_2: pupphaṭṭhānappamāṇaṃ. Thūpakucchito heṭṭhābhāgañhi thūpassa jaṅghāti vadanti. Dhātuoropanatthāyāti
tika-vin01t1:728_3: hatthikumbhato dhātukaraṇḍakassa oropanatthāya. Sakalanagarañca janapado cāti nagaravāsino
tika-vin01t1:728_4: janapadavāsino ca abhedato nagarajanapadasaddehi vuttā “sabbo gāmo āgato, mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:728_5: karontī”tiādīsu viya. Mahājanakāyeti mahājanasamūhe. Samūhapariyāyo hettha kāyasaddo.
tika-vin01t1:728_6: Ekekadhātuppadesato tejodakanikkhamanādivasena yamakayamakaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:728_7: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ. Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ rasmiyo cāti sambandho kātabbo. Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:728_8: udakadhārā cāti evampettha sambandhaṃ vadanti. Parinibbutepi bhagavati tassānubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:728_9: evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyamahosiyevāti dassetuṃ “evaṃ acintiyā”tiādigāthamāha. Buddhadhammāti ettha buddhaguṇā.
tika-vin01t1:729_0: Dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ āgamāsīti bhagavā kira abhisambodhito navame māse phussapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin01t1:729_1: yakkhādhivāsaṃ laṅkādīpamupagantvā laṅkāmajjhe tiyojanāyate yojanavitthate mahānāgavanuyyāne
tika-vin01t1:729_5: ca yakkhānaṃ bhayaṃ santāsaṃ janetvā tehi yācitābhayo “detha me samaggā nisīdanaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin01t1:729_6: vatvā “dema te sakaladīpaṃ, dehi no, mārisa, abhaya”nti vutte sabbaṃ taṃ upaddavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:729_7: antaradhāpetvā yakkhadattabhūmiyā cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha nisinno samantato
tika-vin01t1:729_9: samantā velante bhamantānaṃ yakkhānaṃ giridīpaṃ dassetvā tesu tattha patiṭṭhitesu
tika-vin01t1:729_10: taṃ yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ saṅkhipitvā nisinno tadā samāgate anekadevatāsannipāte
tika-vin01t1:729_11: dhammaṃ desetvā anekapāṇakoṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ katvā sumanakūṭavāsinā mahāsumanadevarājena
tika-vin01t1:729_12: samadhigatasotāpattiphalena yācitapūjanīyo sīsaṃ parāmasitvā muṭṭhimattā nīlāmalakesadhātuyo
tika-vin01t1:730_0: Dutiyaṃ abhisambodhito pañcame saṃvacchare cūḷodaramahodarānaṃ jalathalanivāsīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:730_1: mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ nāgarājūnaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ nissāya upaṭṭhitamahāsaṅgāme nāgānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:730_2: mahāvināsaṃ disvā cittamāsakāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase pātova samiddhasumanena nāma
tika-vin01t1:730_3: rukkhadevaputtena chattaṃ katvā dhāritarājāyatano nāgadīpaṃ samāgantvā saṅgāmamajjhe
tika-vin01t1:730_4: ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno ghorandhakārena nāge santāsetvā assāsento ālokaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t1:730_5: sañjātapītisomanassānaṃ upagatanāgānaṃ sāmaggikaraṇīyaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā mātulabhāgineyyehi
tika-vin01t1:730_6: dvīhi nāgarājūhi pūjite pathavītalagate maṇipallaṅke nisinno nāgehi dibbannapānehi
tika-vin01t1:730_7: santappito jalathalanivāsino asītikoṭināge saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi
tika-vin01t1:730_8: namassituṃ pallaṅkañca rājāyatanapādapañca tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā jambudīpamagamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:731_0: Tatiyampi abhisambodhito aṭṭhame saṃvacchare mahodaramātulena maṇiakkhikanāgarājenābhiyācito
tika-vin01t1:731_2: tattha māpitaruciraratanamaṇḍape manoharavarapallaṅke nisinno nāgarājena dibbannapānehi
tika-vin01t1:731_3: santappetvā nāgamāṇavikagaṇaparivutena dibbamālāgandhādīhi pūjito tattha dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:731_4: desetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā sumanakūṭe padaṃ dassetvā pabbatapāde divāvihāraṃ katvā dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:731_5: ca mubhiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇīcetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhiṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:731_6: ca mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca sasāvako nisīditvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā silācetiyaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin01t1:731_7: ṭhatvā devanāge samanusāsitvā jambudīpamagamāsi. Evaṃ bhagavā dharamānakālepi imaṃ
tika-vin01t1:732_0: Idāni tadeva tikkhattumāgamanaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvento āha “paṭhamaṃ yakkhadamanattha”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:732_1: Rakkhaṃ karontoti yakkhānaṃ puna apavisanatthāya rakkhaṃ karonto. Āvijjīti samantato
tika-vin01t1:732_2: vicari. Mātulabhāgineyyānanti cūḷodaramahodarānaṃ. Ettha pana kiñcāpi bhagavā samiddhasumanena
tika-vin01t1:732_3: nāma devaputtena saddhiṃ āgato, tathāpi pacchāsamaṇena ekenapi bhikkhunā saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:732_4: anāgatattā “ekakova āgantvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadanurūpassa paripanthassa vihatattā “pariḷāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:732_5: vūpasametvā”ti vuttaṃ. Rañño bhātāti rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā. Abhayoti mattābhayo.
tika-vin01t1:733_0: Anuḷā devīti rañño jeṭṭhabhātujāyā anuḷā devī. Purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:733_1: bodhi patiṭṭhāsīti yadā hi so kakusandho nāma bhagavā imasmiṃ dīpe manusse pajjarakābhibhūte
tika-vin01t1:733_2: anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā karuṇāya sañcoditahadayo imaṃ dīpamāgato, tadā taṃ rogabhayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:733_3: vūpasametvā sannipatitānaṃ dhammaṃ desento caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:733_4: katvā sāyanhasamaye bodhipatiṭṭhānārahaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-vin01t1:733_5: vuṭṭhāya “mama sirīsamahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya rucanandā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū”ti
tika-vin01t1:733_6: adhiṭṭhāsi. Sā satthu cittaṃ ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva khemavatīrājadhāniyā khemarājānamādāya
tika-vin01t1:733_7: mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ khemarājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:733_8: chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīhi ceva devatāhi
tika-vin01t1:733_9: ca parivāritā iddhiyā idhānetvā tathāgatena pasārite dakkhiṇahatthe sasuvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:733_10: mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ tathāgato abhayassa nāma rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahātitthavana”nti
tika-vin01t1:734_0: Koṇāgamano ca bhagavā dubbuṭṭhipīḷite dīpavāsino disvā imaṃ dīpamāgato taṃ bhayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:734_1: vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pubbabodhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:734_3: bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū”ti cintesi. Sā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ viditvā taṅkhaṇaññeva
tika-vin01t1:734_5: sobharājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā hemakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīhi
tika-vin01t1:734_6: saddhiṃ suragaṇaparivutā iddhiyā idhāharitvā satthārā pasāritadakkhiṇapāṇitale sahemakaṭāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:734_7: mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ tathāgato samiddhassa rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahānāgavana”nti
tika-vin01t1:735_0: Kassapopi ca bhagavā upaṭṭhitarājūparājayuddhena pāṇino vināsaṃ disvā karuṇāya codito
tika-vin01t1:735_1: imaṃ dīpamāgantvā taṃ kalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni
tika-vin01t1:735_2: maggaphalaṃ pāpetvā mahābodhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:735_4: adhiṭṭhāsi. Sā bhagavato cittaṃ viditvā taṅkhaṇaññeva bārāṇasīrājadhāniyā brahmadattarājānamādāya
tika-vin01t1:735_5: mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ brahmadattena dāpetvā taṃ
tika-vin01t1:735_6: sayaṃ chijjitvā kanakakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīparivārā devagaṇaparivutā
tika-vin01t1:735_7: iddhiyā ettha ānetvā munindena pasārite dakkhiṇakaratale sasuvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ mahābodhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:735_8: ṭhapesi. Taṃ bhagavā jayantarañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahāsālavana”nti saṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:735_9: gate mahāmeghavanuyyāne mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ imasmiṃ dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:735_10: sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ sandhāya evamāha “imasmiñca mahārāja dīpe
tika-vin01t1:736_1: vissajjentena. Atha vā ito cito ca saṃsaraṇato sarasaṃ sajīvaṃ jīvamānaṃ viya raṃsijālaṃ
tika-vin01t1:736_2: vissajjentena. Atha vā sarasakāle dharamānakāle buddhena viya raṃsijālaṃ muñcantenāti
tika-vin01t1:736_3: evamettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Ekadivaseneva agamāsīti sambandho. Pañcahi kaññāsatehīti
tika-vin01t1:736_4: attano paricārikehi pañcahi kaññāsatehi. Upassayaṃ kārāpetvāti bhikkhunupassayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:736_5: kārāpetvā. Appesīti lekhasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Evañca avocāti rājasandesaṃ appetvā
tika-vin01t1:736_6: therassa mukhasāsanaṃ viññāpento evaṃ avoca. Udikkhatīti apekkhati pattheti.
tika-vin01t1:737_0: Chinnahatthaṃ viyāti chinnahatthavantaṃ viya. Chinnā hatthā etassāti chinnahatthoti
tika-vin01t1:737_1: aññapadatthasamāso daṭṭhabbo. Pabbajjāpurekkhārāti pabbajjābhimukhā, pabbajjāya sañjātābhilāsā
tika-vin01t1:737_2: “kadā nu kho pabbajissāmī”ti tattha ussukkamāpannāti vuttaṃ hoti. Maṃ paṭimānetīti
tika-vin01t1:737_3: maṃ udikkhati. Satthena ghātaṃ na arahatīti asatthaghātārahaṃ. Himavalāhakagabbhanti
tika-vin01t1:738_0: Magganti sattayojanikaṃ maggaṃ. Paṭijaggāpetvāti sodhāpetvā, khāṇukaṇṭakādīni harāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:738_1: tattha bahalavipulavālukaṃ okirāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kammāravaṇṇanti rañño pakatisuvaṇṇakāravaṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:738_4: nayena attho veditabbo. Tihatthavikkhambhanti tihatthappamāṇavitthāraṃ. Samussitadhajapaṭākanti
tika-vin01t1:738_7: sajjitaṃ. Nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇanti upahāravasena upanītehi nānappakārehi vaṇṇagandhasampannehi
tika-vin01t1:738_9: Avasesaṃ adassanaṃ agamāsīti ettha “handa, mahārāja, tayā gahetabbā ayaṃ sākhā, tassa
tika-vin01t1:738_10: upanissayabhūto ayaṃ khandho, na mayaṃ tayā gahetabbā”ti vadantā viya avasesā sākhā
tika-vin01t1:738_11: satthu tejasā adassanamagamaṃsūti vadanti. Gavakkhajālasadisanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:738_12: jālakavāṭasadisaṃ katvāti attho. Celukkhepasatasahassāni pavattiṃsūti tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:738_13: janānaṃ sīsopari bhamantānaṃ uttarāsaṅgacelānaṃ ukkhepasatasahassāni pavattiṃsūti
tika-vin01t1:738_14: attho. Mūlasatenāti dasasu lekhāsu ekekāya dasa dasa hutvā nikkhantamūlasatena. Dasa
tika-vin01t1:739_0: Devadundubhiyo phaliṃsūti devadundubhiyo thaniṃsu. Devadundubhīti ca na ettha kāci
tika-vin01t1:739_1: bherī adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena ākāsagato nigghosasaddo. Devoti hi megho.
tika-vin01t1:739_2: Tassa hi acchabhāvena ākāsavaṇṇassa devassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante
tika-vin01t1:739_3: devadundubhīti samaññā, tasmā devadundubhiyo phaliṃsūti devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjīti
tika-vin01t1:739_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Pabbatānaṃ naccehīti pathavīkampena ito cito ca bhamantānaṃ pabbatānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:739_5: naccehi. Yakkhānaṃ hiṅkārehīti vimhayajātānaṃ yakkhānaṃ vimhayappakāsanavasena pavattehi
tika-vin01t1:739_6: hiṅkārasaddehi. Yakkhā hi vimhayajātā “hiṃ hi”nti saddaṃ nicchārenti. Thutijappehīti
tika-vin01t1:739_7: pasaṃsāvacanehi. Brahmānaṃ apphoṭanehīti pītisomanassajātānaṃ brahmānaṃ bāhāyaṃ paharaṇasaṅkhātehi
tika-vin01t1:739_8: apphoṭanehi. Pītisomanassajātā hi brahmāno vāmahatthaṃ samiñjitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena
tika-vin01t1:739_9: bāhāyaṃ pahāraṃ denti. Ekakolāhalanti ekato pavattakolāhalaṃ. Ekaninnādanti ekato
tika-vin01t1:739_10: pavattanigghosaṃ. Phalato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo ujukaṃ uggantvā onamitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamukhavaṭṭiṃ
tika-vin01t1:739_11: āhacca tiṭṭhantīti āha “sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ratanagopānasīvinaddhaṃ viya kurumānā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:739_12: Taṅkhaṇato ca pana pabhutīti vuttanayena suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitassa mahābodhissa
tika-vin01t1:739_13: chabbaṇṇarasmīnaṃ vissajjitakālato pabhuti. Himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsīti
tika-vin01t1:739_14: suvaṇṇakaṭāheneva saddhiṃ uggantvā himodakapuṇṇaṃ valāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:739_15: Paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitoyeva hi bodhi pacchā vuttappakāraacchariyapaṭimaṇḍito
tika-vin01t1:739_16: hutvā himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Teneva vakkhati “paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe
tika-vin01t1:739_17: patiṭṭhahi, tato himagabbhasattāhaṃ abhisekasattāhañca vītināmetvā”tiādi. Tatoyeva
tika-vin01t1:756: Tasmā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitoyeva bodhi kaṭāheneva saddhi uggantvā himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:757: Heṭṭhā pana bhagavato adhiṭṭhānakkamaṃ dassentena yaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:758_1: asokamahārājā mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ gamissati, tadā mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā sayameva
tika-vin01t1:759: “Tattha patiṭṭhānakāle ca ‘mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā tiṭṭhatū’ti adhiṭṭhāsi, idaṃ dutiyamadhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:760: “Sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanto pattehi ca phalehi ca chabbaṇṇarasmiyo muñcatūti adhiṭṭhāsi, idaṃ tatiyamadhiṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:761_0: Taṃ iminā na sameti. Tattha hi paṭhamaṃ himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā pacchā sattame
tika-vin01t1:761_1: divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjanaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanañca
tika-vin01t1:761_2: vuttaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāya pubbenāparaṃ na sameti. Mahāvaṃse pana adhiṭṭhānepi paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:761_3: suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanaṃ pacchāyeva chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjanaṃ himavalāhakagabbhapavisanañca. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:770: Bodhivaṃsepi ca ayameva adhiṭṭhānakkamo vutto, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto adhiṭṭhānakkamo yathā pubbenāparaṃ na virujjhati, tathā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:771_0: Himañca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca āvattitvā mahābodhimeva pavisiṃsūti mahābodhiṃ paṭicchādetvā
tika-vin01t1:771_1: ṭhitaṃ himañca bodhito nikkhantachabbaṇṇarasmiyo ca āvattitvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimeva
tika-vin01t1:771_2: pavisiṃsu, bodhipaviṭṭhā viya hutvā antarahitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha pana “himañca
tika-vin01t1:771_3: raṃsiyo cā”ti ayameva pāṭho satasodhitasammate porāṇapotthake sesesu ca sabbapotthakesu
tika-vin01t1:773: Pavisiṃsu mahābodhiṃ, sabbā tā raṃsiyopi cā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:774_0: Kenaci pana “pañca raṃsiyo”ti pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbadisāhi pañca rasmiyo
tika-vin01t1:774_1: āvattitvāti pañcahi phalehi nikkhantattā pañca, tā pana chabbaṇṇāvā”ti, taṃ tassa
tika-vin01t1:774_3: paripuṇṇakhandhasākhāpasākhāhi ceva pañcahi ca phalehi paṭimaṇḍito, samantato vibhūsitoti
tika-vin01t1:774_4: attho. Abhisekaṃ datvāti anotattodakena abhisekaṃ datvā. Mahābodhiṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsīti
tika-vin01t1:775_1: dvisattāhe jāte uposatho sampattoti āha “kāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase”ti, assayujamāsakāḷapakkhassa
tika-vin01t1:775_2: cātuddasīuposatheti attho. Pācīnamahāsālamūle ṭhapesīti nagarassa pācīnadisābhāge
tika-vin01t1:775_3: jātassa mahāsālarukkhassa heṭṭhā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha ṭhapesi. Sattarasame divaseti
tika-vin01t1:775_4: pāṭipadadivasato dutiyadivase. Kattikachaṇapūjaṃ addasāti kattikachaṇavasena bodhissa
tika-vin01t1:775_5: kariyamānaṃ pūjaṃ sumanasāmaṇero addasa, disvā ca āgato sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
tika-vin01t1:775_6: Taṃ sandhāyeva ca thero bodhiāharaṇatthaṃ pesesi.
tika-vin01t1:776_0: Aṭṭhārasa devatākulānīti mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni datvāti
tika-vin01t1:776_1: sambandho. Amaccakulāni bodhissa kattabbavicāraṇatthāya adāsi, brāhmaṇakulāni lokasammatattā
tika-vin01t1:776_3: adāsi. “Gopakā rājakammino tathā taracchā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade pana
tika-vin01t1:776_6: kāliṅgā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Kaliṅgesu janapade jātisampannakulaṃ kāliṅgakula”nti
tika-vin01t1:776_7: keci. Iminā parivārenāti sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, iminā vuttappakāraparivārena saddhinti
tika-vin01t1:776_8: attho. Viñjhāṭaviṃ samatikkammāti rājā sayampi mahābodhissa paccuggamanaṃ karonto
tika-vin01t1:776_9: senaṅgaparivuto thalapathena gacchanto viñjhāṭaviṃ nāma aṭaviṃ atikkamitvā. Tāmalittiṃ
tika-vin01t1:776_10: anuppattoti tāmalittiṃ nāma titthaṃ sampatto. Idamassa tatiyanti suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitamahābodhissa
tika-vin01t1:776_11: rajjasampadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato pubbe panesa ekavāraṃ saddhāya sakalajambudīparajjena
tika-vin01t1:776_12: mahābodhiṃ pūjesiyeva, tasmā tena saddhiṃ catutthamidaṃ rajjasampadānaṃ. Mahābodhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:776_13: pana yasmiṃ yasmiṃ divase rajjena pūjesi, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ divase sakalajambudīparajjato
tika-vin01t1:777_2: imasmiṃ dīpe pavattamānavohāraṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Tattha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-vin01t1:777_3: aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti vohārassa pavattattā tena vohārena “dutiyapāṭipadadivase”ti
tika-vin01t1:777_4: vattabbaṃ siyā. Tattha hi kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ “paṭhamapāṭipada”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:777_5: Ukkhipitvāti mahāsālamūle dinnehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ ukkhipitvāti
tika-vin01t1:777_6: vadanti. Gacchati vatareti ettha areti khede. Tenevāha “kanditvā”ti, bodhiyā adassanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:777_7: asahamāno roditvā paridevitvāti attho. Sarasaraṃsijālanti ettha pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t1:777_8: attho veditabbo. Mahābodhisamāruḷhāti mahābodhinā samāruḷhā. Passato passatoti anādare
tika-vin01t1:777_9: sāmivacanaṃ, passantassevāti attho. Mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhantāti mahāsamuddassa udakatalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:777_10: pakkhandi. Samantā yojananti samantato ekekena passena yojanappamāṇe padese. Accantasaṃyoge
tika-vin01t1:777_11: cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Vīciyo vūpasantāti vīciyo na uṭṭhahiṃsu, nāhesunti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:777_12: Pavajjiṃsūti viraviṃsu, nādaṃ pavattayiṃsūti attho. Rukkhādisannissitāhīti ettha
tika-vin01t1:778_0: Supaṇṇarūpenāti supaṇṇasadisena rūpena. Nāgakulāni santāsesīti mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_1: āgatāni nāgakulāni santāsesi, tesaṃ bhayaṃ uppādetvā palāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tadā
tika-vin01t1:778_2: hi samuddavāsino nāgā mahābodhiṃ gahetuṃ vātavassandhakārādīhi mahantaṃ vikubbanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_3: akaṃsu. Tato saṅghamittattherī garuḷavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā tena garuḷarūpena ākāsaṃ pūrayamānā
tika-vin01t1:778_4: sikhāmarīcijālena gaganaṃ ekandhakāraṃ katvā pakkhappahāravātena mahāsamuddaṃ āloḷetvā
tika-vin01t1:778_5: saṃvaṭṭajaladhinādasadisena ravena nāgānaṃ hadayāni bhindantī viya tāsetvā nāge palāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:778_6: Te ca utrastarūpā nāgā āgantvāti te ca vuttanayena uttāsitā nāgā puna āgantvā. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_7: vibhūtinti taṃ iddhipāṭihāriyasaṅkhātaṃ vibhūtiṃ, taṃ acchariyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Therī
tika-vin01t1:778_8: yācitvāti “ayye, amhākaṃ bhagavā mucalindanāgarājassa bhogāvaliṃ attano gandhakuṭiṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_9: katvā sattāhaṃ tassa saṅgahaṃ akāsi. Abhisambujjhanadivase nerañjarānadītīre attano
tika-vin01t1:778_10: ucchiṭṭhapattaṃ mahākāḷanāgassa vissajjesi. Uruvelanāgena māpitaṃ visadhūmadahanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_11: agaṇetvā tassa saraṇasīlābharaṇamadāsi. Mahāmoggallānattheraṃ pesetvā nandopanandanāgarājānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_12: dametvā nibbisaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ so lokanāyako amhākaṃ upakārako, tvampi no dosamassaritvā
tika-vin01t1:778_13: muhuttaṃ mahābodhiṃ vissajjetvā nāgalokassa saggamokkhamaggaṃ sampādehī”ti evaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin01t1:778_15: imassa pariyāyavacanamattaṃ roditvāti, guṇakittanavasena vā punappunaṃ roditvā, vilāpaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:779_0: Uttaradvāratoti anurādhapurassa uttaradvārato. Maggaṃ sodhāpetvāti khāṇukaṇṭakādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:779_1: uddharāpanavasena maggaṃ sodhāpetvā. Alaṅkārāpetvāti vālukādīnaṃ okirāpanādivasena
tika-vin01t1:779_2: sajjetvā. Samuddasālavatthusminti samuddāsannasālāya vatthubhūte padese. Tasmiṃ kira
tika-vin01t1:779_3: padese ṭhitehi samuddassa diṭṭhattā taṃ acchariyaṃ pakāsetuṃ tattha ekā sālā katā.
tika-vin01t1:784_0: Tāya vibhūtiyāti tāya vuttappakārāya pūjāsakkārādisampattiyā. Therassāti mahāmahindattherassa.
tika-vin01t1:784_1: Maggassa kira ubhosu passesu antarantarā pupphehi kūṭāgārasadisasaṇṭhānāni pupphacetiyāni
tika-vin01t1:784_2: kārāpesi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “antarantare pupphaagghiyāni ṭhapento”ti. Āgato
tika-vin01t1:784_3: vatareti ettha areti pasaṃsāyaṃ, sādhu vatāti attho. Soḷasahi jātisampannakulehīti
tika-vin01t1:784_4: aṭṭhahi amaccakulehi aṭṭhahi ca brāhmaṇakulehīti evaṃ soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi.
tika-vin01t1:784_5: Samuddatīre mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvāti samuddavelātale alaṅkatappaṭiyatte ramaṇīye maṇḍape
tika-vin01t1:784_6: mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā. Evaṃ pana katvā sakalatambapaṇṇirajjena mahābodhiṃ pūjetvā soḷasannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:784_7: kulānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātetvā sayaṃ dovārikaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tayo divase anekappakāraṃ pūjaṃ
tika-vin01t1:784_8: kārāpesi. Taṃ dassento “tīṇi divasānī”tiādimāha. Rajjaṃ vicāresīti rajjaṃ vicāretuṃ
tika-vin01t1:784_9: vissajjesi, soḷasahi vā jātisampannakulehi rajjaṃ vicārāpesīti attho. Catutthe divaseti
tika-vin01t1:784_10: migasiramāsassa sukkapakkhadasamiyaṃ. Anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ sampattoti dasamiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:784_11: alaṅkatappaṭiyattarathe mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā uḷārapūjaṃ kurumāno pācīnapassavihārassa
tika-vin01t1:784_12: patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānamānetvā tattha saṅghassa pātarāsaṃ pavattetvā mahindattherena
tika-vin01t1:784_13: bhāsitaṃ nāgadīpe dasabalena kataṃ nāgadamanaṃ sutvā “sammāsambuddhena nisajjādinā
tika-vin01t1:784_14: paribhuttaṭṭhānesu thūpādīhi sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti saññāṇaṃ kāretvā tato āharitvā
tika-vin01t1:784_15: tavakkabrāhmaṇassa gāmadvāre ṭhapetvā pūjetvā evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pūjaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:784_16: iminā anukkamena anurādhapuraṃ sampatto. Cātuddasīdivaseti migasiramāsasseva sukkapakkhacātuddase.
tika-vin01t1:784_17: Vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāyāti chāyāya vaḍḍhamānasamaye, sāyanhasamayeti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāpattinti
tika-vin01t1:784_19: dvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāne. “Sakalarajjaṃ mahābodhissa dinnapubbattā upacāratthaṃ rājā dovārikavesaṃ gaṇhī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:785_1: atthaṅgate. “Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānenā”ti vattabbe vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā “saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā”ti
tika-vin01t1:785_2: nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ. Sati hi sahayoge karaṇavacanena bhavitabbaṃ. Mahāpathavī akampīti
tika-vin01t1:785_3: ca idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ, aññānipi anekāni acchariyāni ahesuṃyeva. Tathā hi saha
tika-vin01t1:785_4: bodhipatiṭṭhānena udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi, tāni mūlāni kaṭāhamukhavaṭṭito
tika-vin01t1:785_5: uggantvā taṃ kaṭāhaṃ vinandhantā pathavītalamotariṃsu, samantato dibbakusumāni vassiṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:785_6: ākāse dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu, mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā vuṭṭhidhāramakāsi, ākāsapadesā
tika-vin01t1:785_7: viraviṃsu, vijjulatā nicchariṃsu. Devatā sādhukāramadaṃsu, samāgatā sakaladīpavāsino
tika-vin01t1:785_8: gandhamālādīhi pūjayiṃsu, gahitamakarandā mandamārutā vāyiṃsu, samantato ghanasītalahimavalāhakā
tika-vin01t1:785_9: mahābodhiṃ chādayiṃsu. Evaṃ bodhi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā himagabbhe sannisīditvā
tika-vin01t1:785_10: sattāhaṃ lokassa adassanaṃ agamāsi. Himagabbhe sannisīdīti himagabbhassa anto aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:785_11: Vipphurantāti vipphurantā ito cito ca saṃsarantā. Nicchariṃsūti nikkhamiṃsu. Dassiṃsūti
tika-vin01t1:785_12: paññāyiṃsu. Sabbe dīpavāsinoti sabbe tambapaṇṇidīpavāsino. Uttarasākhato ekaṃ phalanti
tika-vin01t1:785_13: uttarasākhāya ṭhitaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ. “Pācīnasākhāya ekaṃ phala”ntipi keci. Mahāāsanaṭṭhāneti
tika-vin01t1:785_15: kassapagirivihāre. “Issaranimmānavihāre”ti hi pubbasaṅketavasena vuttaṃ, idāni pana
tika-vin01t1:785_16: so vihāro “kassapagirī”ti paññāto. “Issarasamaṇārāme”tipi keci paṭhanti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:788_0: Yojaniyaārāmesūti anurādhapurassa samantā yojanassa anto kataārāmesu. Samantā patiṭṭhite
tika-vin01t1:788_1: mahābodhimhīti sambandho. Anurādhapurassa samantā evaṃ puttanattuparamparāya mahābodhimhi
tika-vin01t1:788_2: patiṭṭhiteti attho. Lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesīti lohapāsādassa kattabbaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi.
tika-vin01t1:788_3: “Kiñcāpi lohapāsādaṃ devānaṃpiyatissoyeva mahārājā kāressati, tathāpi tasmiṃ samaye
tika-vin01t1:788_4: abhāvato ‘anāgate’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayeneva
tika-vin01t1:788_5: kārito lohapāsādo”ti vadanti. Mūlāni panassa na tāva otarantīti iminā, mahārāja,
tika-vin01t1:788_6: imasmiṃ dīpe satthusāsanaṃ patiṭṭhitamattameva ahosi, na tāva supatiṭṭhitanti dasseti,
tika-vin01t1:788_7: assa satthusāsanassa mūlāni pana na tāva otiṇṇānīti evamettha attho veditabbo. Otarantīti
tika-vin01t1:788_8: hi atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ. Tenevāha “kadā pana bhante mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:788_9: Yo amacco catupaṇṇāsāya jeṭṭhakakaniṭṭhabhātukehi saddhiṃ cetiyagirimhi pabbajito,
tika-vin01t1:788_10: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “mahāariṭṭho bhikkhū”ti. Meghavaṇṇābhayassa amaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāneti
tika-vin01t1:788_11: meghavaṇṇābhayassa rañño amaccena kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthubhūte ṭhāne. Maṇḍapappakāranti
tika-vin01t1:788_12: maṇḍapasadisaṃ. Sadisatthampi hi pakārasaddaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Sāsanassa mūlāni otarantāni
tika-vin01t1:788_13: passissāmīti iminā sāsanassa suṭṭhu patiṭṭhānākāraṃ passissāmīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:789_0: Meghavirahitassa nimmalasseva ākāsassa viravitattā “ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:789_1: Paccekagaṇīhīti visuṃ visuṃ gaṇācariyehi. Paccekaṃ gaṇaṃ etesaṃ atthīti paccekagaṇino.
tika-vin01t1:789_2: Yathā vejjo gilānesu karuṇāya tikicchanameva purakkhatvā vigatacchandadoso jigucchanīyesu
tika-vin01t1:789_3: vaṇesu guyhaṭṭhānesu ca bhesajjalepanādinā tikicchanameva karoti, evaṃ bhagavāpi
tika-vin01t1:789_4: kilesabyādhipīḷitesu sattesu karuṇāya te satte kilesabyādhidukkhato mocetukāmo avattabbārahāni
tika-vin01t1:789_5: guyhaṭṭhānanissitānipi asappāyāni vadanto vinayapaññattiyā sattānaṃ kilesabyādhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:789_6: tikicchati. Tena vuttaṃ “satthu karuṇāguṇaparidīpaka”nti. Anusiṭṭhikarānanti anusāsanīkarānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:789_7: ye bhagavato anusāsaniṃ sammā paṭipajjanti, tesanti attho. Kāyakammavacīkammavipphanditavinayananti
tika-vin01t1:790_0: Rājinoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, rājānamanusāsiṃsūti attho. Ālokanti ñāṇālokaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:790_1: Nibbāyiṃsu mahesayoti ettha mahāmahindatthero dvādasavassiko hutvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:790_2: sampatto, tattha dve vassāni vasitvā vinayaṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Dvāsaṭṭhivassiko hutvā
tika-vin01t1:791_0: Tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikāti tesaṃ mahāmahindattherappamukhānaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikā.
tika-vin01t1:791_1: Tissadattādayo pana mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā, tasmā tissadattakāḷasumanadīghasumanādayo
tika-vin01t1:791_2: mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā cāti yojetabbaṃ. Antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikāti ubhayathā
tika-vin01t1:797: Tato ariṭṭho medhāvī, tissadatto ca paṇḍito.
tika-vin01t1:802_0: Ettāvatā ca “kenābhata”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā idāni “kattha patiṭṭhita”nti
tika-vin01t1:802_1: imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento āha “kattha patiṭṭhita”ntiādi. Tattha telamivāti sīhatelamiva.
tika-vin01t1:802_2: Adhimattasatigatidhītimantesūti ettha satīti buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā dhāraṇakasati.
tika-vin01t1:802_3: Gatīti uggaṇhanakagati. Dhītīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā gaṇhanakañāṇaṃ. Gatīti vā paññāgati.
tika-vin01t1:802_4: Dhītīti buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanavīriyaṃ sajjhāyanavīriyaṃ dhāraṇavīriyañca. Lajjīsūti
tika-vin01t1:802_5: pāpajigucchanakalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgatesu. Kukkuccakesūti aṇumattesupi vajjesu
tika-vin01t1:802_6: dosadassāvitāya kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkuccakārīsu. Sikkhākāmesūti adhisīlaaacittaadhipaññāvasena
tika-vin01t1:803_0: Akattabbato nivāretvā kattabbesu patiṭṭhāpanato mātāpituṭṭhāniyoti vuttaṃ. Ācāragocarakusalatāti
tika-vin01t1:803_1: veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā
tika-vin01t1:803_4: ca sampannattā samaṇācāresu ceva samaṇagocaresu ca kusalatā. Apica yo bhikkhu satthari
tika-vin01t1:803_5: sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho
tika-vin01t1:803_6: supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena
tika-vin01t1:803_7: okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto
tika-vin01t1:803_8: satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho
tika-vin01t1:803_9: ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācāro.
tika-vin01t1:804_0: Gocaro pana upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti tividho. Tattha dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato
tika-vin01t1:804_1: kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya assutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:804_2: ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti, yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena,
tika-vin01t1:804_3: sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati, ayaṃ upanissayagocaro. Yo pana bhikkhu antaragharaṃ
tika-vin01t1:804_4: paviṭṭho vīthipaṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī saṃvuto gacchati, na hatthiṃ
tika-vin01t1:804_5: olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na pattiṃ, na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:804_6: olokento, na adho olokento, na disāvidisampi pekkhamāno gacchati, ayaṃ ārakkhagocaro.
tika-vin01t1:804_7: Upanibandhagocaro pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, yattha bhikkhu attano cittaṃ upanibandhati.
tika-vin01t1:804_8: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo,
tika-vin01t1:804_9: yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti. Ayaṃ upanibandhagocaro. Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā
tika-vin01t1:804_10: ca gocarena samannāgatattā ācāragocarakusalatā. Evaṃ anācāraṃ agocarañca vajjetvā
tika-vin01t1:805_0: Vinayapariyattiṃ nissāyāti vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ nissāya. Attano sīlakkhandho sugutto
tika-vin01t1:805_1: hoti surakkhitoti kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito? Āpattiñhi
tika-vin01t1:805_2: āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccapakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā,
tika-vin01t1:805_3: kappiye akappiyasaññitā, satisammosāti. Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati.
tika-vin01t1:806_0: Kathaṃ alajjitāya nāpajjati? So hi “passatha bho, ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva
tika-vin01t1:806_1: paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi akappiyabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva
tika-vin01t1:806_2: madditvā vītikkamaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ alajjitāya nāpajjati. Sahasā āpannampi desanāgāminiṃ
tika-vin01t1:806_3: desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti, tato –
tika-vin01t1:808: Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:810: Kathaṃ aññāṇatāya nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā kappiyaṃyeva karoti, akappiyaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ aññāṇatāya nāpajjati.
tika-vin01t1:811_0: Kathaṃ kukkuccapakatatāya nāpajjati? Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vatthuṃ
tika-vin01t1:811_1: oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ anāpattiṃ oloketvā kappiyaṃ ce hoti, karoti,
tika-vin01t1:811_2: akappiyaṃ ce, na karoti. Uppannaṃ pana kukkuccaṃ avinicchinitvāva “vaṭṭatī”ti madditvā
tika-vin01t1:812_0: Kathaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitādīhi nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:812_1: akappiye kappiyasaññī na hoti, kappiye akappiyasaññī na hoti, supatiṭṭhitā cassa
tika-vin01t1:812_2: sati hoti, adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetabbaṃ vikappeti. Iti imehi chahākārehi
tika-vin01t1:812_3: āpattiṃ nāpajjati, āpattiṃ anāpajjanto akhaṇḍasīlo hoti parisuddhasīlo. Evamassa
tika-vin01t1:813_0: Kukkuccapakatānanti kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannena kukkuccena abhibhūtānaṃ. Kathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:813_1: pana kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti? Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā
tika-vin01t1:813_2: bhikkhū “asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī”ti dūratopi tassa santikaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin01t1:813_3: kukkuccaṃ pucchanti. So tehi katakammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattiṃ garukalahukādibhedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:813_4: sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ desāpetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin01t1:814_0: Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatīti vigato sārado bhayaṃ etassāti visārado, abhītoti
tika-vin01t1:814_1: attho. Avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ sārajjaṃ okkamati, vinayadharassa
tika-vin01t1:814_2: taṃ na hoti. Kasmā? “Evaṃ kathentassa doso hoti, evaṃ na doso”ti ñatvā kathanato.
tika-vin01t1:815_0: Paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma
tika-vin01t1:815_1: attapaccatthikā ca sāsanapaccatthikā ca. Tattha mettiyabhummajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho
tika-vin01t1:815_2: ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ, ime attapaccatthikā nāma. Ye vā panaññepi
tika-vin01t1:815_3: dussīlā pāpadhammā, sabbe te attapaccatthikā. Viparītadassanā pana ariṭṭhabhikkhukaṇṭakasāmaṇeravesālikavajjiputtakā
tika-vin01t1:815_4: mahāsaṅghikādayo ca abuddhasāsanaṃ “buddhasāsana”nti vatvā katapaggahā sāsanapaccatthikā
tika-vin01t1:815_5: nāma. Te sabbepi sahadhammena sahakāraṇena vacanena yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:815_6: na sakkonti, evaṃ suniggahitaṃ katvā niggaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:816_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena.
tika-vin01t1:816_1: Tattha tipiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammo nāma. Terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa
tika-vin01t1:816_2: khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma. Cattāro maggā
tika-vin01t1:816_3: ca cattāri phalāni ca, ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma. Tattha keci therā “yo vo, ānanda,
tika-vin01t1:816_4: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti iminā suttena
tika-vin01t1:816_5: “sāsanassa pariyatti mūla”nti vadanti. Keci therā “ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā
tika-vin01t1:816_6: vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa paṭipatti mūla”nti
tika-vin01t1:816_7: vatvā “yāva pañca bhikkhū sammā paṭipannā saṃvijjanti, tāva sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hotī”ti
tika-vin01t1:816_8: āhaṃsu. Itare pana therā “pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi dhammābhisamayo
tika-vin01t1:816_9: natthī”ti vatvā āhaṃsu. Sacepi pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā honti,
tika-vin01t1:816_10: te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā dasavaggagaṇaṃ pūretvā
tika-vin01t1:816_11: majjhimajanapadepi upasampadaṃ karissanti. Etenupāyena vīsativaggasaṅghaṃ pūretvā
tika-vin01t1:816_12: attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayissanti. Evamayaṃ vinayadharo
tika-vin01t1:816_13: tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti. Evamayaṃ vinayadharo ime
tika-vin01t1:817_0: Vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādīsu vinayoti vinayassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ, vinayoti vā vinayapaññatti
tika-vin01t1:817_1: vuttā, tasmā sakalāpi vinayapaññatti vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ vā kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāyāti
tika-vin01t1:817_2: attho, ājīvapārisuddhipariyosānassa sīlassa upanissayapaccayo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:817_4: Pāmojjanti dubbalā taruṇapīti. Pītīti balavapīti. Passaddhīti kāyacittadarathapaṭippassaddhi.
tika-vin01t1:817_5: Sukhanti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ. Tañhi duvidhampi samādhissa upanissayapaccayo
tika-vin01t1:817_7: Nibbidāti vipassanā. Atha vā yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ taruṇavipassanā, udayabbayañāṇassetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:817_8: adhivacanaṃ. Cittekaggatā hi taruṇavipassanāya upanissayapaccayo hoti. Nibbidāti
tika-vin01t1:817_9: sikhāppattā vuṭṭhānagāminibalavavipassanā. Virāgoti ariyamaggo. Vimuttīti arahattaphalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:817_10: Catubbidhopi hi ariyamaggo arahattassa upanissayapaccayo hoti. Vimuttiñāṇadassananti
tika-vin01t1:817_11: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā anavasesetvā
tika-vin01t1:817_13: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccayo hoti tasmiṃ anuppatte avassaṃ parinibbāyitabbato, na
tika-vin01t1:817_14: ca paccavekkhaṇañāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:818_0: Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etadatthāya, anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:818_1: Evaṃ sabbatthapi. Mantanāpi vinayamantanāeva, “evaṃ karissāma, na karissāmā”ti vinayapaṭibaddhasaṃsandanā.
tika-vin01t1:818_2: Etadatthā upanisāti upanisīdati ettha phalaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāyāti upanisā vuccati
tika-vin01t1:818_3: kāraṇaṃ paccayoti. “Vinayo saṃvaratthāyā”tiādikā kāraṇaparamparā etadatthāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:818_4: Etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānanti imissā paramparapaccayakathāya sotāvadhānaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:818_5: sutvā yaṃ uppajjati ñāṇaṃ, tampi etadatthaṃ. Yadidaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkhoti yadidanti
tika-vin01t1:818_6: nipāto. Sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha atthato pariṇāmetabbo,
tika-vin01t1:818_7: tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo – yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa
tika-vin01t1:818_8: arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho, sopi etadatthāya anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti evamettha
tika-vin01t1:818_9: sambandho veditabbo. Yo ayaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkhasaṅkhāto maggo, heṭṭhā vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:818_10: sabbampi etadatthamevāti. Evañca sati iminā mahussāhato sādhitabbaṃ niyatappayojanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:818_11: dassitaṃ hoti. Heṭṭhā “virāgo…pe… nibbānatthāyā”ti iminā pana labbhamānānisaṃsaphalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:818_12: dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Āyogoti uggahaṇacintanādivasena punappunaṃ abhiyogo.
tika-vin01t1:823_0: 1. Seyyathidanti taṃ katamaṃ, taṃ kathanti vā attho. Aniyamaniddesavacananti natthi
tika-vin01t1:823_1: etassa niyamoti aniyamo, niddisīyati attho etenāti niddeso, vuccati etenāti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:823_2: niddesoyeva vacanaṃ niddesavacanaṃ, aniyamassa niddesavacanaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:823_3: paṭhamaṃ aniyamitassa samayassa niddesavacananti attho. “Yenāti avatvā tenāti vuttattā
tika-vin01t1:823_4: aniyamaṃ katvā niddiṭṭhavacanaṃ aniyamaniddesavacana”ntipi vadanti. Yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:823_5: niccasambandhabhāvato āha “tassa sarūpena avuttenapī”tiādi. Tattha tassāti “tenā”ti
tika-vin01t1:823_6: etassa. Sarūpena avuttenapīti “yenā”ti evaṃ sarūpato pāḷiyaṃ avuttenapi. Atthato
tika-vin01t1:823_8: Parivitakke hi siddhe yena samayena parivitakko udapādīti idaṃ atthato siddhameva
tika-vin01t1:823_9: hoti. Tenevāha “aparabhāge hi vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto āyasmato sāriputtassa
tika-vin01t1:823_10: parivitakko siddho”tiādi. “Tenā”ti vatvā tato tadatthameva “yenā”ti atthato vuccamānattā
tika-vin01t1:823_11: “yenā”ti ayaṃ “tenā”ti etassa paṭiniddeso nāma jāto. Paṭiniddesoti ca vitthāraniddesoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:824_0: Aparabhāge hīti ettha hi-saddo hetumhi, yasmāti attho. Vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūtoti
tika-vin01t1:824_1: “etassa bhagavā kālo, etassa sugata kālo, yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya,
tika-vin01t1:824_2: uddiseyya pātimokkhaṃ. Yathayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitika”nti
tika-vin01t1:824_3: evaṃ pavattassa vinayapaññattiyācanassa kāraṇabhūtoti attho. Parivitakkoti “katamesānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:824_4: kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi, katamesānaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:824_5: bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti evaṃ pavatto parivitakko. Yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:824_6: niccasambandhoti āha “tasmā yena samayenā”tiādi. Pubbe vā pacchā vā atthato siddhenāti
tika-vin01t1:824_7: pubbe vā pacchā vā uppannaatthato siddhena. Paṭiniddeso kattabboti etassa “yadida”nti
tika-vin01t1:824_8: iminā sambandho. “Paṭiniddeso kattabbo”ti yadidaṃ yaṃ idaṃ vidhānaṃ, ayaṃ sabbasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:824_9: vinaye yuttīti attho. Atha vā “paṭiniddeso kattabbo”ti yadidaṃ yā ayaṃ yutti, ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:825_0: Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassananti tassā yathāvuttayuttiyā paridīpane idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:825_1: upāyamattanidassananti attho. Mukhaṃ dvāraṃ upāyoti hi atthato ekaṃ. “Tena hi bhikkhave
tika-vin01t1:825_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti pāḷiṃ dassetvā tattha paṭiniddesamāha “yena
tika-vin01t1:825_3: sudinno”tiādinā. Tenāti hetuatthe karaṇavacanattā tassa paṭiniddesopi tādisoyevāti
tika-vin01t1:825_4: āha “yasmā paṭisevī”ti. Pubbe atthato siddhenāti pubbe uppannamethunadhammapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaatthato
tika-vin01t1:825_5: siddhena. Pacchā atthato siddhenāti raññā adinnaṃ dārūnaṃ ādiyanasaṅkhātapacchāuppannaatthato
tika-vin01t1:826_0: Samavāyeti paccayasāmaggiyaṃ, kāraṇasamavāyeti attho. Khaṇeti okāse. Assāti assa
tika-vin01t1:826_1: samayasaddassa samavāyo atthoti sambandho. Appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca
tika-vin01t1:826_2: samayañca upādāyāti ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttapayuttakālo. Samayo nāma
tika-vin01t1:826_3: tasseva paccayasāmaggī, atthato tadanurūpaṃ sarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo
tika-vin01t1:826_4: ca. Upādānaṃ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā kālañca samayañca paññāya
tika-vin01t1:826_5: gahetvā upadhāretvāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace amhākaṃ sve gamanassa yuttakālo
tika-vin01t1:826_6: bhavissati, kāye balamattā ceva pharissati, gamanapaccayā ca añño aphāsuvihāro na
tika-vin01t1:826_7: bhavissati, athetaṃ kālañca gamanakāraṇasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ samayañca upadhāretvā api
tika-vin01t1:827_0: Khaṇoti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayapaṭilābhahetuttā,
tika-vin01t1:827_1: khaṇo eva ca samayo. Yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati, so ekovāti hi attho. Mahāsamayoti
tika-vin01t1:827_2: mahāsamūho. Pavuddhaṃ vanaṃ pavanaṃ, tasmiṃ pavanasmiṃ, vanasaṇḍeti attho. Samayopi
tika-vin01t1:827_3: kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosīti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetu. Bhaddālīti
tika-vin01t1:827_4: tassa bhikkhuno nāmaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhaddāli tayā paṭivijjhitabbayuttakaṃ etaṃ
tika-vin01t1:827_5: kāraṇaṃ atthi, tampi te na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitanti. Kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti āha “bhagavā kho”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:828_0: Uggāhamāno tiādīsu mānoti tassa paribbājakassa pakatināmaṃ, kiñci kiñci pana uggahetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:828_1: samatthatāya “uggāhamāno”ti naṃ sañjānanti, tasmā “uggāhamāno”ti vuccati. Samaṇamuṇḍikāya
tika-vin01t1:828_2: putto samaṇamuṇḍikāputto. So kira devadattassa upaṭṭhāko. Samayaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti
tika-vin01t1:828_3: etthāti samayappavādako, tasmiṃ samayappavādake, diṭṭhippavādaketi attho. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:828_5: ca paribbājakā sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti kathenti dīpenti,
tika-vin01t1:828_6: tasmā so ārāmo “samayappavādako”ti vuccati, sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya timbarurukkhapantiyā
tika-vin01t1:828_7: parikkhittattā “tindukācīra”nti vuccati. Ekā sālā etthāti ekasālako. Yasmā panettha
tika-vin01t1:828_8: paṭhamaṃ ekā sālā katā ahosi, pacchā mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū
tika-vin01t1:828_9: sālā katā, tasmā tameva ekaṃ sālamupādāya laddhanāmavasena “ekasālako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:828_10: Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasañchanno ārāmoti katvā
tika-vin01t1:828_11: “mallikāya ārāmo”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato. Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya
tika-vin01t1:829_0: Diṭṭhe dhammeti paccakkhe attabhāve. Atthoti vuḍḍhi. Samparāyikoti kammakilesavasena
tika-vin01t1:829_1: samparetabbato sampāpuṇitabbato samparāyo, paraloko. Tattha niyutto samparāyiko,
tika-vin01t1:829_3: hi attho kāraṇassa nipphannattā paṭiladdho nāma hotīti tamatthadvayaṃ ekato katvā
tika-vin01t1:829_4: “atthābhisamayā”ti vuttaṃ. Dhiyā paññāya rāti gaṇhātīti dhīro. Atha vā dhī paññā
tika-vin01t1:830_0: Sammā mānābhisamayāti mānassa sammā pahānena. Sammāti iminā mānassa aggamaggañāṇena
tika-vin01t1:830_1: samucchedappahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhotiādīsu dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino
tika-vin01t1:830_2: hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ, pīḷanameva attho pīḷanaṭṭho, tthakārassa ṭṭhakāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:830_3: katvā vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. Samecca paccayehi katabhāvo saṅkhataṭṭho. Santāpo dukkhadukkhatādivasena
tika-vin01t1:830_4: santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ. Vipariṇāmo jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā.
tika-vin01t1:830_5: Abhisametabbo paṭivijjhitabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayova attho abhisamayaṭṭho, pīḷanādīni.
tika-vin01t1:830_6: Tāni hi abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā “abhisamayaṭṭho”ti vuttāni, abhisamayassa
tika-vin01t1:830_7: vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva pīḷanādīni abhisamayassa
tika-vin01t1:831_0: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samayasaddo evāti
tika-vin01t1:831_1: samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo vutto. Tattha sahakārīkāraṇasannijjhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:831_2: sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha
tika-vin01t1:831_3: tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo. Samenti ettha, etena vā saṃgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi
tika-vin01t1:831_4: uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā
tika-vin01t1:831_5: adhikaraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyati. Samaṃ, saha
tika-vin01t1:831_6: vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavena
tika-vin01t1:831_7: sahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho. Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati
tika-vin01t1:831_8: cāti samayo, hetu yathā “samudayo”ti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano
tika-vin01t1:831_9: visaye pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā taṃsaṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:831_10: etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhanti. Samiti saṅgati
tika-vin01t1:831_11: samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo
tika-vin01t1:831_12: appavattīti samayo, pahānaṃ. Ñāṇena abhimukhaṃ sammā etabbo adhigantabboti abhisamayo,
tika-vin01t1:831_13: dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-vin01t1:831_14: dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:832_0: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ paṭicca saddā abhinivisanti, na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti?
tika-vin01t1:832_1: Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite. Saddavisese hi apekkhiyamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:832_2: na sambhavati. Na hi yo kālattho samayasaddo, soyeva samūhādiatthaṃ vadati. Ettha
tika-vin01t1:832_3: pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ samayasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samayasaddassa
tika-vin01t1:832_4: vuttā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāre adhippāyo veditabbo. Idha panassa kālo atthoti
tika-vin01t1:832_5: assa samayasaddassa idha kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato desadesakādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:833_0: Upayogavacanena bhummavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha karaṇavacanena niddese payojanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:833_1: niddhāretukāmo parammukhena codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti “etthāhā”tiādi. Ettha “tena samayenā”ti
tika-vin01t1:833_2: imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitaṇḍavādī āhāti attho. Athāti codanāya kattukāmataṃ dīpeti, nanūti
tika-vin01t1:833_3: iminā samānattho. Kasmā karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti sambandho. Bhummavacanena niddeso
tika-vin01t1:833_4: katoti yojetabbaṃ. Etthāpi “yathā”ti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tatthāti tesu suttābhidhammesu.
tika-vin01t1:833_5: Tathāti upayogabhummavacanehi. Idhāti imasmiṃ vinaye. Aññathāti karaṇavacanena. Accantamevāti
tika-vin01t1:833_6: ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ, tāva accantameva, nirantaramevāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:833_7: Karuṇāvihārenāti parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena. Tathā hi karuṇānidānattā
tika-vin01t1:833_8: desanāya idha parahitapaṭipatti “karuṇāvihāro”ti vuttā, na pana karuṇāsamaāpattivihāro.
tika-vin01t1:833_9: Na hi desanākāle desetabbadhammavisayassa desanāñāṇassa sattavisayāya mahākaruṇāya
tika-vin01t1:833_10: sahuppatti sambhavati bhinnavisayattā, tasmā karuṇāvasena pavatto parahitapaapattisaṅkhāto
tika-vin01t1:833_11: vihāro idha karuṇāvihāroti veditabbo. Tadatthajotanatthanti accantasaṃyogatthadīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:834_0: Adhikaraṇatthoti ādhārattho. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:834_1: soyevattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho. Kathaṃ pana abhidhamme yathāvuttaatthadvayasambhavoti
tika-vin01t1:834_2: āha “adhikaraṇañhī”tiādi. Tattha kālasaṅkhāto attho kālattho, samūhasaṅkhāto attho
tika-vin01t1:834_3: samūhattho. Atha vā kālasaddassa attho kālattho, samūhasaddassa attho samūhattho.
tika-vin01t1:834_4: Ko so? Samayo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kālattho samūhattho ca samayo tattha abhidhamme
tika-vin01t1:834_5: vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādhāroti yasmiṃ kāle dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:834_6: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva kāle puñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.
tika-vin01t1:835_0: Nanu cāyaṃ upādāya paññatto kālo samūho ca vohāramattako, so kathaṃ ādhāro tattha
tika-vin01t1:835_1: vuttadhammānanti? Nāyaṃ doso. Yathā hi kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato
tika-vin01t1:835_2: avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññatto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato
tika-vin01t1:835_3: “pubbaṇhe jāto sāyanhe gacchatī”tiādīsu, samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi
tika-vin01t1:835_4: kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññapīyati “rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsimhi
tika-vin01t1:836_0: Abhidhamme ādhāratthasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthasambhavaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t1:836_1: āha “khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassā”tiādi. Tattha khaṇo nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo
tika-vin01t1:836_2: buddhuppādasaṅkhāto khaṇo, yāni vā panetāni “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni yehi
tika-vin01t1:836_3: samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti ettha patirūpadesavāso, sappurisūpanissayo,
tika-vin01t1:836_4: attasammāpaṇidhi, pubbe ca katapuññatāti cattāri cakkāni vuttāni, tāni ekajjhaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:836_5: okāsaṭṭhena khaṇoti veditabbo. Tāni hi kusaluppattiyā okāsabhūtāni. Samavāyo nāma
tika-vin01t1:836_6: “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti evamādinā niddiṭṭhā cakkhuviññāṇādisaṅkhātasādhāraṇaphalanipphādakattena
tika-vin01t1:836_9: ca samayassa bhāvena sattāya tesaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ bhāvo sattā lakkhīyati viññāyatīti
tika-vin01t1:836_10: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā “gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato”ti dohanakiriyāya
tika-vin01t1:836_11: gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evamidhāpi “yasmiṃ samaye, tasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte “satī”ti
tika-vin01t1:836_12: ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti aññakiriyāya sambandhābhāve padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti
tika-vin01t1:836_13: samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādibhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyatīti.
tika-vin01t1:836_14: Ayañhi tattha attho yasmiṃ yathāvutte khaṇe paccayasamavāye hetumhi ca sati kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:836_15: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe paccayasamavāye hetumhi ca sati phassādayopi
tika-vin01t1:836_16: hontīti. Tadatthajotanatthanti adhikaraṇatthassa bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthassa ca dīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:837_0: Idha panāti imasmiṃ vinaye. Hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatīti “annena vasati,
tika-vin01t1:837_1: vijjāya vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuattho “pharasunā chindati, kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:837_2: viya karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Kathaṃ sambhavatīti āha “yo hi so”tiādi. Tena samayena
tika-vin01t1:837_3: hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenāti ettha pana taṃtaṃvatthuvītikkamova sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
tika-vin01t1:837_4: hetu ceva karaṇañca. Tathā hi yadā bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā paṭhamameva tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:837_5: tesaṃ tattha tattha taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtaṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhamāno viharati,
tika-vin01t1:837_6: tadā taṃ taṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthaṃ vasatīti siddho vatthuvītikkamassa hetubhāvo
tika-vin01t1:837_7: “annena vasati, annaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthāya vasatī”tiādīsu viya. Sikkhāpadapaññattikāle
tika-vin01t1:837_8: pana teneva pubbasiddhena vītikkamena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
tika-vin01t1:837_9: sādhakatamattā karaṇabhāvopi vītikkamasseva siddho “asinā chindatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:837_10: Vītikkamaṃ pana apekkhamāno teneva saddhiṃ tannissayakālampi apekkhitvā viharatīti
tika-vin01t1:837_11: kālassapi idha hetubhāvo vutto, sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento ca taṃ taṃ vītikkamakālaṃ
tika-vin01t1:837_12: anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti vītikkamanissayassa kālassapi
tika-vin01t1:837_13: karaṇabhāvo vutto, tasmā iminā pariyāyena kālassapi hetubhāvo karaṇabhāvo ca labbhatīti
tika-vin01t1:837_14: vuttaṃ “tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā”ti. Nippariyāyato pana vītikkamoyeva
tika-vin01t1:837_15: hetubhūto karaṇabhūto ca. So hi vītikkamakkhaṇe hetu hutvā pacchā sikkhāpadapaññāpane karaṇampi hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:838_0: Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayantoti vītikkamaṃ pucchitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:838_1: puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva
tika-vin01t1:838_2: kālena karaṇabhūtena sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto. Sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamānoti
tika-vin01t1:838_3: tatiyapārājikādīsu viya sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ vītikkamasamayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:838_4: apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti attho. “Sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t1:838_5: paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno”ti vacanato “tena samayena karaṇabhūtena
tika-vin01t1:838_6: hetubhūtenā”ti evaṃ vattabbepi paṭhamaṃ “hetubhūtenā”ti vacanaṃ idha hetuatthassa
tika-vin01t1:838_7: adhippetattā vuttaṃ. Bhagavā hi verañjāyaṃ viharanto therassa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanahetubhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:838_8: parivitakkasamayaṃ apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena vihāsīti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t1:838_9: vuttaṃ. Kiṃ panettha yutticintāya, ācariyassa idha kamavacanicchā natthīti evametaṃ
tika-vin01t1:838_10: gahetabbaṃ. Teneva dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi “tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:838_11: ayameva anukkamo vutto. Na hi tattha paṭhamaṃ “hetubhūtenā”ti vacanaṃ idha “tena
tika-vin01t1:838_12: samayena verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti ettha hetuatthassa adhippetabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:838_13: “Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena samayena vihāsi, sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-vin01t1:838_14: apekkhamāno hetubhūtena samayena vihāsīti evamettha sambandho kātabbo”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:838_15: Tadatthajotanatthanti hetuatthassa karaṇatthassa vā dīpanatthaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ vinaye.
tika-vin01t1:838_16: Hoti cetthāti ettha imasmiṃ padese yathāvuttatthasaṅgahavasena ayaṃ gāthā hoti. Aññatrāti suttābhidhammesu.
tika-vin01t1:839_0: Porāṇāti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Abhilāpamattabhedoti vacanamattena viseso. Tena suttavinayesu
tika-vin01t1:839_1: vibhattivipariṇāmo katoti dasseti. Parato atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāmāti parato “itipi so
tika-vin01t1:839_2: bhagavā”tiādinā āgataṭṭhāne vaṇṇayissāma. Verañjāyanti ettha “balikaraggahaṇena janassa
tika-vin01t1:839_3: pīḷābhāvato niddosattā vigato rajo assāti verañjā, serivāṇijajātake devadattassa
tika-vin01t1:839_4: veruppannapadese katattā veraṃ ettha jātanti verañjā, paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhe naṭasamajjādīhi
tika-vin01t1:839_5: khādanīyabhojanīyālaṅkārādīhi ca vividhehi upakaraṇehi rañjanato vividhehi rañjayatīti
tika-vin01t1:839_6: verañjā, paṭipakkhe abhibhavitvā katabhāvato veraṃ abhibhavitvā jātāti verañjā, verañjassa
tika-vin01t1:839_7: nāma isino assamaṭṭhāne katattā verañjā”ti evamādinā keci vaṇṇayanti. Kiṃ iminā,
tika-vin01t1:839_8: nāmamattametaṃ tassa nagarassāti dassento āha “verañjāti aññatarassa nagarassetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:839_9: adhivacana”nti. Samīpatthe bhummavacananti “gaṅgāyaṃ gāvo caranti, kūpe gaggakula”ntiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:839_10: viya. Avisesenāti “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati. Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-vin01t1:839_11: viharati. Mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati. Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā
tika-vin01t1:839_12: animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ samāpajjitvā viharatī”tiādīsu viya saddantarasannidhānasiddhena
tika-vin01t1:839_13: visesaparāmasanena vinā. Atha vā avisesenāti na visesena, vihārabhāvasāmaññenāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:840_0: Iriyāpatha…pe… vihāresūti iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti
tika-vin01t1:840_1: etesu catūsu vihāresu. Tattha iriyanaṃ pavattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo kāyikakiriyā.
tika-vin01t1:840_2: Tassā pavattanupāyabhāvato iriyāya pathoti iriyāpatho, ṭhānanisajjādi. Na hi ṭhānanisajjādīhi
tika-vin01t1:840_3: avatthāhi vinā kañci kāyikakiriyaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkā. Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci
tika-vin01t1:840_4: kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vāti. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro, iriyāpathova
tika-vin01t1:840_5: vihāro iriyāpathavihāro, so ca atthato ṭhānanisajjādiākārappavatto catusantatirūpappabandhova.
tika-vin01t1:840_6: Divi bhavo dibbo, tattha bahulappavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevalokabhavoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:840_7: Tattha yo dibbānubhāvo tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo, abhiññābhinīhāravasena mahāgatikattā
tika-vin01t1:840_8: vā dibbo, dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro, dibbabhāvāvaho vā vihāro dibbavihāro,
tika-vin01t1:840_9: mahaggatajjhānāni. Āruppasamāpattiyopi hi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Nettiyaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:840_10: “catasso āruppasamāpattiyo āneñjavihāro”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ mettājhānādīnaṃ brahmavihāratā
tika-vin01t1:840_11: viya tāsaṃ bhāvanāvisesabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana dibbabhāvāvahasāmaññato
tika-vin01t1:840_12: tāpi “dibbavihārā”tveva vuttā. Brahmānaṃ vihārā brahmavihārā, brahmāno vā vihārā
tika-vin01t1:840_13: brahmavihārā, hitūpasaṃharādivasena pavattiyā brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vihārāti attho,
tika-vin01t1:840_14: mettājhānādikā catasso appamaññāyo. Ariyā uttamā vihārāti ariyavihārā, anaññasādhāraṇattā
tika-vin01t1:840_15: ariyānaṃ vā vihārā ariyavihārā, catasso phalasamāpattiyo. Visesato pana rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:840_16: catasso appamaññāyo catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti ca bhagavato dibbabrahmaariyavihārā.
tika-vin01t1:841_1: Bhagavā hi lobhadosamohussannakāle loke tassa sakāya paṭipattiyā vinayanatthaṃ dibbabrahmaaayavihāre
tika-vin01t1:841_2: upasampajja viharati. Tathā hi yadā sattā kāmesu vippaṭipajjanti, tadā kira bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:841_3: dibbena vihārena viharati tesaṃ alobhakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:841_4: disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādentā kāmesu virajjeyyu”nti. Yadā pana issariyatthaṃ sattesu
tika-vin01t1:841_5: vippaṭipajjanti, tadā pana brahmavihārena viharati tesaṃ adosakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:841_6: “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādetvā adosena dosaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:841_7: Yadā pana pabbajitā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vivadanti, tadā ariyavihārena viharati tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:841_8: amohakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā tattha ruciṃ uppādetvā
tika-vin01t1:841_9: amohena mohaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti. Evañca katvā imehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi sattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:841_10: vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaharati upaneti janeti uppādetīti “viharatī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:842_0: Iriyāpathavihārena pana na kadāci na viharati taṃ vinā attabhāvapariharaṇābhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:842_1: tatoyeva ca dibbavihārādīnampi sādhāraṇo iriyāpathavihāroti āha “idha panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:842_3: abhāvato iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanassa ca atthasiddhattā vuttaṃ. Asmiṃ pana pakkhe
tika-vin01t1:842_4: viharatīti ettha vi-saddo vicchedatthajotano, haratīti neti pavattetīti attho, vicchinditvā
tika-vin01t1:842_5: haratīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha kassa kena vicchindanaṃ, kathaṃ kassa pavattananti antolīnacodanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:842_6: sandhāyāha “so hī”tiādi. Soti bhagavā. Yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:842_7: kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti, tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvoti
tika-vin01t1:842_8: dassetuṃ “ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhana”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Aparipatantanti apatantaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin01t1:842_9: pana bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto vineyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento nānāsamāpattīhi ca
tika-vin01t1:842_10: kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaneti,
tika-vin01t1:842_11: tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti viharatīti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:843_0: Naḷerupucimandamūleti ettha vaṇṇayanti – naḷerūti tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthayakkhassetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:843_1: adhivacanaṃ, tasmā tena adhivattho pucimando “naḷerussa pucimando naḷerupucimando”ti
tika-vin01t1:843_2: vuccati. Atha vā naḷe ruhattā jātattā naḷeru. Susiramettha naḷasaddena vuccati, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:843_3: rukkhasusire jātattā naḷeru ca so pucimando cāti naḷerupucimandoti vuccati. Naḷavane
tika-vin01t1:843_4: ruhattā jātattā vā naḷeru. Naḷavane kira so pucimandarukkho jāto. Urunaḷo pucimando
tika-vin01t1:843_5: naḷerupucimando. Urusaddo cettha mahantapariyāyo, naḷasaddo susirapariyāyo, tasmā
