tika-vin01t1:843_6: mahantena susirena samannāgato pucimando naḷerupucimandoti vuccatīti. Ācariyo pana
tika-vin01t1:843_7: kimettha bahubhāsitenāti ekamevatthaṃ dassento “naḷeru nāma yakkho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:844_0: Mūla-saddo ettha samīpavacano adhippeto, na mūlamūlādīsu vattamānoti dassento āha
tika-vin01t1:844_2: avayavavisese pavattamāno mūlasaddo yasmā taṃsadisesu tannissaye padese ca ruḷhīvasena
tika-vin01t1:844_3: pariyāyato pavattati, tasmā “mūlāni uddhareyyā”ti ettha nippariyāyato mūlaṃ adhippetanti
tika-vin01t1:844_4: ekena mūlasaddena visesetvā āha “mūlamūle dissatī”ti yathā “dukkhadukkhaṃ, rūparūpa”nti
tika-vin01t1:844_5: ca. Asādhāraṇahetumhīti asādhāraṇakāraṇe. Lobho hi lobhasahagataakusalacittuppādasseva
tika-vin01t1:844_6: hetuttā asādhāraṇo, tasmā lobhasahagatacittuppādānameva āveṇike nesaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanato
tika-vin01t1:844_7: mūlaṭṭhena upakārake paccayadhammaviseseti attho. Atha vā yathā alobhādayo kusalābyākatasādhāraṇā,
tika-vin01t1:844_8: lobhādayo pana tathā na honti akusalasseva sādhāraṇattāti asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ. Atha
tika-vin01t1:844_9: vā ādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena alobhādīnampi kusalābyākatamūlānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:844_10: Tesupi hi alobhādikusalamūlaṃ akusalābyākatehi asādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ, tathā
tika-vin01t1:844_11: alobhādiabyākatamūlampi itaradvayehi asādhāraṇattāti. Nivāteti vātarahite padese,
tika-vin01t1:844_12: vātassa abhāve vā. Patantīti nipatanti, ayameva vā pāṭho. Ramaṇīyoti manuñño. Pāsādikoti
tika-vin01t1:844_13: pasādāvaho, pasādajanakoti attho. Ādhipaccaṃ kurumāno viyāti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:845_0: Tatthāti “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti
tika-vin01t1:845_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha. Siyāti kassaci evaṃ parivitakko siyā, vakkhamānākārena kadāci
tika-vin01t1:845_2: codeyya vāti attho. Yadi tāva bhagavātiādīsu codakassāyamadhippāyo – “pāṭaliputte
tika-vin01t1:845_3: pāsāde vasatī”tiādīsu viya adhikaraṇādhikaraṇaṃ yadi bhaveyya, tadā “verañjāyaṃ viharati
tika-vin01t1:845_4: naḷerupucimandamūle”ti adhikaraṇadvayaniddeso yutto siyā, imesaṃ pana bhinnadesattā
tika-vin01t1:845_5: na yutto ubhayaniddesoti. Atha tattha viharatīti yadi naḷerupucimandamūle viharati.
tika-vin01t1:845_7: ca vuttattāti adhippāyo. Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ “na hi sakkā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:845_8: vivarati. Verañjānaḷerupucimandamūlānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattāyeva hi na sakkā
tika-vin01t1:845_9: ubhayattha teneva samayena viharituṃ, “ubhayattha teneva samayenā”ti ca vuttattā
tika-vin01t1:846_0: Itaro sabbametaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānantena tayā vuttanti dassento “na kho panetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:846_1: evaṃ daṭṭhabba”ntiādimāha. Tattha etanti “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti
tika-vin01t1:846_2: etaṃ vacanaṃ. Evanti “yadi tāva bhagavā”tiādinā yaṃ taṃ bhavatā coditaṃ, taṃ atthato
tika-vin01t1:846_3: evaṃ na kho pana daṭṭhabbaṃ, na ubhayattha apubbaṃ acarimaṃ vihāradassanatthanti
tika-vin01t1:846_4: attho. Idāni attanā yathādhippetaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ tassa ca paṭikacceva vuttabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:846_5: tena ca appaṭividdhataṃ pakāsento “nanu avocumha samīpatthe bhummavacana”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:846_6: Goyūthānīti gomaṇḍalāni. Evampi naḷerupucimandamūle viharaticceva vattabbaṃ, na verañjāyanti,
tika-vin01t1:846_7: tasmā samīpādhikaraṇatthavasena ubhayathā nidānakittane kiṃ payojananti codanaṃ manasi
tika-vin01t1:847_0: Avassañcettha gocaragāmakittanaṃ kattabbaṃ. Yathā hi naḷerupucimandamūlakittanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:847_4: sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena yathūpanissayaṃ uparivisesādhigamāvahanena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:848_1: Tattha purimenāti verañjāvacanena. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Tassa
tika-vin01t1:848_2: kilamatho kilantabhāvo attakilamatho, attapīḷā attadukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti, tassa anuyogo
tika-vin01t1:848_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa vivajjanaṃ attakilamathānuyogavivajjanaṃ. Antogāme vasantānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:848_6: vasantānaṃ tadabhāvato āha “pacchimena vatthukāmappahānato”tiādi. Tattha pacchimenāti
tika-vin01t1:848_7: naḷerupucimandamūlavacanena. Kilesakāmassa vatthubhūtattā rūpādayo pañca kāmaguṇā
tika-vin01t1:848_9: vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasaṃyuttassa sukhassa yogo anuyogo anubhavo, tassa parivajjane upāyadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:849_0: Sayameva gocaragāmaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano dhammassavanānurūpabhabbapuggalānaṃ dassanato
tika-vin01t1:849_1: dhammadesanāya kālo sampatto nāma hotīti dhammadesanāya abhiyogo viññāyatīti āha
tika-vin01t1:849_3: Bahigāme vivittokāse vasantassa ākiṇṇavihārābhāvato kāyavivekādīsu adhimutti tappoṇatā
tika-vin01t1:850_0: Dhammadesanābhiyogavivekādhimuttīnaṃ hetubhūtā eva karuṇāpaññā dhammadesanāya upagamanassa
tika-vin01t1:850_1: tato apagamanassa kāraṇabhūtā hontīti āha “purimena karuṇāya upagamana”ntiādi. Karuṇāpaññāyeva
tika-vin01t1:850_2: hi anantaradukassa hetū honti. Etena ca karuṇāya upagamanaṃ na lābhādinimittaṃ, paññāya
tika-vin01t1:850_3: apagamanaṃ na virodhādinimittanti upagamanāpagamanānaṃ nirupakkilesataṃ vibhāvibhanti
tika-vin01t1:850_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhimuttatanti tanninnabhāvaṃ. Nirupalepananti anupalepanaṃ anallīyanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:851_0: Dhammikasukhāpariccāganimittanti ettha dhammikasukhaṃ nāma anavajjasukhaṃ. Tañhi
tika-vin01t1:851_1: dhammikaṃ lābhaṃ paṭicca uppannattā “dhammikasukha”nti vuccati. Uttarimanussadhammābhiyoganimittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:851_4: ṭhānaṃ devā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññanti. Loke saṃvaḍḍhabhāvanti āmisopabhogena saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:852_0: Ekapuggaloti ettha ekoti dutiyādipaṭikkhepattho gaṇanaparicchedo. Puggaloti sammutikathā,
tika-vin01t1:852_1: na paramatthakathā. Buddhassa hi bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā paramatthadesanā
tika-vin01t1:852_2: cāti. Ayamattho pana heṭṭhā vitthāritovāti idha na vuccati. Eko ca so puggalo cāti
tika-vin01t1:852_3: ekapuggalo. Kenaṭṭhena ekapuggalo? Asadisaṭṭhena guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena asamasamaṭṭhena.
tika-vin01t1:852_4: So hi dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva
tika-vin01t1:852_5: buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Ye cassa te
tika-vin01t1:852_6: guṇā, tepi aññasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Purimakā
tika-vin01t1:852_7: sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva eko rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva nāmakāyaguṇehi
tika-vin01t1:852_8: ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Loketi sattaloke.
tika-vin01t1:853_0: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva. Uppajjanto bahujanahitatthāya
tika-vin01t1:853_1: uppajjati, na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo. Evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:853_2: na sakkā etaṃ aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ. Apica uppajjamāno nāma, uppajjati
tika-vin01t1:853_3: nāma, uppanno nāmāti ayamettha bhedo veditabbo. Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato laddhabyākaraṇo
tika-vin01t1:853_4: buddhakārakadhamme pariyesanto dasa pāramiyo disvā “ime dhammā mayā pūretabbā”ti
tika-vin01t1:853_5: katasanniṭṭhāno dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Sīlapāramiṃ…pe… upekkhāpāraminti
tika-vin01t1:853_6: imā dasa pāramiyo pūrentopi, dasa upapāramiyo pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Dasa paramatthapāramiyo
tika-vin01t1:853_7: pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_8: Ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ pūrayamānopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_9: Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni buddhakārake dhamme matthakaṃ pāpentopi
tika-vin01t1:853_10: uppajjamāno nāma. Vessantarattabhāvaṃ pahāya tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikā
tika-vin01t1:853_11: sattapaṇṇāsa vassakoṭiyo tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Devatāhi yācito pañca mahāvilokanāni
tika-vin01t1:853_12: viloketvā māyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi, anūnādhike dasa māse gabbhavāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:853_13: vasantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno
tika-vin01t1:853_14: nāma. Kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo
tika-vin01t1:853_15: kaṇḍakaṃ assavaramāruyha nikkhamantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Tīṇi rajjāni atikkamanto
tika-vin01t1:853_16: anomanaditīre pabbajantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ karontopi uppajjamāno
tika-vin01t1:853_17: nāma. Paripākagate ñāṇe oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Sāyanhasamaye
tika-vin01t1:853_18: visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:853_19: anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ parisodhetvā pacchimayāmasamanantare dvādasaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:853_20: paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi uppajjamāno
tika-vin01t1:853_22: nāma. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe pana uppajjati nāma. Arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_23: Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti, saheva pana
tika-vin01t1:853_24: arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādi guṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti, tasmā nibbattasabbakiccattā
tika-vin01t1:853_25: arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma hoti. Imasmimpi sutte arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:854_0: Bahujanahitāyāti mahājanassa hitatthāya uppajjati. Bahujanasukhāyāti mahājanassa
tika-vin01t1:854_1: sukhatthāya uppajjati. Lokānukampāyāti sattalokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:854_2: Katarasattalokassāti? Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā amatapānaṃ pivi, dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:854_3: paṭivijjhi, tassa. Bhagavatā hi mahābodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā
tika-vin01t1:854_4: isipatanaṃ āgamma “dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti dhammacakkappavattanasuttante
tika-vin01t1:854_5: desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno amatapānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:854_6: piviṃsu, etassa sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno. Pañcamadivase anattalakkhaṇasuttantapariyosāne
tika-vin01t1:854_7: pañcavaggiyattherā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno.
tika-vin01t1:854_8: Tato yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi, tato kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
tika-vin01t1:854_9: tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye tayo magge ca phalāni ca sampāpesi, etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya
tika-vin01t1:854_10: uppanno. Gayāsīse ādittapariyāyapariyosāne jaṭilasahassaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin01t1:854_11: tato laṭṭhivane bimbisārappamukhā ekādasa nahutā brāhmaṇagahapatikā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:854_12: sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, ekaṃ nahutaṃ saraṇesu patiṭṭhitaṃ. Tirokuṭṭaanumodanāvasāne
tika-vin01t1:854_13: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṃ pītaṃ. Sumanamālākārasamāgame caturāsītiyā,
tika-vin01t1:854_14: dhanapālasamāgame dasahi pāṇasahassehi, khadiraṅgārajātakasamāgame caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi,
tika-vin01t1:854_16: amatapānaṃ pītaṃ. Pāsāṇakacetiye pārāyanasuttakathādivase cuddasa koṭiyo amatapānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:854_17: piviṃsu. Yamakapāṭihāriyadivase vīsati pāṇakoṭiyo, tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:854_18: nisīditvā mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ desentassa asīti
tika-vin01t1:854_19: pāṇakoṭiyo, devorohaṇe tiṃsa pāṇakoṭiyo, sakkapañhasuttante asīti devasahassāni amatapānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:854_20: piviṃsu. Mahāsamayasuttante maṅgalasutte cūḷarāhulovāde samacittapaṭipadāyāti imesu
tika-vin01t1:854_21: catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayappattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi, etassapi sattalokassa
tika-vin01t1:854_22: anukampāya uppannoti. Yāvajjadivasā ito parampi anāgate imaṃ sāsanaṃ nissāya saggamokkhamagge
tika-vin01t1:855_0: Devamanussānanti na kevalaṃ devamanussānaṃyeva, avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya
tika-vin01t1:855_1: hitāya sukhāyeva uppanno. Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbe
tika-vin01t1:855_2: puggale dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā etesampi atthatthāya hitatthāya sukhatthāyeva
tika-vin01t1:856_0: Katamo ekapuggaloti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ ekapuggalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:856_1: vibhāvento “tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti āha. Tadatthaparinipphādananti lokatthanipphādanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:856_2: buddhakiccasampādananti attho. Paṭhamaṃ lumbinīvane dutiyaṃ bodhimaṇḍeti lumbinīvane
tika-vin01t1:856_3: rūpakāyena jāto, bodhimaṇḍe dhammakāyena. Evamādināti ādi-saddena verañjākittanato
tika-vin01t1:856_4: rūpakāyassa anuggaṇhanaṃ dasseti, naḷerupucimandamūlakittanato dhammakāyassa. Tathā
tika-vin01t1:856_5: purimena parādhīnakiriyākaraṇaṃ, dutiyena attādhīnakiriyākaraṇaṃ. Purimena vā karuṇākiccaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:856_6: itarena paññākiccaṃ, purimena cassa paramāya anukampāya samannāgamaṃ, pacchimena
tika-vin01t1:857_0: Pacchimakoti guṇena pacchimako. Ānandattheraṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṅkhyāyapīti gaṇanatopi.
tika-vin01t1:857_1: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅkhātasaṅghātena
tika-vin01t1:857_2: samaṇagaṇenā”ti. Ettha pana “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā
tika-vin01t1:857_3: dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā,
tika-vin01t1:857_4: “yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni
tika-vin01t1:857_5: aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti
tika-vin01t1:857_6: evaṃ vuttānañca sīlānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātena saṅghato saṅghaṭito sametoti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅkhātasaṅghāto,
tika-vin01t1:857_7: samaṇagaṇo. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t1:857_8: anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:857_9: vijjatī”ti ādivacanato diṭṭhisīlānaṃ niyatasabhāvattā sotāpannāpi aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena
tika-vin01t1:857_10: saṃhatā, pageva sakadāgāmiādayo. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano
tika-vin01t1:857_11: guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatāyeva. “Tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati, tathārūpesu
tika-vin01t1:857_12: sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti vacanato puthujjanānampi diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:857_13: labbhatiyeva, idha pana ariyasaṅghoyeva adhippeto “yo tattha pacchimako, so sotāpanno”ti
tika-vin01t1:857_14: vacanato. Etenāti “pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti etena vacanena. Assāti pañcamattassa
tika-vin01t1:857_15: bhikkhusatassa. Nirabbudotiādīnaṃ vacanattho parato eva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t1:858_0: Assosīti ettha savanamupalabbhoti āha “assosīti suṇi upalabhī”ti, aññāsīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:858_1: So cāyamupalabbho savanavasenevāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena
tika-vin01t1:858_2: aññāsī”ti. Avadhāraṇaphalattā saddappayogassa sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:858_3: āha “khoti padapūraṇamatte nipāto”ti. Avadhāraṇattheti pana iminā antogadhāvadhāraṇepi
tika-vin01t1:858_4: sabbasmiṃ vākye iṭṭhatovadhāraṇatthaṃ khosaddaggahaṇanti dasseti. Tameva iṭṭhatovadhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:858_5: dassento āha “tattha avadhāraṇatthenā”tiādi. Atha padapūraṇatthena khosaddena kiṃpayojananti
tika-vin01t1:858_6: āha “padapūraṇena pana byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattamevā”ti. “Assosī”ti hi padaṃ khosadde
tika-vin01t1:858_7: gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti, tena ca purimapacchimapadāni
tika-vin01t1:858_8: siliṭṭhāni honti, na tasmiṃ aggahite, tasmā padapūraṇena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattameva
tika-vin01t1:858_9: payojanaṃ. Matta-saddo cettha visesanivattiattho, tenassa anatthantaradīpanataṃ dasseti,
tika-vin01t1:859_0: Verañjoti ettha saddalakkhaṇānusārena atthaṃ dassento āha “verañjāyaṃ jāto”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:859_1: Brahmaṃ aṇatīti ettha brahmanti vedo vuccati, so pana mantabrahmakappavasena tividho.
tika-vin01t1:859_2: Tattha mantā padhānamūlabhāvatoyeva aṭṭhakādīhi pavuttā, itare pana tannissayena
tika-vin01t1:859_3: jātā, tena padhānasseva gahaṇaṃ. Mante sajjhāyatīti iruvedādike mantasatthe sajjhāyatīti
tika-vin01t1:859_4: attho. Iruvedādayo hi guttabhāsitabbatāya “mantā”ti vuccanti. Idameva hīti avadhāraṇena
tika-vin01t1:859_5: brahmato jātotiādikaṃ niruttiṃ paṭikkhipati. Jātibrāhmaṇānanti iminā aññepi brāhmaṇā
tika-vin01t1:859_6: atthīti dasseti. Duvidhā hi brāhmaṇā jātibrāhmaṇā visuddhibrāhmaṇā cāti. Idāni tattha
tika-vin01t1:860_0: Samitapāpattāti accantaṃ anavasesato savāsanaṃ samitapāpattā. Evañhi bāhirakaavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamaṇato
tika-vin01t1:860_1: bhagavato pāpasamaṇaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Vuttamevatthaṃ udāharaṇena vibhāvento āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:860_2: Ettha pana “bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇo, samitapāpattā samaṇoti vuccatīti idaṃ bhinnagāthāsannissitapadadvayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:860_3: ekato gahetvā vutta”nti vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu “samitattā hi pāpānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:860_4: samaṇoti pavuccatīti idaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā ‘samitattā samaṇoti vuccatī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:860_5: Bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇoti idaṃ pana aññasmiṃ gāthābandhe vuttavacana”nti. Anekatthattā
tika-vin01t1:860_6: nipātānaṃ idha anussavanatthe adhippetoti āha “khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto”ti.
tika-vin01t1:860_7: Jātisamudāgatanti jātiyā āgataṃ, jātisiddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ālapanamattanti piyālāpavacanamattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:860_8: Piyasamudāhārā hete bhoti vā āvusoti vā devānampiyāti vā. Bhovādī nāma so hotīti
tika-vin01t1:860_9: yo āmantanādīsu “bho bho”ti vadanto vicarati, so bhovādī nāma hotīti attho. Sakiñcanoti
tika-vin01t1:860_10: rāgādīhi kiñcanehi sakiñcano. Rāgādayo hi satte kiñcenti maddanti palibundhantīti
tika-vin01t1:860_11: “kiñcanānī”ti vuccanti. Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpentā “kiñcehi kapila, kiñcehi
tika-vin01t1:860_12: kāḷakā”ti vadanti, tasmā maddanaṭṭho kiñcanaṭṭhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:861_0: Gottavasenāti ettha gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. Gosaddena cettha abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:861_1: tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Gotamoti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya
tika-vin01t1:861_2: tāyati rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
tika-vin01t1:861_3: evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni buddhiabhidhānāni
tika-vin01t1:861_4: tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. So pana aññakulaparamparāya asādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa
tika-vin01t1:861_6: ca samaṇoti iminā sarikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatākittanato,
tika-vin01t1:861_7: gotamoti iminā lokiyajanehi uḷārakulasambhūtatādīpanato. Sakyassa suddhodanamahārājassa
tika-vin01t1:861_8: putto sakyaputto. Iminā ca uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato vuttaṃ “idaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:861_10: paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ. Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūtoti
tika-vin01t1:861_11: ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena parihāniyā anabhibhūto anajjhotthaṭo.
tika-vin01t1:861_12: Tathā hi lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ tassa kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ, atha kho vaḍḍhiyeva.
tika-vin01t1:861_13: Abhinikkhamane ca tato samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññāto. Tena “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti
tika-vin01t1:861_14: idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ
tika-vin01t1:861_15: mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitabhāvasiddhito. Tato paranti “verañjāyaṃ viharatī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:862_0: Itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacananti itthaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto āpannoti ittambhūto,
tika-vin01t1:862_1: tassa ākhyānaṃ itthambhūtākhyānaṃ, soyeva attho itthambhūtākhyānattho. Atha vā itthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:862_2: evaṃ pakāro bhūto jātoti evaṃ kathanattho itthambhūtākhyānattho, tasmiṃ upayogavacananti
tika-vin01t1:862_3: attho. Ettha ca abbhuggatoti ettha abhi-saddo itthambhūtākhyānatthajotako abhibhavitvā
tika-vin01t1:862_4: uggamanappakārassa dīpanato. Tena yogato “taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotama”nti idaṃ
tika-vin01t1:862_6: vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā
tika-vin01t1:862_7: “sādhu devadatto mātaramabhī”ti ettha abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:862_8: kataṃ, evamidhāpi taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ abhi evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo uggatoti
tika-vin01t1:862_10: ettha hi “devadatto mātaramabhi mātari visaye mātuyā vā sādhū”ti evaṃ adhikaraṇatthe
tika-vin01t1:862_11: sāmiatthe vā bhummavacanassa vā sāmivacanassa vā pasaṅge itthambhūtākhyānatthajotakena
tika-vin01t1:862_12: abhisaddena yoge upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Yathā cettha “devadatto mātu visaye mātusambandhī
tika-vin01t1:862_13: vā sādhuttappakārappatto”ti ayamattho viññāyati, evamidhāpi “bhoto gotamassa sambandhī
tika-vin01t1:862_14: kittisaddo abbhuggato abhibhavitvā uggamanappakārappatto”ti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:862_15: Tattha hi devadattaggahaṇaṃ viya idha kittisaddaggahaṇaṃ, tathā tattha “mātara”nti
tika-vin01t1:862_16: vacanaṃ viya idha “taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotama”nti vacanaṃ, tattha sādhusaddaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:863_0: Kalyāṇoti bhaddako. Kalyāṇabhāvo cassa kalyāṇaguṇavisayatāyāti āha “kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato”ti,
tika-vin01t1:863_1: kalyāṇehi guṇehi samannāgato taṃvisayatāya yuttoti attho. Taṃvisayatā hettha samannāgamo
tika-vin01t1:863_2: kalyāṇaguṇavisayatāya tannissitoti adhippāyo. Seṭṭhoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Seṭṭhaguṇavisayatāya
tika-vin01t1:863_3: eva hi kittisaddassa seṭṭhatā “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭha”ntiādīsu viya. “Bhagavā araha”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:863_4: guṇānaṃ saṃkittanato saddanīyato ca kittisaddo vaṇṇoti āha “kittisaddoti kitti evā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:863_5: Vaṇṇoyeva hi kittetabbato kittisaddanīyato saddoti ca vuccati. Kittipariyāyo hi saddasaddo
tika-vin01t1:863_6: yathā “uḷārasaddā isayo, guṇavanto tapassino”ti. Abhitthavanavasena pavatto saddo
tika-vin01t1:864_0: “Abbhuggato”ti pana etassa attho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na dassito, tasmā tassattho evaṃ veditabbo
tika-vin01t1:864_1: – abbhuggatoti abhibhavitvā uggato, anaññasādhāraṇaguṇe ārabbha pavattattā sadevakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:864_2: lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā pavattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kinti saddo abbhuggatoti āha “itipi so
tika-vin01t1:864_3: bhagavā”tiādi. Ito paraṃ pana īdisesu ṭhānesu yattha yattha pāḷipāṭhassa attho vattabbo
tika-vin01t1:864_4: siyā, tattha tattha “pāḷiyaṃ panā”ti vatvā atthaṃ dassayissāma, idāni tattha padayojanāpubbakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:864_5: atthaṃ dassento āha “itipi so bhagavātiādīsu pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā”tiādi. So bhagavāti
tika-vin01t1:864_6: yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho
tika-vin01t1:864_7: devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi
tika-vin01t1:864_8: kāraṇehi bhagavāti laddhanāmo, so bhagavā. Bhagavāti hi idaṃ satthu nāmakittanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:864_9: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata”ntiādi. Parato pana
tika-vin01t1:864_10: bhagavāti guṇakittanameva. Yathā kammaṭṭhānikena “araha”ntiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ
tika-vin01t1:864_11: itipisaddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussarīyanti, evaṃ buddhaguṇasaṃkittakenapīti dassento
tika-vin01t1:864_12: “itipi arahaṃ itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavā”ti āha. Evañhi sati “araha”ntiādīhi
tika-vin01t1:864_13: navahi padehi ye sadevake loke ativiya pākaṭā paññātā buddhaguṇā, te nānappakārato
tika-vin01t1:864_14: vibhāvitā honti. “Itipetaṃ bhūtaṃ, itipetaṃ taccha”ntiādīsu viya hi idha iti-saddo
tika-vin01t1:864_15: āsannapaccakkhakāraṇattho, pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena ca tesaṃ guṇānaṃ bahubhāvo
tika-vin01t1:864_16: dīpito, tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni saddhāsampannānaṃ viññujātikānaṃ paccakkhāni
tika-vin01t1:864_17: hontīti tāni saṃkittentena viññunā cittassa sammukhībhūtāneva katvā saṃkittetabbānīti
tika-vin01t1:864_18: dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:865_0: “Suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ, suttānurūpaṃ paridīpayantī”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā visuddhimagge
tika-vin01t1:865_1: sabbākārato saṃvaṇṇitampi atthaṃ idhāpi vitthāretvā dassetukāmo tattha payojanamāha
tika-vin01t1:865_4: Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ. Arānanti saṃsāracakkassa arānaṃ. Hatattāti viddhaṃsitattā.
tika-vin01t1:866_0: Idāni yathāvuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “ārakā hi so”tiādi. Dūratā nāma āsannatā
tika-vin01t1:866_1: viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṃsagataṃ dūrabhāvaṃ dassento “suvidūravidūre
tika-vin01t1:866_2: ṭhito”ti āha, suṭṭhu vidūrabhāveneva vidūre ṭhitoti attho. So panassa kilesehi dūre
tika-vin01t1:866_3: ṭhitabhāvo, na padesavasena, atha kho tesaṃ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha “maggena
tika-vin01t1:866_4: kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā”ti. Nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṃ
tika-vin01t1:866_5: manasi katvā vuttaṃ “savāsanāna”nti. Na hi ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññe saha vāsanāya
tika-vin01t1:866_6: kilese pahātuṃ sakkonti. Etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:866_7: hoti. Kā panāyaṃ vāsanā nāma? Pahīnakilesassapi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto
tika-vin01t1:866_9: viya. Kathaṃ pana “ārakā”ti vutte “kilesehī”ti ayamattho labbhatīti sāmaññacodanāya
tika-vin01t1:866_10: visese avaṭṭhānato visesatthinā ca visesassa anupayujjitabbato “ārakāssa honti pāpakā
tika-vin01t1:866_11: akusalā dhammā”tiādīni suttapadānettha udāharitabbāni. Ārakāti cettha ā-kārassa rassattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:866_12: ka-kārassa ca hakāraṃ sānusāraṃ katvā niruttinayena “araha”nti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:868: Asamaṅgī ca dosehi, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:869: Anatthacaraṇena kilesā eva arayoti kilesārayo. Arīnaṃ hatattā arihāti vattabbe niruttinayena “araha”nti vuttaṃ. Etthāpi yathāvuttassatthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ idaṃ veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:872_0: Yañcetaṃ saṃsāracakkanti sambandho. Rathacakkassa nābhi viya mūlāvayavabhūtaṃ anto
tika-vin01t1:872_2: Nābhiyā nemiyā ca sambaddhaarasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi
tika-vin01t1:872_4: Tattha tattha bhave pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṃ jarāmaraṇanti taṃ nemiṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:872_5: āha “jarāmaraṇanemī”ti. Yathā rathacakkappavattiyā padhānakāraṇaṃ akkho, evaṃ saṃsāracakkappavattiyā
tika-vin01t1:872_6: āsavasamudayoti āha “āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā”ti. Āsavā eva avijjādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:872_8: kāmabhavādiko tibhavo eva ratho, tasmiṃ tibhavarathe. Attano paccayehi samaṃ, sabbaso
tika-vin01t1:872_9: vā ādito paṭṭhāya yojitanti samāyojitaṃ. Ādirahitaṃ kālaṃ pavattatīti katvā anādikālappavattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:875_0: Evaṃ vuttasaṃsārova saṃsāracakkaṃ. Anenāti bhagavatā. Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t1:875_1: ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne kāle vā. Bodhīti paññā, sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti
tika-vin01t1:875_3: dvidhā pavatteti attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi. Sīlapathaviyanti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:875_4: sīlameva pathavī, tassaṃ. Patiṭṭhāyāti sampādanavasena patiṭṭhahitvā. Saddhāhatthenāti
tika-vin01t1:875_5: anavajjadhammādānasādhanato saddhāva hattho, tena. Kammakkhayakaranti kāyakammādibhedassa
tika-vin01t1:875_6: sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṃ. Ñāṇapharasunti samādhisilāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:876_0: Evaṃ “arānaṃ hatattā”ti ettha vuttaṃ arasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ cakkaṃ viya cakkanti gahetvā
tika-vin01t1:876_1: atthayojanaṃ katvā idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi
tika-vin01t1:876_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭanti anu anu amataggaṃ aviññātapubbakoṭikaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:876_3: Sesā dasa dhammāti saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā dasa dhammā. Kathaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:876_4: arabhāvoti āha “avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā cā”ti. Tattha avijjā mūlaṃ
tika-vin01t1:876_5: padhānakāraṇaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ te avijjāmūlakā, tesaṃ bhāvo avijjāmūlakattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:876_6: Jarāmaraṇaṃ pariyantaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ etesanti jarāmaraṇapariyantā, saṅkhārādayo
tika-vin01t1:876_7: dasa dhammā. Tesaṃ bhāvo jarāmaraṇapariyantattaṃ. Saṅkhārādijātipariyosānānaṃ dasadhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:876_8: avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyosānattā cāti attho, nābhibhūtāya avijjāya mūlato
tika-vin01t1:876_9: nemibhūtena jarāmaraṇena antato saṅkhārādīnaṃ sambandhattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:877_0: Dukkhādīsūti dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggesu. Aññāṇanti ñāṇappaṭipakkhattā moho aññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:877_1: na pana ñāṇato aññaṃ, napi ñāṇassa abhāvamattaṃ. Tattha dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ yathāsabhāvappaṭivedhāppadānato
tika-vin01t1:877_2: tappaṭicchādanavaseneva. Ettha hi kiñcāpi ṭhapetvā lokuttarasaccadvayaṃ sesaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin01t1:877_3: ārammaṇavasenapi avijjā uppajjati, evaṃ santepi paṭicchādanavaseneva idha adhippetā.
tika-vin01t1:877_4: Sā hi uppannā dukkhasaccaṃ paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati, yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
tika-vin01t1:877_5: na deti, tathā samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ magganti.
tika-vin01t1:878_0: Dukkhanti cettha dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ adhippetanti taṃ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā
tika-vin01t1:878_1: tathā tappaṭicchādikañca avijjaṃ tidhā katvā avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike
tika-vin01t1:878_2: paṭipāṭiyā dassento “kāmabhave ca avijjā”tiādimāha. Tattha kāmabhave ca avijjāti
tika-vin01t1:878_3: kāmabhave ādīnavapaṭicchādikā avijjā. Rūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave avijjāti etthāpi
tika-vin01t1:878_4: eseva nayo. Kāmabhave saṅkhārānanti kāmabhūmipariyāpannānaṃ puññāpuññasaṅkhārānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:878_5: kāmabhave vā nipphādetabbā ye puññāpuññasaṅkhārā, tesaṃ kāmabhavūpapattinibbattakasaṅkhārānanti
tika-vin01t1:878_6: attho. Saṅkhārāti cettha lokiyakusalākusalacetanā veditabbā. Paccayo hotīti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:878_7: tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti, apuññābhisaṅkhāresu
tika-vin01t1:878_9: pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena ca paccayo hoti. Arūpabhave saṅkhārānanti
tika-vin01t1:878_10: āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ. Paccayo hotīti upanissayapaccayavaseneva. Imasmiñca panatthe
tika-vin01t1:878_11: ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti, tasmā taṃ nayidha vitthārayissāma. Itaresūti rūpārūpabhavesu.
tika-vin01t1:879_0: Tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānanti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṃ ghānādittayassa tattha asambhavato. Ekassāti
tika-vin01t1:879_1: manāyatanassa itaresaṃ tattha asambhavato. Iminā nayena tiṇṇaṃ phassānantiādīsupi
tika-vin01t1:879_3: vasena chabbidhassa phassassa. Channaṃ vedanānanti cakkhusamphassajā vedanā, tathā
tika-vin01t1:879_5: vedanāti imāsaṃ channaṃ vedanānaṃ. Channaṃ taṇhākāyānanti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā
tika-vin01t1:879_6: rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhāti imesaṃ channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ. Tattha tattha
tika-vin01t1:879_7: sā sā taṇhāti rūpataṇhādibhedā tattha tattha kāmabhavādīsu uppajjanakataṇhā.
tika-vin01t1:880_0: Sā taṇhādimūlikā kathā atisaṃkhittāti taṃ upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā
tika-vin01t1:880_1: dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāme paribhuñjissāmīti iminā kāmataṇhāpavattimāha,
tika-vin01t1:880_2: tathā saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmītiādīhi. Sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena
tika-vin01t1:880_3: pavattamānā kāmupādānaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “kāmupādānapaccayā”ti. Tathevāti
tika-vin01t1:880_4: kāmupādānapaccayā eva. Brahmalokasampattinti rūpībrahmaloke sampattiṃ. “Sabbepi tebhūmakā
tika-vin01t1:880_5: dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā”ti vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā “kāmupādānapaccayā
tika-vin01t1:880_6: eva mettaṃ bhāvetī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha mettaṃ bhāvetīti mijjati siniyhatīti mettā,
tika-vin01t1:880_7: taṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti attho. Atha vā mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:880_8: jhānaṃ vā, taṃ bhāveti vaḍḍheti uppādeti vāti attho. Karuṇaṃ bhāvetītiādīsupi imināva
tika-vin01t1:881_1: eseva nayoti attho. Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – idhekacco “natthi paraloko”ti natthikadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:881_2: gaṇhāti, so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:881_3: Aparo “asukasmiṃ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so tatrūpapattiyā
tika-vin01t1:881_4: kāyena sucaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Aparo “rūpī manomayo hutvā
tika-vin01t1:881_5: attā ucchijjatī”ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti bhāvanāpāripūriyāti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t1:881_6: veditabbaṃ. Aparopi “arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī”ti arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:881_7: bhāveti bhāvanāpāripūriyāti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Etāhiyeva attavādupādānamūlikāpi
tika-vin01t1:881_8: yojanā saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasenapi yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:881_9: Aparo “sīlena suddhi, vatena suddhī”ti asuddhimaggaṃ “suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto
tika-vin01t1:881_10: sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:882_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena “kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo
tika-vin01t1:882_1: hotī”tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayuppannabhāvo ca dassito,
tika-vin01t1:882_3: Tattha yathā saṅkhārā hetunibbattā, evaṃ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha
tika-vin01t1:882_5: paricchijja gahaṇe. Nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ. Paññāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisaṅkhātā
tika-vin01t1:882_6: pakārato jānanā. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti tiṭṭhanti ettha phaladhammā tadāyattavuttitāyāti
tika-vin01t1:882_7: ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ, dhammānaṃ ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti, dhammaṭṭhitiyā ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:882_8: paccayañāṇanti attho, paṭiccasamuppādāvabodhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāmañcettha paccayapariggahe
tika-vin01t1:882_9: paññāyeva dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, saṅkhāresu pana adiṭṭhesu avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:882_10: na sakkā daṭṭhunti “saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā”ti paccayuppannadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ katanti
tika-vin01t1:882_11: veditabbaṃ. Ubhopete hetusamuppannāti idaṃ pana ubhinnampi paccayuppannabhāvaṃ dassetukāmatāya
tika-vin01t1:882_12: vuttaṃ. Idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ yasmā addhattaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:882_13: tasmā “atītampi addhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Etena nayena sabbapadāni vitthāretabbānīti
tika-vin01t1:882_14: etena nayena “avijjā hetū”tiādinā avijjāyaṃ vuttanayena “saṅkhārā hetu, viññāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:883_0: Saṃkhippanti ettha avijjādayo viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo, hetu vipāko ca. Atha vā
tika-vin01t1:883_1: hetuvipākoti saṃkhippatīti saṅkhepo, avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca. Saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena
tika-vin01t1:883_2: pana ekavacanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Te pana saṅkhepā atīte hetu, etarahi vipāko,
tika-vin01t1:883_3: etarahi hetu, āyatiṃ vipākoti evaṃ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā, tenāha “purimasaṅkhepo
tika-vin01t1:883_4: cettha atīto addhā”tiādi. Paccuppanno addhāti sambandho. Taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva
tika-vin01t1:883_5: hontīti ettha avijjāgahaṇena kilesabhāvasāmaññato taṇhupādānā gahitā, saṅkhāraggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:883_6: kammabhāvasāmaññato bhavo gahito, avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ tehi vinā sakiccākaraṇato ca
tika-vin01t1:883_7: taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva honti. Atha vā avidvā paritassati, paritasito upādiyati,
tika-vin01t1:883_8: tassupādānapaccayā bhavo, tasmā taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā honti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:884: “Purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā. Nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo, iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:885_0: Tattha purimakammabhavasminti purime kammabhave, atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kariyamāneti
tika-vin01t1:885_1: attho. Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho yena mūḷho kammaṃ karoti, sā avijjā.
tika-vin01t1:885_2: Āyūhanā saṅkhārāti taṃ kammaṃ karoto yā purimacetanāyo, yathā “dānaṃ dassāmī”ti cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:885_3: uppādetvā māsampi saṃvaccharampi dānūpakaraṇāni sajjentassa uppannā purimacetanāyo,
tika-vin01t1:885_4: paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavoti vuccati. Ekāvajjanesu
tika-vin01t1:885_5: vā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhanasaṅkhārā nāma, sattamā bhavo. Yā kāci vā pana cetanā
tika-vin01t1:885_6: bhavo, sampayuttā āyūhanasaṅkhārā nāma. Nikanti taṇhāti yā kammaṃ karontassa tassa
tika-vin01t1:885_7: phale upapattibhave nikāmanā patthanā, sā taṇhā nāma. Upagamanaṃ upādānanti yaṃ kammabhavassa
tika-vin01t1:885_8: paccayabhūtaṃ “idaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi ucchijjissāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:885_9: nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ, idaṃ upādānaṃ nāma. Cetanā bhavoti
tika-vin01t1:885_10: “taṃ kammaṃ karoto yā purimā cetanāyo”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttesu tīsu atthavikappesu
tika-vin01t1:885_11: yā cetanā bhavoti vuttā, sā cetanā bhavoti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:886_0: Idāni sabbepete avijjādayo dhamme dvīhi vaṭṭehi saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha “ime pañca
tika-vin01t1:886_1: dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭa”nti. Ettha ca nippariyāyato saṅkhārā bhavo ca kammaṃ, avijjādayo
tika-vin01t1:886_2: pana kammasahāyatāya kammasarikkhakā tadupakārakā cāti kammanti vuttā. Avijjādayo
tika-vin01t1:886_3: hi vipākadhammadhammatāya kammasarikkhakā sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā ca kammassa
tika-vin01t1:886_4: ca upakārakā. Kammameva ca aññamaññasambandhaṃ hutvā punappunaṃ parivattanaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:886_5: kammavaṭṭaṃ. Viññāṇādayo pañcāti viññāṇādayo vedanāpariyantā pañca etarahi idāni
tika-vin01t1:886_6: imasmiṃ attabhāveti vuttaṃ hoti. Avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva hontīti etthāpi pubbe viya
tika-vin01t1:886_7: kilesakammabhāvasāmaññato taṇhupādānaggahaṇena avijjā gahitā, bhavaggahaṇena saṅkhārā
tika-vin01t1:886_8: gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā bhave gahite tassa pubbabhāgā taṃsampayuttā vā saṅkhārā
tika-vin01t1:886_9: gahitāva honti, taṇhupādānaggahaṇena ca taṃsampayuttā yāya vā mūḷho kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t1:886_10: sā avijjāva hotīti taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva honti. Teneva vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:887_0: “Idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:887_1: upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo, iti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:888: Tattha idha paripakkattā āyatanānanti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-vin01t1:889_1: avatthānaṃ gahaṇena avatthāvantā gahitāva honti tadavinābhāvatoti āha “jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena
tika-vin01t1:889_2: viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā”ti. Apadesenāti jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ kathanena. Imeti viññāṇādayo.
tika-vin01t1:889_3: Āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭanti paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṃ anāgatānaṃ gahitattā. Teti avijjādayo.
tika-vin01t1:889_4: Ākāratoti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi
tika-vin01t1:889_5: pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ākārā. Tato ākārato. Vīsatividhā hontīti
tika-vin01t1:890_0: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānañcettha antarā eko sandhīti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato
tika-vin01t1:890_1: hetuphalassa sambandhabhūto eko sandhi, tathā bhavajātīnamantarā. Vedanātaṇhānamantarā
tika-vin01t1:890_2: pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi.
tika-vin01t1:890_3: Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayo hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:891_0: Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Tenāha “catusaṅkhepa”ntiādi. Sabbākāratoti idha vuttehi
tika-vin01t1:891_1: ca avuttehi ca paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānādīsu ca āgatehi
tika-vin01t1:891_2: sabbehi ākārehi. Jānātīti avabujjhati. Passatīti dassanabhūtena ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato
tika-vin01t1:891_3: passati. Aññāti paṭivijjhatīti tesaṃyeva vevacanaṃ. Tanti taṃ jānanaṃ. Ñātaṭṭhenāti
tika-vin01t1:891_4: yathāsabhāvato jānanaṭṭhena. Pajānanaṭṭhenāti aniccādīhi pakārehi paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-vin01t1:892_0: Idāni yadatthamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ idhānītaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “iminā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:892_1: te dhammeti te avijjādike dhamme. Yathābhūtaṃ ñatvāti mahāvajirañāṇena yāthāvato
tika-vin01t1:892_2: jānitvā. Nibbindantoti balavavipassanāya nibbindanto. Virajjanto vimuccantoti ariyamaggehi
tika-vin01t1:892_3: virajjanto vimuccanto. Are hanīti sambandho. Tattha yadā bhagavā virajjati vimuccati,
tika-vin01t1:892_4: tadā are hanati nāma. Tato paraṃ pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “hani vihani
tika-vin01t1:892_5: viddhaṃsesī”ti. Evampi arānaṃ hatattā arahanti evaṃ imināpi pakārena yathāvuttasaṃsāracakkassa
tika-vin01t1:895_0: Aggadakkhiṇeyyattāti uttamadakkhiṇeyyabhāvato. Cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne
tika-vin01t1:895_1: tattheva loko pūjaṃ karoti, aññattha pūjāvisesā pacchijjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana sammāsambuddhe
tika-vin01t1:895_3: pūjessāmī”ti vuttepi satthāraṃyeva uddissa katattā “bhagavantaṃ uddissā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:895_4: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti yathāvuttato aññesaṃ amahesakkhehi devamanussehi
tika-vin01t1:895_5: kariyamānānaṃ nātiuḷārānaṃ pūjāvisesānaṃ arahabhāve kā nāma kathā. Paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi
tika-vin01t1:895_6: arahanti yathāvuttacīvarādipaccayānaṃ pūjāvisesassa ca aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvena anucchavikattāpi
tika-vin01t1:895_7: arahaṃ. Imassapi atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:900_0: Asilokabhayenāti akittibhayena, ayasabhayena garahābhayenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Raho pāpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:900_1: karontīti “mā naṃ koci jaññā”ti rahasi pāpaṃ karonti. Evamesa na kadāci karotīti
tika-vin01t1:900_2: esa bhagavā pāpahetūnaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva suppahīnattā kadācipi evaṃ na karoti. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin01t1:903_0: Idāni sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ yathāvuttamatthaṃ sabbampi saṅgahetvā dassento āha “hoti
tika-vin01t1:903_1: cetthā”tiādi. Kilesārīna so munīti ettha gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ niggahītalopo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:903_2: kilesārīnaṃ hatattāti attho. Paccayādīna cārahoti etthāpi niggahītalopo vuttanayeneva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:904_0: Arahanti ettha ayamaparopi nayo daṭṭhabbo – ārakāti arahaṃ, suvidūrabhāvato icceva
tika-vin01t1:904_1: attho. Kuto pana suvidūrabhāvatoti? Ye abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā,
tika-vin01t1:904_2: tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa
tika-vin01t1:904_3: adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā ca, tato suvidūrabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-vin01t1:905_0: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇe cepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa
tika-vin01t1:905_1: pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo
tika-vin01t1:905_2: muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo, atha kho so ārakāva
tika-vin01t1:905_3: mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. Taṃ kissa hetu? Dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati,
tika-vin01t1:906_0: Yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṃpātaṃ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṃ, na te tāvatā
tika-vin01t1:906_1: “satthu santikā”ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṃ. Iti asappurisānaṃ ārakā dūreti
tika-vin01t1:908: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:909_0: Tathā ārakāti arahaṃ, āsannabhāvatoti attho. Kuto pana āsannabhāvatoti? Ye bhāvitakāyā
tika-vin01t1:909_1: bhāvitasīlā bhāvitacittā bhāvitapaññā, tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa
tika-vin01t1:909_2: kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā, tato āsannabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:910_0: “Yojanasate cepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya, so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu
tika-vin01t1:910_1: na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto apaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito
tika-vin01t1:910_2: ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo, atha kho so santikeva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. Taṃ kissa
tika-vin01t1:910_3: hetu? Dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati, dhammaṃ passanto maṃ passatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:911: Tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasatantarikāpi honti, na tāvatā te “satthu dūracārino”ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṃ. Iti sappurisānaṃ ārakā āsanneti arahaṃ. Tenedaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:913: Ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi arahaṃ jino”ti.
tika-vin01t1:914_0: Ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti, tassa diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi
tika-vin01t1:914_1: anatthaṃ āvahanti, nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya ekaṃseneva ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ca,
tika-vin01t1:914_2: te attahitaṃ parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā
tika-vin01t1:914_3: pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti rahā nāma, te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena
tika-vin01t1:915: “Tathāgatassa kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgo pahīno doso moho, sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:916: Tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ akārādesaṃ katvā “araha”nti vuttaṃ. Tenedaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:918: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:919_0: Ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto
tika-vin01t1:919_1: khīṇāsavā, ye ca sekhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti,
tika-vin01t1:919_2: ye ca parisuddhappayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā, tehi
tika-vin01t1:919_3: na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavatāti arahaṃ. Tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā
tika-vin01t1:919_4: diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitāva honti. Yathāha āyasmā piṅgiyo –
tika-vin01t1:924: “Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
tika-vin01t1:928: Teneva ca te aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisanti. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:929: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:930_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti. Iti suppaṭipannehi
tika-vin01t1:930_1: purisavisesehi avirahitabbato tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā,
tika-vin01t1:930_2: natthi vā etassa rahā sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṃ. Tenedaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:932: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:933_0: Rahoti ca gamanaṃ vuccati, bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāre
tika-vin01t1:933_1: gamanaṃ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva sabbaso sasambhārassa
tika-vin01t1:936: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:937: Evaṃ natthi etassa raho gamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṃ. Tenedaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:938: “Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
tika-vin01t1:940_0: Pāsaṃsattā vā bhagavā arahaṃ. Akkharacintakā hi pasaṃsāyaṃ arahasaddaṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-vin01t1:940_1: Pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇato yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke
tika-vin01t1:940_2: suppatiṭṭhito. Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya
tika-vin01t1:940_3: anuttarāya vimuttiyā asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṃ tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:940_4: tasmiṃ guṇe vibhajitvā vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana
tika-vin01t1:940_5: pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpo. Iti pāsaṃsattāpi bhagavā arahaṃ. Tenedaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:946: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jinoti.
tika-vin01t1:947: Ettāvatā ca “araha”nti padassa sabbaso attho vibhatto hoti.
tika-vin01t1:948_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhoti imassa atthaṃ vibhajitvā dassento āha “sammā sāmañcā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:948_1: Tattha sammāti aviparītaṃ. Sāmanti sayameva, aparaneyyo hutvāti attho. Sambuddhoti
tika-vin01t1:948_2: hi ettha saṃ-saddo sayanti etassa atthassa bodhakoti daṭṭhabbo. Sabbadhammānanti
tika-vin01t1:948_3: anavasesānaṃ neyyadhammānaṃ. Kathaṃ panettha sabbadhammānanti ayaṃ viseso labbhatīti?
tika-vin01t1:948_4: Ekadesassa aggahaṇato. Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati
tika-vin01t1:948_5: yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Evañca katvā atthavisesanapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi
tika-vin01t1:948_6: veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato. “Sammā sāmañca buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti
tika-vin01t1:948_7: ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati, “sabbadhammāna”nti idaṃ pana atthato labbhamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:948_8: gahetvā vuttaṃ. Na hi bujjhanakiriyā avisayā yujjati.
tika-vin01t1:949_0: Idāni tassā visayaṃ “sabbadhamme”ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “abhiññeyye
tika-vin01t1:949_1: dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhiññeyyeti aniccādito lakkhaṇarasādito ca abhivisiṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:949_2: ñāṇena jānitabbe catusaccadhamme. Abhiññeyyato buddhoti abhiññeyyabhāvato bujjhi,
tika-vin01t1:949_3: pubbabhāge vipassanāpaññādīhi adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi
tika-vin01t1:949_4: aññāsīti attho. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Pariññeyye dhammeti aniccādivasena parijānitabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:949_5: dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha. Pahātabbeti samudayapakkhiye. Sacchikātabbeti nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin01t1:949_6: Bahuvacananiddeso panettha sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedamapekkhitvā kato,
tika-vin01t1:949_7: uddeso vā ayaṃ catusaccadhammānampi. Tathā hi vakkhati “cakkhu dukkhasacca”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:949_8: Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa vasena karīyati. Uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:949_9: atthitāmattaṃ vuccati, na paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṃ yathā “appaccayā
tika-vin01t1:949_10: dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā”ti. Sacchikātabbeti vā phalavimuttīnampi gahaṇaṃ, na nibbānassevāti
tika-vin01t1:949_11: bahuvacananiddeso kato. Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:949_12: Teneva cāhāti selabrāhmaṇassa attano buddhabhāvaṃ sādhento evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:950_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā sayameva attano sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ sādhetīti? Sādheti mahākaruṇāya
tika-vin01t1:950_1: aññesaṃ avisayato. Tattha “ekomhi sammāsambuddho, sabbābhibhū sabbavidūhamasmī”tiādīni
tika-vin01t1:950_2: suttapadāni, idameva ca “abhiññeyya”ntiādi suttapadaṃ etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:950_3: abhiññeyyanti iminā dukkhasaccamāha, bhāvetabbanti maggasaccaṃ. Ca-saddo panettha
tika-vin01t1:950_4: avuttasamuccayattho, tena sacchikātabbassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā abhiññeyyanti
tika-vin01t1:950_5: imināva pārisesañāyena pariññeyyadhamme sacchikātabbadhamme ca dasseti. Tasmā buddhosmīti
tika-vin01t1:950_6: yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni, saccavinimuttañca kiñci ñeyyaṃ natthi, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:950_7: sabbampi ñeyyaṃ buddhosmi, abbhaññāsinti attho. Selasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:951_0: “Abhiññeyyanti vijjā ca vimutti ca. Bhāvetabbaṃ maggasaccaṃ. Pahātabbaṃ samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:951_1: Hetuvacanena pana phalasiddhito tesaṃ phalāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi vuttāneva
tika-vin01t1:951_2: honti. Evaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, pariññātabbaṃ pariññātanti idampettha saṅgahitamevāti
tika-vin01t1:952_0: Tattha vijjāti maggavijjā vuttā ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. Vimuttīti phalavimutti. Kāmañcettha
tika-vin01t1:952_1: maggavijjāpi bhāvetabbabhāvena gahitā, sabbepi pana sabhāvadhammā abhiññeyyāti vijjāya
tika-vin01t1:952_2: abhiññeyyabhāvo vutto. Imināva nayena sabbesampi abhiññeyyabhāvo vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:952_3: Phalena vinā hetubhāvasseva abhāvato hetuvacanena phalasiddhi vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:952_4: Nirodhassa hi sampāpanena maggassa hetubhāvo, dukkhassa nibbattanena taṇhāya samudayabhāvoti.
tika-vin01t1:953_0: Evaṃ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṃ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammehi
tika-vin01t1:953_1: ceva khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti
tika-vin01t1:953_2: santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena. Taṇhā hi kammassa
tika-vin01t1:953_3: vicittabhāvahetuto sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṃ. Samuṭṭhāpikāti
tika-vin01t1:953_4: uppādikā. Purimataṇhāti purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā. Ubhinnanti cakkhussa taṃsamudayassa
tika-vin01t1:953_8: saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato ca dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:953_9: vuttaṃ, tasmā vattamānabhave taṇhā khandhapariyāpannattā saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato ca
tika-vin01t1:953_10: dukkhasaccaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana attabhāve sā uppajjati, tassa attabhāvassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:954_0: Kasiṇānīti kasiṇārammaṇikajjhānāni. Dvattiṃsākārāti dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā tadārammaṇajjhānāni
tika-vin01t1:954_1: ca. Nava bhavāti kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññībhavo asaññībhavo nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo
tika-vin01t1:954_2: ekavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo pañcavokārabhavoti nava bhavā. Tattha bhavatīti bhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_3: kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena yutto bhavo, kāmasaṅkhāto vā bhavo kāmabhavo, ekādasa kāmāvacarabhūmiyo.
tika-vin01t1:954_4: Kāme pahāya rūparāgasaṅkhātena rūpena yutto bhavo, rūpasaṅkhāto vā bhavo rūpabhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_5: soḷasa rūpāvacarabhūmiyo. Kāmañca rūpañca pahāya arūparāgasaṅkhātena arūpena yutto
tika-vin01t1:954_6: bhavo, arūpasaṅkhāto vā bhavo arūpabhavo, catasso āruppabhūmiyo. Saññāvataṃ bhavo
tika-vin01t1:954_7: saññībhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññībhavo, so kāmabhavo ca asaññībhavamutto
tika-vin01t1:954_8: rūpabhavo ca nevasaññīnāsaññībhavamutto arūpabhavo ca hoti. Na saññībhavo asaññībhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_9: so rūpabhavekadeso. Oḷārikattābhāvato nevasaññā, sukhumattassa sabbhāvato nāsaññāti
tika-vin01t1:954_10: nevasaññānāsaññā, tāya yutto bhavo nevasaññānāsaññābhavo. Atha vā oḷārikāya saññāya
tika-vin01t1:954_11: abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_12: so arūpabhavekadeso. Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo, ekena vā vokāro assa bhavassāti
tika-vin01t1:954_13: ekavokārabhavo, so asaññībhavo. Catūhi arūpakkhandhehi vokiṇṇo bhavo, catūhi vā vokāro
tika-vin01t1:954_14: assa bhavassāti catuvokārabhavo, so arūpabhavo eva. Pañcahi khandhehi vokiṇṇo bhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_15: pañcahi vā vokāro assa bhavassāti pañcavokārabhavo, so kāmabhavo ca rūpabhavekadeso
tika-vin01t1:954_16: ca hoti. Vokāroti vā khandhānametamadhivacanaṃ, tasmā eko vokāro assa bhavassāti
tika-vin01t1:954_17: ekavokārabhavoti evamādināpettha attho veditabbo. Cattāri jhānānīti aggahitārammaṇavisesāni
tika-vin01t1:954_18: cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni. Vipākajjhānānaṃ vā etaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:954_19: upanissayabhūtā taṇhāsamuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhāti veditabbā. Kiriyadhammānaṃ pana yattha
tika-vin01t1:954_20: te kiriyadhammā uppajjanti, tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā taṇhā. Anulomatoti ettha
tika-vin01t1:954_21: “saṅkhārā dukkhasaccaṃ, avijjā samudayasacca”nti iminā anukkamena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:955_0: Anubuddhoti bujjhitabbadhammassa anurūpato buddho. Tenāti yasmā sāmaññato visesato
tika-vin01t1:955_1: ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho, tasmā vuttaṃ. Kiṃ vuttanti āha “sammā sāmañca
tika-vin01t1:955_2: sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā”ti, sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṃ sayameva
tika-vin01t1:955_3: abhisambuddhattāti attho. Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa
tika-vin01t1:956_0: Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, aññathā “cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānī”ti
tika-vin01t1:956_1: vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? Na virujjhati visayappavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:956_2: ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya
tika-vin01t1:956_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti
tika-vin01t1:956_4: vuttaṃ. Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṃ “sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:956_5: tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi. Tasmā natthi nesaṃ atthato bhedo,
tika-vin01t1:956_6: ekantena cetaṃ evamicchitabbaṃ. Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sādhāraṇatā asabbadhammārammaṇatā
tika-vin01t1:956_7: ca āpajjeyya. Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:956_8: asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva
tika-vin01t1:956_9: na siyā. Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha
tika-vin01t1:956_10: appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ, tassa cādhigamanena
tika-vin01t1:956_11: bhagavā sabbaññū sabbavidū sammāsambuddhoti ca vuccati na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhanato.
tika-vin01t1:956_12: Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā
tika-vin01t1:956_13: mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti. Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena
tika-vin01t1:956_14: hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
tika-vin01t1:957_0: Etthāha – kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, udāhu
tika-vin01t1:957_1: kamenāti. Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhādibhedabhinnānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:957_2: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t1:957_3: pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
tika-vin01t1:957_4: vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā
tika-vin01t1:957_5: hontīti āpajjati. Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ
tika-vin01t1:957_6: buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te sabbavidūti vuccanti, evañca katvā ‘caraṃ samāhito
tika-vin01t1:957_7: nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosā
tika-vin01t1:957_8: nātivatti, ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṃ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva
tika-vin01t1:957_9: bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā, tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
tika-vin01t1:958_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti. Evampi na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena
tika-vin01t1:958_1: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesappaṭivedho
tika-vin01t1:958_2: sambhavati apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa
tika-vin01t1:958_3: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
tika-vin01t1:958_4: tañca ñāṇaṃ na anumānañāṇaṃ saṃsayābhāvato. Saṃsayānubaddhañhi loke anumānañāṇa”nti
tika-vin01t1:958_5: vadanti, tesampi taṃ na yuttaṃ. Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa
tika-vin01t1:958_6: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:959_0: Atha tampi paccakkhaṃ tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti? Sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t1:959_2: na cintetabbo, yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:959_3: – yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalaṃ ekadeso vā, tattha tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya
tika-vin01t1:959_4: paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato. Ñātuṃ icchitassa ca
tika-vin01t1:959_5: sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā, ekantenevassā icchitabbā
tika-vin01t1:959_6: “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā
tika-vin01t1:959_7: cittuppādappaṭibaddhā”ti vacanato. Atītānāgatavisayampi bhagavato ñāṇaṃ anumānāgamatakkagahaṇavirahitattā paccakkhameva.
tika-vin01t1:960_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya
tika-vin01t1:960_1: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosā nātivattiyevāti? Na, tassa
tika-vin01t1:960_2: visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya
tika-vin01t1:960_3: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā, tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi
tika-vin01t1:960_4: taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha
tika-vin01t1:960_5: acinteyyaṃ, “yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:960_6: Ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyya”nti evamekajjhaṃ visuṃ sakiṃ kamena
tika-vin01t1:960_7: vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
tika-vin01t1:961_0: Vijjāhīti ettha vindiyaṃ vindatīti vijjā, yāthāvato upalabbhatīti attho. Attano vā
tika-vin01t1:961_1: paṭipakkhassa vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, tamokkhandhādikassa padālanaṭṭhenāti attho. Tato
tika-vin01t1:961_2: eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā. Sampannattāti samannāgatattā paripuṇṇattā
tika-vin01t1:961_3: vā, avikalattāti attho. Tatrāti ambaṭṭhasutte. Manomayiddhiyāti ettha “idha bhikkhu
tika-vin01t1:961_4: imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ ahīnindriya”nti
tika-vin01t1:961_5: iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare aññasseva jhānamanena nibbattattā manomayassa
tika-vin01t1:961_6: sarīrassa nibbattivasena pavattā manomayiddhi nāma. Cha abhiññāti āsavakkhayañāṇena
tika-vin01t1:961_7: saddhiṃ iddhividhādikā pañcābhiññāyo. Tissannaṃ aṭṭhannañca vijjānaṃ tattha tattha
tika-vin01t1:961_8: sutte gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī
tika-vin01t1:961_9: ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu saddho
tika-vin01t1:961_10: hoti, hirimā, ottappī, bahussuto, āraddhavīriyo, upaṭṭhitassati, paññavā hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:961_11: Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
tika-vin01t1:962_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayoyeva pannarasa “caraṇa”nti vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imeyeva
tika-vin01t1:962_1: hī”tiādi. Tena tesaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṃsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
tika-vin01t1:962_2: Idāni tadatthasādhanāya āgamaṃ dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha. Bhagavātiādi vuttassevatthassa
tika-vin01t1:962_3: nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Nanu cāyaṃ vijjācaraṇasampadā sāvakesupi labbhatīti? Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t1:962_4: labbhati, na pana tathā, yathā bhagavatoti dassetuṃ “tattha vijjāsampadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:962_6: pūretvā ṭhitā”ti. Catūsu jhānesu antogadhabhāvena caraṇadhammapariyāpannattā karuṇābrahmavihārassa
tika-vin01t1:962_7: yathārahaṃ tassa ca mahākaruṇāsamāpattivasena asādhāraṇasabhāvassa bhagavati upalabbhanato
tika-vin01t1:962_8: āha “caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṃ pūretvā ṭhitā”ti. Yathā sattānaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjetvā
tika-vin01t1:962_9: atthe niyojanaṃ paññāya vinā na hoti, evaṃ nesaṃ atthānatthajānanaṃ satthu karuṇāya
tika-vin01t1:962_10: vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā. Yattha pana yassā padhānabhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:962_11: taṃ dassetuṃ “so sabbaññutāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampannoti ettha
tika-vin01t1:962_12: tanti nipātamattaṃ, yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno niyojeti, tathā ayanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:962_13: Tena vijjācaraṇasampannassevāyaṃ āveṇikā paṭipattīti dasseti. Sā panāyaṃ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā
tika-vin01t1:962_14: sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṃ “tenassā”tiādi
tika-vin01t1:962_15: vuttaṃ. Tattha attantapādayoti ādi-saddena parantapaubhayantapā gahitā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin01t1:963_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, caraṇasampadāya karuṇāmahattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:963_1: Tesu paññāya bhagavato dhammarajjappatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṃvibhāgo. Paññāya saṃsāradukkhanibbidā,
tika-vin01t1:963_2: karuṇāya saṃsāradukkhasahanaṃ. Paññāya paradukkhaparijānanaṃ, karuṇāya paradukkhapatikārārambho.
tika-vin01t1:963_3: Paññāya parinibbānābhimukhabhāvo, karuṇāya tadadhigamo. Paññāya sayaṃ taraṇaṃ, karuṇāya
tika-vin01t1:963_4: paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ. Paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakiccasiddhi. Karuṇāya
tika-vin01t1:963_5: vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ saṃsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha anabhirati, tathā karuṇāya
tika-vin01t1:963_6: paresaṃ abhiṃsāpanaṃ, paññāya sayaṃ parehi abhāyanaṃ. Karuṇāya paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:963_7: rakkhati, paññāya attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati. Tathā karuṇāya aparantapo, paññāya
tika-vin01t1:963_8: anattantapo, tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:963_9: siddho hoti. Tathā karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. Karuṇāya cassa ninnatābhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:963_10: paññāya unnamābhāvo. Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho, paññānugatattā na
tika-vin01t1:963_11: ca na sabbattha virattacitto, paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto, karuṇānugatattā
tika-vin01t1:963_12: na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto. Yathā hi karuṇā bhagavato sinehasokavirahitā,
tika-vin01t1:963_13: evaṃ paññā ahaṃkāramamaṃkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā
tika-vin01t1:964_0: Idāni sugatoti imassa atthaṃ dassento āha “sobhanagamanattā”tiādi. “Gate ṭhite”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:964_1: gamanampi gatanti vuccatīti āha “gamanampi hi gatanti vuccatī”ti. Sobhananti subhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:964_3: Gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṃ gamanaṃ dassento “ariyamaggo”ti āha. So
tika-vin01t1:964_4: hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti ca katvā gataṃ gamananti ca vuccati. Idāni tasseva
tika-vin01t1:964_5: gamane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tena hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khemaṃ disanti nibbānaṃ. Asajjamānoti
tika-vin01t1:964_6: paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṃ akaronto, pageva itarattha. Atha
tika-vin01t1:964_7: vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippābhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno
tika-vin01t1:964_8: abajjhanto gato. Yaṃ gamanaṃ gacchanto sabbagamanatthaṃ āvahati, sabbañca anuttaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:964_9: sampattiṃ āvahati, tadeva sobhanaṃ nāma, tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha “iti sobhanagamanattā
tika-vin01t1:965_0: Asundarānaṃ dukkhānaṃ saṅkhārappavattīnaṃ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:965_1: nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha “sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbāna”nti. Tenāha bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:965_2: “nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti. Sammāti suṭṭhu. Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa
tika-vin01t1:965_3: gamananti āha “pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto”ti, pahīnānaṃ puna asamudācāravasena
tika-vin01t1:965_4: apaccāgacchanto. Vuttamevatthaṃ āgamaṃ dassetvā vibhāvento āha “vuttañceta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:965_5: Etanti tena tena maggena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna apaccāgamanaṃ, idañca sikhāppattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:965_6: sammāgamanaṃ, yāya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya siddhaṃ, sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:965_7: sugatoti dassetuṃ “sammā vā āgato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sammāpaṭipattiyāti sammāsambodhiyā
tika-vin01t1:965_8: sampāpane aviparītapaṭipattiyā. Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karontāti etena mahābodhiyā
tika-vin01t1:965_9: paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṃ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:965_10: Sassataṃ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gatoti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:965_11: Kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gatoti etena ariyamaggagatiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:966_0: Tatrāti yuttaṭṭhāne yuttasseva bhāsane. Nipphādetabbe sādhetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Abhūtanti
tika-vin01t1:966_1: abhūtatthaṃ. Atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā bhūtatā vā. Atacchanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:966_2: Anatthasaṃhitanti diṭṭhadhammikena samparāyikena vā anatthena saṃhitaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:966_3: anatthāvahaṃ. Na atthoti anattho, atthassa paṭipakkho abhāvo ca, tena saṃhitaṃ, pisuṇavācaṃ
tika-vin01t1:966_4: samphappalāpañcāti attho. Evamettha catubbidhassapi vacīduccaritassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:966_5: Ettha ca paṭhamā vācā sīlavantaṃ “dussīlo”ti, acaṇḍālādiṃ “caṇḍālo”tiādinā bhāsamānassa
tika-vin01t1:966_9: sugatiṃ āvahatī”ti lokassa byāmohanakathā. Pañcamī bhūtena pesuññupasaṃhārā kathā.
tika-vin01t1:966_10: Chaṭṭhā yuttapattaṭṭhāne pavattitā dānasīlādikathā veditabbā. Evaṃ sammā gadattāti
tika-vin01t1:966_11: yathāvuttaṃ abhūtādiṃ vajjetvā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ tato eva
tika-vin01t1:966_12: sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato. Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:966_13: vacanaṃ piyaṃ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā. Ettha pana da-kārassa
tika-vin01t1:967_0: Aparo nayo – sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:967_1: ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ bhaddakaṃ. Tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya
tika-vin01t1:967_4: yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahatāya ca sobhanameva. Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena
tika-vin01t1:967_5: sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato. Tathā
tika-vin01t1:967_6: lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato
tika-vin01t1:967_7: atītoti sugato. Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti
tika-vin01t1:967_8: sugato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti
tika-vin01t1:967_9: sugato. Tathā yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:967_10: pariyesitaṃ ñātaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammā
tika-vin01t1:968_0: Idāni lokavidūti imassa atthaṃ pakāsento āha “sabbathā viditalokattā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:968_1: sabbathāti sabbappakārena, yo yo loko yena yena pakārena veditabbo, tena tena pakārenāti
tika-vin01t1:968_2: attho. Te pana pakāre dassetuṃ “sabhāvato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sabhāvatoti dukkhasabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:968_3: Sabbo hi loko dukkhasabhāvo. Yathāha “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:968_4: Samudayatoti yato samudeti, tato taṇhādito. Nirodhatoti yattha so nirujjhati, tato
tika-vin01t1:968_5: visaṅkhārato. Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo, tato ariyamaggato
tika-vin01t1:968_6: ito aññassa pakārassa abhāvā. Iti “sabbathā lokaṃ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:968_7: suttaṃ dassento “yattha kho, āvuso”tiādimāha. Idañca suttaṃ “yattha kho, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:968_8: na jāyati…pe… na upapajjati, sakkā nu kho so, bhante, gamanena lokassa anto ñātuṃ
tika-vin01t1:968_9: vā daṭṭhuṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ vā”ti okāsalokassa gatiṃ sandhāya rohitadevaputtena puṭṭho
tika-vin01t1:968_10: bhagavā abhāsi. Tattha na jāyatītiādinā ujukaṃ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā na cavati
tika-vin01t1:968_11: na upapajjatīti padadvayena aparāparaṃ cavanupapatanāni paṭikkhipati. Keci pana “na
tika-vin01t1:968_12: jāyatītiādi gabbhaseyyakādivasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ opapātikavasenā”ti vadanti. Tanti
tika-vin01t1:968_13: jātiādirahitaṃ. Gamanenāti padasā gamanena. Lokassantanti saṅkhāralokassa antabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:968_14: nibbānaṃ. Ñāteyyanti jānitabbaṃ. Daṭṭheyyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Patteyyanti pattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:968_15: “Ñātāyaṃ diṭṭhāyaṃ pattāya”nti vā pāṭho, tattha gamanena lokassantaṃ ñātā ayaṃ diṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:968_16: ayaṃ pattā ayanti na vadāmīti attho. Ayanti nibbānatthiko.
tika-vin01t1:969_0: Kāmaṃ padasā gamanena gantvā lokassantaṃ ñātuṃ daṭṭhuṃ pattuṃ vā na sakkā, api ca
tika-vin01t1:969_1: parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṃ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “api cā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:969_2: byāmamatte kaḷevareti byāmappamāṇe attabhāve. Iminā rūpakkhandhaṃ dasseti. Sasaññimhīti
tika-vin01t1:969_3: saññāya sahite. Iminā saññāsīsena vedanādayo tayo khandhe dasseti saññāsahitattā
tika-vin01t1:969_4: eva. Samanaketi saviññāṇaketi attho. Iminā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ dasseti, aviññāṇake pana
tika-vin01t1:969_5: utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo. Lokanti khandhādilokaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:969_6: Lokanirodhanti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṃ nibbānameva vā. Nibbānampi hi khandhe paṭicca
tika-vin01t1:969_7: paññāpanato sarīrasmiṃyeva paññāpeti. Adesampi hi taṃ yesaṃ nirodho, tesaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t1:969_8: desatopi upacāravasena niddisīyati yathā “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā
tika-vin01t1:969_9: taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:970_0: Gamanenāti pākatikagamanena. Lokassantoti saṅkhāralokassa anto antakiriyāya hetubhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:970_1: nibbānaṃ. Kudācananti kadācipi. Appatvāti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. Pamocananti pamutti
tika-vin01t1:970_2: nissaraṇaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā lokantaṃ appatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā. Haveti
tika-vin01t1:970_3: nipātamattaṃ. Lokavidūti sabhāvādito sabbaṃ lokaṃ vijānanto. Sumedhoti sundarapañño.
tika-vin01t1:970_4: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṃ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū. Maggabrahmacariyassa
tika-vin01t1:970_5: pariniṭṭhitattā vusitabrahmacariyo. Sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ samitattā catusaccadhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:970_6: vā abhisamitattā samitāvī. Nāsīsatīti na pattheti, yathā imaṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ parañca
tika-vin01t1:971_0: Evaṃ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvādito dassitattā, loko pana ekadeseneva
tika-vin01t1:971_1: vuttoti taṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ “api ca tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:971_2: khandhānaṃ samūho santāno ca sattaloko. Rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya satto, lokīyati
tika-vin01t1:971_3: ettha kusalākusalaṃ tabbipāko cāti loko. Anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ samūho santāno
tika-vin01t1:971_4: ca okāsaloko lokīyanti ettha jaṅgamā thāvarā ca tesañca okāsabhūtoti katvā. Tadādhāratāya
tika-vin01t1:971_5: hesa “bhājanaloko”tipi vuccati. Ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko paccayehi saṅkharīyanti
tika-vin01t1:971_6: lujjanti palujjanti cāti. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā, paccayāyattavuttikāti
tika-vin01t1:971_7: attho. Paccayattho hettha āhārasaddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:971_8: viya. Evañhi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti. Sā panāyaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā
tika-vin01t1:971_9: nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo, na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:972_0: Yadi evaṃ “sabbe sattā”ti idaṃ kathanti? Puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanāti nāyaṃ doso. Kasmā
tika-vin01t1:972_1: pana bhagavā katthaci puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā dhammaṃ deseti, katthaci dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:972_2: katvā dhammaṃ desetīti? Desanāvilāsato veneyyajjhāsayato ca. Desanāvilāsappattā hi
tika-vin01t1:972_3: buddhā bhagavanto, te yathāruci katthaci puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā katthaci dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:972_4: katvā dhammaṃ desenti. Ye vā pana veneyyā sāsanakkamaṃ anotiṇṇā, tesaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:972_5: desanaṃ desenti. Ye ca otiṇṇā, tesaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Sammutisaccavisayā puggalādhiṭṭhānā
tika-vin01t1:972_6: desanā, itarā paramatthasaccavisayā. Purimā karuṇānukūlā, itarā paññānukūlā. Saddhānusārīgottānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:972_7: vā purimā. Te hi puggalappamāṇikā, pacchimā dhammānusārīgottānaṃ. Saddhācaritatāya
tika-vin01t1:972_8: vā lokādhipatīnaṃ vasena puggalādhiṭṭhānā, paññācaritatāya dhammādhipatīnaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t1:972_9: dhammādhiṭṭhānā. Purimā ca neyyatthā, pacchimā nītatthā. Iti bhagavā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:972_10: apekkhitvā tattha tattha duvidhaṃ desanaṃ desetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:973_0: Diṭṭhigatikānaṃ sassatādivasena “attā loko”ti parikappanā yebhuyyena sattavisayā,
tika-vin01t1:973_1: na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vāti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko
tika-vin01t1:973_2: veditabbo”ti. Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti
tika-vin01t1:973_3: paribbhamanti. Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṃ paribbhamaneneva tā tā disā pabhassarā
tika-vin01t1:973_4: hutvā virocanti. Atha vā disāti upayogabahuvacanaṃ, tasmā sayaṃ virocamānā candimasūriyā
tika-vin01t1:973_5: yattakā disā bhanti sobhenti obhāsayantīti attho. Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakena
tika-vin01t1:973_7: vā pāṭho, tāva tattakaṃ sahassaṃ assa atthīti tāvasahassavā. Etthāti sahassalokadhātusaṅkhāte loke.
tika-vin01t1:974_0: Tampīti tividhampi lokaṃ. Sabbathā avedīti sabbappakārato paṭivijjhi. Kathaṃ paṭivijjhīti
tika-vin01t1:974_1: āha “tathā hī”tiādi. Tathā hissāti imassa “sabbathā vidito”ti etena sambandho. Assāti
tika-vin01t1:974_2: anena bhagavatā. Eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya
tika-vin01t1:974_3: sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko ekavidho
tika-vin01t1:974_4: pakārantarassa abhāvato. Dve lokātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Nāmaggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:974_5: cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā. Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha
tika-vin01t1:974_6: paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati pariññeyyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:974_7: dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ idha lokoti adhippetattā. Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti
tika-vin01t1:974_8: yo gahito tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
tika-vin01t1:975_0: Tisso vedanāti sukhadukkhaupekkhāvasena. Cattāro āhārāti kabaḷīkārāhāro phassāhāro
tika-vin01t1:975_1: manosañcetanāhāro viññāṇāhāroti cattāro āhārā. Tattha kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:975_2: rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro. Phasso tisso vedanā āharatīti āhāro. Manosañcetanā tīsu bhavesu
tika-vin01t1:975_3: paṭisandhiṃ āharatīti āhāro. Viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro.
tika-vin01t1:975_4: Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā upādānakkhandhā. Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānīti cakkhāyatanādimanāyatanapariyantāni.
tika-vin01t1:975_5: Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, ekattakāyā
tika-vin01t1:975_6: nānattasaññino, ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, heṭṭhimā ca tayo āruppāti imā satta “viññāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:975_7: tiṭṭhati etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo”ti vuccanti. Tattha nānattaṃ kāyo etesaṃ, nānatto
tika-vin01t1:975_8: vā kāyo etesanti nānattakāyā, nānattasaññā etesaṃ atthīti nānattasaññino. Iminā nayena
tika-vin01t1:976_0: Sabbe manussā chakāmāvacarā ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”ti
tika-vin01t1:976_1: vuccanti. Aparimāṇesu hi cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ manussānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena
tika-vin01t1:976_2: dvepi ekasadisā natthi. Yepi katthaci yamakabhātaro vaṇṇena vā saṇṭhānena vā ekasadisā
tika-vin01t1:976_4: ca nesaṃ tihetukāpi duhetukāpi ahetukāpi hoti, tasmā sabbepi manussā nānattakāyā
tika-vin01t1:976_5: nānattasaññino. Chakāmāvacaradevesu ca kesañci kāyo nīlo hoti, kesañci pītādivaṇṇo,
tika-vin01t1:976_6: paṭisandhisaññā ca nesaṃ duhetukāpi tihetukāpi hoti, tasmā tepi nānattakāyā nānattasaññino.
tika-vin01t1:976_7: Ekacce vinipātikā pana catuapāyavinimuttakā uttaramātā yakkhinī, piyaṅkaramātā, dhammaguttāti
tika-vin01t1:976_8: evamādayo daṭṭhabbā. Etesañhi odātakaāḷamaṅguracchavisāmavaṇṇādivasena ceva kisathūlarassadīghādivasena
tika-vin01t1:976_9: ca kāyo nānā hoti, manussānaṃ viya tihetukaduhetukāhetukavasena paṭisandhisaññāpi,
tika-vin01t1:976_10: te pana devā viya na mahesakkhā, kapaṇamanussā viya appesakkhā dullabhaghāsacchādanā
tika-vin01t1:976_11: dukkhapīḷitā viharanti, ekacce kāḷapakkhe dukkhitā juṇhapakkhe sukhitā honti, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:976_12: sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā sukhasamussayato vinipāto etesaṃ atthīti vinipātikāti
tika-vin01t1:976_13: vuttā satipi devabhāve dibbasampattiyā abhāvato. Ye panettha tihetukā, tesaṃ dhammābhisamayopi
tika-vin01t1:976_14: hoti. Piyaṅkaramātā hi yakkhinī paccūsasamaye anuruddhattherassa dhammaṃ sajjhāyato sutvā –
tika-vin01t1:977: “Mā saddaṃ kari piyaṅkara, bhikkhu dhammapadāni bhāsati;
tika-vin01t1:978: Apica dhammapadaṃ vijāniya, paṭipajjema hitāya no siyā.
tika-vin01t1:981_0: Evaṃ puttakaṃ saññāpetvā taṃ divasaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā. Uttaramātā pana bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:981_1: dhammaṃ sutvāva sotāpannā jātā. Evamimepi kāyassa ceva paṭisandhisaññāya ca nānattā
tika-vin01t1:982_1: paṭhamajjhānena nibbattā brahmakāyikā ceva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca “nānattakāyā ekattasaññino”ti
tika-vin01t1:982_2: vuccanti. Etesu hi brahmakāyikesu brahmapurohitānaṃ kāyo brahmapārisajjehi pamāṇato
tika-vin01t1:982_3: vipulataro hoti, mahābrahmānaṃ kāyo pana brahmapurohitehipi pamāṇato vipulataro hoti.
tika-vin01t1:982_4: Kāmañca nesaṃ pabhāvasenapi kāyo heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimehi uḷārataro hoti, taṃ pana idha
tika-vin01t1:982_5: appamāṇaṃ. Tathā hi parittābhādīnaṃ parittasubhādīnañca kāye satipi pabhāvematte
tika-vin01t1:982_6: ekattavaseneva vavatthapīyatīti “ekattakāyā”tveva te vuccanti. Evamime brahmakāyikā
tika-vin01t1:982_7: kāyassa nānattā paṭhamajjhānavipākavasena pana paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā nānattakāyā
tika-vin01t1:982_8: ekattasaññino. Yathā ca te, evaṃ catūsu apāyesu sattā. Nirayesu hi kesañci gāvutaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:982_9: kesañci aḍḍhayojanaṃ, kesañci yojanaṃ attabhāvo hoti, devadattassa pana yojanasatiko
tika-vin01t1:982_10: jāto. Tiracchānesupi keci khuddakā, keci mahantā, pettivisayepi keci saṭṭhihatthā,
tika-vin01t1:982_11: keci asītihatthā honti, keci suvaṇṇā, keci dubbaṇṇā, tathā kālakañcikā asurā. Api
tika-vin01t1:982_12: cettha dīghapiṭṭhikapetā nāma saṭṭhiyojanikāpi honti, paṭisandhisaññā pana sabbesampi
tika-vin01t1:982_13: akusalavipākāhetukāva hoti. Iti āpāyikāpi “nānattakāyā ekattasaññino”tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:983_0: Dutiyajjhānabhūmikā pana parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarā “ekattakāyā nānattasaññino”ti
tika-vin01t1:983_1: vuccanti. Nesañhi sabbesaṃ kāyo ekappamāṇova hoti, paṭisandhisaññā pana dutiyatatiyajjhānavipākavasena nānā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:984_0: Parittasubhā appamāṇasubhā subhakiṇhā pana tatiyajjhānabhūmikā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino.
tika-vin01t1:984_1: Tesaṃ vuttanayena kāyassa ceva catutthajjhānavipākavasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā.
tika-vin01t1:984_2: “Vehapphalāpi imaṃyeva catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti kāyassa ceva pañcamajjhānavipākavasena
