tika-vin01t1:984_3: paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekarūpattā. Suddhāvāsā pana apunarāvattanato vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:984_4: na sabbakālikā. Kappasatasahassampi asaṅkhyeyyampi buddhasuññe loke nuppajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:984_6: bhagavato khandhāvāraṭṭhānasadisā honti, tasmā neva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ, na sattāvāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:984_7: bhajantī”ti vadanti. Mahāsīvatthero pana “na kho pana so sāriputta āvāso sulabharūpo,
tika-vin01t1:984_8: yo mayā anāvuṭṭhapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti iminā
tika-vin01t1:984_10: taṃ appaṭibāhiyattā suttassa anuññātaṃ. Tasmā asaññasattaṃ apanetvā parittasubhādīsu
tika-vin01t1:984_11: akaniṭṭhapariyosānāsu navasu bhūmīsu sattā “ekattakāyā ekattasaññino”ti gahetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:985_0: Asaññasattā pana viññāṇābhāvā ettha saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti. Tathā hi anuppanne buddhe
tika-vin01t1:985_1: titthāyatane pabbajitā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tato
tika-vin01t1:985_2: vuṭṭhāya “dhī cittaṃ, dhī cittaṃ, cittassa nāma abhāvoyeva sādhu. Cittañhi nissāya
tika-vin01t1:985_3: vadhabandhādipaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati, citte asati nattheta”nti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā
tika-vin01t1:985_4: aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā rūpapaṭisandhivasena asaññabhave nibbattanti. Yo yassa
tika-vin01t1:985_5: iriyāpatho manussaloke paṇihito ahosi, so tena iriyāpathena nibbattitvā pañca kappasatāni
tika-vin01t1:985_6: ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vā hoti. Evaṃ cittavirāgabhāvanāvasena tesaṃ tattha viññāṇuppatti
tika-vin01t1:985_7: na hotīti viññāṇābhāvato viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ te na bhajanti. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:985_8: yatheva saññāya, evaṃ viññāṇassapi sukhumattā viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu saṅgahaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:985_9: Tañhi saññāya viya viññāṇassapi saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattattā paribyattaviññāṇakiccābhāvato
tika-vin01t1:985_10: neva viññāṇaṃ, na ca sabbaso aviññāṇaṃ hotīti nevaviññāṇā nāviññāṇaṃ, tasmā paripphuṭaviññāṇakiccavantīsu
tika-vin01t1:985_11: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu saṅgahaṃ na gacchati. Tasmā vinipātikehi saddhiṃ chakāmāvacaradevā
tika-vin01t1:985_12: manussā ca nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, paṭhamajjhānabhūmikā apāyasattā ca nānattakāyā
tika-vin01t1:985_14: asaññasattaṃ vajjetvā sesā catutthajjhānabhūmikā ca ekattakāyā ekattasaññinoti imā
tika-vin01t1:986_0: Aṭṭha lokadhammāti lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti ime aṭṭha
tika-vin01t1:986_1: lokassa dhammattā lokadhammā. Ime hi sattalokassa avassaṃbhāvino dhammā, tasmā etehi
tika-vin01t1:986_2: vinimutto nāma koci satto natthi. Te hi aparāparaṃ kadāci lokaṃ anupatanti, kadāci
tika-vin01t1:986_3: te loko ca anupatati. Vuttampi cetaṃ “aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā lokaṃ anuparivattanti,
tika-vin01t1:986_4: loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatī”ti. Ghāsacchādanādīnaṃ laddhi, tāni eva vā
tika-vin01t1:986_5: laddhabbato lābho. Tadabhāvo alābho. Lābhaggahaṇena cettha tabbisayo anurodho gahito,
tika-vin01t1:986_6: alābhaggahaṇena virodho. Evaṃ yasādīsupi tabbisayaanurodhavirodhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:986_7: Lābhe pana āgate alābho āgatoyeva hotīti lābho ca alābho ca vutto. Yasādīsupi eseva
tika-vin01t1:986_8: nayo. Tathā ca lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya lābhādīsu anurodhe sati alābhādīsu
tika-vin01t1:987_0: Nava sattāvāsāti heṭṭhā vuttasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo eva asaññasattacatutthāruppehi
tika-vin01t1:987_1: saddhiṃ “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuccanti. Sattā āvasanti etesūti sattāvāsā, nānattakāyanānattasaññīādibhedā
tika-vin01t1:987_2: sattanikāyā. Te hi sattanikāyā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya
tika-vin01t1:987_3: ādhāro viya vattabbataṃ arahanti samudāyādhāratāya avayavassa yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:988_0: Dasāyatanānīti arūpasabhāvaṃ manāyatanaṃ rūpārūpādimissakaṃ dhammāyatanañca ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t1:988_1: kevalaṃ rūpadhammānaṃyeva vasena cakkhāyatanādayo pañca, rūpāyatanādayo pañcāti dasāyatanāni
tika-vin01t1:988_2: vuttāni, manāyatanadhammāyatanehi pana saddhiṃ tāniyeva “dvādasāyatanānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-vin01t1:989_0: Kasmā panettha cakkhādayo “āyatanānī”ti vuccanti? Āyatanato āyānaṃ vā tananato āyatassa
tika-vin01t1:989_1: ca nayanato āyatanāni. Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā
tika-vin01t1:989_2: sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti, te ca pana
tika-vin01t1:989_3: āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti, idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ ativiya
tika-vin01t1:989_4: āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanti pavattayanti, tasmā “āyatanānī”ti
tika-vin01t1:989_5: vuccanti. Api ca nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:989_6: kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanāni. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:989_7: āyatananti vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro. Sāsane pana “manorame
tika-vin01t1:989_8: āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho gunnaṃ āyatana”ntiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:989_9: sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:989_10: āyatananti vuccati. Cakkhuādīsu ca te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti
tika-vin01t1:989_11: cakkhādayo tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā
tika-vin01t1:989_12: cāti cakkhādayova nesaṃ ākaro. Tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato
tika-vin01t1:989_13: cakkhādayova nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito
tika-vin01t1:989_14: cakkhādayova nesaṃ sañjātideso. Cakkhādīnaṃ abhāve abhāvato cakkhādayova nesaṃ kāraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:989_15: yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ sesānipi.
tika-vin01t1:990_0: Imāneva pana dvādasāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇādichaviññāṇehi saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasa vidahanādito
tika-vin01t1:990_1: “dhātuyo”ti vuccanti. Tathā hi cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati, dhīyate,
tika-vin01t1:990_2: vidhānaṃ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātūti vuccati. Lokiyā hi dhātuyo
tika-vin01t1:990_3: kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitāva hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ, anekappakāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:990_4: saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti, bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya sattehi dhīyanti dhārīyanti,
tika-vin01t1:990_5: dukkhavidhānamattameva cetā avasavattanato. Etāhi ca kāraṇabhūtāhi saṃsāradukkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:990_6: sattehi anuvidhīyati, tathāvihitañca taṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyati, tasmā “dhātuyo”ti
tika-vin01t1:990_7: vuccanti. Api ca yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na evametā, etā pana
tika-vin01t1:990_8: attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Yathā ca loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā
tika-vin01t1:990_9: “dhātuyo”ti vuccanti, evametāpi dhātuyo viya dhātuyo. Vicittā hetā ñāṇañeyyāvayavāti.
tika-vin01t1:990_10: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu
tika-vin01t1:990_11: dhātusamaññā, evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā
tika-vin01t1:990_12: veditabbā. Aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnā hete cakkhādayoti. Api ca dhātūti
tika-vin01t1:990_13: nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturo ayaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:990_14: jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanamakāsi. Tasmā nijjīvaṭṭhenapi dhātuyoti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:991_0: Ettha ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti paccayāyattavuttitāvacanena saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā, tāya
tika-vin01t1:991_1: ca “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā
tika-vin01t1:991_2: hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni. Nāmanti cattāro arūpino khandhā, te ca
tika-vin01t1:991_3: atthato phassādayo. Rūpanti bhūtupādāyarūpāni, tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva
tika-vin01t1:991_4: salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā. Taggahaṇeneva ye te savisesā kusalādayo hetuādayo ca,
tika-vin01t1:991_5: tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
tika-vin01t1:992_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāralokassa sabbathā viditabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sattalokassapi sabbathā
tika-vin01t1:992_1: viditabhāvaṃ dassento “yasmā panesā”tiādimāha. Tattha āsayaṃ jānātīti āgamma cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:992_2: seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya. Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva
tika-vin01t1:992_3: vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo, evaṃ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha
tika-vin01t1:992_4: seti, so tassa āsayoti vuccati. So pana sassatadiṭṭhiādivasena catubbidho. Vuttañca –
tika-vin01t1:995_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā
tika-vin01t1:995_1: imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā. Yathāha “dvayanissito khvāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyyena
tika-vin01t1:995_2: atthitañceva natthitañcā”ti. Atthitāti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, natthitāti ucchedaggāho.
tika-vin01t1:995_3: Ayaṃ tāva vaṭṭanissitānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ āsayo, vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ pana suddhasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:995_4: anulomikā khanti yathābhūtañāṇanti duvidho āsayo. Tattha “anulomikā khanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:995_5: yathābhūtañāṇaṃ pana maggañāṇa”nti sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:995_6: Taṃ catubbidhampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, jānanto ca tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ tesañca
tika-vin01t1:996: “Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti, kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto”’tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:997_0: Anusayaṃ jānātīti anu anu sayantīti anusayā, anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti
tika-vin01t1:997_1: attho. Etena nesaṃ kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahataṃ dasseti. Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe
tika-vin01t1:997_2: sati uppajjanti. Ke pana te? Kāmarāgādayo satta anāgatā kilesā, atītā paccuppannā
tika-vin01t1:997_3: ca taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti. Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi,
tika-vin01t1:997_4: taṃ sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṃ jānāti.
tika-vin01t1:998_0: Caritaṃ jānātīti ettha caritanti sucaritaduccaritaṃ. Tañhi vibhaṅge caritaniddese
tika-vin01t1:998_1: niddiṭṭhaṃ. Atha vā caritanti cariyā veditabbā. Tā pana rāgadosamohasaddhābuddhivitakkavasena
tika-vin01t1:998_2: cha mūlacariyā, tāsaṃ apariyanto antarabhedo, saṃsaggabhedo pana tesaṭṭhividho. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:998_3: caritaṃ sabhāvato saṃkilesato vodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
tika-vin01t1:999_0: Adhimuttiṃ jānātīti ettha adhimuttīti ajjhāsayadhātu. Sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti.
tika-vin01t1:999_1: Yāya hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva sevanti, paṇītādhimuttikā ca paṇītādhimuttike
tika-vin01t1:999_2: eva. Sace hi ācariyupajjhāyā na sīlavanto honti, saddhivihārikā sīlavanto honti,
tika-vin01t1:999_3: te attano ācariyupajjhāyepi na upasaṅkamanti, attanā sadise sāruppabhikkhūyeva upasaṅkamanti.
tika-vin01t1:999_4: Sace ācariyupajjhāyā sāruppabhikkhū, itare asāruppā, tepi na ācariyupajjhāye upasaṅkamanti,
tika-vin01t1:999_5: attanā sadise hīnādhimuttike eva upasaṅkamanti. Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero kira nāgadīpe
tika-vin01t1:999_6: cetiyavandanāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gacchanto ekasmiṃ gāme manussehi nimantito
tika-vin01t1:999_7: therena ca saddhiṃ eko asāruppabhikkhu atthi, dhuravihārepi eko asāruppabhikkhu atthi,
tika-vin01t1:999_8: bhikkhusaṅghesu gāmaṃ osarantesu te ubho janā kiñcāpi āgantukena nevāsiko, nevāsikena
tika-vin01t1:999_9: vā āgantuko na diṭṭhapubbo, evaṃ santepi ekato hutvā hasitvā hasitvā kathayamānā
tika-vin01t1:999_10: aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero disvā “sammāsambuddhena jānitvā dhātusaṃyuttaṃ kathita”nti āha. Evamayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:999_12: vuccati, taṃ adhimuttiṃ jānāti. “Imassa adhimutti hīnā, imassa paṇītā. Tatthāpi imassa
tika-vin01t1:999_13: mudu, imassa mudutarā, imassa mudutamā”tiādinā paṭivijjhati. Adhimuttiyā pana tikkhamudubhāvādiko
tika-vin01t1:1000_0: Apparajakkheti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1000_1: appaṃ vā rāgādirajaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādirajā sattā. Te apparajakkhe.
tika-vin01t1:1000_2: Mahārajakkheti etthāpi eseva nayo, ussadarāgādirajā mahārajakkhā. Jānātīti “imassa
tika-vin01t1:1000_3: rāgarajo appo, imassa dosarajo appo”tiādinā apparajakkhādike jānāti.
tika-vin01t1:1001_0: Tikkhindriyeti tikhiṇehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Mudindriyeti mudukehi
tika-vin01t1:1001_1: saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Ubhayatthāpi upanissayabhūtindriyāni adhippetāni.
tika-vin01t1:1001_2: Svākāreti sundarākāre, kalyāṇapakatike vivaṭṭajjhāsayeti attho. Yesaṃ vā āsayādayo
tika-vin01t1:1001_3: ākārā koṭṭhāsā sundarā, te svākārā. Viparītā dvākārā. Suviññāpayeti sammattaniyāmaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1001_4: viññāpetuṃ sukare saddhe paññavante ca, ye vā kathitaṃ kāraṇaṃ sallakkhenti, sukhena
tika-vin01t1:1001_5: sakkā honti viññāpetuṃ, te suviññāpayā. Viparītā duviññāpayā. Bhabbe abhabbeti ettha
tika-vin01t1:1001_7: te bhabbā. Viparītā abhabbā. Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā
tika-vin01t1:1001_8: jānāti, tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
tika-vin01t1:1002_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi, tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya
tika-vin01t1:1002_1: virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ, bhagavato pana tampi suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitameva,
tika-vin01t1:1003_0: “Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi – ‘taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1003_1: kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1004_0: Evaṃ sattalokassapi sabbathā viditabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni okāsalokassapi tatheva viditabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1004_1: dassento āha “yathā ca sattaloko”tiādi. Okāsalokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:1004_2: Cakkavāḷanti lokadhātu. Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā
tika-vin01t1:1004_3: “cakkavāḷa”nti vuccati. Aḍḍhuḍḍhānīti upaḍḍhacatutthāni, tīṇi satāni paññāsañcāti
tika-vin01t1:1004_4: attho. Nahutānīti dasasahassāni. Saṅkhātāti kathitā. Yasmā pathavī nāmāyaṃ tiriyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1004_5: aparicchinnā, tasmā “ettakaṃ bahalattena, saṅkhātāyaṃ vasundharā”ti bahalatoyeva
tika-vin01t1:1004_6: paricchedo vutto. Nanu cakkavāḷapabbatehi taṃtaṃcakkavāḷapathavī paricchinnāti? Na
tika-vin01t1:1004_7: tadaññacakkavāḷapathaviyā ekābaddhabhāvato. Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇañhi pattānaṃ antarāḷasadise
tika-vin01t1:1004_8: tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antareyeva pathavī natthi lokantaranirayabhāvato, cakkavāḷapabbatānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1004_9: pana cakkavāḷapabbatantarehi sambaddhaṭṭhāne pathavī ekābaddhāva, vivaṭṭakāle saṇṭhahamānāpi
tika-vin01t1:1005_0: Saṇṭhitīti heṭṭhā uparito cāti sabbaso ṭhiti. Evaṃ saṇṭhiteti evaṃ avaṭṭhite. Etthāti
tika-vin01t1:1005_1: cakkavāḷe. Ajjhogāḷhoti ogāhitvā anupavisitvā ṭhito. Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva
tika-vin01t1:1005_2: caturāsīti yojanasatasahassāniyeva uggato. Na kevalañcettha ubbedhova, atha kho āyāmavitthārāpissa
tika-vin01t1:1006: “Sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsīti yojanasahassāni āyāmena, caturāsīti yojanasahassāni vitthārenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1007_0: Sinerupabbatuttamoti pabbatesu uttamo, pabbatoyeva vā uttamo pabbatuttamo, sinerusaṅkhāto
tika-vin01t1:1007_1: pabbatuttamo sinerupabbatuttamo, sinerupabbatarājāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa ca pācīnapassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1007_2: rajatamayaṃ, tasmā tassa pabhāya ajjhottharantiyā pācīnadisāya samuddodakaṃ khīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1007_3: viya paññāyati. Dakkhiṇapassaṃ pana indanīlamaṇimayaṃ, tasmā dakkhiṇadisāya samuddodakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1007_4: yebhuyyena nīlavaṇṇaṃ hutvā paññāyati, tathā ākāsaṃ. Pacchimapassaṃ phalikamayaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1007_5: Uttarapassaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ. Cattāro samuddāpi sinerurasmīhi eva paricchinnā. Tathā
tika-vin01t1:1007_6: hi pubbadakkhiṇapassehi nikkhantā rajatamaṇirasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:1007_7: gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti, dakkhiṇapacchimapassehi nikkhantā maṇiphalikarasmiyo,
tika-vin01t1:1007_9: suvaṇṇarajatarasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca
tika-vin01t1:1007_10: tiṭṭhanti, tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ antaresu cattāro mahāsamuddā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1008_0: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā upari ca vuttappamāṇato. Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhenāti upaḍḍhena upaḍḍhena.
tika-vin01t1:1008_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva upari
tika-vin01t1:1008_2: uggato yugandharapabbato, ekavīsati yojanasahassāni mahāsamudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva
tika-vin01t1:1008_3: ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhappamāṇatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1008_4: Yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti
tika-vin01t1:1008_5: heṭṭhā sineruppamāṇato upaḍḍhappamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:1008_6: evaṃ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno
tika-vin01t1:1008_7: anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro”ti. Sineruyugandharādīnaṃ antare sīdantarasamuddā nāma
tika-vin01t1:1008_8: honti. Tattha kira udakaṃ sukhumaṃ morapattamattampi pakkhittaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti
tika-vin01t1:1008_9: sīdateva, tasmā te sīdasamuddā nāma vuccanti. Te pana vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1008_10: accuggamasamānapaamāṇāti vadanti. Ajjhogāḷhuggatāti ajjhogāḷhā ca uggatā ca. Brahāti mahantā.
tika-vin01t1:1009_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā. Sineruṃ tāva
tika-vin01t1:1009_1: parikkhipitvā ṭhito yugandharo, taṃ parikkhipitvā īsadharo. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t1:1009_2: ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā. Katthaci pana “sineruṃ parikkhipitvā assakaṇṇo
tika-vin01t1:1009_3: nāma pabbato patiṭṭhito, taṃ parikkhipitvā vinatako nāma pabbato”ti evaṃ aññoyeva
tika-vin01t1:1012: Disvānāmantayī sūtaṃ, ime ke nāma pabbatā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1020_0: “Ayaṃ, mahārāja, etesaṃ sabbabāhiro sudassano pabbato nāma, tadanantare karavīko
tika-vin01t1:1020_1: nāma, so sudassanato uccataro. Ubhinnampi pana tesaṃ antare ekopi sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
tika-vin01t1:1020_2: Karavīkassa anantare īsadharo nāma, so karavīkato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
tika-vin01t1:1020_3: Īsadharassa anantare yugandharo nāma, so īsadharato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko
tika-vin01t1:1020_4: sīdantaramahāsamuddo. Yugandharassa anantare nemindharo nāma, so yugandharato uccataro.
tika-vin01t1:1020_5: Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo. Nemindharassa anantare vinatako nāma, so
tika-vin01t1:1020_6: nemindharato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo. Vinatakassa anantare
tika-vin01t1:1020_7: assakaṇṇo nāma, so vinatakato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
tika-vin01t1:1020_8: Ete sīdantaramahāsamudde satta pabbatā anupaṭipāṭiyā samuggatā sopānasadisā hutvā ṭhitā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1021_0: Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanasatāni ucco,
tika-vin01t1:1021_1: ubbedhoti attho. Tattha himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttatāya himaṃ assa atthīti
tika-vin01t1:1021_2: himavā, gimhakāle himaṃ vamatīti himavā. Pabbatoti selo. Selo hi sandhisaṅkhātehi
tika-vin01t1:1021_3: pabbehi sahitattā “pabbato”ti vuccati, pasavanādivasena jalassa sārabhūtānaṃ bhesajjādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1021_4: vatthūnañca giraṇato “girī”ti ca vuccati. Yojanānaṃ sahassāni, tīṇi āyatavitthatoti
tika-vin01t1:1021_5: yojanānaṃ tīṇi sahassāni āyāmato ca vitthārato cāti attho, āyāmato ca vitthārato
tika-vin01t1:1022_1: paṭimaṇḍito, sobhitoti attho. Apicettha avuttopi ayaṃ viseso veditabbo – ayaṃ himavā
tika-vin01t1:1022_2: nāma pabbato samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto, yattha āyāmavitthārena ceva
tika-vin01t1:1022_3: gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsa paṇṇāsa yojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā anotattadaho
tika-vin01t1:1022_4: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinīdaho sīhappapātadahoti
tika-vin01t1:1022_5: satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā. Tesu anotatto sudassanakūṭaṃ citrakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1022_6: kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto. Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1022_7: dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1022_8: Citrakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ. Kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ. Gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare
tika-vin01t1:1022_11: jātiphalādiphalagandho sabbathā gandhabhāvato gandhagandhoti imehi dasahi gandhehi
tika-vin01t1:1022_12: ussannaṃ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ kāḷapakkhauposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1023_0: Tattheva nandamūlakaṃ nāma pabbhāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanokāso. Tisso guhāyo suvaṇṇaguhā
tika-vin01t1:1023_1: maṇiguhā rajataguhāti. Tattha maṇiguhādvāre mañjūsako nāma rukkho yojanaṃ ubbedhena,
tika-vin01t1:1023_2: yojanaṃ vitthārena, so yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni pupphati visesena
tika-vin01t1:1023_3: paccekabuddhāgamanadivase, tassūparito sabbaratanamāḷo hoti. Tattha sammajjanakavāto
tika-vin01t1:1023_4: kacavaraṃ chaḍḍeti, samakaraṇavāto sabbaratanamayaṃ vālikaṃ samaṃ karoti, siñcanakavāto
tika-vin01t1:1023_5: anotattadahato ānetvā udakaṃ siñcati, sugandhakaraṇavāto sabbesaṃ gandharukkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1023_6: gandhe āneti, ocinakavāto pupphāni ocinitvā pāteti, santharaṇakavāto sabbattha santharati,
tika-vin01t1:1023_7: sadā paññattāneva cettha āsanāni honti. Yesu paccekabuddhuppādadivase uposathadivase
tika-vin01t1:1023_8: ca sabbapaccekabuddhā sannipatitvā nisīdanti, ayaṃ tattha pakati. Abhisambuddhapaccekabuddho
tika-vin01t1:1023_9: tattha gantvā paññattāsane nisīdati. Tato sace tasmiṃ kāle aññepi paccekabuddhā saṃvijjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1023_10: tepi taṅkhaṇaṃ sannipatitvā paññattāsanesu nisīdanti, nisīditvā kiñcideva samāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1023_11: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahanti. Tato saṅghatthero adhunāgataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ anumodanatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1023_12: “kathamadhigata”nti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati, tadā so attano udānabyākaraṇagāthaṃ bhāsati.
tika-vin01t1:1023_13: Evamidaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ āvāsaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1024_0: Kelāsakūṭaṃ pana rajatamayaṃ. Sabbāni cetāni citrakūṭādīni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni
tika-vin01t1:1024_1: tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. Sabbāni pana puthulato paññāsayojanāni, āyāmato
tika-vin01t1:1024_2: pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevāti vadanti. Tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1024_3: ca ṭhassanti, nadiyo ca tesu sandanti, taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ anotattameva pavisati,
tika-vin01t1:1024_4: candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
tika-vin01t1:1024_5: ujuṃ gacchantā na karonti, tenevassa “anotatta”nti saṅkhā udapādi. Tattha ratanamayamanuññasopānasilātalāni
tika-vin01t1:1024_7: sādhāraṇakammunāva suppaṭiyattāni susaṇṭhitāni honti, yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā
tika-vin01t1:1024_8: ca iddhimanto ca isayo nhāyanti, devayakkhādayo uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷanti.
tika-vin01t1:1025_0: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ hatthimukhaṃ assamukhaṃ usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni
tika-vin01t1:1025_1: honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. Sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā
tika-vin01t1:1025_2: honti, hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1025_3: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1025_4: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi
tika-vin01t1:1025_5: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1025_6: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1025_7: katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā
tika-vin01t1:1025_8: vuṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā
tika-vin01t1:1025_9: tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā
tika-vin01t1:1025_10: tiyaggaḷā nāma mahāpokkharaṇī jātā, mahāpokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā
tika-vin01t1:1025_11: saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā, tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā
tika-vin01t1:1025_12: viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañcadhārā
tika-vin01t1:1025_13: hutvā pavattati. Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne “āvaṭṭagaṅgā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1025_14: vuccati, ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “kaṇhagaṅgā”ti, ākāsena
tika-vin01t1:1025_15: saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “ākāsagaṅgā”ti, tiyaggaḷapāsāṇe paññāsayojanokāse ṭhitā
tika-vin01t1:1025_16: “tiyaggaḷapokkharaṇī”ti, kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:1025_17: “bahalagaṅgā”ti, umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “umaṅgagaṅgā”ti vuccati. Viñjhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1025_18: nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā yamunā
tika-vin01t1:1025_19: aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcadhā saṅkhyaṃ gatā. Evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pabhavanti.
tika-vin01t1:1026_0: Chaddantadahassa pana majjhe dvādasayojanappamāṇe ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1026_1: maṇikkhandhavaṇṇaṃ udakameva santiṭṭhati, tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthataṃ suddhakallahāravanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1026_2: taṃ udakaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ, tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthatameva suddhanīluppalavanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1026_4: purimaṃ purimaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitāni, imesaṃ pana sattannaṃ vanānaṃ anantaraṃ sabbesampi
tika-vin01t1:1026_5: kallahārādīnaṃ vasena vomissakavanaṃ yojanavitthatameva tāni parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1026_6: tadanantaraṃ nāgānaṃ kaṭippamāṇe udake yojanavitthatameva rattasālivanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1026_8: imāni dasa vanāni yojanayojanavitthatāneva. Tato khuddakarājamāsamahārājamāsamuggavanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1026_10: tato hatthidantappamāṇaphalaṃ kadalivanaṃ, tato sālavanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ cāṭippamāṇaphalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1026_11: panasavanaṃ, tato madhuraphalaṃ ambavanaṃ, tato ciñcavanaṃ, tato kapiṭṭhavanaṃ, tato
tika-vin01t1:1026_12: vomissako mahāvanasaṇḍo, tato veṇuvanaṃ, veṇuvanaṃ pana parikkhipitvā satta pabbatā
tika-vin01t1:1026_13: ṭhitā, tesaṃ bāhirantato paṭṭhāya paṭhamo cūḷakāḷapabbato nāma, dutiyo mahākāḷapabbato
tika-vin01t1:1026_14: nāma, tato udakapassapabbato nāma, tato candapassapabbato nāma, tato sūriyapassapabbato
tika-vin01t1:1026_15: nāma, tato maṇipassapabbato nāma, sattamo suvaṇṇapassapabbato nāma. So ubbedhato
tika-vin01t1:1026_16: sattayojaniko chaddantadahaṃ parikkhipitvā pattassa mukhavaṭṭi viya ṭhito. Tassa
tika-vin01t1:1026_17: abbhantarimapassaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ, tato nikkhantena obhāsena chaddantadaho samuggatabālasūriyo
tika-vin01t1:1026_18: viya hoti. Bāhirimapabbatesu pana eko ubbedhato cha yojanāni, eko pañca, eko cattāri,
tika-vin01t1:1026_19: eko tīṇi, eko dve, eko yojanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1027_0: Evaṃ sattapabbataparikkhittassa pana tassa dahassa pubbuttarakaṇṇe udakavātappaharaṇokāse
tika-vin01t1:1027_1: mahānigrodharukkho, tassa khandho parikkhepato pañcayojaniko, ubbedhato sattayojaniko.
tika-vin01t1:1027_2: Catūsu disāsu catasso sākhāyo chachayojanikā, uddhaṃ uggatasākhāpi chayojanikāva.
tika-vin01t1:1027_3: Iti so mūlato paṭṭhāya ubbedhena terasayojaniko sākhānaṃ orimantato yāva pārimantā
tika-vin01t1:1027_4: dvādasayojaniko aṭṭhahi pārohasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito muṇḍamaṇipabbato viya vilāsamāno
tika-vin01t1:1027_5: tiṭṭhati. Chaddantadahassa pana pacchimadisābhāge suvaṇṇapabbate dvādasayojanikā
tika-vin01t1:1027_6: kañcanaguhā. Chaddanto nāgarājā vassāratte aṭṭhasahassanāgaparivuto kañcanaguhāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1027_7: vasati, gimhakāle udakavātaṃ sampaṭicchamāno mahānigrodhamūle pārohantare tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1028_0: Mandākiniyā pana majjhe pañcavīsatiyojanamatte ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1028_1: phalikavaṇṇaṃ udakameva hoti, tato paraṃ pana nāgānaṃ kaṭippamāṇe udake aḍḍhayojanavitthataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1028_2: setapadumavanaṃ taṃ udakaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha muḷālaṃ naṅgalasīsamattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1028_3: hoti, bhisaṃ mahābheripokkharappamāṇaṃ hoti. Tassa ekekasmiṃ pabbantare āḷhakappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1028_4: khīraṃ hoti. Padumānaṃ pupphasamaye vāto reṇuvaṭṭiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā paduminīpattesu ṭhapeti,
tika-vin01t1:1028_5: tattha udakaphusitāni patanti, tato ādiccapākena paccitvā pakkaayoghaṭikā viya pokkharamadhu
tika-vin01t1:1028_6: tiṭṭhati, tadanantaraṃ tāvamahantameva rattapadumavanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ rattakumudavanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1028_7: tadanantaraṃ setakumudavanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ nīluppalavanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ rattuppalavanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1028_9: valliphalāni, tadanantaraṃ aḍḍhayojanavitthatameva ucchuvanaṃ, tattha pūgarukkhakkhandhappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1028_10: ucchu. Tadanantaraṃ kadalivanaṃ, yato duve pakkāni khādantā kilamanti. Tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1028_11: cāṭippamāṇaphalaṃ panasavanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ ambavanaṃ, jambuvanaṃ, kapiṭṭhavananti
tika-vin01t1:1028_12: saṅkhepato tasmiṃ dahe khāditabbayuttakaṃ phalaṃ nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ. Iti
tika-vin01t1:1028_14: visesaṃ bhagavā sabbathā avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1029_1: pariṇāho pannarasayojanappamāṇoti vuttaṃ hoti. Nagavhayāti nagasaddena avhātabbā,
tika-vin01t1:1029_2: rukkhābhidhānāti attho. Rukkho hi na gacchatīti nagoti vuccati. Nagavhayā jambūti
tika-vin01t1:1029_4: ubbedhato samantato ca paññāsayojanasākhāyāmā ca. Tato eva satayojanavitthiṇṇā, tāvadeva
tika-vin01t1:1029_5: ca uggatā. Jamburukkhassa hi mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva sākhāviṭapā, tāva paṇṇāsa yojanāni,
tika-vin01t1:1029_6: tato parampi ujukaṃ uggatasākhā paṇṇāsa yojanāni, samantato ca ekekā sākhā paṇṇāsa
tika-vin01t1:1029_7: paṇṇāsa yojanāni vaḍḍhitāni. Tāsu pana mahantā mahantā nadiyo sandanti, tāsaṃ nadīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1029_8: ubhayatīre jambupakkānaṃ patitaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti, te nadījalena vuyhamānā
tika-vin01t1:1029_9: anupubbena mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti, tatoyeva jambunadiyaṃ nibbattattā “jambunada”nti
tika-vin01t1:1030_0: Yassānubhāvenāti yassā mahantatā kappaṭṭhāyikādippakārena pabhāvena. Yañcetaṃ jambuyā
tika-vin01t1:1030_1: pamāṇaṃ, etadeva asurānaṃ cittapāṭaliyā, garuḷānaṃ simbalirukkhassa, aparagoyāne
tika-vin01t1:1030_2: kadambassa, uttarakurūsu kapparukkhassa, pubbavidehe sirīsassa, tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakassāti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin01t1:1032: Kadambo kapparukkho ca, sirīsena bhavati sattama”nti. ;
tika-vin01t1:1033: Ettha sirīsena bhavati sattamanti ettha sirīsenāti paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ. Sattamanti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, sirīso bhavati sattamoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1034_0: Cakkavāḷasiluccayoti cakkavāḷapabbato. Parikkhipitvā taṃ sabbaṃ, lokadhātumayaṃ ṭhitoti
tika-vin01t1:1034_1: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi taṃ parikkhipitvā cakkavāḷasiluccayo patiṭṭhito, ayaṃ ekā
tika-vin01t1:1034_2: lokadhātu nāmāti attho. Ma-kāro padasandhivasena āgato. “Taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātuṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t1:1034_3: ayaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhito”ti evampettha sambandhaṃ vadanti, evaṃ vuttepi cakkavāḷapabbatopi
tika-vin01t1:1035_0: Tatthāti tissaṃ lokadhātuyaṃ. Candamaṇḍalaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojananti ujukaṃ āyāmato
tika-vin01t1:1035_1: vitthārato ubbedhato ca ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ, parimaṇḍalato pana tīhi yojanehi ūnadiyaḍḍhasatayojanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1035_2: Sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāsayojananti etthāpi candamaṇḍale vuttanayeneva ujukaṃ paññāsayojananti
tika-vin01t1:1036_0: Tesu pana candamaṇḍalaṃ heṭṭhā, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ upari, antarā nesaṃ yojanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1036_1: Candassa heṭṭhimantato sūriyassa uparimantaṃ yojanasataṃ hoti, candavimānaṃ anto
tika-vin01t1:1036_2: maṇimayaṃ, bahi rajatena parikkhittaṃ, anto ca bahi ca sītalameva hoti. Sūriyavimānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1036_3: anto kanakamayaṃ, bāhiraṃ phalikaparikkhittaṃ hoti, anto ca bahi ca uṇhameva. Cando
tika-vin01t1:1036_4: ujukaṃ saṇikaṃ gacchati. So hi amāvāsiyaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ gacchanto divase divase
tika-vin01t1:1036_5: thokaṃ thokaṃ ohīyanto puṇṇamāsiyaṃ upaḍḍhamaggato ohīyati, tiriyaṃ pana sīghaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1036_6: Tathā hesa ekasmiṃ māse kadāci dakkhiṇato, kadāci uttarato dissati, candassa ubhosu
tika-vin01t1:1036_7: passesu nakkhattatārakā gacchanti, cando dhenu viya vacchaṃ taṃ taṃ nakkhattaṃ upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin01t1:1036_8: nakkhattāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahanti, attano vīthiyāva gacchanti. Sūriyassa
tika-vin01t1:1036_9: pana ujukaṃ gamanaṃ sīghaṃ, tiriyaṃ gamanaṃ dandhaṃ. Tiriyaṃ gamanaṃ nāma dakkhiṇadisato
tika-vin01t1:1036_10: uttaradisāya, uttaradisato dakkhiṇadisāya gamanaṃ, taṃ dandhaṃ chahi chahi māsehi ijjhanato.
tika-vin01t1:1037_0: Sūriyo kāḷapakkhauposathe candena saheva gantvā tato paraṃ pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_1: satasahassaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati attano sīghagāmitāya tassa ca dandhagāmitāya,
tika-vin01t1:1037_2: atha cando lekhā viya paññāyati. Tato parampi pakkhassa dutiyāya yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_3: candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati. Evaṃ divase divase yāva sukkapakkhauposathadivasā satasahassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_4: satasahassaṃ ohāya gacchati, atha cando anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā uposathadivase paripuṇṇo
tika-vin01t1:1037_5: hoti. Anukkamena vaḍḍhanañcettha uparibhāgato patitasūriyālokatāya heṭṭhato pavattāya
tika-vin01t1:1037_6: sūriyassa dūrabhāvena divase divase anukkamena parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena
tika-vin01t1:1037_7: anukkamena caṇḍamaṇḍalappadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa viya dissamānatāyāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1037_8: tasmā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā viya uposathadivase puṇṇamāyaṃ paripuṇṇamaṇḍalo hutvā
tika-vin01t1:1037_9: dissati. Atha sūriyo pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā puna candamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_10: gaṇhāti candassa dandhagatitāya attano ca sīghagatitāya, tathā dutiyāya satasahassanti
tika-vin01t1:1037_11: evaṃ yāva uposathadivasā satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā gaṇhāti. Atha cando anukkamena
tika-vin01t1:1037_12: hāyitvā kāḷapakkhauposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati, anukkamena hāyamānatā cettha
tika-vin01t1:1037_13: anukkamena vaḍḍhamānatāya vuttanayena veditabbā. Tattha pana chāyāya hāyamānatāya
tika-vin01t1:1037_14: maṇḍalaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ viya dissati, idha ca chāyāya vaḍḍhamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ hāyamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_15: viya dissati, tasmā anukkamena hāyitvā viya uposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1037_16: Candaṃ heṭṭhā katvā sūriyo upari hoti, mahatiyā pātiyā khuddakabhājanaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_17: pidhīyati, majjhanhike gehacchāyā viya candassa chāyā na paññāyati. So chāyāya apaññāyamānāya
tika-vin01t1:1037_18: dūre ṭhitānaṃ divā padīpo viya sayampi na paññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1038_0: Imesaṃ pana ajavīthi nāgavīthi govīthīti tisso gamanavīthiyo honti. Tattha ajānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1038_1: udakaṃ paṭikūlaṃ hoti, hatthināgānaṃ manāpaṃ, gunnaṃ sītuṇhasamatāya phāsu hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1038_2: Tathā ca yāya vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā sūriyābhitāpasantattā
tika-vin01t1:1038_3: attano vimānato na nikkhamanti, kīḷāpasutā hutvā na vicaranti, tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1038_4: pakatimaggato adho otaritvā vicarati, tassa oruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi adho
tika-vin01t1:1038_5: oruyha carati taggatikattā, tasmā sā vīthi udakābhāvena ajānurūpatāya “ajavīthī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1038_6: samaññā gatā. Yāya pana vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā sūriyābhitāpābhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1038_7: abhiṇhaṃ attano vimānato bahi nikkhamitvā kīḷāpasutā hutvā ito cito ca vicaranti,
tika-vin01t1:1038_8: tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ pakatimaggato uddhaṃ āruhitvā vicarati, tassa uddhaṃ āruyha
tika-vin01t1:1038_9: caraṇeneva candavimānampi uddhaṃ āruyha carati taggatikattā, taggatikatā ca samānagati
tika-vin01t1:1038_10: nāma vātamaṇḍalena vimānassa phellitabbattā, tasmā sā vīthi udakabahubhāvena nāgānurūpatāya
tika-vin01t1:1038_11: “nāgavīthī”ti samaññā gatā. Yadā sūriyo uddhaṃ anārohanto adho ca anotaranto pakatimaggeneva
tika-vin01t1:1038_12: gacchati, tadā vassavalāhakā yathākālaṃ yathāruciñca vimānato nikkhamitvā sukhena
tika-vin01t1:1038_13: vicaranti, tena kālena kālaṃ vassanato loke utusamatā hoti, tāya utusamatāya hetubhūtāya
tika-vin01t1:1038_14: sā candimasūriyānaṃ gati gavānurūpatāya “govīthī”ti samaññā gatā. Tasmā yaṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1038_15: candimasūriyā ajavīthiṃ āruhanti, tadā devo ekabindumpi na vassati. Yadā nāgavīthiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1038_16: ārohanti, tadā bhinnaṃ viya nabhaṃ paggharati. Yadā govīthiṃ ārohanti, tadā utusamatā sampajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1039_0: Yadā pana rājāno adhammikā honti, tesaṃ adhammikatāya uparājasenāpatippabhutayo sabbe
tika-vin01t1:1039_1: devā brahmāno ca adhammikā honti, tadā tesaṃ adhammikatāya visamaṃ candimasūriyā
tika-vin01t1:1039_3: sādhāraṇassa pāpakammassa balena visamaṃ vāyantena vāyunā phelliyamānā candimasūriyā
tika-vin01t1:1039_4: sineruṃ parikkhipantā visamaṃ parivattanti, yathāmaggena na pavattanti. Vāto yathāmaggena
tika-vin01t1:1039_5: na vāyati, ayathāmaggena vāyati, ayathāmaggena vāyanto ākāsaṭṭhavimānāni khobheti,
tika-vin01t1:1039_6: vimānesu khobhitesu devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni na namanti, cittesu anamantesu
tika-vin01t1:1039_7: sītuṇhabhedo utu yathākālena na sampajjati, tasmiṃ asampajjante na sammā devo vassati,
tika-vin01t1:1039_8: kadāci vassati, kadāci na vassati, katthaci vassati, katthaci na vassati. Vassantopi
tika-vin01t1:1039_9: vappakāle aṅkurakāle nāḷakāle pupphakāle khīraggahaṇādikālesu yathā yathā sassānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1039_10: upakāro na hoti, tathā tathā vassati ca vigacchati ca. Tena sassāni visamapākāni
tika-vin01t1:1039_11: honti vigatagandharasādisampadāni, ekabhājane pakkhittataṇḍulesupi ekasmiṃ padese
tika-vin01t1:1039_12: bhattaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ atikilinnaṃ, ekasmiṃ samapākaṃ. Taṃ paribhuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1039_13: kucchiyampi sabbaso apariṇataṃ, ekadesena pariṇataṃ, supariṇatanti evaṃ tīhiyeva
tika-vin01t1:1039_14: pakārehi paccati, pakkāsayaṃ na sammā upagacchati. Tena sattā bahvābādhā ceva honti appāyukā ca.
tika-vin01t1:1040_0: Dhammikānaṃ pana rājūnaṃ kāle vuttavipariyāyena candimasūriyā samaṃ parivattanti,
tika-vin01t1:1040_1: yathāmaggena pavattanti, utusamatā ca sampajjati, candimasūriyā cha māse sineruto
tika-vin01t1:1040_2: bahi nikkhamanti, cha māse anto vicaranti. Tathā hi sinerusamīpena taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1040_3: katvā gacchantā cha māse tato gamanavīthito bahi attano tiriyaṃ gamanena cakkavāḷābhimukhā
tika-vin01t1:1040_4: nikkhamanti. Evaṃ cha māse khaṇe khaṇe sineruto apasakkanavasena tato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t1:1040_5: cakkavāḷasamīpaṃ pattā. Tatopi cha māse khaṇe khaṇe apasakkanavasena nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t1:1040_6: sinerusamīpaṃ pāpuṇantā anto vicaranti. Te hi āsāḷhīmāse sinerusamīpena caranti,
tika-vin01t1:1040_7: tato dve māse nikkhamitvā bahi caranti. Paṭhamakattikamāse majjhena gacchanti, tato
tika-vin01t1:1040_8: cakkavāḷābhimukhā gantvā tayo māse cakkavāḷasamīpena vicaritvā puna nikkhamitvā citramāse
tika-vin01t1:1040_9: majjhena gantvā tato pare dve māse sineruabhimukhā pakkhanditvā puna āsāḷhe sinerusamīpena
tika-vin01t1:1040_10: caranti. Ettha ca sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ, tassa sinerussa
tika-vin01t1:1040_11: ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ, tena gacchantā sinerusamīpena carantīti veditabbā, na sinerussa
tika-vin01t1:1040_12: aggālindaṃ allīnā, cakkavāḷasamīpena caraṇampi imināva nayena veditabbaṃ. Yadā pana
tika-vin01t1:1040_13: sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ujukaṃ vemajjhena gacchanti, tadā vemajjhena vicarantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1041_0: Evaṃ vicarantā ca ekappahārena tīsupi dīpesu ālokaṃ karonti. Ekekāya disāya nava
tika-vin01t1:1041_1: nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti. Kathaṃ? Imasmiñhi
tika-vin01t1:1041_2: dīpe sūriyuggamanakālo pubbavidehe majjhanhiko hoti, uttarakurūsu atthaṅgamanakālo,
tika-vin01t1:1041_3: aparagoyāne majjhimayāmo, pubbavidehamhi uggamanakālo uttarakurūsu majjhanhiko, aparagoyāne
tika-vin01t1:1041_4: atthaṅgamanakālo, idha majjhimayāmo, uttarakurūsu uggamanakālo aparagoyāne majjhanhiko,
tika-vin01t1:1041_5: idha atthaṅgamanakālo, pubbavidehe majjhimayāmo, aparagoyānadīpe uggamanakālo idha
tika-vin01t1:1041_6: majjhanhiko, pubbavidehadīpe atthaṅgamanakālo, uttarakurūsu majjhimayāmo. Imasmiñhi
tika-vin01t1:1041_7: dīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1041_8: paññāyati, aparagoyānavāsīnaṃ uggamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ paññāyati. Evaṃ sesadīpesupi.
tika-vin01t1:1041_9: Iti imināva pakārena tīsu dīpesu ekappahāreneva candimasūriyā ālokaṃ dassentīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1042_0: Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahāreneva ālokaṃ dassenti. Yasmiñhi dīpe atthaṅgamanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1042_1: upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, atthaṅgamite tattha na paññāyati, ālokaṃ na dasseti,
tika-vin01t1:1042_2: dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahārena ubhayaṃ. Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni
tika-vin01t1:1042_3: andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiñhi dīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1042_4: pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyatīti pubbavidehe
tika-vin01t1:1042_5: navayojanasatasahassappamāṇe ṭhāne andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dasseti, tathā aparagoyāne
tika-vin01t1:1042_6: uggamanavasena tatthāpi upaḍḍhasseva paññāyamānattā. Pubbavidehānaṃ pana atthaṅgamite
tika-vin01t1:1042_7: na paññāyatīti dvīsu dīpesu sabbattha andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dasseti aparagoyānepi
tika-vin01t1:1043_0: Pātubhavantā ca candimasūriyā ekatova loke pātubhavanti, tesu sūriyo paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1043_1: paññāyati. Paṭhamakappikānañhi sattānaṃ sayaṃpabhāya antarahitāya andhakāro ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1043_2: Te bhītatasitā “bhaddakaṃ vatassa, sace añño āloko bhaveyyā”ti cintayiṃsu. Tato mahājanassa
tika-vin01t1:1043_3: sūrabhāvaṃ janayamānaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi, tenevassa “sūriyo”ti nāmaṃ ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1043_4: Tasmiṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgamite puna andhakāro ahosi. Te bhītatasitā “bhaddakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1043_5: vatassa, sace añño āloko uppajjeyyā”ti cintayiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya
tika-vin01t1:1043_6: candamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi, tenevassa “cando”ti nāmaṃ ahosi. Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu
tika-vin01t1:1043_7: nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti, tato pabhuti rattindivā paññāyanti. Anukkamena
tika-vin01t1:1043_8: ca māsaḍḍhamāsautusaṃvaccharā jāyanti. Candimasūriyānaṃ pana pātubhūtadivaseyeva
tika-vin01t1:1043_9: sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā cattāro ca dīpā pātubhavanti, te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1044_0: Yasmā cettha “ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni
tika-vin01t1:1044_1: tīṇi sahassāni cattāri satāni paññāsañca yojanānī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:1044_2: vuttappamāṇato imassa cakkavāḷassa sinerupatiṭṭhitokāse caturāsīti yojanasahassāni
tika-vin01t1:1044_3: parato yāva cakkavāḷapabbatā uttaradisābhāgappamāṇañca pahāya imissā dakkhiṇadisāya –
tika-vin01t1:1051: Majjhato yāva merumhā, cakkavāḷā ca pabbatā;
tika-vin01t1:1062: Gacchanto ca panevaṃ so, oruyhoruyha heṭṭhato.
tika-vin01t1:1066: Tasmā so parito yāti, tattakaṃva dine dine.
tika-vin01t1:1073: Gāvutāni duve cāpi, dvīhi māsehi gacchati;
tika-vin01t1:1075: Gacchati chahi māsehi, timāsehi ca majjhimaṃ;
tika-vin01t1:1085_0: Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ dasasahassayojananti ettha tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti
tika-vin01t1:1085_1: taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ, tadeva tāvatiṃsaṃ, taṃ nivāso etesanti tāvatiṃsā,
tika-vin01t1:1085_2: devā, tesaṃ bhavanaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ. Tathā hi maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ macalagāmake
tika-vin01t1:1085_3: kālaṃ katvā tattha uppanne tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya assa devalokassa ayaṃ paṇṇatti
tika-vin01t1:1085_4: jātāti vadanti. Atha vā yasmā sesacakkavāḷesupi cha kāmāvacaradevalokā atthi. Vuttampi
tika-vin01t1:1085_5: cetaṃ “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti. Tasmā nāmapaṇṇattiyevesā
tika-vin01t1:1085_6: tassa devalokassāti veditabbā. Dasasahassayojananti idaṃ pana sakkapuraṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:1085_7: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi tāvatiṃsakāyikā devā atthi pabbataṭṭhakā, atthi ākāsaṭṭhakā,
tika-vin01t1:1085_8: tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā, tathā cātumahārājikānaṃ yāmādīnañca. Ekadevalokepi
tika-vin01t1:1085_9: hi devānaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi. Idaṃ pana tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1085_10: sinerussa uparimatale dasasahassayojanike ṭhāne patiṭṭhitanti veditabbaṃ. Tassa pācīnapacchimadvārānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1085_11: antarā dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti, tathā dakkhiṇuttaradvārānaṃ. Taṃ kho pana nagaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1086_0: Tassa majjhe tiyojanasatubbedhehi, dhajehi paṭimaṇḍito sattaratanamayo sattayojanasatubbedho
tika-vin01t1:1086_1: sakkassa vejayanto nāma pāsādo. Tattha suvaṇṇayaṭṭhīsu maṇidhajā ahesuṃ, maṇiyaṭṭhīsu
tika-vin01t1:1086_2: suvaṇṇadhajā, pavāḷayaṭṭhīsu muttadhajā, muttayaṭṭhīsu pavāḷadhajā, sattaratanamayāsu
tika-vin01t1:1087_0: Diyaḍḍhayojanasatāyāmo vejayantaratho. Tassa hi pacchimanto paṇṇāsayojano, majjhe
tika-vin01t1:1087_1: rathapañjaro paṇṇāsayojano, rathasandhito yāva rathasīsā paṇṇāseva yojanāni. Tadeva
tika-vin01t1:1087_2: pamāṇaṃ diguṇaṃ katvā “tiyojanasatāyāmo”tipi vadantiyeva. Tasmiṃ yojanikapallaṅko
tika-vin01t1:1087_3: atthato tiṭṭhati. Tattha tiyojanikaṃ setacchattaṃ, ekasmiṃyeva yuge sahassaājaññayuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1087_4: Sesālaṅkārassa pamāṇaṃ natthi. Dhajo panassa aḍḍhatiyāni yojanasatāni uggato, yassa
tika-vin01t1:1088_0: Sakkassa pana erāvaṇo nāma hatthī diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko, sopi devaputtoyeva. Na hi
tika-vin01t1:1088_1: devalokasmiṃ tiracchānagatā honti, tasmā so uyyānakīḷāya nikkhamanakāle attabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1088_2: vijahitvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko erāvaṇo nāma hatthī hoti. So tettiṃsakumbhe māpeti
tika-vin01t1:1088_3: āvaṭṭena gāvutaaḍḍhayojanappamāṇe, sabbesaṃ majjhe sakkassa atthāya sudassanaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t1:1088_4: tiṃsayojanikaṃ kumbhaṃ māpeti. Tassa upari dvādasayojaniko ratanamaṇḍapo hoti. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1088_5: antarantarā sattaratanamayā yojanubbedhā dhajā uṭṭhahanti. Pariyante kiṅkiṇikajālā
tika-vin01t1:1088_6: olambanti, yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasadiso dibbagītasaddo viya
tika-vin01t1:1088_7: ravo niccharati. Maṇḍapamajjhe sakkassa yojaniko maṇipallaṅko paññatto hoti, tattha
tika-vin01t1:1088_8: sakko nisīdati. Tettiṃsāya kumbhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ kumbhe satta satta dante māpeti, tesu
tika-vin01t1:1088_9: ekeko paṇṇāsayojanāyāmo. Ekekasmiñcettha dante satta satta pokkharaṇiyo honti, ekekāya
tika-vin01t1:1088_10: pokkharaṇiyā satta satta paduminīgacchā, ekekasmiṃ gacche satta satta pupphāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1088_11: ekekassa pupphassa satta satta pattāni, ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta devadhītaro naccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1088_12: Evaṃ samantā paṇṇāsayojanaṭṭhāne hatthidantesuyeva naccanaṭasamajjo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1089: Nandā nāma pana pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanā. “Pañcasatayojanikā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1090_0: Cittalatāvanaṃ pana saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ. “Pañcayojanasatika”ntipi vadanti. Taṃ pana dibbarukkhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1090_1: tathā nandanavanaṃ phārusakavanañca. Sakko panettha accharāsaṅghaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1090_2: suvaṇṇamahāvīthiṃ otaritvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanto nandanavanādīsu vicarati.
tika-vin01t1:1091_0: Pāricchattako pana koviḷāro samantā tiyojanasataparimaṇḍalo pañcadasayojanapariṇāhakkhandho
tika-vin01t1:1091_1: yojanasatubbedho. Tassa mūle saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paññāsayojanavitthārā pañcadasayojanubbedhā
tika-vin01t1:1091_2: jayasumanapupphakavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā, yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo
tika-vin01t1:1092_0: Sudhammā nāma devasabhā āyāmato ca vitthārato ca tiyojanasatikā, parikkhepato navayojanasatikā,
tika-vin01t1:1092_1: ubbedhato pañcayojanasatikā, tassā phalikamayā bhūmi, thambhatulāsaṅghāṭādīsu vāḷarūpādisaṅghaṭṭanakaāṇiyo
tika-vin01t1:1092_2: maṇimayā, suvaṇṇamayā thambhā, rajatamayā thambhaghaṭakā ca saṅghāṭañca, pavāḷamayāni
tika-vin01t1:1092_3: vāḷarūpāni, sattaratanamayā gopānasiyo ca pakkhapāsā ca mukhavaṭṭi ca, indanīlaiṭṭhakāhi
tika-vin01t1:1093_0: Āsāvatī nāma ekā latā atthi, “sā pupphissatī”ti devā vassasahassaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1093_1: pāricchattake pupphamāne ekaṃ vassaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. Te tassa paṇḍupalāsādibhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1094_0: “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako koviḷāro paṇḍupalāso
tika-vin01t1:1094_1: hoti, attamanā, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako
tika-vin01t1:1094_2: koviḷāro, na cirasseva dāni pannapalāso bhavissatī”’tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1095_0: Sabbapāliphullassa pana pāricchattakassa koviḷārassa samantā pañca yojanasatāni ābhā
tika-vin01t1:1095_1: pharati, anuvātaṃ yojanasataṃ gandho gacchati. Pupphite pāricchattake ārohaṇakiccaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1095_2: vā aṅkusaṃ gahetvā nāmanakiccaṃ vā pupphāharaṇatthaṃ caṅkoṭakakiccaṃ vā natthi. Kantanakavāto
tika-vin01t1:1095_3: uṭṭhahitvā pupphāni vaṇṭato kantati, sampaṭicchanakavāto sampaṭicchati, pavesanakavāto
tika-vin01t1:1095_4: sudhammadevasabhaṃ paveseti, sammajjanakavāto purāṇapupphāni nīharati, santharaṇakavāto
tika-vin01t1:1095_5: pattakaṇṇikakesarāni racento santharati, majjhaṭṭhāne dhammāsanaṃ hoti yojanappamāṇo
tika-vin01t1:1095_6: ratanapallaṅko, tassa upari dhāriyamānaṃ tiyojanikaṃ setacchattaṃ, tadanantaraṃ sakkassa
tika-vin01t1:1095_7: devarañño āsanaṃ attharīyati, tato bāttiṃsāya devaputtānaṃ, tato aññesaṃ mahesakkhadevatānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1095_8: Aññesaṃ devatānaṃ pana pupphakaṇṇikāva āsanaṃ hoti. Devā devasabhaṃ pavisitvā nisīdanti.
tika-vin01t1:1095_9: Tato pupphehi reṇuvaṭṭi uggantvā upari kaṇṇikaṃ āhacca nipatamānā devatānaṃ tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1095_10: attabhāvaṃ lākhāparikammasajjitaṃ viya karoti, tesaṃ sā kīḷā catūhi māsehi pariyosānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1095_11: gacchati. Iti imāhi sampattīhi samannāgataṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ bhagavā sabbathā avedīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1096_0: Tathā asurabhavananti ettha devā viya na suranti na īsaranti na virocantīti asurā.
tika-vin01t1:1096_1: Surā nāma devā, tesaṃ paṭipakkhāti vā asurā. Sakko kira macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo
tika-vin01t1:1096_2: hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto satta vattapadāni pūretvā tattha
tika-vin01t1:1096_3: kālakato devaloke nibbatti saddhiṃ parisāya. Tato pubbadevā “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā,
tika-vin01t1:1096_4: sakkāraṃ nesaṃ karomā”ti vatvā dibbapadumāni upanāmesuṃ, upaḍḍharajjena ca nimantesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1096_5: Sakko upaḍḍharajjena asantuṭṭho ahosi, atha nevāsikā “āgantukadevaputtānaṃ sakkāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1096_6: karomā”ti gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ adāsi “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1096_7: pivittha, pivamānākāramattameva dassethā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu. Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi
tika-vin01t1:1096_8: upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā
tika-vin01t1:1096_9: sayiṃsu. Sakko “gaṇhatha dhutte, haratha dhutte”ti te pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupāde
tika-vin01t1:1096_10: khipāpesi. Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1096_12: nibbatti pāricchattakapaṭicchannabhūtāya citrapāṭaliyā upasobhitaṃ. Sakko tesaṃ nivattitvā
tika-vin01t1:1096_13: anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1098: Uragakaroṭipayassa ca hārī, madanayutā caturo ca mahatthā”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:1099_0: Tattha dvinnaṃ ayujjhapurānanti dvinnaṃ devāsuranagarānaṃ antarāti attho. Dve kira
tika-vin01t1:1099_1: nagarāni yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni. Yadā hi asurā
tika-vin01t1:1099_2: balavanto honti, atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite asurānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1099_3: satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Yadā devā balavanto honti, atha asurehi palāyitvā
tika-vin01t1:1099_4: asuranagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin01t1:1099_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma. Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu
tika-vin01t1:1099_6: sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā. Tattha uragasaddena nāgā gahitā. Te udake mahabbalā honti,
tika-vin01t1:1099_7: tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde etesaṃ ārakkhā. Sinerussa kira samantato bahalato puthulato
tika-vin01t1:1099_8: ca pañcayojanasahassaparimāṇāni cattāri paribhaṇḍāni tāvatiṃsabhavanassa ārakkhāya
tika-vin01t1:1099_9: nāgehi garuḷehi kumbhaṇḍehi yakkhehi ca adhiṭṭhitāni. Tehi kira sinerussa upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1099_10: pariyādinnaṃ, etāniyeva ca sinerussa ālindāni mekhalāni ca vuccanti. Karoṭisaddena
tika-vin01t1:1099_11: supaṇṇā gahitā. Tesaṃ kira karoṭi nāma pānabhojanaṃ, tena nāmaṃ labhiṃsu, dutiyālinde
tika-vin01t1:1099_12: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Payassahārīsaddena kumbhaṇḍā gahitā. Dānavarakkhasā kira te, tatiyālinde
tika-vin01t1:1099_13: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Madanayutasaddena yakkhā gahitā. Visamacārino kira te yuddhasoṇḍā,
tika-vin01t1:1099_14: catutthālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Caturo ca mahatthāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā. Te hi
tika-vin01t1:1099_15: sinerussa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ passe yugandharādīsu pañcasataparittadīpaparivāre mahādīpe
tika-vin01t1:1099_16: ca sāsitabbassa mahato atthassa vasena “mahatthā”ti vuccanti, pañcamālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā.
tika-vin01t1:1100_0: Te pana asurā āyuvaṇṇayasaissariyasampattīhi tāvatiṃsasadisāva. Tasmā antarā attānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1100_1: ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya “nayidaṃ devanagaraṃ, tattha pāricchattako pupphati,
tika-vin01t1:1100_2: idha pana cittapāṭalī, jarasakkena mayaṃ suraṃ pāyetvā vañcitā, devanagarañca no
tika-vin01t1:1100_3: gahitaṃ, gacchāma tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni
tika-vin01t1:1100_4: gahetvā yuddhasajjā hutvā asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā
tika-vin01t1:1100_5: uṭṭhahanti. Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ abhiruhituṃ ārabhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_6: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci
tika-vin01t1:1100_7: chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati, na lohitaṃ uppajjati, kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1100_8: viya aññamaññaṃ santāsanamattameva hoti. Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1100_9: yujjhitvā asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti. Sace pana asurā balavanto honti, atha
tika-vin01t1:1100_10: nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā yujjhanti. Esa nayo supaṇṇādīsupi.
tika-vin01t1:1100_11: Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti, tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi tāni pañca
tika-vin01t1:1100_12: balāni osakkanti. Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa pavattiṃ ārocenti. Sakko
tika-vin01t1:1100_13: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati,
tika-vin01t1:1100_14: ekaṃ vā puttaṃ peseti. Ekasmiṃ pana divase evaṃ nikkhamitvā asure yuddhena abbhuggantvā
tika-vin01t1:1100_15: samudde pakkhipitvā catūsu dvāresu attanā sadisā paṭimā māpetvā ṭhapeti, tasmā asurā
tika-vin01t1:1100_16: nāgādayo jinitvā āgatāpi indapaṭimā disvā “sakko nikkhanto”ti palāyanti. Iti surānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1100_17: paṭipakkhāti asurā, vepacittipahārādādayo, tesaṃ bhavanaṃ asurabhavanaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:1100_18: āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dasasahassayojananti dassetuṃ “tathā asurabhavana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1101_0: Avīcimahānirayo jambudīpo cāti etthāpi tathā-saddo yojetabbo, avīcimahānirayo jambudīpo
tika-vin01t1:1101_1: ca tathā dasasahassayojanamevāti attho. Ettha ca avīcimahānirayassa abbhantaraṃ āyāmena
tika-vin01t1:1101_2: ca vitthārena ca yojanasataṃ hoti, lohapathavī lohachadanaṃ ekekā ca bhitti navanavayojanikā
tika-vin01t1:1101_3: hoti. Puratthimāya bhittiyā acci uṭṭhahitvā pacchimaṃ bhittiṃ gahetvā taṃ vinivijjhitvā
tika-vin01t1:1101_4: parato yojanasataṃ gacchati. Sesadisāsupi eseva nayo. Iti jālapariyantavasena āyāmavitthārato
tika-vin01t1:1101_5: aṭṭhārasayojanādhikāni tīṇi yojanasatāni honti, parikkhepena nava yojanasatāni catupaṇṇāsañca
tika-vin01t1:1101_6: yojanāni. Samantā pana ussadehi saddhiṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti. Kasmā panesa narako
tika-vin01t1:1101_7: “avīcī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatoti? Vīci nāma antaraṃ vuccati, tattha ca aggijālānaṃ vā sattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1101_8: vā dukkhassa vā antaraṃ natthi, tasmā so “avīcī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato. Tassa hi puratthimabhittito
tika-vin01t1:1101_9: jālā uṭṭhahitvā saṃsibbamānayojanasataṃ gantvā bhittiṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1101_10: gacchati. Sesadisāsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ jālānaṃ nirantaratāya avīci. Abbhantare panassa
tika-vin01t1:1101_11: yojanasatike ṭhāne nāḷiyaṃ koṭṭetvā pūritatipupiṭṭhaṃ viya sattā nirantarā, “imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1101_12: ṭhāne satto atthi, imasmiṃ ṭhāne natthī”ti na vattabbaṃ, gacchantānaṃ ṭhitānaṃ nisinnānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1101_13: nipannānañca paccamānānaṃ anto natthi, gacchantā ṭhite vā nisinne vā nipanne vā na
tika-vin01t1:1101_14: bādhenti. Evaṃ sattānaṃ nirantaratāya avīci. Kāyadvāre pana cha upekkhāsahagatāni
tika-vin01t1:1101_15: cittāni uppajjanti, ekaṃ dukkhasahagataṃ. Evaṃ santepi yathā jivhāgge cha madhubindūni
tika-vin01t1:1101_16: ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ tambalohabindumhi ṭhapite anudahanabalavatāya tadeva paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1101_17: itarāni abbohārikāni honti, evaṃ anudahanabalavatāya dukkhamevettha nirantaraṃ, itarāni
tika-vin01t1:1101_18: abbohārikānīti evaṃ dukkhassa nirantaratāya avīcīti vuccati. “Ayañca avīcimahānirayo
tika-vin01t1:1102_0: Jambudīpo pana āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo. Tattha ca catusahassayojanappamāṇo
tika-vin01t1:1102_1: padeso tadupabhogīsattānaṃ puññakkhayā udakena ajjhotthaṭo “samuddo”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
tika-vin01t1:1102_2: Tisahassayojanappamāṇe manussā vasanti, tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1103_0: Aparagoyānaṃ sattasahassayojanantiādīsu āyāmato ca vitthārato ca pamāṇaṃ dassitanti
tika-vin01t1:1103_1: veditabbaṃ. Tattha jambudīpo sakaṭasaṇṭhāno, channavutiyā paṭṭanakoṭisatasahassehi
tika-vin01t1:1103_3: nagarasahassehi ca samannāgato. Jambudīpe kira ādito tesaṭṭhimattāni nagarasahassāni
tika-vin01t1:1103_4: uppannāni, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ. Tāni pana sampiṇḍetvā satasahassaṃ, tato
tika-vin01t1:1103_5: paraṃ asīti sahassāni ca nava sahassāni ca honti. Doṇamukhanti ca mahānagarassa āyuppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1103_6: padhānagharaṃ vuccati. Aparagoyāno ādāsasaṇṭhāno, pubbavideho aḍḍhacandasaṇṭhāno,
tika-vin01t1:1104_0: Api cettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo. Tattha kira
tika-vin01t1:1104_1: tesu tesu padesesu ghananicitapattasañchannasākhāpasākhā kūṭāgārupamā manoramā rukkhā
tika-vin01t1:1104_2: tesaṃ manussānaṃ nivesanakiccaṃ sādhenti. Yattha sukhaṃ nivasanti, aññepi tattha
tika-vin01t1:1104_3: rukkhā sujātā sabbadāpi pupphitaggā tiṭṭhanti. Jalāsayāpi vikasitapadumapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādipupphasañchannā
tika-vin01t1:1105_0: Sarīrampi tesaṃ atidīghatādidosarahitaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ jarāya anabhibhūtattā
tika-vin01t1:1105_2: tiṭṭhati. Anuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvitāya na ca tesaṃ kasivaṇijjādivasena āhārapariyeṭṭhivasena
tika-vin01t1:1105_3: dukkhaṃ atthi, tato eva na dāsadāsīkammakarādipariggaho atthi. Na ca tattha sītuṇhaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapavāḷādiparissayo
tika-vin01t1:1105_4: atthi. Yathā nāmettha gimhānaṃ pacchime māse paccūsavelāyaṃ samasītuṇho utu hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1105_5: evameva sabbakālaṃ tattha samasītuṇhova utu hoti, na ca nesaṃ koci upaghāto vihesā vā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1106_0: Akaṭṭhapākimameva sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ suddhaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulaphalaṃ niddhūmaṅgārena
tika-vin01t1:1106_1: agginā pacitvā paribhuñjanti. Tattha kira jotikapāsāṇā nāma honti, atha te tayo pāsāṇe
tika-vin01t1:1106_2: ṭhapetvā tattha ukkhaliṃ āropenti, pāsāṇehi tejo samuṭṭhahitvā taṃ pāceti, añño sūpo
tika-vin01t1:1106_3: vā byañjano vā na hoti, bhuñjantānaṃ cittānukūloyevassa raso hoti. Taṃ pana bhuñjantānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1106_4: nesaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍo kilāso soso kāso apamāro jaroti evamādiko na koci rogo uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1106_5: Te taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattānaṃ dentiyeva, macchariyacittaṃ nāma neva hoti, buddhapaccekabuddhādayopi
tika-vin01t1:1106_6: mahiddhikā tattha gantvā piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhanti. Na ca te khujjā vā vāmanā vā kāṇā vā
tika-vin01t1:1106_7: kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkhahatā vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā vā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1107_0: Itthiyopi tattha nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷikā nāccodātā sobhaggappattarūpā
tika-vin01t1:1107_1: honti. Tathā hi dīghaṅgulī tambanakhā alambathanā tanumajjhā puṇṇacandamukhī visālakkhī
tika-vin01t1:1107_2: mudugattā sahibhorū odātadantā gambhīranābhī tanujaṅghā dīghanīlavellitakesī puthulasussoṇī
tika-vin01t1:1107_3: nātilomā nālomā subhagā utusukhasamphassā saṇhā sakhilasambhāsā nānābharaṇavibhūsitā
tika-vin01t1:1108_0: Purisāpi pañcavīsativassuddesikā viya, na puttā mātādīsu rajjanti, ayaṃ tattha dhammatā.
tika-vin01t1:1108_1: Sattāhikameva ca tattha itthipurisā kāmaratiyā viharanti, tato vītarāgā viya yathāsukhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1108_2: gacchanti, na tattha idha viya gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ vā dukkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1108_3: vijāyanamūlakaṃ vā dukkhaṃ hoti, rattakañcukato kañcanapaṭimā viya dārakā mātukucchito
tika-vin01t1:1108_4: amakkhitā eva semhādinā sukheneva nikkhamanti, ayaṃ tattha dhammatā. Mātā pana puttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1108_5: vā dhītaraṃ vā vijāyitvā tesaṃ vicaraṇakappadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā yathāruci gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1108_6: Tesaṃ tattha sayitānaṃ ye passanti purisā vā itthiyo vā, te attano aṅguliyo upanāmenti,
tika-vin01t1:1108_7: tesaṃ kammabalena tato khīraṃ pavattati, tena te dārakā yāpenti. Evaṃ pana vaḍḍhantā
tika-vin01t1:1108_8: katipayadivaseyeva laddhabalā hutvā dārikā itthiyo upagacchanti, dārakā purise.
tika-vin01t1:1109_0: Kapparukkhato eva ca tesaṃ tattha vatthābharaṇāni nipphajjanti. Nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittāni
tika-vin01t1:1109_1: hi vatthāni sukhumāni mudusukhasamphassāni tattha tattha kapparukkhesu olambantāni
tika-vin01t1:1109_5: tūriyabhaṇḍānipi tato olambanti. Tattha ca bahū phalarukkhā kumbhamattāni phalāni
tika-vin01t1:1109_6: phalanti, madhurarasāni yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāhampi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti.
tika-vin01t1:1110_0: Najjopi tattha suvisuddhajalā supatitthā ramaṇīyā akaddamā vālukatalā nātisītā nātiuṇhā
tika-vin01t1:1110_1: surabhigandhīhi jalajapupphehi sañchannā sabbakālaṃ surabhī vāyantiyo sandanti, na
tika-vin01t1:1110_2: tattha kaṇṭakinā kakkhaḷagacchalatā honti, akaṇṭakā pupphaphalasacchannā eva honti,
tika-vin01t1:1110_3: candananāgarukkhā sayameva rasaṃ paggharanti. Nahāyitukāmā ca nadītitthe ekajjhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1110_4: vatthābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otaritvā nahāyitvā uttiṇṇā uttiṇṇā upariṭṭhimaṃ upariṭṭhimaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1110_5: vatthābharaṇaṃ gaṇhanti, na tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “idaṃ mama, idaṃ parassā”ti. Tato eva
tika-vin01t1:1110_6: na tesaṃ koci viggaho vā vivādo vā, sattāhikā eva ca nesaṃ kāmaratikīḷā hoti, tato
tika-vin01t1:1110_7: vītarāgā viya vicaranti. Yattha ca rukkhe sayitukāmā honti, tattheva sayanaṃ upalabbhati.
tika-vin01t1:1111_0: Mate ca satte na rodanti na socanti, tañca maṇḍayitvā nikkhipanti. Tāvadeva ca tathārūpā
tika-vin01t1:1111_1: sakuṇā upagantvā mataṃ dīpantaraṃ nenti, tasmā susānaṃ vā asuciṭṭhānaṃ vā tattha
tika-vin01t1:1111_2: natthi, na ca tato matā nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā upapajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1111_3: “Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te devaloke nibbattantī”ti vadanti. Vassasahassameva
tika-vin01t1:1111_4: ca nesaṃ sabbakālaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, sabbametaṃ nesaṃ pañcasīlaṃ viya dhammatāsiddhamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1112_0: Tadantaresūti tesaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu. Lokantarikanirayāti lokānaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1112_1: antaro vivaro lokantaro, tattha bhavā lokantarikā, nirayā. Tiṇṇañhi sakaṭacakkānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1112_2: pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṃ antarasadisesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1112_3: antaresu ekeko lokantarikanirayo. So pana parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo hoti
tika-vin01t1:1112_4: niccavivaṭo heṭṭhā upari ca kenaci na pihito. Yathā hi heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā
tika-vin01t1:1112_5: pathavī natthīti asaṃvutā lokantarikanirayā, evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu viya devavimānānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1112_6: abhāvato asaṃvutā apihitā cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇasamatthena ca andhakārena samannāgatā.
tika-vin01t1:1112_7: Tattha kira cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati ālokassa abhāvato. Tīsu dīpesu ekappahārena
tika-vin01t1:1112_8: ālokakaraṇasamatthāpi candimasūriyā tattha ālokaṃ na dassenti. Te hi yugandharasamappamāṇe
tika-vin01t1:1112_9: ākāsappadese vicaraṇato cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena vicaranti, cakkavāḷapabbatañca
tika-vin01t1:1112_10: atikkamma lokantarikanirayā, tasmā te tattha ālokaṃ na dassentīti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1112_11: nuppajjati. Yadā pana sabbaññubodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇādīsu obhāso uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1112_12: tadā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. “Aññepi kira bho santi sattā idhūpapannā”ti taṃ divasaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1112_13: aññamaññaṃ passanti. Ayaṃ pana obhāso ekaṃ yāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati, accharāsaṅghāṭamattameva
tika-vin01t1:1112_14: vijjobhāso viya niccharitvā “kiṃ ida”nti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1113_0: Kiṃ pana kammaṃ katvā tattha sattā nibbattantīti? Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ garukaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1113_1: dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca upari aparādhaṃ aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādiṃ sāhasikakammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1113_2: katvā uppajjanti tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya. Tesaṃ attabhāvo tigāvutiko
tika-vin01t1:1113_3: hoti, vaggulīnaṃ viya dīghanakhā honti. Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapāde
tika-vin01t1:1113_4: lagganti, yadā saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsagatā honti, atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti
tika-vin01t1:1113_5: maññamānā khādanatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ upakkamantā viparivattitvā lokasandhārake udake patanti,
tika-vin01t1:1113_6: vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti, patitamattāva accantakhāre
tika-vin01t1:1113_7: udake piṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ viya vilīyanti atisītalabhāvato ātapasantāpābhāvena. Atisītalabhāvameva
tika-vin01t1:1113_8: hi sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā. Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhahanaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1113_9: pathavīsandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati. Tathā hi sati
tika-vin01t1:1113_10: pathavīpi vilīyeyya, tesaṃ vā pāpakammabalena petānaṃ pakatiudakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti
tika-vin01t1:1113_11: viya tassa udakassa tadā khārabhāvappatti hotīti vuttaṃ “accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ viya vilīyantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1114_0: Anantānīti aparimāṇāni, “ettakānī”ti aññehi minituṃ asakkuṇeyyāni. Tāni ca bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1114_1: anantena buddhañāṇena avedi “ananto ākāso, ananto sattanikāyo, anantāni cakkavāḷānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1114_2: Tividhampi hi anantaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchindati sayampi anantattā. Yāvatakañhi ñeyyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1114_3: tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakameva ñeyyaṃ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1114_4: ñeyyanti. Tena vuttaṃ “anantena buddhañāṇena avedī”tiādi. Anantatā cassa anantañeyyappaṭivijjhaneneva
tika-vin01t1:1114_5: veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigamento āha “evamassa
tika-vin01t1:1115_0: Api cettha vivaṭṭādīnampi viditatā vattabbā, tasmā vivaṭṭādayopi ādito pabhuti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1115_1: veditabbā – saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti kappassa cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni.
tika-vin01t1:1115_2: Tattha saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vinassanaṃ saṃvaṭṭo, vinassamāno asaṅkhyeyyakappo. So pana atthato
tika-vin01t1:1115_3: kāloyeva, tadā pavattamānasaṅkhāravasenassa vināso veditabbo. Saṃvaṭṭato uddhaṃ tathāṭhāyīkālo
tika-vin01t1:1115_4: saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Vivaṭṭanaṃ nibbattanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ vā vivaṭṭo, vaḍḍhamāno asaṅkhyeyyakappo.
tika-vin01t1:1115_5: Sopi atthato kāloyeva, tadā pavattamānasaṅkhāravasenassa vaḍḍhi veditabbā. Vivaṭṭato
tika-vin01t1:1115_6: uddhaṃ tathāṭhāyīkālo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā tejosaṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo
tika-vin01t1:1115_7: vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā ābhassarā subhakiṇhā vehapphalāti. Yadā kappo
tika-vin01t1:1115_8: tejena saṃvaṭṭati, tadā ābhassarato heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. Yadā āpena saṃvaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t1:1115_9: tadā subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati. Yadā vāyunā saṃvaṭṭati, tadā vehapphalato
tika-vin01t1:1116_0: Vitthārato pana tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesu ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati. Buddhakkhettaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1116_1: nāma tividhaṃ hoti jātikkhettaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ visayakkhettañca. Tattha jātikkhettaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1116_2: dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti, yaṃ tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇādīsu kampati.
tika-vin01t1:1116_3: Yattake hi ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇādiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito saraseneva
tika-vin01t1:1116_4: paṭivijambhati, taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakkhettaṃ nāmāti buddhakkhettanti
tika-vin01t1:1116_5: vuccati. Āṇākkhettaṃ pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ, yattha ratanasuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1116_6: khandhaparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1116_7: ānubhāvo vattati. Iddhimā hi cetovasippatto āṇākkhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci
tika-vin01t1:1116_8: cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā attano atthāya parittaṃ katvā tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto
tika-vin01t1:1116_9: eva hoti. Ekacakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākkhette sabbasattānampi
tika-vin01t1:1116_10: abhisambhuṇāteva parittānubhāvo tattha devatāhi parittānaṃ sampaṭicchitabbato, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:1116_11: taṃ āṇākkhettanti vuccati. Visayakkhettaṃ pana anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ. Anantāparimāṇesu
tika-vin01t1:1116_12: hi cakkavāḷesu yaṃ yaṃ tathāgato ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ jānāti ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitāya
tika-vin01t1:1116_13: buddhañāṇassa. Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati, tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1116_14: pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti. Vinassantampi ekatova vinassati,
tika-vin01t1:1116_15: saṇṭhahantampi ekatova saṇṭhahati, tassevaṃ vināso saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1117_0: Yasmiṃ samaye kappo agginā nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe
tika-vin01t1:1117_1: ekaṃ mahāvassaṃ vassati, manussā tuṭṭhā sabbabījāni nīharitvā vapanti, sassesu pana
tika-vin01t1:1117_2: gokhāyitamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumpi na vassati, tadā pacchinnapacchinnameva
tika-vin01t1:1117_3: hoti vassaṃ. Idaṃ sandhāya hi bhagavatā “hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ bahūni vassāni
tika-vin01t1:1117_4: bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassatī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1117_5: vuttaṃ. Vassūpajīvinopi sattā kālaṃ katvā parittābhādibrahmaloke nibbattanti, pupphaphalūpajīviniyo
tika-vin01t1:1117_6: ca devatā. Evaṃ dīghe addhāne vītivatte tattha tattha udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1117_7: athānupubbena macchakacchapāpi kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattanti nerayikasattāpi.
tika-vin01t1:1118_0: Jhānaṃ pana vinā natthi brahmaloke nibbatti, etesañca keci dubbhikkhapīḷitā, keci
tika-vin01t1:1118_1: abhabbā jhānādhigamāya, te kathaṃ tattha nibbattantīti? Devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1118_2: Tadā hi “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma
tika-vin01t1:1118_3: kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudammukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā
tika-vin01t1:1118_4: ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā mārisā
tika-vin01t1:1118_5: ito vassasatasahassassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati, ayaṃ loko vinassissati,
tika-vin01t1:1118_6: mahāsamuddopi ussussissati, ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā ḍayhissanti
tika-vin01t1:1118_7: vinassissanti, yāva brahmalokā lokavināso bhavissati, mettaṃ mārisā bhāvetha, karuṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1118_8: muditaṃ, upekkhaṃ mārisā bhāvetha, mātaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, pitaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, kule
tika-vin01t1:1118_9: jeṭṭhāpacāyino hothā”ti. Te pana devā lokaṃ byūhenti sampiṇḍentīti “lokabyūhā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1118_10: vuccanti. Te kira disvā manussā yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi saṃvegajātā sambhamappattāva
tika-vin01t1:1119_0: Kathaṃ panete kappavuṭṭhānaṃ jānantīti? “Dhammatāya sañcoditā”ti ācariyā. “Tādisanimittadassanenā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1119_1: eke. “Brahmadevatāhi uyyojitā”ti apare. Tesaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā
tika-vin01t1:1119_2: ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā
tika-vin01t1:1119_3: devaloke nibbattanti. Tattha dibbasudhābhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tato vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1119_4: katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti. Devānaṃ kira sukhasamphassavātaggahaṇapaacayena vāyokasiṇe
tika-vin01t1:1119_5: jhānāni sukheneva ijjhanti. Tadaññe pana āpāyikā sattā aparāpariyavedanīyena kammena
tika-vin01t1:1119_6: devaloke nibbattanti. Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahito hi saṃsāre saṃsaranto nāma satto
tika-vin01t1:1119_7: natthi. Tepi tattha tatheva jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti. Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena
tika-vin01t1:1119_8: sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti. Idañca yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1120_0: Keci pana “apāyasattā saṃvaṭṭamānalokadhātūhi aññesu lokadhātūsupi nibbattanti. Na
tika-vin01t1:1120_1: hi sabbe apāyasattā tadā rūpārūpabhavesu uppajjantīti sakkā viññātuṃ apāyesu dīghāyukānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1120_2: devalokūpapattiyā asambhavato. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko pana vinassamānepi kappe nirayato
tika-vin01t1:1120_3: na muccatiyeva, tasmā so tattha anibbattitvā piṭṭhicakkavāḷe nibbattati. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-vin01t1:1120_4: hi samannāgatassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. Tāya hi samannāgatassa neva saggo
tika-vin01t1:1120_5: atthi, na maggo, tasmā so saṃvaṭṭamānacakkavāḷato aññattha niraye nibbattitvā paccati.
tika-vin01t1:1120_6: Kiṃ pana piṭṭhicakkavāḷaṃ na jhāyatīti? Jhāyati. Tasmiṃ jhāyamānepi esa ākāse ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1121_0: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1121_1: pātubhūte pana tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo, na divāparicchedo paññāyati. Eko sūriyo
tika-vin01t1:1121_2: uṭṭheti, eko atthaṃ gacchati, avicchinnasūriyasantāpova loko hoti. Yathā ca kappavuṭṭhānakālato
tika-vin01t1:1121_3: pubbe uppannasūriyavimāne sūriyadevaputto hoti, evaṃ kappavināsakasūriye natthi.
tika-vin01t1:1121_4: Kappavuṭṭhānakāle pana yathā aññe kāmāvacaradevā, evaṃ sūriyadevaputtopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā
tika-vin01t1:1121_5: brahmalokaṃ upapajjati. Sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pana pabhassaratarañceva tejavantatarañca
tika-vin01t1:1121_6: hutvā pavattati. Taṃ antaradhāyitvā aññameva uppajjatīti apare. Tattha pakatisūriye
tika-vin01t1:1121_7: vattamāne ākāse valāhakāpi dhūmasikhāpi vattanti, kappavināsakasūriye vattamāne vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1121_8: ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ nabhaṃ hoti. Ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyo sesakunnadiādīsu udakaṃ sussati.
tika-vin01t1:1122: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.
tika-vin01t1:1123_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā himavati
tika-vin01t1:1123_1: mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā sīhappapātadaho mandākinīdaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho anotattadaho
tika-vin01t1:1123_2: chaddantadaho kuṇāladahoti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti.
tika-vin01t1:1124: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1125_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1125_1: ekadhūmaṃ hoti pariyādinnasinehaṃ dhūmena. Yāya hi āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu
tika-vin01t1:1125_2: ābandhattā sampiṇḍitā hutvā tiṭṭhati, sā chaṭṭhasūriyapātubhāvena parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1126_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1126_1: ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi, yojanasatikādibhedāni sinerukūṭāni
tika-vin01t1:1126_2: palujjitvā ākāseyeva antaradhāyanti. Sā aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1126_3: Tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānamaṇivimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gaṇhāti. Etenevūpāyena
tika-vin01t1:1126_4: yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmiṃ gaṇhāti, tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare āhacca
tika-vin01t1:1126_5: tiṭṭhati. Sā yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na nibbāyati. Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā
tika-vin01t1:1126_6: pana sappitelajjhāpanaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyati. Heṭṭhāākāsena
tika-vin01t1:1127_0: Evaṃ ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite lokasannivāse lokassa saṇṭhānatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1127_1: devo vassituṃ ārabhati, āditova antaraṭṭhake himapāto viya hoti. Tato kaṇamattā taṇḍulamattā
tika-vin01t1:1127_4: pūretvā antaradhāyati. Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti
tika-vin01t1:1128_0: Kathaṃ tāvamahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ ghanaṃ karotīti ce? Vivarasampadānato vātassāti. Tañhissa
tika-vin01t1:1128_1: tahiṃ tahiṃ vivaraṃ deti. Taṃ evaṃ vātena sampiṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1128_2: anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati. Otiṇṇe otiṇṇe udake brahmalokaṭṭhāne brahmaloko, uparicatukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:1128_3: ca devalokā pātubhavanti. Cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsabhavanāni pana pathavīsambandhatāya
tika-vin01t1:1128_4: na tāva pātubhavanti. Purimapathaviṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇe pana balavavātā uppajjanti, te
tika-vin01t1:1128_5: taṃ pihitadvāre dhammakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā rumbhanti. Madhurodakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1128_6: parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, udakapiṭṭhe uppalinīpattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1128_7: viya pathavī saṇṭhāti. Sā vaṇṇasampannā ceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca nirudakapāyāsassa
tika-vin01t1:1128_8: upari paṭalaṃ viya. Ettha pana mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ vinassamāne loke pacchā vinassati,
tika-vin01t1:1129_0: Tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā
tika-vin01t1:1129_1: vā tato cavitvā opapātikā hutvā idhūpapajjanti, te honti sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā,
tika-vin01t1:1129_2: te taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakārakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
tika-vin01t1:1129_3: Atha tesaṃ sayaṃpabhā antaradhāyati, andhakāro hoti. Te andhakāraṃ disvā bhāyanti.
tika-vin01t1:1129_4: Tato tesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaññāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1129_5: pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhītānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1129_6: bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito, tasmā sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t1:1130_0: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate “yampi ālokaṃ labhimha, sopi no naṭṭho”ti
tika-vin01t1:1130_1: puna bhītā honti. Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhu vatassa, sace aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1130_2: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā
tika-vin01t1:1130_3: bhiyyoso mattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito, tasmā cando
tika-vin01t1:1131_0: Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti, tato pabhuti
tika-vin01t1:1131_1: rattindivā paññāyanti, anukkamena ca māsaḍḍhamāsautusaṃvaccharā, candimasūriyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1131_3: Te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ? Yathā
tika-vin01t1:1131_4: nāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva pubbuḷakā uṭṭhahanti, eke padesā thūpathūpā
tika-vin01t1:1131_5: honti, eke ninnaninnā, eke samasamā, evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne pabbatā honti, ninnaninnaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:1132_0: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto honti,
tika-vin01t1:1132_1: ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti. Tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti, tesaṃ atimānapaccayā
tika-vin01t1:1132_2: sāpi rasapathavī antaradhāyati, bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati. Atha nesaṃ teneva nayena
tika-vin01t1:1132_3: sopi antaradhāyati, atha padālatā pātubhavati. Teneva nayena sāpi antaradhāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1132_4: akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso sugandho taṇḍulaphalo. Tato nesaṃ bhājanāni
tika-vin01t1:1132_5: uppajjanti. Te sāliṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapenti, sayameva jālasikhā
tika-vin01t1:1132_6: uṭṭhahitvā taṃ pacati. So hoti odano sumanajātipupphasadiso, na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena
tika-vin01t1:1132_7: vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi, yaṃ yaṃ rasaṃ bhuñjitukāmā honti, taṃtaṃrasova hoti. Tesaṃ taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1132_8: oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharayataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati. Tathā hi rasapathavī
tika-vin01t1:1132_9: bhūmipappaṭako padālatāti ime tāva paribhuttā sudhāhāro viya khudaṃ vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi
tika-vin01t1:1132_10: rasameva paribyūhentā tiṭṭhanti vatthuno sukhumabhāvena, na nissandā, sukhumabhāveneva
