tika-vin01t1:1132_11: gahaṇindhanameva ca hoti. Odano pana paribhutto rasaṃ vaḍḍhentopi vatthuno oḷārikabhāveneva
tika-vin01t1:1133_0: Atha tesaṃ nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti. Purisassa purisabhāvo, itthiyā
tika-vin01t1:1133_1: itthibhāvo pātubhavati. Purimattabhāvesu hi pavattaupacārajjhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantānesu
tika-vin01t1:1133_2: kāmarāgo vikkhambhanavegena samito, na tāva bahalakāmarāgūpanissayāni itthipurisindriyāni
tika-vin01t1:1133_3: pāturahesuṃ. Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya bahalakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi, tadā tadupanissayāni
tika-vin01t1:1133_4: tāni sattānaṃ attabhāvesu sañjāyiṃsu, tadā itthī purisaṃ, puriso ca itthiṃ ativelaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1133_5: upanijjhāyati. Tesaṃ ativelaṃ upanijjhāyanapaccayā kāmapariḷāho uppajjati, tato methunaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1133_6: dhammaṃ paṭisevanti. Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā
tika-vin01t1:1133_7: tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti. Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena
tika-vin01t1:1133_8: aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti. Tato
tika-vin01t1:1133_9: pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonandhanti, lāyitaṭṭhānampi na paṭiviruhati.
tika-vin01t1:1134_0: Te sannipatitvā anutthunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā, mayañhi pubbe
tika-vin01t1:1134_1: manomayā ahumhā”ti, aggaññasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. Tato mariyādaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t1:1134_2: athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati, taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsetvā tatiyavāre
tika-vin01t1:1134_3: pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti. Te evaṃ adinnādāne kalahamusāvādadaṇḍādānesu uppannesu
tika-vin01t1:1134_4: ca sannipatitvā cintayanti “yannūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma, yo no sammā
tika-vin01t1:1134_5: khīyitabbaṃ khīyeyya, garahitabbaṃ garaheyya, pabbājetabbaṃ pabbājeyya, mayaṃ panassa
tika-vin01t1:1134_6: sālīnaṃ bhāgamanuppadassāmā”ti. Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva
tika-vin01t1:1134_7: kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca
tika-vin01t1:1134_8: dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1134_9: Te taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammanniṃsu. So tena mahājanena sammatoti mahāsammato,
tika-vin01t1:1134_10: khettānaṃ adhipatīti khattiyo, dhammena samena paresaṃ rañjetīti rājāti tīhi nāmehi
tika-vin01t1:1134_11: paññāyittha. Yañhi loke acchariyaṭṭhānaṃ, bodhisattova tattha ādipurisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1134_12: ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1135_0: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva jālopacchedo, idamekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭoti
tika-vin01t1:1135_2: idaṃ dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:1135_3: idaṃ tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭoti vuccati. Candimasūriyapātubhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho,
tika-vin01t1:1135_4: idaṃ catutthamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyaṃ catusaṭṭhiantarakappasaṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1135_6: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ tāva agginā vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1136_0: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti
tika-vin01t1:1136_1: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
tika-vin01t1:1136_2: evamidha kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti. So ādito sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassanto
tika-vin01t1:1136_3: anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānaṃ pūrento vassati. Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1136_4: pathavīpabbatādayo vilīyanti, udakaṃ samantato vātehi dhārīyati. Pathaviyā heṭṭhimantato
tika-vin01t1:1136_5: pabhuti yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ udakaṃ gaṇhāti. Tena hi khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1136_6: pathavīpabbatādayo udake pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya vilīyanteva, tasmā pathavīsandhārakaudakena
tika-vin01t1:1136_7: saddhiṃ ekūdakameva taṃ hotīti keci. Apare pana “pathavīsandhārakaudakaṃ taṃ sandhārakavāyukkhandhañca
tika-vin01t1:1136_8: anavasesato vināsetvā sabbattha sayameva eko ghanabhūto tiṭṭhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1136_9: yuttaṃ. Upari pana chapi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subhakiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati, taṃ yāva
tika-vin01t1:1136_10: aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na vūpasammati, udakānugataṃ pana sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1136_11: abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasammati, antaradhānaṃ gacchati. Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso
tika-vin01t1:1136_12: eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Kevalaṃ panidha ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1136_13: ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati. Subhakiṇhato cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1136_15: Udakupacchedato yāva sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Sampattimahāmeghato
tika-vin01t1:1136_16: yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Candimasūriyapātubhāvato yāva
tika-vin01t1:1136_17: kappavināsakamahaāmegho, idaṃ catutthamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
tika-vin01t1:1136_18: eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ udakena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1137_0: Yasmiṃ samaye kappo vātena nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti
tika-vin01t1:1137_1: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
tika-vin01t1:1137_2: evamidha kappavināsanatthaṃ vāto samuṭṭhāti. So paṭhamaṃ thūlarajaṃ uṭṭhāpeti, tato
tika-vin01t1:1137_3: saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ thūlavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāvakūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇe
tika-vin01t1:1137_4: visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti. Te pathavito nabhamuggatā na puna patanti,
tika-vin01t1:1137_5: tattheva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti. Athānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā
tika-vin01t1:1137_6: vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃ mūlaṃ katvā ākāse khipati. Yojanasatappamāṇāpi
tika-vin01t1:1137_8: pabhijjitvā vātavegukkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti. Cakkavāḷapabbatampi
tika-vin01t1:1137_9: sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati. Te aññamaññaṃ abhihantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
tika-vin01t1:1137_10: hutvā vinassanti. Etenevūpāyena bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ca ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento
tika-vin01t1:1137_11: chakāmāvacaradevaloke vināsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti. Tattha cakkavāḷā
tika-vin01t1:1137_12: cakkavāḷehi, himavantā himavantehi, sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
tika-vin01t1:1137_13: hutvā vinassanti. Pathavito yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmi vāto gaṇhāti, navapi brahmaloke
tika-vin01t1:1137_14: vināsetvā vehapphale āhacca tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ pathavīsandhārakaudakena taṃsandhārakavātena
tika-vin01t1:1137_15: ca saddhiṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayampi vinassati avaṭṭhānassa kāraṇābhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1137_16: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Idha pana
tika-vin01t1:1137_17: subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati. Vehapphalato cavitvā subhakiṇhaṭṭhānādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1137_18: sattā nibbattanti. Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakavātupacchedo,
tika-vin01t1:1137_19: idamekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Vātupacchedato yāva sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyantiādi
tika-vin01t1:1137_20: vuttanayameva. Evaṃ vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1138_0: Atha kiṃkāraṇā evaṃ loko vinassati. Yadipi hi saṅkhārānaṃ ahetuko sarasanirodho vināsakābhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1138_1: santānanirodho pana hetuvirahito natthi. Yathā taṃ sattanikāyesūti bhājanalokassapi
tika-vin01t1:1138_2: sahetukena vināsena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā kimevaṃ lokavināse kāraṇanti? Akusalamūlaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1138_3: kāraṇaṃ. Yathā hi tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ puññabalena paṭhamaṃ loko vivaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t1:1138_4: evaṃ tesaṃ pāpakammabalena saṃvaṭṭati, tasmā akusalamūlesu ussannesu evaṃ loko vinassati.
tika-vin01t1:1138_5: Yathā hi rāgadosamohānaṃ adhikabhāvena yathākkamaṃ rogantarakappo satthantarakappo
tika-vin01t1:1138_6: dubbhikkhantarakappoti ime tividhā antarakappā vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi asaṅkhyeyyakappe
tika-vin01t1:1138_7: jāyanti. Evamete yathāvuttā tayo saṃvaṭṭā rāgādīnaṃ adhikabhāveneva honti.
tika-vin01t1:1139_0: Tattha rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati, dose ussannatare udakena vinassati. Dose
tika-vin01t1:1139_1: hi ussannatare adhikatarena dosena viya tikkhatarena khārudakena vināso yuttoti.
tika-vin01t1:1139_2: Keci pana “dose ussannatare agginā, rāge udakenā”ti vadanti, tesaṃ kira ayamadhippāyo
tika-vin01t1:1139_3: – pākaṭasattusadisassa dosassa aggisadisatā, apākaṭasattusadisassa rāgassa khārudakasadisatā
tika-vin01t1:1139_4: ca yuttāti. Mohe pana ussannatare vātena vinassati. Evaṃ vinassantopi ca nirantarameva
tika-vin01t1:1139_5: satta vāre agginā nassati, aṭṭhame vāre udakena, puna satta vāre agginā, aṭṭhame
tika-vin01t1:1139_6: udakenāti evaṃ aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre vinassanto sattakkhattuṃ udakena vinassitvā puna
tika-vin01t1:1139_7: satta vāre agginā nassati. Ettāvatā tesaṭṭhi kappā atītā honti. Etthantare udakena
tika-vin01t1:1139_8: nassanavāraṃ sampattampi paṭibāhitvā laddhokāso vāto paripuṇṇacatusaṭṭhikappāyuke
tika-vin01t1:1139_9: subhakiṇhe viddhaṃsento lokaṃ vināseti. Ettha pana rāgo sattānaṃ bahulaṃ pavattatīti
tika-vin01t1:1139_10: aggivasena bahuso lokavināso veditabbo. Iti evaṃ imehi kāraṇehi vinassitvā saṇṭhahantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1139_11: saṇṭhahitvā ṭhitañca okāsalokaṃ bhagavā yāthāvato avedīti evampissa sabbathā okāsaloko
tika-vin01t1:1140_0: Yaṃ pana heṭṭhā vuttaṃ “sabbathā viditalokattā lokavidū”ti, idāni taṃ nigamento āha
tika-vin01t1:1140_1: “evaṃ sabbathā viditalokattā lokavidū”ti. Tattha sabbathāti lakkhaṇādippabhedato
tika-vin01t1:1141_0: Idāni anuttaroti padassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇento āha “attano pana guṇehī”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1141_1: attanoti nissakkatthe sāmivacanametaṃ, attatoti attho. Guṇehi attano visiṭṭhatarassāti
tika-vin01t1:1141_2: sambandho. Taraggahaṇañcettha “anuttaro”ti padassa atthaniddesatāya kataṃ, na visiṭṭhassa
tika-vin01t1:1141_3: kassaci atthitāya. Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1141_4: kuto sadiso, visiṭṭhe pana kā kathā. Kassacīti kassacipi. Abhibhavatīti sīlasampadāya
tika-vin01t1:1141_6: ukkaṃsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya na aññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā
tika-vin01t1:1141_7: ukkaṃsapāramippatto satthu sīlaguṇo, tena bhagavā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ aññadatthu abhibhuyya
tika-vin01t1:1141_8: pavattati, na sayaṃ kenaci abhibhuyyatīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ samādhiguṇādīsupi yathārahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1141_9: vattabbaṃ. Sīlādayo cete lokiyalokuttaramissakā veditabbā, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:1142_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ tena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavatīti? Tassapi ānubhāvato asadisattā.
tika-vin01t1:1142_1: Tampi hi visayato pavattito pavattiākārato ca uttaritarameva. Tañhi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1142_2: satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati, pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1142_3: saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1142_4: katvā pavattati, sammadeva ca vasībhāvassa pāpakattā bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā
tika-vin01t1:1143_0: Evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassapi abhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1143_1: dassetuṃ “sīlaguṇenapi asamo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha asamoti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa
tika-vin01t1:1143_2: sīlādiguṇena samo sadisoti asamo. Tathā asamehi samo asamasamo. Asamā vā samā etassāti
tika-vin01t1:1143_3: asamasamo. Sīlādiguṇena natthi etassa paṭimāti appaṭimo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t1:1143_4: Tattha upamāmattaṃ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo, yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭipuggaloti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1144_0: Na kho panāhaṃ bhikkhave samanupassāmītiādīsu mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1144_1: viya sabbaṃ lokaṃ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe… pajāya attano attato sīlasampannataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1144_2: sampannatarasīlaṃ kañcipi puggalaṃ na kho pana passāmi tādisassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1146_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā
tika-vin01t1:1146_1: arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati
tika-vin01t1:1146_2: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā. Agge kho pana
tika-vin01t1:1148: “Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī, tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1153: Mutto mocayataṃ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varo.
tika-vin01t1:1159_0: Purisadammasārathītiādīsu damitabbāti dammā, damituṃ araharūpā. Purisā ca te dammā
tika-vin01t1:1159_1: cāti purisadammā. Visesanassa cettha paranipātaṃ katvā niddeso, dammapurisāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1159_3: Sāretīti imassa atthaṃ dassento āha “dametī”tiādi. Tattha dametīti sameti, kāyasamādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1159_4: yojetīti attho. Taṃ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṃ yathārahaṃ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1159_5: hotīti āha “vinetīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Adantāti idaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ damataṃ anupagatā
tika-vin01t1:1159_6: purisadammāti vuttāti katvā vuttaṃ. Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1159_7: nātivattā, tepi purisadammā eva, yato te satthā dameti. Bhagavā hi visuddhasīlassa
tika-vin01t1:1159_8: paṭhamajjhānaṃ ācikkhati, paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhānantiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari
tika-vin01t1:1159_9: visesaṃ ācikkhanto ekadesena dantepi sameti. Teneva vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “api ca
tika-vin01t1:1159_10: so bhagavā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttarimaggappaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1159_11: ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyevā”ti. Atha vā sabbena sabbaṃ adantā ekadesena dantā ca
tika-vin01t1:1159_12: idha adantaggahaṇeneva saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ. Dametuṃ yuttāti damanārahā.
tika-vin01t1:1160_0: Tiracchānapurisātiādīsu uddhaṃ anuggantvā tiriyaṃ añcitā gatā vaḍḍhitāti tiracchānā,
tika-vin01t1:1160_1: devamanussādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghaṃ ahutvā tiriyaṃ dīghāti attho. Tiracchānāyeva purisā
tika-vin01t1:1160_3: upacitamānasā ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittā. Ke pana te? Jambudīpavāsino sattavisesā. Tenāha bhagavā –
tika-vin01t1:1161: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1162_0: Tathā hi buddhā bhagavanto paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā mahāsāvakā cakkavattino aññe
tika-vin01t1:1162_1: ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti. Tehi samānarūpāditāya pana saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi
tika-vin01t1:1162_2: itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussātveva paññāyiṃsūti eke. Apare pana bhaṇanti – lobhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1162_3: ca alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā. Ye hi sattā manussajātikā,
tika-vin01t1:1162_4: tesu visesato lobhādayo alobhādayo ca ussannā, te lobhādiussannatāya apāyamaggaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1162_5: alobhādiussannatāya sugatimaggaṃ nibbānagāmimaggañca pūrenti, tasmā lobhādīhi alobhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1162_6: ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ catumahādīpavāsino sattavisesā
tika-vin01t1:1162_7: manussāti vuccanti. Lokiyā pana “manuno apaccabhāvena manussā”ti vadanti. Manu nāma
tika-vin01t1:1162_8: paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto hitāhitavidhāyako sattānaṃ pituṭṭhāniyo, yo
tika-vin01t1:1162_9: sāsane mahāsammatoti vuccati, paccakkhato paramparāya ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā
tika-vin01t1:1162_10: tassa puttasadisatāya manussā mānusāti ca vuccanti. Tato eva hi te māṇavā “manujā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1162_11: ca voharīyanti, manussā ca te purisā cāti manussapurisā.
tika-vin01t1:1163_0: Amanussapurisāti ettha na manussāti amanussā. Taṃsadisatā ettha jotīyati. Tena manussattamattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1163_1: natthi, aññaṃ samānanti yakkhādayo amanussāti adhippetā. Na ye keci manussehi aññe,
tika-vin01t1:1163_2: tathā tiracchānapurisānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yakkhādayo eva ca niddiṭṭhā. Apalālo
tika-vin01t1:1163_4: nibbisā katā dosavisassa vinodanena. Tenāha “saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpitā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1163_5: Kūṭadantādayoti ādi-saddena ghoramukhaupāligahapatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sakkādayoti
tika-vin01t1:1163_6: ādi-saddena ajakalāpayakkhabakabrahmādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Etesaṃ pana damanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1163_7: tattha tattha vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti atippapañcabhāvato idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1163_8: Idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbanti idaṃ kesīsuttaṃ “vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1163_9: etasmiṃ atthe vitthāretabbaṃ yathārahaṃ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayanassa dīpanato.
tika-vin01t1:1164_0: Atthapadanti atthābhibyañjanakaṃ padaṃ, vākyanti attho. Vākyena hi atthābhibyatti,
tika-vin01t1:1164_1: na nāmādipadamattena, ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1164_2: dassito hoti. Tenāha “bhagavā hī”tiādi. Aṭṭha disāti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Tā hi aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1164_3: sambandhāpi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissanti, disā viyāti vā disā. Asajjamānāti
tika-vin01t1:1164_4: na sajjamānā vasībhāvappattiyā nissaṅgacārā. Dhāvantīti javanavuttiyogato dhāvanti.
tika-vin01t1:1164_5: Ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatīti attano kāyaṃ aparivattantoti adhippāyo, satthārā pana damitā
tika-vin01t1:1164_6: purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti. Tenāha “ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1164_7: Aṭṭha disāti ca nidassanamattametaṃ lokiyehi agatapubbaṃ nirodhasamāpattidisaṃ amatadisañca pakkhandanato.
tika-vin01t1:1165_1: tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho. Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā
tika-vin01t1:1165_2: gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko. Tattha niyuttoti samparāyiko, paralokattho. Paramo
tika-vin01t1:1165_3: uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṃ. Tehi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi. Yathārahanti
tika-vin01t1:1165_4: yathānurūpaṃ, tesu tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ arahati, tadanurūpaṃ. Anusāsatīti
tika-vin01t1:1165_5: vineti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe patiṭṭhāpeti. Saha atthena vattatīti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlena
tika-vin01t1:1165_6: vaṇijjāya desantaraṃ gacchanto janasamūho. Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo
tika-vin01t1:1165_7: so etassa atthīti satthā satthavāho niruttinayena. So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā
tika-vin01t1:1166_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1166_1: sattheti satthike jane. Kaṃ udakaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso.
tika-vin01t1:1166_2: Ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati. Corakantāranti corehi adhiṭṭhitakantāraṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1166_3: tathā vāḷakantāraṃ. Dubbhikkhakantāranti dullabhabhikkhaṃ kantāraṃ. Tāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1166_4: atikkāmeti. Uttāretītiādi upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1166_5: upanento tāreti. Nittāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānato nikkhāmento tāreti. Patāretīti pariggahetvā
tika-vin01t1:1166_6: tāreti, hatthena pariggahetvā tāreti viya tāretīti attho. Sabbampetaṃ tāraṇuttāraṇādi
tika-vin01t1:1166_7: khemaṭṭhāne ṭhapanamevāti āha “khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpetī”ti. Satteti veneyyasatte.
tika-vin01t1:1166_8: Mahāgahanatāya mahānatthatāya dunnittharatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṃ jātikantāraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1167_0: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasenāti ukkaṭṭhasattaparicchedavasena. Devamanussā eva hi ukkaṭṭhasattā,
tika-vin01t1:1167_1: na tiracchānādayo. Etanti “devamanussāna”nti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Bhabbapuggalaparicchedavasenāti
tika-vin01t1:1167_3: sāmivacanaṃ yathā “upajjhāyato ajjhetī”ti. Bhagavato santike vāti attho. Upanissayasampattinti
tika-vin01t1:1167_5: nāma rañño deviyā, tāya vā kāritattā “gaggarā”ti laddhanāmāya. Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti
tika-vin01t1:1167_6: “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi, gaṇhanto ca pasannacitto
tika-vin01t1:1167_7: parisapariyante nipajji. Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1167_8: apassanto tattha daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi. Maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena
tika-vin01t1:1167_9: pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi. Devaloke nibbattasattānaṃ ayaṃ dhammatā,
tika-vin01t1:1167_10: yā “kutohaṃ idha nibbatto, tattha kinnu kho kammamakāsi”nti āvajjanā. Tasmā attano
tika-vin01t1:1167_11: purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto”ti. Bhagavato pāde sirasā
tika-vin01t1:1168_0: Jānantova pucchīti mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātukāmo bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1168_1: “ko me vandatī”ti gāthāya pucchi. Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko, katamoti
tika-vin01t1:1168_2: attho. Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti iminā
tika-vin01t1:1168_3: edisena yasena ca parivārena ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya kantena
tika-vin01t1:1168_4: kāmanīyena sundarena. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. Sabbā obhāsayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1168_5: disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento, cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1169_0: Evaṃ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṃ pavedento “maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsi”nti
tika-vin01t1:1169_1: gāthamāha. Tattha pureti purimajātiyaṃ. Udaketi idaṃ tadā attano uppattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1169_2: Udake maṇḍūkoti tena uddhumāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Gāvo
tika-vin01t1:1169_3: caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṃ. Idha pana gocaro viyāti gocaro,
tika-vin01t1:1169_4: vāri udakaṃ gocaro etassāti vārigocaro. Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi
tika-vin01t1:1169_5: hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā
tika-vin01t1:1169_6: desentassa tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
tika-vin01t1:1169_7: Anādare cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Avadhī vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopālakadārako
tika-vin01t1:1169_8: mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1170_0: Sitaṃ katvāti “tathā parittatarenapi puññānubhāvena evaṃ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo
tika-vin01t1:1170_2: bhiyyoso mattāya taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento sitaṃ katvā. Pītisomanassavasena hi so –
tika-vin01t1:1172: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
tika-vin01t1:1173: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
tika-vin01t1:1174: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1176_0: Yaṃ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṃ, tathā kiñcīti. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1176_1: Tasmā yaṃ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Panāti vā visesatthadīpako
tika-vin01t1:1176_2: nipāto. Tena “sammāsambuddho”ti iminā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca satthu catusaccābhisambodho
tika-vin01t1:1176_3: vutto. Buddhoti pana iminā tadaññassapi ñeyyassa avabodho. Purimena vā satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:1176_4: pacchimena desanāñāṇānubhāvo. Pī-ti upari vuccamāno viseso jotīyati. Vimokkhantikañāṇavasenāti
tika-vin01t1:1176_5: ettha sabbaso paṭipakkhehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo, tassa anto, aggaphalaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1176_6: tasmiṃ laddhe laddhabbato tattha bhavaṃ vimokkhantikaṃ, ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1178_0: “Sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya
tika-vin01t1:1178_1: buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti
tika-vin01t1:1178_2: buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho,
tika-vin01t1:1178_3: ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho,
tika-vin01t1:1178_4: abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho. Buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā
tika-vin01t1:1178_5: kataṃ, na bhātarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na mittāmaccehi kataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi
tika-vin01t1:1178_6: kataṃ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ, vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1178_7: bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1179: Ayaṃ niddesapāḷinayo. Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi, tasmā dvīsu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭisambhidānayo vā”ti aniyamattho vāsaddo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1180_0: Tattha yathā loke avagantā “avagato”ti vuccati, evaṃ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho suddhakattuvasena.
tika-vin01t1:1180_1: Yathā paṇṇasosā vātā “paṇṇasusā”ti vuccanti, evaṃ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho hetukattuvasena.
tika-vin01t1:1180_2: Hetuattho cettha antonīto. Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā
tika-vin01t1:1180_3: buddhoti attho. Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammabodhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti
tika-vin01t1:1180_4: attho. Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhito sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_5: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_6: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi chahi padehi cittasaṅkocakaradhammappahānena
tika-vin01t1:1180_7: niddākkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddākkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1180_8: hoti. Tattha saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekattā saṅkhātenāti vacanassa koṭṭhāsenāti
tika-vin01t1:1180_11: rāgadosamohāvasesehi sabbakilesehi nikkileso. Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1180_12: buddhiatthatā viya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattā
tika-vin01t1:1180_13: buddhoti vuccatīti attho. Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na
tika-vin01t1:1180_14: parehi buddhattā buddho, atha kho sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā
tika-vin01t1:1180_15: buddhoti attho. Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti
tika-vin01t1:1180_16: anatthantaraṃ. Tattha yathā rattaguṇayogato ratto paṭo, evaṃ buddhaguṇayogato buddhoti
tika-vin01t1:1180_17: ñāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṃ paññattīti
tika-vin01t1:1180_18: bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1181_0: Idāni bhagavāti imassa atthaṃ dassento āha “bhagavāti idaṃ panassā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1181_2: visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuccamānavacanametaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1181_5: payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
tika-vin01t1:1182_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato “seṭṭha”nti
tika-vin01t1:1182_1: vuttaṃ. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho, tasmā yo “bhagavā”ti vacanena vacanīyo
tika-vin01t1:1182_2: attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Gāravayuttoti
tika-vin01t1:1182_3: garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato. Garukaraṇaṃ vā sātisayaṃ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti
tika-vin01t1:1182_4: attho. “Sippādisikkhāpakā garū honti, na ca gāravayuttā, ayaṃ pana tādiso na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1183_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṃ “bhagavā”ti idaṃ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato
tika-vin01t1:1183_1: vibhajitukāmo nāmaṃyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento “catubbidhañhi nāma”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1183_2: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ upādāya paññattaṃ voharitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1183_3: Tathā liṅgikaṃ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṃ. Nemittikanti nimittato āgataṃ. Adhiccasamuppannanti
tika-vin01t1:1183_4: yadicchāya pavattaṃ, yadicchāya āgataṃ yadicchakaṃ. Idāni āvatthikādīni nāmāni sarūpato
tika-vin01t1:1183_5: dassento āha “tattha vaccho dammo balibaddo”tiādi. Tattha paṭhamena ādi-saddena bālo
tika-vin01t1:1183_6: yuvā vuḍḍhoti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, dutiyena muṇḍī jaṭīti evamādiṃ, tatiyena bahussuto
tika-vin01t1:1183_7: dhammakathiko jhāyīti evamādiṃ, catutthena aghapadīpanaṃ pāvacananti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1183_8: Nemittikanti vuttamatthaṃ byatirekavasena patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “na mahāmāyāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1183_9: Vimokkhantikanti iminā pana idaṃ nāmaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1183_10: Yadi vimokkhantikaṃ, atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha “saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1183_11: paṭilābhā”ti. Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṃ nipphajjamānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi
tika-vin01t1:1183_12: buddhaguṇehi saddhiṃyeva nipphajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “vimokkhantika”nti. Sacchikā paññattīti
tika-vin01t1:1183_13: sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyāya nimittā paññatti. Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā
tika-vin01t1:1183_14: paññatti. Yaṃguṇanimittā hi sā, te satthu paccakkhabhūtā, taṃguṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā
tika-vin01t1:1183_15: eva nāma hoti, na paresaṃ vohāramattenāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1184_0: Vadantīti mahātherassa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1184_1: sandhāya. Issariyādibhedo bhago assa atthīti bhagī. Maggaphalādiariyadhammaratanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1184_2: araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddādiguṇayuttāni bhaji sevi sīlenāti
tika-vin01t1:1184_3: bhajī, bhajanasīloti attho. Bhāgīti cīvarapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānañceva
tika-vin01t1:1184_4: atthadhammavimuttirasassa ca adhisīlādīnañca bhāgīti attho. Vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti
tika-vin01t1:1184_5: vibhattavā. Akāsi bhagganti rāgādipāpadhammaṃ bhaggaṃ akāsīti bhagavāti attho. Garupi
tika-vin01t1:1184_6: loke bhagavāti vuccatīti āha “garū”ti. Yasmā garu, tasmāpi bhagavāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1184_7: Hetuattho hi iti-saddo. So ca yattha iti-saddo natthi bhagītiādīsu, tattha paccekaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1184_8: yojetabbo. Bhāgyamassa atthīti bhāgyavā. Bahūhi ñāyehīti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi
tika-vin01t1:1184_9: bhāvanākkamehi. Subhāvitattanoti sammadeva bhāvitasabhāvassa. Paccatte cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1184_10: tena subhāvitattāti vuttaṃ hoti, subhāvitasabhāvoti attho. Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana “subhāvitattano
tika-vin01t1:1184_11: subhāvitakāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Bhavānaṃ antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti bhavantago.
tika-vin01t1:1186_0: “Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṃ. Apica bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti bhagavā,
tika-vin01t1:1186_1: bhaggamohoti bhagavā, bhaggamānoti bhagavā, bhaggadiṭṭhīti bhagavā, bhaggataṇhoti
tika-vin01t1:1186_2: bhagavā, bhaggakilesoti bhagavā, bhaji vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti bhagavā,
tika-vin01t1:1186_3: bhavānaṃ antakaroti bhagavā, bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapaññoti
tika-vin01t1:1186_4: bhagavā, bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni
tika-vin01t1:1186_5: vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā. Bhāgī vā bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1186_7: attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1186_8: bhagavā. Bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti
tika-vin01t1:1186_9: bhagavā. Bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1186_10: anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā. Bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1186_11: kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā. Bhāgī vā bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1186_12: catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1186_13: indriyānaṃ pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti
tika-vin01t1:1186_14: bhagavā. Bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1186_15: paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā. Bhagavāti netaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1187_0: Ettha ca “gāravādhivacana”ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṃ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
tika-vin01t1:1187_1: yathārahaṃ pana tesaṃ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni. Tattha gāravādhivacananti
tika-vin01t1:1187_2: garūnaṃ garubhāvavācakaṃ vacanaṃ. Bhajīti bhāgaso kathesi. Tenāha “vibhaji pavibhaji
tika-vin01t1:1187_3: dhammaratana”nti. Maggaphalādi ariyadhammoyeva dhammaratanaṃ. Puna bhajīti imassa
tika-vin01t1:1187_4: sevīti attho. Bhāgīti bhāgābhidheyyavā. Puna bhāgīti ettha bhajanasīloti attho. Attharasassāti
tika-vin01t1:1187_5: atthasannissayassa rasassa. Vimuttāyatanasīse hi ṭhatvā dhammaṃ kathentassa suṇantassa
tika-vin01t1:1187_6: ca tadatthaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṃ attharaso. Dhammaṃ ārabbha dhammaraso.
tika-vin01t1:1187_7: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammaveda”nti. Vimuttirasassāti
tika-vin01t1:1187_8: vimuttibhūtassa vimuttisannissayassa vā rasassa. Saññābhāvanānanti aniccasaññādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1187_9: dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ. Channaṃ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:1187_10: vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha bhagavātisaddasiddhi niruttinayeneva veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1188_0: Yadipi “bhāgyavā”tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho “bhagī bhajī”ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito
tika-vin01t1:1188_1: eva, tathāpi padasiddhiatthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṃvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti
tika-vin01t1:1188_2: vuttaṃ “ayaṃ pana aparo nayo”ti. Vaṇṇavipariyāyoti etanti ettha itisaddo ādiattho,
tika-vin01t1:1188_3: tena vaṇṇavikāro vaṇṇalopo dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1188_4: Saddanayenāti saddalakkhaṇanayena. Pisodarādīnaṃ saddānaṃ ākatigaṇabhāvato vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1188_6: pakkhipanaṃ. Pārappattanti paramukkaṃsagataṃ pāramībhāvappattaṃ. Bhāgyanti kusalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1188_7: Tattha maggakusalaṃ lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ, itaraṃ lokiyasukhanibbattakaṃ, itarampi
tika-vin01t1:1189_0: Idāni bhagavāti imassa atthaṃ vibhajitvā dassento āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. Tattha lobhādayo
tika-vin01t1:1189_1: ekakavasena gahitā, tathā viparītamanasikāro vipallāsabhāvasāmaññena, ahirikādayo
tika-vin01t1:1189_2: dukavasena. Tattha kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho, so navavidhaāghātavatthusambhavo. “Akkocchi
tika-vin01t1:1189_3: maṃ avadhi ma”ntiādinā punappunaṃ kujjhanavasena cittapariyonandhano upanāho. Ubhayampi
tika-vin01t1:1189_4: paṭighoyeva, so pavattinānattato bhinditvā vutto. Sakiṃ uppanno kodho kodhoyeva,
tika-vin01t1:1189_5: taduttari upanāho. Vuttañcetaṃ “pubbakāle kodho, aparakāle upanāho”ti. Agāriyassa
tika-vin01t1:1189_6: anagāriyassa vā sukatakaraṇavināsano makkho. Agāriyopi hi kenaci anukampakena daliddo
tika-vin01t1:1189_7: samāno ucce ṭhāne ṭhapito aparena samayena “kiṃ tayā mayhaṃ kata”nti tassa sukatakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1189_8: vināseti. Anagāriyopi sāmaṇerakālato pabhuti ācariyena vā upajjhāyena vā catūhi paccayehi
tika-vin01t1:1189_10: aparena samayena rājarājamahāmattādīhi sakkato garukato ācariyupajjhāyesu acittīkato
tika-vin01t1:1189_11: caramāno “ayaṃ amhehi daharakāle evaṃ anuggahito saṃvaḍḍhito ca, atha ca panidāni
tika-vin01t1:1189_12: nissineho jāto”ti vuccamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ tumhehi kata”nti tesaṃ sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti,
tika-vin01t1:1189_13: tasseso pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa vināsano udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1189_14: udakaṃ nipuñchanto makkho. Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena “makkho”ti
tika-vin01t1:1189_15: vuccati. Paḷāsatīti paḷāso, parassa guṇe dassetvā attano guṇehi same karotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1189_16: So pana bahussutepi puggale ajjhottharitvā “īdisassa ca bahussutassa aniyatā gati,
tika-vin01t1:1189_17: tava vā mama vā ko viseso”ti, rattaññū cirapabbajite puggale ajjhottharitvā “tvampi
tika-vin01t1:1189_18: imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito, ahampi pabbajito, tvampi sīlamatte ṭhito, ahampī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1189_19: nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāho. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo hi paḷāso.
tika-vin01t1:1190_0: Paresaṃ sakkārādīni khīyamānā usūyamānā issā. Attano sampattiyā nigūhanaṃ parehi
tika-vin01t1:1190_1: sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahamānaṃ macchariyaṃ. Vañcanikacariyabhūtā māyā, sā sakadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā.
tika-vin01t1:1190_2: Tathā hi sā attano vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanato cakkhumohanamāyā viyāti “māyā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1190_3: Attano avijjamānaguṇappakāsanalakkhaṇaṃ kerāṭikabhāvena uppajjamānaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ. Asantaguṇadīpanañhi
tika-vin01t1:1190_4: “kerāṭiya”nti vuccati. Kerāṭiko hi puggalo āyanamaccho viya hoti. Āyanamaccho nāma
tika-vin01t1:1190_5: sappamukhamacchavālā ekā macchajāti. So kira macchānaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ dasseti, sappānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1190_6: sīsaṃ “tumhākaṃ sadiso aha”nti jānāpetuṃ, evameva kerāṭiko puggalo yaṃ yaṃ suttantikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1190_7: vā ābhidhammikaṃ vā upasaṅkamati, taṃ taṃ evaṃ vadati “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ antevāsī, tumhe
tika-vin01t1:1190_8: mayhaṃ anukampakā, nāhaṃ tumhe muñcāmī”ti. Evamete “sagāravo ayaṃ amhesu sappatisso”ti
tika-vin01t1:1191_1: paggahitasiraanivātavuttikāyassa ca kārako thambho. Taduttarikaraṇo sārambho. So
tika-vin01t1:1191_2: duvidhena labbhati akusalavasena ceva kusalavasena ca. Tattha agāriyassa parena kataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1191_3: alaṅkārādiṃ disvā taddiguṇataddiguṇakaraṇena uppajjamāno, anagāriyassa ca yattakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1191_4: yattakaṃ paro pariyāpuṇāti vā katheti vā, mānavasena taddiguṇataddiguṇakaraṇena uppajjamāno
tika-vin01t1:1191_5: akusalo. Tena hi samannāgato puggalo taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇaṃ karoti. Agāriyo samāno
tika-vin01t1:1191_6: ekenekasmiṃ gharavatthusmiṃ sajjite aparo dve vatthūni sajjeti, aparo cattāro, aparo
tika-vin01t1:1191_7: aṭṭha, aparo soḷasa. Anagāriyo samāno ekenekasmiṃ nikāye gahite “nāhaṃ etassa heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1191_8: bhavissāmī”ti aparo dve gaṇhāti, aparo tayo, aparo cattāro, aparo pañca. Sārambhavasena
tika-vin01t1:1191_9: hi gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati. Akusalapakkho hesa nirayagāmimaggo. Agāriyassa pana paraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1191_10: ekaṃ salākabhattaṃ dentaṃ disvā attano dve vā tīṇi vā dātukāmatāya uppajjamāno, anagāriyassa
tika-vin01t1:1191_11: ca parena ekanikāye gahite mānaṃ anissāya kevalaṃ taṃ disvā attano ālasiyaṃ abhibhuyya
tika-vin01t1:1191_12: dve nikāye gahetukāmatāya uppajjamāno kusalo. Kusalapakkhavasena hi ekasmiṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1191_13: salākabhattaṃ dente dve, dve dente cattāri dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunāpi parena ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1191_14: nikāye gahite “dve nikāye gahetvā sajjhāyantassa me phāsu hotī”ti vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhatvā
tika-vin01t1:1191_15: taduttari gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, idha pana akusalapakkhiyo taduttarikaraṇo “sārambho”ti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1192_0: Jātiādīni nissāya seyyassa “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā unnativasena paggaṇhanavasena pavatto
tika-vin01t1:1192_1: māno. Abbhunnativasena pavatto atimāno. Pubbe kenaci attānaṃ sadisaṃ katvā pacchā
tika-vin01t1:1192_2: tato adhikato dahato uppajjamānako atimānoti veditabbo. Jātiādiṃ paṭicca majjanākāro
tika-vin01t1:1192_3: mado, sopi atthato māno eva. So pana jātimado gottamado ārogyamado yobbanamado jīvitamado
tika-vin01t1:1192_4: lābhamado sakkāramado garukāramado purekkhāramado parivāramado bhogamado vaṇṇamado
tika-vin01t1:1192_5: sutamado paṭibhānamado rattaññumado piṇḍapātikamado anavaññattimado iriyāpathamado
tika-vin01t1:1192_6: iddhimado yasamado sīlamado jhānamado sippamado ārohamado pariṇāhamado saṇṭhānamado
tika-vin01t1:1193_0: Tattha jātiṃ nissāya uppanno majjanākārappavatto māno jātimado, so khattiyādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1193_1: catunnampi vaṇṇānaṃ uppajjati. Jātisampanno hi khattiyo “mādiso añño natthi, avasesā
tika-vin01t1:1193_2: antarā uṭṭhāya khattiyā jātā, ahaṃ pana vaṃsāgatakhattiyo”ti mānaṃ karoti. Brāhmaṇādīsupi
tika-vin01t1:1193_3: eseva nayo. Gottaṃ nissāya uppanno majjanākārappavatto māno gottamado, sopi khattiyādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1193_4: catunnampi vaṇṇānaṃ uppajjati. Khattiyopi hi “ahaṃ koṇḍaññagotto, ahaṃ ādiccagotto”ti
tika-vin01t1:1193_5: mānaṃ karoti. Brāhmaṇopi “ahaṃ kassapagotto, ahaṃ bhāradvājagotto”ti mānaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t1:1193_6: Vessopi suddopi attano attano kulagottaṃ nissāya mānaṃ karoti. Ārogyamadādīsupi “ahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1193_7: arogo, sesā rogabahulā, kaṇḍuvanamattampi mayhaṃ byādhi nāma natthī”ti majjanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1193_8: uppanno māno ārogyamado nāma. “Ahaṃ taruṇo, avasesasattānaṃ attabhāvo papāte ṭhitarukkhasadiso,
tika-vin01t1:1193_9: ahaṃ pana paṭhamavaye ṭhito”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno yobbanamado. “Ahaṃ ciraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1193_10: jīviṃ, ciraṃ jīvāmi, ciraṃ jīvissāmi, sukhaṃ jīviṃ, sukhaṃ jīvāmi, sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1193_11: majjanavasena uppanno māno jīvitamado nāma. “Ahaṃ lābhī, avasesā sattā appalābhā,
tika-vin01t1:1193_12: mayhaṃ pana lābhassa pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno lābhamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_0: “Avasesā sattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā labhanti, ahaṃ pana sukataṃ paṇītaṃ cīvarādipaccayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1194_1: labhāmī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sakkāramado nāma. “Avasesabhikkhūnaṃ pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1194_2: akkamitvā gacchantā manussā ‘ayaṃ samaṇo’tipi na vandanti, maṃ pana disvā vandanti,
tika-vin01t1:1194_3: pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaṃ katvā aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca durāsadaṃ katvā maññantī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1194_4: majjanavasena uppanno māno garukāramado nāma. “Uppanno pañho mayhameva mukhena chijjati,
tika-vin01t1:1194_5: bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantāpi āgacchantāpi mameva purato katvā parivāretvā gacchantī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1194_6: majjanavasena uppanno māno purekkhāramado nāma. Agāriyassa tāva mahāparivārassa “purisasatampi
tika-vin01t1:1194_8: maṃ parivāreti, sesā appaparivārā, ahaṃ mahāparivāro ceva suciparivāro cā”ti majjanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1194_9: uppanno māno parivāramado nāma. “Avasesā sattā attano paribhogamattakampi na labhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1194_10: mayhaṃ pana nidhānagatasseva dhanassa pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno
tika-vin01t1:1194_11: bhogamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā dubbaṇṇā durūpā, ahaṃ abhirūpo pāsādiko”tipi “avasesasattā
tika-vin01t1:1194_12: nigguṇā patthaṭaakittino, mayhaṃ pana kittisaddo devamanussesu pākaṭo ‘itipi thero
tika-vin01t1:1194_13: bahussuto, itipi sīlavā, itipi dhutaguṇayutto”’ti, evaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ guṇavaṇṇañca
tika-vin01t1:1194_14: paṭicca majjanavasena uppanno māno vaṇṇamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_0: “Avasesā sattā appassutā, ahaṃ pana bahussuto”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sutamado
tika-vin01t1:1195_1: nāma. “Avasesā sattā appaṭibhānā, mayhaṃ pana paṭibhānassa pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1195_2: uppanno māno paṭibhānamado nāma. “Ahaṃ rattaññū asukaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ rājavaṃsaṃ janapadavaṃsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1195_3: gāmavaṃsaṃ rattindivaparicchedaṃ nakkhattamuhuttayogaṃ jānāmī”ti majjanavasena uppanno
tika-vin01t1:1195_4: māno rattaññumado nāma. “Avasesā bhikkhū antarā piṇḍapātikā jātā, ahaṃ pana jātipiṇḍapātiko”ti
tika-vin01t1:1195_5: majjanavasena uppanno māno piṇḍapātikamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā uññātā avaññātā,
tika-vin01t1:1195_6: ahaṃ pana anavaññāto”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno anavaññattimado nāma. “Avasesānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1195_7: sattānaṃ iriyāpatho apāsādiko, mayhaṃ pana pāsādiko”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno
tika-vin01t1:1195_8: iriyāpathamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā chinnapakkhakākasadisā, ahaṃ pana mahiddhiko
tika-vin01t1:1195_9: mahānubhāvo”ti vā “ahaṃ yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ karomi, taṃ taṃ ijjhatī”ti vā majjanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1196_0: Yasamado pana agārikenapi anagārikenapi dīpetabbo. Agārikopi hi ekacco aṭṭhārasasu
tika-vin01t1:1196_1: seṇīsu ekissā jeṭṭhako hoti, tassa “avasese purise ahaṃ paṭṭhapemi, ahaṃ vicāremī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1196_2: anagārikopi ekacco katthaci jeṭṭhako hoti, tassa “avasesā bhikkhū mayhaṃ ovāde vattanti,
tika-vin01t1:1196_3: ahaṃ jeṭṭhako”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno yasamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā dussīlā,
tika-vin01t1:1196_4: ahaṃ pana sīlavā”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sīlamado nāma. “Avasesānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1196_5: kukkuṭassa udakapānamattepi kāle cittekaggatā natthi, ahaṃ pana upacārappanānaṃ lābhī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1196_6: majjanavasena uppanno māno jhānamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā nissippā, ahaṃ sippavā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1196_7: majjanavasena uppanno māno sippamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā rassā, ahaṃ dīgho”ti majjanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1196_8: uppanno māno ārohamado nāma. “Avasesā sattā rassā vā honti dīghā vā, ahaṃ nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo”ti
tika-vin01t1:1196_9: majjanavasena uppanno māno pariṇāhamado nāma. “Avasesānaṃ sattānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1196_10: virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ, mayhaṃ pana manāpaṃ pāsādika”nti majjanavasena uppanno māno saṇṭhānamado
tika-vin01t1:1196_11: nāma. “Avasesānaṃ sattānaṃ sarīre bahū dosā, mayhaṃ pana sarīre kesaggamattampi vajjaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1196_12: natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno pāripūrimado nāma. Evamayaṃ sabbopi jātiādiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1196_13: nissāya majjanākāravasappavatto māno idha “mado”ti vutto. Kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo
tika-vin01t1:1196_14: pamādo, pañcasu kāmaguṇesu satiyā aniggaṇhitvā cittassa vossajjanaṃ, sativirahoti
tika-vin01t1:1197_0: Lobhādayo ca puna tividhākusalamūlanti tikavasena gahitā. Duccaritādīsupi tividha-saddo
tika-vin01t1:1197_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha kāyaduccaritādīni tividhaduccaritāni. Taṇhāsaṃkilesādayo
tika-vin01t1:1197_2: tividhasaṃkilesā. Rāgamalādayo malīnabhāvakarattā tividhamalāni. Rāgādayo hi cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1197_3: malīnaṃ karonti, malaṃ gāhāpenti, tasmā “malānī”ti vuccanti. “Rāgo visamaṃ, doso
tika-vin01t1:1197_4: visamaṃ, moho visama”nti evaṃ vuttā rāgādayo “kāyavisamaṃ vacīvisamaṃ manovisama”nti
tika-vin01t1:1197_5: evamāgatā kāyaduccaritādayo ca tividhavisamāni. Tāni pana yasmā rāgādīsu ceva kāyaduccaritādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1197_6: ca sattā pakkhalanti, pakkhalitā ca sāsanatopi sugatitopi patanti, tasmā pakkhalanapātahetubhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1197_8: saññā tividhasaññā. Tathā “kāmavitakko byāpādavitakko vihiṃsāvitakko”ti evamāgatā
tika-vin01t1:1197_9: tividhavitakkā. Taṇhāpapañco diṭṭhipapañco mānapapañcoti ime tividhapapañcā. Vaṭṭasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1198_0: Catubbidhavipariyesātiādīsu catubbidha-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha aniccādīni
tika-vin01t1:1198_1: vatthūni niccantiādinā nayena viparītato esantīti vipariyesā. “Anicce niccanti saññāvipariyeso
tika-vin01t1:1198_2: cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso, dukkhe sukhanti saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso
tika-vin01t1:1198_3: diṭṭhivipariyeso, asubhe subhanti saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso,
tika-vin01t1:1198_4: anattani attāti saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso”ti evamāgatā dvādasa
tika-vin01t1:1198_5: vipallāsā catunnaṃ aniccādivatthūnaṃ vasena “catubbidhavipariyesā”ti vuttā. Ettha
tika-vin01t1:1198_6: pana cittakiccassa dubbalaṭṭhāne diṭṭhivirahitāya akusalasaññāya sakakiccassa balavakāle
tika-vin01t1:1198_7: saññāvipallāso veditabbo, diṭṭhivirahitasseva akusalacittassa sakakiccassa balavakāle
tika-vin01t1:1198_8: cittavipallāso, diṭṭhisampayuttacitte diṭṭhivipallāso. Tasmā sabbadubbalo saññāvipallāso,
tika-vin01t1:1198_9: tato balavataro cittavipallāso, sabbabalavataro diṭṭhivipallāso. Ajātabuddhidārakassa
tika-vin01t1:1198_10: kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya saññā ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānākāramattagahaṇato. Gāmikapurisassa
tika-vin01t1:1198_11: kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya cittaṃ lakkhaṇappaṭivedhassapi sampādanato. Kammārassa mahāsaṇḍāsena
tika-vin01t1:1198_12: ayogahaṇaṃ viya diṭṭhi abhinivesaparāmasanato. Tattha cattāro diṭṭhivipallāsā, aniccānattesu
tika-vin01t1:1198_13: niccantiādivasappavattā cattāro saññācittavipallāsāti ime aṭṭha vipallāsā sotāpattimaggena
tika-vin01t1:1198_14: pahīyanti. Asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā sakadāgāmimaggena tanukā honti, anāgāmimaggena
tika-vin01t1:1198_15: pahīyanti. Dukkhe sukhanti saññācittavipallāsā arahattamaggena pahīyantīti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1199_0: “Kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo”ti evamāgatā kāmataṇhādayo cattāro āsavanti
tika-vin01t1:1199_1: cakkhuādito sandanti pavattantīti āsavā. Kiñcāpi cakkhuādito kusalādīnampi pavatti
tika-vin01t1:1199_2: atthi, kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena sandanti,
tika-vin01t1:1199_3: tasmā te eva “āsavā”ti vuccanti. Tattha hi paggharaṇakaasucimhi niruḷho āsavasaddoti.
tika-vin01t1:1199_4: Atha vā dhammato yāva gotrabhuṃ, okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savanti gacchanti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:1199_5: pavattantīti āsavā, ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho. Avadhiattho
tika-vin01t1:1199_6: hi ā-kāro. Avadhi ca mariyādābhividhibhedato duvidho. Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahikatvā
tika-vin01t1:1199_7: pavattati yathā “āpāṭaliputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”ti, abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati
tika-vin01t1:1199_8: yathā “ābhavaggaṃ bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti, abhividhiattho cāyaṃ ā-kāro idha gahito,
tika-vin01t1:1199_9: tasmā te dhamme tañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena savantīti “āsavā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1199_10: vuccanti. Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādayo āsavā viyātipi āsavā. Lokasmiñhi cirapārivāsikā
tika-vin01t1:1199_11: madirādayo “āsavā”ti vuccanti. Yadi ca cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavā, eteyeva bhavitumarahanti.
tika-vin01t1:1199_12: Vuttañhetaṃ “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1199_13: Aññesu pana yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu ca
tika-vin01t1:1199_15: ca etesaṃyeva, na aññesanti dvīsupi atthavikappesu etesuyeva āsavasaddo niruḷhoti
tika-vin01t1:1199_16: daṭṭhabbo. Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā. Na hi taṃ kiñci
tika-vin01t1:1199_17: saṃsāradukkhaṃ atthi, yaṃ āsavehi vinā uppajjeyya.
tika-vin01t1:1200_0: “Abhijjhā kāyagantho byāpādo kāyagantho sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho idaṃsaccābhiniveso
tika-vin01t1:1200_1: kāyagantho”ti evamāgatā abhijjhādayo cattāro yassa saṃvijjanti, taṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena
tika-vin01t1:1200_2: vaṭṭasmiṃ ganthenti ghaṭentīti ganthā. “Kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho”ti evamāgatā
tika-vin01t1:1200_3: cattāro kāmataṇhādayo yassa saṃvijjanti, taṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā.
tika-vin01t1:1200_4: Teyeva “kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo”ti evamāgatā vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti
tika-vin01t1:1200_5: yogā. Ariyā etāya na gacchantīti agati, sā chandādivasena catubbidhā. “Cīvarahetu
tika-vin01t1:1200_6: vā bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapāta, senāsana, itibhavābhavahetu
tika-vin01t1:1200_7: vā bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti evamāgatā cattāro taṇhuppādā. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1200_8: itibhavābhavahetūti ettha itīti nidassane nipāto, yathā cīvarādihetu, evaṃ bhavābhavahetupīti
tika-vin01t1:1200_9: attho. Bhavābhavoti cettha paṇītapaṇītatarāni telamadhuphāṇitādīni adhippetāni. Kāmupādānādīni cattāri upādānāni.
tika-vin01t1:1201_0: Pañca cetokhilātiādīsu “buddhe kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya kaṅkhati, sabrahmacārīsu
tika-vin01t1:1201_1: kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto”ti evamāgatāni pañca cetokhilāni, ceto
tika-vin01t1:1201_2: khilayati thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjati etehīti cetokhilāni. Vinibandhādīsupi pañca-saddo
tika-vin01t1:1201_3: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. “Kāme avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1201_4: udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
tika-vin01t1:1201_5: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti āgatā pañca cittaṃ bandhitvā
tika-vin01t1:1201_6: muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetovinibandhā. Ete hi taṇhāppavattibhāvato kusalappavattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1201_7: avasarāppadānavasena cittaṃ bandhaṃ viya samorodhetvā gaṇhanti. Saddatthato pana
tika-vin01t1:1201_8: ceto virūpaṃ nibandhīyati saṃyamīyati etehīti cetovinibandhā. Kāmacchandādīni pañca
tika-vin01t1:1201_9: kusaladhamme nīvārenti āvarantīti nīvaraṇāni. Rūpābhinandanādayo pañcābhinandanā.
tika-vin01t1:1202_0: Cha vivādamūlātiādīsu kodho makkho issā sāṭheyyaṃ pāpicchatā sandiṭṭhiparāmāsoti
tika-vin01t1:1202_1: imāni cha vivādamūlāni. Yasmā kuddho vā kodhavasena…pe… sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī vā sandiṭṭhiparāmasitāya
tika-vin01t1:1202_2: kalahaṃ viggahaṃ vivādaṃ āpajjati, tasmā kodhādayo “cha vivādamūlānī”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1202_4: sattānusayā. Thāmagataṭṭhena appahīnaṭṭhena ca anusentīti anusayā. Micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappamicchāvācāmicchākammantamicchāājīvamicchāvāyāmamicchāsatimicchāsamādhī aṭṭha micchattā.
tika-vin01t1:1203_0: “Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo,
tika-vin01t1:1203_1: vinicchayaṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, chandarāgaṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, ajjhosānaṃ paṭicca
tika-vin01t1:1203_2: pariggaho, pariggahaṃ paṭicca macchariyaṃ, macchariyaṃ paṭicca ārakkho, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1203_4: dhammā sambhavantī”ti evamāgatā pariyesanādayo nava taṇhāmūlakā. Tattha taṇhaṃ paṭiccāti
tika-vin01t1:1203_5: taṇhaṃ nissāya. Pariyesanāti rūpādiārammaṇapariyesanā. Sā hi taṇhāya sati hoti. Lābhoti
tika-vin01t1:1203_6: rūpādiārammaṇapaṭilābho. So hi pariyesanāya sati hoti. Vinicchayoti idha vitakko
tika-vin01t1:1203_7: adhippeto. Lābhaṃ labhitvā hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ sundarāsundarañca vitakkeneva vinicchinati
tika-vin01t1:1203_8: “ettakaṃ me rūpārammaṇatthāya bhavissati, ettakaṃ saddādiārammaṇatthāya, ettakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1203_9: mayhaṃ bhavissati, ettakaṃ parassa, ettakaṃ paribhuñjissāmi, ettakaṃ nidahissāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1203_10: Tena vuttaṃ “lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo”ti. Chandarāgoti evaṃ akusalavitakkena vitakkite
tika-vin01t1:1203_11: vatthusmiṃ dubbalarāgo ca balavarāgo ca uppajjati. Chandoti hi idha dubbalarāgassādhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1203_12: Ajjhosānanti ahaṃ mamanti balavasanniṭṭhānaṃ. Pariggahoti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pariggahakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1203_13: Macchariyanti parehi sādhāraṇabhāvassa asahanatā. Tenevassa porāṇā evaṃ vacanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1203_14: vadanti “idaṃ acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu, mā aññassa acchariyaṃ hotūti pavattattā
tika-vin01t1:1203_15: macchariyanti vuccatī”ti. Ārakkhoti dvārapidahanamañjusagopanādivasena suṭṭhu rakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1203_16: Adhikarotīti adhikaraṇaṃ, kāraṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Ārakkhādhikaraṇanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1203_17: ārakkhahetūti attho. Daṇḍādānādīsu paranisedhanatthaṃ daṇḍassa ādānaṃ daṇḍādānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1203_18: Ekatodhārādino satthassa ādānaṃ satthādānaṃ. Kalahoti kāyakalahopi vācākalahopi.
tika-vin01t1:1203_19: Purimo purimo virodho viggaho. Pacchimo pacchimo vivādo. Tuvaṃ tuvanti agāravavacanaṃ, tvaṃ tvanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1204_1: dasa akusalakammapathā. Cattāro sassatavādā cattāro ekaccasassatavādā cattāro antānantikā
tika-vin01t1:1204_2: cattāro amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā soḷasa saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā
tika-vin01t1:1204_3: aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta ucchedavādā pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
tika-vin01t1:1204_4: etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni. Rūpataṇhādichataṇhāyeva paccekaṃ kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhāvasena
tika-vin01t1:1204_5: aṭṭhārasa honti. Tathā hi rūpārammaṇā taṇhā, rūpe vā taṇhāti rūpataṇhā, sā kāmarāgabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1204_6: rūpaṃ assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā, sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1204_7: dhuvaṃ sassata”nti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1204_8: “rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavatī”ti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti
tika-vin01t1:1204_9: evaṃ tividhā hoti. Yathā ca rūpataṇhā, evaṃ saddataṇhādayopīti etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni
tika-vin01t1:1204_10: honti, tāni ajjhattarūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bahiddhārūpādīsu aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa, iti
tika-vin01t1:1204_11: atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni,
tika-vin01t1:1204_12: aṭṭhuttarasatataṇhāvicaritānīti attho. Pabheda-saddo paccekaṃ sambandhitabbo. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1204_14: sabbāni sattānaṃ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni. Ārammaṇādivibhāgato
tika-vin01t1:1205_0: Saṅkhepato vātiādīsu sampati āyatiñca sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:1205_1: kilesāva māroti kilesamāro. Vadhakaṭṭhena khandhāva māroti khandhamāro. Tathā hi
tika-vin01t1:1205_2: vuttaṃ “vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ, vadhakaṃ rūpanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādi. Jātijarādimahābyasananibbattanena
tika-vin01t1:1205_3: abhisaṅkhārova māro abhisaṅkhāramāro. Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova
tika-vin01t1:1205_4: māroti devaputtamāro. Sattānaṃ jīvitassa jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā
tika-vin01t1:1205_5: maccu eva māroti maccumāro. Tattha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena
tika-vin01t1:1205_8: abhañji, bhagge akāsīti attho. Parissayānanti upaddavānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1206_0: Satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassāti aneka sata puñña nibbattamahā purisalakkhaṇadharassa.
tika-vin01t1:1206_1: Ettha hi “kevalaṃ satamattena puññakammena ekekalakkhaṇaṃ nibbatta”nti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1206_2: na rocayiṃsu aṭṭhakathācariyā “evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyā”ti, anantāsu pana
tika-vin01t1:1206_3: lokadhātūsu yattakā sattā, tehi sabbehi paccekaṃ satakkhattuṃ katāni dānādīni puññakammāni
tika-vin01t1:1206_4: yattakāni, tato ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ mahāsattena sataguṇaṃ kataṃ satanti adhippetanti
tika-vin01t1:1206_5: imamatthaṃ rocayiṃsu. Tasmā idha sata-saddo bahubhāvapariyāyo, na saṅkhyāvisesavacanoti
tika-vin01t1:1206_6: daṭṭhabbo “satagghaṃ sataṃ devamanussā”tiādīsu viya. Rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti
tika-vin01t1:1206_7: itarāsaṃ phalasampadānaṃ mūlabhāvato adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca. Dīpitā hotīti idaṃ dhammakāyasampattītiādīsupi
tika-vin01t1:1206_8: yojetabbaṃ. Tattha pahānasampadāpubbakattā ñāṇasampadādīnaṃ dhammakāyasampatti dīpitā
tika-vin01t1:1206_9: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Lokiyasarikkhakānaṃ bahumatabhāvoti ettha bhāgyavantatāya lokiyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1206_10: bahumatabhāvo, bhaggadosatāya sarikkhakānaṃ bahumatabhāvoti yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ ito
tika-vin01t1:1207_0: Puññavantaṃ gahaṭṭhā khattiyādayo abhigacchanti, pahīnadosaṃ dosavinayāya dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1207_2: abhigamanīyatā”ti. Abhigatānañca tesaṃ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo āmisadānadhammadānehi
tika-vin01t1:1207_3: upakārasabbhāvato rūpakāyaṃ tassa pasādacakkhunā, dhammakāyaṃ paññācakkhunā disvā
tika-vin01t1:1207_4: dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanatoti veditabbo. Bhāgyavantatāya upagatānaṃ āmisadānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1207_5: deti, bhaggadosatāya dhammadānaṃ detīti āha “āmisadānadhammadānehi upakāritā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1207_6: Lokiyalokuttarasukhehi ca saṃyojanasamatthatā dīpitā hotīti “pubbe āmisadānadhammadānehi
tika-vin01t1:1207_7: mayā ayaṃ lokaggabhāvo adhigato, tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1207_8: sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanena abhigatānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṃyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1208_0: Sakacitte issariyaṃ nāma attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanaṃyeva, paṭikūlādīsu appaṭikūlasaññitādivihārasiddhi,
tika-vin01t1:1208_2: ijjhanato. Aṇimālaghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti
tika-vin01t1:1208_3: ime chapi saṅgahitā. Tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṃ aṇimā. Ākāse padasā gamanādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1208_4: arahabhāvena lahubhāvo laghimā. Mahattaṃ mahimā kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṃ. Iṭṭhadesassa
tika-vin01t1:1208_5: pāpuṇanaṃ patti. Adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitanipphādanaṃ pākammaṃ. Sayaṃvasitā issarabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1208_6: īsitā. Iddhividhe vasībhāvo vasitā. Ākāsena vā gacchato aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha
tika-vin01t1:1208_8: aṭṭhavidhaṃ lokiyasammataṃ issariyaṃ. Taṃ pana bhagavato iddhividhantogadhaṃ anaññasādhāraṇañcāti
tika-vin01t1:1208_9: āha “sabbakāraparipūraṃ atthī”ti. Tathā lokuttaro dhammo atthīti sambandho. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1209_0: Kesañci yaso padesavutti ayathābhūtaguṇasannissayattā aparisuddho ca hoti, na evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1209_1: tathāgatassāti dassetuṃ “lokattayabyāpako”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1209_2: āruppe uppannānaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā bhagavato yaso pākaṭo hotīti āha “lokattayabyāpako”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1209_3: Yathābhuccaguṇādhigatoti yathābhūtaguṇehi adhigato. Ativiya parisuddhoti yathābhūtaguṇādhigatattā
tika-vin01t1:1209_5: sabbākārehi paripuṇṇā. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasirīti sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sobhā. Yaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1209_6: yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitanti “tiṇṇo tāreyya”ntiādinā yaṃ yaṃ etena lokanāthena
tika-vin01t1:1209_7: manovacīpaṇidhānavasena icchitaṃ kāyapaṇidhānavasena patthitaṃ. Tathevāti paṇidhānānurūpameva.
tika-vin01t1:1209_8: Sammāvāyāmasaṅkhāto payattoti vīriyapāramibhāvappatto ariyamaggapariyāpanno ca sammāvāyāmasaṅkhāto ussāho.
tika-vin01t1:1210_1: ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho
tika-vin01t1:1210_2: saṅgahādayo samayavimuttādayo ṭhapanādayo tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1210_4: sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ. Saṅkhataṭṭho samecca saṅgamma sambhūya paccayehi
tika-vin01t1:1210_5: katabhāvo. Santāpaṭṭho dukkhadukkhatādīhi santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ. Vipariṇāmaṭṭho
tika-vin01t1:1210_6: jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho dukkhassa
tika-vin01t1:1210_7: nibbattanavasena sampiṇḍanaṃ. Nidānaṭṭho “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti nidassentassa viya
tika-vin01t1:1210_8: samuṭṭhāpanaṃ. Saṃyogaṭṭho saṃsāradukkhena saṃyojanaṃ. Palibodhaṭṭho maggādhigamassa
tika-vin01t1:1210_9: nivāraṇaṃ. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā,
tika-vin01t1:1210_10: taṃnissaraṇanimittatā vā. Vivekaṭṭho sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyuttatā. Asaṅkhataṭṭho kenacipi
tika-vin01t1:1210_11: paccayena anabhisaṅkhatatā. Amataṭṭho niccasabhāvattā maraṇābhāvo, sattānaṃ maraṇābhāvahetutā
tika-vin01t1:1210_12: vā. Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho vaṭṭadukkhato nikkamanaṭṭho. Hetuattho nibbānassa sampāpakabhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1210_13: Dassanaṭṭho accantasukhumassa nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṃ. Ādhipateyyaṭṭho catusaccadassane
tika-vin01t1:1210_14: sampayuttānaṃ ādhipaccakaraṇaṃ, ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo vā visesato maggādhipativacanato.
tika-vin01t1:1210_15: Satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṃ avatvā
tika-vin01t1:1210_16: “maggādhipatino dhammā”icceva vuttaṃ, tasmā viññāyati “atthi maggassa ārammaṇādhipatibhāve
tika-vin01t1:1210_17: viseso”ti. Eteyeva ca pīḷanādayo soḷasākārāti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1211_1: Mettādijjhānāni brahmavihāro. Phalasamāpatti ariyavihāro. Kāmehi vivekaṭṭhakāyatāvasena
tika-vin01t1:1211_2: ekībhāvo kāyaviveko. Paṭhamajjhānādinā nīvaraṇādīhi vivittacittatā cittaviveko. Upadhiviveko
tika-vin01t1:1211_3: nibbānaṃ. Upadhīti cettha cattāro upadhī kāmupadhi khandhupadhi kilesupadhi abhisaṅkhārupadhīti.
tika-vin01t1:1211_4: Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti
tika-vin01t1:1211_5: evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena
tika-vin01t1:1211_6: “upadhī”ti vuccanti, khandhāpi khandhamūlakassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, kilesāpi
tika-vin01t1:1211_8: vuttanayena “upadhī”ti vuccanti. Imehi pana catūhi upadhīhi vivittatāya nibbānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1212_0: Suññatākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo suññatavimokkho. So hi
tika-vin01t1:1212_1: suññatāya dhātuyā uppannattā suññato, kilesehi ca vimuttattā vimokkho. Eteneva nayena
tika-vin01t1:1212_2: appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto appaṇihitavimokkho. Animittākārena
tika-vin01t1:1212_3: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto animittavimokkho. Atha vā suññatānupassanāsaṅkhātāya
tika-vin01t1:1212_5: vuccati. Tathā appaṇihitānupassanāsaṅkhātāya dukkhānupassanāya vasena paṭiladdho
tika-vin01t1:1213_1: manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati, anattato manasikaronto
tika-vin01t1:1215_0: Kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena bhavesu paribbhamanaṃ, tañca taṇhāpadhānanti āha “taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1215_1: gamana”nti. Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāgamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1215_2: Bhagavāti vuccati niruttinayenāti dassento āha “yathā loke”tiādi. Yathā loke niruttinayena
tika-vin01t1:1215_3: ekekapadato ekekamakkharaṃ gahetvā “mekhalā”ti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpīti attho. Mehanassāti
tika-vin01t1:1216: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā. Bhatavāti bhagavā. Bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Bhage vanīti bhagavā. Bhattavāti bhagavā. Bhage vamīti bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1217: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-vin01t1:1218: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
tika-vin01t1:1219_0: Tattha kathaṃ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, te anaññasādhāraṇā
tika-vin01t1:1219_1: niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti
tika-vin01t1:1219_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī ottappaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ, sati sampajaññaṃ, sīlavisuddhi
tika-vin01t1:1219_3: diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni, tayo sammāvitakkā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_4: tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_5: cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_6: catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni, pañca padhāniyaṅgāni,
tika-vin01t1:1219_7: pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, pañca
tika-vin01t1:1219_8: nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā saññā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_9: cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā, cha
tika-vin01t1:1219_10: anuttariyāni, chanibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta
tika-vin01t1:1219_11: aparihānīyā dhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgāni, satta sappurisadhammā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_12: satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā, sattakhīṇāsavabaladesanā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_13: aṭṭhapaññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā, aṭṭha sammattāni, aṭṭhalokadhammātikkamo, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni,
tika-vin01t1:1219_14: aṭṭhaakkhaṇadesanā, aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭhaabhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_15: nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā, nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, navasattāvāsadesanā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_16: nava āghātappaṭivinayā, nava saññā, nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakaraṇā
tika-vin01t1:1219_17: dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_18: dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṃsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā,
tika-vin01t1:1219_19: terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, soḷasavidhā
tika-vin01t1:1219_20: ānāpānassati, soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni,
tika-vin01t1:1219_21: catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaṇṇāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattati
tika-vin01t1:1219_23: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo
tika-vin01t1:1219_24: anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti
tika-vin01t1:1219_25: upalabbhanti, tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ākārassa
tika-vin01t1:1219_26: rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto. Evaṃ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1222_0: Kathaṃ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
tika-vin01t1:1222_1: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā
tika-vin01t1:1222_3: pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
tika-vin01t1:1222_4: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāgoti
tika-vin01t1:1222_5: pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ, ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā,
tika-vin01t1:1222_6: buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo saṅkhepato vā puññasambhārañāṇasambhārā buddhakarā dhammā,
tika-vin01t1:1222_7: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni yathā
tika-vin01t1:1222_8: hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva
tika-vin01t1:1222_9: honti, evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti
tika-vin01t1:1222_10: bhagavā niruttinayena ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte
tika-vin01t1:1222_11: buddhakare dhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1224: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
tika-vin01t1:1225_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
tika-vin01t1:1225_1: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ vani
tika-vin01t1:1225_2: bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu kusalādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1225_3: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
tika-vin01t1:1225_4: vitthārato pana “cakkhu pariññeyyaṃ, sotaṃ pariññeyyaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1225_5: aneke pariññeyyabhāgā, “cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1225_6: nayena pahātabbabhāgā, “cakkhussa nirodho…pe… jarāmaraṇassa nirodho sacchikātabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1225_8: ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā vuttā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1225_9: vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā
tika-vin01t1:1225_10: sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, kinti nu kho te vineyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyyanti
tika-vin01t1:1225_11: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1227: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
tika-vin01t1:1228_0: Kathaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā? Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1228_1: bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo. Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito
tika-vin01t1:1228_2: pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato
tika-vin01t1:1228_3: buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi. Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite
tika-vin01t1:1228_4: anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi. Vittārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampattidevarajjasampattiādivasena
tika-vin01t1:1228_6: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. Evaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1229: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthu;
tika-vin01t1:1230: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
tika-vin01t1:1231_0: Kathaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. Tathāgato
tika-vin01t1:1231_3: payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāsīti
tika-vin01t1:1231_5: “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena ca
tika-vin01t1:1231_8: ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti
tika-vin01t1:1231_9: evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
tika-vin01t1:1231_11: Ye cassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti, kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1231_12: sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti. Tathā hi te
tika-vin01t1:1231_13: attano jīvitapaaccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti tassa vā āṇaṃ daḷhabhattibhāvato. Tenevāha –
tika-vin01t1:1234_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t1:1234_1: yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
tika-vin01t1:1235: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1237: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1238_0: Kathaṃ bhage vamīti bhagavā? Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo
tika-vin01t1:1238_1: pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri, kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho
tika-vin01t1:1238_2: chaḍḍayi. Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle
tika-vin01t1:1238_4: rajjasiriyā pariccattattabhāvānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi, carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ
tika-vin01t1:1238_6: yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-vin01t1:1238_7: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1238_9: sobhā kappaṭṭhāyibhāvato, tepi bhagavā vami taṃnivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena
tika-vin01t1:1241_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vamīti bhagavā? Bhāgā nāma sabhāgadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena,
tika-vin01t1:1241_1: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena atītādivasena ca anekavidhā, te ca bhagavā sabbaṃ papañcaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1241_2: sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amatadhātuṃ samadhigacchanto
tika-vin01t1:1241_3: vami uggiri, anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāgami. Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ
tika-vin01t1:1241_4: āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ, cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ, rūpe sadde gandhe rase
tika-vin01t1:1241_5: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ, cakkhusamphassaṃ…pe… manosamphassaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1241_6: cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ saññaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1241_7: manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1241_8: rūpataṇhaṃ…pe… dhammataṇhaṃ, rūpavitakkaṃ…pe… dhammavitakkaṃ, rūpavicāraṃ…pe… dhammavicārantiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1241_9: anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri, anapekkhapariccāgena
tika-vin01t1:1241_10: chaḍḍayi. Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃ taṃ, ānanda, cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1241_11: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāgamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Evampi bhāge vamīti
tika-vin01t1:1241_12: bhagavā. Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge
tika-vin01t1:1241_13: dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri, anapekkho pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya
tika-vin01t1:1241_14: dhammaṃ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā pageva adhammā.
tika-vin01t1:1241_15: Kullūpamaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1243: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
tika-vin01t1:1245: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-vin01t1:1246: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1247_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
tika-vin01t1:1247_2: tadavinābhāvena tadantogadhattā. Parahitapaṭipatti payogāsayabhedato duvidhā. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1247_5: atthacariyā parahitapaapatti hotiyeva, tasmā tesampi vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṃ “araha”ntiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1248_0: Tattha arahanti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā,
tika-vin01t1:1248_1: sammāsambuddho lokavidūti ca imehi padehi ñāṇasampadāvasena. Nanu ca “lokavidū”ti
tika-vin01t1:1248_2: imināpi sammāsambuddhatā vibhāvīyatīti? Saccaṃ vibhāvīyati, atthi pana viseso “sammāsambuddho”ti
tika-vin01t1:1248_3: iminā sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvo vibhāvito, “lokavidū”ti pana iminā āsayānusayañāṇādīnampi
tika-vin01t1:1248_4: ānubhāvo vibhāvitoti. Vijjācaraṇasampannoti iminā sabbāpi bhagavato attahitasampatti
tika-vin01t1:1248_5: vibhāvitā. Sugatoti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti
tika-vin01t1:1248_6: ca vibhāvitā. Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānanti imehi padehi bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:1248_7: parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā. Buddhoti iminā bhagavato attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti
tika-vin01t1:1248_8: ca vibhāvitā. Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1248_9: hoti. Tenevāha “attanāpi bujjhi, aññepi satte bodhesī”tiādi. Bhagavāti ca imināpi
tika-vin01t1:1248_10: samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1249_0: Aparo nayo – hetuphalasattupakāravasena saṅkhepato tividhā buddhaguṇā. Tattha arahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1249_1: sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidūti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā
tika-vin01t1:1249_2: vibhāvitā. Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānanti imehi sattupakāravasena
tika-vin01t1:1249_3: buddhaguṇā pakāsitā. Buddhoti iminā phalavasena sattupakāravasena ca buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1249_4: Sugato bhagavāti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattupakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1250_0: So imaṃ lokantiādīsu so bhagavāti yo “araha”ntiādinā kittitaguṇo, so bhagavā. Imaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1250_1: lokanti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1250_2: dassetuṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha “idāni vattabbaṃ nidassetī”ti. Pajātattāti
tika-vin01t1:1250_4: pārisesañāyenāti veditabbaṃ itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. Sadevakanti ca avayavena
tika-vin01t1:1250_5: viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. Samārakavacanena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ paccāsattiñāyenāti
tika-vin01t1:1250_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha hi so jāto taṃnivāsī ca. Sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇanti
tika-vin01t1:1250_7: etthāpi eseva nayo. Paccatthikā…pe… samaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇanti nidassanamattametaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1250_9: gahitattā. Kāmaṃ “sadevaka”ntiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati
tika-vin01t1:1250_10: tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso
tika-vin01t1:1250_14: rājāno. Avasesamanussaggahaṇanti samaṇabrāhmaṇehi avasesamanussaggahaṇaṃ. Tīhi padehīti
tika-vin01t1:1250_15: sadevakasamārakasabarhmakavacanehi. Dvīhīti sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ sadevamanussanti imehi dvīhi padehi.
tika-vin01t1:1251_0: Arūpī sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā dibbantīti devāti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti
tika-vin01t1:1251_2: devānaṃ sahabyata”ntiādi. Chakāmāvacaradevalokassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato
tika-vin01t1:1251_5: imāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu khattiyādicatuparisavasena. Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakaggahaṇena gahitā evāti.
tika-vin01t1:1252_0: Kathaṃ panettha catuparisavasena manussaloko gahito? “Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇi”nti iminā
tika-vin01t1:1252_1: samaṇaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā ca gahitā honti, “sadevamanussa”nti iminā khattiyaparisā
tika-vin01t1:1252_2: gahapatiparisā ca gahitā, “paja”nti iminā pana imāyeva catasso parisā vuttā, catuparisasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1252_3: pajanti vuttaṃ hoti, kathaṃ pana sammutidevehi saha manussaloko gahito? Etthāpi “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇi”nti
tika-vin01t1:1252_4: iminā samaṇabrāhmaṇā gahitā, “sadevamanussa”nti iminā sammutidevasaṅkhātā khattiyā,
tika-vin01t1:1252_5: gahapatisuddasaṅkhātā avasesamanussā ca gahitā honti. Ito pana aññesaṃ manussasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1252_6: abhāvato “paja”nti iminā catūhi pakārehi ṭhitā eteyeva manussasattā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1252_7: Evaṃ vikappadvayepi pajāggahaṇena catuparisādivasena ṭhitānaṃ manussānaṃyeva gahitattā
tika-vin01t1:1252_8: idāni “paja”nti iminā avasesasatte saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha “avasesasabbasattaloko
tika-vin01t1:1252_9: vā”ti. Tattha nāgagaruḷādivasena avasesasattaloko veditabbo. Etthāpi catuparisavasena
tika-vin01t1:1252_10: sammutidevehi vā saha avasesasabbasattaloko vāti yojetabbaṃ. Catuparisasahito avasesasuddhanāgasupaṇṇanerayikādisattaloko,
tika-vin01t1:1252_11: catudhā ṭhitamanussasahito vā avasesanāgasupaṇṇanerayikādisattaloko gahitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1253_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgaso
tika-vin01t1:1253_1: lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ukkaṭṭhaparicchedatoti
tika-vin01t1:1253_2: ukkaṃsagativijānanena. Pañcasu hi gatīsu devagatipariyāpannāva seṭṭhā, tatthāpi arūpino
tika-vin01t1:1253_4: evamādīhi visesehi ativiya ukkaṭṭhā. Brahmā mahānubhāvoti dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno
tika-vin01t1:1253_5: vasena vadati. “Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato”ti hi vuttaṃ. Anuttaranti seṭṭhaṃ navalokuttaraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1253_6: Anusandhikkamoti atthānañceva padānañca anusandhānukkamo. Porāṇā panettha evaṃ vaṇṇayanti
tika-vin01t1:1253_7: – sadevakanti devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesaṃ lokaṃ. Samārakanti mārena saddhiṃ avasesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1253_8: lokaṃ. Sabrahmakanti brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesaṃ lokaṃ. Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte
tika-vin01t1:1253_9: devamārabrahmasahitatāsaṅkhātehi tīhi pakārehi “sadevaka”ntiādīsu tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā
tika-vin01t1:1253_10: puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussa”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1253_11: Evaṃ pañcahipi padehi sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
tika-vin01t1:1254_0: Abhiññāti yakāralopenāyaṃ niddeso, abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha “abhiññāya
tika-vin01t1:1254_2: ekappamāṇattā. Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-vin01t1:1254_3: Anuttaraṃ vivekasukhanti phalasamāpattisukhaṃ. Tena vīthimissāpi kadāci bhagavato
