tika-vin01t1:1254_4: dhammadesanā hotīti hitvāpīti pisaddaggahaṇaṃ. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1254_5: khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti, yathāsutaṃ vā dhammaṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ khaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1254_6: pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, yathāparicchedañca samāpattito
tika-vin01t1:1254_7: vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti. Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desentoti ugghaṭitaññussa
tika-vin01t1:1254_8: vasena appaṃ vā, vipañcitaññussa neyyassa vā vasena bahuṃ vā desento. Ādikalyāṇādippakārameva
tika-vin01t1:1254_9: desetīti ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti. Majjhepi pariyosānepi
tika-vin01t1:1254_10: kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammassa hi kalyāṇatā
tika-vin01t1:1255_0: Samantabhaddakattāti sabbabhāgehi sundarattā. Dhammassāti pariyattidhammassa. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t1:1255_1: avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi, yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena
tika-vin01t1:1255_2: apekkhitesu gāthāti samaññā, taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāraṃ āropetvā
tika-vin01t1:1255_4: yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena
tika-vin01t1:1255_6: nidānaganthena. Nigamenāti “idamavocā”tiādikena “iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca
tika-vin01t1:1255_7: vutta”nti vā yathāvuttatthanigamanena. Saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitānipi hi nidānanigamanāni
tika-vin01t1:1255_8: dassetvā tīṇi piṭakāni satthu desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhāneva. Teneva dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1255_9: “ekānusandhikassa suttassa nidānaṃ ādi, idamavocāti pariyosānaṃ, ubhinnamantarā majjha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1256: Evaṃ suttantapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇāditaṃ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sakalopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāsanadhammoti –
tika-vin01t1:1259_0: Evaṃ vuttassa satthusāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo. Sīlamūlakattā sāsanassa “sīlena
tika-vin01t1:1259_1: ādikalyāṇo”ti vuttaṃ. Samathādīnaṃ sāsanasampattiyā vemajjhabhāvato āha “samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi
tika-vin01t1:1259_2: majjhekalyāṇo”ti. Nibbānādhigamato uttari karaṇīyābhāvato vuttaṃ “nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1259_3: Sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṃ samādhi ca mūlanti āha “sīlasamādhīhi
tika-vin01t1:1259_4: vā ādikalyāṇo”ti. Paññā pana anubodhapaavedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto
tika-vin01t1:1259_6: tato paraṃ kattabbaṃ natthīti dassento āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1259_7: Phalaggahaṇena vā saupādisesaṃ nibbānamāha, itarena itaraṃ tadubhayañca sāsanasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1260_0: Buddhasubodhitāya vā ādikalyāṇoti buddhassa subodhitā sammāsambuddhatā, tāya ādikalyāṇo
tika-vin01t1:1260_1: tappabhavattā. Sabbaso saṃkilesappahānaṃ vodānapāripūrī ca dhammasudhammatā, tāya
tika-vin01t1:1260_2: majjhekalyāṇo taṃsarīrattā. Satthārā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ tathā paṭipatti saṅghasuppaṭipatti,
tika-vin01t1:1260_3: tāya pariyosānakalyāṇo tāya sāsanassa loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. Tanti sāsanadhammaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1260_4: Tathattāyāti yathattāya bhagavatā dhammo desito, tathattāya tathabhāvāya. So pana
tika-vin01t1:1260_5: abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho ito aññathā nibbānādhigamassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1260_6: Tattha sabbaguṇehi aggabhāvato itarabodhidvayamūlatāya ca paṭhamāya bodhiyā ādikalyāṇatā,
tika-vin01t1:1260_7: guṇehi vemajjhabhāvato dutiyāya majjhekalyāṇatā, tadubhayatāya vā vosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa
tika-vin01t1:1261: Esoti sāsanadhammo. Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhanasabbhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1262: “Yathā yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti, aññataro vā garuṭṭhānīyo sabrahmacārī, tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammaveda”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1263: “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṃ samaye pahīnāni hontī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1264_0: Ca ādi. Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa vipassanāsukhassa ca sampāpanato.
tika-vin01t1:1264_1: Vuttampi cetaṃ “so vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1267: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti ca. ;
tika-vin01t1:1268_0: Tathā paṭipannoti yathā samathavipassanāsukhaṃ āvahati, yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1268_1: tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo. Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1268_2: tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato. Nāthappabhavattāti pabhavati etasmāti
tika-vin01t1:1268_3: pabhavo, uppattiṭṭhānaṃ, nāthova pabhavo etassāti nāthappabhavo, tassa bhāvo nāthappabhavattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1268_4: tasmā sāsanadhammassa nāthahetukattāti attho. Atthasuddhiyā majjhekalyāṇoti nirupakkilesatāya
tika-vin01t1:1268_5: niyyānikatā atthasuddhi, tāya majjhekalyāṇo. Kiccasuddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇoti suppaṭipattisaṅkhātakiccassa
tika-vin01t1:1269_0: Sāsanabrahmacariyantiādīsu avisesena tisso sikkhā sakalo ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1269_1: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “katamesānaṃ kho, bhante, buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1269_2: na ciraṭṭhitikamahosī”tiādi. Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:1269_3: vuttaṃ “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīya”nti. Yathānurūpanti yathārahaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1269_4: Sikkhattayasaṅgahañhi sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, tathā maggabrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1269_5: Itaraṃ pana tantidhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ yathāvuttenatthena sātthaṃ sabyañjanañca.
tika-vin01t1:1269_6: Atthasampattiyāti sampannatthatāya. Sampattiattho hi idha sahasaddo. Byañjanasampattiyāti
tika-vin01t1:1269_7: etthāpi eseva nayo. Yassa hi yāgubhattādiitthipurisādivaṇṇanānissitā desanā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1269_8: na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya. Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1269_9: desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti, tasmā “atthasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1269_10: sātthaṃ desetī”ti vuccati. Yassa pana desanā sithiladhanitādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva
tika-vin01t1:1269_11: dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttatāya ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā damiḷabhāsā viya, vivaṭakaraṇatāya
tika-vin01t1:1269_12: oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā kirātabhāsā viya, sabbattheva
tika-vin01t1:1269_13: vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā yavanabhāsā viya, sabbattheva sānusāratāya
tika-vin01t1:1269_14: sabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā pādasikādi milakkhubhāsā viya, tassa byañjanapāripūriyā
tika-vin01t1:1269_15: abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti. Sabbāpi hi esā byañjanekadesavaseneva pavattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1271: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1272: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti, tasmā “byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ desetī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1273_0: Idāni “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti ettha nettinayenapi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsanaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1273_1: sabyañjana”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha yadipi nettiyaṃ “byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1273_2: hotīti akkharaṃ pada”ntiādinā byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhāni, idha pana pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1273_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato kāsanaṃ dīpanaṃ saṅkāsanaṃ. Kāsananti ca kāsīyati dīpīyati
tika-vin01t1:1273_5: vibhāvīyatīti attho. “Maññamāno kho bhikkhu baddho mārassa amaññamāno mutto”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1273_6: viya saṅkhepena dīpanaṃ saṅkāsanaṃ nāma. Tattakena hi tena bhikkhunā paṭividdhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1273_7: Tenāha “aññātaṃ bhagavā”tiādi. Paṭhamaṃ kāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ. “Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, āditta”nti
tika-vin01t1:1273_8: evamādīsu pacchā kathitabbamatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ vacanena dīpanaṃ pakāsanaṃ nāma. Ādikammasmiñhi
tika-vin01t1:1273_9: ayaṃ pa-saddo “paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”tiādīsu viya. Tikkhindriyāpekkhañcetaṃ padadvayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1273_10: uddesabhāvato. Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṃ paṭipajjati. Saṃkhittassa
tika-vin01t1:1273_11: vitthāravacanaṃ sakiṃ vuttassa puna vacanañca vivaraṇavibhajanāni, yathā “kusalā
tika-vin01t1:1273_12: dhammā”ti saṅkhepato sakiṃyeva ca vuttassa atthassa “katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1273_13: samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta”ntiādinā vitthārato vivaraṇavasena vibhajanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1273_14: ca puna vacanaṃ. Majjhimindriyāpekkhametaṃ padadvayaṃ niddesabhāvato. Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1273_15: vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ vineyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni,
tika-vin01t1:1273_16: yathā “phasso hotī”tiādinā vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa “katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso
tika-vin01t1:1273_17: hoti? Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā saṃphusanā”tiādinā uttānīkiriyā paññāpanā ca.
tika-vin01t1:1274_0: Atha vā “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, āditta”nti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ dīpitamatthaṃ puna pākaṭaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:1274_1: dīpanena “kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ ādittaṃ? Cakkhu, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1274_2: evamādinā saṃkhittassa vitthārābhidhānena sakiṃ vuttassa punapi abhidhānena vitthāretvā
tika-vin01t1:1274_3: desanaṃ vivaraṇaṃ nāma. “Kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepena nikkhittassa “katame dhammā
tika-vin01t1:1274_4: kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti niddesavasena vivarite
tika-vin01t1:1274_5: kusale dhamme “tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hotī”ti vibhāgakaraṇaṃ vibhajanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1274_6: nāma. Vivaṭassa vitthārābhidhānena vibhattassa ca upamābhidhānena uttāniṃ karotīti
tika-vin01t1:1274_7: vivaraṇena vivaritatthassa “katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti? Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso
tika-vin01t1:1274_8: phusanā saṃphusanā”ti ativivaritvā kathanaṃ, vibhajanena vibhattassa “seyyathāpi,
tika-vin01t1:1274_9: bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā, evameva khvāyaṃ bhikkhave phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1274_10: evamādiupamākathanañca uttānīkaraṇaṃ nāma. Dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ dhammadesanena vicittena
tika-vin01t1:1274_11: anekavidhena somanassassa uppādanaṃ atikhiṇabuddhīnaṃ anekavidhena ñāṇatikhiṇakaraṇañca
tika-vin01t1:1274_12: paññatti nāma sotūnaṃ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṃ paññattīti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1274_14: sātthaṃ. Saṅkāsanapakāsanādayo hi atthākārattā “atthapadānī”ti vuccanti. Atthoyeva
tika-vin01t1:1274_15: hi byañjanapadehi saṅkāsīyati pakāsīyati vivarīyati vibhajīyati uttānī karīyati paññāpīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1275_1: evamādīsu sa-kāra du-kāra so-kārādi viya uccāraṇavelāya apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_2: pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato avevacanato. Na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyo vijjati. Yathā hi
tika-vin01t1:1275_3: padaṃ savevacanatāya atthavasena pariyāyaṃ carantaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti, na evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_4: vaṇṇo avevacanattā. Ekakkharaṃ vā padaṃ akkharaṃ “mā evaṃ kira ta”ntiādīsu mā-kārādayo
tika-vin01t1:1275_5: viya. Keci pana “tīsu dvāresu parisuddhapayogabhāvena visuddhakaraṇaṭṭhānānaṃ cittena
tika-vin01t1:1275_6: pavattitadesanāvācāhi akkharaṇato avevacanato akathitattā akkharanti saññitā. Taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_7: pārāyanikabrāhmaṇānaṃ manasā pucchitapañhānaṃ vasena bhagavatā ratanaghare nisīditvā
tika-vin01t1:1275_8: sammasitapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇavasena ca gahetabba”nti vadanti. Vibhattiyantaṃ atthassa
tika-vin01t1:1275_9: ñāpanato padaṃ. Pajjati attho etenāti hi padaṃ. Taṃ nāmapadaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ upasaggapadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_10: nipātapadanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha phasso vedanā cittanti evamādikaṃ dabbapadhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_11: nāmapadaṃ. Nāmapadehi dabbamāvibhūtarūpaṃ, kiriyā anāvibhūtarūpā. Phusati vedayati
tika-vin01t1:1275_12: vijānātīti evamādikaṃ kiriyāpadhānaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ. Ākhyātapadehi kiriyā āvibhūtarūpā,
tika-vin01t1:1275_13: dabbamanāvibhūtarūpaṃ. Yathā “cirappavāsi”nti ettha pa-saddo vasanakiriyāya viyogavisiṭṭhataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_14: dīpeti, evaṃ kiriyāvisesadīpanato kiriyāvisesāvabodhanimittaṃ. Pa-iti evamādikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_15: upasaggapadaṃ. Kiriyāya dabbassa ca sarūpavisesappakāsanahetubhūtaṃ evanti evamādikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_16: nipātapadaṃ. “Evaṃ manasi karotha, mā evaṃ manasākatthā”tiādīsu hi kiriyāvisesadīpanato
tika-vin01t1:1275_17: kiriyāvisesassa jotako evaṃsaddo, “evaṃsīlā evaṃdhammā”tiādīsu dabbavisesassa. Saṅkhepato
tika-vin01t1:1275_18: vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ. “Cattāro iddhipādā”ti saṅkhepena
tika-vin01t1:1275_19: kathitamatthaṃ “katame cattāro? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_20: iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriya, citta, vīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1275_21: bhāvetī”tiādinā pākaṭaṃ karotīti vākyameva byañjanaṃ, taṃ pana atthato padasamudāyoti
tika-vin01t1:1275_22: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saākhyātaṃ sanipātaṃ sakārakaṃ savisesanaṃ vākyanti hi vadanti. Nanu
tika-vin01t1:1275_23: ca padenapi attho byañjīyatīti padampi byañjananti āpajjatīti? Taṃ na. Padamattasavanepi
tika-vin01t1:1275_24: hi adhikārādivasena labbhamānehi padantarehi anusandhānaṃ katvāva atthasampaṭipatti
tika-vin01t1:1276_0: Pakārato vākyavibhāgo ākāro. “Tattha katamo chando? Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1276_1: evamādīsu kathitasseva vākyassa anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṃ ākāro nāma. Ākārābhihitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1276_2: nibbacanaṃ nirutti. “Phasso vedanā”ti evamādīsu ākārena kathitaṃ “phusatīti phasso,
tika-vin01t1:1276_3: vedayatīti vedanā”ti nīharitvā vitthāravacanaṃ nirutti nāma. “Nibbānaṃ maggati, nibbānatthikehi
tika-vin01t1:1276_4: vā maggīyati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo”tiādinā nibbacanavitthāro niravasesadesanattā
tika-vin01t1:1276_5: niddeso. Atha vā vedayatīti vedanāti nibbacanaladdhapadesu sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhāsu
tika-vin01t1:1276_6: sukhayatīti sukhā, dukkhayatīti dukkhā, neva dukkhayati na sukhayatīti adukkhamasukhāti
tika-vin01t1:1276_7: atthavitthāro niravasesena kathitattā niddeso nāma. Etesaṃ akkharādīnaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1277_0: Evaṃ panassa atthapadasamāyogo byañjanapadasampatti ca veditabbā. Tattha bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1277_1: akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi
tika-vin01t1:1277_2: uttāniṃ karoti, niddesehi paññapeti. Tathā hi padāvayavaggahaṇamukhena padaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1277_3: gahitena ca padena padatthāvabodho gahitapubbasaṅketassa hotīti bhagavā akkharehi
tika-vin01t1:1277_4: saṅkāseti. Yasmā pana akkharehi saṃkhittena dīpiyamāno attho padapariyosāne vākyassa
tika-vin01t1:1277_5: apariyositattā padena paṭhamaṃ pakāsito dīpito hoti, tasmā padehi pakāseti. Vākyapariyosāne
tika-vin01t1:1277_6: pana so attho vivarito vivaṭo kato hotīti byañjanehi vivarati. Yasmā ca pakārehi
tika-vin01t1:1277_7: vākyabhede kate tadattho vibhatto nāma hoti, tasmā ākārehi vibhajati. Tathā vākyāvayavānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1277_8: paccekaṃ nibbacanavibhāge kate so attho pākaṭo hotīti niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti. Katanibbacanehi
tika-vin01t1:1277_9: pana vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1277_10: buddhinisānañca kataṃ hotīti niddesehi paññapeti. Apica bhagavā akkharehi ugghaṭetvā
tika-vin01t1:1277_11: padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ, byañjanehi vipañcetvā ākārehi vineti vipañcitaññuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1277_12: niruttīhi netvā niddesehi vineti neyyaṃ. Evañcāyaṃ dhammo ugghaṭiyamāno ugghaṭitaññuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1277_13: vineti, vipañciyamāno vipañcitaññuṃ, nīyamāno neyyaṃ. Tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā
tika-vin01t1:1277_14: majjhe, nayanaṃ ante. Evaṃ tīsu kālesu tidhā desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho
tika-vin01t1:1278_0: “Tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi
tika-vin01t1:1278_1: vibhajati, niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti, niddesehi paññapeti. Tattha bhagavā akkharehi
tika-vin01t1:1278_2: ca padehi ca ugghaṭeti, byañjanehi ca ākārehi ca vipañceti, niruttīhi ca niddesehi
tika-vin01t1:1278_3: ca vitthāreti. Tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā majjhe, vitthāranā pariyosānaṃ. Soyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1278_4: dhammavinayo ugghaṭiyanto ugghaṭitaññuṃ puggalaṃ vineti, tena naṃ āhu ādikalyāṇoti.
tika-vin01t1:1278_5: Vipañciyanto vipañcitaññuṃ puggalaṃ vineti, tena naṃ āhu majjhekalyāṇoti. Vitthāriyanto
tika-vin01t1:1278_6: neyyaṃ puggalaṃ vineti, tena naṃ āhu pariyosānakalyāṇotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1279_0: Atthagambhīratātiādīsu attho nāma tantiattho. Dhammo tanti. Paṭivedho tantiyā tantiatthassa
tika-vin01t1:1279_1: ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Desanā nāma manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. Te panete
tika-vin01t1:1279_2: atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1279_3: ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Atha vā attho nāma hetuphalaṃ. Dhammo hetu. Desanā paññatti,
tika-vin01t1:1279_5: Paṭivedho abhisamayo, atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1279_6: paññattīsu avabodho. Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo lakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1279_7: Tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo
tika-vin01t1:1279_8: dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Tesu paṭivedhassapi atthasannissitattā
tika-vin01t1:1279_11: sabyañjana”nti tāsaṃ byañjanasampattidīpanato. Atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā,
tika-vin01t1:1279_14: atthasampattiyā asati tadabhāvato. Dhammoti tanti. Niruttīti tantipadānaṃ niddhāretvā
tika-vin01t1:1279_15: vacanaṃ. Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha “dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato
tika-vin01t1:1280_0: Parikkhakajanappasādakantīti ettha iti-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā parikkhakajanānaṃ kiṃkusalagavesīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1280_1: pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā sātthaṃ. Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ nadīpūrena viya
tika-vin01t1:1280_2: upari vuṭṭhipavattiyā. Sātthakatā panassa paṇḍitavedanīyatāya, sā paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1280_4: yasmā lokiyajanassa pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā sabyañjanaṃ. Lokiyajano hi byañjanasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1280_5: tussati. Idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Sabyañjanatā panassa saddheyyatāya, sā ādikalyāṇādibhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1280_6: veditabbā. Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sātthanti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1280_7: āha, tato parikkhakajanappasādakaṃ saddheyyato sabyañjananti saddhāpadaṭṭhānatāya
tika-vin01t1:1280_8: byañjanasampannataṃ, tato lokiyajanappasādatanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Gambhīrādhippāyato
tika-vin01t1:1280_9: sātthanti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṃ aññathā tadabhāvato. Uttānapadato
tika-vin01t1:1280_10: sabyañjananti subodhasaddakatāya byañjanasampannaṃ paramagambhīrassapi atthassa vineyyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1280_11: suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato. Sabbopesa atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjananti
tika-vin01t1:1280_12: sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttasseva atthadvayassa papañcoti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā ceva tattha tattha
tika-vin01t1:1280_13: saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Tathā hettha vikappassa samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṃ. Upanetabbassa abhāvatoti
tika-vin01t1:1280_14: pakkhipitabbassa vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato. Kevalasaddo sakalādhivacananti
tika-vin01t1:1280_15: āha “sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvenā”ti, sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇatāyāti attho. Apanetabbassāti saṃkilesadhammassa.
tika-vin01t1:1281_0: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha pana ayaṃ brahmacariya-saddo dāne veyyāvacce pañcasikkhāpadasīle
tika-vin01t1:1281_1: appamaññāsu methunaviratiyaṃ sadārasantose vīriye uposathaṅgesu ariyamagge sāsaneti
tika-vin01t1:1296: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
tika-vin01t1:1298: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1299_0: Imasmiṃ aṅkurapetavatthumhi veyyāvaccaṃ “brahmacariya”nti vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhave
tika-vin01t1:1299_1: tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1299_2: “brahmacariya”nti vuttaṃ. “Taṃ kho pana me pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya
tika-vin01t1:1299_3: na virāgāya na nirodhāya yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte
tika-vin01t1:1299_4: catasso appamaññāyo “brahmacariya”nti vuttā. “Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha
tika-vin01t1:1299_5: brahmacārī bhavissāmā”ti imasmiṃ sallekhasutte methunavirati “brahmacariya”nti vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1303: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1304_1: sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritā, tapassī sudaṃ homī”ti lomahaṃsanasutte
tika-vin01t1:1307_0: Evaṃ nimijātake attadamanavasena kato aṭṭhaṅgiko uposatho “brahmacariya”nti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1307_1: “Idaṃ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva
tika-vin01t1:1307_2: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasuttasmiṃyeva ariyamaggo “brahmacariya”nti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1307_3: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva
tika-vin01t1:1307_5: vuttaṃ. Imasmimpi ṭhāne idameva “brahmacariya”nti adhippetanti āha “sikkhattayapariggahitattā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1307_6: Seṭṭhehīti buddhādīhi seṭṭhehi. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtaṃ vā cariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1308_0: Sanidānanti heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇena nidānena sanidānaṃ. Sauppattikanti saaṭṭhuppattikaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1308_1: Veneyyānaṃ anurūpatoti veneyyānaṃ cariyādianurūpato. Atthassāti desiyamānassa sīlādiatthassa.
tika-vin01t1:1308_2: Hetudāharaṇayuttatoti “taṃ kissa hetu seyyathāpi, bhikkhave”ti ca ādinā tattha tattha
tika-vin01t1:1308_3: hetupamaggahaṇena hetudāharaṇehi yuttato. Saddhāpaṭilābhenāti “te taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā
tika-vin01t1:1308_4: tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhantī”tiādinā vuttasaddhāpaṭilābhena. Paṭipattiyāti sīlavisuddhiyādisammāpaṭipattiyā,
tika-vin01t1:1308_6: sātthaṃ kapilamatādi viya tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ ahutvā atthasampannanti katvā. Pariyattiyāti
tika-vin01t1:1308_8: viya sammohaṃ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sabyañjanaṃ. Byañjanasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1308_9: hi sati āgamabyattīti. Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttatoti sīlādīhi pañcahi dhammakoṭṭhāsehi
tika-vin01t1:1308_10: avirahitattā. Kevalaparipuṇṇanti anavasesena samantato puṇṇaṃ pūritaṃ. Nirupakkilesatoti
tika-vin01t1:1308_12: kathañcipi taṇhāsannissayassa anissayato parisuddhaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo “imaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1308_13: dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmī”ti deseti, tassa aparisuddhā
tika-vin01t1:1308_14: desanā hoti. Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo
tika-vin01t1:1308_15: ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti, tasmā tassa desanā parisuddhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1309_0: Sādhūti ayaṃ saddo “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu āyācane
tika-vin01t1:1309_1: dissati. “Sādhu bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1309_2: sampaṭicchane. “Sādhu sādhu sāriputtā”tiādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Tena hi brāhmaṇa sādhukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1312_0: Ādīsu sundare. Idhāpi sundareyeva daṭṭhabboti āha “sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho
tika-vin01t1:1312_1: panā”ti. Tattha sundaranti bhaddakaṃ. Bhaddakatā ca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvenāti
tika-vin01t1:1312_3: Sukhāvahanti yathāvuttatividhasukhāvahaṃ. Tathārūpānanti tādisānaṃ. Yādisehi pana
tika-vin01t1:1312_4: guṇehi bhagavā samannāgato, tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbakālepi accantāya pasādanīyo
tika-vin01t1:1312_6: arahatanti iminā dhammappamāṇānaṃ lūkhappamāṇānañca sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1312_7: dasseti, taṃdassanena ca itaresampi rūpappamāṇaghosappamāṇānaṃ pasādāvahatā dassitā
tika-vin01t1:1312_8: hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tadavinābhāvato. Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti kittisaddo abbhuggatoti
tika-vin01t1:1312_9: evamettha sambandhoti āha “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evamajjhāsayaṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1312_10: Tattha dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti ettha kosiyasakuṇavatthu kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1313_0: 2. Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyākāraṇaṃ, na
tika-vin01t1:1313_1: karaṇaṃ viya kiriyattho, tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti
tika-vin01t1:1313_2: “annena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, na karaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1313_3: tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”ti. Avibhāgato hi satatappavattaniratisayasāduvipulāmatarasasaddhammaphalatāyassa
tika-vin01t1:1313_5: hi mahārukkhassa sāduphalatā gahitāti. Upasaṅkamīti upasaṅkamanto. Sampattakāmatāya
tika-vin01t1:1313_6: hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamantoti vattabbataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1313_7: labhati. Tenāha “gatoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti, upagatoti attho. Upasaṅkamitvāti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti
tika-vin01t1:1313_8: āha “upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpana”nti. Tatoti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto upasaṅkamīti vutto,
tika-vin01t1:1313_9: tato upagataṭṭhānato. Āsannataraṃ ṭhānanti pañhaṃ vā pucchituṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1314_0: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te brāhmaṇa khamanīyaṃ, kacci
tika-vin01t1:1314_1: yāpanīya”ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo
tika-vin01t1:1314_2: ahosi. Pubbabhāsitāya tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo
tika-vin01t1:1314_3: ahosīti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi
tika-vin01t1:1314_4: vuttaṃ. Sammoditanti saṃsanditaṃ. Ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1314_5: Khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1314_6: dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyyanti pucchati. Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1314_7: cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1314_8: kacci appābādhaṃ. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena kacci appātaṅkaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya
tika-vin01t1:1314_9: kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Tadanurūpabalayogato kacci balaṃ. Sukhavihārasambhavena kacci
tika-vin01t1:1314_10: phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kaccisaddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Balappattā
tika-vin01t1:1314_11: pīti pītiyeva. Taruṇapīti pāmojjaṃ. Sammodaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanikaṃ, tadeva
tika-vin01t1:1314_12: sammodanīyanti āha “sammodajananato”ti. Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti idaṃ pana atthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1314_14: “Saraṇīya”nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sāraṇīya”nti vuttaṃ. Suyyamānasukhatoti āpāthamadhuratamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1314_16: tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyamāha. Atthaparisuddhatāyāti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1315_0: Atidūraaccāsannapaṭikkhepena nātidūranāccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ, taṃ pana avakaṃsato
tika-vin01t1:1315_1: ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthāsaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gīvaṃ pasāretvāti gīvaṃ parivattanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1315_2: pasāretvā. Meti kattuatthe sāmivacananti āha “mayā suta”nti. Jātibrāhmaṇeti jātiyā
tika-vin01t1:1315_3: brāhmaṇe, na bāhitapāpatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ āpāditeti khaṇḍitadantapalitakesādibhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1315_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Jātimahallakatāyāti uppattiyā mahallakabhāvena. Mahattaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti
tika-vin01t1:1315_6: mahallako, jātiyā mahallako, na vibhavādināti jātimahallako. Addhānanti dīghakālaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1315_7: Kittako pana soti āha “dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe”ti, dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rājūnaṃ rajjapasāsanapaṭipāṭiyoti
tika-vin01t1:1315_8: attho. “Addhagate”ti vatvā kathaṃ vayogahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhanti āha “pacchimavayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1315_9: anuppatte”ti. Pacchimo tatiyabhāgoti sattasaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo koṭṭhāso.
tika-vin01t1:1316_0: Dutiye atthavikappe jiṇṇeti nāyaṃ jiṇṇatā vayomattena, atha kho kulaparivaṭṭena purāṇatāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1316_1: āha “jiṇṇeti porāṇe”tiādi. Tena tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kulavasena uditoditabhāvamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1316_2: “Vayoanuppatte”ti iminā jātivuḍḍhiyā vakkhamānattā guṇavuḍḍhiyā tato sātisayattā
tika-vin01t1:1316_3: ca “vuḍḍheti sīlācārādiguṇavuḍḍhiyutte”ti āha. Tathā jātimahallakatāyapi teneva vakkhamānattā
tika-vin01t1:1316_4: mahallaketi padena vibhavamahattatā yojitā. Maggapaṭipanneti brāhmaṇānaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1316_5: upagate taṃ avokkamma caraṇato. Antimavayanti pacchimavayaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1317_0: Paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha “nāsanā vuṭṭhahatī”ti, nisinnāsanato na vuṭṭhātīti
tika-vin01t1:1317_1: attho. Ettha ca jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatteti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1317_2: na hoti, tasmā jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatte disvāti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1317_3: Atha vā paccuggamanakiriyāpekkhaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, tasmā na paccuṭṭhetīti uṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:1317_4: paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo. Paccuggamanampi hi paccuṭṭhānanti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1317_5: Vuttañhetaṃ “ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1317_6: nāmā”ti. Nāsanā vuṭṭhātīti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti
tika-vin01t1:1317_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vibhāvane nāma attheti pakativibhāvanasaṅkhāte atthe, na abhivādeti vāti
tika-vin01t1:1318_0: Taṃ aññāṇanti “ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī”ti ajānanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1318_1: pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ. Olokentoti “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso, kiṃ nu kho
tika-vin01t1:1318_2: ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ, garuṃ kareyya”ntiādisuttavasena ñāṇacakkhunā
tika-vin01t1:1318_3: olokento. Nipaccakārārahanti paṇipātārahaṃ. Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto, jātasamanantaramevāti
tika-vin01t1:1318_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Uttarena mukhoti uttarābhimukho, uttaradisābhimukhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sattapadavītihārena
tika-vin01t1:1318_5: gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesinti idaṃ “dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, sampatijāto
tika-vin01t1:1318_6: bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1318_7: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā disā viloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsatī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1318_8: pāḷiyaṃ sattapadavītihārūpariṭṭhitassa viya sabbadisānuvilokanassa kathitattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1318_9: na panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā. Mahāsatto
tika-vin01t1:1318_10: hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimadisaṃ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
tika-vin01t1:1318_11: ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā “mahāpurisa idha
tika-vin01t1:1318_12: tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisā
tika-vin01t1:1318_13: heṭṭhā uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1318_14: sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti veditabbo. Olokesinti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye
tika-vin01t1:1318_15: jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1319_0: Mahāpurisoti jātigottakulappadesādivasena mahantapuriso. Aggoti guṇehi sabbapadhāno.
tika-vin01t1:1319_1: Jeṭṭhoti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ vuḍḍhatamo, guṇehi mahallakatamoti vuttaṃ hoti. Seṭṭhoti
tika-vin01t1:1319_2: guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ pasatthatamo. Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti
tika-vin01t1:1319_3: veditabbaṃ. Tayāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. Uttaritaroti adhikataro. Patimānesīti
tika-vin01t1:1319_4: pūjesi. Āsabhinti uttamaṃ. Mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggaloti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya
tika-vin01t1:1319_5: araho anucchaviko puggalo. Niccasāpekkhatāya panettha samāso daṭṭhabbo. Tathāgatāti
tika-vin01t1:1319_6: tathāgatato, tathāgatassa santikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evarūpanti abhivādanādisabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1320_0: 3. Taṃ vacananti “nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādivacanaṃ. “Nāhaṃ arasarūpo, mādisā vā arasarūpā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1320_1: vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya. Tena vuttaṃ “cittamudubhāvajananattha”nti. Ayañhi
tika-vin01t1:1320_2: pariyāyasaddo desanāvārakāraṇesu vattatīti ettha pariyāyeti desetabbamatthaṃ avagameti
tika-vin01t1:1320_3: bodhetīti pariyāyo, desanā. Pariyāyati aparāparaṃ parivattetīti pariyāyo, vāro. Pariyāyati
tika-vin01t1:1320_4: attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattati, tassa vā kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:1320_5: evaṃ pariyāyasaddassa desanāvārakāraṇesu pavatti veditabbā. Aññāya saṇṭhaheyyāti
tika-vin01t1:1320_6: arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya. Katamo pana soti pariyāyāpekkho pulliṅganiddeso, katamo so
tika-vin01t1:1320_7: pariyāyoti attho. Jātivasenāti khattiyādijātivasena. Upapattivasenāti devesu upapattivasena.
tika-vin01t1:1320_8: Seṭṭhasammatānampīti api-saddena pageva aseṭṭhasammatānanti dasseti. Abhinandantānanti
tika-vin01t1:1320_9: sappītikataṇhāvasena pamodamānānaṃ. Rajjantānanti balavarāgavasena rajjantānaṃ. Rūpādiparibhogena
tika-vin01t1:1321_0: Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacananti “jahitā”ti etasmiṃ atthe. Tathāgatassāti karaṇe
tika-vin01t1:1321_1: sāmivacanaṃ, tathāgatena jahitāti attho. Mūlanti bhavamūlaṃ. “Tālavatthuvatthukatā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1321_2: vattabbe “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya majjhepadalopaṃ katvā akārañca dīghaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1321_3: vuttanti āha “tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā”ti. Tattha tālassa
tika-vin01t1:1321_4: vatthu tālavatthu. Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve “ārāmavatthū”ti
tika-vin01t1:1321_5: vuccati, evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite tālassa
tika-vin01t1:1321_6: vatthubhūtapubbattā “tālavatthū”ti vuccati. Nesanti rūparasādīnaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu
tika-vin01t1:1321_7: viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi. Rūpādiparibhogena uppannataṇhāyuttasomanassavedanāsaṅkhātarūparasādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1321_8: cittasantānassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ “tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte
tika-vin01t1:1321_9: cittasantāne kate”ti. Tattha pubbeti pure, sarāgakāleti vuttaṃ hoti. Tālāvatthukatāti
tika-vin01t1:1321_10: vuccantīti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo “tālāvatthukatā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1321_11: vuccanti. Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.
tika-vin01t1:1322_0: Aviruḷhidhammattāti aviruḷhisabhāvatāya. Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto
tika-vin01t1:1322_1: tālāvatthūti āha “matthakacchinnatālo viya katā”ti. Etena “tālāvatthu viya katāti
tika-vin01t1:1322_2: tālāvatthukatā”ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito. Ettha pana avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti
tika-vin01t1:1322_3: avatthutālākatāti vattabbe visesanassa padassa paranipātaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1322_4: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā panatthena idaṃ dasseti – rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā
tika-vin01t1:1322_5: hutvā pubbe uppannā kusalākusaladhammā gahitā, te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1322_6: maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā
tika-vin01t1:1322_7: jātā, tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti. Imasmiñhi atthe
tika-vin01t1:1323_0: Anabhāvaṃkatāti ettha anu-saddo pacchā-saddena samānatthoti āha “yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1323_1: na hotī”tiādi. Anuabhāvaṃ gatāti pacchā anuppattidhammatāvasena abhāvaṃ gatā vināsamupagatā,
tika-vin01t1:1323_2: pahīnāti attho. “Imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṃsū”ti ettha anacchariyasaddaṃ udāharaṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:1323_3: dassento āha “yathā anuacchariyā anacchariyā”ti. Tattha anuacchariyāti savanakāle
tika-vin01t1:1324_0: Yañca kho tvaṃ vadesi, so pariyāyo na hotīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1324_1: kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi, taṃ kāraṇaṃ na hoti, na vijjatīti attho. Nanu ca brāhmaṇo
tika-vin01t1:1324_2: yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti
tika-vin01t1:1324_3: āha, so pariyāyo natthīti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1325_0: 4. Sabbapariyāyesūti sabbavāresu. Sandhāya bhāsitamattanti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo
tika-vin01t1:1325_1: “nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādimāha, bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1325_2: taṃ sandhāya bhāsitamattaṃ. Chandarāgaparibhogoti chandarāgavasena paribhogo. Aparaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1326_0: 5. Kulasamudācārakammanti kulācārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ, kulacārittanti vuttaṃ hoti. Akiriyanti
tika-vin01t1:1326_1: akaraṇabhāvaṃ. Duṭṭhu caritaṃ duccaritaṃ, kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyato pavattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1326_2: duccaritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Taṃ sarūpato dassento “tattha cā”tiādimāha. Pāṇātipātaadinnādānamicchācāracetanā
tika-vin01t1:1326_3: veditabbāti ettha pāṇoti paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ, vohārato satto. Jīvitindriyañcettha
tika-vin01t1:1326_4: rūpārūpavasena veditabbaṃ. Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya
tika-vin01t1:1326_5: vinassati. Sattoti ca khandhasantāno gahetabbo. Tattha hi sattapaññatti. Saraseneva
tika-vin01t1:1326_6: patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1326_7: pātananti attho. Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇassa atipāto
tika-vin01t1:1326_8: pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthato pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino parassa
tika-vin01t1:1326_10: Yāya hi cetanāya vattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetukamahābhūtapaccayā
tika-vin01t1:1326_11: uppajjanakamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti, sā tādisappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin01t1:1326_12: Laddhupakkamāni hi bhūtāni itarabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātiyānaṃ kāraṇāni na honti.
tika-vin01t1:1327_0: Etthāha – khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hantā, ko vā haññati, yadi
tika-vin01t1:1327_1: cittacetasikasantāno, so arūpatāya na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, napi
tika-vin01t1:1327_2: vikopanīyo. Atha rūpasantāno, so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā
tika-vin01t1:1327_3: pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādi atītesu
tika-vin01t1:1327_4: vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu
tika-vin01t1:1327_5: sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato, paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya
tika-vin01t1:1327_6: vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1327_7: maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo, khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanato
tika-vin01t1:1327_8: kassa kiriyā, pariyosānakālānavaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipātakammabaddhoti?
tika-vin01t1:1328_0: Vuccate – yathāvuttavadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārānaṃ puñjo sattasaṅkhāto hantā. Tena
tika-vin01t1:1328_2: yathāvuttavadhappayogakaraṇe uppajjanāraho rūpārūpadhammasamūho haññati, kevalo vā
tika-vin01t1:1328_5: vihate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo, napi ahetuko pāṇātipāto, na ca
tika-vin01t1:1328_6: payogo nippayojano. Paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katapayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa
tika-vin01t1:1328_7: saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha
tika-vin01t1:1328_8: maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1328_9: na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, na ca katturahito pāṇātipātapayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena
tika-vin01t1:1328_10: upakārakesu attano attano anurūpaphaluppādaniyatesu kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito
tika-vin01t1:1328_11: yathā “padīpo pakāseti, nisākarova candimā”ti. Na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno
tika-vin01t1:1328_12: cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchitabbo santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato.
tika-vin01t1:1328_13: Santānavasena vattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyā dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena
tika-vin01t1:1328_14: kammabaddho. Ayañca vicāro adinnādānādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vibhāvetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1329_0: So ca pāṇātipāto guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
tika-vin01t1:1329_1: mahante mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā? Payogamahantatāya, payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya.
tika-vin01t1:1329_2: Guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1329_3: pana samabhāve satipi kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1330_0: Kāyavācāhi na dinnanti adinnaṃ, parasantakaṃ, tassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ. Parassaharaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1330_1: theyyaṃ, corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthato pana parapariggahe parapariggahitasaññino
tika-vin01t1:1330_3: Taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ. Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya.
tika-vin01t1:1330_4: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1330_5: upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1331_0: Micchā caraṇaṃ micchācāro, methunasamācāresu ekantanindito lāmakācāro. So pana lakkhaṇato
tika-vin01t1:1331_2: micchācāro sīlādiguṇavirahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne mahāsāvajjo.
tika-vin01t1:1331_3: Tassa cattāro sambhārā – agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanapayogo, maggenamaggappaṭipattiadhivāsananti.
tika-vin01t1:1332_0: Vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vācato pavattaṃ duccaritanti vacīduccaritaṃ. Taṃ sarūpato
tika-vin01t1:1332_2: musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. Musā vadīyati vuccati etāyāti musāvādo, atathaṃ vatthuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1332_3: tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā. So yamatthaṃ bhañjati,
tika-vin01t1:1332_4: tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Apica gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1332_5: adātukāmatāya natthīti ādinayappavatto appasāvajjo, sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1332_6: vutto mahāsāvajjo. Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena
tika-vin01t1:1332_7: “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:1332_8: pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti –
tika-vin01t1:1332_9: atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa tadatthaviññāpananti. Eko
tika-vin01t1:1332_10: payogo sāhatthikova. So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe
tika-vin01t1:1332_11: daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti, ayaṃ kiriyāsamuṭṭhāpikacetanākkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin01t1:1332_12: musāvādakammunā bajjhati. Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyapaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti,
tika-vin01t1:1332_13: tathā “idamassa bhaṇāhī”ti āṇāpentopi, paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi, “ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1332_14: attho evaṃ veditabbo”ti kuṭṭādīsu likhitvā ṭhapentopi, tasmā ettha āṇattikanissaggiyathāvarāpi
tika-vin01t1:1332_15: payogā yujjanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1333_0: Pisatīti pisuṇā, samagge satte avayavabhūte vagge bhinne karotīti attho. Niruttinayena
tika-vin01t1:1333_1: vā piyasuññakaraṇato pisuṇā. Yāya hi vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye
tika-vin01t1:1333_2: attano piyabhāvaṃ, parassa ca piyasuññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇavācā. Lakkhaṇato pana
tika-vin01t1:1333_3: saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin01t1:1333_4: cetanā pisuṇavācā pisuṇaṃ vadati etāyāti katvā. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti, tassa appaguṇatāya
tika-vin01t1:1333_5: appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā cattāro sambhārā – bhinditabbo paro,
tika-vin01t1:1333_6: “iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī”ti bhedapurekkhāratā vā “iti ahaṃ piyo
tika-vin01t1:1333_7: bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti piyakamyatā vā, tajjo vāyāmo, tassa tadatthavijānananti.
tika-vin01t1:1333_8: Pare pana abhinne kammapathabhedo natthi, bhinne eva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1334_0: Pharusayatīti pharusā, vācā. Yāya hi vācāya attānampi parampi pharusaṃ sinehābhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1334_1: lūkhaṃ karoti, sā pharusavācā. Atha vā sayampi pharusā domanassasamuṭṭhitattā sabhāvenapi
tika-vin01t1:1334_2: kakkasā neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayasukhāti pharusavācā. Ettha pana paresaṃ mammacchedanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1334_3: pavattiyā ekantaniṭṭhuratāya sabhāvena kāraṇavohārena ca vācāya pharusasaddappavatti
tika-vin01t1:1334_4: daṭṭhabbā. Taṃ pharusaṃ vadati etāyāti pharusavācā, parassa mammacchedakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin01t1:1334_5: ekantapharusā cetanā. Tassā āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu – eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1334_6: anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati, taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti
tika-vin01t1:1334_7: akkosi. Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako “yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi,
tika-vin01t1:1334_8: taṃ mā hotu. Yaṃ cittena cintesi, taṃ hotū”ti saccakiriyamakāsi. Mahiṃsī tattheva
tika-vin01t1:1334_9: baddhā viya aṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1334_10: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1334_11: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake
tika-vin01t1:1334_12: evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne”ti. Atha ca nesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1334_13: āgamādhigamasampattiṃ icchanti, yathā cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya
tika-vin01t1:1334_14: apharusavācāpi na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā
tika-vin01t1:1334_15: hoti, cittapharusatāya pana esā pharusavācāva. Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā, tassa appaguṇatāya
tika-vin01t1:1334_16: appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo paro, kupitacittaṃ, akkosanāti.
tika-vin01t1:1335_0: Saṃ sukhaṃ hitañca phalati visarati vināsetīti samphaṃ, attano paresañca anupakārakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1335_1: yaṃ kiñci, samphaṃ palapati etāyāti samphappalāpo, anatthaviññāpikakāyavacīpayogasamauṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin01t1:1335_2: akusalacetanā. So āsevanamandatāya appasāvajjo, āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa
tika-vin01t1:1335_4: Pare pana taṃ kathaṃ agaṇhante kammapathabhedo natthi, parena pana samphappalāpe gahiteyeva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1336_0: Abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyoti ettha parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyatīti abhijjhā,
tika-vin01t1:1336_1: parasampattīsu lobho. Sā pana “aho vata idaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā.
tika-vin01t1:1336_2: Adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Tassā dve sambhārā – parabhaṇḍaṃ, attano
tika-vin01t1:1336_3: pariṇāmanañca. Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1336_4: yāva “aho vata idaṃ mamassā”ti attano na pariṇāmeti.
tika-vin01t1:1337_0: Hitasukhaṃ byāpādeti vināsetīti byāpādo, paṭigho. So paravināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo.
tika-vin01t1:1337_1: So pharusavācā viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. Tassa dve sambhārā – parasatto, tassa
tika-vin01t1:1337_2: ca vināsanacintā. Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1337_3: yāva “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsanaṃ na cinteti.
tika-vin01t1:1338_0: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvena micchā passatīti micchādiṭṭhi. Sā “natthi dinna”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1338_1: nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā. Samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Apica
tika-vin01t1:1338_2: aniyatā appasāvajjā, niyatā mahāsāvajjā. Tassa dve sambhārā – vatthuno gahitākāraviparītatā,
tika-vin01t1:1338_3: yathā ca taṃ gaṇhāti, tathābhāvena tassupaṭṭhānanti. Tattha natthikāhetukaaariyadiṭṭhīhi
tika-vin01t1:1339_1: vuttāvasesā akusalā dhammā gahetabbāti āha “ṭhapetvā te dhamme”tiādi. Te yathāvuttakāyaduccaritādike
tika-vin01t1:1340_0: 6. Ayaṃ lokatantīti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyālakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī. Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1340_1: alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena
tika-vin01t1:1340_4: veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavacano hettha guṇasaddo “vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1340_5: Dvīsu akusalacittesūti domanassasahagatesu dvīsu akusalacittesu. Mohassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā
tika-vin01t1:1341_0: 7. Jigucchati maññeti “ahamabhijāto rūpavā paññavā, kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1341_1: kareyya”nti jigucchati viya jigucchatīti vā sallakkhemi. Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhenāti
tika-vin01t1:1341_2: aññāṇasambhūtaṭṭhena. Akusale dhamme jigucchamāno tesaṃ samaṅgībhāvampi jigucchatīti
tika-vin01t1:1341_3: vuttaṃ “akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattī”ti. Samāpattīti etasseva vevacanaṃ samāpajjanā
tika-vin01t1:1341_4: samaṅgibhāvoti. Maṇḍanakajātiyoti maṇḍanasabhāvo, maṇḍanasīloti attho. Jegucchitanti jigucchanasīlataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1342_0: 8. Lokajeṭṭhakakammanti loke jeṭṭhakānaṃ kattabbakammaṃ, loke vā seṭṭhasammataṃ kammaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1342_1: Tatrāti yathāvuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu. Padābhihito attho padattho, byañjanatthoti
tika-vin01t1:1342_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Vinayaṃ vā arahatīti ettha vinayanaṃ vinayo, niggaṇhananti attho. Tenāha
tika-vin01t1:1342_3: “niggahaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu
tika-vin01t1:1342_4: sakatthe arahatthe ca bhaddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati, na pana “vinayāya
tika-vin01t1:1342_5: dhammaṃ desetī”ti imasmiṃ atthe, tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha “vicitrā
tika-vin01t1:1342_6: hi taddhitavuttī”ti. Vicitratā cettha lokappamāṇato veditabbā. Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1342_7: atthe taddhitappayogo lokassa, tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā
tika-vin01t1:1342_8: taddhitavutti. Tasmā yathā “mā saddamakāsī”ti vadanto “māsaddiko”ti vuccati, evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1342_9: vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayikoti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1343_0: 9. Kapaṇapurisoti guṇavirahitatāya dīnamanusso. Byañjanāni avicāretvāti tissadattādisaddesu
tika-vin01t1:1343_1: viya “imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo”ti evaṃ byañjanaṃ vicāraṃ akatvā, anipphannapāṭipadikavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1344_0: 10. Devalokagabbhasampattiyāti vatvā ṭhapetvā bhummadeve sesesu devesu gabbhaggahaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1344_1: abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin01t1:1344_3: Mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentoti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento,
tika-vin01t1:1344_4: akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchismiṃ nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1344_5: viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti
tika-vin01t1:1344_6: adhippāyo. Gabbhatoti devalokapaṭisandhito. Tenevāha “abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti
tika-vin01t1:1344_7: adhippāyo”ti. Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena
tika-vin01t1:1344_9: Iti-saddā e hetuattho, yasmā āyatimpi hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgī, tasmā hīno vā gabbho
tika-vin01t1:1345_0: Puna tasseva viggahassa kodhavasena…pe… dassentoti heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:1345_1: adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1345_2: Gabbha-saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo “gabbhe vasati māṇavo”tiādīsu viya. Atthi mātukucchismiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1345_3: nibbattasattapariyāyo “antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu viya. Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1345_4: gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha “anāgate gabbhaseyyā”ti. Gabbhe seyyā gabbhaseyyā. Anuttarena
tika-vin01t1:1345_5: maggenāti aggamaggena. Kammakilesānaṃ maggena vihatattā āha “vihatakāraṇattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1345_6: Itarā tissopīti aṇḍajasaṃsedajaopapātikā. Ettha ca yadipi “apagabbho”ti imassa anurūpato
tika-vin01t1:1345_7: gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā, pasaṅgato pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1346_0: Idāni sattapariyāyassa gabbhasaddassa vasena viggahanānattaṃ dassento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1346_1: Imasmiṃ pana vikappe gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattīti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva
tika-vin01t1:1346_2: vuttantipi vadanti. Nanu ca “āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā”ti vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā
tika-vin01t1:1346_3: eva pahīnā, na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha “yathā cā”tiādi. Atha “abhinibbattī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1346_4: ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha “abhinibbatti ca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1346_5: Apunabbhavabhūtāti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.
tika-vin01t1:1347_0: 11. Dhammadhātunti ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu,
tika-vin01t1:1347_1: dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato avabujjhanasabhāvo, sabbaññutaññāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paṭivijjhitvāti
tika-vin01t1:1347_2: sacchikatvā, paṭilabhitvāti attho, paṭilābhahetūti vuttaṃ hoti. Desanāvilāsappatto
tika-vin01t1:1347_3: hotīti rucivasena parivattetvā desetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso, taṃ patto adhigatoti
tika-vin01t1:1347_4: attho. Karuṇāvipphāranti sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya pharaṇaṃ. Tādiguṇalakkhaṇameva
tika-vin01t1:1347_5: puna upamāya vibhāvetvā dassento āha “pathavīsamacittata”nti. Yathā pathavī suciasucinikkhepachedanabhedanādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1347_6: na vikampati, anurodhavirodhaṃ na pāpuṇāti, evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato
tika-vin01t1:1347_8: nāma phalasamāpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano
tika-vin01t1:1347_9: pathavīsamacittatālakkhaṇaṃ akujjhanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo”ti amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1347_10: khanti. Jarāya anusaṭanti jarāya paliveṭhitaṃ. Vaṭṭakhāṇubhūtanti anekesaṃ anayabyasanānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1347_12: sambhāvanavasena “ajja maritvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mahantena kho pana ussāhenāti “sādhu
tika-vin01t1:1347_13: kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena. Appaṭisamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1347_14: purejātabhāvanti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ. Natthi etassa paṭisamoti appaṭisamo, purejātabhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1348_0: “Apī”ti avatvā “pī”ti vadanto pi-saddopi visuṃ atthi nipātoti dasseti. Sambhāvanattheti
tika-vin01t1:1348_1: “api nāmevaṃ siyā”ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho, tasmiṃ jotakatāya pisaddo vattati.
tika-vin01t1:1348_2: Vacanasiliṭṭhatāyāti vacanassa madhurabhāvatthaṃ, mudubhāvatthanti attho. Evañhi
tika-vin01t1:1348_3: loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hotīti evaṃ ekameva gaṇanaṃ avatvā aparāya gaṇanāya saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1348_4: vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti yathā “dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī”ti. Sammā
tika-vin01t1:1348_5: adhisayitānīti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayaparihāratthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1348_6: sammadeva upari sayitāni. Upariattho hettha adhi-saddo. Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyāti tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1348_7: allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā. Tenāha “usmīkatānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1348_8: Sammā paribhāvitānīti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni. Tenāha “kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1349_0: Ettha ca sammā parisedanaṃ kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanañca sammā adhisayananipphattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1349_1: ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammā adhisayaneneva hi itaradvayaṃ ijjhati. Na
tika-vin01t1:1349_2: hi sammā adhisayanato visuṃ sammā parisedanassa sammā paribhāvanassa ca karaṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1349_3: tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ “evaṃ tīhi pakārehi tāni
tika-vin01t1:1349_4: aṇḍāni paripāliyamānānī”ti. Nakhasikhāti nakhaggāni. Mukhatuṇḍakanti mukhaggaṃ. Kapālassa
tika-vin01t1:1349_5: tanukattāti ettha yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā
tika-vin01t1:1349_6: kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti
tika-vin01t1:1349_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṅkuṭitahatthapādāti ettha hatthāti pakkhā. Na hi kukkuṭānaṃ pakkhato
tika-vin01t1:1349_8: añño hattho nāma atthi. Etthāti ālokaṭṭhāne. Pakkhe vidhunantāti pakkhe cālentā.
tika-vin01t1:1350_0: So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyoti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako,
tika-vin01t1:1350_1: soyeva jeṭṭhoti vacanīyo assa, bhaveyyāti attho. Sampaṭipādentoti saṃsandento. Tibhūmakapariyāpannāpi
tika-vin01t1:1350_2: sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti
tika-vin01t1:1350_3: āha “avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū”ti. Aṇḍakosanti bījakapālaṃ. Lokasannivāseti
tika-vin01t1:1350_4: loko eva lokasannivāso. Sammāsambodhinti ettha sammāti aviparītattho, saṃ-saddo sāmanti
tika-vin01t1:1350_5: imamatthaṃ dīpeti, tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati
tika-vin01t1:1350_6: paṭivijjhatīti sammāsambodhīti maggo vuccati. Tenāha “sammā sāmañca bodhi”nti, sammā
tika-vin01t1:1350_7: sayameva ca bujjhanakanti attho. Sammāti vā pasatthavacano, saṃ-saddo sundaravacanoti
tika-vin01t1:1350_8: āha “atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi”nti. Bodhisaddassa anekatthataṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t1:1350_9: idhādhippetamatthaṃ niddhāretvā dassetukāmo āha “bodhīti rukkhopi maggopī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1350_10: Tattha abujjhi etthāti rukkho bodhi. Sayaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti vā tena ariyāti maggo
tika-vin01t1:1350_11: bodhi. Sabbadhamme sabbākārato bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bodhi. Bujjhīyati
tika-vin01t1:1350_12: sacchikarīyatīti nibbānaṃ bodhi. Antarā ca bodhinti dutiyamudāharaṇaṃ vināpi rukkhasaddena
tika-vin01t1:1350_13: bodhisaddassa rukkhe pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Varabhūrimedhasoti mahāpathavī viya
tika-vin01t1:1350_14: patthaṭavarapaññoti attho. Asabbaguṇadāyakattāti sabbaguṇānaṃ adāyakattā. Sabbaguṇe
tika-vin01t1:1350_15: na dadātīti hi asabbaguṇadāyako, ayuttasamāsoyaṃ gamakattā yathā “asūriyaṃpassāni mukhānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1351_0: Tisso vijjāti upanissayavato saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti. Nanu cettha
tika-vin01t1:1351_1: tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati “maggo tisso
tika-vin01t1:1351_2: vijjā detī”ti? Nāyaṃ doso. Satipi āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike
tika-vin01t1:1351_3: magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ tisso vijjā paripuṇṇā hontīti “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1351_4: vuccati. Cha abhiññāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sāvakapāramiñāṇanti aggasāvakehi paṭilabhitabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1351_5: sabbameva lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. Paccekabodhiñāṇanti etthāpi imināva nayena attho
tika-vin01t1:1351_6: veditabbo. Abbhaññāsinti jāniṃ. Jānanañca na anussavādivasenāti āha “paṭivijjhi”nti,
tika-vin01t1:1351_7: paccakkhamakāsinti attho. Paṭivedhopi na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti
tika-vin01t1:1351_8: āha “pattomhī”ti, pāpuṇinti attho. Pāpuṇanañca na sayaṃ gantvāti āha “adhigatomhī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1352_0: Opammasampaṭipādananti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. Atthenāti
tika-vin01t1:1352_1: upameyyatthena. Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato
tika-vin01t1:1352_2: nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1352_3: avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha “yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe… tividhānupassanākaraṇa”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1352_5: buddhaguṇānaṃ, buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva “tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha,
tika-vin01t1:1352_6: adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipī”ti vacanato. Avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvoti balavavipassanāvasena
tika-vin01t1:1352_7: avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, paṭicchādanasāmaññena ca avijjāya aṇḍakosasadisatā. Mudubhūtassapi
tika-vin01t1:1352_9: ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso
tika-vin01t1:1352_10: tikkhatā, anupavisitvāpi satindriyavasena anatikkamanato akuṇṭhatā kharabhāvo. Tikkhopi
tika-vin01t1:1352_11: hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti, na tathā idaṃ. Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena
tika-vin01t1:1352_12: kilesasamudācārasaṅkhobharahitatāya saddhindriyavasena pasannabhāvo, satipi ca pasannabhāve
tika-vin01t1:1352_13: antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena sūrabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1352_14: veditabbo. Evamimehi pakārehi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipassanāñāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1352_15: pariṇāmakāloti vipassanāya vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappatti, tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1352_16: dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvāti saṅkhārupekkhāya
tika-vin01t1:1352_19: Lokuttarābhiññā hi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padālitā. Potthakesu pana katthaci “chaabhiññāpakkhe”ti
tika-vin01t1:1352_20: likhanti, so apāṭhoti veditabbo. Jeṭṭho seṭṭhoti vuddhatamattā jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi
tika-vin01t1:1353_0: Idāni “āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇa vīriya”ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento
tika-vin01t1:1353_1: āha “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādi. Tattha pubbabhāgato pabhutīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgiyavīriyārambhādito
tika-vin01t1:1353_2: paṭṭhāya. Cittamevamuppannanti evaṃ upari vakkhamānaparivitakkavasena cittamuppannanti
tika-vin01t1:1353_3: attho. “Cittameva uppanna”ntipi pāṭho, tattha cittameva uppannaṃ, na tāva bhagavati
tika-vin01t1:1353_4: pasādoti attho. Muṭṭhassatināti vinaṭṭhassatinā, sativirahitenāti attho. Sāraddhakāyenāti
tika-vin01t1:1353_5: sadarathakāyena. Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne. Bodhīti
tika-vin01t1:1353_6: hi paññā vuccati, sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso “bodhimaṇḍo”ti paññāto.
tika-vin01t1:1353_7: Caturaṅgasamannāgatanti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upasussatu
tika-vin01t1:1353_8: maṃsalohita”nti evaṃ vuttacaturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ. Tattha tacoti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1353_9: nhāru ekaṃ aṅgaṃ aṭṭhi ekaṃ aṅgaṃ maṃsalohitaṃ ekaṃ aṅganti veditabbaṃ. Taco ekaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1353_10: aṅganti ca tace nirapekkhabhāvo ekaṃ aṅganti gahetabbaṃ. Padhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa
tika-vin01t1:1353_11: hi tace palujjamānepi taṃnimittaṃ avosānāpajjanaṃ tassa vīriyassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1353_12: kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi attho veditabbo. Paggahitanti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussāhanabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1354_0: Asallīnanti asaṅkucitaṃ kosajjavasena saṅkocaṃ anāpannaṃ. Upaṭṭhitāti ogāhanasaṅkhātena
tika-vin01t1:1354_1: apilāpabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā. Tenāha “ārammaṇābhimukhībhāvenā”ti. Sammosassa
tika-vin01t1:1354_2: viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti asammuṭṭhā. Kiñcāpi cittapassaddhivaseneva
tika-vin01t1:1354_3: cittameva passaddhaṃ, kāyapassaddhivaseneva ca kāyo passaddho hoti, tathāpi yasmā
tika-vin01t1:1354_4: kāyapassaddhi uppajjamānā cittapassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1354_6: vuttaṃ “rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī”ti. So ca khoti so ca kho kāyo. Vigatadarathoti
tika-vin01t1:1354_7: vigatakilesadaratho. Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho
tika-vin01t1:1354_8: hoti. Sammā āhitanti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:1354_9: ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Tenāha “suṭṭhu ṭhapita”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1354_10: Cittassa anekaggabhāvo vikkhepavasena cañcalatā, sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha
tika-vin01t1:1354_11: “ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana”nti. Ettāvatāti “āraddhaṃ kho panā”tiādinā vīriyasatipassaddhisamādhīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1355_0: Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbapaṭipadāya icchitabbāti? Saccaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1355_1: icchitabbā, sā pana nānantarikabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā. Asati hi saddhāya
tika-vin01t1:1355_2: vīriyārambhādīnaṃ asambhavoyeva, paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1355_3: na siyā, tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi
tika-vin01t1:1355_4: gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1357_0: Idāni “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinayappavattāya pāḷiyā jhānavibhaṅge vuttampi atthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1357_1: aṭṭhakathānayeneva saṃvaṇṇetukāmo vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vuttanayena avacane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1357_2: “kiñcāpi tattha katame kāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho
tika-vin01t1:1357_3: chandanaṭṭhena chando, tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo, tatopi balavataro bahalarāgo
tika-vin01t1:1357_4: chandarāgo. Nimittānubyañjanāni saṅkappeti etenāti saṅkappo, tathāpavatto lobho.
tika-vin01t1:1357_5: Tattha nimittasaṅkappanā nāma avayave samodhānetvā “itthī puriso”tiādinā ekajjhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1357_6: katvā uparūpari kilesuppattiyā nimittassa kappanā. Anubyañjanasaṅkappanā pana “hatthā
tika-vin01t1:1357_7: sobhanā, pādā sobhanā”ti evaṃ anubyañjanavasena vibhajitvā kappanāti. Kilesānañhi
tika-vin01t1:1357_8: anu anu byañjanato paribyañjanato paribyattivasena uppattiyā paccayabhāvato anubyañjanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1357_9: hatthapādādiavayavā vuccanti. Tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo, saṅkappavaseneva pavatto
tika-vin01t1:1357_10: tatopi balavataro saṅkapparāgo. Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākāravasena
tika-vin01t1:1357_11: avatthābhedavasena ca veditabbo yathā “vaccho dammo balībaddo”ti. Kāmāti kilesakāmā,
tika-vin01t1:1358_0: Seyyathidanti imassa taṃ katamaṃ, taṃ kathanti vā attho. Viviccitvāti visuṃ hutvā.
tika-vin01t1:1358_1: Tenāha “vinā hutvā apasakkitvā”ti, pajahanavasena apakkamitvāti attho. Vivicceva
tika-vin01t1:1358_2: kāmehīti ettha viviccāti iminā vivecanaṃ jhānakkhaṇe kāmānaṃ abhāvamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1358_3: Viviccevāti pana iminā ekaṃsato kāmānaṃ vivecetabbatādīpanena tappaṭipakkhatā jhānassa
tika-vin01t1:1358_4: kāmavivekappahānassa ca jhānādhigamūpāyatā dassitā hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamajjhāna”ntiādiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1358_5: vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Andhakāre sati padīpo viyāti
tika-vin01t1:1358_6: etena yathā padīpābhāvena rattiyaṃ andhakārābhibhavo, evaṃ jhānābhāvena cittasantatiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1359_0: Etanti pubbapadeyeva avadhāraṇavacanaṃ, na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “kāmehi evā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1359_1: avadhāraṇassa akatattā. Tannissaraṇatoti nissaranti niggacchanti etena, ettha vāti
tika-vin01t1:1359_2: nissaraṇaṃ. Ke niggacchanti? Kāmā. Tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ tannissaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1359_3: tato kāmanissaraṇatoti attho. Kathaṃ pana samāne vikkhambhane kāmānamevetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1359_4: na byāpādādīnanti codanaṃ yuttito āgamato ca sādhetuṃ “kāmadhātū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1359_7: vuttavibhāgassa kilesakāmassa paccatthikabhāvato. Tena yathā mettā byāpādassa, karuṇā
tika-vin01t1:1359_8: vihiṃsāya, evamidaṃ jhānaṃ kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti dasseti. Vipākena cettha
tika-vin01t1:1359_9: kāmadhātusamatikkamo attano pavattikkhaṇe kāmarāgapaṭipakkhatā ca veditabbā. Evamattano
tika-vin01t1:1359_10: pavattiyā vipākappavattiyā ca kāmarāgato kāmadhātuto ca vinivattasabhāvattā idaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1359_11: jhānaṃ visesato kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ, svāyamattho pāṭhāgato evāti āha “yathāhā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1360_0: Kāmañcettha tamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ purimapadeyeva avadhāraṇaṃ gahitaṃ, uttarapadepi pana
tika-vin01t1:1360_1: taṃ gahetabbameva tathā atthasambhavatoti dassetuṃ “uttarapadepī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Itoti
tika-vin01t1:1360_2: kāmacchandato. Esa daṭṭhabboti esa niyamo daṭṭhabbo. Sādhāraṇavacanenāti sabbavivekasādhāraṇavacanena.
tika-vin01t1:1360_4: kāyavivekādayo. Tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbāti tayo eva idha jhānakathāyaṃ daṭṭhabbā samucchedavivekādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1360_5: asambhavato. Niddeseti mahāniddese. Tattha hi “uddānato dve kāmā vatthukāmā kilesakāmā
tika-vin01t1:1360_6: cā”ti uddisitvā tattha “katame vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpā…pe… manāpiyā phoṭṭhabbā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1360_7: vatthukāmā niddiṭṭhā. Te pana kāmīyantīti kāmāti veditabbā. Tatthevāti niddeseyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1360_8: Vibhaṅgeti jhānavibhaṅge. Evañhi satīti evaṃ ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati. Vatthukāmehipīti
tika-vin01t1:1360_9: vatthukāmehi viviccevātipi attho yujjatīti evaṃ yujjamānatthantarasamuccayattho pi-saddo,
tika-vin01t1:1360_10: na kilesakāmasamuccayattho. Kasmā? Imasmiṃ atthe kilesakāmehi vivekassa dutiyapadena
tika-vin01t1:1360_11: vuttattā. Tenāti vatthukāmavivekena. Kāyaviveko vutto hotīti puttadārādipariggahavivekadīpanato
tika-vin01t1:1361_0: Purimenāti kāyavivekena. Etthāti “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1361_1: etasmiṃ padadvaye. Ito vā niddhārite vivekadvaye, akusalasaddena yadi kilesakāmā,
tika-vin01t1:1361_2: sabbākusalāpi vā gahitā, sabbathā kilesakāmehi viveko vuttoti āha “dutiyena kilesakāmehi
tika-vin01t1:1361_3: vivekavacanato”ti. Dutiyenāti ca cittavivekenāti attho. Etesanti yathāvuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1361_4: padānaṃ. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Taṇhādisaṃkilesānaṃ vatthuno pahānaṃ saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1361_5: Lolabhāvo nāma tattha tattha rūpādīsu taṇhuppādo, tassa hetū vatthukāmā eva veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1361_6: Bālabhāvassa hetupariccāgoti sambandho. Bālabhāvo nāma avijjā, ducintitacintitādi
tika-vin01t1:1361_7: vā, tassa ayonisomanasikāro, sabbepi vā akusalā dhammā hetū. Kāmaguṇādhigamahetu
tika-vin01t1:1361_8: pāṇātipātādiasuddhappayogo hotīti tabbivekena payogasuddhi vibhāvitā. Taṇhāsaṃkilesasodhanena
tika-vin01t1:1361_10: ca jhānabhāvanāya paccayabhūtā pubbayogādivasena siddhā ajjhāsayasampadā, sā pana
tika-vin01t1:1361_11: taṇhupatāpavigamena hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanenā”ti. Kāmesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1362_1: Kāmacchandoyevāti kāmasabhāvoyeva chando, na kattukamyatāchando napi kusalacchandoti
tika-vin01t1:1362_2: adhippāyo. Akusalapariyāpannopīti “vivicca akusalehī”ti ettha vuttaakusalesu antogadhopi.
tika-vin01t1:1362_3: Jhānapaṭipakkhatoti jhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvato taṃhetu taṃnimittaṃ visuṃ vutto, akusalabhāvasāmaññena
tika-vin01t1:1362_4: aggahetvā visuṃ sarūpena gahito. Yadi kilesakāmova purimapade vutto, taṃ kathaṃ bahuvacananti
tika-vin01t1:1362_7: vuccamānāni jhānaṅgāni uparijhānaṅgāni, tesaṃ attano paccanīkānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvadassanato
tika-vin01t1:1362_9: pāṭho. Tattha paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti upari vuccamānajhānaṅgānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena
tika-vin01t1:1362_10: paṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti atthaṃ vadanti. Jhānaṅgapaccanīkānīti jhānaṅgānaṃ pavattinivāraṇato
tika-vin01t1:1362_11: jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni. Viddhaṃsakānīti vighātakāni. Samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkhoti
tika-vin01t1:1362_12: rāgapaṇidhiyā ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa
tika-vin01t1:1362_13: samādhānato kāmacchandassa samādhi paṭipakkho. Pīti byāpādassāti pāmojjena samānayogakkhemattā
tika-vin01t1:1362_14: byāpādassa pīti paṭipakkhā. Vitakko thinamiddhassāti yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārappavattito
tika-vin01t1:1362_15: vitakko thinamiddhassa paṭipakkho. Sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassāti sukhaṃ vūpasantasītalasabhāvattā
tika-vin01t1:1362_17: vicāro ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpasabhāvattā vicikicchāya paṭipakkho.
tika-vin01t1:1362_18: Mahākaccānattherena desitā piṭakānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā peṭakaṃ, tasmiṃ peṭake.
tika-vin01t1:1363_5: hontampi kāmarāgādivikkhambhanasabhāvameva hoti taṃsabhāvattāti avisesetvā nīvaraṇākusalamūlādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1364_0: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1364_1: “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ. Vitakkananti hi vitakkanakiriyā, sā ca vitakkassa
tika-vin01t1:1364_2: attano paccayehi pavattimattamevāti bhāvaniddeso vasavattibhāvanivāraṇāya hoti. Tayidaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1364_3: vitakkanaṃ “īdisamida”nti ārammaṇaparikappananti āha “ūhananti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Yasmā
tika-vin01t1:1364_4: cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiniruḷhaṃ viya hoti, tasmā so ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇo
tika-vin01t1:1364_5: vutto. Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ ñātiṃ vā mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati,
tika-vin01t1:1364_6: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1364_7: ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? Vitakkabaleneva. Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko
tika-vin01t1:1364_8: rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-vin01t1:1364_9: Paricayenāti ca santāne pavattavitakkabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paricayena. Vitakkassa hi
tika-vin01t1:1364_10: santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ, tena
tika-vin01t1:1364_11: taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva. Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1364_12: ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati, yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1364_13: hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1365_0: Āhananapariyāhananarasoti ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ āhananaṃ. Parito, parivattitvā
tika-vin01t1:1365_1: vā āhananaṃ pariyāhananaṃ. “Rūpaṃ rūpaṃ, pathavī pathavī”ti ākoṭentassa viya pavatti
tika-vin01t1:1365_2: āhananaṃ pariyāhanananti ca veditabbaṃ. Yasmiñhi ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti, taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1365_3: tassa gahaṇayogyaṃ karonto vitakko ākoṭento viya hoti. Yadi evaṃ nāgasenattherena
tika-vin01t1:1365_4: “ākoṭanalakkhaṇo vitakko. Yathā, mahārāja, bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati anusaddāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1365_5: evameva kho, mahārāja, yathā ākoṭanā, evaṃ vitakko daṭṭhabbo. Atha pacchā anuravanā
tika-vin01t1:1365_6: anusaddanā, evaṃ vicāro daṭṭhabbo”ti ākoṭanalakkhaṇatā vitakkassa kasmā vuttā? Nāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1365_7: virodho. Therena hi kiccasannissitaṃ katvā lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā
tika-vin01t1:1365_8: kāci kiriyā nāma natthi tathā gahetabbākāro ca. Bodhaneyyajanānurodhena pana paramatthato
tika-vin01t1:1365_9: ekībhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi viya samāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1365_10: Evañhi so suṭṭhu pakāsito hoti. Ānayanapaccupaṭṭhānoti ettha ānayanaṃ citte ārammaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1366_0: Anusañcaraṇaṃ anuparibbhamanaṃ. Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno eva santāne pākaṭo
tika-vin01t1:1366_1: hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Anumajjananti ārammaṇe cittassa anumasanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1366_2: parimajjananti attho. Tathā hi “vicāro parimajjanahattho viya sañcaraṇahattho viyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1366_3: ca vutto. Tatthāti ārammaṇe. Sahajātānaṃ anuyojanaṃ ārammaṇe anuvicaraṇasaṅkhātaanumajjanavaseneva
tika-vin01t1:1366_4: veditabbaṃ. Anuppabandhanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti. Tathā hi
tika-vin01t1:1366_5: so “anuppabandhanatā”ti niddiṭṭho. Teneva ca “ghaṇṭānuravo viya, paribbhamanaṃ viyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1366_6: ca vutto. Katthacīti paṭhamajjhāne parittacittuppādesu ca. Oḷārikaṭṭhenāti vicārato
tika-vin01t1:1366_7: oḷārikaṭṭhena. Yathā ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo paṭhamābhinipāto hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:1366_8: vitakko cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto viya hotīti āha “ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo viyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1366_9: Vipphāravāti ettha vipphāro nāma vitakkassa thinamiddhapaṭipakkho ārammaṇe anolīnatā
tika-vin01t1:1366_10: asaṅkoco, so pana abhiniropanabhāvena calanaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyenāha “paripphandanabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1366_11: cittassā”ti. Paribbhamanaṃ viyāti ettha parissayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ paribbhamananti
tika-vin01t1:1367_0: “Ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:1367_1: gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko, vātaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1367_2: pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1368_0: Vuttaṃ, taṃ anuppabandhanena pavattiyaṃ yujjati. Tathā hi upacāre vā appanāyaṃ vā
tika-vin01t1:1368_1: santānena pavattiyaṃ vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1368_2: na paṭhamābhinipāte pākaṭo hoti. Yathā hi apubbārammaṇe paṭhamābhinipātabhūto vitakko
tika-vin01t1:1368_3: vipphāravā hoti, na tathā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ anuppabandhavasena pavattiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1368_4: nātivipphāravā pana tattha hoti sannisinnabhāvato. Paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hotīti
tika-vin01t1:1368_5: vitakkassa viseso abhiniropanākāro oḷārikattā paṭhamajjhāne pākaṭo hoti, tadabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1368_6: pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne vicārassa viseso anumajjanākāro pākaṭo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1369_0: Ayaṃ panettha aparo nayo – malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t1:1369_1: itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelaeḷakalomādikatacumbaṭakena parimajjantassa daḷhaṃ gahaṇahattho
tika-vin01t1:1369_2: viya vitakko, parimajjanahattho viya vicāro. Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1369_3: bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa piṇḍassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko, tasseva ito
tika-vin01t1:1369_4: cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro. Tathā kaṃsabhājanādīsu kiñci maṇḍalaṃ vaṭṭalekhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1369_5: karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko, bahi paribbhamanakaṇṭako
tika-vin01t1:1370_1: voharīyati, evaṃ vitakkādiaṅgavinimuttaṃ avijjamānampi jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti
tika-vin01t1:1370_2: voharīyatīti dassetuṃ “rukkho viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vibhaṅge panātiādīsu jhānabhāvanāya
tika-vin01t1:1370_3: puggalavasena desetabbattā “idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin01t1:1370_4: jhānāni uddiṭṭhānīti. Yadipi vibhaṅge puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, attho pana tatrāpi
tika-vin01t1:1370_5: vibhaṅgepi yathā idha “iminā ca vitakkenā”tiādinā dhammavasena vutto, evameva daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:1370_6: paramatthato puggalasseva abhāvatoti adhippāyo. Atha vā jhānasamaṅgino vitakkavicārasamaṅgitādassanena
tika-vin01t1:1370_7: jhānasseva savitakkasavicāratā vuttāti āha “attho pana tatrāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1371_0: Vivekasaddassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha “tasmā vivekā”ti. Hetuatthe cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1371_1: tasmā vivekā hetubhūtāti attho. Vivekasaddassa kattusādhanataṃ kammasādhanataṃ vā
tika-vin01t1:1371_2: sandhāyāha “tasmiṃ vā viveke”ti. “Vivitto”ti hi iminā nīvaraṇehi vinābhūto tehi vivecitoti
tika-vin01t1:1371_3: ca sādhanadvayampi saṅgahitamevāti. Pinayatīti tappeti vaḍḍheti vā. Sampiyāyanalakkhaṇāti
tika-vin01t1:1371_4: paritussanalakkhaṇā. Pīnanarasāti paribrūhanarasā. Pharaṇarasāti paṇītarūpehi kāyassa
tika-vin01t1:1371_5: byāpanarasā. Udaggabhāvo odagyaṃ. Sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, attanā sampayuttadhamme laddhassāde
tika-vin01t1:1371_6: karotīti attho. Svāyaṃ kattuniddeso pariyāyaladdho dhammato aññassa kattunivattanattho,
tika-vin01t1:1371_7: nippariyāyena pana bhāvasādhanameva labbhatīti “sukhanaṃ sukha”nti vuttaṃ. Sātalakkhaṇanti
tika-vin01t1:1371_8: iṭṭhasabhāvattā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ, sampayuttadhamme vā attani sādayatīti sātaṃ da-kārassa
tika-vin01t1:1371_9: ta-kāraṃ katvā. Sātaṃ madhuranti vadanti, sātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sātalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1371_10: Upabrūhanarasantiādīsu upabrūhanaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃvaddhanaṃ, dukkhaṃ viya
tika-vin01t1:1371_11: avissajjetvā adukkhamasukhā viya anajjhupekkhitvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ upakāritā vā anuggaho.
tika-vin01t1:1371_13: Paṭiladdharasānubhavananti paṭiladdhassa ārammaṇarasassa anubhavanaṃ. Etena pītisukhāni
tika-vin01t1:1371_14: sabhāvato vibhajitvā dassitāni. Yattha pīti, tattha sukhanti vitakkassa viya vicārena
tika-vin01t1:1371_15: pītiyā sukhena accantasaṃyogamāha. Yattha sukhaṃ, tattha na niyamato pītīti vicārassa
tika-vin01t1:1371_16: viya vitakkena, sukhassa pītiyā anaccantasaṃyogaṃ. Tena accantānaccantasaṃyogitāya
tika-vin01t1:1372_0: Kaṃ udakaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāraṃ, nirudakamaruṭṭhānaṃ. Vanameva vanantaṃ. Vanacchāyappavesanaudakaparibhogesu
tika-vin01t1:1372_1: viya sukhanti yathā hi puriso mahākantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno ghammapareto tasito pipāsito
tika-vin01t1:1372_2: paṭipathe purisaṃ disvā “kattha pānīyaṃ atthī”ti puccheyya, so “aṭaviṃ uttaritvāva
tika-vin01t1:1372_3: jātassaravanasaṇḍo atthi, tattha gantvā labhissasī”ti vadeyya, so tassa kathaṃ sutvāva
tika-vin01t1:1372_4: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho bhaveyya, tato gacchanto bhūmiyaṃ patitāni uppaladalanāḷapattādīni
tika-vin01t1:1372_5: disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā gacchanto allavatthe allakese purise passeyya,
tika-vin01t1:1372_6: vanakukkuṭavanamorādīnaṃ saddaṃ suṇeyya, jātassarapariyante jātamaṇijālasadisaṃ nīlavanasaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1372_7: passeyya, sare jātāni uppalapadumakumudāni passeyya, acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakampi
tika-vin01t1:1372_8: passeyya, so bhiyyo bhiyyo haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā jātassaraṃ otaritvā yathāruci nhatvā
tika-vin01t1:1372_9: ca pivitvā ca passaddhadaratho bhisamuḷālapokkharādīni khāditvā nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā
tika-vin01t1:1372_10: mandālavamūlāni khandhe khipitvā uttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā udakasāṭakaṃ ātape katvā
tika-vin01t1:1372_11: sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante nipannova “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vadeyya,
tika-vin01t1:1372_12: evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassa hi purisassa jātassaravanasaṇḍasavanato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:1372_13: yāva udakadassanā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhakālo viya pubbabhāgārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākārā pīti,
tika-vin01t1:1372_14: nhāyitvā ca pivitvā ca sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti
tika-vin01t1:1372_15: vadanto nipannakālo viya balappattaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1373_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samayeti iṭṭhārammaṇassa paṭilābhasamaye paṭiladdhassa rasānubhavanasamaye
tika-vin01t1:1373_1: vanacchāyādīnaṃ savanadassanasamaye paribhogasamaye ca. Pākaṭabhāvatoti yathākkamaṃ
