tika-vin01t1:1373_2: pītisukhānaṃ vibhūtabhāvato. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhanti ettha purimasmiṃ atthe vivekajanti
tika-vin01t1:1373_3: jhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Pītisukhasaddato ca atthiatthavisesavato assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāneti
tika-vin01t1:1373_4: ettha akāro daṭṭhabbo yathā arisasoti. Dutiye pītisukhameva vivekajaṃ, vivekajaṃpītisukhanti
tika-vin01t1:1373_5: ca aññapadatthasamāso paccattaniddesassa ca alopo kato, lope vā sati “vivekajapītisukha”nti
tika-vin01t1:1374_0: Gaṇanānupubbato paṭhamanti iminā desanākkamaṃ ulliṅgeti. “Gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhama”ntipi
tika-vin01t1:1374_1: pāṭho, tatthāpi gaṇanānupubbatāyāti attho, gaṇanānupubbatāmattaṃ vā paṭhamanti idaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1374_2: vacananti attho. Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti paṭhamanti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1374_3: Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ
tika-vin01t1:1374_4: sakkoti, matthakato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti, antarantarā okkamantopi
tika-vin01t1:1374_5: sakkoti. Evaṃ pubbuppattiyaṭṭhena pana paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhamaṃ. Teneva visuddhimagge
tika-vin01t1:1374_6: “gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ, paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhama”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Paccanīkadhamme
tika-vin01t1:1374_7: jhāpetīti nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhamme dahati, vikkhambhanavasena pajahatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1374_8: Gocaranti kasiṇādiālambanaṃ. Tanti taṃ gocaraṃ. Upanijjhāyatīti passati. Saha upacārenāti
tika-vin01t1:1374_9: saddhiṃ upacārajjhānena. Kasiṇārammaṇūpanijjhāyanatoti pathavīkasiṇādino attano ārammaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1374_10: rūpaṃ viya cakkhunā upanijjhāyanato. Lakkhaṇūpanijjhāyanatoti yathāsambhavaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇattayassa
tika-vin01t1:1374_11: nibbānadhātuyā tathalakkhaṇassa ca upanijjhāyanato. Tenevāha “ettha hī”tiādi. Niccādivipallāsappahānena
tika-vin01t1:1374_12: maggo asammohato aniccādilakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti āha “vipassanāya
tika-vin01t1:1374_14: aviparītasabhāvo tathalakkhaṇaṃ, maggassapi vā nibbānārammaṇato tathalakkhaṇūpanijjhānatā yojetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1375_0: Visadisodāharaṇaṃ tāva dassento āha “yathā sadhano”tiādi. Añño apadesāraho hotīti
tika-vin01t1:1375_1: dhanato parijanato ca añño dhanavā parijanavā ca puriso saha dhanena vattati parijanena
tika-vin01t1:1375_2: cāti sadhano saparijanoti apadesaṃ arahatīti apadesāraho hoti, apadisitabbo hotīti
tika-vin01t1:1375_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Senaṅgesu eva senāsammutīti rathādisenaṅgavinimuttāya senāya abhāvepi
tika-vin01t1:1375_4: rathehi pattīhi ca saha vattanato sarathā sapatti senāti rathādisenaṅgesuyeva senāvohāroti
tika-vin01t1:1375_5: attho. Kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-vin01t1:1375_6: “avuttattā”tiādi. Evaṃ vuttāyevāti evaṃ sarūpato vibhaṅge vuttāyeva. Sacittekaggatanti
tika-vin01t1:1375_7: idha avuttepīti “sacittekaggata”nti evaṃ sarūpato imasmiṃ jhānapāṭhe avuttepīti attho,
tika-vin01t1:1375_8: sāmaññato pana jhānaggahaṇena gahitā eva. Tenevāha “yena hī”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-vin01t1:1375_9: – yena vitakkādīhi saha vattabbaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena “savitakkaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1375_10: savicāra”ntiādinā uddeso kato, so eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge “cittassekaggatā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1375_11: niddisantena pakāsito, tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbanti.
tika-vin01t1:1376_0: Upasampajjāti ettha upa-saṃsaddā “upalabbhatī”tiādīsu viya niratthakāti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1376_2: vuttaṃ, tasmā upasampajjāti ettha patvā sādhetvāti vā attho. Iriyanti kiriyaṃ. Vuttintiādīni
tika-vin01t1:1376_3: tasseva vevacanāni. Ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ iriyāpathantarehi rakkhaṇaṃ pālanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1376_4: Sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇattā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānameva vuttaṃ. Tañhi sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1379_0: Vūpasamāti vūpasamahetu. Vūpasamoti cettha pahānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañca vitakkavicārānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_1: atikkamo atthato dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe anuppādoti āha “samatikkamā”tiādi. Katamesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_2: panettha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo adhippeto, kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, udāhu dutiyajjhānikānanti,
tika-vin01t1:1379_3: kiñcettha – yadi paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, natthi tesaṃ vūpasamo. Na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_4: vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi. Atha dutiyajjhānikānaṃ, evampi nattheva vūpasamo sabbena
tika-vin01t1:1379_5: sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Yasmā
tika-vin01t1:1379_7: vitakkādayo eva ca jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti, na taṃsampayuttā phassādayo, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:1379_8: vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamādhivacanaṃ jhāne āgataṃ. Yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi
tika-vin01t1:1379_9: “etena etaṃ oḷārika”nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ, tasmā avisesena vitakkādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_10: taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno adhikavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_11: aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti katvā kañci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassento “oḷārikassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1379_12: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yehi vitakkavicārehi paṭhamajjhānassa oḷārikatā, tesaṃ samatikkamā
tika-vin01t1:1379_13: dutiyajjhānassa samadhigamo, na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ samatikkamāti
tika-vin01t1:1379_14: ayamattho “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etena dīpito, tasmā “kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_15: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo idhādhippeto, udāhu dutiyajjhānikāna”nti edisī codanā anokāsāva.
tika-vin01t1:1379_16: “Pītiyā ca virāgā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā vitakkavicārapītisukhasamatikkamavacanāni
tika-vin01t1:1379_18: avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇanayena taṃ dīpakaṃ vuttaṃ. Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike
tika-vin01t1:1379_20: tadekadesatā hotīti. Atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva taṃsamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakena
tika-vin01t1:1379_21: pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ pītiādisamatikkamā tatiyādiadhigamadīpakatā dīpitā hotīti tassa
tika-vin01t1:1379_22: taṃdīpakatā vuttā. Evañhi avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇaṃ vinā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena
tika-vin01t1:1380_0: Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ, na ajjhattajjhattādīti dassento āha “ajjhattanti
tika-vin01t1:1380_1: niyakajjhattaṃ adhippeta”nti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “vibhaṅge panā”tiādi. Pana-saddopi
tika-vin01t1:1380_2: apisaddattho, vibhaṅgepīti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho.
tika-vin01t1:1381_0: Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyāti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Imasmiñca
tika-vin01t1:1381_1: atthavikappeti “ceto sampasādayatī”ti etasmiṃ pakkhe. Cetasoti ca upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1381_2: Purimasminti “sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādana”nti vuttapakkhe. Cetasoti sambandhe
tika-vin01t1:1381_3: sāmivacanaṃ. “Yāva na pare ekagate karomī”tiādīsu seṭṭhavacanopi ekasaddo loke dissatīti
tika-vin01t1:1381_4: āha “seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccatī”ti. “Ekākīhi khuddakehi jita”ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi
tika-vin01t1:1381_5: ekasaddo diṭṭhoti āha “eko asahāyo hutvā”ti. Saddhādayopi kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1381_6: sādhāraṇato ca asādhāraṇato ca paccayā hontiyeva, samādhi pana jhānakkhaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1381_7: avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ paccayo hotīti dassento “sampayuttadhamme…pe… adhivacana”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1382_1: gahitaṃ. Svāyamatisayo yathā imasmiṃ jhāne labbhati, na tathā paṭhamajjhāneti imaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1382_2: visesaṃ dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇe āhananapariyāhananavasena anumajjanaanuyujjanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1382_3: ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena kilesakālussiyāpagame sampayuttānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1382_4: kiñci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ “vitakkavicārakkhobhena…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1382_5: na suppasanna”nti. Tattha khuddikā ūmiyo vīciyo, mahatiyo taraṅgā. Samādhipi na suṭṭhu
tika-vin01t1:1382_6: pākaṭoti satipi indriyasamatte vīriyasamatāya ca teneva khotena sampasādābhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1382_7: ca bahale viya jale maccho samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo. Vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvenāti
tika-vin01t1:1382_8: ettha yathāvuttakhobho eva palibodho. Evaṃ vuttenāti yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1382_9: yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tāsaṃ eva “saddahanā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1382_10: pavattiākāravisesavibhāvanavasena vuttena tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena. Ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanāti
tika-vin01t1:1382_11: “sampasādanayogato, sampasādanato vā sampasādanaṃ. Ekodiṃ bhāvetīti ekodibhāvanti
tika-vin01t1:1382_12: jhānaṃ vutta”nti evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā. Aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti
tika-vin01t1:1382_13: ca, evaṃ veditabbāti kathaṃ panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ saṃsandati
tika-vin01t1:1382_14: sameti, nanu jhānavibhaṅge “sampasādana”nti padaṃ uddharitvā “yā saddhā saddahanā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1382_15: saddhāyeva vuttā, “cetaso ekodibhāva”nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā “yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti
tika-vin01t1:1382_16: avaṭṭhitī”tiādinā samādhisseva niddeso kato, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sampasādanaṃ ekodibhāva”nti
tika-vin01t1:1382_17: jhānameva vuttanti aṭṭhakathāya vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ virodho āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati
tika-vin01t1:1382_18: vibhaṅgepi imināva adhippāyena niddesassa katattā. Tathā hi yena sampasādanena yogā
tika-vin01t1:1382_19: jhānaṃ “sampasādana”nti vuccati, tasmiṃ “yā saddhā saddahanā”tiādinā dassite sampasādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1382_20: jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1382_21: “Ekodibhāva”nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā ekodimhi dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva
tika-vin01t1:1382_22: jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā vuttāva hotīti iminā adhippāyena byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā
tika-vin01t1:1383_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ṭīkākārehi ācariyadhammapālattherādīhi “yadi ekodīti samādhissa gahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1383_1: adhippetaṃ, tadā ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo
tika-vin01t1:1383_2: siyā. Tasmā ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādanasaddo viya jhāne pavattatīti
tika-vin01t1:1383_3: yutta”nti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. Tasmā so aṭṭhakathānirapekkho visuṃyeveko
tika-vin01t1:1383_4: atthavikappoti gahetabbaṃ. Ayañhi nesaṃ adhippāyo – vitakkavicārehi anajjhāruḷhattā
tika-vin01t1:1383_5: ekaṃ udetīti ekodīti tathāvidhasamādhiyuttaṃ jhānacittameva gahetvā ekodissa bhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1383_6: ekodibhāvoti samādhissa gahaṇaṃ sakkā vattunti. Yo panāyaṃ tesamabhiniveso “ekodīti
tika-vin01t1:1383_7: samādhissa gahaṇe sati ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo
tika-vin01t1:1383_8: siyā”ti, so anekantikattā ayutto. Aññatthapi hi byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā atthamattasseva
tika-vin01t1:1384_0: Santāti samaṃ nirodhaṃ gatā. Samitāti bhāvanāya samaṃ gamitā nirodhitā. Vūpasantāti
tika-vin01t1:1384_1: tato eva suṭṭhu upasantā. Atthaṅgatāti atthaṃ vināsaṃ gatā. Abbhatthaṅgatāti upasaggena
tika-vin01t1:1384_2: padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. Appitāti gamitā vināsaṃ gatā. Sositāti pavattisaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t1:1384_3: santānassa abhāvena sosaṃ sukkhabhāvaṃ gatā. Byantīkatāti vigatantā katā.
tika-vin01t1:1385_0: Ayamatthoti bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkavicārānaṃ abhāvasaṅkhāto attho. Codakena vuttamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1385_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha etanti “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Tadatthadīpakanti
tika-vin01t1:1385_3: tassa vitakkavicārābhāvamattasaṅkhātassa atthassa dīpakaṃ. Na kilesakālussiyassāti
tika-vin01t1:1385_4: upacārakkhaṇe viya nīvaraṇasaṅkhātassa kilesasaṅkhobhassa vūpasamā na sampasādananti
tika-vin01t1:1385_5: attho. Nanu ca “purimaṃ vatvāpi vattabbamevā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi dutiyajjhānādiadhigamūpāyadīpakena
tika-vin01t1:1385_6: ajjhattaṃ sampasādanatāya cetaso ekodibhāvatāya ca hetudīpakena avitakkaavicārabhāvahetudīpakena
tika-vin01t1:1385_7: ca vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva vitakkavicārābhāvo dīpitoti, kiṃ puna avitakkaavicāravacanena
tika-vin01t1:1385_8: katenāti? Na, adīpitattā. Na hi vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena vitakkavicārānaṃ appavatti
tika-vin01t1:1385_9: vuttā hoti. Vitakkavicāresu hi taṇhāppahānaṃ etesaṃ vūpasamanaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgamukhena
tika-vin01t1:1385_11: Yato vitakkavicāresu virattabhāvadīpakaṃ vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanaṃ, ye ca saṅkhāresu
tika-vin01t1:1385_12: taṇhāppahānaṃ karonti, tesu maggesu pahīnataṇhesu ca phalesu saṅkhārappavatti hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1385_14: purimena na nivārito siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ āvajjitukāmatādiatikkamo ca tesaṃ vūpasamoti
tika-vin01t1:1385_15: dassanatthañca “avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa upanissayapaccayena
tika-vin01t1:1386_0: Gaṇanānupubbatotiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Etthāpi “dutiyaṃ uppannantipi
tika-vin01t1:1386_1: dutiya”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhaṅgapāṭhena sādhento āha “yathāhā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1386_2: Yaṃ pana vibhaṅge “jhānanti sampasādo pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1386_3: saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Rathassa paṇḍukambalaṃ viya hi sampasādo
tika-vin01t1:1386_4: jhānassa parikkhāro, na jhānaṅganti āha “pariyāyoyeva ceso”ti. Nippariyāyato pana
tika-vin01t1:1386_5: upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena tivaṅgikamevetaṃ hotīti āha “sampasādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1389_0: Virajjanaṃ virāgo. Taṃ pana virajjanaṃ nibbindanamukhena hīḷanaṃ vā tappaṭibaddharāgappahānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1389_1: vāti dassetuṃ “tassā pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā”ti vuttaṃ. Ubhinnamantarāti
tika-vin01t1:1389_2: pītiyā virāgāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antarā, majjheti attho. Sampiṇḍanaṃ samuccayo.
tika-vin01t1:1389_3: Maggoti upāyo. Dutiyajjhānassa hi paṭilābhaṃ vinā tatiyajjhānassa adhigamo na hotīti
tika-vin01t1:1389_4: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo tatiyajjhānādhigamassa upāyo. Tadadhigamāyāti tatiyamaggādhigamāya.
tika-vin01t1:1390_0: Upapattitoti samavāhitabhāvena patirūpato jhānupekkhāpi samavāhitameva antonītaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1390_1: katvā pavattatīti āha “samaṃ passatī”ti. Visadāyāti saṃkilesavigamena paribyattāya.
tika-vin01t1:1390_2: Vipulāyāti sātisayaṃ mahaggatabhāvappattito mahatiyā. Thāmagatāyāti pītivigamena
tika-vin01t1:1390_3: thirabhāvappattāya. Nanu cettha upekkhāvedanāva na sambhavati, tasmā kathamayaṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī
tika-vin01t1:1390_4: upekkhāya samannāgatattā “upekkhako”ti vuccatīti ce? Na kevalaṃ vedanupekkhāva upekkhāti
tika-vin01t1:1390_5: vuccati, atha kho aññāpi upekkhā vijjantīti dassento āha “upekkhā pana dasavidhā
tika-vin01t1:1390_6: hotī”tiādi. Tattha “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti
tika-vin01t1:1390_7: na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu
tika-vin01t1:1391: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ brahmavihārupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1392: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ bojjhaṅgupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1393: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā, ayaṃ vīriyupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1395_0: “Kati saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, kati saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
tika-vin01t1:1395_1: uppajjanti? Aṭṭha saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1396_1: nīvaraṇe paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, dutiyajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1396_2: vitakkavicāre paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, tatiyajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1396_3: pītiṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, catutthajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1396_4: sukhadukkhe paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1396_5: rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu
tika-vin01t1:1396_8: viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya
tika-vin01t1:1396_9: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, imā aṭṭha
tika-vin01t1:1397_1: uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1397_2: byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu
tika-vin01t1:1397_3: ñāṇaṃ, sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1397_4: paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggapaalābhatthāya…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1397_6: arahattamaggapaṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1397_7: nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā
tika-vin01t1:1397_8: santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, arahattaphalasamāpattatthāya…pe… suññatavihārasamāpattatthāya…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1397_9: animittavihārasamaāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ paṭisaṅkhā
tika-vin01t1:1397_10: santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, imā dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1398: Evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1399_0: Tattha nīvaraṇe paṭisaṅkhāti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahātabbabhāvena paṭisaṅkhāya, pariggahetvāti
tika-vin01t1:1399_1: attho. Santiṭṭhanāti nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānābhimukhībhūtattā tesaṃ pahānepi abyāpārabhāvūpagamanena
tika-vin01t1:1399_2: majjhattatāya santiṭṭhanā. Saṅkhārupekkhāsūti nīvaraṇappahāne byāpārākaraṇena nīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1399_3: saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanāsūti attho. Esa nayo vitakkavicārādīsu uppādādīsu ca. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1399_4: uppādanti purimakammapaccayā khandhānaṃ idha uppattimāha. Pavattanti tathāuppannassa
tika-vin01t1:1399_5: pavattiṃ. Nimittanti sabbampi tebhūmakaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ nimittabhāvena upaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin01t1:1399_6: Āyūhananti āyatiṃ paṭisandhihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ. Paṭisandhinti āyatiṃ upapattiṃ. Gatinti
tika-vin01t1:1399_7: yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti. Nibbattinti khandhānaṃ nibbattanaṃ. Upapattinti vipākappavattiṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1399_8: Jātinti jarādīnaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ bhavapaccayā jātiṃ. Jarāmaraṇādayo pākaṭā eva.
tika-vin01t1:1400_0: Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa visayavasena vuttā, sesā tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1400_1: vevacanavasena. Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1400_2: Gati upapatti cāti idaṃ dvayaṃ pavattassa, jarādayo nimittassāti veditabbaṃ. Nanu
tika-vin01t1:1400_3: cettha catūsu maggavāresu “uppāda”ntiādīni pañca mūlapadāni, “gatī”tiādīni dasa vevacanapadānīti
tika-vin01t1:1400_4: pannarasa padāni vuttāni, chasu pana phalasamāpattivāresu pañca mūlapadāneva vuttāni,
tika-vin01t1:1400_5: taṃ kasmāti ce? Saṅkhārupekkhāya tikkhabhāve sati kilesappahānasamatthassa maggassa
tika-vin01t1:1400_6: sabbhāvato tassā tikkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ vevacanapadehi saha daḷhaṃ katvā mūlapadāni
tika-vin01t1:1400_7: vuttāni, phalassa nirussāhabhāvena santasabhāvattā maggāyattattā ca mandabhūtāpi
tika-vin01t1:1400_8: saṅkhārupekkhā phalassa paccayo hotīti dassanatthaṃ mūlapadāneva vuttānīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t1:1401_1: aññataro vutto. “Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā”tiādīsu catūsu phalavāresu pana appaṇihitaphalasamāpatti
tika-vin01t1:1401_3: dvinnaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ visuṃ vuttattā. Aniccānupassanāvuṭṭhānavasena hi animittamaggo,
tika-vin01t1:1401_6: suttantanayena veditabbā. Evañca katvā suññatādivimokkhavasena magguppattihetubhūtā
tika-vin01t1:1401_8: dveti dasa saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanāpaññā vuttā, samathasaṅkhārupekkhā pana appanāvīthiyā
tika-vin01t1:1402: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaññitā upekkhā, ayaṃ vedanupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1403: Yā “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati, upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1404_0: Tattha yadatthi yaṃ bhūtanti khandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇena pajahati.
tika-vin01t1:1404_1: Upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatīti diṭṭhasovattikattayassa sappassa lakkhaṇavicinane viya diṭṭhalakkhaṇattayassa
tika-vin01t1:1405: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samappavattihetubhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1406: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā, ayaṃ jhānupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1407: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ pārisuddhupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1408_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā
tika-vin01t1:1408_1: ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti. Tena
tika-vin01t1:1408_2: tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo ekassapi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena
tika-vin01t1:1408_3: bhedo viya. Tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā, na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo. Yattha
tika-vin01t1:1408_4: vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā, na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā. Yathā cetāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1408_5: atthato ekībhāvo, evaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanupekkhānampi. Paññā eva hi sā kiccavasena
tika-vin01t1:1408_6: dvidhā bhinnā. Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t1:1408_7: pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu kho, no”ti avalokentassa
tika-vin01t1:1408_8: sovattikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa “sappo, na sappo”ti vicinane majjhattatā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1408_9: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane
tika-vin01t1:1408_10: majjhattatā uppajjati, ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā. Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadena
tika-vin01t1:1408_11: daṇḍena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kintāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca iminā aḍaṃsāpento
tika-vin01t1:1408_12: muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti, evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa
tika-vin01t1:1408_13: diṭṭhattā āditte viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā, ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā.
tika-vin01t1:1408_14: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti. Iminā panesā vicinanagahaṇesu
tika-vin01t1:1408_15: majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnā. Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca
tika-vin01t1:1409_0: Imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgo tattha tattha vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t1:1409_1: veditabboti dassento āha “evamayaṃ dasavidhāpī”tiādi. Tattha bhūmipuggalacittārammaṇatoti
tika-vin01t1:1409_7: saṅgahitā, itarā nava saṅkhārakkhandhenā”ti khandhasaṅgahavasena. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā
tika-vin01t1:1409_9: tāsu ekāya sati na itarā, tathā saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanupekkhāpi veditabbā, vedanāvīriyupekkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1409_10: ekakkhaṇe siyā uppattīti evaṃ ekakkhaṇavasena. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā abyākatā, brahmavihārupekkhā
tika-vin01t1:1409_11: kusalābyākatā, tathā sesā, vedanupekkhā pana siyā akusalāpīti evaṃ kusalattikavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1409_12: Dasapetā saṅkhepato cattārova dhammā vīriyavedanātatramajjhattatāñāṇavasenāti evaṃ saṅkhepavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1410_0: Idāni idhādhippetāya jhānupekkhāya lakkhaṇādiṃ niddhāretvā dassento āha “lakkhaṇādito
tika-vin01t1:1410_1: panā”tiādi. Tattha anābhogarasāti paṇītasukhepi tasmiṃ avanatipaṭipakkhakiccāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1410_2: Abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti satipi sukhapāramippattiyaṃ tasmiṃ sukhe abyāvaṭā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1410_3: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha abyāpāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti attho. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ khobhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1410_4: uppilavañca āvahantehi vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā aparibyattaṃ tattha tatramajjhattatāya
tika-vin01t1:1410_5: kiccaṃ, tadabhāvato idha paribyattanti āha “aparibyattakiccato”ti. Tenevāha “aparibyattaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1411_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha “vuccatī”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Saratīti iminā “sato”ti
tika-vin01t1:1411_1: padassa kattusādhanatamāha. Sampajānātīti sammadeva pajānāti. Puggalenāti puggalādhiṭṭhānena.
tika-vin01t1:1411_2: Saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti saraṇalakkhaṇā. Sammussanapaṭipakkho
tika-vin01t1:1411_3: asammussanaṃ kiccaṃ etissāti asammussanarasā. Kilesehi ārakkhā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1411_4: tato vā ārakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā. Asammuyhanaṃ sammadeva pajānanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1411_5: sammohapaṭipakkho vā asammoho lakkhaṇametassāti asammohalakkhaṇaṃ. Tīraṇaṃ kiccassa
tika-vin01t1:1411_6: pāragamanaṃ. Pavicayo vīmaṃsā. Kāmaṃ upacārajjhānādiṃ upādāya paṭhamadutiyajjhānānipi
tika-vin01t1:1411_7: sukhumāneva, imaṃ pana uparimajjhānaṃ upādāya “oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānāna”nti
tika-vin01t1:1411_8: vuttaṃ, sā ca oḷārikatā vitakkādithūlaṅgatāya veditabbā. Keci “bahucetasikatāyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1411_9: ca vadanti. Bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassāti purisassa bhūmiyaṃ gati viyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1411_10: Gati sukhā hotīti tesu jhānesu gati sukhā hoti. Abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccanti
tika-vin01t1:1411_11: “idaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ karīyatī”ti vattabbassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgappahānena
tika-vin01t1:1411_12: pana sukhumattāti ayamattho kāmaṃ dutiyajjhānepi sambhavati, tathāpi yebhuyyena avippayogībhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1411_13: vattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahānena sukhumatāya idha sātisayo
tika-vin01t1:1411_14: satipaññābyāpāroti vuttaṃ “purisassā”tiādi. Dhenuṃ pivatīti dhenupago, dhenuyā khīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1411_15: pivantoti vuttaṃ hoti. Punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyyāti hānabhāgiyaṃ jhānaṃ siyā, dutiyajjhānameva
tika-vin01t1:1411_16: sampajjeyyāti attho. Tenāha “pītisampayuttameva siyā”ti. Idañca atimadhuraṃ sukhanti
tika-vin01t1:1411_17: tatiyajjhāne sukhaṃ sandhāyāha, atimadhuratā cassa pahāsodagyasabhāvāya pītiyā abhāveneva
tika-vin01t1:1412_0: Sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesinti ettha kathamābhogena vinā sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāti āha
tika-vin01t1:1412_1: “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ, tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t1:1412_2: “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesi”nti āhāti yojetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho –
tika-vin01t1:1412_3: “sukhaṃ vedayāmī”ti evamābhoge asatipi nāmakāyena cetasikasukhaṃ, kāyikasukhaheturūpasamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-vin01t1:1412_4: kāyikasukhañca jhānasamaṅgī paṭisaṃvedetīti vuccatīti. Tassāti jhānasamaṅgino. Yaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1412_5: vā tanti yaṃ vā taṃ yathāvuttaṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānenāti tato
tika-vin01t1:1412_6: samuṭṭhitena atipaṇītena rūpena assa jhānasamaṅgino rūpakāyo yasmā phuṭo, tasmā etamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1412_7: dassentoti sambandhitabbaṃ. Yassāti rūpakāyassa. Phuṭattāti byāpitattāti attho. Yathā
tika-vin01t1:1412_8: hi udakena phuṭṭhasarīrassa tādise phoṭṭhabbe phuṭṭhe sukhaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ etehi
tika-vin01t1:1412_9: jhānacittasamuṭṭhitehi rūpehi phuṭṭhasarīrassa. Jhānā vuṭṭhitopīti jhānamhā vuṭṭhitopi.
tika-vin01t1:1412_11: uppannakāyaviññāṇena kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya. Etamatthanti vuttanayena cetasikakāyikasukhapaṭisaṃvedanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1413_0: Yanti hetuatthe nipāto, yasmāti attho. Tenāha “yaṃjhānahetū”ti. Ācikkhantītiādīni
tika-vin01t1:1413_1: padāni kittanatthānīti adhippāyenāha “pasaṃsantīti adhippāyo”ti. Kintīti pasaṃsanākārapucchā.
tika-vin01t1:1413_2: Sukhapāramippatteti sukhassa paramaṃ pariyantaṃ patte. Sukhābhisaṅgenāti sukhasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1413_3: ālayena. Edisesu ṭhānesu satiggahaṇeneva sampajaññampi gahitaṃ hotīti idha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1413_4: satiyā eva gahitattā evaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya satimā icceva vuttaṃ, sampajānoti heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1413_5: vuttattā vā. Asaṃkiliṭṭhanti kilesehi asammissattā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Jhānakkhaṇe nippariyāyato
tika-vin01t1:1413_6: cetasikasukhameva labbhatīti “sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatiyanti
tika-vin01t1:1416_0: “Pubbevā”ti vuttattā “kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hotī”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā āha “catunnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1416_1: jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe”ti. Evaṃ veditabbanti sambandho. Pahānakkamena avuttānanti
tika-vin01t1:1416_2: ettha pahānakkamo nāma pahāyakadhammānaṃ uppattipaṭipāṭi. Tena pana vuccamāne “dukkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1416_3: domanassaṃ sukhaṃ somanassa”nti vattabbaṃ siyā, kasmā ito aññathā vacananti āha “indriyavibhaṅge”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1417_0: Atha kasmā jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti sambandho. Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyanti
tika-vin01t1:1417_1: attano paccayehi uppannaṃ avikkhambhitaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ. Kattha ca aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti
tika-vin01t1:1417_2: nirodhaṭṭhānaṃ nirodhakāraṇaṃ pucchati. Tena katthāti pucchāya etthāti vissajjanepi
tika-vin01t1:1417_3: hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jhānānubhāvanimittañhi anuppajjantaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1417_4: aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti vuttaṃ. Atisayanirodho suṭṭhu pahānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhena vūpasamo.
tika-vin01t1:1417_5: Nirodho pahānamattaṃ. Nānāvajjaneti yena āvajjanena appanāvīthi, tato bhinnāvajjane
tika-vin01t1:1417_6: anekāvajjane vā. Appanāvīthiyañhi upacāro ekāvajjano, itaro anekāvajjano anekakkhattuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1417_7: pavattanato. Visamanisajjāya uppannakilamatho visamāsanupatāpo. Pītipharaṇenāti pītiyā
tika-vin01t1:1417_8: pharaṇarasattā pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin01t1:1417_9: “sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hotī”ti. Paṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīrassa sukhokkantakāyattā kuto
tika-vin01t1:1417_11: pi-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto, so “pahīnassā”ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo. Pahīnassapi
tika-vin01t1:1417_12: domanassindriyassāti idañca “siyā uppattī”ti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. Etanti domanassindriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1417_13: “Uppajjatī”ti iminā sambandho. “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi
tika-vin01t1:1417_14: kilami, cittampi ūhaññī”ti vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1417_16: Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha dutiyajjhānūpacāre assa pahīnassapi domanassindriyassa uppatti bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1418_0: Ettha ca yadeke vadanti “tatthassa siyā uppattīti vadantena jhānalābhīnampi domanassuppatti
tika-vin01t1:1418_1: atthīti dassitaṃ hoti, tena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvo lobho viya dosopi atthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1418_2: Na hi dosena vinā domanassaṃ pavattati, na cettha paṭṭhānapāḷiyā virodho cintetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1418_3: Yasmā tattha parihīnajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ domanassaṃ dassitaṃ, aparihīnajjhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1418_4: ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānassa domanassassa asambhavato jhānalābhīnaṃ sabbaso domanassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1418_5: nuppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattuṃ aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā, na heva
tika-vin01t1:1418_6: kho so parihīnajjhāno ahosī”ti, taṃ ayuttaṃ anīvaraṇasabhāvassa domanassassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1418_7: Yadi siyā, rūpārūpāvacarasattānampi uppajjeyya, na ca uppajjati. Tathā hi āruppe
tika-vin01t1:1418_9: byāpādakukkuccanīvaraṇāni anuddhaṭāni, na cettha anīvaraṇatāpariyāyo kāmacchandādīnampi
tika-vin01t1:1418_10: anīvaraṇānaṃyeva nīvaraṇasadisatāya nīvaraṇapariyāyassa vuttattā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1418_11: “aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā”ti, tampi akāraṇaṃ uppajjamānena ca domanassena
tika-vin01t1:1418_12: jhānato parihāyanato. Lahukena pana paccayena parihīnaṃ tādisā naṃ appakasireneva
tika-vin01t1:1418_13: paṭipākatikaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti idaṃ pana parikappanavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1418_14: upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa appahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “na tveva antoappanāya”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1418_15: Yadi pana tadā domanassaṃ uppajjeyya, paṭhamajjhānampissa parihīnamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1418_16: Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ. Nānāvajjanūpacāre
tika-vin01t1:1418_17: pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyya vāti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1418_18: dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha. Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito
tika-vin01t1:1418_19: pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti, evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe
tika-vin01t1:1418_20: dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1419_0: Samāharīti samānesi, saṅgahetvā abhāsīti attho. Sukhumāti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikattā
tika-vin01t1:1419_1: avibhūtatāya sukhumā, tato eva anuminitabbasabhāvattā dubbiññeyyā. Duṭṭhassāti duṭṭhapayogassa,
tika-vin01t1:1419_2: duddamassāti attho. Sakkā hoti esā gāhayitunti aññāpohananayena sakkā gāhayitunti
tika-vin01t1:1419_3: adhippāyo. Adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyāti idameva catutthaṃ jhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1419_5: hi tassā paccayā”ti. Dukkhappahānādayoti ca sopacārā paṭhamajjhānādayovettha adhippetā.
tika-vin01t1:1419_6: Pahīnāti vuttāti “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti vuttattā. Etāti
tika-vin01t1:1419_8: kāyikasukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo. “Sukhāya kho, āvuso visākha vedanāya, rāgānusayo
tika-vin01t1:1419_9: anusetī”ti vacanato āha “somanassaṃ rāgassa paccayo”ti. “Dukkhāya kho, āvuso visākha,
tika-vin01t1:1419_10: vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti vacanato vuttaṃ “domanassaṃ dosassa paccayo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1420_0: Adukkhamasukhanti ettha na dukkhanti adukkhaṃ, dukkhavidūraṃ. Yasmā tattha dukkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1420_1: natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “dukkhābhāvenā”ti. Asukhanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Etenāti dukkhasukhapaṭikkhepavacanena.
tika-vin01t1:1420_2: Paṭipakkhabhūtanti idaṃ idha tatiyavedanāya dukkhādīnaṃ samatikkamavasena pattabbattā
tika-vin01t1:1420_3: vuttaṃ, na kusalākusalānaṃ viya ujuvipaccanīkatāya. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇāti
tika-vin01t1:1420_5: anubhavanalakkhaṇā. Tato eva majjhattarasā. Avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānāti sukhadukkhāni
tika-vin01t1:1420_6: viya na vibhūtākārā piṭṭhipāsāṇe migagatamaggo viya tehi anumātabbāvibhūtākāropaṭṭhānā.
tika-vin01t1:1420_7: Sukhanirodho nāma idha catutthajjhānūpacāro, so padaṭṭhānaṃ etissāti sukhanirodhapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-vin01t1:1420_10: pārisuddhupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhāne sati sampahaṃsanapaññā viya suparisuddhā
tika-vin01t1:1420_11: suvisadā ca hotīti āha “satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā na aññenā”ti. Yadi tatramajjhattatā
tika-vin01t1:1420_12: idha “upekkhā”ti adhippetā, kathaṃ satiyeva pārisuddhāti vuttāti āha “na kevala”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1420_13: Satisīsenāti satiṃ uttamaṅgaṃ katvā, padhānaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1421_0: Evamapi kasmā idheva sati “upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha
tika-vin01t1:1421_1: kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu vijjamānāyapi tatramajjhattatāya
tika-vin01t1:1421_2: paccanīkābhibhavanato sahāyapaccayavekallato ca apārisuddhi, tathā taṃsampayuttānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1421_3: tadabhāvato idha pārisuddhīti imamatthaṃ upamāvasena dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1421_4: Sūriyappabhābhibhavāti sūriyappabhāya abhibhuyyamānattā. Atikkhatāya candalekhā viya
tika-vin01t1:1421_5: rattipi sommasabhāvā sabhāgāya rattiyameva ca candalekhā samujjalatīti sā tassā saṅgayhatīti
tika-vin01t1:1421_6: dassento “sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā”ti āha. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-vin01t1:1424_1: āha “cattāri jhānānī”ti. Yuttaṃ tāva cittekaggatā bhavokkamanatthatā viya vipassanāpādakatāpi
tika-vin01t1:1424_2: catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sādhāraṇāti tesaṃ vasena “cattāri jhānānī”ti vacanaṃ, abhiññāpādakatā
tika-vin01t1:1424_3: pana nirodhapādakatā ca catutthasseva jhānassa āveṇikā, sā kathaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1424_4: sādhāraṇā vuttāti? Paramparādhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānampi hi padaṭṭhānantveva
tika-vin01t1:1424_5: vuccati, kāraṇakāraṇampi kāraṇanti yathā “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddha”nti. Evañca katvā
tika-vin01t1:1424_6: payojananiddese aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Cittekaggatatthānīti ittasamādhatthāni,
tika-vin01t1:1424_8: vutto, sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1424_9: viharissāmā”ti. Bhavokkamanatthānīti bhavesu nibbattiatthāni. Sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1424_10: samāpajjanato āha “sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā”ti. Kasmā pana sattāhameva nirodhaṃ samāpajjantīti?
tika-vin01t1:1424_11: Tathākālaparicchedakaraṇato, tañca yebhuyyena āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ upādinnakappavattassa
tika-vin01t1:1425_0: Kā panāyaṃ nirodhasamāpatti nāma, ke taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjanti, kattha
tika-vin01t1:1425_1: samāpajjanti, kasmā samāpajjanti, kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ hotīti? Vuccate – tattha
tika-vin01t1:1425_2: kā panāyaṃ nirodhasamāpatti nāmāti yā anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1425_3: appavatti. Ke taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanasotāpannasakadāgāmino
tika-vin01t1:1425_4: sukkhavipassakā ca anāgāmiarahanto na samāpajjanti, aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pana anāgāmino
tika-vin01t1:1425_5: khīṇāsavā ca samāpajjanti. Kattha samāpajjantīti pañcavokārabhave. Kasmā? Anupubbasamāpattisabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1425_6: Catuvokārabhave pana paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ uppattiyeva natthi, tasmā na sakkā tattha
tika-vin01t1:1425_7: samāpajjituṃ. Kasmā samāpajjantīti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhede ukkaṇṭhitvā “diṭṭhadhamme
tika-vin01t1:1425_8: acittakā hutvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti. Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1425_10: nirodhayato evamassā samāpajjanaṃ hoti. Yo hi samathavaseneva ussakkati, so nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1425_11: patvā tiṭṭhati. Yopi vipassanāvaseneva ussakkati, so phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1425_12: Yo pana ubhayavaseneva ussakkitvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodheti, so taṃ samāpajjatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-vin01t1:1426_0: Ayaṃ pana vitthāro – idha bhikkhu nirodhaṃ samāpajjitukāmo paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-vin01t1:1426_1: vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. Vipassanā ca panesā
tika-vin01t1:1426_3: Tattha saṅkhārapariggaṇhanakavipassanā mandā vā tikkhā vā maggassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1426_5: pana nātimandanātitikkhā vaṭṭati, tasmā esa nātimandāya nātitikkhāya vipassanāya
tika-vin01t1:1426_6: te saṅkhāre vipassati. Tato dutiyajjhānaṃ…pe… tato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-vin01t1:1426_7: vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati. Atha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:1426_8: catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ saṅghapatimānanaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1427_0: Tattha nānābaddhaavikopananti yaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ na hoti, nānābaddhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1427_1: hutvā ṭhitaṃ pattacīvaraṃ vā mañcapīṭhaṃ vā nivāsagehaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin01t1:1427_2: parikkhārajātaṃ, taṃ yathā na vikuppati, aggiudakavātacoraundūrādīnaṃ vasena na vinassati,
tika-vin01t1:1427_3: evaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tatridaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṃ “idañcidañca imasmiṃ sattāhabbhantare
tika-vin01t1:1427_4: mā agginā jhāyatu, mā udakena vuyhatu, mā vātena viddhaṃsatu, mā corehi harīyatu,
tika-vin01t1:1427_5: mā undūrādīhi khajjatū”ti. Evaṃ adhiṭṭhite taṃ sattāhaṃ tassa na koci parissayo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1427_6: anadhiṭṭhahato pana aggiādīhi nassati, idaṃ nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana ekābaddhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1427_7: hoti nivāsanapārupanaṃ vā nisinnāsanaṃ vā, tattha visuṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1428_0: Saṅghapatimānananti bhikkhusaṅghassa patimānanaṃ udikkhanaṃ, yāva so bhikkhu āgacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1428_1: tāva saṅghakammassa akaraṇanti attho. Ettha ca patimānanaṃ etassa na pubbakiccaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1428_2: patimānanāvajjanaṃ pana pubbakiccaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ “sace mayi sattāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1428_3: nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne saṅgho apalokanakammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo
tika-vin01t1:1428_4: hoti, yāva maṃ koci bhikkhu āgantvā na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1428_5: katvā samāpanno hi tasmiṃ samaye vuṭṭhahatiyeva. Yo pana evaṃ na karoti, saṅgho ce
tika-vin01t1:1428_6: sannipatitvā taṃ apassanto “asuko bhikkhu kuhi”nti pucchitvā “nirodhaṃ samāpanno”ti
tika-vin01t1:1428_7: vutte kañci bhikkhuṃ peseti “taṃ pakkosāhī”ti, athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre
tika-vin01t1:1428_8: ṭhatvā “saṅgho taṃ āvuso patimānetī”ti vuttamatteyeva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Evaṃ garukā
tika-vin01t1:1428_9: hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma, tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā yathā paṭhamameva vuṭṭhāti, evaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1429: Satthupakkosananti idhāpi satthupakkosanāvajjanameva imassa pubbakiccaṃ, tasmā tampi evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1430_0: Addhānaparicchedoti jīvitaddhānassa paricchedo. Iminā bhikkhunā addhānaparicchedesu
tika-vin01t1:1430_1: kusalena bhavitabbaṃ, “attano āyusaṅkhārā sattāhaṃ pavattissanti na pavattissantī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1430_2: āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ. Sace hi sattāhabbhantare nirujjhanake āyusaṅkhāre anāvajjitvāva
tika-vin01t1:1430_3: samāpajjati, tassa nirodhasamāpatti maraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti, antonirodhe maraṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1430_4: natthitāya antarāva samāpattito vuṭṭhāti, tasmā etaṃ āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1430_5: Avasesañhi anāvajjitumpi vaṭṭati, idaṃ pana āvajjitabbamevāti vuttaṃ. So evaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1430_6: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1430_7: athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti, nirodhaṃ phusati. Kasmā panassa
tika-vin01t1:1430_8: dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari cittāni na pavattantīti? Nirodhassa payogattā. Idañhi imassa
tika-vin01t1:1430_9: bhikkhuno dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭhasamāpattiārohanaṃ anupubbanirodhassa
tika-vin01t1:1430_10: payogo, na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyāti nirodhassa payogattā dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1431_0: Yasmā bodhisattena bodhimaṇḍupasaṅkamanato pubbepi carimabhave catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattitapubbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1431_1: tadā pana taṃ nibbattitamattameva ahosi, na vipassanādipādakaṃ. Tasmā “bodhirukkhamūle
tika-vin01t1:1431_2: nibbattita”nti tato visesetvā vuttaṃ. Vipassanāpādakanti vipassanārambhe vipassanāya
tika-vin01t1:1431_3: pādakaṃ. Abhiññāpādakanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Buddhānañhi paṭhamārambhe eva pādakajjhānena
tika-vin01t1:1431_5: Abhisambodhisamadhigamato paṭṭhāya hi sabbaṃ ñāṇasamādhikiccaṃ ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddhamevāti.
tika-vin01t1:1431_7: ettha vipassanābhiññāpādakattā eva catutthassa jhānassa bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakatā
tika-vin01t1:1431_9: abhisambodhi, tadadhigamasamakālameva ca bhagavato sabbe buddhaguṇā hatthagatā ahesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1432_0: “Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsi”nti vatvā “so”ti vuttattā āha “so aha”nti. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1432_1: samāhiteti ettha evaṃ-saddo heṭṭhā jhānattayādhigamapaṭipāṭisiddhassa catutthajjhānasamādhānassa
tika-vin01t1:1432_3: tassa ca adhigamamaggassa nidassanaṃ, yena samādhānānukkamena catutthajjhānasamādhi
tika-vin01t1:1432_4: laddho, tadubhayanidassananti attho. Tenāha “iminā…pe… vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Tattha iminā
tika-vin01t1:1432_5: kamenāti iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena. Yadipi “eva”nti idaṃ āgamanasamādhinā
tika-vin01t1:1432_6: saddhiṃ catutthajjhānasamādhānaṃ dīpeti, satipārisuddhisamādhi eva pana iddhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1432_8: paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhānaṃ taṃsampayuttā
tika-vin01t1:1432_9: ca dhammā suparisuddhā suvisadā ca honti, satisīsena pana tattha desanā katāti āha
tika-vin01t1:1432_11: attho. Parisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1432_12: nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viyāti āha “parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte, pabhassareti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1433_0: Sukhādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ ghātenāti sukhasomanassānaṃ dukkhadomanassānañca yathākkamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1433_1: rāgadosapaccayānaṃ vikkhambhanena. “Sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa,
tika-vin01t1:1433_2: dukkhaṃ domanassassa paccayo, domanassaṃ dosassā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā rāgādayo cetaso
tika-vin01t1:1433_3: malāsucibhāvena “aṅgaṇānī”ti vuccanti, evaṃ upagantvā kilesanaṭṭhena upakkilesāti
tika-vin01t1:1433_4: āha “anaṅgaṇattā eva ca vigatupakkilese”ti. Tenāha “aṅgaṇena hi cittaṃ upakkilissatī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1433_5: vibādhīyati upatāpīyatīti attho. Subhāvitattāti paguṇabhāvāpādanena suṭṭhu bhāvitattā.
tika-vin01t1:1433_6: Tenāha “vasībhāvappatte”ti, āvajjanādinā pañcadhā cuddasavidhena vā paridamanena
tika-vin01t1:1433_7: vasaṃ vattituṃ upagateti attho. Vase vattamānañhi cittaṃ mudūti vuccatīti vase vattamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1433_8: cittaṃ paguṇabhāvāpattiyā suparimadditaṃ viya cammaṃ suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā
tika-vin01t1:1433_9: mudūti vuccati. Kammakkhameti vikubbanādiiddhikammakkhame. Tadubhayanti mudutākammaniyadvayaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1434_0: Nāhantiādīsu na-kāro paṭisedhattho. Ahanti satthā attānaṃ niddisati. Bhikkhaveti
tika-vin01t1:1434_1: bhikkhū ālapati. Aññanti idāni vuccamānacittato aññaṃ. Ekadhammampīti ekampi sabhāvadhammaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1434_2: Na samanupassāmīti sambandho. Ayañhettha attho – ahaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-vin01t1:1434_3: olokentopi aññaṃ ekadhammampi na samanupassāmi, yaṃ vasībhāvāpādanena bhāvitaṃ tathā
tika-vin01t1:1434_4: punappunaṃ karaṇena bahulīkataṃ evaṃ savisesamudubhāvappattiyā mudu kammakkhamatāya
tika-vin01t1:1434_5: kammaniyañca hoti yathā idaṃ cittanti. Idaṃ cittanti ca attano tesañca paccakkhatāya evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1435_0: Yathā yathāvuttā parisuddhatādayo na vigacchanti, evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ tattha avaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1435_1: idha “ṭhitaṃ āneñjappatta”nti ca vuttanti āha “etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā
tika-vin01t1:1435_2: ṭhite, ṭhitattāyeva āneñjappatte”ti. Yathā mudukammaññatā vasībhāvappattiyā lakkhīyati,
tika-vin01t1:1435_3: evaṃ vasībhāvappattipi mudukammaññatāhi lakkhīyatīti “mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano
tika-vin01t1:1435_4: vase ṭhitattā ṭhite”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi kāraṇena phalaṃ niddhārīyati, evaṃ phalenapi
tika-vin01t1:1435_5: kāraṇaṃ niddhārīyatīti niccalabhāvena avaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjappattiyā ca sampayuttadhammesu
tika-vin01t1:1435_6: thirabhāvena paṭipakkhehi akammaniyatāya ca sambhavataṃ saddhādibalānaṃ ānubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1436_0: Idāni saṅkhepato vuttamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “saddhāpariggahitaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1436_1: saddhāpariggahitanti evaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvappattaṃ cittaṃ ekaṃsena abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1436_2: dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ pavattāya saddhāya pariggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1436_4: hetunā. Na iñjatīti na calati na kampati, aññadatthu uparivisesāvahabhāveneva tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1436_5: Vīriyapariggahitantiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – vīriyapariggahitanti
tika-vin01t1:1436_7: bhāvanābahulīkāre asammosādikāya kusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānāya satiyā
tika-vin01t1:1436_8: upatthambhitaṃ. Samādhipariggahitanti tattheva avikkhepasādhanena samādhānena upatthambhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1436_9: Paññāpariggahitanti tassā eva bhāvanāya upakārānupakāradhammānaṃ pajānanalakkhaṇāya
tika-vin01t1:1436_10: paññāya upatthambhitaṃ. Obhāsagatanti ñāṇobhāsasahagataṃ. Obhāsabhūtena hi yathāvuttasamādhānasaṃvaddhitena
tika-vin01t1:1436_11: ñāṇena saṃkilesapakkhaṃ yāthāvato passanto tato utrāsanto ottappanto taṃ abhibhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1436_12: na tena abhibhuyyati. Tenāha “kilesandhakārena na iñjatī”ti. Etena ñāṇapariggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1436_14: parisuddhatā pariyodātatā anaṅgaṇatā vigatupakkilesatā mudubhāvo kammaniyatā āneñjappattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1436_15: ṭhitatāti imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Atha vā samāhitassa cittassa imāni aṅgānīti
tika-vin01t1:1436_16: “samāhite”ti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena aggahetvā ṭhitiāneñjappattiyo visuṃ gahetvā yathāvuttehi
tika-vin01t1:1436_17: aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatanti attho daṭṭhabbo. Abhinīhārakkhamanti iddhividhādiatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1437_0: Kāmaṃ nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā eva paṭhamajjhānasamadhigamo, vitakkādivūpasamā eva
tika-vin01t1:1437_1: ca dutiyajjhānādisamadhigamo, tathāpi na tathā te tehi dūrībhūtā, apetā vā yathā
tika-vin01t1:1437_3: suṭṭhu vimuttiyā tassa parisuddhipariyodātatā ca vuttāti āha “nīvaraṇa…pe… pariyodāte”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1437_5: pāṭhaṃ gahetvā “jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkāna”nti ayaṃ pāṭho paṭikkhitto. Vuttañhi tena –
tika-vin01t1:1438_1: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1438_2: ‘aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyā’tiādinayappavattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1438_3: mānamāyāsāṭheyyādīnaṃ. Abhijjhādīnanti ādi-saddenapi tesaṃyeva saṅgaho. Abhijjhā
tika-vin01t1:1438_4: cettha paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā mānādayo ca tadekaṭṭhā daṭṭhabbā jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānanti
tika-vin01t1:1438_5: anuvattamānattā. Vikkhambhaneyyā pana nīvaraṇaggahaṇena gahitā. Kathaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānena
tika-vin01t1:1438_6: avikkhambhaneyyā idha vigacchantīti? ‘Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalānaṃ paṭipakkhā’ti
tika-vin01t1:1438_7: sallekhapaṭipattivasena evaṃ vuttaṃ jhānassa aparāmaṭṭhabhāvadassanato. Ye panettha
tika-vin01t1:1438_10: pāṭhoti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ tathā pāṭhasseva abhāvato, jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkā
tika-vin01t1:1438_11: ca nīvaraṇā ceva tadekaṭṭhā ca, tesaṃ dūrībhāvaṃ vatvā puna tesaṃyeva abhāvavigamacodanāya
tika-vin01t1:1438_12: ayujjamānattā. Nanu ca anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttesu ayamattho labbhati oḷārikānaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:1438_13: pāpadhammānaṃ tattha adhippetattāti. Saccametaṃ, idha pana adhigatacatutthajjhānassa
tika-vin01t1:1438_14: vasena vuttattā sukhumāyeva te gahitā, aṅgaṇupakkilesatāsāmaññena panettha suttānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1438_15: apadisanaṃ. Tathā hi ‘suttānusārenā’ti vuttaṃ, na pana suttavasenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1439_0: Avassañcetamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ adhigatajjhānānampi kesañci icchāvacarānaṃ pavattisabbhāvatoti.
tika-vin01t1:1439_2: ayaṃ pāṭho paṭikkhitto. Mahāgaṇṭhipade visuddhimaggassa sīhaḷagaṇṭhipadepi ca “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti
tika-vin01t1:1439_3: imasseva pāṭhassa attho vutto, tasmā ayameva pāṭho gahetabbo, atthopi cettha yathāvuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t1:1439_4: veditabbo. Tena “icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1439_5: nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti attho”ti ayampi pāṭho ayuttoyevāti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1439_6: tatoyeva ca visuddhimagge ayaṃ pāṭho sabbena sabbaṃ na dassitoti.
tika-vin01t1:1440_1: Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti ito paraṃ kattabbassa abhāvavasena abhinīhārakkhamabhāvanāya
tika-vin01t1:1440_2: paripuṇṇattā. Paṇītabhāvūpagamanenāti tato eva padhānabhāvaṃ nītatāya uttamaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:1440_3: atittikaraṭṭhena ca paṇītabhāvassa upagamanena. Ubhayañcetaṃ bhāvanāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1440_4: paripuṇṇāya bhāvanāya paṇītabhāvappattiyā ṭhiteti. Āneñjappatteti idaṃ ṭhitiyā visesanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1440_5: Tenāha “yathā āneñjappattaṃ hoti, evaṃ ṭhite”ti. Imasmiṃ pakkhe “ṭhite āneñjappatte”ti
tika-vin01t1:1440_6: ubhayamekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “samāhite”ti pana idampi ekamaṅgaṃ. Tenevassa paṭhamavikappato
tika-vin01t1:1441_0: Pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, tassa vā anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati taṃnissayādipaccayabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1441_1: paṭicca uppajjanato. Pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tadatthāyāti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1441_2: vivaranto pubbenivāsaṃ tāva dassetvā tattha satiñāṇāni dassetuṃ “pubbenivāso”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1441_3: Tattha “pubbe”ti idaṃ padaṃ “ekampi jāti”ntiādivacanato atītabhavavisayaṃ idhādhippetanti
tika-vin01t1:1441_4: āha “atītajātīsū”ti. Nivāsasaddo kammasādhano, khandhavinimutto ca nivasitadhammo
tika-vin01t1:1441_5: natthīti āha “nivutthakkhandhā”ti. Nivutthatā cettha santāne pavattatā, tathābhūtā
tika-vin01t1:1441_6: ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā, tattha uppajjitvā vigatā ca hontīti āha “nivutthāti
tika-vin01t1:1441_7: ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā”ti. Evaṃ sasantatipariyāpannadhammavasena
tika-vin01t1:1441_8: nivāsasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni avisesena vattuṃ “nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1441_9: vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ “gocaranivāsenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gocarabhūtāpi hi gocarāsevanāya
tika-vin01t1:1441_10: āsevitā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anubhūtā nivutthā nāma honti. Te pana duvidhā saparaviññāṇagocaratāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1441_11: ubhayepi te dassetuṃ “attano”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “attano viññāṇena viññātā”ti vatvā
tika-vin01t1:1441_12: “paricchinnā”ti vacanaṃ ye te gocaranivāsena nivutthadhammā, na te kevalaṃ viññāṇena
tika-vin01t1:1441_13: viññātamattā, atha kho yathā pubbe nāmagottavaṇṇaliṅgāhārādīhi visesehi paricchedakārikāya
tika-vin01t1:1441_14: paññāya paricchijja gahitā, tathevetaṃ ñāṇaṃ paricchijja gaṇhātīti imassa atthassa
tika-vin01t1:1441_15: dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Paraviññāṇaviññātāpi vā nivutthāti sambandho. Na kevalaṃ attanova
tika-vin01t1:1441_16: viññāṇena, atha kho paresaṃ viññāṇena viññātāpīti attho. Idhāpi “paricchinnā”ti padaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1441_17: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ, paresampi vā viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnāti. Tassa ca gahaṇe
tika-vin01t1:1442_0: Te ca kho yasmā atītāsu eva jātīsu aññehi viññātā paricchinnā, te ca parinibbutāpi
tika-vin01t1:1442_1: honti, yehi te viññātā, tesaṃ tadā vattamānasantānānusārena tesampi atīte pavatti
tika-vin01t1:1442_2: viññāyatīti sikhāppattaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa visayabhūtaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1442_5: keci vadanti. Chinnavaṭumakā pana sabbeva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutā
tika-vin01t1:1442_6: chinnasaṃsāramaggattā, tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ nāma tesaṃ paṭipattiyā anussaraṇaṃ. Sā pana
tika-vin01t1:1442_7: paṭipatti saṅkhepato chaḷārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇāti tāni idha paraviññāṇaviññātaggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:1442_8: gahitāni. Tasmā purimāsu jātīsu attano viññāṇena aviññātānaṃ parinibbutānaṃ sabbesampi
tika-vin01t1:1442_10: panettha purimāsu jātīsu attano viññāṇena aviññātānaṃ aparinibbutānampi vattamānakkhandhapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin01t1:1442_11: agantvā sīhokkantikavasena anussaraṇaṃ gahitaṃ, ime pana yathāvuttachinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādayo
tika-vin01t1:1442_12: buddhānaṃyeva labbhanti. Na hi atīte buddhā bhagavanto evaṃ vipassiṃsu, evaṃ maggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1442_13: bhāvesuṃ, phalanibbānāni sacchākaṃsu, evaṃ veneyye vinesunti ettha sabbathā aññesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1442_14: ñāṇassa gati atthīti. Ye pana purimāsu jātīsu attanova viññāṇena viññātā, te parinibbutepi
tika-vin01t1:1442_15: khandhapaṭibaddhattā sāvakā anussarantiyeva. Yāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati,
tika-vin01t1:1442_16: sā pubbenivāsānussatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Abhinīharinti cittaṃ jhānārammaṇato
tika-vin01t1:1442_17: apanetvā pubbenivāsābhimukhaṃ pesesiṃ, pubbenivāsaninnaṃ pubbenivāsapoṇaṃ pubbenivāsapabbhāraṃ akāsinti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1443_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “abhininnāmesi”nti uttamapurisappayogattā “so”ti ettha ahaṃsaddo ānetvā vuccamāno
tika-vin01t1:1443_1: tadattho pākaṭo hotīti “so aha”nti vuttaṃ. Anekavidhanti nānābhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsādivasena
tika-vin01t1:1443_2: bahuvidhaṃ. Pakārehīti nāmagottādiākārehi saddhiṃ. Sahayoge cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1443_3: Pavattitanti desanāvasena pavattitaṃ. Tenāha “saṃvaṇṇita”nti, vitthāritanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1443_4: Nivāsanti antogadhabhedasāmaññavacanametanti te bhede byāpanicchāvasena saṅgahetvā
tika-vin01t1:1443_5: dassento “tattha tattha nivutthasantāna”nti āha. Anugantvā anugantvāti ñāṇagatiyā
tika-vin01t1:1443_6: anugantvā anugantvā. Anudevāti anu eva, da-kāro padasandhivasena āgato. “Abhininnāmesi”nti
tika-vin01t1:1443_8: dīpetīti āha “citte abhininnāmitamatte eva sarāmīti dassetī”ti. Parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1443_9: siyāti “pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritukāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
tika-vin01t1:1443_10: rahogatena paṭisallīnena paṭipāṭiyā cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānato
tika-vin01t1:1443_11: vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchimā nisajjā āvajjitabbā”ti evamādinā pubbenivāsañāṇassa parikammabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1444_1: Ekampi jātinti ekampi bhavaṃ. So hi ekakammanibbatto ādānanikkhepaparicchinno antogadhadhammappabhedo
tika-vin01t1:1444_2: khandhappabandho idha “jātī”ti adhippeto jāyatīti jātīti katvā. Tenāha “ekampi…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1444_3: khandhasantāna”nti. Parihāyamānoti khīyamāno vinassamāno. Kappoti asaṅkhyeyyakappo.
tika-vin01t1:1444_4: So pana atthato kālo, tadā pavattamānasaṅkhāravasenassa parihāni veditabbā. Vaḍḍhamāno
tika-vin01t1:1444_5: vivaṭṭakappoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yo pana “kālaṃ khepeti, kālo ghasati bhūtāni,
tika-vin01t1:1444_6: sabbāneva sahattanā”ti ādīsu kālassapi khayo vuccati, so idha nādhippeto aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin01t1:1444_7: Saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vinassanaṃ saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭato uddhaṃ tathāṭhāyī saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Tammūlakattāti
tika-vin01t1:1444_8: taṃpubbakattā. Vivaṭṭanaṃ nibbattanaṃ, vaḍḍhanaṃ vā vivaṭṭo.
tika-vin01t1:1445_0: Tejena saṃvaṭṭo tejosaṃvaṭṭo. Saṃvaṭṭasīmāti saṃvaṭṭanamariyādā. Saṃvaṭṭatīti vinassati.
tika-vin01t1:1445_1: Sadāti sabbakālaṃ, tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesūti attho. Ekaṃ buddhakkhettanti idha yaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1445_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ “buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1445_3: Yattake ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇādiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito saraseneva
tika-vin01t1:1445_4: parijambhati, taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakkhettaṃ nāmāti āha “jātikkhettaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1445_5: dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyanta”nti. Ānubhāvo pavattatīti idha iddhimā cetovasippatto
tika-vin01t1:1445_6: āṇākkhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā attano atthāya parittaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:1445_7: tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto eva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Atha vā tattha
tika-vin01t1:1445_8: ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākkhette sabbasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1445_9: abhisambhuṇātveva parittānubhāvo tattha devatāhi parittānaṃ sampaṭicchitabbatoti
tika-vin01t1:1445_10: vuttaṃ “ānubhāvo pavattatī”ti. Yaṃ yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyāti vuttanti yaṃ visayakkhettaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1445_11: sandhāya ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe sarena abhiviññāpanaṃ attano rūpadassanañca paṭijānantena
tika-vin01t1:1445_12: bhagavatā “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Yatthāti yasmiṃ padese anantāparimāṇe
tika-vin01t1:1445_13: visayakkhette. Yaṃ yaṃ ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ anussaratīti ākaṅkhamattapaṭibaddhavuttitāya
tika-vin01t1:1445_14: buddhañāṇassa yaṃ yaṃ anussarituṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ anussarati. Ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassatīti
tika-vin01t1:1445_15: iminā tiriyato saṃvaṭṭamānaparicchedo vutto. Saṇṭhahantanti vivaṭṭamānaṃ jāyamānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1445_16: Tassa vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca visuddhimagge vuttanti amhehipi heṭṭhā “lokavidū”ti
tika-vin01t1:1445_17: imassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanādhikāre pasaṅgato vuttattā idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1446_0: Evaṃ pasaṅgena saṃvaṭṭādike pakāsetvā idāni yathādhigataṃ tesaṃ anussaraṇākāraṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1446_1: “ye panete saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭā vuttā”tiādimāha. Tattha etesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappasamudāyato
tika-vin01t1:1446_2: anekesaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappādīnaṃ niddhāriyamānattā. Amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappeti ettha vā-saddo
tika-vin01t1:1446_3: luttaniddiṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. Tena ca aniyamatthena itarāsaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānampi saṅgaho
tika-vin01t1:1446_4: siddhoti. Atha vā amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappeti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappassa ādito pāḷiyaṃ gahitattā
tika-vin01t1:1446_5: vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi hi imassa katipayakālaṃ bhavādīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ upalabbhatīti. Saṃvaṭṭakappe
tika-vin01t1:1446_6: vā vattamāne yesu bhavādīsu imassa upapatti ahosi, taṃdassanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhave
tika-vin01t1:1446_7: vātiādīsu kāmādibhave vā aṇḍajādiyoniyā vā devādigatiyā vā nānattakāyanānattasaññīādiviññāṇaṭṭhitiyā
tika-vin01t1:1446_8: vā sattāvāse vā khattiyādisattanikāye vā. Yasmā idaṃ bhagavato vasena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1446_9: āgataṃ, tasmā tasseva nāmādivasena atthaṃ yojetvā dassento āha “evaṃnāmoti vessantaro
tika-vin01t1:1446_10: vā jotipālo vā”tiādi. Sālimaṃsodanāhāro vāti gihikālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pavattaphalabhojano
tika-vin01t1:1446_11: vāti tāpasādikālaṃ sandhāya. Pavattaphalabhojanoti sayampatitaphalāhāro. Sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānanti
tika-vin01t1:1446_12: ettha sāmisā gehassitasomanassādayo, nirāmisā nekkhammassitasomanassādayo. Ādi-saddena
tika-vin01t1:1447_0: Heṭṭhā sāmaññato vuttamevatthaṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo “atha vā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1447_1: amutrāsinti sāmaññaniddesoyaṃ, byāpanicchālopo vā, amutra amutra āsinti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1447_2: Anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇanti ettha ārohantassāti paṭilomato
tika-vin01t1:1447_3: ñāṇena pubbenivāsaṃ ārohantassa. Paṭinivattantassāti pubbenivāsaṃ anussaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:1447_4: yāvadicchakaṃ gantvā paccāgacchantassa. Paccavekkhaṇanti anussaritānussaritassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1447_5: Tasmāti vuttassevatthassa kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasanaṃ, paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇabhāvatoti
tika-vin01t1:1447_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Idhūpapattiyāti idha carimabhave upapattiyā. Anantaranti atītānantaramāha.
tika-vin01t1:1447_7: Amutrāti amukasmiṃ bhaveti attho. Udapādinti uppajjiṃ. Tāhi devatāhīti tusitadevatāhi.
tika-vin01t1:1447_8: Ekagottoti tusitagottena ekagotto. Mahābodhisattānaṃ santānassa pariyosānāvatthāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1447_9: devalokūpapattijanakaṃ nāma akusalena kammunā anupaddutameva hotīti adhippāyena “dukkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1447_10: pana saṅkhāradukkhamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāpuññānampi pana devaputtānaṃ pubbanimittuppattikālādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1447_11: aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogo hotiyevāti “kadāci dukkhadukkhassapi sambhavo natthī”ti na
tika-vin01t1:1447_12: sakkā vattuṃ, dhammānaṃ uppādanirodhasaṅkhāradukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Sattapaññāsa…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1447_13: pariyantoti idaṃ manussavassagaṇanāvasena vuttaṃ. Tattha devānaṃ vassagaṇanāya pana catusahassameva.
tika-vin01t1:1448_0: Itīti vuttatthanidassanametaṃ, tañca kho yathārahato, na yathānupubbatoti dassento
tika-vin01t1:1448_1: “nāmagottavasenā”tiādimāha. Uddisīyatīti disvāva aviññeyyattā “ayaṃ ko nāmo”ti pucchite
tika-vin01t1:1448_3: Sāmotīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena evamādievaṃpakāranānattatoti
tika-vin01t1:1448_4: dassitaṃ hoti. Nāmagottaṃ uddesoti uddisīyati satto etenāti uddeso nāmagottaṃ. Itare
tika-vin01t1:1448_5: ākārāti ākarīyati disvāva satto viññāyati etehīti itare vaṇṇādayo ākārā. “No ca kho
tika-vin01t1:1448_6: avisesenā”ti saṅkhepato vuttamevatthaṃ vitthārena dassento āha “titthiyā hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1448_7: Tattha titthiyāti aññatitthiyā. Te pana kammavādino kiriyavādino tāpasādayo. Yasmā
tika-vin01t1:1448_8: titthiyānaṃ brahmajālādīsu cattālīsāya eva saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1448_9: tasmā “na tato para”nti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanto “dubbalapaññattā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1448_10: Tena vipassanābhiyogo pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa visesakāraṇanti dasseti. Tatoyeva
tika-vin01t1:1448_11: ca balavapaññattā ṭhapetvā aggasāvakamahāsāvake itare pakatisāvakā kappasatampi kappasahassampi
tika-vin01t1:1448_12: anussarantiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “pakatisāvakā kappasatampi
tika-vin01t1:1448_13: kappasahassampi anussarantiyeva balavapaññattā”ti. Ettako hi tesaṃ abhinīhāroti kappānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1448_14: satasahassampi tadadhikaṃ ekaṃ dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānīti kālavasena evaṃparimāṇo yathākkamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1448_16: siddhā. Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhavo,
tika-vin01t1:1448_17: evaṃ sante buddhānampissa paricchedatā āpannāti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1448_18: “Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya buddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1448_19: abhiññāñāṇānampi savisaye paricchedo nāma natthīti tattha yaṃ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1448_20: taṃ taṃ jānanti eva. Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede kāraṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā
tika-vin01t1:1448_21: sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ paññāpāramitāya pavattiānubhāvassa paricchedo nāma
tika-vin01t1:1448_22: natthi, kuto taṃnibbattānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1448_23: Atīte “ettakānaṃ kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti evaṃ kālaparicchedo natthi anāgate anāgataṃsañāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1449_0: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ janānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ kālavibhāgato dassetvā idāni ārammaṇaggahaṇavasenassa
tika-vin01t1:1449_1: pavattivisesaṃ dassento “titthiyā cā”tiādimāha. Khandhapaṭipāṭimeva sarantīti ettha
tika-vin01t1:1449_2: khandhapaṭipāṭi khandhānaṃ anukkamo, sā ca kho cutito paṭṭhāya uppaṭipāṭivasena.
tika-vin01t1:1449_3: Keci panettha “iriyāpathapaṭipāṭi khandhapaṭipāṭī”ti vadanti. Vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekato
tika-vin01t1:1449_4: vibhāvento āha “paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā”tiādi. Tattha cutipaṭisandhivasenāti attano parassa
tika-vin01t1:1449_5: vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve cutiṃ disvā antarā kiñci anāmasitvā paṭisandhiyā eva gahaṇavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1449_6: Yathā pana andhā yaṭṭhiṃ amuñcitvā gacchanti, evaṃ te khandhapaṭipāṭiṃ amuñcitvāva
tika-vin01t1:1449_7: sarantīti āha “tesañhi andhānaṃ viya icchitappadesokkamanaṃ natthī”ti. Sāvakāti pakatisāvakāpi
tika-vin01t1:1449_8: mahāsāvakāpi aggasāvakāpi sāmaññato vuttā. Pakatisāvakāpi hi khandhapaṭipāṭiyāpi
tika-vin01t1:1449_9: anussaranti, cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamanti balavapaññattā, tathā asītimahāsāvakā.
tika-vin01t1:1449_10: Dvinnaṃ pana aggasāvakānaṃ khandhapaṭipāṭikiccaṃ natthi. Ekassa attabhāvassa cutiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1449_11: disvā paṭisandhiṃ passanti, puna aparassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhinti evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasenapi
tika-vin01t1:1449_12: saṅkamantā gacchanti. Yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ caturatanike
tika-vin01t1:1449_13: gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ. Siyā pana
tika-vin01t1:1449_14: tassa sukhumataratirokuṭṭādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā, na tveva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1449_15: icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā, atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1449_16: viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti, tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa suppahīnattāti āha “buddhā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1450_0: Tattha sīhokkantavasenāti sīhagatipatanavasena. Yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākaṅkhantīti yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1450_1: kappe yasmiṃ bhave yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ jānituṃ icchanti. Taṃ sabbaṃ sarantiyevāti ñātuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1450_2: icchitaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ sarantiyeva, na na saranti. Buddhānañhi neva khandhapaṭipāṭikiccaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1450_3: na ca cutipaṭisandhivasena saṅkamanakiccaṃ atthi. Tesañhi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1450_4: vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchanti, taṃ taṃ pākaṭameva hoti. Tasmā yathā peyyālapāḷiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1450_5: paṭhantā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… pañcamaṃ jhāna”ntiādipariyosānameva gaṇhantā saṅkhipitvā
tika-vin01t1:1450_6: sajjhāyanti, na anupadaṃ, evaṃ anekāpi kappakoṭiyo peyyālapāḷiṃ viya saṅkhipitvā
tika-vin01t1:1450_7: yaṃ yaṃ icchanti, tattha tattheva ñāṇena okkamantā sīhokkantavasena gacchanti. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1450_8: gacchantānañca tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ yathā nāma katavālavedhiparicayassa sarabhaṅgasadisassa
tika-vin01t1:1450_9: dhanuggahassa khitto saro antarantarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkheyeva patati
tika-vin01t1:1450_10: na sajjati na virajjhati, evaṃ antarantarāsu jātīsu na sajjati na virajjhati, asajjamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1451_0: Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhanāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsantveva saṅgahitānīti
tika-vin01t1:1451_1: āha “kiṃ viditaṃ karoti? Pubbenivāsa”nti. Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo viya tamoti
tika-vin01t1:1451_2: āha “sveva moho”tiādi. Obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhenāti kātabbato karaṇaṃ, obhāsova karaṇaṃ obhāsakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1451_3: attano paccayehi obhāsabhāvena nibbattetabbaṭṭhenāti attho. Sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacananti
tika-vin01t1:1451_4: paṭipakkhavidhamanapavattivisesānaṃ bodhanato vuttaṃ. Avijjā vihatāti etena vijānanaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:1451_5: vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannāti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā
tika-vin01t1:1451_6: avijjā, paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1451_7: Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvayeti iminā tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā? Yasmā āloko uppannoti
tika-vin01t1:1451_8: imamatthaṃ atidisati. Kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ ātāpoti āha “vīriyātāpena
tika-vin01t1:1451_9: ātāpino”ti, vīriyavatoti attho. Pesitacittassāti yathādhippetatthasiddhiṃ pativissaṭṭhacittassa.
tika-vin01t1:1451_10: Yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti aññassapi kassaci mādisassāti
tika-vin01t1:1451_11: adhippāyo. Padhānānuyogassāti sammappadhānamanuyuttassa. Sesamettha uttānattā vuttanayattā ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin01t1:1454_0: 13. Cutiyāti cavane. Upapāteti upapajjane. Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, cutikkhaṇasāmantā
tika-vin01t1:1454_1: upapattikkhaṇasāmantā cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati “ye pana āsannacutikā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1454_2: Yena ñāṇenāti yena dibbacakkhuñāṇena. Dibbacakkhuñāṇeneva hi sattānaṃ cuti ca upapatti
tika-vin01t1:1454_3: ca ñāyati. Parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti “dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena ādikammikena
tika-vin01t1:1454_4: kulaputtena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:1454_5: tejokasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇanti imesu tīsu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ āsannaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1454_6: upacārajjhānagocaraṃ katvā vaḍḍhetvā ṭhapetabba”ntiādinā dibbacakkhuñāṇassa parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1455_0: So ahanti so katacittābhinīhāro ahaṃ. Dibbasadisattāti divi bhavanti dibbaṃ, devānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1455_1: pasādacakkhu, tena dibbena cakkhunā sadisattāti attho. Dibbasadisattāti ca hīnūpamādassanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1455_2: devatānaṃ dibbacakkhutopi imassa mahānubhāvattā. Idāni taṃ dibbasadisattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1455_4: suṭṭhu caritattā sucaritena devūpapattijanakena puññakammena nibbattaṃ. Pittasemharuhirādīhīti
tika-vin01t1:1455_5: ādi-saddena vātarogādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Apalibuddhanti anupaddutaṃ. Pittādīhi anupaddutattā
tika-vin01t1:1455_6: kammassa ca uḷāratāya upakkilesavimutti veditabbā. Upakkilesadosarahitañhi kammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1455_7: tiṇādidosarahitaṃ viya sassaṃ uḷāraphalaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti. Kāraṇūpacārena cassa
tika-vin01t1:1455_8: phalaṃ tathā voharīyati yathā “sukkaṃ sukkavipāka”nti. Dūrepīti pi-saddena sukhumassapi
tika-vin01t1:1455_9: ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchanasamatthataṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pasādacakkhūti catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1455_11: sabbāpi kusalabhāvanā vīriyabhāvanā, padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatā vā iddhipādabhāvanā
tika-vin01t1:1455_12: visesato vīriyabhāvanā, tassā ānubhāvena nibbattaṃ vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ. Ñāṇamayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1455_13: cakkhu ñāṇacakkhu. Tādisamevāti upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi sukhumassapi ārammaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1456_0: Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattāti dibbavihārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t1:1456_1: paṭiladdhattā. Iminā kāraṇavasenassa dibbabhāvamāha. Dibbavihārasannissitattāti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena
tika-vin01t1:1456_2: ukkaṃsagataṃ pādakajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ dibbavihāraṃ sannissāya pavattattā, dibbavihārapariyāpannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1456_3: vā attanā sampayuttaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nissāya paccayabhūtaṃ sannissitattāti
tika-vin01t1:1456_4: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbanti kasiṇālokānuggahena
tika-vin01t1:1456_5: pattabbattā sayaṃ ñāṇālokapharaṇabhāvena ca mahājutikabhāvatopi dibbanti attho. Mahājutikampi
tika-vin01t1:1456_6: hi dibbanti vuccati “dibbamidaṃ byamha”ntiādīsu. Mahāgatikattāti mahanīyagamanattā,
tika-vin01t1:1456_7: vimhayanīyappavattikattāti attho. Vimhayanīyā hissa pavatti tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanato.
tika-vin01t1:1456_8: Taṃ sabbanti “heṭṭhā vuttaṃ atthapañcakamapekkhitvā vutta”nti vadanti. Keci pana
tika-vin01t1:1456_10: idameva dvayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā ‘saddasatthānusārena veditabba’nti idaṃ dibbati
tika-vin01t1:1456_11: jotayatīti dibbaṃ, dibbati gacchati asajjamānaṃ pavattatīti dibbanti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1457_1: vijayicchā nāma hoti, dibbacakkhulābhī ca iddhimā devatānaṃ vacanagahaṇakkhamanadhammadānavasena
tika-vin01t1:1457_2: mahāmoggallānattherādayo viya dānaggahaṇalakkhaṇe vohāre ca pavatteyyāti evaṃ vihāravijayicchāvohārajutigatisaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1457_3: atthānaṃ vasena imassa abhiññāñāṇassa dibbacakkhubhāvasiddhito saddavidū ca tesu
tika-vin01t1:1457_4: eva atthesu divusaddaṃ icchantīti ‘taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabba’nti vutta”nti –
tika-vin01t1:1459_0: Dassanaṭṭhenāti rūpadassanabhāvena. Cakkhunā hi sattā rūpaṃ passanti. Yathā maṃsacakkhu
tika-vin01t1:1459_1: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati, na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:1459_2: sayameva tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti āha “cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi
tika-vin01t1:1459_3: cakkhū”ti. Diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yo hī”tiādi
tika-vin01t1:1459_4: vuttaṃ. Ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti parato uppattiyā adassanato “etthe vāyaṃ satto ucchinno,
tika-vin01t1:1459_5: evamitarepī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti jhānalābhī
tika-vin01t1:1459_6: adhiccasamuppanniko viya gaṇhāti. Yathā hi so asaññasattā cavitvā idhūpapanno pabbajito
tika-vin01t1:1459_7: samāno abhiññālābhī hutvā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto idhūpapattimeva disvā tato paraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1459_8: asaññabhave uppattiṃ anussaritumasakkonto “ahaṃ adhiccasamuppanno pubbe nāhosiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1459_9: somhi etarahi ahutvā sattatāya pariṇato, sesāpi sattā tādisāyevā”ti abhinavasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1459_10: gaṇhāti, evamayampi upapātamattameva disvā cutiṃ apassanto navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1460_0: Idāni aññathāpi visuddhikāraṇaṃ dassento āha “ekādasaupakkilesavirahato vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1460_1: Yathāhāti upakkilesasutte āgatapāḷiṃ nidasseti. Tattha hi anuruddho nandiyo kimiloti
tika-vin01t1:1460_2: ime tayo kulaputte āmantetvā dhammaṃ dassentena “anuruddhā tumhe kiṃ imehi na āluḷissanti,
tika-vin01t1:1460_3: ahampi imehi upādāya ekādasahi upakkilesehi āluḷitapubbo”ti dassetuṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1461_0: “Ahampi sudaṃ anuruddhā pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno obhāsañceva
tika-vin01t1:1461_1: sañjānāmi dassanañca rūpānaṃ, so kho pana me obhāso na cirasseva antaradhāyati dassanañca
tika-vin01t1:1461_2: rūpānaṃ. Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo, yena me obhāso
tika-vin01t1:1461_3: antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpāna’nti. Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘vicikicchā
tika-vin01t1:1461_4: kho me udapādi, vicikicchādhikaraṇañca me samādhi cavi, samādhimhi cute obhāso antaradhāyati
tika-vin01t1:1461_5: dassanañca rūpānaṃ, sohaṃ tathā karissāmi, yathā me puna na vicikicchā uppajjissatī’ti.
tika-vin01t1:1462_0: “So kho ahaṃ anuruddhā appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi
tika-vin01t1:1462_1: dassanañca rūpānaṃ, so kho pana me obhāso na cirasseva antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1462_2: Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo, yena me obhāso antaradhāyati
tika-vin01t1:1462_3: dassanañca rūpāna’nti. Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘amanasikāro kho me udapādi,
tika-vin01t1:1462_4: amanasikārādhikaraṇañca pana me samādhi cavi, samādhimhi cute obhāso antaradhāyati
tika-vin01t1:1462_5: dassanañca rūpānaṃ, sohaṃ tathā karissāmi, yathā me puna na vicikicchā uppajjissati
tika-vin01t1:1463: Ādinā desanaṃ ārabhitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ “so kho ahaṃ anuruddhā vicikicchā cittassa upakkilesoti iti viditvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1464_0: Tattha vicikicchāti mahāsattassa ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni
tika-vin01t1:1464_1: passantassa “idaṃ nu kho ki”nti uppannā vicikicchā. Manasikāravasena pana me rūpāni
tika-vin01t1:1464_2: upaṭṭhahiṃsu, rūpāni passato vicikicchā uppajjati, tasmā idāni kiñci na manasi karissāmīti
tika-vin01t1:1464_3: tuṇhī bhavati, taṃ tuṇhībhāvappattiṃ sandhāyāha “amanasikāro”ti. Thinamiddhanti kiñci
tika-vin01t1:1464_4: amanasikarontassa uppannaṃ thinamiddhaṃ. Tathābhūtassa hi savipphārikamanasikārassa
tika-vin01t1:1464_5: abhāvato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. Chambhitattanti thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā yathāraddhamanasikāravasena
tika-vin01t1:1464_6: himavantābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dānavarakkhasaajagarādayo passantassa uppannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1464_7: chambhitattaṃ. Uppilanti “mayā diṭṭhabhayaṃ pakatiyā cakkhuviññāṇena olokiyamānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1464_8: na passati, adiṭṭhe parikappitasadise kiṃnāma bhaya”nti bhayassa vinodanavasena cintentassa
tika-vin01t1:1464_9: attano paccavekkhaṇākosallaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ uppilāvitattaṃ. Duṭṭhullanti kāyālasiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1464_10: “Mayā thinamiddhaṃ chambhitattānaṃ vūpasamanatthaṃ gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ paggahitaṃ, tena
tika-vin01t1:1464_11: me uppilasaṅkhātā cittasamādhidūsitā gehassitā balavapīti uppannā”ti vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1464_12: karontassa hi kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ kāyadaratho kāyālasiyaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin01t1:1465_0: Accāraddhavīriyanti “mama vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karoto duṭṭhullaṃ uppanna”nti puna vīriyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1465_1: paggaṇhato uppannaṃ accāraddhavīriyaṃ. Atilīnavīriyanti “mama vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato
tika-vin01t1:1465_2: evaṃ jāta”nti puna vīriyaṃ sithilayato uppannaṃ atilīnavīriyaṃ. Abhijappāti devalokābhimukhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1465_3: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devasaṅghaṃ passato uppannā taṇhā. “Evaṃ me hotū”ti hi abhinivisanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1465_4: jappatīti abhijappā, taṇhā. Nānattasaññāti “mayhaṃ ekajātikaṃ rūpaṃ manasikarontassa
tika-vin01t1:1465_5: abhijappā uppannā, nānāvidhaṃ rūpaṃ manasikāraṃ karissāmī”ti kālena devalokābhimukhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1465_6: kālena manussalokābhimukhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasikaroto uppannā nānattasaññā,
tika-vin01t1:1465_7: nānatte nānāsabhāve saññāti nānattasaññā. Atinijjhāyitattanti “mayhaṃ nānāvidhāni
tika-vin01t1:1465_8: rūpāni manasikarontassa nānattasaññā udapādi, iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ vā ekajātikameva
tika-vin01t1:1465_9: rūpaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti tathā manasikaroto uppannaṃ rūpānaṃ atinijjhāyitattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1465_10: ativiya uttari katvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ atinijjhāyitattaṃ. Obhāsanti parikammasamuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1465_11: obhāsaṃ. Na ca rūpāni passāmīti parikammobhāsamanasikārappasutatāya dibbacakkhunā
tika-vin01t1:1465_12: rūpāni na passāmi. Rūpāni hi kho passāmīti tena parikammobhāsena pharitvā ṭhitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:1467_0: “Kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divaṃ kevalampi rattindivaṃ tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi
tika-vin01t1:1467_1: ‘ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo, yvāhaṃ obhāsañhi kho sañjānāmi, na ca rūpāni passāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1467_2: rūpāni kho passāmi, na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divaṃ kevalampi
tika-vin01t1:1467_3: rattindiva’nti. Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘yasmiñhi kho ahaṃ samaye rūpanimittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1467_4: amanasikaritvā obhāsanimittaṃ manasi karomi. Obhāsañhi kho tasmiṃ samaye sañjānāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1467_5: na ca rūpāni passāmi. Yasmiṃ panāhaṃ samaye obhāsanimittaṃ amanasikaritvā rūpanimittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1467_6: manasi karomi. Rūpāni hi kho tasmiṃ samaye passāmi, na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi kevalampi
tika-vin01t1:1469_0: Manussānaṃ idanti mānusakaṃ, manussānaṃ gocarabhūtaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ. Tadaññassa pana
tika-vin01t1:1469_1: dibbatirokuṭṭasukhumādibhedassa rūpassa dassanato atikkantamānusakaṃ. Evarūpaṃ tañca
tika-vin01t1:1469_2: manussūpacāraṃ atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1469_3: Tattha manussūpacāranti manussehi upacaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pakatiyā cakkhudvārena gahetabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1469_4: visayanti adhippāyo. Evaṃ visayamukhena dassetvā idāni visayimukhena dassetuṃ “mānusakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1469_5: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi maṃsacakkhātikkamo tassa kiccātikkameneva daṭṭhabbo. Dibbena
tika-vin01t1:1469_6: cakkhunāti dibbacakkhuñāṇenapi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā khaṇassa atiittaratāya atisukhumatāya
tika-vin01t1:1469_7: kesañci rūpassa, apica dibbacakkhussa paccuppannaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tañca purejātapaccayabhūtaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1469_8: na ca āvajjanaparikammehi vinā mahaggatassa pavatti atthi, nāpi uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1469_9: ārammaṇapaccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, bhijjamānaṃ vā, tasmā cutūpapātakkhaṇe rūpaṃ dibbacakkhunā
tika-vin01t1:1470_0: Yadi dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇameva, atha kasmā “satte passāmī”ti vuttanti? Yebhuyyena
tika-vin01t1:1470_1: sattasantānagatarūpadassanato evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattagahaṇassa vā kāraṇabhāvato vohāravasena
tika-vin01t1:1470_2: vuttantipi vadanti. Te cavamānāti adhippetāti sambandho. Evarūpeti na cutūpapātakkhaṇasamaṅginoti
tika-vin01t1:1470_3: adhippāyo. Mohūpanissayaṃ nāma kammaṃ nihīnaṃ nihīnaphalaṃ hotīti āha “mohanissandayuttattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1470_4: Mohūpanissayatā ca kusalakammassa pubbabhāge mohappavattibahulatāya veditabbā. Tāya
tika-vin01t1:1470_5: pana mohappavattiyā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ kusalakammaṃ nihīnameva jātiādiṃ nipphādetīti nihīnajātiādayo
tika-vin01t1:1470_6: mohassa nissandaphalānīti āha “hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīna”ntiādi. Hīḷiteti garahite.
tika-vin01t1:1470_7: Ohīḷiteti visesato garahite. Uññāteti lāmakabhāvena ñāte. Avaññāteti visesato lāmakabhāvena
