tika-vin01t1:1470_8: vidite. Amohanissandayuttattāti ettha amoho sampayuttavasena pubbabhāgavasena ca
tika-vin01t1:1470_9: pavatto kathito, tena ca tihetukapaṭisandhike dasseti. Tabbiparīteti tassa hīḷitādibhāvassa
tika-vin01t1:1470_10: viparīte, ahīḷite anohīḷite anuññāte anavaññāte cittīkateti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1471_0: Suvaṇṇeti sundaravaṇṇe. Dubbaṇṇeti asundaravaṇṇe. Sā panāyaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā yathākkamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1471_2: ca kammassa mettādīhi paribhāvitasantānappavattiyā veditabbā. Abhirūpe virūpeti idaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1471_3: saṇṭhānavasena vuttaṃ. Saṇṭhānavacanopi hi vaṇṇasaddo hoti “mahantaṃ hatthivaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1471_4: abhinimminitvā”tiādīsu viya. Paṭhamaṃ vutto pana attho vaṇṇavaseneva vutto. Sundaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1471_5: gatiṃ gatā sugatāti āha “sugatigate”ti, sugatiṃ upapanneti attho. Alobhajjhāsayā
tika-vin01t1:1471_6: sattā vadaññū vigatamaccherā alobhūpanissayena kammunā sugatā samiddhā hontīti āha
tika-vin01t1:1471_7: “alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane”ti. Dukkhaṃ gatiṃ gatā duggatāti āha
tika-vin01t1:1471_8: “duggatigate”ti. Lobhajjhāsayā sattā luddhā maccharino lobhūpanissayena kammunā duggatā
tika-vin01t1:1471_9: durūpā hontīti āha “lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne”ti. Upacitanti phalāvahabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1471_10: kataṃ. Yathā katañhi kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitaṃ. Cavamānetiādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1471_11: dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti visayamukhena visayibyāpāramāha. Purimehīti “dibbena cakkhunā”tiādīni
tika-vin01t1:1471_12: padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ādīhīti ettha ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tasmā “dibbena…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1471_13: passāmī”ti imehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi ca dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti attho. Iminā pana
tika-vin01t1:1471_14: padenāti “yathākammūpage satte pajānāmī”ti iminā vākyena. Pajjati ñāyati attho imināti hi padaṃ vākyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1472_0: Mahantaṃ dukkhamanubhavamāneti ettha dibbacakkhuñāṇena rūpaṃ disvā tesaṃ dukkhānubhavanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1472_1: kāmāvacaracitteneva jānātīti veditabbaṃ. Soti nerayikasatte paccakkhato disvā ṭhito
tika-vin01t1:1472_2: dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī. Evaṃ manasi karotīti tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ nirayasaṃvattanikassa
tika-vin01t1:1472_3: kammassa ñātukāmatāvasena pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya parikammavasena manasi
tika-vin01t1:1472_4: karoti. Kiṃ nu khotiādi manasikāravidhidassanaṃ. Evaṃ pana parikammaṃ katvā pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1472_5: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa taṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ niruddhe
tika-vin01t1:1472_6: cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti. Yesaṃ purimāni tīṇi cattāri vā parikammaupacārānulomagotrabhunāmakāni
tika-vin01t1:1472_7: kāmāvacarāni, catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ, tattha
tika-vin01t1:1472_8: yaṃ tena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, taṃ yathākammūpagañāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1472_9: “Visuṃ parikammaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ pana dibbacakkhuñāṇena vinā yathākammūpagañāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1472_10: visuṃ parikammaṃ natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Evañcetaṃ icchitabbaṃ, aññathā yathākammūpagañāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1472_11: mahaggatabhāvo eva na siyā. Devānaṃ dassanepi eseva nayo. Nerayikadevaggahaṇañcettha
tika-vin01t1:1472_12: nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ākaṅkhamāno hi dibbacakkhulābhī aññagatikesupi evaṃ paṭipajjatiyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1472_14: manussagatipi saṅgayhatī”ti ca. Taṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyakammaṃ ārammaṇametassāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1473_0: Yathā cimassāti yathā ca imassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthi, evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1473_1: anāgataṃsañāṇassapīti visuṃ parikammābhāvañca nidasseti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “dibbacakkhupādakāneva
tika-vin01t1:1473_2: hi imānī”ti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – yathā dibbacakkhulābhī nirayādiabhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1473_3: vaḍḍhetvā nerayikādike satte disvā tehi pubbe āyūhitaṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyādikaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1473_4: tādisena samādānena tajjena ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti, evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1473_5: yassa yassa sattassa samanantaraṃ anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo, taṃ taṃ odissa ālokaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1473_6: vaḍḍhetvā tena tena atīte etarahi vā āyūhitaṃ tassa nibbattakaṃ kammaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇena
tika-vin01t1:1473_7: disvā tena tena nibbattetabbaṃ anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo tādisena samādānena tajjena
tika-vin01t1:1473_8: ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti. Esa nayo tato paresupi attabhāvesu.
tika-vin01t1:1473_9: Etaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ nāma. Yasmā etaṃ dvayaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇe sati eva sijjhati, nāsati.
tika-vin01t1:1474_0: Kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ duccaritanti kāyena duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kāyato
tika-vin01t1:1474_1: vā uppannaṃ kilesapūtikattā duṭṭhu caritaṃ kāyaduccaritanti evaṃ yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1474_2: Kāyoti cettha copanakāyo adhippeto. Kāyaviññattivasena pavattaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_3: kāyaduccaritaṃ. Yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ katupacitaṃ, asati āhārupacchede vipākārahasabhāvassa
tika-vin01t1:1474_4: avigacchanato so tena sahitoyevāti vattabboti āha “samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1474_5: Anatthakāmā hutvāti etena mātāpitaro viya puttānaṃ, ācariyupajjhāyā viya ca nissitakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_6: atthakāmā hutvā garahakā upavādakā na hontīti dasseti. Guṇaparidhaṃsanenāti vijjamānānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_7: guṇānaṃ viddhaṃsanena, vināsanenāti attho. Nanu ca antimavatthunāpi upavādo guṇaparidhaṃsanamevāti?
tika-vin01t1:1474_8: Saccametaṃ, guṇāti panettha jhānādivisesā uttarimanussadhammā adhippetāti sīlaparidhaṃsanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_9: visuṃ gahitaṃ. Tenāha “natthi imesaṃ samaṇadhammo”tiādi. Samaṇadhammoti ca sīlasaṃyamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_10: sandhāya vadati. Jānaṃ vāti yaṃ upavadati, tassa ariyabhāvaṃ jānanto vā. Ajānaṃ vāti
tika-vin01t1:1474_11: ajānanto vā. Jānanājānanañcettha appamāṇaṃ, ariyabhāvo eva pamāṇaṃ. Tenāha “ubhayathāpi
tika-vin01t1:1474_12: ariyūpavādova hotī”ti. “Ariyoti pana ajānato aduṭṭhacittasseva tattha ariyaguṇabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_13: pavedentassa guṇaparidhaṃsanaṃ na hotīti tassa ariyūpavādo natthī”ti vadanti. Bhāriyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1474_14: kammanti ānantariyasadisattā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ, satekicchaṃ pana hoti khamāpanena,
tika-vin01t1:1475_0: Tassa ca āvibhāvatthanti bhāriyādisabhāvassa pakāsanatthaṃ. Taṃ jigucchīti taṃ theraṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1475_1: taṃ vā kiriyaṃ jigucchi. Aticchātoti ativiya khudābhibhūto. Mahallakoti samaṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1475_2: sāruppamasāruppaṃ, lokasamudācāramattaṃ vā na jānātīti adhippāyena vuttattā guṇaparidhaṃsanena
tika-vin01t1:1475_3: garahatīti veditabbaṃ. Amhākaṃ lajjitabbakaṃ akāsīti “samaṇena nāma evaṃ kata”nti
tika-vin01t1:1475_4: vutte mayaṃ sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkomāti adhippāyo. Jānanto eva thero “atthi te
tika-vin01t1:1475_5: āvuso imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā”ti pucchi. Itaropi saccābhisamayo sāsane patiṭṭhāti
tika-vin01t1:1475_6: āha “sotāpanno aha”nti. Thero taṃ karuṇāyamāno “khīṇāsavo tayā upavadito”ti attānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1475_7: āvi akāsi. Tenassa taṃ pākatikaṃ ahosīti tena assa taṃ kammaṃ maggāvaraṇaṃ nāhosīti
tika-vin01t1:1475_8: adhippāyo. Pubbeva pana sotāpannattā apāyagāmīnaṃ suppahīnabhāvato saggāvaraṇamassa
tika-vin01t1:1475_9: kātumasamatthameva taṃ kammaṃ. Attanā vuḍḍhataro hotīti ettha “ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
tika-vin01t1:1475_10: khamāpetabbo”ti visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Sotāpannasakadāgāmino dosenapi nakkhamanti,
tika-vin01t1:1475_11: sesaariyā vā tassa atthakāmā hutvā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṇatthāya na khamāpeyyunti āha “sace
tika-vin01t1:1475_12: so nakkhamatī”ti. Attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti, ṭhitakenevāti etthāpi “ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1476_0: “Sace disāpakkanto hoti, sayaṃ vā gantvā saddhivihārike vā pesetvā khamāpetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1476_1: Sace nāpi gantuṃ, na pesetuṃ sakkā hoti, ye tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū vasanti, tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1476_2: santikaṃ gantvā sace navakatarā honti, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā, sace vuḍḍhatarā, vuḍḍhesu
tika-vin01t1:1476_3: vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitvā ‘ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca avacaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1476_4: khamatu me so āyasmā’ti vatvā khamāpetabbaṃ. Sammukhā akhamantepi etadeva kātabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1478_0: “Sace ekacārikabhikkhu hoti, nevassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, na gataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati, ekassa
tika-vin01t1:1478_1: paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā ‘ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca
tika-vin01t1:1478_2: avacaṃ, taṃ me anussarato anussarato vippaṭisāro hoti, kiṃ karomī’ti vattabbaṃ. So
tika-vin01t1:1478_3: vakkhati ‘tumhe mā cintayittha, thero tumhākaṃ khamati, cittaṃ vūpasamethā’ti. Tenapi
tika-vin01t1:1479_0: Parinibbutamañcaṭṭhānanti pūjākaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha. Pākatikameva hotīti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1479_1: kate attano cittaṃ pasīdatīti taṃ kammaṃ saggāvaraṇaṃ maggāvaraṇañca na hotīti adhippāyoti
tika-vin01t1:1480_2: saṃyuttaṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1480_3: hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpeti, sattame divase vipaccanasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ. Khamāpite
tika-vin01t1:1480_4: pana mahāsatte payogasampattiyā vipākassa paṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajji ahosikammabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1481_0: Ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttattā evaṃ khamāpite taṃ kammaṃ payogasampattiyā vipākassa
tika-vin01t1:1481_1: paṭibāhitattā ahosikammabhāvena avipākadhammataṃ āpannanti neva saggāvaraṇaṃ na mokkhāvaraṇañca
tika-vin01t1:1482_0: Viparītaṃ dassanametesanti viparītadassanā. Samādātabbaṭṭhena samādānāni, kammāni
tika-vin01t1:1482_1: samādānāni yesaṃ te kammasamādānā, micchādiṭṭhivasena kammasamādānā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā,
tika-vin01t1:1482_2: hetuatthaṃ vā antogadhaṃ katvā micchādiṭṭhivasena pare kammesu samādāpakā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā.
tika-vin01t1:1482_3: Tayimaṃ atthaṃ dassento “micchādiṭṭhivasenā”tiādimāha. Ye ca…pe… samādapenti, tepi
tika-vin01t1:1482_5: vasena vuttaṃ, aggamaggaṭṭhe pana vattabbameva natthi. Atha vā aggamaggapariyāpannā
tika-vin01t1:1482_6: eva sīlādayo veditabbā. Aggamaggaṭṭhassa hi diṭṭheva dhamme ekaṃsikā aññārādhanā,
tika-vin01t1:1482_7: itaresaṃ anekaṃsikā. Aññanti arahattaṃ. Evaṃsampadamidanti ettha sampajjanaṃ sampadā,
tika-vin01t1:1482_8: nipphatti, evaṃ avirajjhanakanipphattikanti attho, yathā taṃ avassambhāvī, evamidampīti
tika-vin01t1:1482_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā hi maggānantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva phalaṃ nibbattaṃ, evametaṃ imassapi
tika-vin01t1:1482_10: puggalassa cutianantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva niraye paṭisandhi hotīti dasseti. Sakalasmiñhi
tika-vin01t1:1482_11: buddhavacane na imāya upamāya gāḷhataraṃ katvā vuttaupamā atthi. Taṃ vācaṃ appahāyātiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1482_12: ariyūpavādaṃ sandhāya “puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmī”ti vadanto vācaṃ pajahati
tika-vin01t1:1482_13: nāma, “puna evarūpaṃ cittaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti cintento cittaṃ pajahati nāma, “puna
tika-vin01t1:1482_14: evarūpiṃ diṭṭhiṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti pajahanto diṭṭhiṃ pajahati nāma. Tathā akaronto
tika-vin01t1:1482_15: neva pajahati na paṭinissajjati. Yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā nirayapālehi
tika-vin01t1:1482_16: āharitvā niraye ṭhapito, evaṃ niraye ṭhapitoyeva, nāssa nirayūpapattiyā koci vibandho.
tika-vin01t1:1482_17: Tatrāyaṃ yutti – nirayūpago ariyūpavādī tadādāyakassa avijahanato seyyathāpi micchādiṭṭhīti.
tika-vin01t1:1482_18: Ettha ca “taṃ vācaṃ appahāyā”ti evamādivacanena tadādāyakassa appahāneneva ariyūpavādo
tika-vin01t1:1482_19: antarāyiko anatthāvahova, pahānena pana accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanena na antarāyiko
tika-vin01t1:1482_20: anatthāvaho yathā taṃ vuṭṭhitā desitā ca āpattīti dasseti. Micchādiṭṭhivasena akattabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1482_21: nāma pāpaṃ natthi, yato saṃsārakhāṇubhāvopi nāma hotīti āha “micchādiṭṭhiparamāni,
tika-vin01t1:1483_0: “Ucchinnabhavanettiko, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa kāyo tiṭṭhati, ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā
tika-vin01t1:1483_1: ca nāmarūpa”nti ca evamādīsu viya idha kāya-saddo khandhapañcakavisayoti āha “kāyassa
tika-vin01t1:1483_2: bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā”ti. Avītarāgassa maraṇato paraṃ nāma bhavantarūpādānamevāti
tika-vin01t1:1483_3: āha “paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe”ti. Yena tiṭṭhati, tassa
tika-vin01t1:1483_4: upacchedeneva kāyo bhijjatīti āha “kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1483_5: Eti imasmā sukhanti ayo, puññanti āha “puññasammatā ayā”ti. Āyanti etasmā sukhānīti
tika-vin01t1:1483_6: āyo, puññakammādīnaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ. Tenāha “sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā”ti. Vivasāti
tika-vin01t1:1483_7: kammassa vase vattanato attano vase vattituṃ na sakkontīti vigato vaso etesanti vivasā,
tika-vin01t1:1483_8: avasavattinoti attho. Iyati assādīyatīti ayo, assādoti āha “assādasaññito ayo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1484_0: Nāgarājādīnanti ādi-saddena supaṇṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Asurasadisanti petāsurasadisaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1484_1: So hīti so asurakāyo. Sabbasamussayehīti sabbehi sampattisamussayehi, sabbasampattirāsitoti
tika-vin01t1:1484_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttavipariyāyenāti “suṭṭhu caritaṃ, sobhanaṃ vā caritaṃ anavajjattāti
tika-vin01t1:1484_3: sucarita”ntiādinā kāyaduccaritenātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttassa atthassa vipariyāyena.
tika-vin01t1:1484_4: “Ito bho sugatiṃ gacchā”ti vacanato manussagatipi sugatiyevāti āha “sugatiggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:1484_5: manussagatipi saṅgayhatī”ti. Sesamettha vuttanayattā uttānatthato ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin01t1:1487_0: 14. Vipassanāpādakanti vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Vipassanā ca tividhā vipassakapuggalabhedena.
tika-vin01t1:1487_3: avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā anekadhā arūpamukhavasena catudhātuvavatthāne
tika-vin01t1:1487_4: vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ aññataramukhavasena anekadhāva visuddhimagge
tika-vin01t1:1487_5: nānānayato vibhāvitā. Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato
tika-vin01t1:1487_7: gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumataraṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1487_8: vipassanāñāṇaṃ hoti. Yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati. Yassa ca pavattivibhāgena
tika-vin01t1:1487_10: devasikaṃ satthu vaḷañjanakasamāpattiyo vuccanti, svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro
tika-vin01t1:1487_11: paramatthamañjusāyaṃ visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ uddesato dassito, atthikehi tato gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1488_0: Āsavānaṃ khepanato samucchindanato āsavakkhayo ariyamaggo, ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena
tika-vin01t1:1488_1: arahattamaggaggahaṇaṃ. Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti dassento “tatra cetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1488_2: ñāṇa”nti vatvā khayeti ca ādhāre bhummaṃ, na visayeti dassento “tappariyāpannattā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1488_3: āha. Idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1488_4: Ettakaṃ dukkhanti tassa paricchijja gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. Na ito bhiyyoti anavasesetvā
tika-vin01t1:1488_6: sabhāvasaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa asammohato paṭivijjhanena. Asammohapaṭivedhoti ca
tika-vin01t1:1488_7: yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā
tika-vin01t1:1488_8: pavatti. Tenāha “yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi”nti. Nibbattikanti nipphādentaṃ. Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1488_9: patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma. Tadubhayavato
tika-vin01t1:1488_10: hi puggalassa patti tadubhayassa pattīti vuttaṃ. Patvāti vā pāpuṇanahetu. Appavattinti
tika-vin01t1:1488_11: appavattinimittaṃ. Te vā na pavattanti etthāti appavatti, nibbānaṃ. Tassāti dukkhanirodhassa.
tika-vin01t1:1489_0: Kilesavasenāti āsavasaṅkhātakilesavasena. Yasmā āsavānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāyo, tappariyāpannattā,
tika-vin01t1:1489_1: sesasaccānañca taṃsamudayādipariyāyo atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “pariyāyato”ti. Dassento
tika-vin01t1:1489_2: saccānīti yojanā. Āsavānaṃyeva cettha gahaṇaṃ “āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā”ti āraddhattā.
tika-vin01t1:1489_3: Tathā hi āsavavimuttisīseneva sabbasaṃkilesavimutti vuttā. Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1489_4: abbhaññāsintiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti “saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1489_5: kathetī”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca saccappaṭivedhassa tadā atītakālikattā “yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi”nti
tika-vin01t1:1489_6: vatvāpi abhisamayakāle tassa paccuppannataṃ upādāya “evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato”ti
tika-vin01t1:1489_7: vattamānakālena niddeso kato. So ca kāmaṃ maggakkhaṇato paraṃ yāvajjatanā atītakāliko
tika-vin01t1:1489_8: eva, sabbapaṭhamaṃ panassa atītakālikattaṃ phalakkhaṇeneva veditabbanti āha “vimuccitthāti
tika-vin01t1:1489_9: iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dassetī”ti. Jānato passatoti vā hetuniddesoyaṃ. Jānanahetu dassanahetu
tika-vin01t1:1489_10: kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccitthāti yojanā. Bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva cettha bhavarāgassa
tika-vin01t1:1489_11: viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1490_0: Yasmā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena vijjamānassapi kammassa āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1490_1: “khīṇā jātī”ti jānāti, yasmā ca maggapaccavekkhaṇādīhi vusitaṃ brahmacariyantiādiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1490_2: pajānāti, tasmā vuttaṃ “khīṇā jātīti ādīhi tassa bhūmi”nti. Tattha tassāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa.
tika-vin01t1:1490_3: Bhūminti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yenādhippāyena “katamā panā”tiādinā codanā katā, taṃ pakāsetvā
tika-vin01t1:1490_4: parihāraṃ vattukāmo āha “na tāvassā”tiādi. Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇāti maggabhāvanāya
tika-vin01t1:1490_5: na khīṇāti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha “pubbeva khīṇattā”ti. Na anāgatā assa jāti
tika-vin01t1:1490_6: khīṇāti yojanā. Na anāgatāti ca anāgatattasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena vadati. Tenāha
tika-vin01t1:1490_7: “anāgate vāyāmābhāvato”ti. Vijjamāneyeva hi payogo sambhavati, nāvijjamāneti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1490_8: Anāgataviseso panettha adhippeto, tassa ca khepane vāyāmopi labbhateva. Tenāha “yā
tika-vin01t1:1490_9: pana maggassā”tiādi. “Yā panā”ti hi ādinā maggabhāvanāya anāgatajātiyā eva hetuvināsanadvārena
tika-vin01t1:1490_11: anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tanti yathāvuttajātiṃ. Soti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1491_0: Brahmacariyavāso nāma idha maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha “niṭṭhita”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1491_1: Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi
tika-vin01t1:1491_2: dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti, itarasaccesu ca nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena
tika-vin01t1:1491_3: pavatti pākaṭā eva. Tena vuttaṃ “catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1491_4: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti ime pakārā itthaṃ, tabbhāvo itthattaṃ, tadatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1491_5: Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha “evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1491_6: Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, pariññādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1491_7: ca pahānameva padhānaṃ, tadatthattāya itaresanti āha “kilesakkhayāya vā”ti. Pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:1491_8: vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. “Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti abbhaññāsi”nti etthāyamaparo nayo – itthattāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1491_9: nissakke sampadānavacanaṃ. Tenāyamattho – itthattāya itthambhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā
tika-vin01t1:1491_10: idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ anāgatakkhandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi, ime
tika-vin01t1:1491_11: pana carimattabhāvasaṅkhātā pañcakkhandhā pariññātā appatiṭṭhā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā
tika-vin01t1:1491_12: rukkhā viya. Apariññātamūlakā hi patiṭṭhā. Yathāha “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre
tika-vin01t1:1491_13: atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha”ntiādi. Te
tika-vin01t1:1491_14: pana pañcakkhandhā carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti abbhaññāsinti.
tika-vin01t1:1492_1: adhippāyo. Dassentoti nigamanavasena dassento. Sarūpato hi pubbe dassitamevāti. Sesamettha
tika-vin01t1:1493_0: Tikkhattuṃ jātoti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva
tika-vin01t1:1493_1: purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuḍḍho mahallako, kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi
tika-vin01t1:1493_2: vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jātoti. Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇanti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya
tika-vin01t1:1493_3: tabbhāvībhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1493_6: ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva ca ṭhitassa cetopariyañāṇasiddhito
tika-vin01t1:1493_8: dibbacakkhuñāṇena. Paccuppannaṃso ca anāgataṃso ca paccuppannānāgataṃsaṃ, tattha
tika-vin01t1:1493_11: ijjhanato vuttaṃ “āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇa”nti. Tenāha “sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1496_1: aññāṇassāti attho. Dhīsaddassa yogato hi sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Abhikkantāti
tika-vin01t1:1496_2: ettha atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha “khaye dissatī”ti. Teneva hi “nikkhanto paṭhamo
tika-vin01t1:1496_3: yāmo”ti vuttaṃ. Abhikkantataro cāti ativiya kantataro manoramo, tādiso ca sundaro
tika-vin01t1:1496_4: bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti. Koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko
tika-vin01t1:1496_5: katamo. Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti
tika-vin01t1:1496_6: iminā edisena parivārena paricchedena. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
tika-vin01t1:1496_7: kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. Sabbā obhāsayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1496_8: disāti dasapi disā pabhāsento cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti
tika-vin01t1:1497_0: Abhikkantaṃ bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotamāti vacanadvayassa “sādhu sādhu bho
tika-vin01t1:1497_1: gotamā”ti āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā tassa visayaṃ niddhārento āha “bhaye kodhe”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1497_2: Tattha “coro coro, sappo sappo”tiādīsu bhaye āmeḍitaṃ. “Vijjha vijjha, pahara paharā”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1497_3: kodhe. “Sādhu sādhū”tiādīsu pasaṃsāyaṃ. “Gaccha gaccha, lunāhi lunāhī”tiādīsu turite.
tika-vin01t1:1497_5: abhikkamathāyasmanto”tiādīsu hāse. “Kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakā”tiādīsu soke.
tika-vin01t1:1497_6: “Aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”ntiādīsu pasāde. Ca-saddo avuttasamuccayattho. Tena garahaasammānādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1497_7: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha “pāpo pāpo”tiādīsu garahāyaṃ. “Abhirūpaka abhirūpakā”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1498_0: Nayidaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho atthadvayavasenāti dassento “atha
tika-vin01t1:1498_1: vā”tiādimāha. Abhikkantanti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:1498_2: bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā vuttaṃ “yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1498_3: Atthamattadassanaṃ vā etaṃ, tasmā atthavasena liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1498_4: Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Dosanāsanatoti rāgādikilesaviddhaṃsanato. Guṇādhigamanatoti
tika-vin01t1:1498_5: sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampāpanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti, tesu padhānabhūtā guṇā dassetabbāti
tika-vin01t1:1498_6: te padhānabhūte guṇe tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpamukhā
tika-vin01t1:1498_7: hi lokiyā guṇā, paññāpamukhā lokuttarā. Sātthatotiādīsu sīlādiatthasampattiyā sātthato,
tika-vin01t1:1498_14: vimaddakkhamatāya hitajjhāsayappavattitāya ca vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1498_17: saggamaggadvāravivaraṇato, pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanato, anusayasamugghātanatoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1499_0: Adhomukhaṭhapitanti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Heṭṭhāmukhajātanti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1499_1: jātaṃ. Ugghāṭeyyāti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. Hatthe gahetvāti “puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho
tika-vin01t1:1499_2: vā gacchā”tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā “nissandehaṃ esa maggo, evaṃ gacchā”ti dasseyya.
tika-vin01t1:1499_3: Kāḷapakkhacātuddasīti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī kāḷapakkhacātuddasī. Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti
tika-vin01t1:1499_4: ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya. Heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya
tika-vin01t1:1499_5: saddhammavimukhaṃ adhomukhaṭhapitatāya asaddhamme patiṭṭhitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1499_6: yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayopi paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1499_7: micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesanenāti āha “micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1499_8: Tenāha bhagavā – “micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti. Sabbo apāyagāmimaggo
tika-vin01t1:1499_9: kummaggo kucchito maggoti katvā, sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo
tika-vin01t1:1499_10: aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo. Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1499_11: ācikkhantenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo na tathā, ujjalo yathā telasannissayoti
tika-vin01t1:1499_13: etehi vā yathāvuttehi arasarūpatādīnaṃ attani aññathā paṭipādanapariyāyehi attano
tika-vin01t1:1502_0: Pasannākāranti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. Saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti ettha iti-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin01t1:1502_1: āha “saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti. Ettha hi nāyaṃ gamisaddo nīsaddādayo viya dvikammako,
tika-vin01t1:1502_2: tasmā yathā ajaṃ gāmaṃ netīti vuccati, evaṃ “gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vattuṃ na
tika-vin01t1:1502_3: sakkā, “saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti pana vattabbaṃ, tasmā ettha iti-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin01t1:1502_4: veditabbaṃ. Saraṇanti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “parāyaṇa”nti. Parāyaṇabhāvo ca anatthanisedhanena
tika-vin01t1:1502_5: atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha “aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā”ti. Aghassāti
tika-vin01t1:1502_6: dukkhatoti vadanti, pāpatoti pana attho yutto, nissakke cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Saraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:1502_7: gamanañcettha tadadhippāyena bhajanaṃ tathā jānanaṃ vāti dassento “iti iminā adhippāyenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1502_8: Tattha gacchāmītiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ. Bhajanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1502_9: vā saraṇādhippāyena upasaṅkamanaṃ, sevanā santikāvacaratā, payirupāsanaṃ vattappaṭivattakaraṇena
tika-vin01t1:1502_10: upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva dīpeti. Gacchāmīti padassa kathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1503_0: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodheti padadvayenapi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā, na maggaṭṭhāti
tika-vin01t1:1503_1: te dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha. Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi
tika-vin01t1:1503_2: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatīti vuccatīti? Kiñcāpi vuccati, nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1503_3: eva tathā vattabbā, na itare niyāmokkamanābhāvato. Tathā hi te eva “apāyesu apatamāne
tika-vin01t1:1503_4: dhāretī”ti vuttā. Sammattaniyāmokkamanena hi apāyavinimuttasambhavo. Akkhāyatīti
tika-vin01t1:1503_5: ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā
tika-vin01t1:1503_6: vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti suttapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, “vitthāro”ti
tika-vin01t1:1503_7: vā iminā. Ettha ca ariyamaggo niyyānikatāya, nibbānaṃ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1503_8: ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammoti vutto. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā
tika-vin01t1:1503_9: ariyamaggassa tadatthasiddhi, tathāpi ariyaphalānaṃ “yasmā tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”tiādivacanato
tika-vin01t1:1503_12: iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva, svāyamattho pāṭhāruḷho evāti
tika-vin01t1:1504_0: Rāgavirāgoti maggo kathitoti kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati
tika-vin01t1:1504_1: pahīyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito. Anejamasokanti phalanti ejāsaṅkhātāya
tika-vin01t1:1504_2: taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā anejamasokanti
tika-vin01t1:1504_3: phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Appaṭikūlanti avirodhadīpanato kenaci aviruddhaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītanti
tika-vin01t1:1504_4: vā attho. Paguṇarūpena pavattitattā, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato vā paguṇaṃ. Yathāha
tika-vin01t1:1504_5: “vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ nabhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme”ti. Sabbadhammakkhandhā
tika-vin01t1:1504_6: kathitāti yojanā. Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa
tika-vin01t1:1504_7: sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya
tika-vin01t1:1504_8: diṭṭhiyā “yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni
tika-vin01t1:1504_9: aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1504_10: evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññenāti attho. Saṃhatoti ghaṭito,
tika-vin01t1:1504_11: sametoti attho. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā
tika-vin01t1:1504_12: saṃhatā eva. Aṭṭha ca puggalā dhammadasā teti purisayugaḷavasena cattāropi puggalavasena
tika-vin01t1:1504_13: aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā. Tīṇi vatthūni saraṇanti gamanena
tika-vin01t1:1504_14: tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca tīṇi saraṇagamanāni. Paṭivedesīti attano hadayaṅgataṃ vācāya pavedesi.
tika-vin01t1:1507_0: Saraṇagamanassa visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha
tika-vin01t1:1507_1: kosallāya hotīti “saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ…pe… veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ tena
tika-vin01t1:1507_2: vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato. Tattha saraṇanti padatthato tāva hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1507_3: Hiṃsatthassa hi sarasaddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā saraṇagatānaṃ teneva
tika-vin01t1:1507_4: saraṇagamanena vaṭṭabhayaṃ cittutrāsaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi
tika-vin01t1:1507_5: dukkhaṃ hanati, vināsetīti attho. Ratanattayassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Atha vā hite pavattanena
tika-vin01t1:1507_6: “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā”tiādinā atthe niyojanena ahitā ca nivattanena
tika-vin01t1:1507_7: “pāṇātipātassa kho pana pāpako vipāko, pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya”ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena
tika-vin01t1:1507_8: anatthato nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati, hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1507_9: byasanaṃ apavattikaraṇena vināseti buddho. Bhavakantārauttaraṇena maggasaṅkhāto dhammo
tika-vin01t1:1507_10: sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati, itaro assāsadānena. Appakānampi dānavasena pūjāvasena ca
tika-vin01t1:1507_11: upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati saṅgho
tika-vin01t1:1507_12: anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato, tasmā imināpi vibhajitvā vuttapariyāyena ratanattayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1507_13: saraṇaṃ. “Sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evaṃ pavattaratanattayapasaādataggarukatāhi
tika-vin01t1:1507_15: parāyaṇaṃ gati tāṇaṃ leṇanti evaṃ pavattiyā tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo
tika-vin01t1:1507_16: saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇanti gacchati etenāti katvā. Tena yathāvuttacittuppādena samannāgato
tika-vin01t1:1507_17: satto saraṇanti gacchati, vuttappakārena cittuppādena “etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1507_18: etāni parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ upeti bhajati sevati payirupāsati, evaṃ vā jānāti, bujjhatīti
tika-vin01t1:1507_19: attho. Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati, idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1508_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca. Tattha lokuttaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1508_2: hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Atthato catusaccādhigamo eva hi lokuttarasaraṇagamanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1508_3: Tattha hi nibbānadhammo sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena, maggadhammo bhāvanābhisamayavasena
tika-vin01t1:1508_4: paṭivijjhiyamānoyeva saraṇagamanatthaṃ sādheti, buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā
tika-vin01t1:1508_5: pariññābhisamayavasena, tathā ariyasaṅghaguṇā. Tena vuttaṃ “kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye
tika-vin01t1:1508_6: ijjhatī”ti. Ijjhantañca saheva ijjhati, na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena
tika-vin01t1:1508_7: paṭividdhattā. Ye pana vadanti “na saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1508_8: maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo
tika-vin01t1:1508_9: viyā”ti, tesaṃ lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ siyā, na lokuttaraṃ. Tañca ayuttaṃ duvidhassapi
tika-vin01t1:1508_10: icchitabbattā. Lokiyaṃ pana saraṇagamanaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena
tika-vin01t1:1508_11: ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati. Taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu “sammāsambuddho
tika-vin01t1:1508_12: bhagavā”tiādinā saddhāpaṭilābho yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā ca sammādiṭṭhi, dasasu
tika-vin01t1:1508_13: puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati. Ettha ca “saddhāpaṭilābho”ti iminā
tika-vin01t1:1508_14: mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttasaraṇagamanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1508_15: “Sammādiṭṭhī”ti iminā pana ñāṇasampayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ dassitaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1508_16: dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca lokiyāvabodhavaseneva sammā ñāyena dassanato.
tika-vin01t1:1509_0: Tayidaṃ lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya
tika-vin01t1:1509_1: sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti. Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:1509_2: ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi, dhammassa, saṅghassā”ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva saṃsāradukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1509_3: attano attabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ. Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo
tika-vin01t1:1509_4: dhammaparāyaṇo saṅghaparāyaṇoti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo. Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1509_5: nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ‘ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko, dhammassa, saṅghassā’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1509_6: evaṃ sissabhāvūpagamo. Paṇipāto nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ‘ahaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1509_7: añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomī’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1509_8: evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro. Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena
tika-vin01t1:1510_0: Apica “bhagavato attānaṃ pariccajāmi, dhammassa saṅghassa attānaṃ pariccajāmi, jīvitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1510_1: pariccajāmi, pariccattoyeva me attā, pariccattaṃyeva me jīvitaṃ, jīvitapariyantikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1510_2: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇa”nti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1510_3: veditabbaṃ. “Satthārañca vatāhaṃ passāmi, bhagavantameva passāmi, sugatañca vatāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1510_4: passāmi, bhagavantameva passāmi, sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passāmi, bhagavantameva
tika-vin01t1:1510_5: passāmī”ti evaṃ mahākassapattherassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1511: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
tika-vin01t1:1513: “Te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata”nti. –
tika-vin01t1:1514_0: Evampi āḷavakasātāgirahemavatādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā. Nanu
tika-vin01t1:1514_1: cete āḷavakādayo maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kathaṃ tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1514_2: vuttanti? Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi “sohaṃ vicarissāmi gāmā gāma”ntiādinā tehi
tika-vin01t1:1514_3: tapparāyaṇatākārassa paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ. Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā
tika-vin01t1:1514_4: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena
tika-vin01t1:1514_5: ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti “brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama,
tika-vin01t1:1514_6: brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo”ti evampi paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1515_0: So panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyatāvasena catubbidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyatāhetukena
tika-vin01t1:1515_1: paṇipātena saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, na itarehi ñātibhayādivasappavattehi tīhi paṇipātehi.
tika-vin01t1:1515_2: Seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṃ gayhati, seṭṭhavasena bhijjati, tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo
tika-vin01t1:1515_3: vā “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā “samaṇo gotamo
tika-vin01t1:1515_4: rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati, aggahitameva
tika-vin01t1:1515_5: hoti saraṇaṃ. Yopi bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
tika-vin01t1:1518_0: Evarūpiṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvā “ācariyo me”ti vandati, aggahitameva
tika-vin01t1:1518_1: hoti saraṇaṃ, samparāyikaṃ pana niyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsīsanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva
tika-vin01t1:1518_2: karoti. Yo pana “ayaṃ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo”ti vandati, teneva gahitaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1519_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1519_1: “ñātako me aya”nti vandatopi saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṃ. Tathā
tika-vin01t1:1519_2: rājānaṃ bhayavasena vandato. So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
tika-vin01t1:1519_3: Tathā yaṃ kiñci sippasikkhāpakaṃ titthiyampi “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjati.
tika-vin01t1:1522_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ ariyamaggasseva
tika-vin01t1:1522_1: lokuttarasaraṇagamananti adhippetattā. Sakalassa pana vaṭṭadukkhassa anuppādanirodho
tika-vin01t1:1523: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
tika-vin01t1:1529: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1530_0: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato
tika-vin01t1:1530_1: upagaccheyya, sukhato upagaccheyya, kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya, mātaraṃ jīvitā
tika-vin01t1:1530_2: voropeyya, pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya, arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, paduṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa
tika-vin01t1:1530_3: lohitaṃ uppādeyya, saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1531: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1537_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
tika-vin01t1:1537_1: tenupasaṅkami…pe… ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
tika-vin01t1:1537_2: etadavoca ‘sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhasaraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhasaraṇagamanahetu
tika-vin01t1:1537_3: kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1537_4: upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena
tika-vin01t1:1537_5: sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi phoṭṭhabbehī”’ti.
tika-vin01t1:1539_0: Apica velāmasuttādivasenapi saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo. Tathā hi velāmasutte
tika-vin01t1:1539_3: caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1539_4: caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1539_5: aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni
tika-vin01t1:1539_6: satta saṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa sotāpannassa dinnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1539_7: mahapphalataraṃ, tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmino, tato ekassa
tika-vin01t1:1539_8: anāgāmino, tato ekassa arahato, tato ekassa paccekasambuddhassa, tato sammāsambuddhassa,
tika-vin01t1:1539_9: tato buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1539_10: uddissa vihārakaraṇaṃ, tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalatara”nti pakāsitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1540: “Yaṃ, gahapati, velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ, yo cekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya, idaṃ tato mahapphalatara”nti –
tika-vin01t1:1544_0: Tattha ca lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
tika-vin01t1:1544_1: na mahājutikaṃ, na ujjalaṃ aparisuddhaṃ apariyodātaṃ hoti, na mahāvipphāraṃ anuḷāraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1544_2: Ettha ca aññāṇaṃ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ tattha sammoho. “Buddho nu
tika-vin01t1:1544_3: kho, na nu kho”tiādinā vicikicchā saṃsayo. Micchāñāṇaṃ nāma tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena
tika-vin01t1:1544_4: viparītaggāhoti veditabbaṃ. Lokuttarassa pana saraṇagamanassa natthi saṃkileso. Lokiyassa
tika-vin01t1:1544_5: ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca. Tattha sāvajjo aññasatthārādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1544_6: attaniyyātanādīhi hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. Anavajjo pana kālakiriyāya hoti. Lokiyañhi
tika-vin01t1:1544_8: hoti, tasmā tassa khandhabhedena bhedo, so avipākattā aphalo. Lokuttarassa pana nevatthi
tika-vin01t1:1544_9: bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti. Evaṃ saraṇagamanassa
tika-vin01t1:1545_0: Kasmā panettha vodānaṃ na gahitaṃ, nanu vodānavibhāvanāpi tattha kosallāya hotīti?
tika-vin01t1:1545_1: Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇena atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ. Yāni hi
tika-vin01t1:1545_2: tesaṃ saṃkilesakāraṇāni aññāṇādīni, tesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ anuppādanena uppannānañca
tika-vin01t1:1545_3: pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti. Evamettha “saraṇaṃ saraṇagamana”ntiādīnaṃ papañco veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1545_4: Imassa pana yathāvuttapapañcassa idha avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “so pana idha
tika-vin01t1:1548_0: Evaṃ dhāretūti evaṃ jānātūti attho. Ettha ko upāsakoti sarūpapucchā, tasmā kiṃlakkhaṇo
tika-vin01t1:1548_1: upāsakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmāti hetupucchā. Tena kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo
tika-vin01t1:1548_2: tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti dasseti. Tenāha “kasmā upāsakoti vuccatī”ti. Saddassa hi
tika-vin01t1:1548_3: abhidheyyapavattinimittaṃ tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ. Kimassa sīlanti kīdisaṃ assa
tika-vin01t1:1548_4: upāsakassa sīlaṃ, kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho. Ko ājīvoti
tika-vin01t1:1548_5: ko assa sammāājīvo. So pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti sopi vibhajīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1548_6: Kā vipattīti kassa sīlassa ājīvassa vā vipatti. Anantarassa hi vidhi vā paṭisedho
tika-vin01t1:1549_0: Idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbanti kathaṃ veditabbaṃ? Vuccate – ko upāsakoti khattiyādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1549_1: yo koci tisaraṇaṃ gato gahaṭṭho. Saraṇagamanameva hettha kāraṇaṃ, na jātiādiviseso.
tika-vin01t1:1549_2: Vuttañhetaṃ “yato kho, mahānāma, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1549_3: gato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1550_0: Kasmā upāsakoti ratanattayaupāsanato. Teneva saraṇagamanena tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya
tika-vin01t1:1550_1: ādaragāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti
tika-vin01t1:1551_0: Kimassa sīlanti pañca veramaṇiyo. Veramaṇiyoti cettha veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1551_1: dussīlyaṃ, tassa mananato hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo pañca viratiyo viratippadhānattā
tika-vin01t1:1551_2: tassa sīlassa. Vuttañhetaṃ “yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1551_3: adinnādānā, kāmesumicchācārā, musāvādā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1551_4: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1552_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1552_1: – “pañcimā, bhikkhave, vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca? Satthavaṇijjā sattavaṇijjā
tika-vin01t1:1552_2: maṃsavaṇijjā majjavaṇijjā visavaṇijjā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1553_0: Ettha ca satthavaṇijjāti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin01t1:1553_1: tassa vikkayo. Sattavaṇijjāti manussavikkayo. Maṃsavaṇijjāti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike
tika-vin01t1:1553_2: posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo. Majjavaṇijjāti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa
tika-vin01t1:1553_3: vikkayo. Visavaṇijjāti visaṃ yojetvā saṅgahetvā vā tassa vikkayo. Tattha satthavaṇijjā
tika-vin01t1:1553_4: paroparodhanimittatāya akaraṇīyā vuttā, sattavaṇijjā abhujissabhāvakaraṇato, maṃsavisavaṇijjā
tika-vin01t1:1554_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti bhedo kopo pakopo ca, ayamassa
tika-vin01t1:1554_1: vipatti. Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca paṭikuṭṭho ca, sāpissa vipattīti
tika-vin01t1:1554_2: veditabbā. Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:1555_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca
tika-vin01t1:1555_1: upāsakapaṭikuṭṭho ca. Katamehi pañcahi? Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kotūhalamaṅgaliko
tika-vin01t1:1555_2: hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti, no kammaṃ, ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati, tattha
tika-vin01t1:1556_0: Ettha ca upāsakapaṭikuṭṭhoti upāsakanihīno. Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo
tika-vin01t1:1556_1: assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho, yathāvuttena assaddhiyena samannāgato assaddho. Yathāvuttasīlavipattiājīvavipattivasena
tika-vin01t1:1556_2: dussīlo. “Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena
tika-vin01t1:1556_3: diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko. Maṅgalaṃ paccetīti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1556_4: maṅgalameva pattiyāyati. No kammanti kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. Itobahiddhāti
tika-vin01t1:1556_5: ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatīti duppaṭipannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1556_6: dakkhiṇārahasaññī gavesati. Pubbakāraṃ karotīti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1556_7: karoti. Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapaayesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1557: Kā sampattīti sāva tassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca sampatti, ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:1558_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca
tika-vin01t1:1558_1: upāsakapuṇḍarīko ca. Katamehi pañcahi? Saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, na kotūhalamaṅgaliko
tika-vin01t1:1558_2: hoti, kammaṃ pacceti, no maṅgalaṃ, na ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati, idha
tika-vin01t1:1559_0: Ettha ca catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ upāsakaratanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1559_1: guṇasobhākittisaddasugandhatāhi upāsakova padumaṃ upāsakapadumaṃ, tathā upāsakapuṇḍarīko
tika-vin01t1:1559_2: ca veditabbo. Sesamettha vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena viññeyyaṃ. Evamidaṃ “ko upāsako”tiādikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1559_3: pakiṇṇakaṃ vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Imassa pana pakiṇṇakassa idha vitthāretvā avacane
tika-vin01t1:1560_0: Ādimhīti ādiatthe. Koṭiyanti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ. Vihāraggenāti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena, “imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1560_1: gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ panasaphalaṃ pāpuṇātī”tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti
tika-vin01t1:1560_2: attho. Ajjatanti ajja icceva attho. Pāṇehi upetanti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1560_3: dassento “yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī”tiādīni vatvā puna jīvitenapahaṃ vatthuttayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1560_4: paṭipūjento saraṇagamanañca rakkhāmīti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento
tika-vin01t1:1560_5: “ahañhī”tiādimāha. Pāṇehi upetanti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upetaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1560_6: upento na vācāmattena na ekavāraṃ cittuppādanamattena, atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasena
tika-vin01t1:1561_0: Adhivāsetūti sādiyatu, taṃ pana sādiyanaṃ manasā sampaṭiggaho hotīti āha “sampaṭicchatū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1561_1: Kāyaṅganti kāyameva aṅganti vadanti, kāyassa vā aṅgaṃ sīsādi kāyaṅgaṃ, sīsādi sarīrāvayavanti
tika-vin01t1:1561_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Vācaṅganti “hotu sādhū”ti evamādivācāya aṅgaṃ avayavaṃ. Vācaṅgassa copanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1561_3: vācāya pavattanamevāti veditabbaṃ. Abbhantareyevāti attano cittasantāneyeva. Khantiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1561_4: cāretvāti khantiṃ pavattetvā, ruciṃ uppādetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Khantiṃ dhāretvā”tipi
tika-vin01t1:1561_5: pāṭho, uppannaṃ ruciṃ abbhantareyeva dhāretvā vacībhedena apakāsetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1562_0: Kathaṃ pana verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ aññāsi. Na hi tena sakkā bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:1562_1: cittappavatti paccakkhato viññātuṃ, tasmā “bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā”ti kasmā
tika-vin01t1:1562_2: vuttanti ce? Kiñcāpi tena na sakkā cittappavatti paccakkhato viññātuṃ, tathāpi ākārasallakkhaṇakusalatāya
tika-vin01t1:1562_3: anvayabyatirekavasena anumānato aññāsīti dassento āha “sace me samaṇo gotamo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1562_5: kusalatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalanti dvīsu hatthesu dasannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1562_6: nakhānaṃ samodhānena ekībhāvena samujjalantaṃ. Añjalinti hatthapuṭaṃ. Paṭimukhoyevāti
tika-vin01t1:1562_7: abhimukhoyeva, na bhagavato piṭṭhiṃ dassetvāti attho. Vanditvāti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā.
tika-vin01t1:1565_0: 16. Susassakālepīti sampannasassakālepi. Atisamagghepīti atisayena appagghepi, yadā
tika-vin01t1:1565_1: kiñcideva datvā bahuṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ gaṇhanti, tādise kālepīti attho. Sāliādi dhaññaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1565_2: pubbaṇṇaṃ, muggamāsādi aparaṇṇaṃ. Dvidhā pavattaṃ īhitaṃ etthāti dvīhitikāti majjhapadalopībāhiratthasamāsoyamīti
tika-vin01t1:1565_3: dassento āha “dvidhā pavattaīhitikā”ti. Īhanaṃ īhitanti īhitasaddoyaṃ bhāvasādhanoti
tika-vin01t1:1565_4: āha “īhitaṃ nāma iriyā”ti. Tattha iriyāti kiriyā. Kassa panesā kiriyāti āha “cittairiyā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1565_5: cittakiriyā cittappayogoti attho. Tenevāha “cittaīhā”ti. Kathaṃ panettha īhitassa
tika-vin01t1:1565_6: dvidhā pavattīti āha “lacchāma nu kho”tiādi. Tattha lacchāma nu khoti idaṃ duggatānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1565_7: vasena vuttaṃ. Jīvituṃ vā sakkhissāma nu kho, noti idaṃ pana issarānaṃ vasena vuttanti
tika-vin01t1:1565_8: veditabbaṃ. Bhikkhamānāti yācamānā. “Duhitikā”tipi pāṭho. Tatthāpi vuttanayenevattho
tika-vin01t1:1565_9: veditabbo. Dvi-saddassa hi du-saddādesenāyaṃ niddeso hoti. Dukkhaṃ vā īhitaṃ ettha
tika-vin01t1:1565_10: na sakkā koci payogo sukhena kātunti duhitikā, dukkarajīvitappayogāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1566_0: Du-sadde vā ukārassa vakāraṃ katvā dvīhitikāti ayaṃ niddesoti āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1566_1: Byādhi rogoti etāni “āturatā”ti imassa vevacanāni. Tena setaṭṭikā nāma ekā rogajātīti
tika-vin01t1:1566_2: dasseti. So pana rogo pāṇakadosena sambhavati. Eko kira pāṇako nāḷamajjhagataṃ gaṇṭhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1566_3: vijjhati, yena viddhattā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenāha
tika-vin01t1:1567_0: Vuttasassanti vapitasassaṃ. Tatthāti verañjāyaṃ. Salākāmattaṃ vuttaṃ etthāti salākāvuttā,
tika-vin01t1:1567_1: purimapade uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddeso. Tenāha “salākā eva sampajjatī”ti. Yaṃ tattha
tika-vin01t1:1567_2: vuttaṃ vāpitaṃ, taṃ salākāmattameva ahosi, phalaṃ na jāyatīti attho. Sampajjatīti
tika-vin01t1:1567_3: ca iminā “salākāvuttā”ti etthāyaṃ vuttasaddo nipphattiatthoti dasseti. Salākāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1567_4: veḷuvilīvatālapaṇṇādīhi katasalākāya. Dhaññavikkayakānaṃ santikanti dhaññaṃ vikkiṇantīti
tika-vin01t1:1567_5: dhaññavikkayakā, tesaṃ samīpanti attho. Kayakesūti dhaññagaṇhanakesu. Kiṇitvāti gahetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1567_6: Dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāneti koṭṭhāgārassa samīpaṭṭhāne, dhaññaminanaṭṭhāneti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1567_7: Vaṇṇajjhakkhanti kahāpaṇaparikkhakaṃ. Nasukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetunti paggayhatīti
tika-vin01t1:1567_8: paggaho, patto. Tena paggahena pattenāti attho, pattaṃ gahetvā bhikkhācariyāya yāpetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1567_9: na sakkāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenevāha “paggahena yo uñcho”tiādi. Nasukarāti sukarabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1567_10: ettha natthīti nasukarā. Piṇḍāya caritvāti piṇḍāya caraṇahetu. Hetuatthepi hi tvāsaddameke icchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1568_0: Uttarāpathato āgatā, uttarāpatho vā nivāso etesanti uttarāpathakāti vattabbe niruttinayena
tika-vin01t1:1568_2: pāḷipāṭho veditabbo. Keci pana “uttaraṃ visiṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āharantīti uttarāhakā,
tika-vin01t1:1568_3: uttaraṃ vā adhikaṃ agghaṃ nentīti uttarāhakā”tiādinā aññena pakārena atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin01t1:1568_4: Assānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhāneti assānaṃ ākaraṭṭhāne. Verañjanti verañjāyaṃ. Bhummatthe hetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1568_5: upayogavacanaṃ. Mandiranti assasālaṃ. Assamaṇḍalikāyoti paññāyiṃsūti parimaṇḍalākārena
tika-vin01t1:1568_6: katattā assamaṇḍalikāyoti pākaṭā ahesuṃ. Evaṃ katānañca assasālānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacananiddeso
tika-vin01t1:1568_7: kato. Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ assānaṃ vasanokāso ekekā assamaṇḍalikātipi vadanti. Addhānakkhamā
tika-vin01t1:1568_8: na hontīti dīghakālaṃ pavattetuṃ khamā na honti, na cirakālappavattinoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1569_0: Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇā disā appatirūpadeso, uttarā disā patirūpadesoti adhippāyenāha “na
tika-vin01t1:1569_1: hi te”tiādi. Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇatīrajātā dakkhiṇāpathamanussā. “Amhākaṃ buddho”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1569_2: buddhaṃ mamāyantīti buddhamāmakā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Paṭiyādetunti sampādetuṃ. Niccabhattasaṅkhepenāti
tika-vin01t1:1569_3: niccabhattākārena. Pubbaṇhasamayanti idaṃ bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “pubbaṇhasamayeti
tika-vin01t1:1569_4: attho”ti. Accantasaṃyoge vā idaṃ upayogavacananti dassetuṃ yathā accantasaṃyogattho
tika-vin01t1:1569_5: sambhavati, tathā atthaṃ dassento āha “pubbaṇhe vā samaya”ntiādi. Evanti evaṃ pacchā
tika-vin01t1:1569_6: vuttanayena atthe vuccamāne. Nanu ca vihāre nisīdantāpi antaravāsakaṃ nivāsetvāva
tika-vin01t1:1569_7: nisīdanti, tasmā “nivāsetvā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha “vihāranivāsanaparivattanavasenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1569_8: Vihāranivāsanaparivattanañca vihāre nisinnakāle nivatthampi puna gāmappavesanasamaye
tika-vin01t1:1569_9: cāletvā ito cito ca saṇṭhapetvā sakkaccaṃ nivāsanamevāti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha “na
tika-vin01t1:1569_10: hi te tato pubbe anivatthā ahesu”nti. Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattañca cīvarañca gahetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1569_11: Gahaṇañcettha na kevalaṃ hattheneva, atha kho yena kenaci ākārena dhāraṇamevāti dassento
tika-vin01t1:1570_0: Gatagataṭṭhāneti assamaṇḍalikāsu sampattasampattaṭṭhāne. Udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā
tika-vin01t1:1570_1: paribhuñjantīti ettha kasmā pana te bhikkhū sayameva evaṃ katvā paribhuñjanti, kimevaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1570_2: laddhaṃ kappiyakārakehi yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā pacāpetvā sayaṃ vā pacitvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t1:1570_3: na vaṭṭatīti āha “therānaṃ koci kappiyakārako natthī”tiādi. Kappiyākappiyabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1570_4: anapekkhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ kātuṃ sāruppaṃ na hotīti vatvā puna akappiyabhāvampi
tika-vin01t1:1570_5: dassento āha “na ca vaṭṭatī”ti. Bhājanādipariharaṇavasena bahubhaṇḍikatāya abhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1570_6: vuttaṃ “sallahukavuttitā”ti. Sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭivīsanti attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ. Appossukkāti
tika-vin01t1:1570_7: samaṇadhammato aññattha nirussāhā. Tadupiyanti tadanurūpaṃ. Pisatīti cuṇṇeti. Puññañāṇavisesehi
tika-vin01t1:1570_8: kattabbakammassa manāpatā hotīti āha “puññavatā”tiādi. Nanti naṃ patthapulakaṃ. “Na
tika-vin01t1:1570_9: tato paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanato tato pubbe bhagavato piṇḍāya caraṇampi dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1571_0: Laddhāti labhitvā. “Laddho”ti vā pāṭho, upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ neva laddhoti attho. Kadā
tika-vin01t1:1571_1: pana thero upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhoti? Vuccate – ekadā kira bhagavā nāgasamālattherena
tika-vin01t1:1571_2: saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patto. Thero maggā ukkamma “bhagavā ahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1571_3: iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ bhagavā “ehi bhikkhu, iminā gacchāmā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1571_4: So “handa bhagavā tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ iminā gacchāmī”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1571_5: chamāyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. Atha bhagavā “āhara bhikkhū”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t1:1571_6: gato. Tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu, sīsañca
tika-vin01t1:1571_7: bhindiṃsu. So “bhagavā dāni me paṭisaraṇaṃ, na añño”ti cintetvā lohitena gaḷantena
tika-vin01t1:1571_8: bhagavato santikaṃ āgami. “Kimidaṃ bhikkhū”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Atha
tika-vin01t1:1571_9: naṃ bhagavā “mā cintayi bhikkhu, etaṃ kāraṇaṃyeva te nivārayimhā”ti vatvā samassāsesi.
tika-vin01t1:1572_0: Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1572_1: Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā “bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1572_2: tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ etasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti vatvā
tika-vin01t1:1572_3: bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi anvāsatto paccāgantvā
tika-vin01t1:1572_4: taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tampi bhagavā “idameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhayitvā nivārayimhā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1572_5: vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane
tika-vin01t1:1572_6: nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi – “bhikkhave, idānimhi mahallako,
tika-vin01t1:1572_7: ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti, ekacce mayhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1572_8: bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanti, mayhaṃ nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṃ bhikkhuṃ jānāthā”ti. Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasaṃvego
tika-vin01t1:1572_9: udapādi. Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tumheyeva
tika-vin01t1:1572_10: patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūresiṃ, nanu mādiso mahāpañño
tika-vin01t1:1572_11: upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati, ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā “alaṃ, sāriputta,
tika-vin01t1:1572_12: yassaṃ disāyaṃ tvaṃ viharasi, asuññāyeva sā disā, tava ovādo buddhānaṃ ovādasadiso,
tika-vin01t1:1572_13: na me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi. Etenevupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1572_14: katvā asītimahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Sabbe bhagavā paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin01t1:1573_0: Ānandatthero pana tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu “āvuso, bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin01t1:1573_1: upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācati, tvampi yācāhī”ti. Yācitvā laddhaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āvuso kīdisaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1573_2: hoti, kiṃ maṃ satthā na passati, sace rocessati, “ānando maṃ upaṭṭhātū”ti vakkhatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1573_3: Atha bhagavā “na, bhikkhave, ānando aññena ussāhetabbo, sayameva jānitvā maṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1573_4: āha. Tato bhikkhū “uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda, uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda, dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1573_5: yācāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Thero uṭṭhahitvā cattāro paṭikkhepe ca catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.
tika-vin01t1:1574_0: Cattāro paṭikkhepā nāma “sace me, bhante bhagavā, attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1574_1: na dassati, piṇḍapātaṃ na dassati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasituṃ na dassati, nimantanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1574_2: gahetvā na gamissati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda,
tika-vin01t1:1574_3: ādīnavaṃ addasā”ti vutte āha “sacāhaṃ, bhante, imāni vatthūni labhissāmi, bhavissanti
tika-vin01t1:1574_4: vattāro ‘ānando dasabalena laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati,
tika-vin01t1:1574_5: ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasati, ekanimantanaṃ gacchati, etaṃ lābhaṃ labhanto tathāgataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1574_6: upaṭṭhāti, ko evaṃ upaṭṭhahato bhāro”’ti. Ime cattāro paṭikkhepe yāci.
tika-vin01t1:1575_0: Catasso āyācanā nāma “sace, bhante bhagavā, mayā gahitaṃ nimantanaṃ gamissati, sacāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_1: tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataparisaṃ āgatakkhaṇe eva bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_2: dassetuṃ lacchāmi, yadā me kaṅkhā uppajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_3: lacchāmi, tathā yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_4: kathessati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda, ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_5: passasī”ti vutte āha “idha, bhante, saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā maṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_6: evaṃ vadanti ‘sveva, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti.
tika-vin01t1:1575_7: Sace bhagavā tattha na gamissati, icchitakkhaṇeyeva parisaṃ dassetuṃ kaṅkhañca vinodetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_8: okāsaṃ na lacchāmi, bhavissanti vattāro ‘kiṃ ānando dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhāti, ettakampissa
tika-vin01t1:1575_9: anuggahaṃ bhagavā na karotī’ti. Bhagavato ca parammukhā maṃ pucchissanti ‘ayaṃ, āvuso
tika-vin01t1:1575_10: ānanda, gāthā idaṃ suttaṃ idaṃ jātakaṃ kattha desita’nti. Sacāhaṃ taṃ na sampāyissāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1575_11: bhavissanti vattāro ‘ettakampi, āvuso, na jānāsi, kasmā tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1575_12: na vijahanto dīgharattaṃ ciraṃ vicarī’ti. Tenāhaṃ parammukhā desitassapi dhammassa
tika-vin01t1:1575_13: puna kathanaṃ icchāmī”ti. Imā catasso āyācanā yāci. Bhagavāpissa adāsi. Evaṃ ime
tika-vin01t1:1576_0: Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi,
tika-vin01t1:1576_1: pāpuṇitvā ca upaṭṭhākānaṃ aggo hutvā bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahi. Thero hi upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1576_2: laddhakālato paṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ duvidhena udakena tividhena dantakaṭṭhena pādaparikammena
tika-vin01t1:1576_4: “imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
tika-vin01t1:1576_5: taṃ taṃ nipphādento mahatiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava
tika-vin01t1:1576_6: vāre anupariyāyati. Evañhissa ahosi “sace me thinamiddhaṃ okkameyya, bhagavati pakkosante
tika-vin01t1:1576_7: paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ nāhaṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti. Tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na
tika-vin01t1:1576_8: muñcati, evametassa nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṭṭhānassa aladdhabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “no ca
tika-vin01t1:1576_9: kho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhā”ti. Nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthīti niyatupaṭṭhāko nāma
tika-vin01t1:1576_10: natthi. Aniyatupaṭṭhākā pana bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bahū ahesuṃ, te dassento āha
tika-vin01t1:1576_11: “kadāci nāgasamālatthero”tiādi. Ñāti ca so pasatthatamaguṇayogato seṭṭho cāti ñātiseṭṭho.
tika-vin01t1:1576_12: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu ayameva patirūpoti āpadāsu āmisassa abhisaṅkharitvā dānaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t1:1577_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tenevāha “āvaṭṭetvā mohetvā”tiādi. Tiṭṭhantu…pe… tampi māro āvaṭṭeyyāti
tika-vin01t1:1577_2: phussassa bhagavato kāle katupacitassa akusalakammassa tadā laddhokāsavasena upaṭṭhitattā.
tika-vin01t1:1579: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
tika-vin01t1:1582_1: āgamiṃsūti mārena āvaṭṭetvā gate pacchā āgamiṃsu. Avisahatāyāti asakkuṇeyyatāya.
tika-vin01t1:1582_3: bhagavato dassāmā”ti niccabhattavasena paricchinditvā ṭhapitadānassa. Appitavatthassāti
tika-vin01t1:1582_4: “idaṃ buddhassa catupaccayaparibhogattha”nti vihāraṃ netvā dinnavatthuno. Na visahatīti
tika-vin01t1:1582_6: samantato byāmamattāya pabhāya. Ettha ca anubyañjanānaṃ byāmappabhāya ca nippabhākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1583_0: Assosi kho bhagavā udukkhalasaddanti kiṃ sayameva uppannaṃ udukkhalasaddaṃ assosīti
tika-vin01t1:1583_2: Anatthasañhiteti anatthanissite vacane. Ghātāpekkhaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Yasmiñca yena
tika-vin01t1:1583_3: ghāto nipphādīyati, tasseva tena ghāto kato nāma hotīti āha “maggeneva tādisassa
tika-vin01t1:1583_4: vacanassa ghāto samucchedoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Sāmiatthe vā bhummavacananti maññamāno
tika-vin01t1:1583_5: evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vacanassa ca samugghāto tammūlakilesānaṃ samugghātenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1584_0: Ākaroti attano anurūpatāya samariyādaṃ saparicchedaṃ phalaṃ nipphattetīti ākāro kāraṇanti
tika-vin01t1:1584_1: āha “ākārehīti kāraṇehī”ti. Aṭṭhuppattiyuttanti paccuppannavatthuṃ nissāya pavattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1584_2: Tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvāti “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādipucchāya
tika-vin01t1:1584_3: tena bhikkhunā katavītikkamaṃ pakāsetvā, vītikkamappakāsanañca kimatthamidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1585_0: Natthi kiñci vattabbanti pubbe vuttanayattā na kiñci ettha apubbaṃ vattabbamatthīti
tika-vin01t1:1585_1: dasseti. Tenāha “pubbe vuttameva hī”tiādi. Sādhu sādhūti idaṃ pasaṃsāyaṃ āmeḍitavacananti
tika-vin01t1:1585_2: āha “āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sampahaṃsento”ti. Dvīsu ākāresūti dhammadesanasikkhāpadapaññattisaṅkhātesu
tika-vin01t1:1585_3: dvīsu kāraṇesu. Ekaṃ gahetvāti dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti evaṃ vuttakāraṇaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1585_4: Evaṃdubbhikkheti evaṃ dukkhena labhitabbā bhikkhā etthāti evaṃdubbhikkhe kāle, dese
tika-vin01t1:1585_5: vā. Dullabhapiṇḍeti etasseva atthadīpanaṃ. Bhājanādipariharaṇavasena bahubhaṇḍikatāya
tika-vin01t1:1585_6: abhāvato vuttaṃ “imāya sallahukavuttitāyā”ti. Ettakameva alaṃ yāpetunti uttari patthanābhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1585_7: pana “iminā ca sallekhenā”ti vuttaṃ. Dubbhikkhaṃ vijitanti ettha hi bhikkhānaṃ abhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1585_9: abhāvato bhikkhūhi vijito vase vattito. Lobho vijitoti āmisahetu ratticchedavassacchedasamuṭṭhāpako
tika-vin01t1:1585_10: loluppādopi tesaṃ nāhosīti āmisalolatāsaṅkhāto lobho vijito. Icchācāro vijitoti “āmisahetu
tika-vin01t1:1585_11: aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammappakāsanavasena guṇavaṇijjaṃ katvā jīvikaṃ kappessāmā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1585_12: evaṃ pavattaicchācārassa abhāvato yathāvutto icchācāro vijito. Cittuppādamattassapi
tika-vin01t1:1585_13: anuppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya “cintā vā”ti vuttaṃ. Punappunānusocanavasena pana cittapīḷāpi
tika-vin01t1:1586_0: Ratticchedo vāti sattāhakaraṇīyavasena gantvā bahi aruṇuṭṭhāpanavasena ratticchedo
tika-vin01t1:1586_1: vā na kato sattāhakiccavasenapi katthaci agatattā. Sattāhakiccavasena vippavāsañhi
tika-vin01t1:1586_2: sandhāya ratticchedoti aṭṭhakathāvohāro, tatoyeva ca vassūpanāyikakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1586_4: gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā sattāhakaraṇīyameva vibhattaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1586_5: “sattāhakiccena gantvā ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā na kato”ti. Evañca katvā ratticchedo
tika-vin01t1:1586_6: nāma sattāhakaraṇīyavasena hoti, na aññathāti ratticchedalakkhaṇañca kathitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1586_7: Ettha ca paccayavekallasaṅkhāte vassacchedakāraṇe sati ratticchedassapi vuttattā
tika-vin01t1:1586_8: yattha vassacchedakāraṇaṃ labbhati, tattha sattāhakiccena gantumpi vaṭṭatīti siddhanti
tika-vin01t1:1586_9: cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ, taṃ suvuttaṃ vassūpanāyikakkhandhake
tika-vin01t1:1587: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse vassūpagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāmo corehi vuṭṭhāsi. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yena gāmo tena gantu”nti –
tika-vin01t1:1588_0: Ettha “sace gāmo avidūragato hoti, tattha piṇḍāya caritvā vihārameva āgantvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1588_1: Sace dūragato, sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo. Na sakkā ce hoti, tattheva sabhāgaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:1588_2: vasitabba”nti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanenapi saṃsandanato. Tathā hi gāme vuṭṭhite bhikkhāya
tika-vin01t1:1588_3: abhāvato vassacchedepi anāpattiṃ vadantena bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yena
tika-vin01t1:1588_4: gāmo tena gantu”nti vuttattā bhikkhāya abhāvo vassacchedakāraṇaṃ. Tattha “sace dūragato,
tika-vin01t1:1588_5: sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ vassacchedakāraṇe sati
tika-vin01t1:1590_0: “Ratticchedoti sattāhakiccaṃ sandhāya vutto, sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā ratticchedo
tika-vin01t1:1590_1: vā vassacchedo vā ekabhikkhunāpi na katoti vuttaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā vassacchedassa
tika-vin01t1:1590_2: kāraṇe sati sattāhakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke. Vinayadharā pana na icchanti, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:1591_0: Taṃ pana sayaṃ sammūḷhassa paresaṃ mohuppādanamattaṃ. Na hi vinayadharānaṃ anicchāya
tika-vin01t1:1591_1: kāraṇaṃ dissati aṭṭhakathāya virujjhanato yuttiabhāvato ca. Yañhi kāraṇaṃ vassacchedepi
tika-vin01t1:1591_2: anāpattiṃ sādheti, tasmiṃ sati vinā vassacchedaṃ sattāhakiccena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t1:1591_3: kā nāma yutti. “Pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmā”ti idaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anurūpaparivitakkanapaadīpanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1591_4: na pana visesatthaparidīpanaṃ. Tathā hi dubbhikkhatāya vassacchedakaraṇasabbhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1591_5: purimikāya tāva vassacchedepi anāpatti. Pacchimikāyaṃ anupagantukāmatāya gamanepi
tika-vin01t1:1592_0: Na kismiñci maññantīti kismiñci guṇe sambhāvanavasena na maññanti. Pakāsetvāti paṭiladdhajjhānādiguṇavasena
tika-vin01t1:1592_1: pakāsetvā. “Pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā”ti vuttanayena kucchipaṭijaggane sati tathāpavattaicchācārassa
tika-vin01t1:1592_2: aparisuddhabhāvato ājīvasuddhiyā ca abhāvato puna vāyamitvā saṃvare patiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin01t1:1593_0: Kiṃ idanti garahaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Sālitaṇḍulehi sampāditaṃ maṃsena upasittaṃ odanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1593_1: sālimaṃsodanaṃ. Atimaññissatīti avaññātakaraṇavasena atikkamitvā maññissati, lāmakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1593_2: nihīnaṃ katvā maññissatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ karissatī”ti. Heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1593_3: katvā nihīnaṃ katvā ñātaṃ oññātaṃ. Avaññātanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Svāyanti so ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1593_4: janapado. Imāya paṭipattiyāti verañjāyaṃ pūritāya sudukkarāya paṭipattiyā. Tumhe
tika-vin01t1:1593_5: nissāyāti tumhākaṃ imaṃ appicchapaṭipadaṃ nissāya. Sabrahmacārīsaṅkhātāti chabbaggiyādayo
tika-vin01t1:1593_6: vuttā. Tumhākaṃ antare nisīditvāti tumhākaṃ majjhe nisīditvā, tumhehi saddhiṃ nisīditvāti
tika-vin01t1:1593_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Omānanti atimānaṃ. Atimānoyeva hettha nihīnatāya “omāna”nti vutto, na
tika-vin01t1:1593_8: pana hīḷetvā maññanaṃ. Tumhehi, ānanda, sappurisehi vijitaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ pacchimā
tika-vin01t1:1593_9: janatā atimaññissatīti evamettha pāḷiṃ yojetvā atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-vin01t1:1593_10: – yaṃ laddhaṃ, teneva tussitvā sālimaṃsodanapatthanāya chinnattā ca tumhehi vijitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1593_11: abhibhūtaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ pacchimā janatā tattha patthanaṃ chindituṃ asamatthatāya atimaññissatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1596_0: 17. Āyasmāti vā devānaṃpiyāti vā bhadrabhavanti vā piyasamudācāro esoti āha “āyasmāti
tika-vin01t1:1596_1: piyavacanameta”nti. Viññujātikā hi paraṃ piyena samudācarantā “bhava”nti vā “devānaṃpiyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1596_2: vā “āyasmā”ti vā samudācaranti, tasmā sammukhā sambodhanavasena āvusoti, tirokkhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1596_3: āyasmāti ayampi samudācāro. Tayidaṃ piyavacanaṃ garugāravasappatissavasena vuccatīti
tika-vin01t1:1596_5: atthitāyāti āha “mahā ca so guṇamahantatāyā”ti. Pappaṭakojanti pathavīsandhārakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1596_6: udakaṃ āhacca ṭhite mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale samuṭṭhitaṃ udakoghena ajjhotthaṭe
tika-vin01t1:1596_7: bhūmippadese sañjātakaddamapaṭalasadisaṃ atimadhurapathavīmaṇḍaṃ. Na me taṃ assa
tika-vin01t1:1596_8: patirūpanti taṃ anāpucchā karaṇaṃ na me anucchavikaṃ bhaveyyāti attho. Anāpucchā
tika-vin01t1:1596_9: karontena ca yathā bhagavā icchiticchitaṃ kiñci anāpucchā karoti, evamahampīti bhagavatā
tika-vin01t1:1596_10: samānaṃ katvā attānaṃ mānena kataṃ viya bhavissatīti āha “yugaggāho viya bhagavatā
tika-vin01t1:1596_11: saddhiṃ kato bhaveyyā”ti. Parena hi saddhiṃ attānaṃ yugaṃ yugaḷaṃ samānaṃ katvā gāho,
tika-vin01t1:1596_12: tassa mama vā ko visesoti gahaṇaṃ yugaggāho.
tika-vin01t1:1597_0: Sampannanti sampattiyuttaṃ. Sā panettha rasasampatti adhippetā sāmaññajotanāya visese
tika-vin01t1:1597_1: avaṭṭhānato. Tenāha “sampannanti madhuraṃ sādurasanti attho”ti. Tividhañhi sampannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1599: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1600_0: Idaṃ paripuṇṇasampannaṃ nāma. Paripuṇṇampi hi samantato pannaṃ pattanti sampannanti
tika-vin01t1:1600_1: vuccati. “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno
tika-vin01t1:1600_2: samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgīsampannaṃ nāma. Samaṅgīpi hi sammadeva panno gato upagatoti
tika-vin01t1:1600_3: sampannoti vuccati. “Tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo cā”ti idaṃ madhurasampannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1600_4: nāma. Tattha madhurasampannaṃ idhādhippetanti veditabbaṃ. Upapannaphaloti bahuphalo.
tika-vin01t1:1600_5: Assāti pathaviyā heṭṭhimatalassa. Opammanidassanatthanti upamāya nidassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1600_6: Anīḷakanti niddosaṃ. Niddosatā cettha makkhikādirahitatāyāti āha “nimmakkhika”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1600_7: Natthi ettha makkhikāti nimmakkhikaṃ. Makkhikāsaddena cettha makkhikaṇḍakampi sāmaññato
tika-vin01t1:1600_8: gahitanti vadanti. Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “nimmakkhikanti imassevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1600_9: pakāsetuṃ nimmakkhikaṇḍakanti vuttaṃ, makkhikāhi tāsaṃ aṇḍakehi ca virahitanti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1600_10: Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti “makkhikānaṃ aṇḍāni makkhikaṇḍāni, natthi ettha makkhikaṇḍānīti
tika-vin01t1:1600_11: nimmakkhikaṇḍanti. Iminā makkhikānaṃ aṇḍehi rahitatā vuttā, ‘nimmakkhika’nti iminā
tika-vin01t1:1600_12: pana makkhikānaṃyeva abhāvo vutto”ti. Etaṃ kira madhūti khuddakamakkhikāhi katamadhu.
tika-vin01t1:1600_13: Sabbamadhūhīti mahāmakkhikabhamaramakkhikādikatehi. Agganti uttamaṃ. Seṭṭhanti pasatthatamaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1601_0: Āyācanavacanametanti iminā sampaṭicchanasampahaṃsanādiatthaṃ nivatteti. Ekaṃ hatthanti
tika-vin01t1:1601_2: vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ nu kho pathavī, udāhu na ayanti iminā nimmitapathaviyā pakatipathaviyā
tika-vin01t1:1601_3: ca sandissamānattā “esā nu kho amhākaṃ pathavī, udāhu aññā”ti uppajjamānakukkuccaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1601_4: dasseti. Nibaddhavipulāgamo gāmo nigamo, pavattitamahāāyo mahāgāmoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1601_5: Na vā esa vipallāsoti pubbapakkhaṃ nidasseti. Kasmā panesa vipallāso na hotīti āha
tika-vin01t1:1601_6: “acinteyyo hi iddhimato iddhivisayo”ti. Iddhibaleneva tesaṃ sattānaṃ tādiso vipallāso
tika-vin01t1:1601_7: na bhavissatīti adhippāyo. Idāni aññathā vipallāsappaṭilābhaṃ dassento āha “evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1601_8: panā”tiādi. Garahantāti sammukhā garahantā. Upavadantāti parammukhā akkosantā.
tika-vin01t1:1602_0: Nanu ca uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyunti
tika-vin01t1:1602_1: kāraṇaṃ na vuttaṃ, tasmā kimettha kāraṇanti āha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Yadipi na
tika-vin01t1:1602_2: vuttaṃ, tathāpi “vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyu”nti pubbe adhikatattā teneva kāraṇena
tika-vin01t1:1602_3: piṇḍāya uttarakurugamanampi bhagavatā paṭisiddhanti viññāyati, tasmā tadeva kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1602_4: idhāpi gahetabbanti dassento āha “pubbe vuttanayeneva gahetabba”nti. Vipallāsampi
tika-vin01t1:1602_5: sattā paṭilabheyyunti idaṃ idha avuttampi ānetvā sambandhitabbanti adhippāyo. Atthopi
tika-vin01t1:1602_6: cassa vuttasadisameva veditabboti. “Evaṃ pana vipallāsaṃ paṭilabheyyu”ntiādinā pacchā
tika-vin01t1:1602_7: vuttameva atthavikappaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ “te guṇe nibbattetvā
tika-vin01t1:1602_8: dubbhikkhakāle pathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ paribhuñjiṃsū”ti, taṃ apanetvā
tika-vin01t1:1602_9: te guṇe nibbattetvā dubbhikkhakāle uttarakuruṃ gantvā piṇḍāya caritvā paribhuñjiṃsūti
tika-vin01t1:1602_10: evamettha yojanā kātabbā. Ekena padavītihārenāti ettha padassa vītiharaṇaṃ nikkhipanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1602_11: padavītihāro, padanikkhepo, tasmā ekena padanikkhepenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekena padavītihārena
tika-vin01t1:1602_12: atikkamitabbaṭṭhānañca samagamanena dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin01t1:1602_13: Mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1605_0: 18. Vinayapaññattiyāti pubbe apaññattasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Thero hi paññattasikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t1:1605_1: ṭhapetvā idāni paññapetabbasikkhāpadāni pātimokkhuddesañca sandhāya “etassa bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1605_2: kālo, etassa sugata kālo, yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya, uddiseyya
tika-vin01t1:1606_0: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1606_1: bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahiṃsu. Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena etarahi
tika-vin01t1:1606_2: bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti, appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantīti. Evametaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1606_3: bhaddāli, hoti, sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t1:1606_4: honti, appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantīti. Na tāva, bhaddāli, satthā sāvakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1606_5: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti, yāva na idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṅghe pātubhavantī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1607_0: Imasmiṃ bhaddālisutte viya ekaccesu paññattesupi tato paraṃ paññapetabbāni sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:1607_1: “na tāva, sāriputta, satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī”ti vuttaṃ. Idheva ca
tika-vin01t1:1607_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti, na ca vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ “ratticchedo
tika-vin01t1:1607_3: vā vassacchedo vā na kato”ti vacanañca pubbe paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāve pamāṇanti
tika-vin01t1:1607_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesasikkhāpadānañceva pātimokkhuddesassa ca therassa āyācanena paññattattā
tika-vin01t1:1607_5: “mūlato pabhuti nidānaṃ dassetu”nti āha. Rahogatassāti raho janavivittaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatassa.
tika-vin01t1:1607_6: Tena gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvena therassa kāyavivekamāha. Paṭisallīnassāti nānārammaṇacārato
tika-vin01t1:1607_7: cittassa nivattiyā paṭi sammadeva nilīnassa tattha avisaṭacittassa. Tena cittasaṅgaṇikābhāvenassa
tika-vin01t1:1607_8: pubbabhāgiyaṃ cittavivekamāha. Ciranti kālāpekkhaṃ accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1608_0: Etaṃ na sakkotīti etaṃ vinicchinituṃ na sakkoti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t1:1608_1: idāni theravādaṃ dassento āha “mahāpadumatthero panā”tiādi. Aṭṭhakathāyampi “na sakkotī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1608_2: idaṃ yasmā jānamānopi sammadeva paricchindituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā vuttanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1608_3: Soḷasavidhāya paññāya matthakaṃ pattassāti majjhimanikāye anupadasuttantadesanāya –
tika-vin01t1:1609_0: “Mahāpañño bhikkhave sāriputto, puthupañño bhikkhave sāriputto, hāsapañño bhikkhave
tika-vin01t1:1609_1: sāriputto, javanapañño bhikkhave sāriputto, tikkhapañño bhikkhave sāriputto, nibbedhikapañño
tika-vin01t1:1610: Evamāgatā mahāpaññādikā cha, tasmiṃyeva sutte āgatā navānupubbavihārasamāpattipaññā, arahattamaggapaññāti imāsaṃ soḷasappabhedānaṃ paññānaṃ sāvakavisaye ukkaṭṭhakoṭippattassa.
tika-vin01t1:1611_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavā vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1611_1: kathesi, na buddhavaṃsadesanāyaṃ viya pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ, tato vā pana bhiyyoti?
tika-vin01t1:1611_2: Yesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ ekaṃsato nicchayena ajjāpi dharati, na antarahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1611_3: te eva kittento vipassīādīnaṃyeva bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1611_4: idha kathesi. Tesaṃyeva hi sāvakā tadā ceva etarahi ca suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:1611_5: na aññesaṃ parinibbutattā. Siddhatthatissaphussānaṃ kira buddhānaṃ sāvakā suddhāvāsesu
tika-vin01t1:1611_6: uppannā uppattisamanantarameva imasmiṃ sāsane upakādayo viya arahattaṃ adhigantvā
tika-vin01t1:1611_7: na cirasseva parinibbāyiṃsu, na tattha tattha sāvakā yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhaṃsūti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1611_8: Apubbācarimaniyamo pana aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇakasattāvāsavasena ekissā lokadhātuyā
tika-vin01t1:1612_0: 19. Asādhāraṇo hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayoti evamādivibhāgena idha payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1612_1: vipassīādīnaṃ pana brahmacariyassa aciraṭṭhitikatāya ciraṭṭhitikatāya ca kāraṇapucchāparattā
tika-vin01t1:1612_2: codanāyāti āha “hetu paccayoti ubhayametaṃ kāraṇādhivacana”nti. Hinoti tena phalanti
tika-vin01t1:1612_3: hetūti karaṇasādhanoyaṃ hetusaddoti āha “tena tassa phala”ntiādi. Kattusādhanopi
tika-vin01t1:1612_4: hetusaddo no na yujjati hinoti phalassa hetubhāvaṃ upagacchatīti hetūti. Taṃ paṭicca
tika-vin01t1:1612_5: eti pavattatīti taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tassa phalaṃ eti pavattati nibbattatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1613_0: Kilāsuno ahesunti appossukkā ahesuṃ, nirussāhā ahesunti attho. Sā pana nirussāhatā
tika-vin01t1:1613_1: na ālasiyavasenāti āha “na ālasiyakilāsuno”ti, ālasiyavasena kilāsuno nāhesunti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1613_2: Tattha kāraṇamāha “na hī”tiādi. Ālasiyaṃ vāti iminā thinamiddhavasappavattānaṃ akusalānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1613_3: abhāvamāha. Osannavīriyatā vāti iminā pana “ālasiyābhāvepi antamaso annabhāranesādānampi
tika-vin01t1:1613_4: sakkaccaṃyeva dhammaṃ desetī”ti vacanato yassa kassacipi dhammadesanāya nirussāhatā
tika-vin01t1:1613_5: natthīti dīpeti sabbesaṃ samakeneva ussāhena dhammadesanāya pavattanato. Tenāha “buddhā
tika-vin01t1:1613_6: hī”tiādi. Osannavīriyāti ohīnavīriyā, appossukkāti attho. Ussannavīriyāti adhikavīriyā,
tika-vin01t1:1613_7: mahussāhāti attho. Vegenāti javena. Dhamme garu etesanti dhammagaruno. Dhamme gāravametesanti
tika-vin01t1:1613_8: dhammagāravā. Vipassissa bhagavato kāle asīti vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ sikhissa
tika-vin01t1:1613_9: sattati vassasahassāni, vessabhussa saṭṭhivassasahassāni āyuppamāṇanti āha “tesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1613_10: kira kāle dīghāyukā sattā”ti. Abhisamentīti paṭivijjhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1614_0: Niddosatāyāti vītikkamadosassa abhāvato. “Imasmiṃ vītikkame ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1614_1: āpattivasena apaññapetvā “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”tiādinā dhammadesanāvasena
tika-vin01t1:1614_3: apaññatta”nti. Channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ accayenāti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā channaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1614_4: channaṃ vassānaṃ osānadivasaṃ apekkhitvā “sakiṃ saki”nti vuttattā tadapekkhamidaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1614_5: sāmivacanaṃ. Sakalajambudīpe sabbopi bhikkhusaṅgho ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne uposathaṃ akāsīti
tika-vin01t1:1614_6: sambandho. Katamaṃ taṃ ṭhānanti āha “bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā”tiādi. Isipatanaṃ tena
tika-vin01t1:1614_7: samayena khemaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ hoti, migānaṃ pana abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti
tika-vin01t1:1615_0: Abbokiṇṇāni dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhusahassāni vasantīti visabhāgapuggalehi asaṃsaṭṭhāni
tika-vin01t1:1615_1: dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhūnaṃ sahassāni vasanti. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “te sabbepi
tika-vin01t1:1615_3: ca ahesu”nti vuttaṃ. Uposathārocikāti uposathārocanakā. Tā kira devatā ekamhi vasse
