tika-vin01t1:1615_4: nikkhante tattha tattha gantvā ārocenti “nikkhantaṃ kho, mārisā, ekaṃ vassaṃ, pañca
tika-vin01t1:1615_5: dāni vassāni sesāni, pañcannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena bandhumatī rājadhānī upasaṅkamitabbā
tika-vin01t1:1615_6: pātimokkhuddesāyā”ti. Tathā dvīsu vassesu nikkhantesu “nikkhantāni kho, mārisā, dve
tika-vin01t1:1615_7: vassāni, cattāri vassāni sesāni, catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena bandhumatī rājadhānī
tika-vin01t1:1615_8: upasaṅkamitabbā pātimokkhuddesāyā”ti ārocenti. Imināva nayena tīsu catūsu pañcasu
tika-vin01t1:1615_9: vassesu atikkantesu ārocenti. Tena vuttaṃ “mārisā ekaṃ vassaṃ atikkanta”ntiādi. Sānubhāvāti
tika-vin01t1:1615_10: iddhānubhāvena sānubhāvā. Te kira bhikkhūti ye devatānubhāvena gacchanti, te sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:1615_11: vadati. Pācīnasamuddanteti pācīnasamuddassa samīpadese. Gamiyavattanti gamikehi kātabbaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1615_13: devatānubhāvena gatā eva honti. Teti attano attano ānubhāvena devatānubhāvena ca gatā sabbepi.
tika-vin01t1:1616_0: Khantī paramantiādīsu parūpavādaṃ parāpakāraṃ sītuṇhādibhedañca guṇoparodhaṃ khamati
tika-vin01t1:1616_1: sahati adhivāsetīti khanti. Sā pana sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme savisesaṃ tapati santapati
tika-vin01t1:1616_2: vidhamatīti paramaṃ uttamaṃ tapo. Titikkhanaṃ khamanaṃ titikkhā. Khantiyāyevetaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1616_3: vevacanaṃ. Akkharacintakā hi khamāyaṃ titikkhāsaddaṃ vaṇṇenti, tasmā evamettha attho
tika-vin01t1:1616_4: daṭṭhabbo “titikkhāsaṅkhātā adhivāsanakhanti nāma uttamaṃ tapo”ti. Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1616_5: vadanti buddhāti bhavena bhavantaraṃ vināti bhavanikantibhāvena saṃsibbati, sataṇhasseva
tika-vin01t1:1616_6: vā āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato phalena saddhiṃ kammaṃ vināti saṃsibbatīti vānanti saṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1616_7: gatāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ tattha tassā sabbaso abhāvato. Taṃ nibbānaṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:1617_0: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātīti yo adhivāsanakhantirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādhati
tika-vin01t1:1617_1: vihiṃsati, so pabbajito nāma na hoti pabbājetabbadhammassa apabbājanato. Catutthapādo
tika-vin01t1:1617_2: pana tatiyapādasseva vevacanaṃ anatthantarattā. “Na hi pabbajito”ti etassa hi “na
tika-vin01t1:1617_3: samaṇo hotī”ti vevacanaṃ. “Parūpaghātī”ti etassa “paraṃ viheṭhayanto”ti vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1617_4: Atha vā parūpaghātīti sīlūpaghātī. Sīlañhi uttamaṭṭhena “para”nti vuccati parasaddassa
tika-vin01t1:1617_5: seṭṭhavācakattā “puggalaparoparaññū”tiādīsu viya. Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1617_6: viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti attano sīlavināsako, so pabbajito nāma na hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1617_7: Atha vā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvā parūpaghātī hoti, paraṃ antamaso ḍaṃsamakasampi
tika-vin01t1:1617_8: jīvitā voropeti, so na hi pabbajito. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Pāpamalassa apabbājitattā anīhaṭattā.
tika-vin01t1:1617_9: “Pabbājayamattano malaṃ, tasmā pabbajitoti vuccatī”ti idañhi pabbajitalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1617_10: Yopi naheva kho upaghāteti na māreti, apica daṇḍādīhi viheṭheti, sopi paraṃ viheṭhayanto
tika-vin01t1:1617_11: samaṇo na hoti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Vihesāya asamitattā. Samitattā samaṇoti vuccatīti idañhi
tika-vin01t1:1617_12: samaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. “Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ, samaṇoti pavuccatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1618_0: Apica bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanto pātimokkhakathāya ca sīlappadhānattā
tika-vin01t1:1618_1: sīlassa ca visesato doso paṭipakkhoti tassa niggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ādito “khantī
tika-vin01t1:1618_2: paramaṃ tapo”ti āha. Tena aniṭṭhassa paṭihananūpāyo vutto, titikkhāggahaṇena pana
tika-vin01t1:1618_3: iṭṭhassa, tadubhayenapi uppannaṃ aratiṃ uppannaṃ ratiṃ abhibhuyya viharatīti ayamattho
tika-vin01t1:1618_4: dassito. Taṇhāvānassa vūpasamanato nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā. Tattha khantiggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:1618_5: payogavipattiyā abhāvo dassito, titikkhāggahaṇena āsayavipattiyā abhāvo. Tathā khantiggahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:1618_6: parāparādhasahatā, titikkhāggahaṇena paresu anaparajjhanā dassitā. Evaṃ kāraṇamukhena
tika-vin01t1:1618_7: anvayato pātimokkhaṃ dassetvā idāni byatirekato taṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1618_8: Tena yathā sattānaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ paraṃ pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi viheṭhanañca “parūpaghāto
tika-vin01t1:1618_9: paraṃ viheṭhana”nti vuccati, evaṃ tesaṃ sāpateyyāvaharaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ visaṃvādanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1618_11: ucchedacintanaṃ micchābhinivesanañca upaghāto paraviheṭhanañca hotīti yassa kassaci
tika-vin01t1:1618_12: akusalassa kammapathassa kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajito samaṇo ca na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1619_0: Dutiyagāthāya sabbapāpassāti sabbākusalassa sabbassapi dvādasākusalassa sabbacittuppādasaṅgahitassa
tika-vin01t1:1619_1: sāvajjadhammassa. Akaraṇanti anuppādanaṃ. Karaṇañhi nāma tassa attano santāne uppādananti
tika-vin01t1:1619_3: hi idaṃ “etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti vakkhamānattā ariyamaggadhamme tesañca sambhārabhūte
tika-vin01t1:1619_4: tebhūmikakusale dhamme bodheti. Upasampadāti upasampādanaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato tassa
tika-vin01t1:1619_5: kusalassa samadhigamo paṭilābho. Sacittapariyodapananti attano cittassa jotanaṃ cittassa
tika-vin01t1:1619_6: pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ. Taṃ pana arahattena hoti. Ettha ca yasmā
tika-vin01t1:1619_7: aggamaggasamaṅgino cittaṃ sabbaso pariyodapīyati nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇe pana pariyodapitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1619_8: hoti puna pariyodapetabbatāya abhāvato, tasmā pariniṭṭhitapariyodapanataṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t1:1619_9: vuttaṃ “taṃ pana arahattena hotī”ti. Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya lokiyalokuttarāhi
tika-vin01t1:1619_10: samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena cittaṃ pariyodapetabbanti etaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1620_0: Tatiyagāthāya anupavādoti vācāya kassaci anupavadanaṃ. Anupaghātoti kāyena manasā
tika-vin01t1:1620_1: ca kassaci upaghātākaraṇaṃ manasāpi paresaṃ anatthacintanādivasena upaghātakaraṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1620_2: vajjetabbattā. Pātimokkheti yaṃ taṃ paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ uttamaṃ sīlaṃ, pāti
tika-vin01t1:1620_3: vā sugatibhayehi mokkheti duggatibhayehi, yo vā naṃ pāti, taṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkhanti
tika-vin01t1:1620_4: vuccati, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ca. Saṃvaroti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇo
tika-vin01t1:1620_5: saṃvaro. Mattaññutāti bhojane mattaññutā paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena pamāṇaññutā.
tika-vin01t1:1620_6: Pantañca sayanāsananti janasaṅghaṭṭavirahitaṃ nijjanasambādhaṃ vivittaṃ senāsanañca.
tika-vin01t1:1620_7: Ettha dvīhiyeva paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpitoti veditabbo paccayasantosasāmaññena
tika-vin01t1:1620_8: itaradvayassapi lakkhaṇahāranayena jotitabhāvato. Adhicitte ca āyogoti vipassanāpādakaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1620_9: aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ adhicittaṃ, tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1620_10: yathāvutte adhicitte āyogo ca, anuyogoti attho. Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa
tika-vin01t1:1620_11: anupavadanaṃ anupaghātanaṃ pātimokkhe saṃvaro paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu mattaññutā vivittasenāsanasevanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1620_12: adhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.
tika-vin01t1:1621_0: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā. Tenāha “eteneva upāyenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1621_1: Yāva sāsanapariyantāti dharamānakabuddhānaṃ anusāsanapariyantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1621_2: yāva buddhā dharanti, tāva uddisitabbataṃ āgacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ovādapātimokkhañhi
tika-vin01t1:1621_3: buddhāyeva uddisanti, na sāvakā. Paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva uddesamāgacchantīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:1621_4: Paṭhamabodhi cettha vīsativassaparicchinnāti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Tañca heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:1621_6: nāma natthī”ti kathitattā “paṭhamabodhi nāma vīsativassānī”ti gahetvā vuttaṃ. Ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-vin01t1:1621_7: pana “pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhī”ti vuttaṃ. Evañca
tika-vin01t1:1621_8: sati majjhe pannarasa vassāni majjhimabodhi, ante pannarasa vassāni pacchimabodhīti
tika-vin01t1:1621_9: tiṇṇaṃ bodhīnaṃ samappamāṇatā siyāti tampi yuttaṃ. Pannarasattikena hi pañcacattālīsa
tika-vin01t1:1621_10: vassāni pūrenti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pannarasavassappamāṇāya paṭhamabodhiyā vīsativassesuyeva
tika-vin01t1:1621_11: antogadhattā “paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare”ti vuttanti evampi sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1622_0: Nanu ca kānici sikkhāpadāni paññapetvāpi na tāva āṇāpātimokkhaṃ anuññātaṃ pacchā
tika-vin01t1:1622_1: therassa āyācanena anuññātattā, tasmā kathametaṃ vuttaṃ “sikkhāpadapaññattikālato
tika-vin01t1:1622_2: pana pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva uddisīyatī”ti, yadipi kānici sikkhāpadāni paññapetvāva
tika-vin01t1:1622_3: āṇāpātimokkhaṃ na anuññātaṃ, tathāpi apaññatte sikkhāpade āṇāpātimokkhaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1622_4: kintu paññatteyevāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pana pabhutī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1622_5: vuttaṃ. Pubbārāmeti sāvatthiyā pācīnadisābhāge katattā evaṃladdhavohāre mahāvihāre.
tika-vin01t1:1622_6: Migāramātupāsādeti migāraseṭṭhino mātuṭṭhāniyattā migāramātāti saṅkhyaṃ gatāya visākhāmahāupāsikāya
tika-vin01t1:1622_7: kārite pāsāde. Aṭṭhānanti hetupaṭikkhepo. Anavakāsoti paccayapaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenapi
tika-vin01t1:1623_0: Tesanti bhikkhūnaṃ. Sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajitāti sabbantimānaṃ subhaddasadisānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1623_1: sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajite sandhāya vadati. Khattiyakulādivaseneva vividhā
tika-vin01t1:1623_2: kulāti sambandho. Uccanīcauḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vāti uccanīcakulavasena uḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena
tika-vin01t1:1623_3: vāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha khattiyabrāhmaṇavasena vā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t1:1623_4: vā uccakulatā veditabbā, sesānaṃ vasena nīcakulatā. Uḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vāti
tika-vin01t1:1624_0: Brahmacariyaṃ rakkhantīti vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsetvā dassento āha “ciraṃ pariyattidhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1624_1: pariharantī”ti. Apaññattepi sikkhāpade yadi samānajātiādikā siyuṃ, attano attano
tika-vin01t1:1624_2: kulānugataganthaṃ viya na nāseyyuṃ. Yasmā pana sikkhāpadampi apaññattaṃ, ime ca bhikkhū
tika-vin01t1:1624_3: na samānajātiādikā, tasmā vināsesunti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā ekanāmā…pe… tasmā
tika-vin01t1:1624_4: aññamaññaṃ viheṭhentā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā ciraṭṭhitikavārepi “nānānāmā”tiādi
tika-vin01t1:1624_5: vuttanti? Satipi tesaṃ nānājaccādibhāve sikkhāpadapaññattiyā eva sāsanassa cirappavattīti
tika-vin01t1:1624_6: dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sikkhāpadapaññattivaseneva sāsanassa cirappavatti. Yasmā buddhā
tika-vin01t1:1624_7: attano parinibbānato uddhampi vinetabbasattasambhave sati sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti,
tika-vin01t1:1624_8: asati na paññapenti, tasmāti veditabbo. Yathā kāyavacīdvārasaṅkhātaṃ viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:1624_9: pavattamānampi cittaṃ tassāyeva viññattiyā vasena pavattanato “kāyavacīdvārehi pavatta”nti
tika-vin01t1:1624_10: vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ. Vaggasaṅgahapaṇṇāsasaṅgahādīhīti
tika-vin01t1:1625_0: Evaṃ vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti ettha evanti yathānusiṭṭhāya anusāsaniyā
tika-vin01t1:1625_1: vidhivasena paṭisedhanavasena ca pavattitākāraparāmasanaṃ, sā ca sammāvitakkānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1625_3: ca vibhāvanatthaṃ. Tenāha “nekkhammavitakkādayo tayo vitakke vitakkethā”tiādi. Ettha
tika-vin01t1:1625_4: ādi-saddena abyāpādavitakkaavihiṃsāvitakkānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha nekkhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1625_5: vuccati lobhato nikkhantattā alobho, nīvaraṇehi nikkhantattā paṭhamajjhānaṃ, sabbākusalehi
tika-vin01t1:1625_6: nikkhantattā sabbo kusalo dhammo, sabbasaṅkhatehi nikkhantattā nibbānaṃ, upanissayato
tika-vin01t1:1625_7: sampayogato ārammaṇakaraṇato ca nekkhammena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko nekkhammavitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1625_8: sammāsaṅkappo. So asubhajjhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, asubhajjhāne rūpāvacaro,
tika-vin01t1:1625_9: taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. Byāpādassa paṭipakkho abyāpādo,
tika-vin01t1:1625_10: kañcipi na byāpādenti etenāti vā abyāpādo, mettā. Yathāvuttena abyāpādena paṭisaṃyutto
tika-vin01t1:1625_11: vitakko abyāpādavitakko. So mettājhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, mettābhāvanāvasena
tika-vin01t1:1625_12: adhigate paṭhamajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle
tika-vin01t1:1625_13: lokuttaro. Vihiṃsāya paṭipakkhā, na vihiṃsanti vā etāya satteti avihiṃsā, karuṇā.
tika-vin01t1:1625_14: Tāya paṭisaṃyutto vitakko avihiṃsāvitakko. So karuṇājhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro,
tika-vin01t1:1625_15: karuṇābhāvanāvasena adhigate paṭhamajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro.
tika-vin01t1:1626_0: Nanu ca alobhādosāmohānaṃ aññamaññāvirahato nesaṃ vasena uppajjanakānaṃ imesaṃ nekkhammavitakkādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1626_1: aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ na hotīti? No na hoti. Yadā hi alobho padhāno hoti
tika-vin01t1:1626_2: niyamitapariṇatasamudācārādivasena, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti. Tathā hi
tika-vin01t1:1626_3: yadā alobhappadhāno nekkhammagaruko cittuppādo hoti, tadā laddhāvasaro nekkhammavitakko
tika-vin01t1:1626_4: patiṭṭhahati. Taṃsampayuttassa pana adosalakkhaṇassa abyāpādassa vasena yo tasseva
tika-vin01t1:1626_5: abyāpādavitakkabhāvo sambhaveyya, sati ca abyāpādavitakkabhāve kassacipi aviheṭhanajātikatāya
tika-vin01t1:1626_6: avihiṃsāvitakkabhāvo ca sambhaveyya. Te itare dve tasseva nekkhammavitakkassa anugāmino
tika-vin01t1:1626_7: sarūpato adissanato tasmiṃ sati honti, asati na hontīti anumāneyyā bhavanti. Evameva
tika-vin01t1:1626_8: yadā mettāpadhāno cittuppādo hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti. Yadā karuṇāpadhāno
tika-vin01t1:1626_9: cittuppādo hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti.
tika-vin01t1:1627_0: Kāmavitakkādayoti ettha ādi-saddena byāpādavitakkavihiṃsāvitakkānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1627_1: Tattha kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko kāmavitakko. Ettha hi dve kāmā vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo
tika-vin01t1:1627_2: ca. Tattha vatthukāmapakkhe ārammaṇavasena kāmehi paṭisaṃyutto vitakko kāmavitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1627_3: kilesakāmapakkhe pana sampayogavasena kāmena paṭisaṃyuttoti yojetabbaṃ. Byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto
tika-vin01t1:1627_4: vitakko byāpādavitakko. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko vihiṃsāvitakko. Tesu dve sattesupi
tika-vin01t1:1627_5: saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti. Kāmavitakko hi piye manāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa
tika-vin01t1:1627_6: uppajjati, byāpādavitakko appiye amanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato
tika-vin01t1:1627_7: paṭṭhāya yāva vināsanā uppajjati, vihiṃsāvitakko saṅkhāresu nuppajjati. Saṅkhāro
tika-vin01t1:1627_8: hi dukkhāpetabbo nāma natthi, “ime sattā haññantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā
tika-vin01t1:1627_9: mā vā ahesu”nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati. Atha kasmā vuttaṃ “saṅkhāro dukkhāpetabbo
tika-vin01t1:1627_10: nāma natthī”ti, nanu ye dukkhāpetabbāti icchitā sattasaññitā, tepi atthato saṅkhārā
tika-vin01t1:1627_11: evāti? Saccametaṃ, te pana indriyabaddhā saviññāṇakatāya dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti,
tika-vin01t1:1627_12: tasmā te vihiṃsāvitakkassa visayā icchitā sattasaññitā. Ye pana na dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti
tika-vin01t1:1627_13: vuttalakkhaṇāyogato, te sandhāya “vihiṃsāvitakko saṅkhāresu nuppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1628_0: Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti ettha āsavehīti katthuatthe karaṇaniddeso,
tika-vin01t1:1628_1: cittānīti paccattabahuvacanaṃ, vimucciṃsūti kammasādhanaṃ, tasmā āsavehi kattubhūtehi
tika-vin01t1:1628_2: anupādāya ārammaṇavasena aggahetvā cittāni vimuccitānīti evamettha attho gahetabboti
tika-vin01t1:1628_3: āha “tesañhi cittānī”tiādi. Yehi āsavehīti etthāpi kattuatthe eva karaṇaniddeso.
tika-vin01t1:1628_4: Vimucciṃsūti kammasādhanaṃ. Na te tāni gahetvā vimucciṃsūti te āsavā tāni cittāni
tika-vin01t1:1628_5: ārammaṇavasena na gahetvā vimucciṃsu vimocesuṃ. Ettha hi cittānīti upayogabahuvacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1628_6: vimucciṃsūti kattusādhanaṃ. Anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānāti āyatiṃ anuppattisaṅkhātena
tika-vin01t1:1628_7: nirodhena nirujjhamānā āsavā. Aggahetvā vimucciṃsūti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena aggahetvā
tika-vin01t1:1628_8: cittāni vimocesuṃ. Vikasitacittā ahesunti sātisayañāṇarasmisamphassena samphullacittā
tika-vin01t1:1628_10: Tenāha “yaṃ vuttaṃ aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍeti, tatrā”ti. Katanti bhāvasādhanavāci
tika-vin01t1:1628_11: idaṃ padanti āha “bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hoti, bhiṃsanakakiriyāyā”ti. Bhiṃsanassa karaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1629_0: Idāni aññathāpi atthayojanaṃ dassento āha “atha vā”tiādi. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe bhiṃsayatīti
tika-vin01t1:1629_1: bhiṃsano, bhiṃsano eva bhiṃsanako, tassa bhāvo bhiṃsanakattanti vattabbe ta-kārassa
tika-vin01t1:1629_2: lopaṃ katvā “bhiṃsanakata”nti vuttanti dassento āha “bhiṃsanakatasminti bhiṃsanakabhāveti
tika-vin01t1:1629_3: attho”tiādi. Yebhuyyaggahaṇaṃ lomavantavasenapi yojetabbaṃ, na lomavasenevāti āha
tika-vin01t1:1630_0: Purisayugavasenāti purisakālavasena, purisānaṃ āyuppamāṇavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sabbapacchimako
tika-vin01t1:1630_1: subhaddasadiso”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ kāle vijjamānānaṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1630_2: āyuparicchedaṃ sakalameva gahetvā “satasahassaṃ…pe… aṭṭhāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Dveyeva purisayugānīti
tika-vin01t1:1630_3: ettha purisānaṃ yugappavattikālo purisayugaṃ. Abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana
tika-vin01t1:1630_4: purisova purisayugaṃ. Dharamāne bhagavati ekaṃ purisayugaṃ, parinibbute ekanti katvā
tika-vin01t1:1630_5: “dveyeva purisayugānī”ti vuttaṃ. Parinibbute pana bhagavati ekameva purisayugaṃ asītiyeva
tika-vin01t1:1631: 20. Sāvakayugānīti sāvakā eva sāvakayugāni. Asambhuṇantenāti apāpuṇantena. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassāti sabbaññutaññāṇassa vijāyanatthaṃ ñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassa.
tika-vin01t1:1632_0: 21. Ko anusandhīti pubbāparakathānaṃ kiṃ anusandhānaṃ, ko sambandhoti attho. Sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanāpekkhanti
tika-vin01t1:1632_1: yācīyatīti yācanā, sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva yācanā sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanā, taṃ apekkhatīti
tika-vin01t1:1632_3: bhummavacananti vuttaṃ hoti. Yācanavisiṭṭhā sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva hi “tatthā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1632_4: iminā parāmaṭṭhā, teneva vakkhati “tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā”ti. Yaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin01t1:1632_5: “sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyyā”ti iminā yaṃ sikkhāpadapaññapanaṃ vuttaṃ, yācitanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1632_6: Tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyāti tassaṃ yāciyamānasikkhāpadapaññattiyanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1633_0: Āsavaṭṭhānīyāti ettha adhikaraṇe anīyasaddoti āha “āsavā tiṭṭhanti etesū”tiādi. Ke
tika-vin01t1:1633_1: pana te āsavā, ke ca dhammā tadadhikaraṇabhūtāti āha “yesu diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1633_2: Diṭṭhadhammikā parūpavādādayo, samparāyikā āpāyikā apāyadukkhavisesā. Te āsavanti
tika-vin01t1:1633_3: tena tena paccayavasena pavattantīti āsavā. Nesanti parūpavādādiāsavānaṃ. Teti vītikkamadhammā.
tika-vin01t1:1633_4: Asati āsavaṭṭhānīye dhamme sikkhāpadapaññattiyaṃ ko doso, yenevaṃ vuttanti āha “yadi
tika-vin01t1:1633_5: hi paññapeyyā”tiādi, vītikkamadosaṃ adisvā yadi paññapeyyāti adhippāyo. Parammukhā
tika-vin01t1:1633_6: akkosanaṃ parūpavādo, parehi vacanesu dosāropanaṃ parūpārambho, sammukhā garahanaṃ garahadoso.
tika-vin01t1:1634_0: Kathañhi nāma paliveṭhessatīti sambandho, kathaṃ-saddayoge anāgatappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1634_1: Anvāyikoti anuvattako. Bhogakkhandhanti bhogarāsiṃ. “Amhākamete”ti ñāyantīti ñātī,
tika-vin01t1:1634_2: pitāmahapituputtādivasena parivaṭṭanaṭṭhena parivaṭṭo, ñātīyeva parivaṭṭo ñātiparivaṭṭo.
tika-vin01t1:1634_3: Ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhāti ghāsacchādane paramatāya uttamatāya santuṭṭhā,
tika-vin01t1:1634_4: ghāsacchādanapariyesane sallekhavasena paramatāya ukkaṭṭhabhāve saṇṭhitāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1634_5: Ghāsacchādanameva vā paramaṃ paramā koṭi etesaṃ na tato paraṃ kiñci asāmisajātaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1634_6: pariyesanti paccāsīsanti cāti ghāsacchādanaparamā, tesaṃ bhāvo ghāsacchādanaparamatā,
tika-vin01t1:1634_7: tassaṃ ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhā. Tesu nāma koti yathāvuttaguṇavisiṭṭhesu
tika-vin01t1:1634_8: tesu bhikkhūsu ko nāma. Lokāmisabhūtanti lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbattā
tika-vin01t1:1634_10: Etanti methunādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ. Thāmanti sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanakiriyāya sāmatthiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1634_11: Balanti yāthāvato sabbadhammānaṃ paṭivedhasamatthaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ. Kuppeyyāti kuppaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1634_12: bhaveyya. Etassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ na yathāṭhāne tiṭṭheyyāti, paññattiṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:1634_13: na tiṭṭheyyāti attho. Akusaloti tikicchituṃ yuttakālassa aparijānanato akusalo acheko.
tika-vin01t1:1634_14: Avuddhi anayo, byasanaṃ dukkhaṃ. Paṭikaccevāti gaṇḍuppādanato paṭhamameva. Sañchaviṃ
tika-vin01t1:1634_15: katvāti sobhanacchaviṃ katvā. Bālavejjoti apaṇḍitavejjo. Lohitakkhayañca maṃ pāpetīti
tika-vin01t1:1635_0: Akālaṃ dassetvāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā akālaṃ dassetvā. Rogaṃ vūpasametvāti phāsuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1635_1: katvā. Sake ācariyaketi ācariyassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ācariyakaṃ, tasmiṃ attano ācariyabhāve,
tika-vin01t1:1635_2: ācariyakamme vā. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Viditānubhāvoti pākaṭānubhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1636_0: Vipulabhāvenāti pabbajitānaṃ bahubhāvena. Sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjantīti
tika-vin01t1:1636_1: yasmā senāsanāni pahonti, tasmā āvāsamacchariyādihetukā sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā
tika-vin01t1:1636_2: dhammā na uppajjanti. Iminā nayenāti etena padasodhammasikkhāpadādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1637_0: Lābhaggamahattanti cīvarādilabhitabbapaccayo lābho, tassa aggaṃ mahattaṃ paṇītatā
tika-vin01t1:1637_1: bahubhāvo vā. Bahussutassa bhāvo bāhusaccaṃ. Ayoniso ummujjamānāti anupāyena abhinivisamānā,
tika-vin01t1:1637_2: viparītato jānamānāti attho. Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvāti sabhāvena sabhāvaṃ saṃsanditvā,
tika-vin01t1:1637_4: anupādinnaphassarasena upādinnaphassarasaṃ saṃsanditvā, samānabhāvaṃ upanetvāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1637_5: Uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpentīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t1:1638_0: Imasmiṃ attheti “nirabbudo hi, sāriputta, bhikkhusaṅgho”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhusaṅghasaññite
tika-vin01t1:1638_1: atthe. Kathaṃ pana dussīlānaṃ corabhāvoti āha “te hi assamaṇāva hutvā”tiādi. Kāḷakadhammayogāti
tika-vin01t1:1639_0: Sabbaparittaguṇoti sabbehi nihīnaguṇo, appaguṇo vā. So sotāpannoti ānandattheraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1639_1: sandhāya vadati. Sotaṃ āpannoti maggasotaṃ āpanno. Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ anavasesato
tika-vin01t1:1639_2: savanato pellanato soto ariyamaggoti āha “sototi ca maggassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Sotāpannoti
tika-vin01t1:1639_3: tena samannāgatassa puggalassāti iminā maggasamaṅgī sotāpannoti vatvā tamevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1639_4: udāharaṇena sādhetvā idāni idhādhippetapuggalaṃ niddhāretvā dassento āha “idha panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1639_5: Idha āpannasaddo “phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno”tiādīsu viya vattamānakālikoti āha
tika-vin01t1:1639_6: “maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinna”nti. Maggena hi attanā sadisassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā sattaṅgikassa
tika-vin01t1:1639_7: vā phalassa sototi nāmaṃ dinnaṃ, atītakālikatte pana sarasatova nāmalābho siyā. Maggakkhaṇe
tika-vin01t1:1639_8: hi maggasotaṃ āpajjati nāma, phalakkhaṇe āpanno.
tika-vin01t1:1640_0: Virūpaṃ sadukkhaṃ saupāyāsaṃ nipātetīti vinipāto, apāyadukkhe khipanako. Dhammoti
tika-vin01t1:1640_1: sabhāvo. Tenāha “na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvo”ti. Atha vā dhammoti apāyesu
tika-vin01t1:1640_2: khipanako sakkāyadiṭṭhiādiko akusaladhammo. Yassa pana so akusaladhammo natthi sabbaso
tika-vin01t1:1640_3: pahīnattā, so yasmā apāyesu attānaṃ vinipātanasabhāvo na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “na attānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1640_4: apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Kasmāti avinipātanadhammatāya kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1640_5: pucchati. Apāyaṃ gamentīti apāyagamanīyā. Vinipātanasabhāvoti uppajjanasabhāvo. Sammattaniyāmena
tika-vin01t1:1640_6: maggenāti sammā bhavaniyāmakena paṭiladdhamaggena. Niyatoti vā heṭṭhimantato sattamabhavato
tika-vin01t1:1640_7: upari anuppajjanadhammatāya niyato. Sambodhīti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi.
tika-vin01t1:1640_8: Sambujjhatīti hi sambodhi, ariyamaggo. So ca idha paṭhamamaggassa adhigatattā avasiṭṭho
tika-vin01t1:1640_9: eva adhigantabbabhāvena icchitabboti. Tenāha “uparimaggattayaṃ avassaṃ sampāpako”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1643_0: 22. Anudhammatāti lokuttaradhammānugato dhammo. Anapaloketvāti padassa vivaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1643_1: “anāpucchitvā”ti. Janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantīti ettha iti-saddo gamyamānatāya na vutto,
tika-vin01t1:1643_2: evaṃ aññatthāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu. Tattha janapadacārikanti janapadesu caraṇaṃ, caraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1643_3: vā cāro, so eva cārikā, janapadesu cārikā janapadacārikā. Taṃ pakkamanti, janapadagamanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1643_4: gacchantīti attho. Pakkamantiyevāti avadhāraṇena no na pakkamantīti dasseti. “Janapadacārikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1643_5: pakkamantī”ti ettha ṭhatvā bhagavato cārikāpakkamanavidhiṃ dassento āha “janapadacārikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1643_6: carantā cā”tiādi. Cārikā ca nāmesā duvidhā turitacārikā ceva aturitacārikā ca. Tattha
tika-vin01t1:1643_7: dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1643_8: sā mahākassapattherapaccuggamanādīsu daṭṭhabbā. Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto
tika-vin01t1:1643_9: muhuttena tigāvutamagamāsi, āḷavakassatthāya tiṃsayojanaṃ, tathā aṅgulimālassa, pukkusātissa
tika-vin01t1:1643_10: pana pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ, mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ, dhaniyassatthāya sattayojanasatāni
tika-vin01t1:1643_12: vīsayojanasataṃ agamāsi, ayaṃ turitacārikā. Yaṃ pana gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1643_13: yojanaaḍḍhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ, ayaṃ aturitacārikā
tika-vin01t1:1643_14: nāma. Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti
tika-vin01t1:1643_15: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ carati. Tattha “janapadacārika”nti vuttattā
tika-vin01t1:1643_16: aturitacārikāva idhādhippetā. Tameva vibhajitvā dassento āha “mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍala”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1644_0: Tattha antimamaṇḍalanti khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ, itaresaṃ vā maṇḍalānaṃ antogadhattā antimamaṇḍalaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1644_1: abbhantarimamaṇḍalanti vuttaṃ hoti. Imesaṃ pana maṇḍalānaṃ kiṃ pamāṇanti āha “tattha
tika-vin01t1:1644_3: tato paraṃ nādhippetaṃ turitacārikāvasena agamanato. Yasmā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:1644_4: gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu samantato yojanasataṃ ekakolāhalaṃ hoti, purimaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1644_5: purimaṃ āgatā nimantetuṃ labhanti, itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍalaṃ osarati,
tika-vin01t1:1644_6: tattha buddhā bhagavanto tesu tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasantā mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena
tika-vin01t1:1644_7: anuggaṇhanti, dhammadānena ca vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhenti, tasmā vuttaṃ “gāmanigamādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1644_8: mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhantā”tiādi. Samathavipassanā taruṇā hontīti ettha
tika-vin01t1:1644_9: taruṇā vipassanāti saṅkhāraparicchedane ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ sammasane ñāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1644_10: maggāmagge ñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Samathassa taruṇabhāvo pana upacārasamādhivasena
tika-vin01t1:1644_11: veditabbo. “Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā hontī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1644_12: nidassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena
tika-vin01t1:1644_13: majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmā cātumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamanti.
tika-vin01t1:1645_0: Pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvāti anumatidānavasena datvā. Māgasirassa paṭhamadivaseti māgasiramāsassa
tika-vin01t1:1645_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesanti tesaṃ buddhānaṃ. Tehi vinetabbattā “tesaṃ vineyyasattā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1645_3: vuttaṃ. Vineyyasattāti ca cārikāya vinetabbasattā. Māgasiramāsampi tattheva vasitvā
tika-vin01t1:1645_4: phussamāsassa paṭhamadivaseti idampi nidassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catumāsavutthānampi
tika-vin01t1:1645_5: buddhānaṃ vineyyasattā aparipakkindriyā honti, tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamānā
tika-vin01t1:1645_6: aparampi ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tatthevavasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā
tika-vin01t1:1645_7: nikkhamitvā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhantā sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi
tika-vin01t1:1645_8: vā māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpenti. Veneyyavasenevāti avadhāraṇena na cīvarādihetu carantīti
tika-vin01t1:1645_9: dasseti. Tathā hi imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ carantā na cīvarādihetu
tika-vin01t1:1645_10: caranti, atha kho ye duggatabālajiṇṇabyādhikā, te “kadā tathāgataṃ āgantvā passissanti,
tika-vin01t1:1645_11: mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatadassanaṃ labhissati, tattha keci cittāni
tika-vin01t1:1645_12: pasādessanti, keci mālādīhi pūjessanti, keci kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dassanti, keci micchādassanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1645_13: pahāya sammādiṭṭhikā bhavissanti, taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1646_0: Apica catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti jaṅghavihāravasena sarīraphāsukatthāya,
tika-vin01t1:1646_2: paripākagatindriye bodhaneyyasatte bodhanatthāyāti. Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā
tika-vin01t1:1646_3: bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchissantīti vā, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1646_4: gacchissantīti vā, mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmāti vā. Aparehipi
tika-vin01t1:1646_5: pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti pāṇātipātā viramissantīti vā,
tika-vin01t1:1646_7: vā. Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1646_9: vā. Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti sotāpattimaggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1646_10: adhigamissantīti vā, sotāpattiphalaṃ…pe… arahattaphalaṃ sacchikarissantīti vāti.
tika-vin01t1:1647_0: Pupphāni ocinantā viya carantīti iminā yathā mālākāro bahuṃ pupphagacchaṃ disvā tattha
tika-vin01t1:1647_1: cirampi ṭhatvā pupphāni ocinitvā pupphasuññaṃ gacchaṃ disvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā
tika-vin01t1:1647_2: taṃ pahāya aññattha gantvā pupphāni ocinanto vicarati, evameva buddhāpi yattha gāmanigamādīsu
tika-vin01t1:1647_3: vineyyasattā bahū honti, tattha cirampi vasantā te vinetvā vineyyasuññagāmādīsu papañcaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1647_4: akatvā taṃ pahāya aññattha bahuvineyyakesu gāmādīsu vasantā vicarantīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1647_5: Tatoyeva ca atikhuddakepi antimamaṇḍale upanissayavantānaṃ bahubhāvato tāva bahumpi
tika-vin01t1:1648_0: Santasabhāvattā kilesasamaṇahetutāya vā santaṃ nibbānaṃ, sukhakāraṇatāya ca sukhanti
tika-vin01t1:1648_1: āha “santaṃ sukhaṃ nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti. Dasasahassacakkavāḷeti jātikkhettabhūtāya
tika-vin01t1:1648_2: dasasahassilokadhātuyā. Idañca devabrahmānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, manussā pana imasmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:1648_3: cakkavāḷe bodhaneyyā honti. Bodhaneyyasattasamavalokananti paṭhamaṃ mahākaruṇāya
tika-vin01t1:1648_4: pharitvā pacchā sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā tassa anto paviṭṭhānaṃ bodhaneyyasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1648_5: samolokanaṃ. Buddhā kira mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya “ye sattā
tika-vin01t1:1648_6: bhabbā paripākañāṇā ajjayeva mayā vinetabbā, te mayhaṃ ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahantū”ti cittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1648_7: adhiṭṭhāya samannāharanti. Tesaṃ saha samannāhārā eko vā dve vā bahū vā tadā vinayūpagā
tika-vin01t1:1648_8: veneyyā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthamāgacchanti, ayamettha buddhānubhāvo. Evaṃ āpāthamāgatānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1648_9: pana nesaṃ upanissayaṃ pubbacariyaṃ pubbahetuṃ sampativattamānañca paṭipattiṃ olokenti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_10: Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthañhi samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāveneva
tika-vin01t1:1648_11: upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Atha “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti saraṇagamanādivasena kañci nipphattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1649_0: Otiṇṇeti ārocite, parisamajjhaṃ vā otiṇṇe. Dvikkhattunti ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dvikkhattuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1649_1: Buddhakāle kira ekekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dve vāre bhikkhū sannipatanti upakaṭṭhavassūpanāyikakāle
tika-vin01t1:1649_2: ca pavāraṇākāle ca. Upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi
tika-vin01t1:1649_3: paññāsampi bhikkhū vaggavaggā hutvā kammaṭṭhānatthāya āgacchanti. Bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1649_4: sammoditvā “kasmā, bhikkhave, upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vicarathā”ti pucchati.
tika-vin01t1:1649_5: Atha te “bhagavā kammaṭṭhānatthaṃ āgatamha, kammaṭṭhānaṃ no dethā”ti yācanti. Satthā
tika-vin01t1:1649_6: tesaṃ cariyavasena rāgacaritassa asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ deti, dosacaritassa mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1649_7: mohacaritassa “uddeso paripucchā kālena dhammassavanaṃ kālena dhammasākacchā idaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1649_8: tuyhaṃ sappāya”nti ācikkhati. Kiñcāpi hi mohacaritassa ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1649_9: kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya pana bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ sammohavigamāya paṭhamaṃ uddesaparipucchādhammassavanadhammasākacchāsu
tika-vin01t1:1649_10: niyojeti. Vitakkacaritassa ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ deti. Saddhācaritassa visesato
tika-vin01t1:1649_11: purimā cha anussatiyo sappāyā, tāsaṃ pana anuyuñjane ayaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t1:1649_13: Ñāṇacaritassa pana maraṇassati upasamānussati catudhātuvavatthānaṃ āhārepaṭikūlasaññā
tika-vin01t1:1649_14: visesato sappāyā, tesaṃ upakāradhammadassanatthaṃ aniccatādipaṭisaṃyutte gambhīre
tika-vin01t1:1649_15: suttante katheti. Te kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sace sappāyaṃ hoti, satthu santike eva
tika-vin01t1:1649_16: vasanti. No ce hoti, sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ pucchantā gacchanti. Tepi tattha vasantā
tika-vin01t1:1649_17: temāsikaṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā sotāpannāpi honti sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi
tika-vin01t1:1649_18: arahantopi. Tato vutthavassā pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “bhagavā ahaṃ tumhākaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1649_19: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patto…pe… ahaṃ aggaphalaṃ arahatta”nti
tika-vin01t1:1649_20: paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocenti, upari anadhigatassa adhigamāya kammaṭṭhānañca yācanti.
tika-vin01t1:1649_21: Tena vuttaṃ “pure vassūpanāyikāya ca kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ…pe… upari kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthañcā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1650_0: Āyāmāti ettha ā-saddo “āgacchā”ti iminā samānatthoti āha “āyāmāti āgaccha yāmā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1650_1: ehi gacchāmāti attho. Ānandāti bhagavā santikāvacarattā theraṃ ālapati, na pana tadā
tika-vin01t1:1650_2: satthu santike vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvato. Pañcasataparimāṇo hi tadā bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:1650_3: santike bhikkhusaṅgho. Thero pana “gaṇhathāvuso pattacīvarāni, bhagavā asukaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1650_4: gantukāmo”ti bhikkhūnaṃ āroceti. “Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1650_5: vuttattā “bhagavato paccassosī”ti idha bhagavatoti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanavacanameva
tika-vin01t1:1650_6: sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato vacanaṃ paṭiassosī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1650_7: Bhagavatoti pana idaṃ patissavasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa paṭissuṇotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1650_8: Paccassosīti ettha paṭi-saddo abhimukhavacanoti āha “abhimukho hutvā suṇī”ti. Bhagavato
tika-vin01t1:1650_9: mukhābhimukho hutvā adhivāsetvā suṇi, na udāsino hutvāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1651_0: Tassa pāṭihāriyassa āgantukavasena katattā vuttaṃ “nagaradvārato paṭṭhāyā”ti. Suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāhi
tika-vin01t1:1651_1: rasmīhīti ettha rasa-saddo udakapariyāyo, piñjara-saddo hemavaṇṇapariyāyo, tasmā
tika-vin01t1:1651_2: suvaṇṇajaladhārā viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇāhi rasmīhīti attho. Samujjotayamānoti obhāsayamāno.
tika-vin01t1:1651_3: Assāti verañjassa brāhmaṇassa. Bhagavantaṃ upanisīditukāmoti bhagavantaṃ upagantvā
tika-vin01t1:1651_4: nisīditukāmo, bhagavato samīpe nisīditukāmoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1652_0: Brāhmaṇa tayā nimantitā vassaṃvutthā amhāti pāḷiyaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Dātabbo
tika-vin01t1:1652_1: assāti dātabbo bhaveyya. No asantoti neva avijjamāno, kintu vijjamānoyevāti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1652_2: Vinā vā liṅgavipallāsenettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha “atha vā”tiādi. Iminā sāmaññavacanato
tika-vin01t1:1652_3: ettha napuṃsakaliṅganiddesoti dasseti. No natthīti no amhākaṃ natthi. Noti vā etassa
tika-vin01t1:1652_4: vivaraṇaṃ natthīti. Kesaṃ adātukāmatā viyāti āha “yathā”tiādi. Pahūtavittūpakaraṇānanti
tika-vin01t1:1652_5: ettha vittīti tuṭṭhi, vittiyā upakaraṇaṃ vittūpakaraṇaṃ, tuṭṭhikāraṇanti attho. Pahūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1652_7: pahūtavittūpakaraṇā, tesaṃ pahūtavittūpakaraṇānaṃ maccharīnaṃ yathā adātukāmatā,
tika-vin01t1:1652_8: evaṃ no adātukāmatāpi natthīti sambandho. Taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti taṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1652_9: taṃ kiccaṃ vā. Etthāti gharāvāse. Dutiye pana atthavikappe tanti deyyadhammassa parāmasanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1652_10: Etthāti imasmiṃ temāsabbhantareti attho. Yanti yena kāraṇena, kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā.
tika-vin01t1:1652_11: Dutiye pana atthavikappe yanti yaṃ deyyadhammanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1653_0: Alaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhacintāyāti saññāpetvāti brāhmaṇa netaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhena
tika-vin01t1:1653_1: kataṃ, atha kho mārāvaṭṭanenāti brāhmaṇaṃ saññāpetvā. Taṅkhaṇānurūpāyāti yādisī tadā
tika-vin01t1:1653_2: tassa ajjhāsayappavatti, tadanurūpāyāti attho. Tassa tadā tādisassa vivaṭṭasannissitassa
tika-vin01t1:1653_3: ñāṇaparipākassa abhāvato kevalaṃ abbhantarasannissito eva attho dassitoti āha “diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1653_4: atthaṃ sandassetvā”ti, paccakkhato vibhāvetvāti attho. Kusale dhammeti tebhūmake
tika-vin01t1:1653_5: kusale dhamme. Tatthāti kusaladhamme yathāsamādapite. Nanti brāhmaṇaṃ. Samuttejetvāti
tika-vin01t1:1653_6: sammadeva uparūpari nivesetvā puññakiriyāya tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ āpādetvā. Taṃ pana
tika-vin01t1:1653_7: atthato tassa ussāhajananaṃ hotīti āha “saussāhaṃ katvā”ti. Evaṃ puññakiriyāya saussāhato
tika-vin01t1:1653_8: evarūpaguṇasamaṅgitā ca niyamato diṭṭhadhammikādiatthasampādananti evaṃ saussāhatāya
tika-vin01t1:1653_9: aññehi ca tasmiṃ vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā sammadeva haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvaṃ āpādetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1654_0: Yadi bhagavā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassi, atha kasmā so visesaṃ nādhigacchi? Upanissayasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:1654_1: abhāvato. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā tassa tathā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassīti? Vuccate
tika-vin01t1:1654_2: – yadipi tassa visesādhigamo natthi, āyatiṃ pana nibbānādhigamatthāya vāsanābhāgiyā
tika-vin01t1:1654_3: ca sabbā purimapacchimadhammakathā ahosīti daṭṭhabbā. Na hi bhagavato niratthakā
tika-vin01t1:1654_4: dhammadesanā atthi. Temāsikopi deyyadhammoti temāsaṃ dātabbopi deyyadhammo. Yaṃ divasanti yasmiṃ divase.
tika-vin01t1:1655_0: 23. Buddhapariṇāyakanti buddho pariṇāyako etassāti buddhapariṇāyako, bhikkhusaṅgho.
tika-vin01t1:1655_1: Taṃ buddhapariṇāyakaṃ, buddhajeṭṭhakanti attho. Yāvadatthaṃ katvāti yāva attho, tāva
tika-vin01t1:1655_2: bhojanena tadā katanti adhippāyo. Dātuṃ upanītabhikkhāya paṭikkhepo nāma hatthasaññāya
tika-vin01t1:1655_3: mukhavikārena vacībhedena vā hotīti āha “hatthasaññāyā”tiādi. Onītapattapāṇinti ettha
tika-vin01t1:1655_4: onīto pattato pāṇi etassāti onītapattapāṇīti bhinnādhikaraṇavisayoyaṃ saddo bāhiratthasamāsoti
tika-vin01t1:1655_5: āha “pattato onītapāṇi”ntiādi. “Onittapattapāṇi”ntipi pāṭho, tassattho onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1655_6: vinābhūtaṃ āmisāpanayanena vā sucikataṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇi, taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1655_7: onittapattapāṇiṃ, hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti
tika-vin01t1:1655_8: attho. Pattuṇṇapaṭṭapaṭe cāti pattuṇṇapaṭe ca paṭṭapaṭe ca. Tattha pattuṇṇapadese
tika-vin01t1:1655_9: bhavā pattuṇṇā, kosiyavisesātipi vadanti. Paṭṭāni pana cīnapaṭāni. Āyogādīsu āyogoti
tika-vin01t1:1655_10: paṭiāyogo, aṃsabaddhakaṃ pattatthavikādīsu. Bhesajjatelānanti bhesajjasampākena sādhitatelānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1655_11: Tumbānīti cammamayatelabhājanāni. Ekamekassa bhikkhuno sahassagghanakaṃ telamadāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:1656_0: Mahāyāgaṃ yajitvāti mahādānaṃ datvā. Saputtadāraṃ vanditvā nisinnanti puttadārehi
tika-vin01t1:1656_1: saddhiṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ. Temāsanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. “Temāsaṃ sotabbadhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1656_2: ajjeva suṇissāmī”ti nisinnassa taṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūretvā desitattā vuttaṃ “paripuṇṇasaṅkappaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1657_0: Buddhānaṃ anabhiratiparitassitā nāma natthīti āha “yathājjhāsayaṃ yathārucitaṃ vāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1657_1: vasitvā”ti. Abhirantaṃ abhiratīti hi atthato ekaṃ. Abhirantasaddo cāyaṃ abhirucipariyāyo,
tika-vin01t1:1657_2: na assādapariyāyo. Assādavasena ca katthaci vasantassa assādavatthuvigamanena siyā
tika-vin01t1:1657_3: tassa tattha anabhirati, tayidaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ natthi, pageva buddhānaṃ, tasmā abhirativasena
tika-vin01t1:1657_4: katthaci vasitvā tadabhāvato aññattha gamanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ natthi, vineyyavinayanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1657_5: pana katthaci vasitvā tasmiṃ siddhe vineyyavinayatthameva tato aññattha gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1657_6: ayamettha yathāruci. Soreyyādīni anupagammāti mahāmaṇḍalacārikāya vīthibhūtāni soreyyanagarādīni
tika-vin01t1:1657_7: anupagantvā. Payāgapatiṭṭhānanti gāmassapi adhivacanaṃ titthassapi. Gaṅgaṃ nadinti
tika-vin01t1:1657_8: gaṅgaṃ nāma nadiṃ. Tadavasarīti ettha tanti karaṇatthe upayogavacananti āha “tena
tika-vin01t1:1659_0: Samantapāsādikāyāti samantato sabbaso pasādaṃ janetīti samantapāsādikā, tassā samantapāsādikāya.
tika-vin01t1:1659_1: Tatridaṃ samantapāsādikāya samantapāsādikattasminti ettha tatrāti purimavacanāpekkhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1659_2: idanti vakkhamānakāraṇavacanāpekkhaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – yaṃ vuttaṃ “samantapāsādikāya
tika-vin01t1:1659_3: vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyā”ti, tatra yā sā samantapāsādikāti saṃvaṇṇanā vuttā, tassā samantapāsādikāya
tika-vin01t1:1660_3: Parasamayavivajjanatoti “sakāya paṭiññāya mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”tiādīsu micchāpaṭipannānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1660_4: paresaṃ laddhinirākaraṇato, tatoyeva ca attano samayapatiṭṭhāpanena sakasamayavisuddhito.
tika-vin01t1:1661_1: vā nibbacanaṃ dassetvā padanipphattidassanaṃ byañjanaparisodhanaṃ. Vibhaṅganayabhedadassanatoti
tika-vin01t1:1661_3: ñāṇacakkhunā sammā passantānaṃ, upaparikkhantānanti attho. Apāsādikanti appasādāvahaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1661_4: Etthāti samantapāsādikāya. Sampassataṃ viññūnanti sambandho. Tasmā ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā
tika-vin01t1:1661_5: samantapāsādikātveva pavattāti yojetabbaṃ. Kassa kena desitassa saṃvaṇṇanāti āha “vinayassā”tiādi.
